1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA kAR+ShA ba ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bye ba/ oM sangs rgyas
1b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das gsung gi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po'i
2a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rnal 'byor
2a3(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams kyi ga rnams su rgyu ba dang ldan par rgyu/ / de la badzin dang rgyug gis blag s
2a4(rgyud 'bum): tsal pa/ bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang po'i dra ba bdag gis mthong // 'khor ba dang ni nges
2b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gas/ / mya ngan 'das pa so sor skyed// de yi dbus su skra chen po// bdag gi dbang po yis rig go/ dpa' bo rang
2b2(rgyud 'bum): gi rang bzhin ni/ / ye shes rgya mtshor mnyan par gyis// rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su// phag mo bdag ni 'dri ba'o// dbang
2b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i dra ba ci ru bshad/ / bdag gis gang du bshad par bya// mthong ba dang ni chen po'i sgra// bde ba za ba de bzhin ci// ting 'dzin
2b4(rgyud 'bum): ming ci de la ni/ / byung ba nyams par byas pa dang // 'khor ba yang dag byung ba ni// gang du thim par 'gyur ba yin// bcom ldan
2b5(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'das pa'i ming / / ji ltar slar yang yongs su skyed// skur brjod pa ni gsung bar mdzod// nyid kyi dbang pos rig pa ni//
3a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po bzhugs gyur pa'i// bdag gi bdag pos gsung bar mdzod// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug chen pos bka' stsal pa/
3a2(rgyud 'bum): phag mo lha rdzas pad+ma can// lha mo rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// sngon du spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// dbang po 'jig
3a3(rgyud 'bum): rten mchog chos bshad/ / dra ba de la yid rol pa'o// bdag gi nga rgyal tsam gyis ni// dam tshig mchog gang byung ba'o// de phyir ye shes che mthong ste//
3a4(rgyud 'bum): zab chen ba de la bzhugs pas so// gang du dbang po rnams kyis za// de yis nga yi ming sngon song // de tshe ting nge 'dzin tsam du// thub pa skyes
3a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ / yang dag lhag rtogs ye shes ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi lha dbang pos// de rnams su byung ba'i sbyor bas// mkha'
3a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro mchog mang gis byas so/ / bde dang mi bde gnyis nyams las// slar yang 'dir ni byung ba ste// sgra yi gzugs las byung zhing 'thon// dam
3b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul lo/ / sems gsum rnams kyi dbye ba yis// sgrub mo khyod kyis shes par gyis// 'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom// 'byung
3b2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'byung po'i dus su ni/ / yongs su gsal ba 'od gsal ba'o// de phyir 'jig rten 'khor bar byed// de ni 'khor bar yongs su brjod// 'dir ni sgyu ma skyes de bzhin// de ni thim pa'i
3b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po 'ang med/ / myang 'das gzhan pa'i rdzas yod min// 'khor ba yi ni phyi rol son// srid pa'i rtse mo gang 'dzin pa// de phyir mya ngan 'das par brjod// gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku//
3b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi gnas la rnam par 'phro// bdag chen ye shes gzugs kyi ni// dbang pos gsal bar rig pa ste// lha dang sbyin byed la sogs pas// mi mthong mkha' la 'gro ba'i gzugs// lha khyod
3b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni gsung rnams kyi/ / ye shes chen pos ros bdag tsham// de ring bdag la the tshom mchis// dpa' bo rnams kyi rang bzhin ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' rnams
3b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rang bzhin te/ / rang bzhin de rnams chos can no// 'dir ni 'dod pa dus brjod de// 'dod pa sems las yongs su byung // 'dod dang sems gnyis dag las ni// byung ba gzugs
3b7(rgyud 'bum): ni gtso bo'o/ / 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas// gang zhig mtha' ma rnams kyi sems// sems de ro mnyam gyur pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba
4a1(rgyud 'bum): las/ mkha' 'gro de ni de phyir byung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag nyid che// sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya// gang tshe sngon du yang dag byung // 'gro ba'i gtso bo tshangs pa'o// gnas
4a2(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin ji ltar stong / / mgon po sems can rnam grol byed// de tshe 'jig rten khams gzhan gyis// chung ngu 'dir ni bskul ba'o// gson gson byang chub spros son pa'i// sems can bsgral
4a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sems med pa/ / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khyod bzhugs nas// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar mdzod// yon tan ngag 'di thos nas ni// sems can grol byed 'di ltar bsgom// de bzhin gshegs
4a4(rgyud 'bum): pa kun rnam pa/ / 'gro ba'i gtso bo he ru ka/ dpal ni sngon du mngon brjod pas// rten la sogs pa bskyed pa ste// glu dang rol mo dri za dang // gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang // 'gro ba'i sde
4a5(rgyud 'bum): dang las dang ni/ / de yi rgyun las yongs su byung // de la sogs pa mtha' med dang // stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsum mo// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid
4a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bcu drug dang / / skye ba dang ni thim pa'i rgyu// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma de nyid// zla ba'i dbye bas 'gro ba'o// dga' ba rtag tu shes byas nas// tshes gcig zla ba 'phel bas so// nag po sogs
4a7(rgyud 'bum): dang dkar mthar yang / / thung ngu de bzhin 'dir shes bya// 'di skad thos pa bdag gi ngag/ gsang ba'i 'dod pa thams cad ster// de bzhin 'dir bdag the tshom mchis// gsang ba la sogs gsung ni ci// bdag
4b1(rgyud 'bum): gi bdag pos gsung bar mdzod/ / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa// lha mo chen mo bdag dga' 'o// sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i rgyur// mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad bya ste// rtse gcig pa yi sam
4b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis nyon/ / gsang ba khams thams cad kyi mtha'// dbang po'i gnas ni mchog yin la// rnam shes phun tshogs de rnams su// dgyes pa nam mkha' las byung ba'o// thams cad bdag nyid khams gsum
4b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi khyab bya'i gzugs su yang dag son/ / rtag bzhugs gnyis su med pa'i chos// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu mchog/ yang na bdag med bcu drug dang // khyad par du yang snying rje'o// de yi rnam pa ye shes
4b4(rgyud 'bum): chetshe/ de kho na nyid kun tu son// 'dir ni skye bar go bya ba// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor ro// thim pa bsgrub pa gnyis dang ni// de bzhin bsnyen pa gnyis kyang ngo // rnal 'byor thig ler bshad pa ste/
4b5(rgyud 'bum): phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o// dus kyi phyed dang zla ba yis// rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis rtsod dus son// 'di yi rdo rje'i zhal bzhi po// dga' ba brgyad gnyis su 'gyur te// cha shas bcu drug rnam
4b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i/ / phyogs kyi dbye bas 'gro ba'o// thung ngu nyi ma'i rgyu ba yis// de bzhin du ni cha shas zad// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// gnyis med ye shes bla na med// byang chub sems 'od chen por ni//
4b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po nges par 'gro// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med de// dngos rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin// sad pa na yang nyams pa ste// de gnas kun tu gnas min pa'o// rmi lam yul med
5a1(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ / dbang po kun las byung ba med// gnyid log pa yi stobs kyis ni// sa gsum po ni bza' bar bya// gnyid 'brug skyes pa'i dus de ltar// sad med gnyid med rmi lam
5a2(rgyud 'bum): med/ 'das pa'i bde ba'i dus rnams su// sangs rgyas nyid kyang lhag par gnas// mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchog tu bde// las kyi yul ni bsnyen byas na// sum cu rtsa
5a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum du ltung ngo / / ma rig pas bslang nges par ni// 'gro ba dmyal sogs 'jigs pa che// de phyir sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun// rdzu 'phrul che 'dir rjes chags bya// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag
5a4(rgyud 'bum): pomakha' 'gro ma kun gyi ni ming / / de ni bdag la sems dpas gsungs// mkha' 'gro kun la bdag mchog tu// gsang ba der ni btud byas nas// phag mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med tshig
5a5(rgyud 'bum): gis ji ltar zhes/ / de bzhin yang nas yang du dris// mkha' 'gro ma yi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ phra mo'i rnam pa rtsa gsum ste// rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rgyu// de phyir phra mor rig bya ste// rtsa 'byung ba ni
5a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid che/ / sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma// re re la ni de yongs ldan// mkha' 'gro ma kun der bshad de// gzhan yang de ltar ngo mtshar che// ming mdor bstan pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir// de kun ji lta bzhin
5a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya/ / zla ba 'o ma sdum pa mo// 'jam ma 'dod ma kun sbyin ma// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // sring mo'i bu mo ne ne mo// gnyen mo pha yi ma dang ni// zhang po yi yang chung ma dang // pad can dung can sna tshos/
5b1(rgyud 'bum): ma glang po ma dang myos brlabs ma// gzugs ma sgyu ma dri ma dang // ro ma reg ma yid ma dang // chos dbyings ma dang tshogs can ma// gnyid ma le lo ma gzhan mnan// rlom pa mo dang sgeg mo dang // bzang
5b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal ma dang drag mo ma/ / 'thung zhing za ma 'jigs pa mo// ha ha sgrogs ma dur khrod ma// bcom ldan dgyes mar rtag tu bshad// sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma// las kyi cho ga blangs pa yis// gzhan gyi
5b3(rgyud 'bum): ming yang shes par bya/ / gang zhig gang gir mngon brjod pa'i// rtsa de 'dir ni brjod pa'o// de rnams sems dpa' de rang bzhin// mthar gyur mchog tu zhi ba'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos po yang // mchog tu
5b4(rgyud 'bum): zag med rnal 'byor ldan/ / mdog dang phyag sogs rnam pa ru// srid pa'i 'khor lor yang dag byung // gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs 'dir// pul+li ra sogs dbus su'o// gang zhig gang gi lha bdag po/
5b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni de dang des rgyas gdab// nyid dang bdag tu rtsen gyur pas// bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan// 'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu de bzhin dang po'i lha// mkha' 'gro ma kun bde ster ba'i// bcom
5b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs so/ / nam mkha' thog ma tha ma med// gang 'drar mchog tu 'du shes pa// de 'drar bdag ni rig pa ste// snang med par yang yongs su gsal/ der ni 'byung ba'ang yod min te/
5b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa yi tha skang mchog/ ji ltar mkha' las mi byung ba// tha med me 'dir de bzhin no// ro bro ba ni gcig dngos la// de yi nang na dngos mang po// gcig dang duma'i rang bzhin 'das// thams cad /
6a1(rgyud 'bum): ro'i khyab bdag/ pho nya rnams kyi bdag po yis// sa gsum po ni mchog tu za// thabs dang shes rab snying rje che// lha yi bdag po gzhan med do// 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min//
6a2(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma yang ni mi dmigs so// de ltar rtag shes rnal 'byor pas// 'dod bya kun la longs spyad bya// rtag tu nang du gyur byas nas// kha dog rnams ni zhal las byung // rtag tu lus kyi sbyin pa ste// sems/
6a3(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba spang bar bya// de ltar 'dod chags sgyu mtha' la// rol pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo // 'dod chags bral ba dga' ba gsum// spangs pa dbu ma zag pa med// gzung bar bya ba min pa ste// dngos po'i
6a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin 'dod chags min/ / bral ba'i dga' ba nyams pa ste// de la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o// de gnyis dbus na gnas pa yi// chos de la yang dga' dmigs med// dbye ba med pa yi ni chos// rdo rje la ni
6a5(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar gyis/ / lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig mngon sum byed pa'o// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// rnam par byas pa'i dbyibs su 'gyur// stong nyid rang bzhin gzugs rnal 'byor//
6a6(rgyud 'bum): rang byin rlab pa'i mtshan nyid do// bdag byin rlab dang bral rnal 'byor// spun sgrogs dum bu bzhin shes bya// 'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid mchog gyur pa// skye bo phyugs rnams kyis mi shes// de phyir sgyu 'phrul
6a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di bsgoms na/ / byang chub bla na med pa 'thob// skye ba 'di la glen pa nyid// shes rab snyan dngags skyes bur 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i yon tan tshogs ldan pas// rmi lam dang ni mnyam par ltos// rnal 'byor
6b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud/ / 'gro ste de phyir 'jig rten pa'o// mngon sum rang nyid sngags kyi sku// 'khor lo gsum rnams nyis 'gyur ro// gcig la 'khor lo gsum bshad de// gnyis la nyis 'gyur du ni 'dod//
6b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gsum po thabs shes rab// snyoms par 'jug par 'chad pa'o// de ni nyis 'gyur zhes bya ste// 'khor lo nyis 'gyur des bshad do// khams gsum gyi ni gnas chen po// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
6b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa'o/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' dbang che// bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs so// chos dang chos min gang du nub//
6b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub der ni sems gzung gis// grub pa lha dang lha ma yin// dbang po dang ni yul dang ni// khams dang skye mched thams cad ni// skye ba dang ni 'gag pa ste// rmongs pa 'ching zhing mkhas pa ni// yongs
6b5(rgyud 'bum): su shes pas grol ba'o/ / sems 'di rang nyid mngon sum du// khams gsum du ni rnam par gnas// bdag dang mchog khyod gnyis med las// tshogs pa'i gtso bo byung ba'o// spyod lam la sogs
6b6(rgyud 'bum): bye brag chos/ / mdo sde rnam shes dbu ma pa// mos pa'i sems can rnams bshad de// bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min// phyag ni bcu gnyis dang ldan te// de bzhin zhal ni bzhi pa'o// kha dog nam mkha'
6b7(rgyud 'bum): sngon po la/ / spyan gsum brkyang bskum ldan pa ste// 'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan// gzhan ni 'bum tsho stong phrag go// gang dang gang gi rgyud kyi ni// phyi nang gsang ba nang bdag nyid// de dang de yi
6b8(rgyud 'bum): gzugs nges par/ / lha ni he ru ka'i bdag nyid// rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang mchog tu// dbye ba mos pa'i dbang gis te// ming ni de ltar shes par bya// 'on kyang he ru ka bsres pa'o// kha dog de dang 'drar shes bya//
7a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs tshul he ru ka'i rnam pa// sa ni bcu gnyis rnams kyi rgyu// de yis he ru ka dang 'dra// rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems
7a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ste 'di ni le'u dang po'o//
7a3(rgyud 'bum): phag mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor mas// slar yang rdo rje mchod byas te// bcom ldan bdag pos bstan par mdzod// phag mo ci yis yongs su byung // bskyed pa gang gis bskyed pa yin// rang bzhin ji/
7a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar du ni 'dod// bdag byung ba yi rgyu mtshan ci// 'dir ni dgos pa ji ltar yin// dbang po dang ni yul thams cad// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rab zhugs// spyi bo'i rdo rje'i gur du ni// steng du kha bltas rlung
7a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bab bo/ / 'dod chags nyi ma'i dbus su ni// skad cig gis ni sprul thim gyur// der skyes pa yi phag mo ni// b+ha ga ling ga yid las byung // bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin khams// de rnams las ni sngon du skyes//
7a6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin bdag med gcig pu ste// mkha' mnyam rnal 'byor gzugs can no// rgyu mtshan skye bo dgrol ba dang // snying rje'i gzugs rang bzhin du byung // 'dir ni dgos pa gnyis rig ste// phyag rgya sbyor ba rab sgrub
7a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / khyod ni lha mo'i bdag po ste// kun tu spyod pa mang spyod pa'o// sngags kyi 'phreng ba brje byas nas// a yig la sogs de'i khyab bdag/ yang na phag mo'i rtsa ba dang // go cha'i sngags rnams kyis ldan te/
7b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge re re'i sngags kyi ni// spyod pa sdom par son pa'o// rnal 'byor ma mchog skye ba ni// rtsa yi mchog gi grong ngu ste// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi// dbus ma a ba d+hU tI'i 'o// dbu ma 'di ltar thams cad kyi
7b2(rgyud 'bum): khyab byed du ni rnam par gnas/ / de phyir phag mo gtso mo yin// go 'phang mchog bzhin shes par bya// rdo rje la sogs ming thog mar// a rdo rje dang ka rdo rje// sngags mthar de la sogs pa ste// yang na so so tha dad
7b3(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / gang gis dus su sngags zlos pa// de dus rnams su rnal 'byor ldan// lte ba'i spyi bo snying gyen du// 'di ltar 'gro dang 'ong ba med// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma gtso mo// de ni bdag nyid rnam par 'phro//
7b4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi 'khor ldan rnal 'byor ma// zhing dang zhing rnams su ni 'gro// lha mo khyod ni bdag po ste// nga dang lhan cig kha sbyor ro// dus dang dus ni ma yin par// nam mkha'i bu ga'i nang 'dug nas// de bzhin
7b5(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas lam 'thon nas/ / 'chi ba med pa'i sa bon 'dzag/ der ni 'pho med ye shes bya// hig phyed yi ges bsgom bya ste// mi mo skyes bu'i dus su yang // mchog tu zag med mngon par bya// de byung ba
7b6(rgyud 'bum): yi rig ma che/ / sgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis bri'o// thog mar rnam snang mgon po ste// ri mo gsum skor lte 'og gnas// langs nas mgrin pa'i bar du 'gro/ sa gsum sgron ma lta bur son// gzhan
7b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags ni sa mtha' 'dra/ / de las zla 'bab g.yon nas so// sngags 'di thig les brgyan pa ste// sngags ni rnal 'byor ma bskyed pa'o// slar yang sa bon gnyis pa brjod// g.yas pa nyi ma bskyed pa ste//
8a1(rgyud 'bum): logs su gnyis phye mgor thig le// ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon no// byang chub sems chen 'bab lam mo// 'di ni phag mo'i sa bon yin// A yi yi ges mthar brgyan pa// bcu
8a2(rgyud 'bum): drug zla phyed nyi mas brgyan/ / ya sde'i dang po'i sa bon ni// sbyor bas sa gsum rlung yon tan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pas rgyas gdab// dkar po'i phyogs kyis mgo bor brgyan// thig le dang ni bcas pa 'bar
8a3(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba bzhi pa dag pa'o/ / pa sde'i mtha' ma bde ba'i gzugs// oM yi yi ge zhon ldan pa// mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas mnan// sa yi pha rol gzhom med ma// nyi ma yi ni gdan la gnas// dbyangs kyi bzhi
8a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rtsa drung bzung / / mgo bor zla phyed thig les brgyan// 'dod chags mtha' yi rang bzhin no// ye shes sa bon nyis 'gyur dbyer// spro ba dang ni bsdu bas skyes// 'og dang steng du gnas pa yi// mgon po
8a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rdzogs 'dzin pa/ / snying kha dang ni chu skyes su// don gyi cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa'o// yongs su skrag byed ma sa bon// pa mtha'i yi ge bzung nas ni// slar yang de bzhin brjod par bya// dbu rgyan
8a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba 'dzin grong gi/ bu gar gtum mo sbyor ba'o// byang chub sems kyis sa gsum 'gengs// de ltar bshad pa'i sngags gang ni// rim pas yi ge rnams mi mthun// rnal 'byor ma yi ming ldan par//
8a7(rgyud 'bum): las dus de ltar rtogs par bya// re re'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni// yi ge yi ni grangs kyis so// bdag nyid chen po rnam par 'phro// byang chub cha shas cha rgyu'o// thog mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba// chos kyi
8b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyings ni bya ba'i gzugs/ / ta sde'i lnga pa'i yi ge ni// lnga pa yi ni sde tshan no// rnal 'byor ma gzugs nam mkhar rten// pa mtha'i sa bon oM dbyangs ldan// gti mug 'joms par byed ma ste// rnam
8b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o/ / de yi bzhi pa'i sa bon ni// sa gsum du ni khyab pa yi// rnal 'byor ma ni spro ba'o// thog ma'i sde yi gsum pa ste// 'gro ba drug po nyams byed pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor
8b3(rgyud 'bum): lo spro/ / ya sde'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no// lnga pa'i sde yi thog ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi sa bon te// i yi dbyangs kyis mgo la reg/ chu yi yi ge yongs bsags pa//
8b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin no// tsa sde'i dbus gnas bzung nas ni// nyi ma yi ni gdan ldan pa// las kyi dus su khyad par ldan// phag mo yi ni sa bon ni// a yi yi ge rna bar reg/ sa gsum ye shes
8b5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin mnyam/ / me yi sa bon dbyangs gnyis ldan// 'khor ba'i las kyi rang bzhin no// sa mtha'i mgo la i dbyangs reg/ rtag tu tshangs pa'i rang bzhin blta// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzung nas ni//
8b6(rgyud 'bum): de ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs// sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o// ya yig gnas pa ra dang ldan// slar yang i yi dbyangs sbyar ro// khams gsum rnal 'byor ma spro'o// drug pa'i sde yi dang po ni//
8b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma sngags kun rang bzhin// ra gnas pa ni a dbyangs ldan// sdang ba'i sems can gsod byed 'gyur// dza yi yi ge yongs bzung ste// i yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yongs ldan
9a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / so yi sa bon rna ba la// e yi dbyangs kyis reg pas dbye// klu yi sngags ni sbyar bya ste// tre yi yi ge sa gsum kun// ye shes kyi ni khyad par sngags// la yi yi ge o dang ldan//
9a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin te// byang chub byed pa'i don yin no// thog ma'i ka ni ya stan ldan// 'chi dang lhan skyes dbye ba med// pa yi sde yi mtha' ma la// a yi yi ge d+hi byangs sbyar bya// sa gsum gyi ni ma
9a3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin/ / ta yig e yi yi ges brgyan// bde ba 'dzin par byed pa'o// slar yang pa sde'i mtha' ma ste// tshad med pa yi lhan skyes kyi// dbus na bzhugs pa'i rang bzhin no// sa yi mtha' ma A dang ldan//
9a4(rgyud 'bum): / rdor sems ye shes gzhom med pa'o// ya'i sde'i mtha' ma i dbyangs ldan// me shes rang bzhin 'joms byed pa'o// t+ye sngags chos dbyings rang bzhin te// thams cad rang bzhin du khyab pa'o// bu ga rnams
9a5(rgyud 'bum): / nas 'dzag pas// 'bab pa'i sa bon nyi ma ldan// chu srin dbang po yi ni sngags// pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon ni// U dbyangs stan dang ldan pa ste// 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa nyams byed pa// ta yi sngags kyis nga /
9a6(rgyud 'bum): nyams byed// slar yang pa'i sde'i bzhi pa ni// sgra chen po ni sgrogs pa'o// rlung gi sa bon A yig reg/ sngags ni nor bu 'bab bzhin pa'o// chu yi sa bon rnar gzung ba// sgyu ma yi ni rang bzhin no// sa yi pha
9a7(rgyud 'bum): rolol e yig ldan/ / sa gsum gyi ni 'khrul 'joms rgyu// pa sde'i mtha' ma rkang rang bzhin// sa yi pha rol A dang ldan// ngo mtshar che ba yi ni chos// ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni// pad+ma'i sa bon mchog yig go/
9b1(rgyud 'bum): rtswa li dbus ma'i sa bon ni// ra ni mgol gnas pa ste// e yig gis ni phye ba ni// g+ha dang b+hU min rang bzhin no// de ltar sngags tshig drug po che// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs smrog// las kun rang bzhin 'tsha/
9b2(rgyud 'bum): lo'o// snying rje'i 'dod par gyur pa yi// de kho na nyid tshig rgya che// rnal 'byor thams cad rab 'gengs pa'i// bcom ldan mkha' 'gros 'di gsungs so// 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad bya ste// khyod kyis
9b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor chung rgya che/ / kun nas yongs su zlum por ni// ri mo bcu gsum bri bar bya// lha mo dum bu bcu gnyis 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs kyis brgyan// rtsi bla re re la'ang yi ge ni// rim pas yongs su
9b4(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar sbyin/ / lhag ma nyi shu bzhi yi ge/ thams cad lte ba'i snying po la'o// de rnams kyis ni bskyed pa'i rtsa// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// so so re re yi ni 'khor// nor dang mda' dang zla ba'o// kun la
9b5(rgyud 'bum): lhag pas dman pa ni/ / nor dang rig byed tshogs pa'o// der gnas pa la 'khrul 'khor btu// las gcig ji ltar mos pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa ni// rtsa thams cad du 'char dus su// der ni dbang po dang
9b6(rgyud 'bum): ni yul/ / las kyi dus su gsad par bya// yid ces bya ba bskrad bya zhing // sems ni dbang du bya ba ste// khams dang skye mched gzhan de bzhin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya// phung po kun dang de bzhin srog/ dgug pa
9b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni sdang ba'o/ / lus dang ngag dang de bzhin sems// de rnams rengs par bya ba'o// las gzhan ji ltar rigs pa yis// brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya yang ngo // yang na sa bon ci 'dra ba// de yi tshad dang mnyam las so//
10a1(rgyud 'bum): de dus bdag nyid che ba yis// yi ges bskyed dang 'joms pa'o// phag mo rdo rje gtso mo yi// 'khrul 'khor gnyis pa bshad bya ste// ya de'i mtha' yi sa bon no// byang chub sa bon rab
10a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / lce gnyis yi ge ra yig ldan// rnal 'byor ma sngags A yig dgang // sa gnas pa ni mi g.yo ba'o// na yi yi ge e dang ldan// sems can kun sprul rgyu mtshan no// thog gnas dbyangs ni thog
10a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i mgon/ / lce gnyis e dbyangs mgo la reg/ sa gsum khams kyi rang bzhin no// ta yi yi ge e dang ldan// lnga pa yi ni thog ma ste// rnal 'byor ma yi rang bzhin no// ya sde gzhir gnas pa'i sa bon//
10a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin no// brgyad pa'i sde'i thog sa bon// stong pa yis ni brgyan pa ste// khu ba'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid// gnyis par gnas pa'i thog ma ni// keng rus thig le 'dzin pa'o// ya sde'i gnyis pa'i
10a5(rgyud 'bum): sa bon ni/ / i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa ste// rdo rje snying gnas mgon po'o// ta mtha' e yi yi ges brgyan// skye gnas la ni spras pa'o// ta yig nyi ma dang ldan pa// rims 'joms pa'i rgyal po'o// b+ha ni nyin
10a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan a yig brgyan/ / lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa'o// pa sde'i mtha' ma gnas rang bzhin// Ta mtha' i yis brgyan pa ni// 'gugs pa yi ni rang bzhin no// bi sho Sha'i sngags bzhi ste// dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin
10a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ gter chen po yi sa bon no// ra yig o yi yi ges brgyan// rtsa drag po yi rang bzhin no// sha yis gnyis pa'i sa bon ni// snying po yi ni gzugs su'o// Ni yig rang bzhin gyis bzung ba// rnal 'byor ma
10b1(rgyud 'bum): yi de nyid do/ / ka yig ra yig o yig ldan// dbu ma brkyang ma ro rang bzhin// ta pa'i bar gnas gzung bar bya// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi ni// rkang pa brgyad pa sgrub rang bzhin// ta sde'i mtha' ma i yig brgyan//
10b2(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i dbus kyi rtsa rang bzhin// ka ru mngon brjod gzung bar bya// de yis las rnams zad par byed// ra yig a yi yi ges gzung // mgo bo'i dbus nas sgra chen 'dzag/ sa yi sa bon i yig ldan// gru
10b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ni dbus su'o/ / ta yi mtha' ma is brgyan pa// sprul pa'i steng dang 'og tu'o// ta yig ra yig A yig sbyar// chos kyi dbyings ni gru gsum ste// de phyir sa gsum skyed pa'o// sa gzung dbus ma
10b4(rgyud 'bum): bcas sa bon/ / na yig i dang ldan rang bzhin// pa sde'i mtha' ma a yis brgyan// sgyu ma'i ngo bo pad+ma'i rtsa// ra gang gnas pa rna rang bzhin// Ta sde'i mtha' ma i dang ldan// ma lus dbyer med sems can
10b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams 'dzin pa yi mgon po'o/ / de ltar sngags tshig bcu brjod de// dus bzhi yi ni tshad can no// rnal 'byor ma kun las kyi ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba longs spyod pa// dus kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin can/
10b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma gnas 'du ba ni// 'khor lo 'khor lor shes pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug gi/ ye shes las ni de bzhin byed// yon por smra ba rnams kyi ni//
10b7(rgyud 'bum): de'i rdul grangalasaskyed par 'dod// bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bzung nas// phyi nas blo ldan gyis sngags sbyor// sngon du pa la ra stan no// thog ma yi ni chos gzugs so// de yi bzhi par gnas pa la// e mi
11a1(rgyud 'bum): migs rnang brtan pa/ / rnas 'byor ma rnams kyis sngags so// ta sde'i dbus nas ci 'dod stem// nA mig ma~M mi yi ke lam// sku tshogs sprul pa byed pa'o// ba rig smos pa dang /
11a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'o// rA yi yi ge a dang ldan// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo sgyur// tsaM ste'i dbus gnas sa bon gzung // gang la de lha'i rang bzhin no// rlung bsags pa ni e yig ldan// a haM yi ge'i rang bzhin
11a3(rgyud 'bum): no/ ya yi sde yi mtha' ma la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan// sna tshogs ye shes sngags rang bzhin// dza yi sa bon mtha' med par// 'bar bar 'gyur ba yi ni gzugs// yi ge ya ni e yig
11a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan theg pa kun gyi lta ba'i gzugs/ / ci sde'i gsum pa'i sa bon ni// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs zhes bya// pa mtha' de yi bzhi pa la'o// sngags thams cad kyi bla ma'o// ta sde'i mtha' ma dbyangs gsu
11a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma lus sems can 'bod pa'i gzugs/ / dro ba'i gsum pa ta stan can// 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas 'gro sgrol// de bzhin m+b+ha'i yi ge bzung // sa ni bcu bzhi pa'i gzugs so// ni sngags rnal 'byor
11a6(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams kyi/ / brda yis su ni 'jug pa'o// pa sde'i mtha' ma o yig reg/ sna tshogs mi shes 'dzin pa'o// sa mthar rdor sems rang bzhin no// ni yi yi ge chos dang ni// chos min sun 'byin pa yin no//
11a7(rgyud 'bum): ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni// rnal 'byor ma ste nam mkha'i gzugs// dzaM yig ra yig stan can ni// khu ba'i rang bzhin shar ba'o// slar yang rlung gi mtha' ma ni// a yi yi ges gzi bskyed pa// tshangs pa pad+ma/
11b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ni gzugs// ra yig a yi yi ge ldan// 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin no// sa mtha' dbyangs gsum mgo la gnas// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'bab pa'i gzugs// ma ni dbus ma de nyid gzugs// sa
11b2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' a yis bkang ba ste/ / rnal 'byor ma gzugs kyi khar brjod// ya yig o yi cod pan gnas// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no// ka sde'i dbus gnas dbyangs gsum brgyan// de nyid mid pa'i rang bzhin
11b3(rgyud 'bum): no/ ni yi yi ge rang bzhin med// gnyis pa yi ni thog ma la// a yi yi ge gsal bar byas// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no// pa sde'i mtha' ma e dang ldan// thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no// pa yis
11b4(rgyud 'bum): bon mthar sha ste/ / ya sde'i mtha' yig stan can ni// khu ba dang ni rlung dbyer med// i dbyangs mgor brgyan me sa bon// grub pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no// ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon no// nam mkha' rnal 'byor ma
11b5(rgyud 'bum): yi gzugs/ / sa bon de yi mtha' yi ge/ e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa// dpa' bo gcig pu mi bskyod pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin// de ltar rkang pa dgu po ni// rnal 'byor ma tshogs yi ge ste// khams
11b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ni sngags rang bzhin/ / sngags kun spyod pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// mkha' 'gro dam tshig la bzhugs nas// dngos grub thams cad rab gsol ba'i// bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so//
11b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gsum pa'i nus pa yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o// rnal 'byor rnams kyi las dus su// sgyu mas thams cad rmongs par bya// rdo rje ma bdag slar langs nas// 'khor lo gzhan gyi rnal 'byor
12a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu mi 'gyur gtso bo la/ / bdag med ma yis dam 'khyud do// ta yi sngags kyis gnyis pa sbyor// d+ya gnas me dang rlung sa bon// bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags che// de yi gnyis
12a2(rgyud 'bum): pa sa bon ni/ / A yi yi ges dgang ba'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi rang bzhin// pa yig ra yig o yig sbyar// gsum po rlung gi rang bzhin no// ta yi yi ge aM yig ldan// slar yang rnam shes sa bon no//
12a3(rgyud 'bum): ka yi sde yi dbus gnas pa// e yi yi ges rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya rang bzhin// slar la yang ni brjod par bya'o// tshig 'di thabs shes dbyer med dngos// sa mtha' dang ni na yi sngags//
12a4(rgyud 'bum): slar la yang ni brjod par bya// skyed cing sdud par byed gzugs so// pa ra a yig sa bon gcig/ don dam pa yi yi ge'o// Ta mtha' A yi yi ge ldan// gzhom du med las skyes pa'o// ta yi mtha' ma
12a5(rgyud 'bum): kun 'joms pa'o/ / ka ka dang ni Na gnas la// dbyangs gsum sbyar zhing thig le sbyin// rnal 'byor ma kun 'bod pa'o// de bzhin du ni kha kha dang // gsum pa Na ru gnas pa'o// dub pa sel bar byed pa'i
12a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu d+hu na yi ni sngags kyi tshig/ lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed// ya sde'i mtha' ma yi ni sngags// rdo rje bu gar brgyan pa'o// rtsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni// ra yi
12a7(rgyud 'bum): stan la yongs su gnas/ / gti mug za bar byed pa'o// sa mtha' gzhom med dbus ma'o// sha sde'i gsum pa ha stan can// e yi yi ges rna bar brgyan// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs// 'bod
12b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa yi ni sngags/ / sho Sha la yi sngags kyi tshig/ lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// ye shes can rlom nga rtul 'joms// byang chub byang chub med de nyid// de ltar rkang pa bcu gnyis mi// sa dang rnal 'byor
12b2(rgyud 'bum): las rang bzhin/ / bcu gnyis sa rnams khyab bdag gi/ bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so// yi ge rnams kyi gnas sogs kyi// brda yis de nyid pha rol 'gro/ bdag las sems can thams cad skyes//
12b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can las kyang bdag byung ngo // bdag de rtag tu med gyur nas// sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin gshegs// 'khrul 'khor 'di ni stobs che ste// las rnams ji lta bar ni byung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid
12b4(rgyud 'bum): du/ dus 'dir thams cad 'gyur ba'o// 'khor lo lnga pa 'di rnams su// mya ngan 'das pa'ang brjod par bya// lha sogs thams cad rgyun du gsod// de rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grol// bka' stsal pa/
12b5(rgyud 'bum): ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni// rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs de nyid do// Ta bzung ba mtha'i stan can te// aM gis cod pan brgyan par bya// de la a yi yi ges dgang // 'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin no// ka sde'i
12b6(rgyud 'bum): / dbus gnas sa bon ni// drug gis reg pa 'phrog par byed// ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin// na yi mtha' ma a yig ldan// me 'bar ba yis dbang ldan te// 'dzin pa yi ni sa bon ni// spyod pa'i khyab bdag
12b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'o/ / ta yi sde yi bzhi pa ni// a yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa yi// srid pa dang bral ba yi gzugs// nyi ma a yig ldan ro langs// ta mtha'i sa bon gzung bar bya// dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan/
13a1(rgyud 'bum): sa gsum thams cad gsod pa'o// pa sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni// yid kyi smra ba rtog med byed// sa mtha'i A yi ngag ldan pa// thar pa'i shes ni rtog pa'o// ma gnyis ha gnyis brjod par bya//
13a2(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'phrog cing 'phrog/ pa yi sa bon i yig brgyan// pha nags kun nyams gzung de nyid// sha yi yi ges i dang ldan// seng ge za ba yi ni sngags// ta yi sngags slar yang 'chi med skye//
13a3(rgyud 'bum): pa mtha' a yi yi ges dgang // thig les cod pan la reg pa'o// rgyal 'chi ba rtogs pa yin// sa yig dbyangs gnyis brjod phyir brgyan// sngon du 'phrog par byed pa'o// sha gnas sa bon dur khrod de//
13a4(rgyud 'bum): ta mtha' i dang ldan pa ni// thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o// pa sde'i mtha' ma i dbyangs ldan// sdang ba'i yid ni 'dzin chen po'o// na yig u stan rtog kun sel// pa sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni// a
13a5(rgyud 'bum): / yig mgor reg thig le gnas// byang chub sgrub pa yi ni sngags// thur du sel ba'i rlung gis so// ta dang ra yi yi ge gnyis// sa ni 'jigs par byed sngags so// pa ra a yi sa bon gcig/ sum cu rtsa gsum
13a6(rgyud 'bum): skyo dub 'joms/ / ya sde'i mtha' ma ri mnan pa// ye shes kyi ni dag byed do// Na yi 'gram gnas sa bon ni// e yis rna bar brgyan pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yi mi shes 'joms// sa yig a yi yi ges
13a7(rgyud 'bum): dgangs/ / dbugs chad pa ni nyams par byed// na sngags gsum pos mgo la brgyan// chos dang chos min spong rang bzhin// d+ha yig ya dang sbyar ba ste// bsam gtan sngags kyi rang bzhin no// ta sde'i
13b1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ma gzung bya ste/ / grong khyer ltar snang dngos po med// ya sde'i gnyis po'i sa bon ni// gti mug rang bzhin 'bar ba'o// sa yig i yi yi ges dbye// seng ge ma he 'joms pa'o// nyi mar yang ni gnas
13b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ rnal 'byor ma kun rgyal po'o// ba sde'i mtha' ma A dbyangs brgyan// sgyu mar sems can kun nges 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i sa bon a yig brgyan// de kho na yi ye shes thob// de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi po//
13b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi mi shes gsod// dam pa'i sngags dngos gzugs bdag nyid// 'byin cing sdud par byed pa po// 'byung po thams cad 'jigs byed pa// bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so// 'khor
13b4(rgyud 'bum): lo'i rnam pa'i gzugs bdag nyid/ / phag mo'i thugs khar brgyan pa ste// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med par// gsod pa dang ni mi gsod pa'i// ka ste'i dbus na ra stan can// gsum de'i mgo la thig le
13b5(rgyud 'bum): / sbyin/ theg pa mchog gi chos can no// ta sde'i gnyis pa'i yi ge ni// i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o// mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams byed pa'o// ta yig rtogs par byed pa'o// ta sde'i gzhir gnas A dang
13b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan byang chub mtha' med 'dzin pa'o/ / ra gnas pa la dbyangs gsum brgyan// rnal 'byor ma kun 'chang ba'o// na sngags i yig gis brgyan pa'o// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi la mo// sum+b+ha na yi tshig rkang
13b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// tshig drug rtogs pa'i de nyid do// de bzhin du ni sum+b+ha'i sngags// rnal 'byor ma yi mchod rang bzhin// ha na'i sngags ni lan gnyis brjod// sdang ba'i theg pa nyams par byed// /
14a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ra a yi yi ge gcig/ dbang po rang rang ngo bo gzhan// Na a aM gi yi ges dgang // sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags// sa yig rtsa kun 'dzag pa'o// ba yig ra yi yig brgyan ri// pa
14a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas nam mkha' la 'jug pa'o/ / sa yi yig gnas kun gyi gzugs// ya sde'i mtha' ma A yis dgang // rlung ni srog gi ye shes so// na yig A yi yi ges dgang // byang chub gang du'ang mi rtog pa'o//
14a3(rgyud 'bum): / thig le mgo la blta bar bya// pa sde'i mtha' ma sbrang chen gzugs// sa mtha' A yis dgang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs srog go/ pa mtha' a dang ldan pa la// aM gi cod pan la brgyan pa'o// chos
14a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin/ / sa yig dam chos mi shes gsod// ts+tshe sngags byang chub sems dpa' bo// song ba 'khor bar skye ba med// ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni// da ni don med pa snang ba'o// na la i dang
14a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ste/ / 'jig rten ma lus 'ching ba nyid// klo sngags gnon pas 'khor ba gcod// d+ha yi sa bon 'gro kun 'joms// spros pa med par byed pa'o// mU yi yi ge sa bon ni// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi/
14a6(rgyud 'bum): las de ltar phyed bcas tshig bcu bzhi// rtsa yi 'khor lo yi ni mtha' 'o// bum pa can la sogs pa'i las// rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed// 'khor lo drug gi rab sbyor bas// ci 'dod las kyi
14a7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin te/ / bdag po sbyor ba grub nus can// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// gtsug tor la sogs skye gnas mthar// lus ngag sems shes nam mkha' las// lugs 'byung lugs
14b1(rgyud 'bum): las bzlog pa yis/ / de nyid byang chub rnam shes bya// 'dir ni thabs kyi cha dang ni// shes rab kyi yang cha ru brjod// yang na yi ge re re yi// bar bar du ste slar yang ni/ d+hi sngags lhan skyes rang bzhin te//
14b2(rgyud 'bum): / 'khor lo yi ni khyad par gyi// nye ba'i las rnams byed pa'o// daMSh+T+rA ka rA li yi sngags// 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin no// ma sngags ha sngags mu dre'i sngags// rna ba yi ni rang bzhin no// shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya gra
14b3(rgyud 'bum): ma hi Shi'i/ / sngags tshig sna yi rang bzhin no// sa ha sra shi re'i ni sngags// dbyangs kyi bdag po yi ni gzugs// sa ha sra bA ha b+he yi// sngags kyi yi ge lus kyi gzugs// sha ta sa'i sngags 'khor lo gcig/
14b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags 'chi ba dang // skye ba yi ni rang bzhin no// gnyis med rnam pa'i chos las ni// gnyis su sems can 'dzin pa ste// shes rab la ni bde ster ba// bcom ldan bla mas 'di gsungs so//
14b5(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos la sogs mu stegs rnams// mi shes pa yi phyugs thams cad// de rnams ye shes thob bya'i phyir// tshul lugs 'di ni bstan pa'o// ha s+thA na ne yi ni sngags// yul gyi gzugs la reg
14b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ dz+wa li ta te dza se'i sngags// sngags kyi tshig ni yid kyi yul// dz+wa la mu kha'i tshig lus yul// ping ga lo ce na yi sngags// mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// badz+ra sha rI'i re'i sngags tshig/ lus kyi
14b7(rgyud 'bum): / rnam par shes pa'o// badz+rA sa ne yi ni sngags// sna yi yul la reg pa'o// mi li ta yi sngags kyi tshig/ sna yi rnam par shes pa'o// tsi li te yi sngags kyi tshig/ dbyangs kyi bdag po yi ni yul// he sngags gnyis
15a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod sgra yi yul/ / sgra dang dbyangs gnyis kyi rnam shes// de ltar sngags tshig phyed bcas bdun// 'chi dang skye ba kun gyi gzugs// phag mo la ni bde dga' ba'i// bcom ldan bdag pos
15a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs te/ / po la ka ko sbyor bdag nyid// yul dang dbang po sogs gsod pa'o// sems can gang dang gang rnams kyi// yul gyi chu skyes las skyes te// sems can de dang de rnams kyi// rang rang las
15a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis gsod pa'o/ / yul la sogs pa 'joms pas na// shes rab 'khor lor de bshad do// rgyu dang rgyud rnams kyi ni las// sgrub pa'i snying po'i ye shes so// sa mtha' drug po'i dbyangs stan can//
15a4(rgyud 'bum): / zla dum thig les mgo la brgyan// lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i gzugs// kha gnyis d+hu gnyis mu ru gnyis// las rnams kyi ni dngos po ste// srog dang mnyam du gnas pa/
15a5(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ a dwai te ma hA yo gi nI// pa Shi ta sid+d+he'i sngags kyi tshig/ de yang lus mtha' yi ni gzugs// dr-i d+haM tshig gnyis gram tshig gnyis// he yi tshig gnyis ha tshig gnyis// khro bcu'i yi ge gshin rje ni// mthar byed
15a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs kyir gor bya/ / pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon la// I yig mgo la reg pa'o// me sa'i sngags ni tshig kun te// mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin no// de ltar sngags tshig bcu gnyis ni// rten 'brel bcu gnyis
15a7(rgyud 'bum): bslu ba ste/ / ston pa dam tshig chen po gtso// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi// las kyis lhan cig rmugs byed pa'o// pho nya rnams bskyed pa'i yi ge/ 'khor lo'i
15b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa'i rang bzhin can/ / 'khor lo yi ge min de ltar// pho nya'i rang bzhin med pa'o// rnam smin de las rnam skyes pa// so so'i ming du 'du shes te// 'jam rdor la sogs dngos po yis// a ba d+hU tI'i
15b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid bya/ / sa ha dpa' bo gcig sngags tshig/ de bzhin gshegs drug sa bon te// yon tan mtha' med 'chad pa'o// hA yi sa bon yi ge bzhi// ho gcig ho gnyis brjod par bya// yi ge bdun po bgra
15b3(rgyud 'bum): / sogs khams// trai lo kya bi nA sha'i sngags sdang ba la ni cho ga'o// sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti// ta thA ga ta pa ri bA re// sa mtha' U yi dbyangs kyis spras// zla ba'i dum bu thig les brgyan// de ltar sngags kun nyer
15b4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa'o/ / ha U aM sngags kyi rang bzhin// de ltar sngags kyi tshig ni bzhi// rnal 'byor ma skyed dngos grub 'gyur// bkas gnang dngos grub rab 'jug pa// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so//
15b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro sdom pa mngon brjod dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dang // rnal 'byor rgyud rnams su gsungs pa'i// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub ster// bka' gnang 'khor lo'i rab sbyor bas/ grub
15b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur sbyor ba gzhan gyis min/ / slar yang sa mtha' dbyangs lnga pa'i// drung na gnas pa'i stan can la// bla dum thig les brgyan pa'o// tshogs de kho na'i sa bon// pa drung gnas pa rnal 'byor ma'i// tshogs
15b7(rgyud 'bum): ni skyod par byed pa'o/ / Ta yig 'bar bar byed pa'i sngags// sing ha ru be khaHsngags tshig/ bgegs kyi gtso bo rlag byed pa'o// ga dza ru po gaHyi sngags// sems can kun gyi bgegs byed pa'o// trai lo kyo da re
16a1(rgyud 'bum): tshig/ rab mchog pho nya kun bskyod pa'o// sa mu dra me kha la gra ha gnyis kyi tshig/ rgya mtsho lta bu'i ska rags spras// de ni sngags kyi ska rags so// hUM dang phaT kyi yi ge ni// mkha' 'gro ma
16a2(rgyud 'bum): yi khyab bdag go/ bI ra dwai te hUM sngags chog/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// tha mal 'dus byas skyes pa'o// de ltar rkang pa bdun sngags te// ye shes sa yi rang bzhin gyi// bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di
16a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ / sems can las las grub pa'i mthar// de yi go 'phang mchog tu 'gro// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba'i ming // slar yang skye zhing lam la gnas// sgyu ma'i rnam pa sgyu ma min// rang gi bdag nyid so so/
16a4(rgyud 'bum): / rig/ hUM ha gnyis ma hA pa shu mo ha ni'i// tshig ni 'khor ba'i rmongs pa'o// yo gi shwa ri tAM gi sngags// zhi ba yi ni gzugs su 'o// DA ki nI lo ka nAM ban+d+ha ni'i tshig/ 'jig rten byang chub tu 'jug byed// sa t+ya me
16a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaTa'i sngags kyi tshig/ mtha' bzhi po ni ston pa'o// b+hU ta trA sa na yi cho ga/ mu stegs ye shes 'joms pa'o// de ltar sngags tshig bdun pos ni// las kyi dbye ba byed pa ste// pad lha'i 'dab ma re re la/
16a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi yi ge rnam gnas pa'o// dpa' bo sngags kyi gzugs gnas pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 'khrul 'khor chen po bcu gnyis de// bdag gi mdza' bo yis ni gsungs// las thams
16a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'khrul 'khor ni/ / bcu gnyis rnams kyis lhan cig bya// 'khor lo chen po re re ru// nges par so so'i las bya'o// phrad pa rnams ni bcu gnyis su// bsgrub bya'i ming gis bsgrub par bya// pa mtha' sa
16b1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' A dang ldan/ / ya mtha' I yi dbyangs dang bcas// re yig na mtha' ra yig dang // pa mtha' dang ni sid+d+he'i tshig/ bid d+h+ye'i tshig dang shwa ri'i sngags// pa drung ma dang Ta sa bon// hUM la zla dum thig les
16b2(rgyud 'bum): brgya na/ bsgyur la yang ni brjod par bya// pa drung gnas dang Ta yig ste// hUM phaT dang ni swA hA bcas// sngags 'di lte bar cho ga yis// bsgrub bya ming dang bcas par brjod// bcu gnyis rnams dang lde bcas pa// de
16b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so/ / sa bon yi ge nyi shu bzhi// pul+li ra sogs bsres pa'o// dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sngags 'di yi ni mthu stobs ni// bye ba stong phrag
16b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yi/ / mtha' med gzhung las dpa' bo yis// de bzhin snying po bsdus pa yin// rgyud gzhan du ni gsungs pa'i sngags// sngags 'di yi ni sgrub thabs so// bzlas med grangs med yi ge med//
16b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs med bsam gtan de bzhin med// lha dran pa yi ye shes kyis// dngos grub thams cad bskyed pa'o// dbugs 'jug pa yi dus su ni// yi ge thams cad gsad par bya// 'byin pa rnams kyi sbyor kun
16b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes 'byung ba'i dus su shes par bya/ / gnas dus rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dod mi bya// dbugs rgyu de ltar shes bya ste// byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi rtogs// gang gi slob ma dbang
16b7(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba/ / de nyid bzhi rnams bcas pas so// theg pa chen por yongs smin la// phyi nas sngags ni rab bstan bya// sngon du phag mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// bri bya de nas he ru ka'i 'o// rdo rje'i bu mo 'am de nas gzhan
17a1(rgyud 'bum): der ni shes rab gzhug par bya/ / rgyud gzhan du ni dbang bskur la// tshul 'di bstan par mi bya'o// ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin can// a ba d+hU tIr dkyil 'khor bya// ye shes rnam pa
17a2(rgyud 'bum): phag mo yis/ / shes bya dpal he ru kar 'khyud// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can ma// zhal bzhi mche ba gtsigs pa ste// phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan// dkar mo dang ni 'jigs byed gnon//
17a3(rgyud 'bum): / sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs// 'jig dus me lha'i 'od zer can// phyag g.yas rdo rje dang gri gug/ dgra sta DA ma ru de bzhin// rtse gsum lus med pags pa ste// phyag g.yon pas kyang de bzhin no// g.yon
17a4(rgyud 'bum): du dril bu thod pa dang / / zhags pa kha T+wAM ga dang mgo/ dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ma// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa mo// sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan// dbu la thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// 'dod chags rdo
17a5(rgyud 'bum): / rjes rgyas btab ste// yang na he ru ka yis so// yan lag lha rdzas dris nyer byugs// zhabs gdub dpung rgyan rnams dang ldan// lha rdzas me tog 'phreng bas klubs// rtse bran zlar gnas rdo rje ni// dpral bar
17a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'dzin pa mo/ / g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs dang ldan// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mdun du// sku las 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba spro// he ru ka mig sman nag po 'dra// ral pa'i cod pan mdun du'o// stag gi
17a7(rgyud 'bum): pags pa'i sham thabs can/ / phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par klubs// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed ldan// spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa ste// zhal bzhi pa la 'jigs par byed//
17b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag bcu gnyis par rig par bya// brgya phyed mgo bos brgyan pa ste// mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba dang // 'bar ba'i 'phreng can gtsigs pa po// skye gnas phyag rgya phyag gnyis kyis// lhag ma rdo rje phag
17b2(rgyud 'bum): mo'i 'o/ / gal te he ru ka gtso bo// de tshe phag mo'i phyag gnyis su'o// glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa po// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid de// zag med rnal 'byor bde chen bzang // srid dang mya ngan 'das
17b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzugs/ / gnyis po snying por sbyin par bya// lhag ma rnal 'byor ma rnams ni// mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji ltar// thod dum la sogs sngags rig pas// dpa' bo kun kyang sbyin par bya// re re yi ni//
17b4(rgyud 'bum): yang de'i rgyud// ji ltar sngon gyi rjes su'o// brkyang ma dang ni ro ma'i rtsa// shes rab dang ni thabs 'du ba'i// rten ni a ba d+hU tI ste// gang der ro mnyam son pa'o// 'khor lo gsum gnyis 'gyur zhes bya//
17b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin// he ru ka dang rdor phag mo// 'bum tsho stong phrag phyag can te// phyag gnyis la sogs nas brtsams nas// gzhan ni gang rnams de rnams so// dbang po'i yul ni mi lta/
17b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing / phyag dang bzhugs tshul la sogs min// bsgoms pas spros pa kun bzung ste// gti mug de ni spang bar gyis// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig la sogs de sbyor can// snying
17b7(rgyud 'bum): khar sa bon rnam par dgod/ / spro dang bsdu ba la sogs bya// dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod pa dang // sdig pa bshags pa la sogs te// stong nyid la sogs ri rab mthar// ra ba dang ni gur la sogs//
18a1(rgyud 'bum): sa yi char ni rdo rje'i thig/ 'khor lo drug tu bri ba'o// ji lta'i mngon rtogs mtshan nyid kyi// rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bya// thabs dang man ngag thams cad ni// mdzes ma bdag
18a2(rgyud 'bum): gis kun bshad do/ / der ni gtor ma sbyin bya ste// sa sogs lnga rnams kyis mchod bya// yi ge 'bar ba'i yig rnams kyis// sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya'o// 'bar ba'i gnyis 'phel yig rnams kyis//
18a3(rgyud 'bum): srog gis gtum mo 'bar bar bya// steng du kha bltas rtsa sreg ste// de bzhin ye shes mkha' 'gro skyes// mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma lus dang // rnam par shes la sogs thim pas// bsregs pas ri
18a4(rgyud 'bum): bong can haM 'dzag/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro
18a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ / rdo rje phag mo bskyed pa dang // gtso mo dang / 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor sgom pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te 'di ni le'u gnyis pa'o//
18a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi// ji ltar skyed pa rab bshad bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor brten nas// bcom ldan 'das ni mchog tu rtser// phag mo'i gzugs ni mtha'
18a7(rgyud 'bum): yas pa'ang / / spros pa dra ba'i sdom pa'o// lus kyi dngos po'i dbye ba yis// mtha' yas gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma// lus kyi bde ba la brten nas// 'dod pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// dga' ba gsum
18b1(rgyud 'bum): zha dang rtsa gsum ste/ / bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par 'dod// sangs rgyas sku yi nyams chen po// de'i rang bzhin las sna tshogs 'phro// mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas brten nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no//
18b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling ni chen po yi// dum bu bcu gnyis kyi dbus su// shar gyi yul du gnas lha mo// dus sbyor ro hi ta chu srin dang // rgyal dang nyi ma dag bskyed dang // rtsa yi dngos po srog 'bab pa'o// lha mo phyi
18b3(rgyud 'bum): nang bdag nyid du/ / bcom ldan gzugs can ma gnas te// phyag bzhi ma la kha dog gnag/ spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma// mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa ste// phyag rgya lnga mngon 'dzin pa mo// ro la zhon
18b4(rgyud 'bum): ma skra grol ma/ / g.yas brkyang zhabs dang ldan pa mo// drag mo thod pa'i 'phreng can ma// g.yas pa Da ma ru gri gug can// g.yon par thod pa ga T+wAM ga/ spro zhing sdud pa'i sku can ma// sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi//
18b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// snying po'i yi ge nyi shu gnyis// mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas kha sbyor// oM shrI oM badz+ra he DA he ki tu nI ru ye kaM hrI DA hU~M kaMR+Sha nI pa dzA Ta la Ta sa sA b+ha ha ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor
18b6(rgyud 'bum): ba yi lha mo rnams/ / yi ge rdo rje can du 'dod// mkha' 'gro ma thog 'joms pa'i mthar// rigs kyi rtsar ni rab tu grags// mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas bsgrubs nas su// der ni phag mo gnas par 'gyur// sum cu
18b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bdun lha rnams ni/ / rang 'dra'i thabs dang gnyis med bde// ming gi sbyor bas shes bya ba// dgos pa rnams mang man ngag go/ sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ni rgyud// bde ba che las bskyed par 'gyur// gang phyir bdag po
19a1(rgyud 'bum): @mkha' 'gro ma/ / rgyud de mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs so// bdag po khyod la bdag 'dri'o// ji ltar bdag gi bskyed 'gyur ba// mkha' 'gro ma la bde ster ba'i// bcom ldan 'das ni mnyes byas
19a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ khyod bskyed pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rang gi rgyud ni ma nyams pa// zla yig gsang ba'i bug bdag nyid// gzhu yi rnam pa srog dang ldan// lus kyis gzugs can yang dag pa// yul dang dbang po'i bdag
19a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid can/ / byang chub sems kyi thig le che// rgyu da i zhes bya'i ming can te// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i pad chen du// rtsa yi 'khor lo la khyab gyur// ka yig ka gzugs kyang de bzhin// 'od gsal sprul bya sprul pa'o//
19a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phrin las kyis ni khams kun gyis// zhi ba'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba che// dga' ba med mdzes mi 'gyur yang // brjod min lhan skyes tshon gyis 'tshed// mi gzugs rtag tu bde chen pos// sgyu 'phrul nges
19a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'phro bar 'gyur/ / I ni 'byung po che kun dang // dbang phyug la sogs su ni ston// lug dang dmar ser yid bzang gis// de yi gzhi ni skyed par 'gyur// 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i ming // las kyi dus bzhin
19a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshon par bya/ / klu rnams yang dag dgug bya dang // char 'bebs gzhug phyir bzhu ba dang // lha rnams dang ni 'byung po kun// rgyal po rnams kyi'ang 'phrul chen dang // dbang dang mngon spyod rengs pa dang //
19a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang dang bslang ba la sogs pa// mngon spyod dus las shes par bya// rang rang gling du bskyed pa ste// shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pas// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor dbang pos sems
19b1(rgyud 'bum): phra zhing / / shin tu phra bas der 'jug 'gyur// sems can don du de dang der// rang bdag sbyor bas mdzad par 'gyur// stong gsum stong ni chen po ru// gang du khyab bdag kun spyod 'gyur// der ni dum bu bcu
19b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su/ / rang rang gtso mo rnal 'byor ma// thim dang longs spyod spyod rnams su// rdzu 'phrul che rnams kun spyod 'gyur// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug gi/ dbugs rgyu bar ni shes par bya// brgya phrag bco brgyad
19b3(rgyud 'bum): srog rnams kyis/ / 'pho bar 'dir ni brjod par bya// bcu gnyis rnams ni nyin zhag 'gyur// dus sbyor bcu gnyis rim pas so// dus sbyor gsum bsgyur byas nas kyang // dus kyi pho nya mo kun spyod// dus
19b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya'i phyed kyis pho nya mo/ / re re rnam par shes par bya// lnga bcu gsum gyi yang dag par// nyin zhag gcig la spyod pa'o// de rnams yi ger yang dag bshad// a yig la sogs k+Sha mtha' can// yon tan
19b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phar ma yin bstan pas/ / gsum bsgyur brgya phrag phyed dang bcas// de rnams pho nya mor nges bshad// 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma phyag rgya// mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan// sa 'og rnams na'ang gnas pa mo// /
19b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam gsum ni// zhing sngags lhan cig skyes rang ngo // gang zhig gang gis lhag gnas pa// de ni de yir gsal mthong 'gyur// rigs kyi khyad par la brten nas// 'dod pa'i sbyor
19b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes gnas pa can/ / tsA ru'i bza' ba de rnams su// ye shes gzugs can phyugs chen po// bza' min bza' ba der yang ni// mtshon min gsal bar mtshon par bya// mtshan nyid mtshan nyid min pa
20a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod/ de ni spong bar rab spong ba'o// rjes 'dzin tshar bcad la chags pa'ang // gang zhig gang gis rang rang dngos// sangs rgyas dang ni chos gnas par// byas te mngon sbyor sbyor ba
20a2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ a ba d+hU tI'i srog gi rlung // brtan pa phag sogs rnal 'byor ma// ma brtan srog gi rlung rnams kyi// dngos grub gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// lha mo rnam snang gis rgyas gdab// rdo rje 'dzin bdag
20a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod pas/ / pho nya mo sngags sum cu drug/ dus las rang dang rang gi rigs// ji ltar bdag mo'i rigs dang ni// phyag dang mtshan ma rim ji ltar// yang na nges par brjed pa ru// mngon rtogs mtshan
20a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid las shes bya/ / bol+la kak+ko la sbyor las// lha mo rang nyid zhu bar zhugs// skad cig de la ma lus pa'i// dkyil 'khor thams cad ro mnyam lha// lha mo nam mkha'i nang snang bas// 'di yis mnga'
20a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag bskul bar bya/ / mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rol cig rol// shes rab thabs kyis dgongs pa grub par mdzod// 'jig rten rnams la khyod kyis thugs rje bsgoms// ji ltar lha dang lha min ma lus
20a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mdzod/ / byang chub rdo rje 'dzin pas bde chen gyis ni mnyes par mdzod// khyod ni stong nyid ting nge 'dzin la zhugs sam ci// rdo rje pad+mo rol pas deng ni nges rtogs mdzod// gang gis lhan cig stong
20a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid ting 'dzin la khyod bzhugs/ / mnga' bdag khyod kyis khams bzhi'i sa bon 'dzag par mdzod// a ba d+hU tI'i rang bzhin gtum mo ldang bar 'gyur// sa gsum sreg par byed de gang du'ang mi mthong ngo //
20b1(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bos 'bar zhing 'bar bar 'gyur// lhan skyes rang bzhin gyis ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams dga' bar mdzod// rga ba dang ni 'chi bar snang ba ma mthong ngo // thugs kyi rgyal ba mgon po yis
20b2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di dag sad par mdzod/ / sgyu mas sems can khams ni bsgral bar mdzod// glu chen po ni 'di gsan nas// rnal 'byor 'khor lo can rab sad// sgyu ma lta bu'i 'gro ba kun// brtan pa la sogs 'gro
20b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ mthong bzhin rang gi 'khor lo can// nam mkhar thim pa sku cher 'gyur// lhan skyes sogs kyis sprul pa can// gnyis po gcig pa'i sku chen po// dang po'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin can// thams cad
20b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni chos kyi sku/ / rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud thob nas// rnal 'byor rgyud rnams la yid ches// slob dpon sems kyi rdo rje yang // dbu ma'i tshul gyi spyod yul lo// de nyid phyir bstan thob pa las// dbu ma chen
20b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i mtshan nyid do/ / grub mtha'i man ngag spyod yul ni// mkhas pa rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min// grub mtha' mngon sum las shes bya// man ngag kyang ni rjes dpag las// shes bya bla ma'i zhal las kun//
20b6(rgyud 'bum): de mkhas sangs rgyas spyod yul lo// byis pa'i rigs kyi rnam shes bya// mngon nga rgyal can spyod yul min// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de
20b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mkha' 'gro ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba la kun
21a1(rgyud 'bum): tu spyongad pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga ste le'u gsum pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// lA ma ji ltar gnas pa ni// ji ltar sdom
21a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ / gsungs pa bdag gis gsal bya tsam// rdo rje sdom pa bcom ldan 'das// phag mo rnal 'byor sdom pa ste// 'khor lo sdom pa mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin dam tshig sdom pa ni// lA ma
21a3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni yang dag bstan/ / pad+ma'i sdom par 'dod pa ni// dum skyes ma can gzugs can ma// rin chen sdom pa'o khyab bdag la// lA ma rang nyid kyis zhus pa// rdo rje sdom sogs ji lta bu// ngo mtshar bdag
21a4(rgyud 'bum): gi bdag po skye/ / rdo rje dam tshig de bzhin spyon// pad 'khor de bzhin rin chen gyi// sdom pa yang ni ji ltar lags// de nas rdo rje can mchod nas// mnyes pas bdag la yang dag gsungs// rdo rje bug 'pho
21a5(rgyud 'bum): med ye shes/ / rtogs nas rdo rje gsum rnams su// sdom pa rdo rje gsum rnams la// bskyed pa rdo rje sdom pa ni// dam tshig rtsa rnams thams cad kyi// shes bya lam gyi rjes skyob pa'i// sdom pa'o/
21a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo mchod pa ni// dam tshig sdom par 'dod pa yin// rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po ni// sbyor drug nam mkha'i bu ga ru// sdom pa bden pa'i dngos po kun// bdag gi rnal 'byor sdom pa'o// pad+hU a pa
21a7(rgyud 'bum): d+hU tI'i rtsa/ / 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa ni// sdom pa'o 'khor lo de rnams su// pad+ma'i sdom par brjod par bya// 'khor lo bde bar gshegs pa'i lam// dbang sogs rnams su bskyed pa yis// sdom
21b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o chos de rnams su ni/ / 'khor lo sdom pa yin par bshad// rin chen rdo rje mgo bo yi// nor bur 'bab pa 'ongs pa yis// sdom pa'o srog gi thig le yang // rin chen sdom pa yin par 'dod// ma bshad
21b2(rgyud 'bum): pa las de rnams kyi/ / mkha' 'gro bdun pa ye shes mchog/ khwa gdong la sogs brgyad dang ni// 'dren pa gnyis med mtshan nyid phyir// de ltar thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// gcig tu sdom pa'i mkha' 'gro//
21b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ gtum mo 'bar ma la ni gzugs// rtsa so so dang dbu ma ste// ye shes mkha' 'gro de las bskyed// rnam pa kun rig skad cig las// byang chub sems kyi dbus su ni// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i
21b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can gang / / rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bshad do// nam mkhar 'gro ba yi ni mchog/ blo bur byung ba bdag med pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po chu skyes gzugs// rnal 'byor rang sems sems med kyang // rnal
21b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid do/ / 'khor lo nang gi bdag nyid gzugs// thig le kun tu sbyar ba'o// mtshan nyid gnad dang mtshams la ni// kun tu sangs rgyas skye bar 'gyur// 'du ba phyi dang nang bdag
21b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid ye shes dngos rang bzhin las so/ / dam tshig sems dpa' gsum rig pa// skye dang 'chi dang bar rnams kyi// srid pa kun las shes par bya// spong bas dam tshig mkha' 'gro skye// bdag nyid kun
21b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi shes kyang / / 'gro ba mkhas pa'i lam gyis 'gyur// 'dod chags sgyu ma bcas nam mkha'// pad+ma mkha' 'gro rang nyid gtso// dbyangs yig de bzhin rnal 'byor dang // phyag rgya lhan skyes 'dod rnams
22a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bgrod bzhin du ni rtag tu skye/ / 'bar ba rin chen dbang mkha' 'gro// de bzhin khams ni rnam pa bdun// rnam shes bdun gyi mtshan nyid do// chu gter ri dang gling rnams kyang // rgyu
22a2(rgyud 'bum): mtsho che der rab tu zhugs/ / de nyid nyi shu lnga bdag nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgyus// khor yug la sogs stong nyid dang // rang bzhin skyes bu de bzhin du// 'od gsal ba dang thams cad ming // chos
22a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings dang rang mtshan nyid/ / thar dang sangs rgyas de bzhin du// ye shes rdo rje sems lam bdag/ chos 'byung dang ni theg chen dang // gsang ba sngags tshul khyab bdag dang // lhan skyes dang ni 'dus de bzhin
22a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po'ang rang nyid dang / / bdag med ma dang kun de nyid// rang bzhin can stong yang nas yang // de phyir rgya mtsho'i ming dang yang // rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs can ni// Ar+tha kun 'jig na gzir sems
22a5(rgyud 'bum): can rnams/ / ngang gis sangs rgyas yon tan ldan// d+hA rje de rnams dge ba mngon 'dod la// du ba dang yongs su ngal ba med// wa rdza rtogs pa thams cad spangs pa las// thob pa sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// ma
22a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags tshul gyi bdag nyid kun/ / hA rdza ni bskyed pa yi gzugs can no// sarba de yi chos ni mi bden te// muHdngos po skad cig 'jig phyir ro// dra rnga rdzas dang sna tshogs rang bstan 'chos// rgya mtsho chen
22a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i mtshan nyid do/ / lA rnga ma yi rang gi mtshan nyid sa// ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis te// rol pa'i myos las bskyed pa ni// rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// ma sogs kun gyi 'khor lo yi// rtsa yi lam
22b1(rgyud 'bum): nas rjes 'gro ma'o/ / yang na sgyu ma 'dzin par 'gyur// de ni sgyu ma che rang bzhin// bum pa'i rA si spyod pa yis// 'pho ba'i grungs kyang gnyis pa'o// rdo rje phag mo spyan lha mo// kun tu spyod pa'i lA mar
22b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / kha dog ljang snang lha mo ste// lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs// sred pa dang ni snang ba'i dngos// thams cad de yi steng du gnas// he ru ka yi mdog dang gzugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
22b3(rgyud 'bum): rjes 'gro rnams/ / lhag ma 'khor drug rnal 'byor ma// dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad 'byung // 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su sbyin// thugs sogs kha dog drug tu grags// 'khor lo cha mnyam la
22b4(rgyud 'bum): bri bya/ rdo rje pad+ma 'khor de bzhin// ral gri rin chen gri gug gi/ 'phreng ba rtag tu rim shes bya// phyi rol sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'phreng // mgo bo'i 'phreng ba thams cad du'o// lA ma byang gi sems las bskyed//
22b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma tshogs gtso mo ste// dus kyi rjes mthun sems can don// smon lam gyi ni mtshan nyid do// bskal pa bzang po'i dbus su yang // rdzogs ldan la ni rnam gzigs so// de'i dus su shes bya
22b6(rgyud 'bum): bde bzhin rnam gzigs byang gling du'o/ / 'dzam bu'i gling ni chung ngu du'ang // bdag ni shAkya'i rigs rjes 'gro// lhag ma gling lnga rnams su ni// de bzhin gshegs rigs rim pas so// de phyir lA ma
22b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba kun/ / sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas mtha' len// ma ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// snying stobs bya ba byed pa gsal// sa'i dbang phyug zhag la ni// mchu yi zla ba can du 'dod// thur sel zhes
23a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'i rlung dang ni/ / 'gro dang zla ba zhes bya'i rtsa// ji srid 'chi ba'i dus nyid bar// 'dzin bzhin du ni mi nyams so// de ltar rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis// zla ba nyin zhag rlung rnams so// rtsa
23a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rtsa nas 'bab pa ste/ / mi ni bskyed pa rnal 'byor ma// rtsa yi tshogs ni thams cad la// skad cig las ni srog 'pho 'gyur// rang bzhin de la shes byas nas// sdang sogs yon tan gyis rim pas// des ni/
23a3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs sprul bdag dang // las kyi gnas ni mang po'o// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos gcig ni// lA ma mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid// mya ngan 'das dang mtshon pa na'ang // gnyis po zhugs gyur ming med pa// ji
23a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar mi shes de la ni/ / bdag gis mchog tu 'du shes so// sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa' med par 'gyur// chos kyi sku sogs dngos po'o// dbang po rnams kyi drin gyis ni// skye ba can kun
23a5(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / dbang po'i dngos po bden min yang // de tshe mi bden pas thob 'gyur// dbang po gnyis kyi dngos nyid ci// grib ma yi ni skyes bu mtshungs// grib ma'i dngos po de bden kyang // skyes bu'i
23a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni bden ma yin/ / de bzhin dbang po mi bden kyang // de dngos bden pa'i mtshan nyid do// man ngag rnam pa mang po gzhan// mchog tu bsngags pa shes par bya// btung ba la sogs bdog pa kun//
23a7(rgyud 'bum): bla ma la ni 'bul ba bden// de ni mi bden pas spyad bya// de la brnyas par mi bya'o// 'di la sngags kyang bshad bya ste// lha mo kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dir// nye ba'i snying po sngags rnams la// kha sbyor mdzes pas
23b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa'o/ / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje// nye snying rnam pa gsum du 'dod// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// de bzhin dbus su lugs 'byung min// oM oM ba hrIHdz+ra he lA he ma hUM ye huM hUM pha hUM/
23b2(rgyud 'bum): Ta phaT pa hUM Ta hUM swA hA ha hrIHoM oM hUM he hUM he hrIHphaT oM zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma rim las// rtsa dang tshigs ni shes bya ste// yi ge brjod pa'i bdag nyid kyi/
23b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dang gsum gyi rtsa bskyed de// yi ge re re yi yang ngo // yang na thams cad bsdus pa yis// bdag nyid chen po'i dus 'di'o// de phyir sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// rnal 'byor ma rtag re re skye// gal
23b4(rgyud 'bum): te sems dpa' che khros na/ / spros pa'i khro bo rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin gti mug 'dod chags sogs// rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu spro// tshegs chung ba yis las 'grub pa// yum mchog lA ma'ang 'thob
23b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs te// yi ge re re rnal 'byor ma// ming ni de dang mnyam zhes bya// khyod la rdo rje mchog bsres pa'o// de ltar de nyid rtag brten nas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya dang
23b6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig/ sten zhing rgya cher rol par bya// srid dang mya ngan 'das dbus su// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
23b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ lA ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sngags dgod pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba drug la sogs pa'i
24a1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dang / / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya// sems can rnams la phan brtse bas
24a2(rgyud 'bum): khaN+Da ro ha'i gnas zhugs nas/ / mnga' bdag rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang // 'khor lo bzhi'i pad+mo ru// rtsa ni brgya dang nyi shu'o// de rnams ming ni ci rigs par// de kho na nyid snod la bshad// yul dbus ma dang
24a3(rgyud 'bum): ka ling ka ma dang / / o Ta ma dang kar+N+Na Ta mo ma ru mo// sau raSh+Ta mo ma la ya ma bing ga ma// 'gro lding ma dang ta ling ga ka mo// mA la wa mo ma hA raSh+Ti ma ba ren+d+ra mo kA ma ru pi ma// DA hA li mo a Ta li yul ma// b+ha Ta ri mo lA
24a4(rgyud 'bum): Da dbus 'gyur ma/ / ti ra hu t+ti mo dang da ra Na Ta ma dang bal yul ma// mnyan yod ma dang rA D+ha mo dang Di ka ka ri ma dang // bang ga lA mo khA Ta ma dang ha ri ke la ma// gser gling ma dang sing ga li mo dang // Da ma Ta mo kan+tor
24a5(rgyud 'bum): / mosin d+hu kha ba'i gnas ma tsA Ti mo// ku lu Ta mo dza Da ra mo pa tha ma// dza dz+nyA yu ta ma dang pa ru Na ma dang // un ma dang laM pa ka ma dang // dzA lan d+ha ra ma dang ar bu da ma dang // kha che ma dang ko sa la mo kAny+tsi ma// dza
24a6(rgyud 'bum): yan+t+ra mo tri shak+ta ma tsi b+ha ma/ / lu ha ram pu ra ho ri ka mo dang // mu mu na ma kA ma bo dze ma dang // b+han+do ma la gri ha de ba mo// pre ta pu ri ma dang bab b+ha ra ma dang // pi la mo dang nye ba'i pi la mo// dur khrod ma dang nye ba'i dur khrod ma/
24a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram ma kha sa mo// kla klo ma dang thams cad yul ma ste// rim pa drug cu bzhi lha mo// lte ba'i 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma// rigs kyi rtsar ni shes par bya// snying kha'i 'khor lor de bzhin brgyad// pho nya
24b1(rgyud 'bum): mo kun 'gro ma ste/ / pra ya ga mo de bi ko Ta ma// 'phags rgyal ma dang dpal chen mo 'bar ba'i gdong ma grub pa sim pa li mo dang / ma hi la ma kau ma ri sau ra ma/ de ltar thams cad snying gnas su// sgyu ma'i rnam pa
24b2(rgyud 'bum): rang zhing ma'o/ / mgrin par 'khor lo'i lha mo yang // gtso mo mchog ni bshad par bya// cha chen bcu drug nyid yin te// khams rnams bcu drug de bzhin no// khrag dang khu ba rkang dang ni// rdul dang tshil dang pags pa
24b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnga sha dang rus pa rgyus pa dang // rnag dang rgyu ma rang byung dang // bshang gci mkhris pa mchil ma'o// ra ha s+ya sogs tshal gyi khams// de rnams myos byed 'bab ma'o// mgo bo ru ni lha mo che// 'khor lo/
24b4(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa// zhag gi rim pa thams cad du// mtshams kun rmad byung chen mo'o// nag mo gtsigs ma 'jigs rung ma// dga' ma 'das ma log 'dren ma// tsA muN+Da dang drag gzugs ma//
24b5(rgyud 'bum): lha mo dka' bzlog dbyangs can ma// nag bzang mo dang nag chen mo// nag sbom ma dang gzhan mi thub// rgyal ma dang rnam par rgyal ma// mi pham ma dang rgyal ba mo// drag mo sdang ba dbang mo dang // zla ma
24b6(rgyud 'bum): lam gyi bzhi mdom/ / grong gnas ma dang drag mi ga ma// kaM po dza ma DoM bi ma// gtum mo dang ni gdol pa mo// bram ze mo dang dmangs rigs mo// rgyal po'i bu mo 'phrul chen mo// lha rdzas chang gis 'gengs
24b7(rgyud 'bum): byed ma'o/ / de ltar rtsa yi 'khor lo ru// khaN+Da ro ha nang 'gro ma'o// bdag 'dir 'gro ba mo yin ci// rang gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ lus rnams thams cad la ni khams// mkha' 'dra dngos po gcig
25a1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ / sa gzhi cha bzhin shes bya ste// yul gyi phye yang sa gzhi gcig/ dum bu dum bur gyur pa'i khams// yang na yul dang zhag dag 'gyur// Da yi yi ge bstan de'i phyir// sgo pa
25a2(rgyud 'bum): mngal gyi mtshan nyid las/ / 'dir ni rnam shes bskyed par 'gyur// gang 'dra'i gang gis khams rnams la// bzhir ni rnam par shes bya ste// las la dum skyes ma rang nyid// sdig pa chen po 'phrog bzhin ma//
25a3(rgyud 'bum): bsad la khams ni thams cad do// des ni sems can bral dum skyes// shin tu las kun mdzad pa mo// gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma// rang gi 'pho ba lam bzhengs mchog/ nya ni 'char ba'i dus dang mi//
25a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod dang rgyu skar gre mchog dang // nub kyi ba glang spyod gling du// 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin ma// dngos med byed pa min lha mo// gnyis med go 'phang la brten ma// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su//
25a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed 'gyur rang gi sngags las skye// oM ba sa dz+ra rba kha bud+d+had d+ha ro ba hi dz+ra kra nA ye ke hUM ni hUM ye phaT ba phaT d+hA swA nI hA ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA oM/ sngags 'di rab tu sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams
25a6(rgyud 'bum): cad la/ / lha mo re re rnams kyi ni// dbus su 'khor lo bzhi skyes ma// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// thams cad chos 'byung dbus su ste// sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs kyis ni de
25a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams brgyan/ / sha chen po ni za bzhin du// 'jigs byed sgra ni bsgrags pa'o// lA ma'i 'khor lo ba lang sha/ mkha' 'gro ma la glang chen sha/ phag mo la ni sha thams cad// dam tshig sdom pa'i sbyor bas so//
25b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags bden par shes byas nas// sngags kyi yi ge brjod pa min// sems can kun gyi ngag gang de// sngags ni rnal 'byor ma ru grags// gal te yi ge ba sngags yin// go Di'i yi ge pa dang mtshungs/
25b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa yi bu ga bu ga ru// dbugs ni yi ger 'du shes pa'o// sngags kyi btung bas sems la ni// ji srid rkang mthar 'gog pa las// yul dang yul du kun tu spyod// yul dbus su yang 'ongs pa las// tshim
25b3(rgyud 'bum): bya rang gi 'khrul 'khor du/ / bum pa bzhin du btung ba 'bab// dkyil 'khor rang gi bstan gnas nas// srog gi 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// sems dpas 'khor bzhin pa ru ni// nor bu'i bu gar btsir
25b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / bu ga dgu ru sa bon kyang // rdo rje sogs pas bsgom par bya// yang na rtsa rnams thams cad du// sngags kyi yi ge 'di dgod bya// ma ka o ka ma sau ma bi dra ta mA ma b+ha kA DA a b+hA lA mA ti da ni sA rA DI
25b5(rgyud 'bum): ba khA ha su si DA ka si hi bu ku dza ya dza ba au laM dza a ka ko kAM dza a kA ko kAM dza tri tsa lu yuM muM kAM b+ha dre pre pa pe usma u kham+be zhes bya ba ni lte ba ra ro/ / pre de u ma dzA si ma kau zhes bya ba ni snying khar ro// ra su ma sra me tsa
25b6(rgyud 'bum): mAM a swA pU a swa bi mU pe sha le zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i 'o/ / kr-i ka b+hI na tI bi tsa go o sa b+ha mastu a sa bi a dza go du i tsa tsa grA rau kAM tau tsa mA pra sU rA zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i 'khor lo la'o// yang ni mi phyed ma la
25b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i ming can te/ de rnams kyi yang yig dang po// thams cad mgo bo'i 'khor lor sbyin// 'khrul 'khor 'di ni blo chen po// srog gi rlung ni rnam 'dzin 'gyur// pad+ma bzhi yi 'dab ma'i dbyibs// re'u
26a1(rgyud 'bum): mig 'khor lo rim thig gdab/ / thams cad zlum po'i rnam par ni// thig lnga rnams ni gdab par bya// brgyad dang bcu drug drug cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis re'u mig 'dod// lte ba'i gnas ni
26a2(rgyud 'bum): thob nas su/ / srog gi nus pa rnams kyis 'khor// ji srid a ba d+hU tI'i rlung // de srid 'khrul 'khor 'dir brjod do// gal te ngag gis de ltar byed// sngags ni 'jam snyan gyis glu len// sgras ni srog des
26a3(rgyud 'bum): phur btab nas/ / rtsa dgu po ni dgug par bya// nad med mi rgas mdze med cing // rtag tu bkres dang skom pa med// de ltar la sogs mtha' yas pa// nad dang 'chi ba'i mthar thug med// dkyil 'khor lngar ram
26a4(rgyud 'bum): yang na ni/ / 'khrul 'khor can kun 'bab par bya// khams dang skye mched gzhan la sogs// bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor ldan pas bza'// mdog dmar 'du shes lhag ma ni// lA ma'i phyag dang gzugs can no//
26a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor/
26a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ dum skyes ma'i mtshan nyid dang / bskyed pa dang / 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i ming mdor bstan pa dang / sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'o//
26a7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan mchog bshad par bya// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min// dpal he ru ka'i kun sbyor las// gzugs can ma yi mtshan nyid dge/ lus ldan dang ni las dang tshigra/
26b1(rgyud 'bum): sngon du gzugs can ma la rten// phyi nang bdag nyid can gzugs su// bde la gnas pas 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni rkang lag thams cad la// tshogs ni bcu gnyis nyid yin no// lnga lnga ru ni shes bya ste//
26b2(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis la rtsa drug cu'o// dkyil 'khor rnams la'ang 'bab pa mo// 'pho ba bcu gnyis su 'dod do// g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa la'ang // sngon du lugs sogs sngags rig pas// lhag ma bu ga bzhi
26b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams so/ / lte ba mdoms dang rtsibs logs gnyis// gru gsum de bzhin shes bya ste// de yi sgo rnams rtsa drug cu// mtshams ni rnam pa lnga rab gsungs// nyi ma rgyu bar gang 'gro ba// de 'gro zla ba zla rnams
26b4(rgyud 'bum): sung 'drug lnga sum cu'i cha rnams su/ / snying khar grags pa de bzhin gsungs// rtsa dgu ji ltar 'gro ba'o// mig la sogs pa'i bug rnams su// sgo la brten nas gnas par 'gyur// mgrin par gang
26b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba yi khams/ / de ru gyur nas gnas pa'o// mi phyed ma sogs sum cu gnyis// rgyud mang por ni bsngags pa'o// de yi gzugs su gnas lha mo// gzugs can ma de'i rnam rtog pas// bcom ldan
26b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das la bdag 'dri'o/ / gzugs can ma yi ming ci gsungs// 'gro ba thams cad gzugs med mdzod// rtsa yi bde sogs mig gis so// 'gro ba'ang dbang po'i lam rnams su// gang 'dra'i gzugs
26b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs can ma/ / pha las thob pa'i bde ba ni// dbang gnyis rnam pa'i sbyor las so// gang dang gang gi rigs gang ni// de dang de yi 'gro bar bshad// bden pa kun las 'dren par 'gyur// sngags kyi /
27a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul las gzhan mi 'gro// de phyir gzugs can ma 'grogs las// lhan skyes rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tsho la// lha mo chen mo kha dog ser// lhag ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs// 'du byed
27a2(rgyud 'bum): phung po'i gzugs dang ni/ / mi dang bud med sogs gzugs can// mnyam med sems can don las phyir// gling 'di ru ni skye 'gyur ro// lus dang bya ku la nag pa'i// zla ba rA si'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang shes
27a3(rgyud 'bum): rab bde bas kyang / / dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhugs pa'o// yang dag sum cu bdun bdag nyid// ji lta'i rim pas dpa' rnal 'byor// gsang sngags kha dog sbyor ba ru// gzugs can gtso mo'i shes par bya// oM ba
27a4(rgyud 'bum): adz+ra gr-i rU ma pi maHmI hi ye oM ke swA hUM hA hUM hUM pha oM Ta bau pa Sha TaT he swA oM hA hUM hU~M ho/ oM phaT phaT haM/ de ltar rang bzhin las shes bya// sngon gyi cho ga'i las kyis ni// dbu ma'i bu gar byin nas ni// dbugs ni rnam
27a5(rgyud 'bum): shes ngo bo can/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa// ma lus skad cig de la mthong // ma lus rang bdag ngo bo can// bsgoms dang thos dang mthong ba yang // bgrod bzhin pa na rtogs mi 'gyur// 'di ni sgyu ma'i rang mtshan/
27a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ gzugs kyi sku yang rnam gsum ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid de// de ni 'dod dang gzugs gzugs med// me long du ni gdong rdzogs pa// ji bzhin khams gsum la gnas su// de'i gzugs
27a7(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhan gzugs can/ / gzugs dang gzugs la gzugs brnyan te// grangs med pa yi 'jig rten khams// gzugs can sgyu mas bud med dang // thabs ni skyes bu'i las can gyi// gnyis med bud med skyes/
27b1(rgyud 'bum): bu gcig/ gcig min gcig min min gzugs can// gzugs kyi lus la sogs dngos la// mtshon byed mtshon bya med gzugs can// mtshon dka' mtshon bya'o mtshon bya la// mtshon bya gzugs med
27b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid ma/ / mtshon med spyod yul de yang ni// mtshon pa po de'i spyod yul lo// ji ltar la lar rmi lam mthong // rang nyid shi ba mthong 'gyur na'ang // mthong bzhin du yang ngu bar byed// gzugs dang gzhan
27b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzugs can no/ / de ltar kun gyi rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dang // sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin dang // dam tshig sems dpa' chen po pa// byang chub chen po'i tshul sems dpa'// brtan
27b4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'gro ba sna tshogs so/ / de lta'i gzugs ni ji ltar sngon// rtog ge pa rnams kyis mi shes// byis pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs bya min// rnal 'byor ma yi mchog thob pas// skye ba 'di nyid la shes 'gyur// skye bo
27b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byang chub rang bzhin te/ / rmongs pa'i byis pas shes pa ma yin no// sems can thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid// mi gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'chang // glu 'di blangs pas thams cad ni// skrag ste sa la
27b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyal bar 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyel nas kyang // chos kyi spyod yul ngo mtshar to// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs gtso// dpa' bo rnams kyis bskul mdzad nas// gson cig gson cig sring mo khyed//
27b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can khams kyi rang bzhin grol byed ma// khyed dang sems can rnams la dbye ba med// dpa' bo thams cad sgrol bar mdzad pa mo// slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ni// sku la thams cad rab tu zhugs// slar
28a1(rgyud 'bum): yang spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ / gtso bo'i zhal nas spros par gyur// rnam snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rgyud// slar yang zhal nas spro bar mdzad// bcom ldan thams cad bsdu mdzad nas// rnal
28a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma yi rgyud la ni/ / ched du brjod pas che brjod mdzad// rnal 'byor rgyud kun la yang ngo // rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dbang // 'dir ni 'dod chags don yod grub// mi bskyod pa dang spyan ma'i rgyud// mA
28a3(rgyud 'bum): ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ / sgrol ma dang ni gzugs rdo rje// sgra dang dri dang ro de bzhin// reg dang chos dbyings su grags dang // sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang // phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang // sgrib kun sel
28a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bzang po dang / / 'jam dpal dang ni byams pa dang // gshin rje'i dgra dang shes mthar mdzad// pad+ma mthar mdzad bgegs mthar mdzad// mi g.yo ba dang dbyug sngon can// 'dod dang stobs chen gnod mdzes
28a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba dang // khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can// lhag ma rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// de ltar rgyud kyi ming 'di ni// thabs kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// shes rab rgyud ni rang byung nyid// rang gi rang
28a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rtag tu gnas/ / byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams su// mi 'jig go 'phang rjes 'gro ba// bskal pa sreg pa'i dus su ni// gzhan du song nas yang dag gnas// thod pa'i dum la sogs dpa' bo// ming
28a7(rgyud 'bum): ni mi bskyod la sogs so/ / dngos po'i dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyis// rigs ni du ma 'byung ba'o// gzugs can ma yi gnas brten nas// dpa' bo sa la bgyings par 'gyur// gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i
28b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / bde mchog dang ni mnyam par 'khyer// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
28b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang / gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi
28b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga ste le'u drug pa'o/ / / de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi sa// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis te// gang gis khwa gdong ma byung ba// de yis cho gas thar 'gro ma// nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste/
