28b4(rgyud 'bum): khyu mchog 'pho dang bzang po ma// sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste// sa lnga par ni 'dod pa yin// lha mo sgo na gnas pa mo// kA ni chos dbyings mar 'du shes// gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni// de las longs spyod rdzogs 'byung
28b5(rgyud 'bum): bas+tha ni sprul pa'i sku yin te/ / lte snying mgrin pa mgo bo las// bu ga bzhi rnams shes bya ste// bya rog 'dra ba'i srog gdong can// de la rtag tu sngon spyod ni// srog chags rnams ni skad cig gsod// klu rnams dgug
28b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / / char dbab pa dang rengs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang byang chub che// rnal 'byor ma kun rang bzhin ma// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa la// bde ba 'dod pas 'gro ba mo// sngags bden las kyi bdag nyid can
28b7(rgyud 'bum): bya rog gtso mo de la rten/ / rdo rje phag mo de la ni// bya rog ma ni gnas su son// sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma// sngags 'di las ni byung ba yin// oM ba na dz+ra mo kA b+ha kA ga swA ba a te ke bI hUM re hUM shA sa pa ya Ta hUM pa hUM Ta pha
29a1(rgyud 'bum): sAT hA pa oM Ta swA hUM hA hUM/ 'di ni ring thung dbye ba las// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// thung ngu thabs kyi rang bzhin dang // ring po shes rab mngon par brjod// kha dog nag mo drag chen mo//
29a2(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs// gang phyir byang chub sems zhu ba// de tshe bya rog las rgyal mo// nam mkhar bya rog bzhin 'khor ba// bya rog gdong ma'i rlung gis so// gang phyir 'phur zhing steng 'phur ba// de phyir 'og
29a3(rgyud 'bum): dang steng du lta/ / bya rog bzhin du ring 'phur nas// bya rog gling du slar 'ong ba'o// der son pa ni bde chen po// lus kyis nyams su myong ba'o// bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o//
29a4(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams mi ldan de bzhin 'dir// dmyal ba bya rog dum bu can// pha rol phyin tshul rnams kyi yang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'dod// ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa// bya rog bzhin du rtag tu bkres//
29a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi de ltar las dus su// mi gang ngang gis 'chi bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas// bde chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma yi spyod kun kyang // rang gis rang ni 'thob par 'gyur//
29a6(rgyud 'bum): las ma byas na gang gi ni// las can med cing las byed med// rang sems 'pho ba las yin te// las de las byed pa yang de// lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid// sems med pa ni sems pa mchog/ lag
29a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rkang pa thams cad kyis/ / gang byas las byed pa rang ngo // de kun gyis nar khyer ba ni// yang dag las mtha'i mtshan nyid do// las kyang dge ba rgyu don gnyer// mi dge rang gis spang bar bya// rnal 'byor rnams kyi
29b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa 'am/ / de bzhin bza' ba 'du ba ni// grong dang grong khyer gnas pa dang // ri la sogs pa'i rtse chen du// dam tshig don du mchod par bya// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras rab ster// mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs
29b2(rgyud 'bum): brnyan kyang / / khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te// srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang // khyab byed ji lta'i rim gnyis kyis// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// 'ug gdong khyi dang
29b3(rgyud 'bum): phag gdong ma/ / rim pas klu dang rus sbal rtsangs// lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal// rtag tu brtan pa pho nya gnyis// dga' dang skyo ba zhes bya ba// mche ma dang ni 'joms ma mchog/ mdor bstan pa yi tshig 'di yang //
29b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bshad kun nas brjod par bya// phag mos mchod pa byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa// ji srid srog sogs rlung rnams kyi// so so re re'i ming 'du shes// bdag gi ston pa ngo mtshar che// dus kun tu
29b5(rgyud 'bum): ni skye bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por gtso bo can 'dzin pa// stong pa'i ngo bos grol bar 'gyur// rdo rje lta bu'i rlung dgod bya// rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten la'o// gang phyir 'jig pa
29b6(rgyud 'bum): thim 'gyur ba/ / de yi dbyibs tshul kyang med pa// de phyir thur sel zhes bya yang // 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar bstan// mnyam gnas rigs su song nas ni// sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis// ngag tu brjod pa smra bar
29b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ sngon du bag chags ma lus pa'o// khyab byed 'gro ba thams cad la// rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung // klu ni khro ba'i ngo bo nyid// khyab byed de bzhin tshig gnyis te// rus sbal ser sna'i ngo bo ni// sgra
30a1(rgyud 'bum): ba yi ni mtshan nyid do/ / rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnas so// thur sel phrag dog lha sbyin no// nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid do// srog gi rlung ni grangs gnyis las// dga'
30a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ye shes can shes bya/ / skyo ba de yi btags pa'o// de phyir mkhas pas so sor shes pa yis// gang phyir srog gi rlung ni thams cad bdag nyid skye// ji ltar sa ni bcu gnyis las// thog ma de nyid bcu
30a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'o/ / bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya// gang phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ sa gcig rang bzhin rnams kyis ni// rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mor 'dod// sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang // lhan skyes yang dag
30a4(rgyud 'bum): / byang chub nyid// thams cad kyi ni ngan son pas// rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma mchog/ bshad dang ma bshad gang ci rung // de kun byang chub tshul can no// slar yang bya rog dbyibs lha mo// de nas byed pa'i
30a5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can ma'o/ / byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la ste// rtsa gnas kun gyi bu ga'o// thim dang de las langs bsam gtan// khwa gdong ming du 'du shes so// de ltar rnal 'byor gter thams cad// bla ma'i zhal
30a6(rgyud 'bum): las gsal thob 'gyur/ / bla ma gang de mi brnyas shing // ston byas de nyid 'dod par bya// 'phags pa'i go 'phang ma thob na// mnar med la sogs rnams su 'tshed// kun nas bla ma gus pa las// byang
30a7(rgyud 'bum): chub bar du thob par 'gyur/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni
30b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i srog bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan gyi mtshan//
30b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog/ 'ug gdong la sogs gang gsal ba/ byed pa yang dag bya ba dang / thams cad mtshams ni bshad par bya/ 'khrig pa sdig pa sgron rnams ni// zla ba'i sbyor bas rtag tu gnas// 'ug gdong
30b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes thob nas ni/ / rtsa ni lam gsum 'gro ba mo// urnga drag shul gzi brjid gtsigs pa mo// ye shes lam dbang bza' ba las// lUH'dod la dga' ba sgyu 'phrul che// lha min la sogs skye rnams
30b4(rgyud 'bum): / la/ rkang pa'i mtheb mthar bcu gnyis su// kaT mda' yi shugs kyis 'gro ba 'gror// 'ug gdong ma yi ming las yang // u ni u rgyan bu gar 'dod// lar+tha pul+lI ra ma la yar grags// U ni
30b5(rgyud 'bum): / mAM mu ni zhing ngo // kA ni kA ma ru pa ste// de bzhin sgra 'dir zhing kun 'dod// zhing kun dbugs su gyur pa ni// gru gsum rnam pa'i bde ba'i mtha'// gang phyir gnas bug lnga'i bdag nyid// mi bzad ha
30b6(rgyud 'bum): ru ka'i go 'phang / / yang na bdag gi gdan sogs su// dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang // skye gnas gnas lnga'i bdag nyid de// snying lte rkan dang mgo bo dang // gsang ba ru yang rtsa kun gyi// skye gnas bu ga
30b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i bdag nyid/ / sgong skyes dang ni drod gsher skyes// mngal skyes rdzus te skye ba rnams// sems can sangs rgyas yon tan bdag/ rigs lnga rab tu ston pa'o// nye ba'i gling du gnas ma yang // gtso mo'i
31a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can yang dag gnas/ / sngags kyi 'phreng ba las skyes rnams// sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid skyes// oM ba ma dz+ra hA u ka lU lpa kA s+thAg+ni ya saM ke ni hUM b+ha hUM ya pa hUM Ta hUM pha pa Ta Ta
31a2(rgyud 'bum): swA pha hA Ta oM swA hUM hA/ de ltar sngags de kho na'i bdag/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// kha dog ljang ser drag chen mo// lhag ma lA ma dang ni mtshungs// dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom byas nas// dur khrod
31a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang gnyis med pa/ / kun spyod rtsa rnams thams cad kyi// rgyas pa'i dga' ba'i spyod yul lo// 'di ni 'tsho ba'i ting 'dzin dang // 'od gsal rnam pa'i chos nyid do// bskrad pa'i las dang rnal 'byor ma//
31a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa mo// rang bstan chos las gsungs pa yi// sna tshogs las kyang bya ba'o// kun gyi rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs nas// rgyud 'di yi ni spyod yul lo// 'on kyang rnal 'byor de kun kyang //
31a5(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus tshul ni tshig 'di yin// so sor sdud dang de bzhin du// bsdam gtan srog rtsol 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnam drug go/ so sor sdud pa khwa gdong ma//
31a6(rgyud 'bum): 'ug gdong ma ni bsam gtan 'dod// srog nyid du ni gnas pa khyi// 'dzin pa la ni phag mo'o// rjes dran gnas pa po nya mo// ting nge 'dzin ni brtan mar 'dod// mche ba ma ni rgyas bstan thob// 'joms ma
31a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu kun bdag skyes/ / 'khor ba las ni grol gyur pa// rang gi sku ni sgyu ma mnyam// bdag byin rlab 'di phra mo dang // rdo rje bzlas rang mtshan nyid do// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gter// de las
31b1(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma zung 'jug go/ mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba'ang 'di// lam thams cad kyis mya ngan 'das// theg chen kun la rab 'jug pa// sngags kyi theg pa ru ni byed// bya ba bstan chos dge sna tshogs// snying rje
31b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyes gshin pa yis byed/ / gang 'dri'i dngos dang dngos po la// ye shes rnam pa'i rang byung gis// de 'dra ba yi sems rgyun las// bdag nyid rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong // lus kyi mtshan nyid yang
31b3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa/ / rtsa yi gur ni bshad par bya// spyi gtsug nas ni nor bu'i mthar// mtshams dang mgrin pa rnam gnyis 'dod// rkang pa'i mthe bong mtshams mtha' dang // smin dbus de bzhin 'gro ba ste// mtshan
31b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rtsa ba dpral ba dag/ mig dang rkang pa'i sor mo gnyis// ming med pa ni pus mos shes// byin pa rna ba gnyis dag dang // rkang pa'i mthil dang snying ka dag/ lte ba dang ni rgyab gzhung dang // bshang lam
31b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rkan shes bya/ / rkang pa'i tshigs dang mchu dag dang // mkhur ba mkhur chos dag dang ni// mdoms dang mchan khung gnyis dang ni// lag pa'i tshags dang rkang pa dag/ dpung pa'i tshogs dang nu ma
31b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ mjing pa thal gong 'dir mtshams so// mjug ma nor bu gnyis dag dang // rked pa'i tshogs dang mgrin pa dang // dpral ba dang ni tshogs gnyis dag/ sna bug dag dang rtsa ba dang // brang dag gnyis /
31b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshams su 'dod// stan dag dag ni smin khugs dang // lce dang mi yi sna gang dag/ de bzhin du ni rkan dang lce// bol+la ka ko la gnyis dag/ de la sogs pa du ma ni// rtsa dang tshigs kyi gnang du 'gyur//
32a1(rgyud 'bum): rang rang spyod pa btsir bya ste// byang sems bdag nyid che rnams kyi// btsan thabs sbyor ba'i cho ga ru// shes bya bla ma'i gsung gis so// zla ba zla ba'i tshes gang du// tshes grangs de la
32a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rtsa/ / dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas// ji srid nag po'i mthar thug par// shes bya byang chub 'bab pa'i rtsa// 'ug mo sgo la spyod pa mo// gang dang 'dra ba'i gdong de yi// de 'dra'i sor mo'i
32a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni/ / dbugs ni de dang 'dra bar bya// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// yang na rtsa rnams thams cad ni// brtsir bya bcu gnyis kyis lhag pa'i// brgya yi tshigs rnams thams cad ni// ji ltar gdong
32a4(rgyud 'bum): gis rim pas so/ / de dang der ni a li 'bar// drag mo'i sgyu ma dus kun tu// de phyir a zhes bya ba'i sgo// tshig tu rtog pas brtags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung bar// rdo rje 'chang
32a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar brtag pa'o/ / gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// rtsa ni gti mug chen por 'gyur// de yis de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// rmongs dang mkhas rnams kyi ngag la//
32a6(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bdag thar pa chen po bzhugs// byed pa 'byung po thams cad kyi// dbang phyug chen po sna tshogs rnams// de phyir rtag tu lam nyams pa// sngon byas sdig pa'i las kyis te// nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di
32a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ bgrod bya sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
32b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'ug gdong ma'i nges pa'i tshul dang / yang dag pa'i cho ga las bskyed pa dang / srog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de le
32b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan ni don che ba// khyi gdong rgyu yi dbye bshad bya// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis// rnal 'byor rnams kyis mchog 'grub 'gyur// swAHkhyi ni rnal
32b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma dbugs 'byin/ / rang gi 'jug dang 'byung bar 'gyur// dus kun tu ni gnyid log dang // sad pa bde ba yon tan che// narje sna tshogs gnas su song nas ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bde rig 'gyur// brgya
32b4(rgyud 'bum): la nyi shus lhag pa ni/ / nges tshig bstan bya'i mtshan nyid do// de ltar khyi yi ming du ni// bde ba sbyin pa por shes bya// pad+ma'i skye gnas de rnams su// A s+yaM/ pad+ma'i kha ni rab rgyas pa// gtong dang longs spyod
32b5(rgyud 'bum): gar chen po/ / glu dang rol mo gnyid log dang // reg dang gos dang rgyan dag dang // me tog la sogs bsung can 'dod// mthun par lta ba'i ma la sogs// mdzes ma rnams kyi ngag can te// sangs rgyas
32b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod sogs thams cad du/ / su ra'i btung la 'thung 'gyur dang // skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram// bsti gnas 'gro ba la sogs kyis// tsham dang ston mo 'dod pa ltar// bla ma'i gsung ni bde chen
32b7(rgyud 'bum): po/ mi dang mi mo'i bsgegs pa dang // rgod dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang // mkhas pa rnams kyi yid dam pa// skye bo dbang phyug nyid du'o// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// mchod dang phyag byed la sogs
33a1(rgyud 'bum): bas/ bla ma gus las bde ba ste// yon dbul ba dang bud med do// spyod pa la sogs chos rnams la// las thams cad la mi 'jug go// rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang // sangs
33a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas chos rnams bzhag pa dang / / rnal 'byor ma dang bza' btung dang // sgom dang dga' ba bskyed pa dang // dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes// sbyin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi// las kyis skyid pa
33a3(rgyud 'bum): btsal bya dang / / byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms dang // ye shes rnam shes smra ba dang // dbu ma'i tshul ni bzhag pa las// kun la dbugs dbyung sbyin pa dang // skur pa 'debs/
33a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dgag pa dang // dge ba bcu yi las dang ni// klog dang kha ston byed mchog las// byang chub lam la gnas pa yi// dpa' bo gnyis med lta bu'i phyir// lus la ltos pa med pa yis// grong dang grong du
33a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas rnams kyi/ / de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o// gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud la dga'// don dam rnams la gsal ba yis// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas
33a6(rgyud 'bum): sru dngos grub gtam rnams brjod pa dang / / chos ni don chen 'du shes la// dus su 'du shes sgom pa po// 'gro drug spong ba'i 'du shes ni// de nyid rtogs pa'i ming can no// dngos rnam sgyu ma'i 'du
33a7(rgyud 'bum): shes dang / / ni sogs las kyis bde ba dang // pha dang bu las gcig min dang // gnas sogs 'gro bar spro ba can// nyon mongs phung po yongs gtong dang // ye shes phung po bskyed pa dang // slar yang
33b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bar mi 'ong dang / / 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// rtog pa po yi tshig bzung nas// rtog ldan min pa'i tshig spang bya// dbang po rnams kyi mi mthun min// rang bzhin gyis ni mdzes pa yi//
33b2(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs// sprul pa dang ni chos sku'i yang // 'du shes sad pa la sogs su// gang phyir srid mtshor kun spangs bya// lhag ma dga' ba bzhi po ni// smon lam rdzogs ldan
33b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs la/ / rdzogs ldan dus su rang bzhin skye// dga' ba sangs rgyas rdzogs ldan gang // sems can gsum ldan la phra skye// rig pa des la sbom po skyes// gnyis ldan la ni bde ba med// rtsod dus
33b4(rgyud 'bum): cha yi rags pa'o/ / thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob// smon lam gyis ni rang gi 'bras// de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis rmad byung che// gnas skabs gsum pa'i bde ba la//
33b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba bcu drug rtags brtag pas// khams bcu drug tu shes par bya// rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal// sman dang 'dra bar shes par bya// bdud rtsi zos pas pha rol 'gro/ pad can dung dang sna
33b6(rgyud 'bum): / tshogs can// glang po ma dang bub pa'i ming // 'khor lo rdo rje skya sgur ma// du ba mo dang bu skye tshe// nyung rtsi sbas dang ngo tsha dang // glog dang can dan nyi ma skyes// dmar po de bzhin sbrul gyi mig/ sman mchog
33b7(rgyud 'bum): tu ni shes par bya/ / bde bas dga' ba'i dus su ni// khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig las// bya ba de dag zhar la dran// sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o// gnas skabs bzhi la bshad pa ni// yid can
34a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi grangs brgyad de/ / 'gro dang 'pho 'gyur de bzhin du// sdug 'gyur gnyid yur 'gyur de bzhin// lhung 'gyur 'dzag 'gyur dang ni 'dir// g.yo 'gyur 'gyel bar 'gyur
34a2(rgyud 'bum): babanyid/ / rnal 'byor ma brgyad dkar mo sogs// bde ba'i rgyu yis gnas skabs so// de ltar gnas skabs rnam bzhi la// khyi gdong ming gis 'du shes gyur// yang dag pa yi go 'phang 'dir// gang dang
34a3(rgyud 'bum): su yir gnas par 'gyur/ / yang dag rtsol ba la gnas nas// khyi ni gzhan gyi grong du'o// sngags bden sbyor ba bdag nyid de// dkyil 'khor dbus su sgom pa'o// oM badz+ra nA shwA ma na ta a ka s+phA Ta ya oM ke
34a4(rgyud 'bum): taMhaMhUM kA hAM nA pa ya Ta hUM Ta s+phA Ta hA ba oM Ta swA hA/ sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid sngags// shes rab thabs te dngos grub ster// kha dog dmar po drag chen mo// lhag ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs// chu stod
34a5(rgyud 'bum): karka ta yugs sa/ / rang gi bdag po rab gnas ma// nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste// sems can rang rang bzhin du skyes// dbang gi las la lha mo ste// lha dang lha min sogs sngags rig/ bdud rtsi lnga
34a6(rgyud 'bum): dang sgrol ma che/ / mchod pa las rnams thams cad la'o// snying kha'i pad+mar yongs bkug nas// bdud rtsi tshigs kun las skyes pa// rdo rje sbu gu'i rab sbyor bas// sngar dang bsro ba la sogs pas// sku rdo rje
34a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs sngags kyi ni/ / byin gyis brlab par byas pa la'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di
34b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang bde ba la sogs ma'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u dgu pa'o//
34b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas phag gdong ma yi ni// nyung ba rgya cher bshad par bya// dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang // dngos po de las ldog pa'o// phag mo rengs pa'i las rnams la// mi shes ri bo 'joms
34b3(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / sUHkhab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang // skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ma// byang chub sems kyi dga' chen po// kardza keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa mo// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs kun// bzhi pa
34b4(rgyud 'bum): las 'das mi 'gyur ma/ / de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad// mngal sogs bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de// thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon// ma yi pad+ma la ltung ba'o// nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis// phyi nas 'ug
34b5(rgyud 'bum): par gnas dang 'dra/ / zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni// khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las// phag tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can// brtan mas skye gnas dral ba las// pho nya byis pa dang 'phye phyis// mche ba
34b6(rgyud 'bum): mo ni las bcom pas/ / 'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ma// yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di// gzhan gyi lta ba nya sogs kyi// 'jug pa thams cad bden pa ste/
34b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug med de dngos spyod yul lo// rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa'i// rtsol ba'i yan lag la 'jog ma'o// mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang // 'jug med de nyid rtag tu'o// kha dog ser mo drag chen mo//
35a1(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma gzugs can ma dang mtshungs// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// seng ge 'gro bzhin chu srin la// nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo// sngag
35a2(rgyud 'bum): las bzhengs pa'i lha mo rnams/ / rang rang zhing dang nye zhing ma'o// oM bA daM dzAb+hA s+phu kA rA la s+thA gra ye mu hUM kha hUM b+hi ba oM Ta phaT swA hA/ sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyis// gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/
35a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thig gdab la sogs ni// bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba'i ma yi ste// thig chen gnyis ni btab nas su// shar dang so sor 'dod thig dang // zur gyi thig gnyis btab byas nas// phur bu'ang gdab
35a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba ste/ / tshangs pa'i thig gi logs nas ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa gnyis gdab// sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste// lte ba'i pad+ma de dang mnyam// snying po'i 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni// cha gsum du yang de
35a5(rgyud 'bum): shes bya/ / de yi cha gcig 'khor lo gsum// lhag mtshon gyi sa gzhi'o// de yi gsum cha 'phreng ba ste// rdo rje pad+ma dang 'khor lo// rtsibs rnams 'khor lo dbu ma las// dman te gnyis gcig sdom par sbom//
35a6(rgyud 'bum): ka ba rnams ni kun tu sbyin// brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o// sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs te// sgo khyung sgro yi cha can mo// stegs bu rnams ni de'i phyed de// 'gram dang logs ni de bzhin mo// gzugs kyi
35a7(rgyud 'bum): snam bu dang ni 'dir/ / rin chen 'phreng phyed snam bu'o// man pa'i 'phreng ba de'i byed // mun pa'i snam bu de bzhin mo// ga pa'i rtsalas 'thon gyi mo// sna tshogs rdo rje 'od chen po'o// dril chung rba ba gos rnams dang /
35b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa// de yi phyi chu skyes thams cad du// snying po la sogs yang dag bri// sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'phreng dang 'dir// lhag mar 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'o// de yi phyi rol khor yug ni// sa gzhi'i
35b2(rgyud 'bum): rim pas bye bar bya/ / mi grug 'brang ba sbyin bya zhing // mgo dang lag pa dag de bzhin// skyed pa'i bang+gA'i rol tu// rin chen 'phreng ba yang dag bri// dra thod brgyang po bri ba'o// kun nas gdus drug la sdos/
35b3(rgyud 'bum): so// sa bon rnam par dgod par bya// thams cad gri gug las byung ba'o// yang na sku sogs rnams kyi ni// yi ge rnams kyis dkyil 'khor kun// de bzhin skad cig rnam pas kyang // sa bon gyis ni
35b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbyung / / mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni// bum pa'i steng du sbyin bya ste// sum cu rtsa bdun gzhan bya'o// gnag dang rtsa ba spangs pa ste// mchu ni 'phyang zhing mgrin
35b5(rgyud 'bum): pa mtho/ / mgrin pa rnams su gos zung ste// rin chen lnga dang 'bru dang sman// dri yi mchu dang 'dab ma'i rtse// bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis dgang bya// gtor ma las rnams kun la ste// kun nas bsgoms pa la
35b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'o/ / rdo rje lha mo rnams dang ni// zhing skyong dang ni khri rnams la// bdud rtsi lnga sogs rdzas rnams dbul// chom bya phyi la sogs rnams kyis// bgegs med yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur// phyi nas
35b7(rgyud 'bum): las ni yang dag brtsam/ / du ma'i dud 'gro'i zhal lha mo// sum cu rtsa bdun gzugs can rnams// las kyi rdo rje 'joms byas nas// ting 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor ldan// bdun cu gnyis phyag drag mo ste//
36a1(rgyud 'bum): zhabs bco brgyad ni rnams kyis ldan// rtsa ba'i zhal ni phag zhal te// ngos gnyis dag tu dgu dgu'o// de'i steng du bdun bdun te// phyi nas gsum ni gzhag par bya// g.yas
36a2(rgyud 'bum): su khyi dang lce spyang dang / / byi la stag dang seng ge dang // 'jigs byed mche can rta bong bu// de ltar ji ltar rim pas so// g.yon du ba lang ma he spyang // rus sbal chu srin ri bong dang // bse dang g.yag dang mun
36a3(rgyud 'bum): dza dang / / ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// sbrul dang sre mo rtsangs pa dang // sram dang byi ba dang ni dom// mkha' lding bya rgod bya rog dang // 'ug pa bya gar khra dang ni// srin bya dang ni ngur pa dang // rma bya zangs

36a5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal// 'gro la byang chub byed bdag nyid// zhabs rnams kyis ni 'byung po'i tshogs// me yi dbus su son po gnon// g.yas pas khyab
36a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug drag po dang / / tshangs pa nyi ma me dang ni// dbang po rlung dang bden bral dang // nor sbyin ji lta'i rim pa'o// g.yon pa gshin rje 'dod pa dang // zla ba chu lha nor rgyas dang // sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po
36a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / smin drug bu dang 'khor sbyar te// de ltar bco brgyad dbyibs rnams ni// 'dus pa rmad byung bsngags pa'o// 'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni// lha mo'i zhabs ni rdo rje 'dzin// g.yas par
36b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha'i tshogs kyang ni/ / rdo rje ral gri mdung dpal can// dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni// gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo Da ma ru chu gri dang // dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig/ dung dang /
36b2(rgyud 'bum): zangs dung dbyug gu dang // rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin te// bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni// me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbyug pa me long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang // rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags
36b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrog dang / / gdos dang sgrogs dang nya rgya dang // mgo bcad 'bar ba mar nag dang // 'jigs byed gzugs ni rim pas so// g.yon par dril bu phub rings che// tho ba zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha
36b4(rgyud 'bum): / D+haM po ti dang // phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang // g.yer ka'i 'phreng dang lcags sgrog dang // brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni// b+ho kaM Da ka pags rlon dang // sgra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang // skul byed ro
36b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shing bu dang / / brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang // keng rus zor ba de bzhin te// mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang // spen pa dang ni phur pa dang // sa bon gang dang sog le dang // khab dang lus kyi pags pa
36b6(rgyud 'bum): dang sprin char 'bab dang shing ral gri/ / de ltar rim pas shes byas pas// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa'o// gnyis lhag pa yi phyag gnyis kyis// glang po'i pags pa steng bgos pa'o// khams
36b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum glang po la bzhugs pa/ / dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa'o// kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te// yang na gtso mo'i kha dog bzhin// mgo bo'i 'phreng sogs thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes/
37a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o// de ltar yang dag pa rtsol ba'i// gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya// yang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid do// ting 'dzin dra bas kun
37a2(rgyud 'bum): bkang nas/ / 'od gsal ba la kun thim byos// rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o// rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni// rang rig skyes la ston par 'gyur// sU yi yi
37a3(rgyud 'bum): ges 'gro kun rgyas btab ste/ / lhan skyes rang bzhin de kho na nyid dran par bya// slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo // phyugs gang yin pa'i skye bo de rnams sangs rgyas so// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam
37a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las
37a5(rgyud 'bum): pagra gdong ma bskyed pa dang dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / de nas brtan ma'i sbyor ba 'dir// bshad kyis sgom pa po rnams nyon// kun nas dus na
37a6(rgyud 'bum): bani rnams su/ / zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi// bgrod dang mnyam pas bcings pa yi// mtshams de rnams ni rab bshad bya// byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa// brtan ma la sogs mnyam gnas ma// nye ba'i
37a7(rgyud 'bum): gling du gnas pa mo/ / mgo yi zla ba dang ni gzhu// mo hi ta ni rtag tu de'i// las gnyis dag tu shes bya ste// sbom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i// 'chi ba mche bas gcod ma gang // de yis gshin rje'i mcher
37b1(rgyud 'bum): shes bya/ / thog mar yi ge gnyis can no// bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni// mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung // gang gi drin gyis bdag gir 'gyur// su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
37b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ / brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni// sems can rang rang las kyis so// skye bo kun la 'tshe ba yi// sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa// de yis de ni dus min 'chi// khams dang dbugs ni
37b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chad par 'gyur/ / gzhan rnams kyis ni bcad pa yis// bza' btung phyin ci log tu 'gyur// sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin// dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur// sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad// lus
37b4(rgyud 'bum): / dang bsam pa las kyang ngo // g.yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni// zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis// bgrod pa'i srog ni nyi ma'i ste// a ba d+hU tI'i rlung rim pas// de yis ya yi yi ge bshad// ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab
37b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ da yig g.yas su song nas ni// re zhig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur// a yi yi ges gnas pa 'thob// slu ba nam mkhar 'gro ba mo// rtsa ni bde kun bdag nyid rnams// d+hi yi yi ge'i ming du shes//
37b6(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni// dkyil 'khor lnga rnams su ni brjod// de rnams dngos las khyab bskyed de// dus min slu bar rig par bya// de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid po// gnas gnas bgrod pa'i
37b7(rgyud 'bum): lus can no/ / 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur// 'dir ni kha dog gnyis su 'gyur// lus sgom pa ni de bzhin no// ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas// mtshan ma
38a1(rgyud 'bum): / mtshon cha sogs 'gyur ro// spong ba'i chos zhes bya bar gsungs// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso mo'o// rnal 'byor snyam cu bdun bdag nyid// sngags las byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi/
38a2(rgyud 'bum): oM AHsa hUM ha ba sra dzA b+hu ya dza ma b+hA dA su Da rA kI ya ye hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA hA oM/ 'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso// gshin rje'i mche ba'i rab sbyor
38a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ skye ba mthar byed bza' bar bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes
38a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// /
38a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gshin rje pho nya 'chang // gang gis 'chi ba dbang 'gyur ba'o// br-i sh+tsi ka ru yang dag byung // smin drug can dang bzang por ldan// dpyid kyis mnyam pa'i dus kyi ni// pho nya ma bskyed mtshan nyid do//
38a6(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gsod ma de yi ni// 'chi ba slu ba'i 'khor lo la// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo tshar// lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya// lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// bcu gsum par ni bri bar bya// slar yang
38a7(rgyud 'bum): sum cu gnyis rnams su/ / gsum gnyis gcig ni lo yin no// dus tshod med dang gnyis zla ba// zla ba'i tshes phyogs de bzhin mda'// gsum gnyis gcig gi skabs su ni// rim pas phyi nas nyi phyed sogs//
38b1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma gcig dang zhag dang gnyis// gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs// nor ro chu phyogs rim pas te// sum cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o// srog gi nus par shes bya ba// bcu dgu yi ni bdag nyid do// bcu/
38b2(rgyud 'bum): dgu slar yang 'di ru ni// 'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus can no// nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par// skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba// gcig tu spyod par rtag rgyu las// rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag 'thob// bar gyi
38b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma rnams nyid ni/ / bcu drug grangs su shes byas la// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis// lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyor// de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang // dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya// gang du
38b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ni srog spangs pa/ / der ni 'di de 'bab par bya// steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba// gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o// de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te// mnyam pa ya yig gis 'gugs ma'o//
38b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gnad bcings pas nyams pas// ma yi yi ge thams cad bshad// 'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas// rnon po'i ma ni rab sbar bya// nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams// las kyis rang nyid
38b6(rgyud 'bum): nyams par 'gyur/ / der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya ste// ba lang ma he zhon sogs so// byang chub sems kyis lam du ni// mdzes ma rnams kyis de tshe btung // der yang rang gi yan lag las// byung ba'i sgra sman
38b7(rgyud 'bum): gtang bar bya/ / 'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste// glo ba la sogs ma chos pa'o// g.yul ngor rang nyid 'gyel ba yi// gal te rnyed na khrag chen po// the tshom spangs nas btung bya zhing // de yi sha yang bza'
39a1(rgyud 'bum): bar byang yang na gang gis gnas su/ / 'chi lngas zad nas song bar du'o// bza' ba 'o mas byas na bde// yang na sha rnams thams cad do// gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs g.yogs
39a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rabadag nyid la ni dus kun tu// der ni gnas pa bsro bya zhing // me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya// der ni chu dron yang btung zhing // bza' ba chung ngu nyung ngu'o// gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste// sum cu
39a3(rgyud 'bum): bdun bdag nyid rang / / gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can// ser dmar gnyis kyi kha dog can// ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed// dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed// lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub
39a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos kyi/ / lte 'og mgrin pa rkan 'gro rnams// zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba// phan tshun bug rnams su 'du 'gyur// de phyir kha T+wAM ga bsgom ste// yan lag kha T+wAM sbyor bas so// snying ka'i pad dbus
39a5(rgyud 'bum): su sems kyis/ / dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no// lha mo'i mdog ni sngon can te// dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs// oM ba pa dz+wa ra ya shu ma pU d+h+r-i sho tI d+ya ye tA hUM sU hUM la phaT kha phaT/
39a6(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rUMb+hUM swA ga hA d+hA ri Ni huM hUM phaT swA hA oM hUM/ shes rab thabs bdag nyid du skyes// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor ma ni 'di rnams kun// bdud rtsi'i gzugs su bsgom par bya// de rnams
39a7(rgyud 'bum): snying khar dkar ba ni/ / 'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgom bya// de rnams nang du rang ming yang // kha dog dkar mo 'od bcas pa// rtsa yi bu ga so so yi// nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya// rlon dang btsos pa'i
39b1(rgyud 'bum): ra'i 'o ma/ / bdud rtsi lnga dang rang byung ni// rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang // dus su 'chi ba nyams par 'gyur// zag med de nyid thob pas na// de la dus min 'chi ming ci// de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i// chos
39b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar shes/ / rdo rje btung byas rab bshad pa// las kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'dod// gcig ni phyi rol gyir bshad do// gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba// rtsa
39b3(rgyud 'bum): / drug dus ni rgyu ba mo// ngang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog/ 'og gi chu ni 'thung ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad// de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs// 'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bros// rdo rje 'chang gi
39b4(rgyud 'bum): gdams ngag go/ / gshin rje pho nya ma'i rnal 'byor ma khyod bzhugs// de yis slar yang rgas dang 'chi ba med pa 'thob// 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma bla med// rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nam
39b5(rgyud 'bum): mi ldan no/ / de ni mnyam pa'o mnyam sreg las// g.yon dang g.yas dang dbu ma yi// rtsol ba g.yo mang dngos po las// slar yang ya ma'i yi ge 'dod// pho nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngang pa// dbu ma zad pa'i
39b6(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang ngo / / de ltar rnam pa mang po ni// brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya// 'dir mang bshad pas ci bya ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs pa// dge ba'i las kyang bsnyen bya ste// lus gcig lus mang po
39b7(rgyud 'bum): can no/ / rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing // dpa' bo rnams la rjed par bya// gang zhig gang slong la yang dag/ de phyir de rnams la nges sbyin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde
40a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gshin rje
40a2(rgyud 'bum): phopo nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'chi ba bslu ba'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas gshin rje mche gtsigs ma// bshad
40a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis de ni mnyan par gyis/ / sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi// skyon gyis gur la 'bigs dang sreg/ gang zhig gang la las byas pas// de yi dus su 'bigs par 'dod// brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnad
40a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / gang dang der ni gnas rnams kyang // 'di rnams dbus su bya ba ste// dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya// mi dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas// gnad du na bas mtshon par bya// gal te dus ni gcig la
40a5(rgyud 'bum): nirkan gsum du ni gzer ba na/ / de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi bar// rig bya 'di la the tshom med// rkang pa'i brang ba gzer ba dang // gal te lte bar gzer ba ni// lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar// skye bo rnams ni
40a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'o/ / rkang pa gnyis kyi brang mthil dang // gal te mig tu gzer ba na// de tshe zla ba gsum na yang // 'chi byed kyi ni dbang du 'gro// rkang pa'i mthil ni gzer ba dang // gal te sna ni gzer ba na// zhag gsum
40a7(rgyud 'bum): na ni 'chi 'gyur bar/ / 'di la yang ni the tshom med// bshang dang gci ba'i dus su ni// gal te sbrid pa byung ba na// de yi de ltar dus tshod kyi// lo na nges par 'chi ba'o// snga dro yi ni nyin lnga dang // dbus ma'i gung la bcu/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin// gzhan gyi gung la zla phyed gcig/ nam phyed la yang zla ba ste// 'di tshe'i de ltar dus su ni// gal te sbrid byung sngon bzhin te// dus kyi nges par 'tsho 'gyur bas// 'di la the tsom med pa'o// lhag pa yi ni/
40b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud khung du// gzer na lo ni lnga rnams na// de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni// zhes bya 'di la the tshom med// lha mo lce rtse ma mthong na// de phyir zhag ni gsum na 'chi// nyan pa yi ni rtse mor gzer// 'chi ba zla ba bzhi
40b3(rgyud 'bum): na'o/ mig g.yon pa yi 'bras bu ni// me long la ni ma mthong na// de tsha zhag bdun na 'chi bar// sngon gyi skye bar bshad pa'o// dkar po yi ni tshes gcig la// gal te khu ba dkar min 'gyur// zla ba drug na de
40b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ste/ / dmar pos nad du nges par 'gyur// b+ha ga ling ga yongs sbyar ba'i// mtha' ru gal te sbrid pa ni// byung na zla ba lnga na ni// de tshe ltung bar 'gyur ba'o// sbyor ba'i dus su dril bu'i sgra// rna dag la byung
40b5(rgyud 'bum): 'chi gsal bar/ / gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur pa// zla ba lnga na the tshom med// de bzhin dus ni gcig gi tshe// gal te zla ba nyi ma dag/ gang gi sems can la gzer ba// zla ba gcig tu 'tsho bcas pa'o//
40b6(rgyud 'bum): rkang lag dag gi tshogs bzhi dang // mthe'u chung gi ni sor mo la// gang gi dus gcig la gzer ba// nges par zla ba gcig na 'chi// bsnun pa rnams kyis gzer ba na// gal te nus stobs bdag mnyam
40b7(rgyud 'bum): pang rkang pa'i mthe bong dag las dpa'/ / sa gsum du ni skye bo rnams// mdud pa'i rgyal po lta bu'i tshul// dpe des rtag tu bshad pa'o// de tshe zla drug na 'chi bar// gal te drag po mnyam yang 'gyur// snying
41a1(rgyud 'bum): ka'i dbus dang de bzhin sngon/ / 'dir yang mgrin pa'i spyod yul te// bla phyed gsum na 'chi ra ni// rnam dpyad spyod yul 'di la med// slar yang mgo bo'i rtse mor gzer// grong khyer/
41a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi rgya mtsho sreg/ 'phral du 'chi bar shes bya bar// lus kyi gur du bshad pa'o// rtsu ba'i rtsa bar de bzhin gzer// 'phral du 'chi bar nges par bshad// smin ma'i dbus su de bzhin gzer// de ni
41a3(rgyud 'bum): skad cig la 'chi 'gyur/ / sna yi rtse mor rlung grang mor// gyur ni yongs rdzogs dus yin no// de ltar 'chi ba thams cad ni// mche gtsigs go 'phang gis slu'o// gang gi dus su 'di 'gyur bar// gzer
41a4(rgyud 'bum): ni de tshe'i dus 'dir 'gyur/ / gzer ba'i gnas ni gsal mtshon nas// rtsa ba bcu yis mnye bar bya// khyab 'jug ces bya'i mar khu ni// mgo bor rtag tu gzung bar bya// sna nas rnam snang mar khu dang //
41a5(rgyud 'bum): mar dang khrag tu yongs ldan pa'o// nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi gdung ste// skye bo dang bral khyim dron por// sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho cha bzung bas// rnal 'byor ma de yang bsgom bya// yaHgang gi dkyil 'khor chen por ni//
41a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzadabu ma'i mtha' yi mtshan nyid las// g.yas su bgrod pa'i dus su ni// daM rdzas yi tshig mtshams kun tu'o// bu ga gzer byed phug nas ni// de'i skad cig la dbyug gu dbyug/ TAM Ta hri la hril por ni
41a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bzhin pa/ / ShaT snying kha'i rdzing bu la sogs la// shes bya mtshams kun tu yang ste// gzer ba'i 'chi ba slu ba la// ir+tha dbang po yis ni thams cad la// yid ni de bzhin nges par gnas// Sh+Ti yi yi/
41b1(rgyud 'bum): ge zhes bya ba// de ltar tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs// der ni ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// dbang po sbyangs pas thob par gyis// pad snal skud pas nor bu dang // spyi gtsug kyang ni gcig tu bya// rnam shes brgyad
41b2(rgyud 'bum): po der gnas par/ / bsgom bya myos byed 'bab pa mo// kun tu skud pa de btang bas// gshin rje'i mche ba 'joms pa mo// de yis nI yi yig bshad de// gzer ba thams cad rnam 'joms ma'o// kha dog
41b3(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang sngo ba ste/ / 'chi ba 'joms ma byang chub 'gro// de yi mtshon char 'gyur ba ni// dum skyes rnal 'byor ma yi'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog/ oM ba b+ha dza
41b4(rgyud 'bum): / g+ha ya dzi man daM aSh+NI m+ba nI ra ya d+ha ke rA ya hUM ya huM hUM pa hUM Ta pha phaT Ta phaT swA swA hA oM/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin du'ang // skud pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya// tha skar zla ba de bzhin du// srang dang khyu
41b5(rgyud 'bum): / mchog rA si'i 'o// 'dis ni byed bzhin pa yis ni// 'chi ba slu ba dge ba'o// gzhan ni de la de ltar bya// pho nya ma ni gsal bar brjod// gzhan gyi 'chi ba slu ba yang // brgya phrag 'bum rnams shes par bya//
41b6(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang kun stong gnas byas nas// bla mchog mnyes pas byas pas so// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
41b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// gshin rje mche ba ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la 'jug pa 'chi ba slu ba la sogs pa'i le'u ste
42a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu gsum pa'o/ / / de nas 'joms ma'i 'jug pa ni// gang gis pha rol 'gro bshud bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dus byas nas// gzhi las 'dri bar byed pa
42a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'jug pa zhes bya ci ru bshad// khyab bdag pha rol phyin ni ci// shin tu ngo mtshar ston pa gsungs// rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin mdzod// nyon cig sgyu ma'i 'jug pa yang // mi bden pa ni btags pa ste//
42a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo dbang po'i dra ba ltar// 'joms ma yi yang 'jug pa ste// mthong ba na yang de la med// chu yi zla ba lta bu mchog/ rang gi rang bzhin la 'jug 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid 'dzin rnams kyi'o// dus kyi
42a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dngos po yang / / las kyis su ni slu ba ste// 'khor ba las ni pha rol 'gro// 'chi med slu ba yang ni med// ston gyi nam nyin mnyam dus su// sna yi nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// rlung ni rnam par
42a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin bzhin pas/ / 'chi ba'i dus ni slu ba'o// brgya phrag drug dang nyi shu gcig/ stong phrag rnams kyi srog rnams ni// a ba d+hU tIr rab zhugs pa// de ni 'joms mar mngon brjod pa'o// byis pa'i mkhas pa
42a6(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa yi/ / slu ba bshad pa de ma yin// de min slu ba rab bshad pa// 'di ni bdag gi rang mtshan nyid// slar yang lha mo des gsungs pa// ya sogs de ltar don bstan pas// gang gang ting 'dzin dmigs
42a7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / nam mkha' mnyam sogs 'dus pa'i mtha'// rgyud ni de bzhin srog chen po// rdo rje lta bur yang ni bshad// dal gyis dal gyis 'gro bdag nyid// tshogs rnams kun tu thim pa'o// zhi gnas lhag
42b1(rgyud 'bum): mthong dag gis ni/ / byang chub 'chi ba'i spyod yul min// rdo rje'i sar ni 'khrid par grags// go 'phang chen po 'dzin mchog go// de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags pas// mi rnams kyi ni mi dge 'dzad// nor chen go
42b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phang thob pa ni/ / yang dag spong ba'i mtshan nyid do// srog gi yang dag rgyu byas nas// dus kun tu ni nye bar bya// rtag tu 'chi ltas 'chi ba slu// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lhan cig/ rnal 'byor ma rnams dang
42b3(rgyud 'bum): mjal ba/ / bsod nams dbang gis brgya lam thob// de rnams dang byas dga' chen po// myangs pas 'chi ba slu ba yin// de phyir rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// mchod pa rnal 'byor pa yis bya// rdo rje 'chang chen
42b4(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang ni/ / de rnams mnyes pas 'theb par 'gyur// rmongs pa gang zhig smod byed pa// de yi dngos grub mchog med do// de rnams la ni smad pa las// mnar med dmyal ba chen por 'gyur// de yis bsod nam
42b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pas ci/ / bsrung bar gnas pa 'am dka' thub ci// rnal 'byor ma la rtag gus pas// skad cig yud tsam sogs kyis so// lha mo kha dog gnyis ma ste// srid dang mya ngan 'das gzugs can// dkyil
42b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor pa rnams dbus su ni/ / bsgom bya mtshan ma lA ma bzhin// sngags kyi yi ge'i sbyor ba yis// sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor mas// bskyed bya thabs dang bcas pa ste// lhan skyes sbyor bas rdo rje 'dzin// oM
42b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ma dz+ra hA ya d+hu ma mAn+ta tha kA nI ra ye ba hUM pu hUM ShA pha ya Ta hUM pha hUM Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hA/ de ltar nyungs kar tsam gyi ni// thig le'i dbus ma bsgom par bya// snying kha la sogs 'khor lo ru// gang du yid ni yongs sbyor
43a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ bu mo rus sbal zla ba yang // khrums can nye ba'i gling ma'o// sems can don byed de nyid du// thim dang longs spyod sogs byed ma// phag mo'i sprul pa'i bdag nyid du// skyes pa srid/
43a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'joms byed ma'o// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ches// lha rnams thams cad gzhug pa dang // 'khor lo sgyur chen ngo bo las// thams cad kun ni sprul pa dang // sangs rgyas nyid bdag 'du shes kyis// de'i
43a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid du sdud par 'gyur/ / bsdu de de ltar yid min pa// 'byin pa ru ni ji ltar 'gyur// 'di kun sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sgyu ma med cing stong nyid med// ngo bo kun tu sbyor ba tsam// sangs rgyas nyid sogs 'du
43a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'o/ / rdzogs ldan gsum ldan sogs dngos nyid// rang gi rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// rnam gzhag tsam du gsungs pa ni// dngos po ma 'khrul ngo bo nyid// rnam par rtog pas brtag par bya// rtog pa
43a5(rgyud 'bum): / med par gyur pa na// brtag pa nyid du mi bya'o// rtog dang rtog med las rgol 'gyur// thams cad gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan// gang zhig gang dngos skad cig mthong // de mthong ri bong rwa bzhin no// 'di
43a6(rgyud 'bum): / yis 'gog pa med par ni// skye ba la sogs yongs rtogs bya// sna tshogs lung dang rgyud rnams la'ang // rigs pa can 'dir rnam par dpyod// rnam dpyad gyur pas rigs pa ni// de rigs bdag gi tshe
43a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'od rje sems ni de yi gzhi rtogs par/ / rna ba'i drung du brjod pa'o// slob ma'i phyir dang bla ma la// gus phyir 'di ni gzung bar gyis// ding sang skye bo tshe thung la// rigs pa gzhan dag la yod min// g.yon/
43b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsod pa'i dus su ni// blo chung bsod nams shin tu chung // de phyir bsod nams ldan rnams kyi// ye shes sangs rgyas spyod yul min// yun ring dus nas snying rje ni// ston 'gyur rtogs pa ma byed cig/
43b2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams grangs med ma byas par// slar yang ye shes smra ba ci// byang chub sems ci sangs rgyas ci// 'di la khyad par yod mi 'gyur// dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga// de dngos byang chub sems
43b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rang / / dbang po rnams ni byang chub sems dpar skyed// yul rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid du gyis// phung po dang ni sangs rgyas lhan cig zung // khams rnams rdo rje 'dzin par gzung bar byos//
43b4(rgyud 'bum): srid par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ba ma yin no// thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ngo bor zung // snying rje yi ni sbyor bas khyed bzhugs shig/ gang dang gang gis gzhan gyi dgos pa gyis// brjod med kun
43b5(rgyud 'bum): la'ang nan tan byos/ / mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'joms mtha' yi// 'joms ma 'dus pa thams cad dang // bgegs sogs 'byung po 'dus pa ma// 'jig rten sdang ba thams cad dang // yi dgas
43b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs dang dmyal ba'ang rung / / gshin rje la sogs khro ba 'dir// sngon gyi bag chags 'joms ma'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de
43b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gshin rje 'joms ma 'jug pa bskyed pa dang / dus
44a1(rgyud 'bum): su 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'di las gsang chen bshad/
44a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ting 'dzin mtshan nyid do// dpal he ru kar gnas gang gis// gus bcas las gzhan la yod min// 'jig pa la sogs chags pa'i mthar// brtan pa sprul pa'i sku gsal ba'o// chos dang
44a3(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rdzogs sogs 'dir/ / thams cad bsdus par byas par 'gyur// thog mar gnas ni kun bsgrub bya// skye ba med dang ri sogs dang // dur khrod du bya de ru ni// gtor ma zhing skyong rnams la'o//
44a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor kha'i gtsang sbra sogs// sngon song mchod yon la sogs dbul// bcom ldan 'das kyi skur dmigs nas// ras bris sogs bsgom bshad par bya// yi dwags gdan can drag chen po/
44a5(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa 'gro ba'i don dang ldan// kun nas kun tu skad cig gis// ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs par bya// shrI yig 'byung ba kun gyi don// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// 'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni//
44a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can dang // e baM la sogs gnyis med pa'ang // shrI zhes bya ba'i yig des brjod// he yig snying ka nas kun tu// he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro// bsgom pa kun gyi 'byung
44a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas las/ / 'dzin pa la sogs rnams skyed 'gyur// de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de// rgyu bdag nyid du mi rtog pa'o// rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid// de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas// bkod pa gang zag
44b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag med pa/ / rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni// ru yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can// de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o// slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i// bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang // gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa// /
44b2(rgyud 'bum): de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod// dngos po mngon sum stong pa min// dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can// dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo// snga nas sgom pa kun 'gro ba'o// snying la pad+ma'i nyi dbus su// ye shes sa bon
44b3(rgyud 'bum): rang byung las/ / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa// nam mkha' gang bar spro bar bya// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs// lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs nas// nam mkha'i khongs kyi dbus su ni// 'gro ba'i bdag po
44b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhag byas la/ / zla nyi shar bshad nyid skyes pa'i// bdud rtsi sogs kyis mchod byas nas// sdig pa bshags sogs byas nas ni// snying rje la sogs rjes dran bya// stong nyid rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi// rnal
44b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dag pa rnam bsgom bya/ / sa bon lnga yi rang bzhin las// khang pa brtsegs pa rnams sprul bya// rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang ba phyis// ri rab pad+ma'i steng du gsal// sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi la// spyan gsum
44b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ / shes rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid// byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// dkar dang ljang ku dmar ba dang // ser po g.yon nas bskor bas so// zhal gyi ral pa'i cod pan la// sna tshogs
44b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/ / 'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu glang chen gyi// pags pa cang te'u gri gug dang // dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du/
45a1(rgyud 'bum): kha T+wAM ga snod zhags pa dang // mgo sde g.yon dang gsas par ro// 'das sdes kha dog sgra tshogs lnga// 'dab rgya bzhi bcwa rtswa brgyad dang // 'khor lo'ang bcu gnyis bdag nyid cam/
45a2(rgyud 'bum): nibacu drug bdag nyid dang // nyams dga' dur khrod so gnyis na'o// gri gug rin chen rdo rje dang // pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri dang // sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa dang // mgo bo keng rus 'di rnams dang // zhags pa
45a3(rgyud 'bum): 'am lcags kyur shes bya ste/ / 'khor lo 'khor lor 'phreng ba'o// re rer rtsibs ni sum cu drug/ rdo rje pad+ma nyi ma can// rgyu yi rdo rje yongs gyur pa// lnga brgya bzhi yis lhag pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
45a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'o/ / rtag tu glu ma'i sgra yis so// mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba 'gron 'bod na// khyod ni ci yi phyir na stong pa nyid du bzhugs// bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje 'dzin pa
45a5(rgyud 'bum): bde chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod/ / gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub// 'jig rten phyugs gang shi ba bzhin du 'gyur// bdag gi pad+ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod// de ltar 'jig rten kun bder//
45a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar byos// rdo rje 'dzin pas bdag la rol cig rol// lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa thob// sems can 'jig rten gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas// ji ltar khyod kyi stong pa don med 'gyur// khyod ni
45a7(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste/ / ci phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin 'gro med bzhugs// bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod// de ltar khyod ni 'jig rten rnams mthun bzhud// glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba
45b1(rgyud 'bum): yis / rang rang he ru ka rab sad// oM AHkA ya wA k+tsi t+ta badz+ra hUM phaT ho/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa ni// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// skad cig sngags las byung bdag nyid// dpa' bo kun dang
45b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma'o/ / 'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo dang // lte ba nyid ma che mchog la// gang du mdzad pa yi ni sku// gnag dang ljang ku phyed phyed do// bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni// zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum pa/
45b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can// mche ba chen po gtsigs pa'i zhal// g.yas dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni// ser ba dang ni ljang khur grags// nub ni dmar po de bzhin te// lhag ma'i
45b4(rgyud 'bum): zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ / mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par byed// rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i tshogs// g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya// glang chen pags pas phyag gnyis kyis// skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin
45b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan/ / rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang // rtse gsum ji lha'i rim pas g.yas// dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni// gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang // dbyug to dang ni mtshon rtse gcig/ dung
45b6(rgyud 'bum): dang zangs dung dbyig gu dang / / rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin du// bya rog sgo dang pir dang ni// me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbyug pa me long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang // rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang // gdos
45b7(rgyud 'bum): dang du b+hu sa nya rgya/ / mgo med 'bar ba'i mar nag dang // 'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so// g.yon pa dril bu phub rings che// gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti// phub chung yu can sdigs
46a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub dang / / g.yer ka'i 'phreng dang lcags sgrog dang // brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni// b+ho kaM rnga dang pags rlon dang // sgra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang // ro sreg skul ba'i shing bu dang // 'phongs
46a2(rgyud 'bum): dang phub rings mgo bo dang / / keng rus zor ba de bzhin du// mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang // spen pa yi ni phur bu dang // sa bon gang ba sog le dang // khab dang skud bshus pags pa dang // sprin char 'bab
46a3(rgyud 'bum): dang shing lcags kyu/ / phyag gi mtshon cha bdun cu gnyis// de lta'i rim pas shes par bya// mgo bo lnga yis rgyan du byas// phyag rgya drug dang ldan pas klubs// de bzhin mgo brgya'i 'phreng ba dang // dpung rgyan
46a4(rgyud 'bum): zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs dang / / sku la ba spu'i 'phreng bar ldan// de yi mdun du lha mo che// rdo rje phag mo sngar dang mtshungs// shes rabs thabs kyi bde bas brlan// sku yi tshigs rnams kun la'o// sna tshogs he
46a5(rgyud 'bum): ru ka 'bar bas/ / rnam par 'phro bas rnam bsgom bya// dbu rnams kun la dar dbyangs kyi// 'phreng ba brtul zhugs can gyis bya// pad+ma'i 'dab mar shar sogs kyi// bar bar du ni rnal 'byor ma// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i
46a6(rgyud 'bum): grangs nyid ni/ / mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug drug go/ shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar// mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug de bzhin// dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar// slar yang lA ma la sogs drug/ nub la sogs
46a7(rgyud 'bum): nas lho yi mthar/ / dum skyes ma la sogs pa'i rigs// dang po lho nas shar gyi mthar// de nas gzugs can ma sogs drug/ mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid// 'o byed ma dang gzhan bsgyur ma// byis
46b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas ma dang rjes 'jug ma/ / phyed gnag phyed sngon can rnams so// lA ma rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang // bzang mo thod pa can nag mo// rgyal po skor ma byed ljang ku// gang phyir phyed mar rim pas so// dum skyes ma
46b2(rgyud 'bum): dang dur khrod ma/ / rnam par zhu ma ku ru kul ma// nu ma gar mar grags ma rnams// phyed dmar ba la phyed ser mo// gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug pud ma// thor tsugs ral pa can drag mo// lha mo phyed ser
46b3(rgyud 'bum): phyed nag ma'o/ / phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhin// mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnams so// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du// thod pa'i 'phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma//
46b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon skor du ni shes bya ste// ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o// de rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni// sngo gnag pa yi dbus su ni// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// rab gtum mo
46b5(rgyud 'bum): dang gtum mig ma/ / 'od ldan ma dang sna chen mo// dpa' blo mo dang mi'u thung ma// lang ka'i bdag mo shing grib mo// sa srungs ma dang de bzhin 'dir// 'jigs byed chen mo ru ni dran// rlung shugs ma dang chang
46b6(rgyud 'bum): za mo/ sngo bsangs lha mo rab bzang mo// rta rnam dang bya gdong ma// 'khor lo'i shugs ma dum skyes ma// chang 'tshong 'khor lo'i go cha ma// shin tu dpa' mo stobs chen ma// 'khor lo sgyur ma brtson chen mo// gshin
46b7(rgyud 'bum): rjerdzam skyes gshin rje ma/ / de bzhin g.yo byed skrag byed ma// gtum mo dang ni dbyangs can ma// 'dod 'grub ma dang 'bar chen mo// kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o// phyag bzhi ma la zhal gcig ma// thod pa dang /
47a1(rgyud 'bum): ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug de bzhin no// skra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma// sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs te// rdo rje'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// yi dgas gdan can drag
47a2(rgyud 'bum): chen mo/ / 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma// sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang // de bzhin shes rab thabs ldan pa'o// de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni// de yang gnas su nges par brjod// rab tu dga'
47a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sar grags pa'o/ / slar yang gnas dang nye gnas sogs// de ltar sa yi dbus su yang // sa bcu gnyis su 'dod pa yin// de ltar thams cad du shes bya// khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad de// sum
47a4(rgyud 'bum): / cu rtsa drug bshad pa rnams// gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin// de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams rang bzhin can// khor yug tu ni sems can rnams// rdzus skyes rigs kyi rim pas so// /
47a5(rgyud 'bum): de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi/ yul dang yul rim pas phye ba'o// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'o// de nas de yi phyi rol 'chang // slar yang snying po'i 'khor lo 'di// dmar ser kha dog la de bzhin// 'khor lo'i
47a6(rgyud 'bum): / rtsibs kyi dbus su ni// rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma// rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang // pad+mo gar ma don yod ma// spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI// gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs rdo rje// sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang /
47a7(rgyud 'bum): / chos dbyings rdo rje ma// sa snying ma dang mkha' snying mo// phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma// sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo// rin chen sgron ma bdag med ma// khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can// gshin mthar byed ma shes
47b1(rgyud 'bum): mthar ma/ / pad mthar ma bgegs mthar byed ma// mi g.yo ma dang dbyug sngon ma// 'dod rgyal ma dang stobs chen mo// gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes ma// kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te// zhal la sogs pa'i
47b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid kun/ / lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin// nye ba'i gnas su lha mo rnams// rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang // gzugs kyi khams dang dri med dang // gling
47b3(rgyud 'bum): dang po ru 'dod pa yin/ / 'dren par rnam par shes bya dang // chung ngu'i he ru kar 'dod dang // gsum par pad+ma'i he ru ka/ bzhi pa nam mkha' bar 'dod dang // lnga par 'thor rlung he ru ka/ drug par sa yi he ru
47b4(rgyud 'bum): ka bdun par 'bar ba'i he ru ka/ brgyad par gsher ba'i he ru ka/ dgu par ye shes he ru ka/ bcu par thugs kyi he ru ka/ bcu gcig gsung gi he ru ka/ bcu gnyis par ni sku yir 'dod// bcu gnyis de
47b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams rdo rje che/ / he ru ka ste rgyud gzhan med// 'khor lo gsum sdom he ru ka/ de rnams dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba// sku mdog rang rang 'khor lo las// blo ldan rnams kyis mtshon par bya// zhes bya ba ste snying po'i
47b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o/ / de nas de rgyab yon tan kun// zhes bya'i 'khor lo dkar dmar ba// rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa// pho nya ma mchog sum cu drug/ bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs mo// dmangs mo
47b7(rgyud 'bum): gtum mo khyi 'tshod ma/ / g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can// nya ba mo dang bsnyig dkar ma// dung mkhan mo dang tha ga mo// 'khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo mo// 'phreng ma kha ma tshos ma dang // srin bal byed ma pho nya mo//
48a1(rgyud 'bum): bshang 'phyag mu dang rtsi mkhan ma// chang 'tshong ldum ra'i gnyer ba mo// rgyal pos bkrabs ma shen pa mo// so rtsi 'tshong bar byed ma dang // gser mgar mo dang lcags mgar mo// nor bu/
48a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud ma nags pa mo// kla klo ma o Di ma tshong pa mo// rdo bzo ma dang zhing las ma// ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma// 'di rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ lhag ma thams cad snying po yi// 'khor lo ji bzhin shes
48a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'dir ni zhing du shes bya ste// 'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang // gnyis pa'i gling zhes bya bar bshad// rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid// 'od byed pa yis de bzhin// bla ma rang nyid mchod
48a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni// thog mar phyag 'tshal rab tu grags// hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mthar// de ltar 'khor lo kun la bya// de yi phyi rol zlum por sbyin// ri mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo// sgo ngang
48a5(rgyud 'bum): rta babs kha khyer dang / / dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes// shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang // mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa gdong ma// byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma// nub tu khyi gdong can ma dang // lho ru phag gi gdong can
48a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ kha dog lA ma sogs 'dra mchog/ me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo// gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo// mche gtsigs 'joms ma rim ji bzhin// kha dog gnyis gnyis
48a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bya/ / nal ni rjes su mthun rim pas// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi sa gni rtag pa cha// gnag dang sngo dang ldang dang dmar// ser po yi ni mdog tu bya// ldan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du//
48b1(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhi// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'jug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin// 'khor lo gnyis par ri mo gsum// gsum po la ni ri mo bzhi// bzhi pa ri mo lnga yi bdag nyid// dur
48b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod kun nas rim pas te/ / phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni// zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod// 'khor lo ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid// grwa bzhi pa la kun tu 'bar// de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi// dur khrod rnam
48b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bshad bya ste/ / gtum drag tshang tshang de bzhin du// 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus can// 'jigs sde'i shar la sogs pa yi// phyogs su g.yon skor yongs su gnas// an+d+raT+Te Ta rgod dbang ldan du//
48b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar te// mun pa drag po bden bral du// rlung du kI li kI li sgrogs// dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni// ro langs 'byung po lce spyang sgra// rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste// dur khrod
48b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad po rnams su yang / / shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste// sha ri shing khyab nas kaM ke li// tsu ta'i shing dang n+ya gro d+ha// de bzhin ka rany+dza ka nyid// la tA pa ra ka Ti dang pI tha ba// dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin klu/
48b6(rgyud 'bum): klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag/ dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang // srin po'i dbang po klu bdag po// nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma nyid// pad chen hu lu hu lu dang // rigs ldan dang /
48b7(rgyud 'bum): ni dung skyong ngo // sgrogs po dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang // drag po 'khyil pa 'thug de bzhin// gang ba char 'bebs gtum po ste// 'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po'o// 'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la// rdo rje 'phreng ba
49a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sbyin/ / thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya// phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin// zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o// de nas phyi rol nam mkha' yi// 'khor lo 'dam
49a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes sngon po mtshungs/ / sum cu drug rtsibs dbus su yang // mkha' spyod rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams// mi 'am ci mo dri za mo// puT+Ta ka ma pA rba ba ma de bzhin du// gyi wang gling bu mu kun dam dang // rdza rngam dang
49a3(rgyud 'bum): nges par ga ga ga ri ma dang / / cha lang ma dang she lan dri ki ma// glu ma ka ra Da dang ta ma DA mchog dang // gar ma sgeg mo Ta ka ka ma dang ni// tA li sha ra Na mo rnga chen ma// mo dri ma dang rgyud can ma dang ma tA ma// nA la ba mo
49a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rnam pa ki/ Da ma ru ma dang D+yan D+ha ka dang de bzhin du// zangs dung ma dang ra dung ma de bzhin// b+hu ki ma dang dril bu ma dang dril chung ma// g.yer ka ma dang de bzhin Ta ko li ka ma dang // dung ma dang ni dbyangs
49a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma de bzhin/ / 'khor ba mchog gi dbang phyug mo// kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba 'am// yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog go// nye ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo// gling ni gsum pa mo mchog go// mkha' la spyod ma'i rigs su
49a6(rgyud 'bum): byon gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas/ / sa ni 'od 'phro can de dang // rang rang gnas sogs zhing ma'o// yang na Da ma ru kha T+wAM ga/ 'dir ni slar yang spangs nas su// rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul// ji ltar 'dod
49a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'o/ / 'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la// rang gi bdag pos bya ba'o// 'dir ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid// rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o// ji ltar rgyan la sogs mang po// lhag ma sngon bzhin
49b1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'o/ / 'khor lo kun tu spyan gsum dang // phyogs kyi gos 'chang rjes 'gro ma'o// zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o// de nas phyi rol rlung 'khor lo// sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog/ rdo rje'i
49b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsibs dbus sbyin bya ba/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin// nam mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming // blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// mkha' lding dang mo bkra ba mo// bya rog bya gar sreg pa mo// rma bya
49b3(rgyud 'bum): zangs kyi gtsug pud ma/ / gu da bu yi 'jam pa mo// phug ron bya rog chen mo dang // ga Di ni dang gong ma sreg/ ne tso bsngags ma bzhad mo dang // bya rgod 'ug pa mchil pa mo// shing bye'u mo dang ngur pa ma//
49b4(rgyud 'bum): brik+Sha ra NI kak+ka bI// so bya mo dang byil mo// spug ma'i mgrin dang sA ri mo// khra mo gur kum lce can ma// bA Ti rA kA kaM dzaM g+ha mo// ho ra mo kaM ka mo de bzhin// dad da ri mo ri dgas dgra/ de ltar rnal 'byor
49b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i 'khor lo/ / 'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog/ yang na rang rang las shes bya// phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs// thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid// 'dun sa la ni gnas ma mchog/
49b6(rgyud 'bum): spyang dka'i sar ni shes bya ste// gling ni bzhi pa mar 'dod do// 'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes dang // yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can// gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum pa yi// 'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs
49b7(rgyud 'bum): can/ bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod// ces bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya ba// 'khor lo sa yi ming can mchog/ kha dog
50a1(rgyud 'bum): ser po'i rang bzhin la/ / sum cu drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras// rnal 'byor ma ni sum cu drug/ sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin// seng mo stag mo b+him+b+ha ri bong ma// glang chen
50a2(rgyud 'bum): ri dgas byil mo/ / ba dang ma he mo rta mo// ce spyang mo dang bse mo 'bri// byi ba bong mo b+hi Ti ma// ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin// khyi mo phag mo dom mo dang // daN+Da ri mo'u dz+nyA ma de bzhin// dred mo dang ni sgeg
50a3(rgyud 'bum): mo dang / / nags ma dang ni khyi chen mo// bya rog chen mo khwa sgo ma// sbrul mo bkra mo rnga mo dang // sre mo rtsangs mo phrug pa mo// grong na gnas pa ma mchog go/ de ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin nam// yang
50a4(rgyud 'bum): na rang rang kha dog go/ lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid// nye ba'i mdun sar gnas pa mo// mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang // de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// lnga pa'i gling du gnas pa mo// mtshon cha la
50a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs sngon bzhin no/ / lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs// gdod pa rang gi dngos por 'dod// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi sgo ru shes bya ba// tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po ma// gzhon nu
50a6(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug ma de bzhin/ / phag mo dbang mo gtum mo dang // dpal chen mo ni grwa rnams su// sgro ru gzugs dang mtshan ma ni// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags// grwa ru brtan ma la sogs
50a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum// sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams so// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu mdzes// dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste// me yi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// gsod dang kun
50b1(rgyud 'bum): tu skrag byed dang / / 'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed do// drag po'i dur khrod de bzhin du// g.yon skor du ni rnam par dgod// skrod byed dang ni sdang byed dang // lkugs byed dang ni rengs byed slar//
50b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan la sogs grA la'o// shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste// go yu star ka nA li ra// se 'bru bil ba'i shing de nas// skyu ru bi dzA ra ga sha'i shing // rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod// dbang po gshin
50b3(rgyud 'bum): / rje ma chu mo// gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma// srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste// 'jig rten skyong ma sbyin par bya// klu mo srin mo thams cad ni// 'dir ni rnam pa kun tu sbyin// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor
50b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad la/ / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin// las kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can// der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya// zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa
50b5(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir// me yi 'khor lo bdag gis bshad// kha dog dmar po 'bar chen po// sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la// rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba// lha sogs rigs
50b6(rgyud 'bum): las byung ma ste/ / lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// 'byung mo ngo bo tsam po'o// de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci// lha yi rigs byung bshad par bya// ma dang chung ma sring mo dang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // pha yi sring
50b7(rgyud 'bum): mo de dang ni/ / zhang po yi ni da dang ni// chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni// de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma// chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang // ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang // ma yi spun spun zla yi bu mo dang // rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang //
51a1(rgyud 'bum): spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo// pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang // khu bo yi ni chung mo dang // bu mo'i khu yi chung ma dang // slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang // rang pha'i sring mo'i bu mo dang // de nyid kyi ni
51a2(rgyud 'bum): rang rigs skyes/ / spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang // bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang // bu mo'i khyo yi ma yi ni// bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang // bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad// pho nya sum cu drug rnams so// kha dog dmar
51a3(rgyud 'bum): / por yang dag grags// mtshon cha la sogs sngar dang mtshungs// sa ni ring du song nyid dang // drug pa'i gling du gnas pa mo// 'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste// shes rab thabs bdag ngo bo can// nus pa'i
51a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo 'di rtag tu/ / shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes ma'o// kun tu rdo rje'i 'phreng la sogs// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis// 'dir ni mchod pa byed pa
51a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad// kun tu son par dbul bar bya// btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dbul// bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin// rang rang stan las langs nas ni// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin
51a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog/ slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yis// mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o// zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'phar ma'i me'i 'khor lo dang po'o// de nas de yi phyi rol bshad// chu yi
51a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ / mdog dkar sum cu drug rtsibs la// rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas sgom// ma ka ra mo rus sbal nya// sbal mo rus sbal chu sram mo// sdig nag gag+ha ra ma shI li ma// chu yi phug ma srin
51b1(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gdong ma dang / / cha ga ba mo ka ka ru mo su ya mo// chu byi mo dang grog mo'i gdong ma dang // chu yi mi mo dang ni rgod ma dang // glang chen mo dang stag mo ce spyang mo// chu sbal mo dang dung mo 'gron bu ma// nya lcibs/
51b2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang nor bu dzang gu ra ma dang // li sa mo dang dung du ra ma kar+N+Na TA// pha Ta ka mo dA pa ka mo kr-i ma mo// dzu Shi dzu ShI ma dang sha sbrang ma ka lA ma// lha yi gtso mo mchog rnams so// de ltar kha dog rang bzhin ni// dkar
51b3(rgyud 'bum): po 'am rang rang rigs skyes pa'o/ / gdong ni rang rang gzugs kyis te// rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhin no// nye ba'i 'du ba nyid dang ni// sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go/ bdun pa'i gling du gnas par ni// shes bya
51b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha sngon bzhin no/ / yang na gang ba'i ri sogs kyi// mi rnams sum cu drug lha'o// gnas sogs rim pas de rnams su// mi mo dngos su yang dag bya// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de yis ni// dum bu bcu
51b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o/ / ba tsha zhes bya'i rgya mtshor ni// da ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams// drod gsher skyes dang 'du 'phrod las// skyes pa 'am mngal nas skyes par bsam// 'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher
51b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes me yi 'khor lo mngal skyes so/ / mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// shes rab thabs bdag rang nyid do// zhes bya ba ni chu yi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad// kun
51b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ye shes 'khor lo'o/ / sum cu drug rtsibs sna tshogs mdog/ lha min mo yi rigs rim pas// til mchog ma dang phul du bde// lha yi bu mo dga' chen ma// dga' dang dgar grags pad can ma// dung
52a1(rgyud 'bum): can sna tshogs glang chen ma/ / gzugs chen ma dang gzugs mdzes ma// 'od chags rnam sreg bde ba mo// me tog 'dod ma ut+pal dkar// ut+pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang // 'dod chag
52a2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang 'dod chags che/ / rol grags ma dang rol chen ma// myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma// 'dod pa mo dang 'dod chen ma// bde las byung dang bde ldan ma// mthun mchog ma dang byams pa mo// skal bzang
52a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma skal bzang mo/ / dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo// sku gzugs mar ni grags pa ste// rnal 'byor ma yi gtso mo mchog/ thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid// rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin// phyag
52a4(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin shes/ / legs pa'i blo gros sa de bzhin// dur khrod rin po cher snang ba// rang byung bde ba byed pa po// de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum pa la// dga'
52a5(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhi ni dag pa yis/ / kun nas ri mo bzhi can no// shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru// rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin// dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma// za phod ma yang rnam par dgod// grwa la gnas
52a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha mo bzhi/ / spos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin// gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo ste// rim pas sngon bzhin rtag shes bya// phyi rol dur khrod 'khor lo ni// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// byis pa 'chi dang lhag
52a7(rgyud 'bum): mtha'a' g.yul drag po dang mche ba kun/ / shar la sogs par g.yon skor du// de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam// du ba mun nag dang ni me// hA hA'i sgra dang sgra chen no// shing ni tsan dan ga pur dang // dzaH
52b1(rgyud 'bum): pha la dang e la sogs/ / na ga ge sar tsam pa dang // kun tu ru dang lha yi shing ngo // phyogs skyong rnams ni mtshon bya ba// nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu// ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid// ngan spong nyi ma'i bu de bzhin//
52b2(rgyud 'bum): min mgo bor shes bya ste// drag po'i gdong rnams su bya'o// 'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang // mdung rings spu gri brag de bzhin// glog dang sna tshogs mtshon 'bebs par// dur khrod kyi ni dbus su bya// ral gri
52b3(rgyud 'bum): mig sman ril bu dang / / rkang pa byug dang bcud len dang // mchil lham dngul chu sa 'og go/ dngos grub bsgrub pa mkhas pas bya// zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil
52b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid do/ / de nas de yi phyi rol 'chang// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di gsal ba'o// mdog gnag sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs// thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog/ klu mo gnod
52b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo 'byung mo/ / yi dgas dmyal mo mnar med ma// ltung ba mo dang bar med ma// bum mo gshin rje mo de bzhin// thig nag ma dang me mdag mo// tsha ba mo dang rab tsha ba// ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che// mar
52b6(rgyud 'bum): nag tu 'tshed ri gnyis 'chir/ / sdang ma rmongs ma phrag dog ma// chags myos ser sna skud pa ma// grangs ma ral gri'i nags ma nyid// du ma dang ni mu ge ma// nad dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang // chu yi dgon
52b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ma dang ni/ / ral gri sen mo rab med ma// spu gri'i so ma 'khor lo ma// grul bum mo ste lha mo che// mdog ni 'khor lo ci 'dra ba'o// phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin du// shes bya rang gi gzugs can no// de la
53a1(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i dur khrod dang / de nas sa ni chos kyi sprin// sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid// kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod// rang bzhin spangs pa bdag med pa// 'khor lo can sar
53a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa'o/ / 'khor lo rnams ni rim ji bzhin// thams cad de ltar shes par bya// sgo skyong ma ni thams cad kyi// gnas bzhi rnams ni bcu gnyis so// de ltar bcu drug shes bya ba// stong pa nyid ni
53a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa yi/ / ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir// dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni// gsum gyi bdag nyid ming gis so// phyi nas gzhan 'di thams cad ni// 'khor lo//
53a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su bshad par bya// zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dang po'o// de nas phyi rol tu gzhan pa// gsung gi 'khor lo de bshad bya// dmar po btsod kyi kha dog ste// sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid
53a5(rgyud 'bum): gtso/ mchod ma za ma gnyid ma dang // le lo ma chos sems sgom mo// khyim sems bud med sems ma dang // don sems ma dang sbyor bral ma// bu sems rnams dang mya ngan ma// bsam gtan ma dang sngags
53a6(rgyud 'bum): zlos ma/ / ngo tsha nga rgyal gdung ba mo// sems can don byed brtson ma dang // rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod ma// ye shes thob ma dka' thub ma// rgas ma 'chi ba'i bsam can ma// bde ba sdug ma mi dge ma//
53a7(rgyud 'bum): yod dang med ma nyid dang ni// bla ma sems ma 'gro ba mo// bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma// ngal sos ma dang bkres ma mchog/ las ni thams cad byed lha mo// rang bzhin 'khor lo 'di che'o// kha dog rang gi 'khor
53b1(rgyud 'bum): lor grags/ / lhag ma 'di ni sngon bzhin no// shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// rang bzhin gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'dir// gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud stong phrag ni// bcu gnyis pa las bshad pa ste// ye shes
53b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi/ / mchod sogs lha mor 'dod pa yin// grong mtha'i gnas ni 'di lta bu// kun tu 'od kyi sa yin no// de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mtha'// chu me sa rlung dang nam mkha'i// bskor
53b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya bar/ / rdo rje mchog ma shes par bya// zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnyis pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o// de nas sku yi 'khor lo bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi kha dog can// sum
53b4(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa drug rtsibs dbus su/ / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor sgyur ma'o// rgyal chen bzhi yi ris ma dang // sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor sgyur ma// 'thab bral dga' ldan 'khor sgyur ma// 'phrul dga' ma dang de
53b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni// tshangs ris ma yi 'khor lo ma// tshangs pa mdun 'don ma de bzhin// tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor sgyur ma// 'od chung tshad med 'od ma dang // 'od gsal ma dang
53b6(rgyud 'bum): dge chung ma/ / tshad med dge ba'i 'khor sgyur ma// dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma// bsod nams skyes ma'i 'khor lo dang // 'bras bu che ba'i 'khor sgyur ma// mi che mi gdung 'khor lo ma// shin tu mthong ma bzang
53b7(rgyud 'bum): snang ma/ / 'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma// ci'ang med skye mched ma de nas// 'du shes 'du shes med min ma// dmyal mo yi dgas
54a1(rgyud 'bum): ma de bzhin/ / dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo// gzhal med khang spyod ma de bzhin// zla ba nyi ma gshin rje mo// dbang mo 'khor sgyur mar shes bya// rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya// phyag
54a2(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshon cha sngar bzhin no/ / shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te// nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas// sa ni mos pa spyod pa ste// 'di rnams 'khor lo bcu gnyis so// dkyil 'khor 'di ni gru bzhi ste/
54a3(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i skur ni 'du shes so// ri mo lnga ni me long sogs// thams cad mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa'o// brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yi// mchod pa dkyil 'khor bzhi la'o// phyi rol dur khrod brgyad
54a4(rgyud 'bum): / rnams te// sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin// shar du chu skyes dkar mo sgom// byang du gan+d+ha ri ma'o// nub tu rdo rje gar ma ste// lho ru rta rgod ma yi kha// grwa yi char ni lha mo bzhi// dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin//
54a5(rgyud 'bum): lhamo rdo rje 'bar zhal dang // rdo rje khro gnyer ma'i zhal dang // rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste// kha dog la sogs sngon bzhin no// drag mo chen mo gtsigs pa'i zhal// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rnam mdzes ma'o//
54a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs// rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o// kun la mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan// dpa' bo rnams la dar 'phreng can// ral pa'i cod pan dpa' de rnams// yan lag kun
54a7(rgyud 'bum): la thal bas bskus/ / rnal 'byor ma yi mtho zhing 'khrang // lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang // mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o// dpa' bo kun gyi ming rnams
54b1(rgyud 'bum): nithog ma'i 'khor lo la sogs mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin du// sna tshogs pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang // rin chen thod pa'i dum bu dang // keng rus chen po keng rus dang // mche ba rnam gtsigs lha
