54b2(rgyud 'bum): dgra dang / / 'od dpag med dang rdo rje 'od// rdo rje sku dang myu gu can// rdo rje ral pa can de bzhin// dpa' chen rdo rje hUM mdzad dang // shin tu bzang dang rdo rje bzang // 'jigs byed chen po mig mi bzang // stobs
54b3(rgyud 'bum): chen rin chen rdo rje dang / / rta mgrin nam mkha'i snying po dang // he ru ka dang pad kar can// rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems// stobs chen ye shes mkha' 'gro dang // blo brtan thar dang ye shes dang // thabs
54b4(rgyud 'bum): dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ / lhag ma'i ming ni lha mo bzhin// skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya'o// 'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyi me// sgo la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no// snying po'i pad+ma'i lha mo rnams// gtso bos
54b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag po bzhin du bya/ / 'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor// ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni// bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig/ de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya// mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas
54b6(rgyud 'bum): phye sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid do/ / gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi// rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar byung // de yis bcu gnyis shes par bya// kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o// lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum
54b7(rgyud 'bum): pa sgo dang grwa la sogs gnas ma'o/ / mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni// thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya// dpa' bo rnams la'ang de bzhin no// phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba// dang por tshig par shes bya
55a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ gnyis par yang ni ma tshig pa// gsum pa dum bur gyur pa nyid// bzhi pa yang ni ma gtugs pa// lnga pa 'jigs su rung bar bshad// drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa// bdun pa
55a2(rgyud 'bum): gsal shing phug pa ste/ / steng nas btags pa brgyad pa'o// dur khrod brgyad por rtag tu ni// dmyal srungs chen po brgyad rnams so// shal ma li shing mya ngan med// yongs 'du u dum ba ra de bzhin//
55a3(rgyud 'bum): Dom+bi ra dang gam+b+ha ri// rgya shug dang ni ba ru ra'o// sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs// mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan// gang yin de yang rdzu 'phrul che// mgo med
55a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyug dang gzhan yang ni/ / mgo bo med par gar byed dang // nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang // mgo dang lus sogs gtugs pa ste// ting 'dzin chen po rgyu yis ni// de rnams dga' byas gar byed pa'o// de
55a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar de bzhin dbus su ni/ / rgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin// kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste// bzhon pa gang gang gi yin pa'o// rdzogs par byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid// yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom
55a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rgyu yi rdo rje ci 'dra ba// yang ni de 'dra spro bar bya// dud 'gro'i zhal can lha mo ni// las thams cad mas khyer nas 'ongs// khro bo'i tshogs kyis mnyam bkug nas// sngon du bgegs ni bsal bar
55a7(rgyud 'bum): bya um b+has bka' bsgo rdo rje can/ / brtul zhugs can gyis phur gdab bya// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha kA ya kaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na wAg tsi kAM hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ tsit+ta si kaM hUM hUM phaT/
55b1(rgyud 'bum): oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga wan badz+ra dz+nyA ni kaM hUM hUM phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni// 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhir 'gyur// steng du mda' yi dra ba can// rdo rje ra ba bla re'o// chos kyi/
55b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gnas nang du yang // de yang gsum bzhi lnga dang ni// gru drug pa ru bsgom par bya// 'phar ma bzhi yi rim ji bzhin// rim pa thams cad 'dir dgod bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAn phaT/ kI lA/
55b3(rgyud 'bum): ya kI lA ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI lA ya badz+ra d+ha ro a dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba bi g+h+nAn kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA ya hUM phaT/ phur bu gdab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra kI lA ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ brdung ba'i
55b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / de ltar 'khor lo kun dpa' ngobo// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rigs byung ba'o// sprul pa'i sku ni ma lus pa// rnal 'byor pa kun byang chub snod// 'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dang // sprul
55b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o// de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs// ji lta'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa// gnas ni gang ba'i ri nyid dang // dra ba 'dzin dang u rgyan dang // ar bu da yang de bzhin gnas//
55b6(rgyud 'bum): go dA ba ri nye gnas ste// dga' ba'i dbang phyug lha mo'i mkhar// gyad yul yang ni nye gnas so// 'dod gzugs de bzhin o tre dang // tri sha ku ne ko sa la zhing // ka ling ka dang laM pa ka/ kAny+tsi kha ba'i gnas te
55b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing rnga yi dgas grong dang khyim lha mo/ / sau rASh+Ta dang gser gling ni// 'dun sa'o nye ba'i 'dun sa ni// grong khyer sin+d+hu ma ru dang // ku lu tA yang nye 'dun sa// 'du ba chu klung 'gram dang ni// skyed tshal rgya mtshor rab
56a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad dang / / lam gyi bzhi mdo'o nye 'du ba// ri yi spyi bo grong dbus dang // tshogs can gzhon nu'i ri dang ni// rigs kyi zhing yang nye 'du ba'o// dur khrod mu mu ni yang nas// spyod dang ha ri
56a2(rgyud 'bum): ki la dang / / sgyu ma'i grong khyer dur khrod do// nye ba'i dur khrod ri mtha' dang // sngags kyi zhing dang lha yi grong // kaN+Tha Ta dang pa Ta yang // de bzhin grong mthar bshad pa'o// grong mtha' kong ka na nyid dang /
56a3(rgyud 'bum): khyab bdag las kyi yul ljongs dang // rnal 'byor ma ni sdug po'i grong // de bzhin 'dir ni nye grong mtha' 'o// pha yi nags dang khyim gyi logs// lteng ka dang ni rdzing bu ste// gnas 'di rnams su bu mo
56a4(rgyud 'bum): gang / lhan skyes rang gi skye gnas skyes// yul dang yul du shes bya ba// ye shes ldan dang gnyis med gnas// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams kyis ni// mda' yi dbye bas gnas skyes rnams// bcu
56a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gnas sogs rab bshad pa/ / sum cu drug khams rgyu yis so// re re yi ni khams rnams la'ang // mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis su// shes bya/
56a6(rgyud 'bum): lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma'o// sngon gyi tshigs bcad 'di yis ni// dbang bskur ba ni nod par bya// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol gyur// de bzhin bdag la
56a7(rgyud 'bum): khrus byed 'gyur/ / lha yi chu yis dag par bya// rdo rje dang ni mkha' bar du// sangs rgyas thams cad son 'di ni// ye shes 'od zer byung de rnams// rang byung bdud rtsi rgyun gyis ni// dbang bskur rdo rje mgon po
56b1(rgyud 'bum): yilhan skyes chus ni dgang phyir ro/ / oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// 'khor lo gang dang gang gi ni// de dang de yis rgyas gdab la// rnal 'byor ma rnams
56b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos te/ / khyab bdag gzhan gyis rgyas mi gdab// ye shes ting 'dzin sems dpa' yang // 'khor lo kun la bsgom par bya// de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs kyis// ye shes 'khor lo dgug
56b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dzaHhUM baM hoH'i yig rnams kyis// bla ma'i man ngag las shes bya// sna tshogs dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas// gtso bo la ni mchod byed gzhug/ thig le dang ni phra mo che'i// rnal 'byor gnyis ni yod
56b4(rgyud 'bum): dmigs bya/ / 'khor lo bcu gnyis thig le yang // rdo rje'i rnam pa rnams su mtshon// lte ba'i 'og ste rtsa rnams ni// stong phrag gcig ni thig le can// rtse mo bcu yi thig le rnams// ji lta'i rim pa rnams su
56b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshon/ / du ba la sogs brgya phrag gcig/ thig le'i gnas su 'bab par bya// de phyir phra mo gang ci'ang rung // sangs rgyas spyod yul min de sgom// rdo rje'i srog rnams la bltas pas// phyag rgya che de sangs
56b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas de/ / gsang sngags bzlas pa bya ba ni// rkang pa brgyad lhag rtsa ba ni// bzhi bcu la sogs 'di rnams kyis// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa dang // bde chen sogra dang bzang po dang // gnyis kun rnam
56b7(rgyud 'bum): par spangs pa dang / / mchod pa khams gsum bdag nyid ni// dngos po kun 'byung rnams kyis so// dkar mo sogs dang 'gro drug 'khor sgyur ma// gzugs dang gzugs med gnyis kyi lha mo ste// rang gis
57a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ / ma lus 'khor lo mchod par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba chen po sgom par gyis// rnal 'byor bcu gnyis bsod nams sdig med pa'o// thams cad zab
57a2(rgyud 'bum): med rang bzhin mos par gyis/ / dkyil 'khor ngan pa de ni bde bar shes par byos// dbang po 'khrul pa bde ba chen po mos pa gyis// skad cig de la rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo med// gang gi rnam pa sna tshogs
57a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs chen gyis/ / sa gsum du ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo spo bar byos// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs brgyan pas// rnal 'byor chen pos gtor ma sbyin// 'bum bzlas pa yi rjes las ni// bye ba bzlas
57a4(rgyud 'bum): pas dngos grub che/ / ji ltar mngon par brjod pa bzhin// sna tshogs dam tshig nyer spyod tshe// rnal 'byor dngos grub gyur de nas// gang rung der ni gnas par bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje
57a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/
57a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par gzhag pa dang man ngag sna tshogs bstan pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o// / de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi ni// btu ba bshad bya mnyan
57a7(rgyud 'bum): par gyis/ / chos 'byung gi ni dbus su ni// de nas 'khor lo 'di bri'o// dbus su dum bu lnga'i bdag nyid// de yi phyi rol bcu gnyis bri// zlum po sbyin bya slar yang der// sgo dang gru ni bzhi pa'o// rtsibs brgyad
57b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang zur bzhi pa'i/ / le'u tsher dbyangs dang sde tshan no// der gnas mgon po btu bar bya// 'dod pa kun dang bde 'bab pa'o// sde tshan lnga sogs yi ge ni// dbus su'o de nas dbyangs bcu gnyis// ma ning
57b2(rgyud 'bum): sgo ni bzhi ru ste/ / gru gnyis par de gnyis gnyis can// khyab bdag sngags pas me la ni// sogs par shes par bya ba'o// ka dbus tsa shar Ta lho ta nub tu// ba byang rim pa ji ltas so// nub kyi mtha' ma
57b3(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / byang gi mtha' ma de bzhin no// me yi gnyis pa'i yi ge ni// gzung bya dbang ldan chu yi sa bon// shar gyi gsum pa'i yi ge dang // lho yi gsum pa de bzhin no// dbus ma'i dang po gzung bar
57b4(rgyud 'bum): bya byang gi mtha' ma'i sa bon no/ / dbang ldan gnyis pa gzung bya ste// de ni de ltar thog ma slar// bden bral me yi sa bon dang // dbang ldan gyi ni chu de bzhin// srin po'i ra yig blang bar bya// me yi gnyis
57b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yi ge'o/ / 'dre yi me yi sa bon bzung // me yi rlung ni de bzhin no// sngags kyi tshig ni dang po ni// 'dre yi dbyangs ni brjod par bya// tsheg drag dang ni yongs ldan pa// gnyis pa'i yi ge la spras pa'o// /
57b6(rgyud 'bum): dum bu bzhi pas mnan pa ste// gsum par me yis spras pa'o// yi ge lnga par ra yig gis// 'og gi char ni brgyan pa'o// dum bu gnyis pas brgyan pa ste// mkhas pas drug pa'i yi ge la'o// dgu
57b7(rgyud 'bum): par de nyid kyis mnan pa'o/ / bcu pa la yang bzhi pas so// bcu gnyis de nyid kyis mnan pa'o// bcu gsum pa yang de nyid kyis// bcu bzhi pa la chu yis ni// 'og gi cha ru rnam brtag bya// dum bu
58a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas mnan pa ni/ / yi ge bco lnga pa mchog la'o// de ltar sngags pa ches shes nas// rkang pa kun la byed pa'o// nub kyi thog ma gzung bar bya// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa
58a2(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// slar yang lho yi mtha' ma'o// dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang // byang gi mtha' ma de bzhin no// dbus ma'i thog ma gzung bar bya// byang gi mtha' ma'i sa bon dang /
58a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// lho yi mtha' ma'i sa bon dang // ma yi rlung gi yi ge ste// gnyis pa yi ni rkang par bshad// dum bu gsum pas mnan pa ste// thog ma me yis 'og gsal byas// dum du
58a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga pas gnyis pa yi/ / yi ge yi ni 'og tu brgyan// byang phyogs kyi ni thog ma yis// drug pa'i 'og tu gsal byas pa'o// yi ge brgyad pa'ang de dang mtshungs// dum bu gnyis pas phye ba'o// bcu pa de
58a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis mnan pa'o/ / don med thams cad rnam 'joms byed// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // dngos grub rnyog pa med kun no// nub kyi gsum pa gzung bar bya// 'dre yi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang /
58a6(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi thog ma'i sa bon dang // slar yang lho yi dang po dang // byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // 'dre yi gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // lho yi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // 'dre yi ma yi
58a7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gzung / / dbang ldan gyi chu de bzhin// me yi rlung gi sa bon te// sngags kyi rkang pa gsum pa'o// mkhas pas thog ma'i yi ge la// dum bu bcu gcig pa yis mnan// dum bu dgu pa yis kyang ni/
58b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i yi ge'i mgor brgyan cing // lho yi thog ma nyid la ni// me yis 'og tu brgyan pa'o// dbus ma gsum par sbyin bya ba// 'og gi cha ru brtag par bya'o// dum bu bzhi pas mnan pa ni// mkhas pas
58b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge lnga pa la'o/ / dum bu brgyad pa sbyin bya ba// yi ge yi ni brgyad pa la'o// bcu pa gnyis pas mnan pa ste// sdang ba rnams kyi tshar gcod mchog/ lha dang lha min mi rnams kyi// gnas dang gnas min
58b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams tshar gcod/ / me yi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // nub kyi thog ma'i yi ge dang // rlung gi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // dbang ldan gyi ni gzhan de bzhin// rlung gi gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // nub kyi mtha' ma'i
58b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dang / / slar yang nub kyi thog ma dang // me yi rlung ni blang bar bya// rkang pa bzhi pa zhes bshad de// dngos po thams cad rab ston pa'o// yi ge lnga pa'i 'og gi char// ra yi yi ge brtag par bya// drug
58b5(rgyud 'bum): par bdun pa'i dum bu dang / / slar yang bdun par me yis ni// 'og tu brgyan par gnyis pa sbyin// kun mkhyen go 'phang mi zad pa'o// dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// slar yang d+hu yig rang byung ngo // nub kyi
58b6(rgyud 'bum): thog ma'i sa bon dang / / shar phyogs kyi yang gsum pa dang // dbang ldan gyi ni gzhan gzung bya// slar yang me yi rlung dang ni// rkang pa lnga pa drug po ste// rnal 'byor ma rnams sad byed pa'o// dbus ma'i thog
58b7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sa bon dang / / yang ni yi ge de nyid dang // rlung gi dbang chen gzung bar bya// slar yang byang gi mtha' ma dang // rlung gi sa yi sa bon dang // byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // srin po'i me yi sa bon dang /
59a1(rgyud 'bum): slar yang lho yi mtha' ma dang // dbus ma'i gsum pa gzung bar bya// me yi rlung ni de bzhin no// lnga pa sogs la dbyangs sbyin bya// 'byin cing sdud par byed pa'o// thog ma'i yi ge kun/
59a2(rgyud 'bum): grol la// dum bu gsum pas mnan par bya// sa bon bzhi pa'ang de nyid kyis// mnan pa mdzes pa yi ni mchog/ lnga par dum bu gnyis pas mnan// chu yi stan du byas par 'dod// rkang pa lnga pa de la ni//
59a3(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad sbyar ba yin// dang po'i yi ge bcu gcig pas// mnan par gyur pa mdzes pa yin// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa ni// yi ge gnyis par brjod par bya// bzhi pa lnga pa'i yi ge dag/ de nyid kyis
59a4(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag mnan/ / yi ge brgyad pa dgu pa yi// dum bu yis ni rnam par brgyan// bcu pa dum bu gnyis pas mnan// me yis 'og tu phye ba ste// rkang pa drug par shes par bya// 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa
59a5(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / dbus ma'i thog ma gzung bar bya// lho yi thog ma de bzhin du// rlung gi sa yi sa bon dang // ka Shar bshad pa'i sngags btu bya// byang gi bzhi pa gzung bar bya// shar gyi gsum pa de bzhin te// me yi
59a6(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni btu byas nas/ / rkang pa bdun pa mi zad pa'o// khyab bdag thog ma'i yi ge la// re'u mig dgu pas mnan pa'o// re'u mig gsum pas de bzhin du// gnyis pa'i yi ge brgyan pa'o// dum bu lnga
59a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyi mo yis/ / mkhas pas lnga pa'i gdan du bya// de nas yi ge drug pa la// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa'o// shar gyi gsum pa gzung bar bya// rlung gi sa yi sa bon dang // dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung
59b1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rlung gi sa dang de bzhin du// lho yi gsum pa gzung bar bya// slar yang rlung gi sa nyid dang // dbus ma'i gsum pa gzung bar bya// me yi grwa yi rlung nyid de// rkang pa brgyad par shes par bya// sdig
59b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad rnams 'joms pa'o/ / dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa ni// yi ge dang po chu gdan can// mkhas pas yi ge gnyis pa ni// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa'o// dum bu bzhi pas gnon pa mi
59b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge bzhi par 'du shes so/ / dum bu gnyis pas gnon pa ni// lhan cig bdun pa'i yi ge dang // nub kyi mtha' mar shes bya'o// dgra kun zad par byed pa'o// byang gi thog ma gzung bar bya// bden
59b4(rgyud 'bum): bral me yi sa bon dang / / de nyid gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // byang gi thog ma'i yi ge dang // bden bral gyi ni gnyis pa gzung // d+ya yig rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// nub kyi thog ma'i sa bon dang // me yi gnyis
59b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yi ge dang / / rlung gi'ang sa ni gzung bar bya// me yi rlung gi sa bon te// sngags kyi rkang pa dgu pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i snying nyid pa'o// yi ge gnyis pa dum bu las// lnga pa yis ni gdan du brgyan// yi ge
59b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'ang de nyid kyis/ / bzhi pa dum bu gnyis pas mnan// lnga pa dum bu dgu pas so// brgyud par dum bu drug pas so// dgu pa dum bu gnyis pas mnan// gdan du rnam par shes bya'o// dbus ma'i thog
59b7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sa bon dang / / rlung gi dbang chen de bzhin dang // nub kyi thog ma'i sa bon dang // de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa dang // byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// dbus ma yi ni gsum pa dang // dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// byang
60a1(rgyud 'bum): gi thog ma'i yi ge dang / / bden bral gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // slar yang me yi rlung dang ni// de bzhin sngags kyi rkang pa ni// bcu pa zhes bya sdang ba gsod// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa
60a2(rgyud 'bum): / yibyang gi dang po'i yi ge ni// gnyis pa'i gdan du shes par bya// bcu gcig pas ni spyi gtsug la'o// dum bu drug pa'i bzhi la ni// mkhas pas yi ge bzhi pa la'o// yi ge lnga pa dum bu ni// bzhi pa'i
60a3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' 'og me dang ldan/ / drug par ra yig gdan sbyin bya// brgyad par lnga pa yi ni gdan// dgu pa dum bu gnyis pas mnan// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'o// dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// dbus
60a4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i thog ma'i yi ge dang / / lho yi thog ma gzung bar bya// slar yang byang gi mtha' ma dang // dbus ma'i gnyis pa sa bon dang // dbang ldan gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // yang ni de nyid gzung bar bya// bden bral
60a5(rgyud 'bum): me yi sa bon dang / / dbang ldan chu yi yi ge dang // me yi rlung gi sa bon bsdu// sngags kyi rkang pa bcu gcig pa// bdud sde rnam par 'joms byed pa'o// thog ma'i yi ge dum bu ni// gsum pas mnan cing
60a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'o/ / bzhi pa yi ni yi ge la'ang // dum bu lnga pas stan du byas// drug pa gnyis pas mnan pa dang // slar yang bdun pa dgu pas so// byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// slar yang nub kyi thog ma dang /
60a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus ma'i gsum pa gzung bar bya// lho yi mtha' ma'i yi ge dang // byang gi thog ma gzung bar bya// bden bral me yi yi ge dang // byang gi thog ma'i sa bon dang // 'dra yi me ni de bzhin te// nub kyi thog ma gzung
60b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / slar yang me yi rlung yin te// sngags kyi tshig rkang bcu gnyis pa// rnal 'byor ma kun dbang byed pa'o// mkhas pas thog ma'i yi ge la// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa'o// shar sgo ma yis gnon pa
60b2(rgyud 'bum): nide nas gnyis pa'i gdan du'o/ / slar yang yi ge drug pa la// dum bu gsum pas mnan pa'o// yi ge bdun pa dum bu ni// drug pa'i gdan gyis rdzogs byas pa'o// yi ge brgyad pa dum bu ni// gsum pa
60b3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni brgyan par bya/ / bcu par dum bu bcu gcig pas// mnan cing bcu gcig 'og nyi ma// dum bu gnyis pas de nyid la'o// dbang gi las la g.yo ba med// rlung gi gnyis pa gzung bar bya// slar yang
60b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan gnyis pa dang / / shar gyi gsum pa'i sa bon dang // rlung gi gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // nub kyi gsum pa'i sa bon dang // bden bral me yi yi ge dang // dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// rlung gi sa yis
60b5(rgyud 'bum): bon dang / / 'og gi char ni de nyid sbyin// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // dbus ma'i thog ma gzung bar bya// bden bral me yi yi ge dang // me yi rlung ni gzung bar bya// sngags kyi tshig rkang bcu gsum pa/
60b6(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' thams cad byed pa dang // rjes skyob rnams kyi byang chub lam// ye shes sa bon yang dag btu// yang ni de nyid btu bar bya// dbus ma'i thog ma gzung bar bya// bden bral me yi yi ge dang /
60b7(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi thog ma gzung bar bya// de ni de ltar gdan du bya// srin po'i ra yi yi ge gzung // lho yi mtha' ma'i sa bon dang // byang gi mtha' ma btu byas nas// dbus ma'i gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // me yi
61a1(rgyud 'bum): yang rlung ni gzung bar bya/ / tshig rkang bcu bzhi mi zad pa'o// slar yang gsum pa'i yi ge la// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa dang // bzhi par dgu pas mnan pa dang // slar yang lnga par
61a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas so/ / dum bu lnga pa'i gdan ldan pa// brgyad pa'o de bzhin dgu pa la// dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa'o// lugs bzlog bcu gsum pa bshad bya// mkhas pas yi ge bcu gcig pa// re mig
61a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas mnan pa'o/ / drug pa bzhi pas mnan pa dang // bzhi pa'i gdan ni lnga pa'o// bcu gcig pa ni cod pan du// skye bo thams cad rnam 'khrul byed// byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// dbang ldan dbang
61a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan gzhan de bzhin/ / mi yi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // yang ni de nyid btu bar bya// lho yi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// slar yang byang gi dang po ma// me yi rlung ni gzung bar bya// yang ni sa bon de nyid do//
61a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshig rkang bco lnga pa// skrod par rnam par brtag pa'o// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge sngags// re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan// gsum pa'i gdan du byang gi ni// mtha' ma nyid ni sbyin par bya// khyab
61a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag yi ge bzhi pa ni/ / re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan// drug par re mig gsum pas mnan// 'og tu me yis 'bar byas pa'o// bdun pa gnyis pas mnan pa ni// rnal 'byor ma'i bder gnas pa'o// /
61a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi gnyis pa gzung bar bya// slar yang dbang ldan gyi ni chu// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // nub kyi thog ma de bzhin du// rlung gi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // slar yang nub kyi thog ma dang // rlung gi
61b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa gzung bar bya/ / lho yi mtha' ma nyid dang yang // dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang // bden bral gyi ni me yi bu// me yi rlung gi sa bon dang // sngags kyi tshig rkang bcu drug pa'o// gnyis par ra yi yi
61b2(rgyud 'bum): ge mnan/ / gsum pa'i gdan ni drug pa ste// lnga pa'i cod pan bcu gcig pa// drug pa dum bu gnyis pa las// gdan ni me yi bu yis so// bcu par dum bu gnyis pas so// byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya//
61b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan phyi ma de bzhin du// dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang // slar yang rlung gi sa bon dang // byang gi thog ma gdan du bya// nub kyi thog ma de bzhin du// dbus ma'i gsum pa gzung bar bya// nub kyi
61b4(rgyud 'bum): thog ma'i yi ge dang / / shar gyi gsum pa gzung bar bya// slar yang me yi rlung yin te// tshig rkang bcu bdun pa yi sngags// dus su 'chi ba 'joms byed pa'o// sngags kyi yi ge gnyis pa la// re mig
61b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa yang dag ldan/ / bzhi pa'ang de nyid yang dag ldan// lnga par yang ni de yis so// bzhi par bcu gcig pa yis mnan// drug pa la ni gsum pas mnan// na yi yi ge'i stan mnan pa'o// bdun par re
61b6(rgyud 'bum): mig bdun pas so/ / brgyad par re mig gnyis pas te// gsang sngags bde ba kun 'byung ba'o// shar gyi gsum pa gzung bar bya// lho yi thog ma de bzhin no// dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang // rlung gi
61b7(rgyud 'bum): grwa las sa dang ni/ / byang phyogs kyi ni thog ma dang // de nyid kyi mtha'i yi ge dang // dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang // lho yi thog ma de bzhin du// me yi rlung ni gzung bya ste// sngags kyi tshig rkang bco brgyad
62a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / gnyis pa'i yi ge re mig ni// gnyis pa dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa yang ni de nyid kyis// lnga pa drug pa'i yi ge la'o// bdun pa'i yi ge'ang de nyid kyis// de bzhin brgyad pa dum/
62a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas// skye bo rnams la chos 'khor lo// rab bskor sngags pa'i sngags tshig gis// dbu ma'i gnyis pa gzung bar bya// slar yang lho yi dang po ma'o// dbus ma'i gsum pa gzung bar bya// dbus ma'i
62a3(rgyud 'bum): thog ma de bzhin du/ / byang phyogs kyi ni thog ma dang // rlung gi sa nyid de nas ni// me yi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // rlung gi grwa yi sa dang ni// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // nub kyi mtha' ma de bzhin du// de nyid kyi
62a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi pa dang / / slar yang 'dre yi me yi bu// lho yi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang tshig/ yi ge gnyis par chu gdan dang // re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan// cod pan re mig bcu
62a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa'o/ / lnga pare mig gnyis par ldan// bdun par re mig drug pa dang // 'og gi cha ru gsal byas pa'o// dgu pa re mig gsum pa yis// mgo bor bcu gcig pa 'dod do// gnyis pas bcu gcig

62a7(rgyud 'bum): bon dang / / yang ni byang gi mtha' ma dang // nub kyi gsum pa byang gi ni// mtha' ma yi ni yi ge dang // dbus ma yi ni gnyis pa dang // rlung gi sa yi yi ge dang // me yi rlung ni gzung bya ste// sngags kyi tshig rkang nyi

62b2(rgyud 'bum): tu skrag mdzad chen po ste/ / klu rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o// dbang ldan gyi yang chu gzung bya// dbus ma'i yi ge bzhi pa dang // shar gyi thog ma gzung bar bya// bden bral me yi sa bon dang // gdan ni byang gi
62b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ma dang / / de nyid kyi yig bzhi pa dang // bden bral me ni btu byas nas// nub phyogs kyi yang bzhi pa dang // bden bral ma yi sa bon dang // lho yi mtha' ma de bzhin te// tshig rkang nyi shu rtsa gcig pa//
62b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu skrag pa thams cad spangs// re mig gnyis pa yang dag sbyar// rlung gi stan ni de bzhin du// yi ge thog ma zhes bya'o// gnyis pa de ltar ra steng gnas// bzhi pa yi ni mgor gnas pa// re mig gnyis

64a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtha' ma'i yi ge dang / / rlung gi gnyis pa btu bya ste// dbus ma'i gsum pa de bzhin du// srin po'i nyi ma blangs pa dang // byang gi thog ma de nas ni// ra yig gdan dang mnyam ldan bya// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi

64b1(rgyud 'bum): gi char ni sbyar bar bya/ / bdun par gsum pa ldan par bya// le'u tshe gnyis pas bcu pa la// bcu gcig pa la'ang de nyid kyis// slar yang gsum pas bcu gnyis la'o// bcu gsum pa la dum bdun pas//

65a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis/ / brgyad pa'ang de yis de bzhin no// de yang 'khrul pa rnams spangs pa'o// rlung gi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // nyi mar ldan pa'i dbang ldan chu// nub kyi mtha' ma'i sa bon dang //

65a6(rgyud 'bum): pas bcu gsum pa la gnyis pas te/ / bco lnga pa yang de nyid kyis// sngags rkang sum cu rtsa gcig pa// bde ba thams cad 'byung ba'o// thog ma'i re mig btu byas nas// nub kyi thog ma de bzhin du/

66b7(rgyud 'bum): yis mnan pa dang / / mkhas pas yi ge lnga pa la// dam bu gnyis pas sbar ba'o// bag chags sems kyi bdag nyid kun// spong ba'i gsang sngags 'bod pa ste// mkhas pa'i gsang sngags tshig rkang mi
67a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcur gcig gis ma tshang ba'o/ / rlung gi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // dbang ldan chu nir ldan dang // slar yang de nyid btu byas nas// dbus ma'i thog ma'i yi ge dang // rlung gi grwa yis
67a2(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / slar yang byang gi dang po'i gdan// byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // shar gyi dbus ma'i yi ge dang // lho yi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// dbus ma'i thog ma de bzhin du// srin po'i me yi sa bon dang // me yi
67a3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi sa bon te/ / sngags kyi tshig rkang bzhi bcu pa// yi ges ji lta'i don byed pa'o// sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa la// re mig gsum pa sbyar ba dang // mkhas pas yi ge drug pa la// re mig bcu gcig pa yis
67a4(rgyud 'bum): mnan/ / bcu par re mig gnyis pa yis// mnga' bdag sna tshogs don byed pa'o// byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// lho phyogs kyi ni gsum pa dang // dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// rlung gi grwa las sa dang ni//
67a5(rgyud 'bum): yang ni de nyid btu byas nas// dbus ma yi ni gsum pa la// nub kyi mtha' ma'i gdan can dang // me yi gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // bden bral me yi sa bon dang // slar yang de nyid btu bar bya// me yi rlung ni
67a6(rgyud 'bum): gzung bya ste/ / sngags rkang bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// thog mar re mig lnga pa yi// gdan dang thig les mnan pa'o// gnyis pa'ang re mig gnyis pas so// bzhi pa la ni bzhi pas so// brgyad par yang ni de nyid
67a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ dgu par dum bu gnyis pas so// byang phyogs kyi ni thog ma dang // srin po'i nyi ma'i mgon po dang // dbus ma'i thog ma bzung byas la// de nas dbang po'i sgo gdan can// nub phyogs kyi ni thog ma dang /
67b1(rgyud 'bum): me yi rlung gi sa bon dang // nub kyi dang po bzung byas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' la zhon pa'o// byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// nub kyi thog ma'i yi ge ni// de nyid la nir yig ldan// nub kyi mtha' ma de bzhin du/
67b2(rgyud 'bum): me yi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // slar yang nub kyi mtha' ma dang // me yi rlung ni gzung bya ste// tshig rkang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// lnga par bcu gcig pa yis mnan// bdun pa la yang de nyid kyis// dgu par
67b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu gcig dum gnyis pas/ / gsang sngags 'joms byed chen por gsungs// byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// dbang ldan grwa yis mtha' dang // 'dre yi grwa yi nyi ma dang // ka Shar grags pa rang nyid btu//
67b4(rgyud 'bum): dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang // srin po'i me yi bu dang ni// me'i yang rlung ni gzung bya ste// tshig rkang bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// gnyis dang bzhi pa drug pa la// dum bu gnyis pa sbyar ba'o// rnal 'byor
67b5(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ba'i bdag nyid du/ / yi ge las ni shes par bya// nub phyogs kyi ni gsum pa dang // slar yang bden bral gnyis par ni// lho yi dang po'i stan du sbyin// nub kyi mtha' ma de bzhin te// dbang ldan gyi
67b6(rgyud 'bum): nichu gzung bya/ / slar yang nub kyi gsum pa dang // rlung gi grwa yi sa dang ni// nub kyi mtha' ma de bzhin du// tshig rkang bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa// mtshams med lnga ni byed rnams kyi'o// khyab bdag thog mar dum tha
67b7(rgyud 'bum): ni lnga pa'i stan gyis mdzes pa dang / / gnyis par dum bu gnyis pa yis// sbyar dang slar yang gsum pa la// dum gnyis pa dang thig les so// gsum pas yi ge bzhi pa la'o// lnga pa bdun pa la de
68a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ re mig gnyis dang bdun pas so// nub phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // bden bral me yi sa bon ni// byang gi mtha' ma'i stan can dang // nub phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // me yi rlung ni
68a2(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / dbus ma'i thog ma'i yi ge dang // bden bral me yi bu dang ni// slar yang me yi rlung yin te// sngags kyi yi ge gnyis pa la// re mig dgu pas mnan pa dang // slar yang yi ge drug pa dang //
68a3(rgyud 'bum): re mig gnyis pas sbyar ba yi// sngags ni chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// tshig rkang bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// dbus ma'i thog ma bzung nas ni// nyi ma'i gdan gyis gsal byas pa'o// nub phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang // rlung
68a4(rgyud 'bum): gi gnyis pa'i yi ge la/ / byang gi gnyis pa'i gdan can no// bden bral rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rlung gi gnyis pa bzung byas la// byang gi gnyis pa'i gdan can no// 'dre yi me yi bu dang ni// lho yi mtha' ma
68a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du/ / me yi rlung ni gzung bya ste// tshig rkang bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o// thog ma'i yi ger re mig ni// dgu pas mnan pa mdzes pa'o// gsum pa lnga pa bdun pa la// dum bu gnyis pas sbyar ba'o// re mig
68a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa btu byas nas/ / nub phyogs kyi ni gsum pa la// nyi ma'i gdan ni ldan pa dang // shar phyogs kyi ni gsum pa dang // rlung gi grwa yi sa dang ni// de nyid gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // ra yig ldan dang dbang
68a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan chu/ / rlung gi gnyis pa'i yi ge dang // nub kyi dang po nyid la ni// dbang ldan chu yi gdan can no// nub phyogs kyi yang thog ma la// gdan ni byang gi mtha' ma'o// nub kyi mtha' ma bzung byas pa// chog rkang bzhi//
68b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// thog mar bcu gcig pa yis ni// mnan pa mdzes pa'i mchog yin no// gsum pa la ni gnyis pas te// brgyad pa la yang de nyid kyis// bcu par bdun pa nyid kyis te// sngags ni sa la
68b2(rgyud 'bum): kun mnyam pa'o/ / dbus ma yi ni gsum pa la// ra yi yi ge ldan par bya// rlung gi gnyis pa'i sa bon la// nub kyi dang po'i gdan de nas// dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// nub phyogs kyi ni gsum pa dang /
68b3(rgyud 'bum): byang gi thog ma bzung byas la// nyi ma'i gdan gyis gsal bar bya// dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya// nub phyogs kyi ni gsum pa dang // byang gi mtha' ma gzung bar bya// dbang ldan grwa yis mtha' dang // byang gi
68b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ma gzung bar bya/ / nub kyi thog ma'i yi ge'o// sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa la// re mig gnyis pas sbyar ba dang // drug pa la yang de nyid sbyar// dgu pa la yang de nyid kyis// bcu gcig pa la bdun
68b5(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyar/ / shes rab pha rol phyin rang nyid// gsang sngags tshig rkang bzhi bcu brgyad// dpa' bo yis ni gsungs pa ste// sar gtogs 'byung po thams cad dang // lha dang klu sogs skrag par 'gyur// gsang
68b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di yi nus pa ni/ / ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' sogs// gsang sngags ming gis gsungs pa ni// 'bum phrag bzlas pa'i bdag nyid ches// mnyes shing
68b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub gsol bar 'gyur/ / oM yig dang por sngags kun la// hUM hUM phaT mthar de bzhin du// tshig rkang rnams la sbyar ba dang // thung ba dang ni ring po gdon// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // gnod sbyin
69a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po 'khor sgyur dang / / skye gnas bzhir skyes sems can rnams// 'dren pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje sogs// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sngags pas bklags pas grub
69a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang yin/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams rigs rim pas// kun spyod dus su shes par bya// yi ge'i thog mthar rim pa yis tshig rkang re re la yang ngo // bgegs kun rnam par gzhig don du// khri phrag gcig ni
69a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya/ / oM a ka A kha i ga I g+ha u nga U tsa ri tsha r-I dza l-i dz+ha l-I nya e Ta ai Sha o Da au D+ha aM Na aHta a tha aM da au d+ha au na aM pa aM pha lAM b+ha r-I maM rAM yaM UM ra uM la AM ba aM sha AM Sha aM sa aM ha
69a4(rgyud 'bum): aM k+ShaHhaMH/ ka kA kha khA ga gA g+ha g+hA da dA tsa tsA tsha tshA dza dzA dz+ha dz+nyA nya ny+dza Ta TA Tha thA Da DA D+ha b+hU Na NA ta tA tha thA da dA d+ha d+hA na nA pa pA pha pA ba bA b+ha b+hU ma mA ya yA ra rA la lA wa wA sha shA Sha ShA sa sA ha hA k+Sha k+Sha k+ShaM k+ShaM haM hAM saM sAM ShaM ShAM
69a5(rgyud 'bum): s haM shAM waM wAM laM r-I raM rA yaM yAM maM mAM b+h+r-i b+hA baM bAM paM bAM baM bAM naM nAM d+ha dz+nyA daM dAM thaM thAM taM tA NAM r+Nar+d+ha d+h+waM R+R-i waM tr-i TaM TAM nya yAM dz+nye d+h+waM dze dzArma rA tsa tsA daM dAM g+haM g+h+raM gaM gAM khaM khAM kaM kAM ka tsa kha tsha ga dza g+ha d+haM danya ka Ta kha Tha ga Da g+ha D+ha da Na ka ta kha tha ga
69a6(rgyud 'bum): dag+ha d+ha da na ka pa kha pa ga ba g+ha b+hang ma ya wa ra la sa ha Sha sha k+ShaHaHaMH/ ka ha ka ha ka sa ka sa ka Sha ka Sha ka sha ka sha ka wa ka wa ka la ka la ka ra ka ra ka ya ka ya ka ma ka ma ka b+ha ka b+ha ka ba ka ba ka pha ka pa ka ba

70a7(rgyud 'bum): rUrA bi Ne sarba sha rI ra rU pA ya/ br-ik+Sha gul+lo la tA ya sarba rU pi Ni sarba bstu ne ma ra NA ya rU pA ya b+hak+Sha ya bak+Sha Na ru pA ya ni ro pa mA ya ni ro pa ma su kha be ha sa ha sa bi la sa bi la sa nri t+yA pa yo nr-i t+yA pa ya/ d+hIn drI ya/
70b1(rgyud 'bum): k+Shu b+hA hA la sa praSh+Tane shas d+har la raN+Da la nAn ra/ rkyen na chubacu bathal thal tsams lam+b+ha ArmAn+naHthAhAr+m+mAHd+hArmAn+ta nAn+dan+da ma r+thaH6/ d+har+m+ma dzaH/ ma ma can
70b2(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ba~M ba~M hU~M/ ga sa pa kra k+Sha ba d+huH sa T+Ta sa Da ra bar shA radwa 'ang dzanga' tsham sa nas dan/ hUM bAn+d+ra b+hU hrI hA ba~M hU~M hU~M hU~M thA thA bru~M hU~M hU~M dz+dza sa swAhA/ tsa bya'i sngags so// dpa' bo thams cad ma
70b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
70b4(rgyud 'bum): las/ rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan lhur bshad bya ba// lus can rnams kyi go cha ste// rdo rje sems dpa' snying kha ru/
70b5(rgyud 'bum): a li dang sbyor rgyas gdab bya// rdo rje snying po'i ye shes dang // sems dpa' nam mkha' dang gcig pa// snying kha rnam par shes phra mo// A li gtum mo yum yin te// sbyor ba'ang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba// 'di
70b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar dbang po kun rgyas gdab/ / de phyir srung ba'ang oM ha yin te// yig gang rtag tu 'joms med pa'o// lhag ma rnam snang brjod pa'i mthar// rdo rje bskyod pa las sgra'o// de'i phyir ji ltar mngon par ni/
70b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa las ni bzhengs pa'i gzugs// mi rnams kyi ni snying dbus su// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dkyil 'khor// rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa dang // lte ba'i 'khor lo srung ba ste// oM baM gyi ni sngags
71a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs/ / dbus mdzes ma dang rdo rje 'dzin// kha sbyar 'di ni srung ba che// ma byung dang por yang dag byung // 'khor lo kun gyi gsang sngags kyang // dngos grub kun gsol bshad par
71a2(rgyud 'bum): byA/ oM ha baM hA b+h+raM hi bi hI bI hu bu hUM prA// he be he bye ho bo ho bo he baM ha baHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hUM/ swA hA rnga thung dang ring po'i rang bzhin gyis// thabs dang shes rab thabs bdag nyid// gang tshen/
71a3(rgyud 'bum): rje phag mo ni// gtso mo'i rnam par gnas pa na// oM baM zhes bya la sogs pa'o// sngags kyi'ang yi ge sbyin par bya// ye shes 'khor lo skye gnas te// gdan yang gsang ba par 'dod do// thams cad bde
71a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rnam par 'gyur/ / bde ba brtan dang 'gro ba dang // bde ba dkar po bde ba gnag/ bde ba kun tur skyes de bzhin// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar dran// rang byung bde ba mi
71a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la/ / rang byung dkyil 'khor rdzogs ldan du'o// rdzogs ldan rgyud du srung 'di ni// rdzogs ldan nyid ni 'byung ba'o// 'jig rten sna tshogs rdzogs ldan shes// sna tshogs khams rdzogs ldan de bzhin//
71a6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs 'jig rten khams rnams su// de ltar dus kun shes par bya// dus gcig la ni rdzogs ldan sogs// 'jig rten khams rnams su 'byung min// bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen byas pas// kun
71a7(rgyud 'bum): tu bde bas khyab par spyod/ / gang du rtsod dus der rdzogs ldan// gang du rdzogs ldan der rtsod dus// der ni gsum ldan dang gnyis ldan// re re yi ni gnyis ldan te// rnal 'byor rgyud ni sum cu drug/ ma lus 'dus
71b1(rgyud 'bum): las yang byung ba'o/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
71b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rjes spa dpa' dang phag mo'i go cha bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// de nas slar yang go cha yi// srung ba rnam snang
71b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad kyi ste/ / mgo bor rgyas gdab de yi ni// gsang sngags na ma hi nyid do// gyen du 'gro dus rnal 'byor ni// gang gang bde las byung ba'i las// de de'i dus su shes bya ste// gus pas mngon par srung ba'i sngags/
71b4(rgyud 'bum): dri med mgo bor sbyar bya ste// 'di ni bde chen 'khor lo'o// rnal 'byor gtan du shes bya ste// gshin rje ma yis 'khyud de bzhin// oM yoM sngags las skyes bdag nyid// shes rab thabs bdag rgyu yis ni// yA ro//
71b5(rgyud 'bum): mi tsarba nI na/ de ltar khams rnams sbyar bar bya// lus la sogs pa kun thim pa// zung dang zung du 'byung bar 'gyur// de phyir gsum pa'i ye shes ni// gshin rje ma ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'pho ba lta bu bde ba'i
71b6(rgyud 'bum): thabs/ / gsum ldan rkang pa gcig las so// snang ba gang du 'dod par ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang nyid 'gro/ gtso bo'i rnam pa yi ni gzugs// slar yang sum cu bdun dag tu'o// sngags rnams kyi yig las
71b7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / dpral ba'i dbus su shes par bya// sngon du bshad pa'i sngags la 'dir// gang zhig gang gi dang po'i yig/ 'di yi sngags kun rim pa yis// de ni de dang de shes bya// lhag ma thams cad mnyam pa
72a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa mchog/ thams cad yod min med pa'ang min// kun 'gro thams cad pa min pa'o// sgyu ma yis ni thams cad rmongs// mkhas pa sgyu ma nyid kyis grol//
72a2(rgyud 'bum): phan pa sgyu ma phan ye shes// sems bskyed pa yang phan pa'o// de ltar na ma hi yi don to// mkhas pa lhag ma bde ba ste// rnam par snang gyur 'bar gyur pas// bde de rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o// gshin rje
72a3(rgyud 'bum): gnon pa'i rig ma ste/ / gshin rje ma de brjod par 'gyur// gang phyir srung ba 'di dran pas// dus kun tu ni bya ba bya// snying kha dpral ba'i ye shes ni// gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor ma
72a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams don chen phyir/ / rgyud rnams kun ni skyes pa'o// rgyud thams cad du gzhan pa yi// rnal 'byor dag byed yod pa min// rgyud 'di yi ni rnal 'byor ni// rgyud thams cad du dag byed yin// dkyil
72a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gtso mo gshin rje mas/ / de nas slar yang bya ba spang // mngal du zhugs las grol ba dang // bskyed pa dang ni 'pho ba gnyis// gshin rje ma dang rnam snang mdzad// der ni gzugs dang gzugs med
72a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bde dang sdug bsngal can ye shes// lha rdzas phyag rgyas ro mnyam mo// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom
72a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i go cha srung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
72b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas pad+ma gar dbang gi/ go cha'i srung ba bka' sprul pa// 'dod chags me ni gsal bzhin pa// spyi bor 'gro ba stobs chen te// swA hA hU~M gi sngags yig dang // rje mo rmongs pa'i rgyu ma yis/
72b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni// nam mkha' 'khor lo'i gtso bo'o// kha yi pad+mar rmongs byed pa'ang // ro dang ro min can srung ba// lce dang lce ni 'dus pa la// thig le de myang rnal 'byor pas// mchog tu
72b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba skyes pa na/ / ye shes can med ye shes ldan pa'ang med// mi dang mi mo la bstan pas// 'dul ba zhes bya rang sems so// dga' ba'i ngag gi tshogs rnams ni// chos sgrogs pa yi rgyu yis so//
72b4(rgyud 'bum): / byang chub sems kyi bu ga ni// de ru dbugs ni rgyu ba'o// bu ga rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// de rnams su dbugs mngon rgyus so// bu ga kun tu hrI sbyin bya// mi 'gyur mchog tu zhi ba'o// mau yaM zhing ste mgo bo
72b5(rgyud 'bum): la mi 'gyur mchog las 'du ba'o/ / rmongs pa yis ni srid sbyor ba// yang dag lam du rab 'dzud byed// des na rmongs byed mar grags te// srid pa'i 'khor lo 'jom ma'o// srid med srid pa mchog kyang
72b6(rgyud 'bum): med/ de ni kha sbyar du brjod do// sngags de nyid kyi sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor sum cu bdun bdag nyid// gtso bo dpa' bo 'am lha mo ste// spyi gtsug dang ni kha'i dbus su// thams cad du ni srung byed dang //
72b7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa tsam ni 'joms byed pa'o// pad+ma don dam pa'i ye shes// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub gzugs// kun rdzob shes byed shes bya ni// gar dbang phyug tu brjod pa nyid// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
73a1(rgyud 'bum): @kyi gzugs/ / byang chub rang gis thams cad rtogs// sprul pa kun tu rmongs gyur pas// lha mo rmongs byed mar 'gyur ro// pad+ma chos kyi 'byung gnas 'gyur// gar gyi dbang po rdo rje/
73a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ dbang phyug lhan skyes zhes bya ste// byang chub sems ni g.yo ba'o// rang bzhin med dang bde rtog nyid// de ni kha sbyar du brjod do// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i
73a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la
73a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i srung ba'i go cha'i sngags gtan la dbab pa ste le'u bcu dgu pa'o/ / / de nas he ru ka'i srung ba// go cha slar yang bshad par bya// mgrin dang dpung par 'ong ba ste//
73a5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma ni mgo bor ro// bau ShaT he sngags mnyam med pa// 'byung dang 'byung las byung ba srun// hreM hriM kun tu bskyod ma'i sngags// de phyir shes rab thab bdag nyid// he ni sems bdag nyid rnal
73a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor/ / slar yang ru ni bdag nyid ka/ lus kyi rang bzhin nyid rnal 'byor// sa 'og sa steng mtho 'jig rten// bde ba'i thog mtha' dbus su ni// bau ShaT he rnams sa bon can// hreM hriM 'og dang steng shes
73a7(rgyud 'bum): bya srog gi rlung ni bskyod pa yin/ / gtong dang dgang ba la goms dang // bum pa can gyi sbyor ba'i dus// de yi dus su 'khor lo ni// sum cu bdun bdag nyid shes bya// de ltar dus ni bzhi rnams kyi//
73b1(rgyud 'bum): ji lta'i rim par de 'dod do// sngags de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod pa mchog tu rmad du byung // de ltar rnam shes brgyad rnams kyi// gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang lnga// le'u bzhi yi rnal 'byor
73b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ji lta'i rim pas rtogs pa'o/ / spyod pa'i rgyud ni gsum pa yi// le'u ru ni byung ba dang // bya ba le'u bzhi pa ru// rgyud ni rang nyid bskyed pa dang // de kho na nyid gdan skyes pa// slar yang gsum par brjod
73b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / bzhi pa ru ni gzhan gyi gdan// skyes pa ye shes pha rol 'gro// srung ba 'gro ba bzhi rnams kyi// lha dang mi dang 'dre dang ni// klu yi 'gro bar mkhas pa yis// shes bya kun tu rgyu rnams kyi'o// de de'i
73b4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dus rnams ni/ / bskal pa bzang por chud pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'grongs mi 'gyur// slar yang 'grongs med skye mi 'gyur// rang bzhin shes par gyur nas ni// sems can rang gi rang bzhin/
73b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur// lta ba bdun cu gnyis rnams ni// kun tu bskyod ma'i las kyis so// nyan thos rnams kyi lta ba lnga// rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba gnyis// rnal 'byor spyod pa pa yi bdun// dbu ma pa mchog rnams kyi/
73b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad// bcu drug pha rol phyin rnams kyi// gsang sngags theg pa'i sum cu drug/ bdun dang brgyad pa'i gnyis kyis dman// kun kyang sngags kyi theg pa'o// rtsa yi kun spyod rtsa ba can// bla ma'i drin las shes
73b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / he ru ka ma rtsa ba mdzad// srid dang mya ngan 'das dbus bzhugs// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
74a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtshon la 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ se ru ka la sogs pa'i spang ba'i go cha'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
74a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rdo rje nyi ma yi// srung ba bshad par bya ba ni// hUM hUM ho sngags 'di yis// mig gi dbang po'i dbus su ste// hUM yig gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// lta ba thams cad mthong
74a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'o/ / ye shes rnam shes mchi ma yis// 'og dang steng du thim pa las// lta ba bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// dus gcig tu ni mthong bar 'gyur// mgrin pa'i bu ga ru ni lnga// gsang ba'i rdo rje can du gnyis/
74a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun ni snying khar yang dag bshad// brgyad ni klad pa'i rgyas su'o// bcu drug gtsug tor du ni 'gyur// lte dkyil 'khor du sum cu drug/ ma lus rang gi las kyis bskyed// rang gi lta ba 'dir mthong
74a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di de bdag gi gang na yin te// sa gsum lta bur mthong ba yin// ho yig sems dpa' ma kun gyi// mtha' yas pa yi sangs rgyas zhing // rdo rje nyi mas khyab par 'gyur// de phyir mig ni srung byed
74a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / kun tu skrag byed mas 'khyud pa// hUM hUM gsang sngags sgra sgrogs ma// skrag pa yi ge gnyis kyis ni// sdig pa thams cad mthar byed pa'o// sum cu bdun bdag dkyil 'khor gyi// dbus su gnyis
74a7(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgom par bya/ / mngon sum sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni// lha rnams kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// re re yi ni lta ba yis// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma yis nam mkha' gang // slar yang
74b1(rgyud 'bum): lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub/ / rnal 'byor ma ni lhan skyes gzugs// lhan skyes yi ge rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor ma yis lhan skyes zos// slar yang rnal 'byor ma za 'gyur// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnal
74b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs can ma// gnas kyi gzugs ni rnal 'byor ma// byas dang byed po'ang de nyid do// bsgrub bya mthong ba ster bar 'gyur// go cha'i yi ge sgom pa la'o// sgrub po ci dang ci
74b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa/ / de rnams kyis ni ster bar 'gyur// tshul 'di sgom pa med pa yi// sems can de rnams rmongs par 'gyur// yi ge bkod pa tsam gyis ni// las rgyal thams cad byed par 'gyur// dpa' bo
74b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor
74b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje nyi ma la sogs pa'i go cha'i srung ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas rta mchog gi srung ba// thams cad bya ba byed dge
74b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / phaT haM sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis// kun nas mgo dang rkang pa'i mthar// mdzod spu'i dbus su dgod bya ste// spyi gtsug dbus su rnal 'byor ma// mgo bor kun skrag ma shes nas// tshig
74b7(rgyud 'bum): kun dang ni mkha' zhes bya/ / gtum mo'i gsang sngags phaT phaT de// ye shes gdan dbang phyug mar 'dod// rta mchog ting 'dzin dag tu yang // rnal 'byor dngos grub smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor pa
75a1(rgyud 'bum): yis 'khor ba dral/ / slar yang mya ngan 'das dka' ba'o// ye shes zhes bya'i rnam rtog kyang // sngags pas gnyis su med pas bkas// haM yig kun mkhyen yod min na// skye bo
75a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad smos ci dgos/ / bkur sti byed pa yod pa dang // dbang po tshar gcod yod pa ste// rnal 'byor gtum mo'i yon tan ldan// de ni bdud rtsir mngon par brjod// bde bcas the tsom med par ni//
75a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po thams cad zos pas so// dkyil 'khor sngon du gsungs pa yin// dbus su dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// sngags la sogs pa thams cad kyang // kun gyis kun tu bya ba'o// las kyi bag chags
75a4(rgyud 'bum): rang gis bza'/ / phra mo'ang kun tu bcom par du'o// ngan pa thams cad sbar byas na// ras bal ltar yang pha rol 'gro// de ni gtum byed mar shes bya// phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o// zla bar brtsi ba'i
75a5(rgyud 'bum): skar ma yis/ skar ma'i bdag po snying rjes zhu// slar yang mdor bsdus bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor ma ni drug rnams dang // dpa' bo gnyis su byar med nyid// dgos pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rnal
75a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis/ / re re'i gnas su shes par bya// der ni gang yang byed du gzhug/ lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub mtshan nyid// lus can kun gyi bde ba ni// dbang gnyis dus las shes par bya//
75a7(rgyud 'bum): bug drug bum pa can byas pas// de dang 'dra ba'i bde 'thob 'gyur// lte ba'i 'og gi bu ga gsum// de yi steng du gsum de bzhin// 'gro dang 'ong ba gnyis gnyis te// go cha bcu gnyis der de bzhin//
75b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po yul gyi mtshan nyid kyis// dngos po'i bdag nyid der gar byed// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi nyid 'thung 'gyur// zang zing khams rnams za ba ste// steng dang 'og tu mtshon bltas pas// lhan skyes bdag
75b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid rtsen par byed/ / rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po yis bya ba yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom
75b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rta mchog la sogs pa'i go cha'i srung ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
75b4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gtor ma'i de nyid bshad// mthar gyis ji lta ba bzhin no// chos 'byung dbus su son par ni// ji lta'i cho gas gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mkha' 'gro'i gzug/
75b5(rgyud 'bum): slar yang go cha sogs pas bsrung // de'i yang ting nge 'dzin dmigs bya// pad+ma'i snod ni gzhag bya ste// phyi dang nang bdag nyid du bya// a ba d+hU tIr skye gnas bri// lte ba'i 'og dang steng bu ga/ pad+ma'i snod du brtag
75b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / nam mkha' lnga yi bdud rtsi ni// thams cad ro mnyam par bya'o// phung po go ku da ha na sogs// skye mched rnams ni sha kun te// sbar ba bde ba'i sems kyis te// 'dod chags me yis bsro ba'o//
75b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyang ba mchog ni bdag nyid la'o// slar yang bdud rtsir byed pa ste// bsam gtan phyag rgya rgyun du der// sku gsum du ni byin gyis brlab// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drang bya//
76a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo mdud byas nges par ni// gung mo rtse sbyar mtheb rdo rje// brtan par yang dag bcir byas nas// dpral ba'i phyogs su yong gzhag pas// bzlas shing bsgyur bas 'khor bar bya// rkang
76a2(rgyud 'bum): pa mnan cing steng du blta/ / sngags pas de byas pa mchog ste// spyi bor pheM yig sgra yis ni// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ g.yon dang g.yas pa'i
76a3(rgyud 'bum): / sbyor ba yis// snying khar phyag rgya sbyin par bya// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag gnyis kyis// bskor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i de bde// oM A ral+li hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki n+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM dri sh+ya hoH/ rdo rje thal mo
76a4(rgyud 'bum): / gyen la phye// mtshan mo phyeng na gtor ma sbyin// oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tse na mA dA pa smA ra DA ka DA ki n+yA da ya i maM ba liM grih+Nan+tu sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+na ya thai baM ya theSh+TaM b+huny+dza tha dzi g+h+ra tha pi
76a5(rgyud 'bum): / tha mA ti kra ma tha ma ma sarba kar+N+Na ya sata su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye ma ma swA hA yi kA b+ha wan+d+ha hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags kyi 'jug pa ji srid du// bum pa can gyis gnas mi 'gyur// rgyun mi 'chad pa 'thob 'gyur te// dga'
76a6(rgyud 'bum): skyes bde ba'ang smos ci dgos/ / dpa' bo rnams kyi gtor ston mo// rnal 'byor ma rnams la de bzhin// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// bla ma gtso bo ru na bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ming gang gang // dpa'
76a7(rgyud 'bum): bopo rnams kyi'ang de bzhin du/ / de dang de la sha dbul bya// myos byed bde chen ster ba 'ang ngo // 'khor lo mngon par zung du bya// yang na sngags par zung du'o// gdan ni stag gi pags pa ste// ston mo mi yi pagra
76b1(rgyud 'bum): par ro/ / snod chen rnams su btung ba dang // sngags pa skra grol ba yis so// snod ni rnal 'byor mas zhes bya// yang na gzhon nu ma yis so// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lor dpa' bo rnams kyis te// dpa' bo
76b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi gzhi la snod ni gzhon nu ma yis so/ / dar 'breng dbu rgyan dag dang ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dri de bzhin// glu len gar byed sil snyan dang // drug ldan sogs dang dman rnams dang // gtor ma'i
76b3(rgyud 'bum): snod rnams thams cad ni/ / sngags pas shar gyi phyogs nas su// chang thams cad dang mchod pa yi// snod rnams der ni gzhag par bya// mchod bya mchod pa mchod pa'i rgyu// mchod pa chen po phan tshun
76b4(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ 'khor lor rang gi slob ma byas// yang na mnyam gzhag gzhan rnams so// sngags pas skal med thams cad dang // mu stegs la sogs spang bar bya// 'gro ba kun ni mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin
76b5(rgyud 'bum): te/ rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gnas kyis// a re re re gti mug phyugs kyis mi shes so// lhan skyes mdzes ma blangs nas bde ba che la mnos// sham bu/ sa gsum ma lus 'gro ba sangs
76b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi rang bzhin/ / snying rje'i gzhon nu ma dang lhan cig rol par byos// a re rdza gang gis don dam la ni ma bsgoms pas// de yis sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob pa ma yin no// a re rnga nang dang phyi ni dbye ba med
76b7(rgyud 'bum): par shes par gyis/ / 'jig rten thams cad bsgral bar nus pa'o// a re/ de la sogs pa thams cad ni// gang dang der ni blang ba'o// nga yi rgyud dang rtogs pa yis// sngags pa'i snang bas glu blang bya// de la
77a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag ni byas nas su/ / gar dang glu yang bya ba yin// snod ni pad+ma'i phyag tu ni// rang nyid brtul zhugs can gyis dbul// pad+ma'i lag par gzung bya ste// de nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya// rnal
77a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma rnams phud chang bu/ / so sor bsdu bar bya ba yin// zos pa yi ni lhag ma yang // 'byung po thams cad la sbyin bya// ji ltar yang dag 'byor pa yi// de rnams la ni yon dbul bya// de ltar nyi ma re re bya//
77a3(rgyud 'bum): yang na zla ba zla bar ro// dam tshig bsrung phyir lo gcig la// nyi ma gcig ni bya ba'o// der ni sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad bklag/ bkra shis pa yi ngag kyang bya// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dus la mchod pa dang // dpa'
77a4(rgyud 'bum): bo rnams la bza' dang btung ba khyod kyis drangs/ / khyod la rtag tu bsrung dang mchog gi 'byor pa dang // yang na yid la 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par shog/ skye ba kun tu mchog tu bde bar gshegs pa yi//
77a5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i 'jig rten dbus su 'gro bar 'gyur bar shog/ dpa' bo gnyis med mchod pas skye ba 'di la ni// sdig pa zad dang phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur bar shog/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje
77a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gtor ma
77a7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan pa rab bshad de// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gad ba dang // sbyin sreg thab dang de bzhin du// slob dpon
77b1(rgyud 'bum): rang nyid mchod bshad bya/ / slar yang sa gzhi cha mnyam la// dkyil 'khor khru ni brgyad pa ste// ri yi steng la sogs pa dang // dag pa'i sa yi mthil du bya// der ni pus mo tsam du brko// slar yang mtho gang tsam
77b2(rgyud 'bum): brkos nas/ / chu yis dgang bar bya ba ste// ji srid chu ni ma zad pa// de srid du ni rtsa ba'i sngags// mkhas pas 'dir ni bzlas par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi khyim bya ste// skye bo thams cad sreg par 'gyur// der ni
77b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ / thig gnyis kyang ni gdab par bya// tshangs pa'i thig gi logs gnyis su// sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis gdab bya// slar yang de yi dbus btab pas// thig rnams drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// de
77b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dbus su de mnyam pa/ / slar yang de rnams su gdab bya// mdor na 'khor lo bzhi po la// nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug go/ kun nas dum bu bcu drug las// tshon rtsi yis ni ri mo bya// lhag ma sgo yi tshad
77b5(rgyud 'bum): du ni dbus ma'i pad+ma la sogs bya/ / 'on kyang dbus kyi pad+ma der// sor ni bcu gnyis bya ba'o// 'khor lo gsum ni bzhi po la// dum bu gsum gsum bya ba yin// dum bu re re la ni khru// gnyis gnyis
77b6(rgyud 'bum): mkhas rnams kyis shes bya/ / tshon sna lnga yi skud pa ni// de phyir dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ro// sboms su sgo las nyi shur ni// gcig gis ma tshang tshad can no// dri zhim po dang dri spos kyis// ye shes thig skud
77b7(rgyud 'bum): la bdug bya/ / gtor ma chen po byin nas ni// phyi nas thig las 'dir brjod kyis// rdo rje phur bu sa gzhi la// mkhas pas spro ba yis ni bya// rang gi slob ma thig 'dzin gzhug/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte bar/
78a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa yis ni bzung byas nas// steng du yang ni gdab par bya// de bzhin du ni gdab pa ni// g.yon skor du ni bya ba'o// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba na// gtor ma byin la bcag par bya// rtsa
78a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags ni brjod pa yis/ / ri mo bar snang la gdeg bya// phyi nang nang du shes pa yi// sngags pas bdud rtsi btung bar bya// sa ni nam mkhar gshegs bya zhing // slar yang de nyid du dgug bya// me tog rnam
78a3(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs dang / / rdo rje'i gom pas gar bya'o// lag pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor ma dang rol// 'di kun gri gug mtshan ma rnams// dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis bya'o// mchod pa rnam pa
78a4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs byas/ / slob dpon dri yis khrus byas pa// dri ma med bkrus legs bdugs pa'i// gos ni yongs su gyon nas ni// dril bu'i sgra ni rab bya zhing // rnal 'byor ma rnams glu len dang // sna tshogs sil snyan
78a5(rgyud 'bum): snod rnams dang / / ca co yi ni sgra sgrogs pa'o// dbang bskur ba ni sbyin bya zhing // rang slob ma la phyi dang gsang // rgyal po rkun mo sogs spangs pa'i// skye bo dang bral phyogs su bya// 'dir ni cho ga'i skyon mang
78a6(rgyud 'bum): pos/ mnar med sogs su ltung bar 'gyur// zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i// sbyin sreg rnams kyi thab bya'o// zlum po zhi ba yi ni thab// gru bzhi pa ni rgyas pa la// gru gsum pa ni dbang las la// mngon
78a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod la ni zur drug pa/ / zur bdun pa ni bskrad pa la// sdang bar bya la gru brgyad pa// zur dgu pa ni rengs pa la// gsad pa la ni zur lnga ste// las thams cad la zur bcu pa// kha dog rang bdag sbyor bas so//
78b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bdag gyur mtshan ma ni// thab rnams kyi ni dbus su bya// 'khor pad rdo rje dang gri gug/ ral gri rin chen sna tshogs rdor// mda' gzhu de bzhin thab la ni// 'phreng ba de rnams su bya'o// khru gcig pa
78b2(rgyud 'bum): dang khru gnyis pa/ / khru phyed de yi phyed dang ni// slar yang khru gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga drug bdun dang brgyad dang dgu// khru bcu ru ni yang dag bshad// thab kun ji lta'i rim pas so// yam shing dang ni rdzas
78b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / sreg blugs me tog thams cad dang // phyi nang bdag nyid sbyor rnams kyis// rang rang gi ni las bya'o// mngon par brjod par bshad pa'i las// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs thams cad can// 'di/
78b4(rgyud 'bum): yi sbyor ba'i cho ga'i las// rgyud rnams kun tu shes byed do// cung zad 'chad par 'gyur nyid du// rgyud thams cad kyi bshad par bya// zlum po lte bar skyes pa'i thab// snying kha ru ni gru bzhi pa// nor bu'i bu/
78b5(rgyud 'bum): / gar gla drug pa// mgrin par grA ni bdun pa ste// zur brgyad pa ni mgo bo la// zur dgu pa ni smin dbus su// gtsug tor du ni zur lnga pa// zur bcu pa ni dpral bA ste// rlung las byung ba'i rtsa ba can// bsreg
78b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas khams rnams thams cad ni/ / rlung 'bab pa la bsreg par bya// de nyid dus su phyi rol gyi// blo ldan gyis las chung ngu'o// la la nA dang ra sa nA// dgang gzar blugs gzar gnyis de bzhin/
78b7(rgyud 'bum): mar snod a ba d+hU tI ste// thab ni de'i bar bar dag tu'o// las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni// 'jig rten 'di la bya ba yin// der ni rdzas rnams thams cad ni// the tshom med par bsreg par bya// dgang
79a1(rgyud 'bum): gzar khru gang du 'gyur te/ / rgyar ni sor mo bzhi pa las// der ni sor mo gnyis brko bya// mchu yi spug mo sor mo phyed// dbus su rdo rje pad+ma dang // mchu sdug rdo rje ldan pa can// rtsa bar
79a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sor drug pa/ / yu ba'i steng du dgang gzar sogs// blugs gzar kyang ni de'i tshad la// steng du pad 'dab lta bu yin// gang gi thab rnams kyi ni tshad// khru gang ba'am khru do pa// de'i phyed thur du brko bya ba/
79a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu po rnams la rab tu bshad// thog ma dang ni dbus dang mthar// sngags pas gang ba'i sreg blugs dbul// me ni dgug bya de yang ni// ku sha'i bam po la gzhag bya// mchod yon zhabs bsil zhal
79a4(rgyud 'bum): bsil ni/ / sna tshogs mngon par bsngags nas dbul// der ni nya lcibs phor ba gsum// lo ma'i steng du gzhag par bya// 'o ma'i snod ni yang gzhag nas// de nas gos ni de'i steng du'o// sa gzhir dur ba
79a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin bya ba/ / sngon du kha mngon phyogs par ro// thams cad du ni g.yas phyogs su// der ni rdzas rnams gzhag par bya// sa gzhi ri mo gsum bri ste// sgo gcig pu ni nub tu'o// bsgrub bya'i dngos kun
79a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / rgyal po nas brtsams gzhug par bya// thams cad nye bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje bla ma la dbul bya// drang srong phyag bzhi bsam bya ba// dbyug pa thab dang spyi blugs dang // bgrang 'phreng
79a7(rgyud 'bum): lug la zhon pa yi/ / kha dog dmar po rnam bsam bya// oM e h+ye hi ag+na ye raM sarba sid+d+ham+me pra yats+tsha dz+wa la dz+wa la ho/ ma hA ri Shi sarba de ba mu kha pu rI asmin san ni hi to b+ha wa hUM/ me spyan drang ba'i sngags so//
79b1(rgyud 'bum): oM AHpA d+haM hu trA sa nA ye grih+Na hUM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so// oM baM A tsa ma nai r-i Sha ye prats+tsha hUM/ zhal bsil gyi sngags so// oM hUM DA ka DA ki nI sa ma Ar+g+haM da dA mi hUM hUM raM raM swA hA/ mchod yon gyi sngag/
79b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM de bo r-i Shi pa ra ma sau ga ta kA ru ni kA ye dzaHhUM baM hoHha ha da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ha na ha na/ hUM hUM/ me dgyes par byed pa'i sngags so// rdzas thams cad la oM gi yi ge dang AHdang
79b3(rgyud 'bum): / dbus su ming dang yang dag par ldan pa dang / mthar hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge dang swA hA sbyin par bya'o// rdzas thams cad kyi sngags so// dkyil 'khor gtso bo dang bcas pa// drang srong snying kar bsgom par bya/
79b4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig me ni raM las rdzogs// ye shes me lha de dang mnyam// yang na 'bar bar sgom pa ste// zhi ba la sogs mdog tu'o// me ni de ru thim bsam bya// sngags pas 'od kyi khyad par ni// so so'i snang ba'i
79b5(rgyud 'bum): mer shes bya/ / rnal 'byor me lha'i bdag nyid kyi// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// nang bdag nyid ye shes gang 'dra// phyi rol yang ni de 'drar bya// bsod nams tshogs
79b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud don dang / / ye shes tshogs rdzogs bya phyir ro// der ni tsu ru bsgrub bya ste// me la bshos bu dbul bya zhing // cung zad bdag nyid kyis spyad dang // sbyin bdag rnams la'ang sbyin par bya// gzhon nu mdzes
79b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gar byed dang / / sna tshogs sil snyan rnam bkrar byas// sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan rnams kyi// skye bo chen po rtsen bzhin dang // me tog spos sogs kyis spro bar// 'dus pa'i dbus su bya ba'o// tam bu
80a1(rgyud 'bum): la kun thams cad la/ / dgyes byed sbyin par bya ba yin// lhag ma gos dang so rtsi dang // gang ba'i sreg blugs sbyin par bya// rdo zho dang bral so rtsi dang // zhal bsil ba ni mjug tu'o//
80a2(rgyud 'bum): / ye shes me ni gshegs gsol te// bsngags brjod pa yis bzod gsol bya// oM ag+na ye sarba san+to Sha NaM ku ru me ya thA kA le sid+d+ha da gats+tsha tu hUM hUM swA hA/ me gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// dman dang
80a3(rgyud 'bum): / chad sogs gang cung zad// de thams cad ni bzod pa mdzod// kun gyi lhag ma yi ni 'bru// thams cad thab tu bsreg par bya// zhes bya dkyil 'khor thig mdor bstan// sbyin sreg thab dang cho ga mchog/
80a4(rgyud 'bum): / slob dpon mchod bya yang dag par// rdo rje 'chang du byas nas ni// mu tig gser dang rin chen rnams// glang rta sa gzhi yul ljongs dang // bran po bran mo 'khor rnams dang // chung ma phun sum tshogs kun dang /
80a5(rgyud 'bum): gos zung du ma rnams dang ni// dgyes pa'am sa la gang cung zad// bdag tu lta ba dang bral bas// dbul bya gtso bo zhi bar gyis// bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis// phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya// me
80a6(rgyud 'bum): tog spos sogs thams cad rnams/ / ston pa'i mdun du dbul bar bya// maN+Dal mdun du bya ba ni// de nas dgu yi bdag nyid 'di// dbus su bla ma rdo rje ste// mdun du thams cad mdzes ma ste// byang du
80a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i mchog ma dang / / nub tu shin tu rtse ma dang // lho ru rol pa'i rdo rje ma// snying rje la sogs grwa bzhir ro// oM badz+ra satwa gu ru pA de b+h+yaHsarba two pa kA ra NA ya swA hA/ dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang ming ni/
80b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod bya oM thog swA hA mtha' 'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha'
80b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ dkyil 'khor dang / sbyin sreg dang / slob dpon mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor
80b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'jigs pa ni/ / sgrol byed rab gnas bshad par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud rgyal du// nye bar mkho ba thams cad rnams// slob dpon gyis ni rtag gzung bya// bya bar 'os pa gzhan de bzhin// 'jig rten
80b4(rgyud 'bum): smod pa bsrung phyir yin/ / slar yang rang bzhin las skyes pa// rab gnas sgyu ma yis gzung bya// lugs ma 'am ni thang ka la// rang gzugs lha ni phyi rol spro// gang gi dus nyid la 'byung ba// gang gang lha ni lhag
80b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i/ / de'i gzugs ni de'i dus kyi'o// bde ba'i bdag nyid spros pa ste// sa bon gang gi dang po'i yig/ 'char ba dbugs rgyu ba'i bdag nyid// rlung dang rnam shes 'dus las so// de'i tshe'i dus su gang
80b6(rgyud 'bum): gi gzugs/ / phun sum tshogs kun byed pa yin// gnyis med ye shes bral yin la// lugs ma rab tu gnas pa med// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las// 'khor ba pa yi rab gnas bya// thar bde mngon
80b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod rnams kyi/ / 'di la bde ba'i bde ba che// rnal 'byor ma yi dgar gnas la// de las byung bar bya ba yin// lugs ma 'am ni thang sku la// yang dag rig pas ro rnams byug/ bdud rtsi lnga yis rdzas rnams
81a1(rgyud 'bum): la bsres par gyur pas khrus bya'o/ / blo dang ldan pas bum pa gzhag/ lha ni dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas// dam chos la sogs thams cad rnams// chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ste//
81a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa gang gi gnas rnams su// dus thams cad du rab gnas pa'o// e yi yi ge'i gnas bsgrubs nas// baM yig rdo rje sems dpa' can// ma yig rab tu gnas pa der// bzhi pa thog ma med yar
81a3(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / thos pa gcig pa sngags kyi don// brda yi yi ge'i sngags can no// dus su bcom ldan 'das rang gis// rab bzhugs rab tu mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshig/ chos kyi
81a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyings dang mnyam pa'o/ / sku gsung thugs kyi tshigs rnams kyi// rnal 'byor ma'i gtso gzhan gyi min/ b+ha ga rnams su rgyud lnga rnams// bya ba la sogs bla med mthar// bzhugs pa de ltar du ni ci// rab tu
81a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'am mi gnas pa'o/ / sems can bsgral ba byas nas ni// rab tu gnas pa rgyud kun tu'o// gang tshe lhag mos rnal 'byor ma'i// rgyud du gnyis med rab tu gnas// las dang las bya gnyis byas
81a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'on kyang rang gi rig pa can// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes che// rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid lha// rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin las// rab gnas de ni rab tu bsngags// skye bo rnams la snying brtse
81a7(rgyud 'bum): bas gzhan yang de bzhin rab smra bya/ / yang dag ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi// lha yi rnam par dag pa'o// bdun cu rtsa gnyis phyag rnams ni// rgyad dag par ni rnam par brjod// phyag bzhi rgod pa la sogs
81b1(rgyud 'bum): brda bzhi po rnams ni dag par 'dod/ / zhal rnams dag pa'i dngos po ni// lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub bcu drug/ bcu bdun pa'i zhal yid du bshad// srid dang mya ngan 'das zhabs gnyis// thams cad
81b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyi dag pa ni/ / chos dang chos pa'i skye rnams so// lhag ma 'jig rten khams kyi ni// rnam dag gsal dang mi gsal ba'o// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dag pa yang // theg pa thams cad don ston pa'o// /
81b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+ma sogs thams cad// 'dir ni mngal skyes brjod pa po'o// dkyil 'khor dag pa thams cad kyang // chos bsdus ston pa po yin no// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam dag pa// 'khor lo sgyur ba bcu
81b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis so/ / cha shas bcu drug rnams kyi bar// dur khrod dag par shes par bya// rgyud gang bdag las byung ba de// thams cad dag par shes par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes can thams cad// de yi dag
81b5(rgyud 'bum): pa mngon brjod pa'o/ / rdzas 'du shes nyid dang ye shes// so so'i ye shes smra rnams kyi// ming brjod pa yi dag pa ni// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do// sgyu ma lta bu skye 'gro kun// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
81b6(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma'i ngo/ / gsungs pa rang gis rig ye shes// gang dang der ni mngon brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i grub mtha'i mtshan nyid ni// bla ma'i zhal las kun shes bya// man ngag gis ni bgrod bzhin pa// so so mtshams la bde/
81b7(rgyud 'bum): ba che de tshe'i dus su dag pa gang // sangs rgyas spyod yul las de dag/ de phyir rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang // bde ba 'dod la 'byung bar 'gyur// yi ge re rer btags pa las// dngos po'i gzugs kyi de dag
82a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ phag mo'i gsang sngags nyid bshad pa// dngos po thams cad de'i dag pa'o// dbang po dang yul mi bden par// ro mnyam de nyid sbyor rnams kyi// chos kyi sku can dag par 'gyur//
82a2(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni longs spyod rdzogs sku can// sems ni sprul pa'i sku yi ste// lus ni lhan skyes sku can no// dri med la sogs slar yang der// bzhi rnams kyi yang dag par 'dod// go cha'i sngags kyi ngag chen ni// rnal
82a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa kun gyi spyod pa'o/ / snying po dang ni nye snying du// kha sbyor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o// 'byung dang 'byung las byung 'dus pa// gtor ma'i sngags kyi dag par 'gyur// gnod mdzes sngags kyi dag pa
82a4(rgyud 'bum): gang / rnam rtog kun la phur 'debs pa'o// sna tshogs las kyi dag pa gang // de yi dag pa don dam can// khams thams cad kyi lha rnams ni// pags dang sha sogs dag par 'jug 'dir mang smras pas ci
82a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / bde ba thams cad rnam dag pa'o// gang gang dbang po'i lam rnams su// gang gdangade de'i rang bzhin gyis// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin mnos// dag pa
82a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshon du shes bya ste/ / gzhan gyi dag pa mi smra'o// dbang phyug la sogs lta bar ni// mdor bsdus dag par shes par bya// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du// de ni 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// byang chub
82a7(rgyud 'bum): lam du gnas pa gang / / gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po can// de yis ma rig mngon skyon gyis// dbang phyug la sogs su blta'o// de phyir rang gis rig rang bzhin// rnam dag 'di ni bshad pa yin// dpa' bo
82b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
82b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dang de bzhin du rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de
82b3(rgyud 'bum): nas phyag rgya lhan cig skyes/ / byed rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// mi phyed ma sogs rtsa rnams la'ang // bzhi yis lhag pa bshad pa yin// mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma// bzang mo g.yon ma g.yon phyogs
82b4(rgyud 'bum): ma rus sbal skyes ma sgom pa mo/ / dbang ma skyon ma non ma ma// spyi ma dang ni rgyu sbyin ma// dngos ma su ma na de bzhin// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a wa d+hU tI spro ba'i ngag/ pra ba na dro ma grub ma dang // rgan mo skye bo kun
82b5(rgyud 'bum): mthun ma/ / 'dar ba mo dang snying po ma// ngang pa sum skor 'don ma klu// gtum mo bdud kyi bu mo dang // zla ba nyi ma me rA hUM// sum cu rtsa drug rtsa rnams la// re re la ni bcu gnyis te// thams cad dbye bas phye ba mi/
82b6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa'o// sor mo gcig ni bstan bya ste// de yi sor mo gnyis bstan bya// 'og dang steng du mnyam par mi// slar yang mthe bong bstan par bya// 'di rnams rtsa ni thams cad rnams//
82b7(rgyud 'bum): 'og dang steng du mnyam rengs pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pas 'gro bya mchog/ sna tshogs rim pas shes par bya// de yi mthe'u chung rab bstan bya// de dang yang dag gnas byed pa'o// gang gi ming med ston pa ni// de yi
83a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu ston pa ster/ / rdo rje nyi ma he ru ka/ brkyang ma snying ka'i pad+mar ro// gang gi sdigs mdzub ston pa na// gung mo rab tu bstan par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba steng du
83a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phang bar bya/ / gang gi pral ba ston pa na// de yi dar dpya rab bstan bya// rang gis rig pa'i bde ba der// phyag rgya dang bcas 'ching bar 'gyur// gang gi 'khor lo ston pa na// de yi sa gzhi rab bstan bya//
83a3(rgyud 'bum): / gtsug tor dang ni lter 'gro ba// lag pa gnyis kyis rengs byar bya// gang gi mig ni ston pa na// de yi me long rab bstan bya// lha rdzas dbang po rnams kyi rgyus// 'od gsal ba ni mthong bar 'gyur//
83a4(rgyud 'bum): gang gi lto bar rdeg byed pa// de yi lte ba rab bstan bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// rnam shes brgyad po snang bar 'gyur// gang gi nam mkha' ston pa na// de yi nyi ma rab bstan bya// stong nyid snying
83a5(rgyud 'bum): rje yang dag par/ / rtsa yi rnal 'byor nyid kyis mthong // gang gi khro gnyer ston pa na// de yi mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya// bdag nyid yang dag sbyor rol cing // rang gis rjes su myong ba shes// gang gi
83a6(rgyud 'bum): / chu bo ston pa na// de yi rgya mtsho rab bstan bya// sa gcig gi ni rab 'byor pas// thams cad sar ni rab tu bsngags// gang gi pus mo ston pa na// de yi rkang pa rab bstan bya// bde 'gror 'gro ba'i dus su
83a7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ dbang po'i dngos po de 'gro'o// gang gi nu ma ston pa na// de yi gdan ni rab bstan bya// bde ba longs spyod bdag nyid skyes// kun nas srid pa 'dzag par du'o// gang gi dpung pa ston pa na// de yi
83b1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa rab bstan bya/ / 'bar ba dbyug pa bzhin snang la// bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsreg par bya// gang gi brla ni ston pa na// de yi gsang ba rab bstan bya// gzhu yi dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i srog/ dbus ma
83b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams su'ang thim pa'o/ / gang gi lce ni ston pa na// de yi rkan ni rab bstan bya// gtum mo thams cad rtsa ru ni// bsdus nas rnam par gnas pa yin// gang gi mchu ni ston pa na// de yis kos sko rab
83b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan bya/ / thams cad chos nyid brjod med pa// dbang po kun gyi dran pa bral// gang gi sor mo'i rtse ston pa// de yi sen mo rab bstan bya// srid pa'i rtse mor bde ba'i gzugs// gcod par nges par mthong
83b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / gang gi sgra ni ston pa na// de yi 'phreng ba rab bstan bya// g.yo can sems can gyi ni sde// ye shes gzugs can du blta'o// gang gi spyi gtsug ston pa na// de yi rkang mtheb rab bstan bya// nor
83b5(rgyud 'bum): bu'i skud pa bzhin du srog/ dbu mar 'ong ba mthong bar 'gyur// gang gi mgrin pa ston pa na// de yi skye ba rab bstan bya// spyi blugs bdu rtsi ji lta bar// pad+mar skye 'gro thams cad mthong // gang gis nyi ma
83b6(rgyud 'bum): ston pa na/ / de yi nam mkha' bstan par bya// snying ka las byung 'jig rten kun// mchog tu zag med las shes 'gyur// gang gi sa ni ston pa na// rkang pa'i mthil ni rab bstan bya// pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i
83b7(rgyud 'bum): chu yis ni/ / bdud rtsi'i myu gu 'dzag par 'gyur// gang gi mur gongs ston pa na// de yi mkhur ba rab bstan bya// sems can kun gyi rtsa rnams kyis// nus pas nam mkha'i gnas rnams su'o// gang
84a1(rgyud 'bum): gi ling ga ston pa na/ / de yi rlig pa rab bstan bya// 'gyur med 'gyur bar 'gro 'gyur ba// de ni rlig mtshams phyag rgya skyes// gang gi spyi blugs ston pa na// ri bo de yi rab bstan bya//
84a2(rgyud 'bum): ri las thur du chu bo bzhin// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig rna bar reg/ rgyab kyi rgyud ni rab bstan bya// gang gis lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub// thos pa'i spyod yul du 'thob
84a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang gis gos ni ston pa na// de yi tshon rtsi rab bstan bya// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du// skad cig gis ni bdag med mthong // gang zhig so yis mchu 'dzin pa// so ni krig krig bstan par bya//
84a4(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba thams cad med pa nyid// bag chags stobs kyis rnam par 'phel// gang gi lce ni bskyod pa na// za ba'i lag pa rab bstan bya// bde ba kun gyis tshim pa ni// don yod pa las 'thob par 'gyur// gang
84a5(rgyud 'bum): gi lag pa'i mkhrig ma ston/ / de yi thal gong rab bstan bya// srog gi rlung rnams la rdung ba// bum can 'khrul 'khor sogs kyis so// gang gi rtsib logs ston pa na// de yi mchan khung rab bstan bya// nang du
84a6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig skyes pa dang / / snying rje la yang reg pa'o// gang gi lag pa'i dbus reg pa// lag pa'i rgyab ni bstan par bya// bdag gis gzhan dang rang gi dus// mchog ma kye he mi shes pa'o// gang gi dgod pa ston pa
84a7(rgyud 'bum): na de yi ngu ba rab bstan bya/ / mchog tu gnyis med zhugs pa las// 'dod chags 'dod chags bral ba'ang nyams// gang gis gar ni ston pa na// de yi glu ni rab bstan bya// khams gsum thams cad sgyu ma
84b1(rgyud 'bum): ru gnyis kyi dngos po las mthong 'gyur/ / gang gi keng rus ston pa na// de yi rtse mo rab bstan bya// rtsa gsum po ni 'bar ba yis// 'chi ba slu bar 'ong ba yin// de ltar phyag rgya sum cu drug/ phyag rgya'i
84b2(rgyud 'bum): lan ni de bzhin mchog/ spun dang sring mor spyod pa ni// rdo rje'i 'khor lor shes par bya// rab gtum rigs kyi bdag mor ni// gnas kyi gtso mor shes par bya// rab tu gsal ba'i mthar gyur gzugs//
84b3(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'byung bar 'gyur// ji srid gnyis su med spyod yul// g.yo ba'i chos kyang shes par bya// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor 'dus// rab gtum yi ges
84b4(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / thams cad bud med sgyu ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya kun gyis 'dun pa yi// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rang bzhin du// gsungs pa'i rang bzhin ma lus pa// de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang par 'dod// phyag rgya'i
84b5(rgyud 'bum): brda ni ma lus pa/ / rnal 'byor ma bskyed mtshan nyid do// sngon bshad chung ngu'i bde mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngags 'di tham cad rnal 'byor
84b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / mkha' 'gro ma sogs bcu gnyis kyis// dus sbyor chu srin la sogs te// rab gtum la sogs nyi shu bzhi// dus de rnams su 'byung ba yin// skad cig yud tsam la sogs pas// thams cad kyi
84b7(rgyud 'bum): ni 'pho ba gcig/ shin tu phra dang rags rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyi dus kyis ni// lor 'gyur ba yi tshad kyis ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor ma rnams rtsis// kha ra sogs su dus byas nas// ldog pa gnyis dag
85a1(rgyud 'bum): gis ni mtshon/ / gnyis dag bcu yis bsgre byas la// lo yi chu tshod de bzhin no// brgyad cu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i brgya// chu tshod lnga la shes par bya// nyi ma gcig gi tshad kyang ni// nam mkha' mig
85a2(rgyud 'bum): dang lag pa mig/ zla ba gcig gi tshad kyang ni// mkha' mkha' ro dang dus tshod do// lo gcig gi ni tshad kyang ni// mkha' stong mig dang bug de bzhin// mkha' 'gro ma kun shes par bya// gsang sngags kha sbyor
85a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid de/ / rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyi ni yang // rkang pa gnyis gnyis mnyam par ni// rnal 'byor ma yi rkang pa gcig/ de rnams las ni lhag gyur gang // hUM phaT la sogs spang bar bya// oM tri Na b+hU maH
