85a4(rgyud 'bum): ba shrI na ba kaM dz+wa ya DA kaM ka pA ma ba hA Ne bI ya rA hUM bI hUM rI phaT shwa ra phaT ya swA hUM hA hUM pra tsaN+De hUM sU phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni sngags so// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// skra grol 'jigs par mdzad pa mo// lha
85a5(rgyud 'bum): mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ / lhag ma sngon bshad mtshan nyid ni// lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni// slar yang rtag tu rgya mtsho mnyam// rab mchog bde ba thob pa na// dgos pa mang po yang dag rig/ ye shes zla
85a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rang bzhin du/ / 'di ni 'char dang nub pa yin// tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i 'od gzugs gang // 'od zer mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// 'od zer zhes bya rab bcing ba'ang // ye shes 'bab par rab tu nus// ri mo'ang
85a7(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbus rnams su/ / bgrod bya rang gi ma las skyes// de ltar rab gtum ma'i yon tan// rab mchog la sogs su mtshon bya// dus thams cad du kun spyod pa// sngags las byung ba shes par bya//
85b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dngos grub rgyu yis ni// 'du ba rnal 'byor mar rab gsungs// dngos grub rmi lam du ster ma// stes na dus kyis shes par bya// las ni gang dang gang 'dra ba// de dang de 'dra'i 'bras bu ste// rgyu dang 'bras
85b2(rgyud 'bum): bu'i 'brel nyid pas/ / rang nyid rnal 'byor pas skyes 'gyur// rgyu med cing ni 'bras bu med// mngon sum mngon sum min de bzhin// 'di 'dra'i bden pa smra rnams kyi// tshad ma'i bstan bcos las shes
85b3(rgyud 'bum): bya dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i
85b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rab tu gtum mo bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i brda yis gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i spyod yul gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
85b5(rgyud 'bum): drug pa'o/ / // de nas gtum mig ma'i phyag rgya// rgyud gzhan na med bshad par bya// mig gi brdar ni shes bya ste// 'di thams cad kyang kha sbyar yin// btsums pa dang ni ma btsums
85b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mnyam dang g.yon dang g.yas 'gro dang // gyen du bskyod dang sna rtser dang // sar lha dngos po'i mig can dang // khro dang zhum dang mthun bud med// bu dang gnyen dang spun rnams dang // gti mug zhe sdang
85b7(rgyud 'bum): chags drag dog/ skyon dang nga rgyal cher rlom dang // 'dod dang snying rje glen pa dang // sgyu mar lha dang ring du lha// 'gro dang bsam gtan phyed phye dang // thams cad phye dang dga' ba dang // chang dang nang dang gsu
86a1(rgyud 'bum): ngo dang / / chos dang bcas par lta ba mchog/ gal te sum cu drug lta ba// 'di nyid rnal 'byor mas ster na// de nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i lan// rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtag sbyin pa// me long chu dang
86a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / / ral gri mar me mthe bong dang // nam mkha' pad+ma ku mu da// mda' dang zla ba nyi ma dang // nor bu mu tig byi ru dang // bzhu ba'i gser dang 'dra ba dang // 'bar ba grib ma ras bal dang // bla ma rta
86a3(rgyud 'bum): glang sa ra b+ha/ / gar dang skrag dang 'dar ba dang // 'khrig pa rtsod smra nye bar dang // gtor ma ri mo dkyil 'khor dang // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// gsad pa dang ni bskrad rnams kyis// lha ba ru ni bshad
86a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / brda ni sum cu rtsa drug po// ji lta'i rim pas sbyin par bya// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yin te// de rnams dgos pa bshad par bya// zla ba'i rgyu bar son pa'i srog/ g.yon par rgyu ba yi ni mchog/ sum cu
86a5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa drug sems 'bab pa/ / de rnams ngo bor shes par bya// mig gi phyag rgya gang 'dra bar// de 'dra'i srog ni rgyu bar bya// mgo la sogs pa'i tshigs kun tu// rtsa rnams gnas ni bsgrub byas nas// mi phyed
86a6(rgyud 'bum): ma sogs steng 'og tu/ / der ni blta ba chen po bya// de ltar bdun cu gnyis shes bya// phun sum tshogs kun thob par 'gyur// gtum mig rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo// sdang ba tshar gcod mdzad ma yin//
86a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub phyogs kyi chos su yang // rnal 'byor ma kun shes 'gyur ba// gtum mig rnal 'byor ma rtag tu// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nyid// gtum mo'i rnam par rtog kun la// mig gi lta ba za ba
86b1(rgyud 'bum): yin ga yo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin no/ / sems gcig tu ni 'ching ba yin// rba tsa' ste spyod 'jig rten du// 'joms pa phyag rgya mkha' 'gro ste// kun rdzob dang ni don dam pa// longs med par ni gnyis
86b2(rgyud 'bum): med byed/ / gnyis med mig ni 'dir de nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni snang ba byed// rtsa rnams thams cad rab tu ston// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// tshul
86b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di bsgom par bya ba yin/ / gtum mig ma ni thabs ldan pa// sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can// de yi tshum ma mngon brjod pas// thams cad byang chub rang bzhin can// sngags kyi yi ge las skyes pa//
86b4(rgyud 'bum): kun spyod rtsa yi bdag nyid can// de yi ji ltar kha dogs thugs// rab gtum rnal 'byor ma yi'o// oM sa daM taSh+To sarbA Ta pra b+hI ne Sha tra NA ya b+he hUM bA pha ya Ta hUM Ta pa swA Ta hA phaT swA hA/ oM tsaN+Da k+ShI ye hUM hUM phaT
86b5(rgyud 'bum): phaT swA hA/ gang ba'i ri yi gnas su yang // rab tu gtum mo dus kun skyes// zla ba nya la dpral ba ru// ri bo chen por zla ba 'char// 'bar ba 'dzin par gtum mig ma// rA hu yis ni zas su byas// chos
86b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu ni yang dag bshad/ / nyi ma'i rjes 'gror nges bshad pa'o// de ltar rnal 'byor ma re re'i// rang gi zhing du ming rgya che// re re yi yang nyi shu bzhi// slar yang gnas dang nye gnas so// bsam gtan sngags
86b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bzlas pa'ang med/ / yi ge las byung spangs pa yin// dus dang dus min ngo bo'i bdag/ hUM phaT yi ges 'dod par gyis// yi ge las byung ba'i gzugs kyi// he yi rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'byung // spun gyi spyod par
87a1(rgyud 'bum): tsum pa gang / / 'jug dang ldog par byed pa mo// snying ka'i 'khor lor shes bya ste// mig gi rang bzhin can snying kha// snying khar gnas rang rnal 'byor ma// gtum mo lte ba'i steng nas
87a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya
87a3(rgyud 'bum): mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gtum mig ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya dang bdag po'i rang bzhin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de
87a4(rgyud 'bum): nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ / ji lta'i tshogs badz+ra'i yig go// rnal 'byor 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las// shes nas myur du nges par grol// rA dA li ka/ nA ma dang naM bi Shiti/ rA dzi kA/ ba rba ki pi Ta ka TI/ kun
87a5(rgyud 'bum): dA ru ka pU ra/ si wa kaM/ swa yaM b+ha/ kam+bu ri kA/ tso sa ma/ bo lA/ kak+ko laM/ kA liny+dza raM/ shA li bI raM/ a d+ya kaM/ pi dra ba naM/ b+heny+dza naM/ mA la ta na d+ha naM/ rat+na sam+b+ha baM/ go/ ku rbadaHha ran/ bimUr+tha shuHra
87a6(rgyud 'bum): maHde ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ / de bzhin dpa' bo spun rnams brda// rnal 'byor ma de'i dgongs pa ni// kha yis rjod pa byed par 'gyur// skyes bu rnal 'byor ma bud med// changashaT lce rdzab tu
87a7(rgyud 'bum): brda cang te'u/ bud med kyi/ mkhris pa/ khu ba/ khrag sha las skyes/ khrag/ bud med kyi gcin/ bshang ba/ ling ga/ pad+ma/ 'dus pa 'am/ skal ldan/ skye gnyis kyi sha/ shi ba'i ro// rgyal
87b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i skyes bu/ dur khrod nya'i sha/ bya'i sha/ g.yul ngo'i khrag/ ba lang / khyi glang po che rta rnga mi rnga bshang ba/ gci ba/ khu ba/ khrag/ rkang dmar/ de ltar yang ni brda yi lan// sngags pas rtag
87b2(rgyud 'bum): tu shes par bya/ / rnal 'byor dngos po shes rnams kyi// dus rnams kun tu bskyed pa ni// sprul pa sems can sgrol ba po// zhing dang zhing du skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni zhu ba'i khams// sum cu rtsa//
87b3(rgyud 'bum): drug grangs kyang ni// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' dang ni ye shes khams// de'i yang khams ni drug drug 'gyur// mngon pa'i gzugs sogs shes mthar ro// nges par bshad don smra ba po'i//
87b4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi ni brdar shes bya// re re'i bar du lha mo ni// 'od ldan ye shes gzugs can no// sum cu rtsa drug khams rnams kyi// 'char ba'i dus mtha' mkha' spyod ma// ye shes 'od zer de bsgrubs
87b5(rgyud 'bum): nas bde ba kun gyi gnas la bzhugs/ / gos kyi mtha' nas bzung nas ni// gnad dang gnang du rtse bar bya// ye shes kun rdzob spangs pa las// sgom pa'ang rnam rtog bdag nyid do// rdo rjes 'og sbyor
87b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid/ / rtsa thams cad ni gzhig par bya// rnon por bsreg pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// mkhas pas 'od ldan yi ge'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ste// oMrlan gnas su de bzhin du'o// dkyil 'khor
87b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ / lha yi bdag mo mchog bsgom bya// gsang sngags bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sna tshogs yi ge rnams dbus son// sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni// shes rab thabs kyi bdag
88a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid nyid/ / oM kaM bi kA da la yu la mA ta la dzaM b+ha ha ra bA na ya oM hUM grA hUM pha ya Ta hUM Ta pha sA Ta hA phaT swA hA/ oM pra b+hA wa tI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ kha dog gzugs ni sngon bzhin no//
88a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi 'od kyis rnal 'byor 'grub// oM yig phyi mo 'byung ba'i bdag/ srog gi rlung ni bskyod cing spong // skar ma'i bdag po kun mkhyen rnams// dbang po sogs kyi'ang spangs pa yin// ya yig dang ni a
88a3(rgyud 'bum): yig gzugs/ / rkang pa'i mtha' dang mgo bo can// nA da tsam la thams cad brten// rang byung chos brjod pa yin no// de ltar yi ge bzhi rnams ni// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang yin// mi ni yid de'i cha'i ye
88a4(rgyud 'bum): shes de yod pas ni dpyod pa ste/ / 'jig rten dbus dang sa la ni// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas spyod lam byed// yon tan kun gyi 'khor lor yang // thar pa'i rgyu yis ster bar 'gyur// yon tan kun bdag stong
88a5(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid 'khor bar 'di las thabs gzhan med/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
88a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'od ldan ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor
88a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gtso bo/ / mtshon cha'i brda ni bshad bya ste// sna chen ma yis rab sbyor bas// srog dang rtsol ba'i rang bzhin can// 'di la dril bu phub mche ba// gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga pau ti//
88b1(rgyud 'bum): phub chung dang ni sdigs mdzub dang // g.yer ka'i 'phreng dang lcags zag dang // brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni// mdung dang rnga dang pags rlon dang // skra yi thag pa spangs pa dang // ro sreg bskul ba'i shing dang ni//
88b2(rgyud 'bum): ga ta'i dbyug pa phub dang mgo/ keng rus dang ni zor ba nyid// mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang // spen pa yi ni phur bu dang // sa bon gang dang sog le dang // khab dang skud bshus pags pa dang // sprin char 'bab/
88b3(rgyud 'bum): dang shing lcags kyu// de ltar rnal 'byor ma ster na// phyag rgya'i lan du brjod bya ba// rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang // rtse gsum dgra sta gri gug mda'// gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo cang te'u chu
88b4(rgyud 'bum): gri dang / / dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig/ dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu gsum// der ni rma bya'i mjug ma dang // bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni// me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbyug thung me long pi wang dang // rkang
88b5(rgyud 'bum): mgo lag mgo glo ba dang / / sgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang // gdos dang skogs dang nya rgya dang // mgo med mar nag 'bar ba dang // 'jigs byed gzugs can zhes bya ba// phyag rgya'i lan du mngon brjod
88b6(rgyud 'bum): yin rlung gi rang bzhin ma lus pa/ / de'i rigs rnal 'byor ma'i khyim du'o// gang dang gang gi phyag rgya'i dbyibs// de de rnal 'byor ma yi lus// de yi rang bzhin rjes gzung ngam// tshar gcod pa yang
88b7(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur/ / stong pa nyid ni bco brgyad dang // khyad par du yang snying rje dang // sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres dang // de bzhin du ni khams bco brgyad// rnal 'byor ma yi rgya mtshan nyid// skye bo thams cad
89a1(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / sna chen ma yi rab sbyor bar// rang gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin// 'byung po thams cad kyi ni ma// mngon par sna tshogs nor bu bzhin// hA yig skyod pa'i nA da'i bdag/
89a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin kha 'og bltas par 'phyang // nA dar gnas pa'i skud pa yang // de gzugs gnyis med 'phreng ba can// sgrub thabs man ngag sbyor bdag nyid// dbyangs dang gsal byed las sngon byung // chos dang
89a3(rgyud 'bum): las dang dam tshig dang / / phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin can// yi ge bzhi yi rtog pa las// phyag rgya bzhi mngon brjod nyid do// gnas ni ar bu dar shes bya// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang de bzhin// lha rdzas
89a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa/ / nam mkha'i 'khor lor grags pa yin// sum cu bdun bdag nyid de yi// bdag mo sna chen ma yin no// sna yi thog ma tha mar dbug/ 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba can// dbus
89a5(rgyud 'bum): su mtshon bya mtshan nyid bral/ / rnal 'byor ma kun rtse bar 'gyur// nu baM la ni dbyangs can 'gro// dbus su gang gang 'bab pa mo// gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis// srog dang thur sel can 'dzin pa'o//
89a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes brda ru shes byas nas// mtshon cha de yang gzhom par bya// gang du sems ni gtong ba na// der ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dpag bya// ye shes ma yi mngal nyid du// thams cad du ni rnam par dpyad//
89a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// 'dir ni slar yang bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni// gsang sngags yi ge rnams las byung // mdog dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi ste// 'jigs byed
89b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo nag mo can/ / oM dza ko bA Ti lA la bak+Sha lI b+hu d+ha dz+wa la ya ga hUM nA hUM ya pha hUM Ta hUM Ta swA pha hA Ta swA hA/ oM hoHoM ma hA nA se hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i gsang sngags las rdzogs pa// 'dod pa
89b2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rang bzhin can/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro
89b3(rgyud 'bum): / rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sna chen ma'i mtshan nyid kyi brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas lus kyi ts+tsha ma ni// mdzes
89b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya/ / dpa' bo blo gros ma'i sbyor bas// lha rdzas lus skyes 'thob par 'gyur// mgo dang spyi gtsug dpral ba dang // g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rna ba dang // rgyab kyi rgyud dang dpung
89b5(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis/ / sna dang smin ma mig dang kha// rkan dang snying kha lag pa dang // mchan khung nu ma rtsib logs dang // lte ba mdoms dang 'phongs ling ga/ brla dang pus mo byin rkang pa// sor mo mtheb chen
89b6(rgyud 'bum): long bu dang / / rkang pa'i mthil du thams cad du// rlig pa lag pa glang po'i pags// mkhrig ma dpral ba'i ngos dang ni// mtshams dang lto bar shes bya ste// rtag tu rnal 'byor mas ster na// phyag rgya'i
89b7(rgyud 'bum): lan gyur rnal 'byor pas/ / ji lta'i rim pa sbyin bya ba// gling bu pi wang 'khar rnga dang // glu rnga rdza rnga rol mo dang // 'phreng ba sgeg pa gar zangs dung // spos dang dri dang lha bshos dang // 'bras bu ma chag 'bras
90a1(rgyud 'bum): dang snod/ / zhabs bsil mchod yon mar me phul// gos dang me long gdugs dang ni// bla re rnga yab de bzhin du// ba dan me tog 'phreng ba dang // rgyal mtshan dang ni dri gtsang khang /
90a2(rgyud 'bum): mdung thung 'phreng ba 'phreng phyed dang // slar yang dril chung dra ba dang // seng ge'i gdan dang cod pan dang // rin chen sna tshogs de bzhin no// go dA ba ri'i nye gnas bzhugs// dad pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin
90a3(rgyud 'bum): can dpa' blo ma yi rab sbyor bas/ / phyag rgya thams cad rab tu bshad// lhan skyes skas kyis bI zhes bya// sum cu drug dngos bdag nyid can// phung po khams dang yul dang ni// dbang po las dang las
90a4(rgyud 'bum): can te/ / yul gyi sgra ni de bzhin 'dir// kun la drug drug rim ji bzhin// de rnams nang du song ye shes// lhan skyes gzhan gyi dngos po min// mtshan mo nyin mo'i rab sbyor bas// shes rab thabs kyi
90a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid do/ / lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma de rnams// sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye// dam tshig chen po 'dus pa ni// pad+ma'i lte bar rig par bya// de las skyes pa'i rang phyag rgya// yul dang yul du rnam par
90a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ rang rig rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba// 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul yin// 'jig bzhin pa ni chen po nyid/ bcu gnyis mi rnams nang du son// rdo rje'i rlung ni rab zhugs pa'i// der ni kun dur rnal 'byor
90a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes 'od zer slong ba'i bde ba yi/ / 'pho med rnams kyis bgrod par byos// de ltar go dA ba ri shes byas nas// dad pa'i dbang po'i rdo rje tsam// dpa' blo ma yi rang bzhin shes// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi
90b1(rgyud 'bum): gtso mo yin/ / sum cu bdun bdag nyid rdo rjer// rang ming gsang sngags ldan par ro// sna tshogs rnam rtog zas can ni// lhan skyes brtson 'grus ming gis so// oM ka pA la ru pA ShAM ta yA d+hu sho ma d+ya ru ta gra shA
90b2(rgyud 'bum): ba lA pu ya ShA hUM ya hUM hUM phaT hUM phaT huM phaT swA phaT hA phaT/ oM bI ra ma tI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ kha dog dang dbyibs sngon gyi ru// rnal 'byor ma kun gyi ni bya// gang phyir brtson 'grus yang dag 'pho// mngon par
90b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa yang dag 'byung / / nam mkha' lding gi sbyor ldan pas// 'dir ni the tsom med par byed// sngon du bstan pa'i ts+tsha ma ka/ mchog gi lce ru shes par bya// phyag rgya'i lan ni gzhan med de// lan gyi lce ni dbang
90b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi'o/ / sna tshogs rgyud dang lung rnams su// nga yis khyod la mang bshad do// rgyud 'di yi ni rab sbyor ba// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ma rig pa dang sdang sems dang // skye bo rmongs gang yul spyod
90b5(rgyud 'bum): na/ sangs rgyas nyid ni mi 'thob cing // nges par dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur// de phyir gus pa'i sems bdag gis// bya ba gus pas legs rig bya// sngon gyi rmongs pa med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid
90b6(rgyud 'bum): 'thob yun mi ring / / mos pas rgyun du gzhol gyur pas// tshe dang nad med 'phel ba yin// rlung gi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma// stobs ldan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma// rdo rje'i rlung dbyer rab ldan pas//
90b7(rgyud 'bum): sems chen por ni thim par 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
91a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi ming zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu ba'o//
91a2(rgyud 'bum): / khams thams cad kyi ts+tsha ma ka/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// gang zhig dri med dngos po'i brda// bshad kyis sgrub mo mnyan par gyis// so yi mchu ni yongs bzung nas//
91a3(rgyud 'bum): bde bas po la 'jib par byed// phyi nas ye shes rab ston pa'i// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so// phyi mo'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis// bcu po gsum la drug ldan pa'i// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// 'di las
91a4(rgyud 'bum): / dngam tshig dbye bar bya// ka kha ga g+ha nga kaM/ tsa tsha dza dzA nya tsa// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na TaM// ta tha da d+ha na ta// pa pha ba b+ha ma paM// ya ra la wa ha yaM// zhes bya rnal 'byor mas ster na// phyag rgya'i lan ni slar yang 'di// kA khA
91a5(rgyud 'bum): / gA g+hA dA kaMHtsA tshA dz+nyA dz+nyA ny+dza tsaH/ nA ShA DA rnA NA TaHtA thA dA dz+nyA nA taHpA pA dA b+hU mA paHyA rA lA wA hA yaHde ltar phyag rgya'i khyud shes nas// lus can kun gyi sgo glegs yin// bu ga gnyis kyi rab sbyor ba/
91a6(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad kyang ni yi gaM 'dra// 'og dang steng du 'dus byas nas// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gnyis med// skad cig bzhi yi bden rnams kyis// de nyid dga' ba bzhi bzhin// sde pa bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi//
91a7(rgyud 'bum): / e baM ma yA sku rnams ni// rgyud 'dir mdo ru bstan pa ste// rgyas bshad gzhan du rtogs dran bya// mi'u thung ma yi rab sbyor bas// cho ga sngags pas shes par bya// nam mkha' dang mnyam sgo glegs 'phreng //
91b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' spyod ma ru spyod pa rang // ngag kyang skad kyi rang bzhin bdag/ 'gog par nye bar 'gro bar gyis// gsang chen sems dang sems byung rnams// mtha' ma gsal bar mthong ba yis// rin chen rdo rje las
91b2(rgyud 'bum): dga'i gzugs/ / bltas pa'i mtshams su mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// bzhi po bzhi yi bdag nyid can// rA me shwa ra dang dbang por// mchog tu rmad byung shes par bya// 'dod
91b3(rgyud 'bum): chags chags bral rnams bsres pa/ / de yi skad cig las byung min// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid las// me ni dbus su bdud rtsi'i gnas// dbugs kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bde'i// de bzhin gshegs pa
91b4(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar bya/ / lha dang klu rnams bud med la// mkhas pa yis ni rol pa yin// de rnams kyis ni dus kun tu// lus can kun gyi 'pho ba yang // sgo dgu'i bdag nyid nam mkha' la// de rnams bzhi
91b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur 'du shes bya/ / de ltar sgo glegs gnas rnams ni// rtag tu sum cu rtsa drug 'gyur// sgo yi dbye ba mi shes la// skyon dang yon tan ji ltar lags// 'pho ba'i dus tshod kyi ni tshad// yang dag rab tu
91b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba nyon/ / mdzes pa'i gnas ni lam bzang pos// lam ngan gyis ni srid pa'i sbyor// thig le lte ba steng rnams la// mig dang sna dang rna ba dag/ bshang ba dang ni gci ba'i sgo// sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid do//
91b7(rgyud 'bum): lte bas 'dod pa'i mtho ris dang // thig les gzugs kyi lus can rnams// steng gis steng gi gnas kyi ni// 'gro dang 'ong bar rab tu grags// gnod sbyin dngos po sna las so// rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha/
92a1(rgyud 'bum): gal te mig nas ye shes bgrod// mi rnams mi bdag bsgyur rnams 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo yis yi dgas rnams// gci bas dud 'gro de bzhin no// dmyal ba brgyad kyi dngos rnams
92a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ lus can rnams ni bshad pa las// gzhan gyi sgo ni gsum gsum ste// mkhas pas rtsa yi kun spyod can// nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams kyang ni// smin drug la sogs rgyu skar ro// rnam dag ye shes gsum
92a3(rgyud 'bum): po ni/ re re'i sgo ma rnams kyi'o// brtson 'grus dbang po'i dngos rnams kyis// thams cad nyer spyod mtshan nyid do// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngon gyi mdog can bsgom par bya// rdo rje dkar mo
92a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs sa bon/ / sgo glegs gnas su gzhag par bya// shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// sa yi 'khor lo'i sbyor bas so// sngags kyi yi ge rnams su gyur pa ni// oM mA bi tri ka ga Ta Na mu ba khA ra hA pU hA ri ra
92a5(rgyud 'bum): / ta pA ma ya na tra hUM ya hUM hUM pha hUM Ta pha phaT Ta pha swA Ta hA swA hA oM kharba rI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags las yang dag byung // don dam sbyor ba las skyes pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//
92a6(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mi'u
92a7(rgyud 'bum): thung ma'i yi ge'i brda'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / / slar yang mchod pa byas nas ni// yang dang yang du zhus pa nyid// dngos po ye
92b1(rgyud 'bum): shes kyis phyag rgya/ / bcom ldan gtso bo ji ltar lags// bdag gis mtshan nyid bshad bya yis// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// lhan skyes bde dang stong pa dang // rang gis rig dang bde ba che// chos kyi sku dang
92b2(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rdzogs/ / sprul pa dang ni rmad byung che// 'od gsal sems dang bsam pa dang // zhi dang myang 'das sbyor skyes dang // pha rol phyin dang gnyis med dang // thar pa dang ni don dang dang // ye shes rnam shes
92b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub dang / / chos dbyings grong khyer de bzhin du// pad+ma dang ni chos 'byung dang // slar yang bdag med mtho ris dang // zhi dang sgra dang bla ma dang // rig dang 'khrul med rtog spangs dang // bcud len dang ni smra
92b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ / mkhas pas ts+tsham ma'i rnam grangs so// ji ltar de ltar yig dang po thams cad lan gyi ts+tsham ma yin// ji ltar yi ge de bzhin don// dmyal ba la sdang shes par bya// lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i sbyor
92b5(rgyud 'bum): pabar/ rnal 'byor pa khyod kyis bya'o// 'phyang bar gyur pa'i sa bon gyi// der ni ts+tsham ma thams cad de// ge sar ye shes khams kyi ni// rang gi rang bzhin du mtshan nyid// rang yod de mnyam rnal 'byor pa// pad+ma'i
92b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po ru ni gnas/ / ri ni rnam shes 'gro ba ste// yid kyis khams rnams thams cad du'o// lang kar bdag nyid skye ba ste// dngos po'i ye shes rnams kyis byung // dbang phyug 'byung po thams cad kyi// ye shes
92b7(rgyud 'bum): min pa dngos kun skyes/ / de bi ko Ta'i gnas su ste// slar yang byang chub dran dbang po// gang du ye shes bsam med pa// der ni bstan pas thos par 'gyur// 'dod chags bral bas gang dag gi/ bi ni kun 'gro
93a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes so/ / rlung rnams kyi ni mkhar rnams su// dbang po rnams kyi bde de bzhin// Ti ni rdo rje'i nus par grags// yul rnams kyi ni grong du bgrod// dran pa lhan cig skyes ye shes//
93a2(rgyud 'bum): gang du yid ni rab brjod pa// der ni dbang po'i byang chub kyang // shes nas rdo rje'i tshul bdag nyid// de ltar de nyid nges shes nas// rang gi rang bzhin du gnas bya// chos dang 'jig rten bcas pa spangs//
93a3(rgyud 'bum): cung zad ming med gzung bar bya// yang na dngos po kun bdag nyid// yang na thams cad rnam par spang // dngos dang dngos po can yod min// dngos po med pa gsal mthong 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rnam
93a4(rgyud 'bum): par grol/ / thams cad mi bden las skyes blta// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin zhal las// brgyud pa'i rim pas phrad par gyis// me yi dkyil 'khor du lha mo// de phyir de yi rang bzhin lus// sum cu bdun bdag nyid
93a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su/ / sngon gyi gzugs can bsgom par bya// thams cad thabs dang ldan par 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba'o// oM hUM sa hUM ha kA dza ro su ts+tshan+da ra rI nA ba mul+la khA b+ha ya ka hUM rA hUM ya phaT hUM phaT swA
93a6(rgyud 'bum): phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM leng+ge shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar shes byas gsang sngags che// dngos grub yang bas byed pa yin// las thams cad kyi rang bzhin te// brgyal na yang gzhan du min// dngos grub
93a7(rgyud 'bum): ri yi ming can ni/ / nyi shu rtsa brgyad sman du'o// smin drug dang ni snar ma 'gyur// mgo bo dang ni lag de bzhin// nab so dang ni rgyal nyid dang // skag dang mchu dang gzhan pa ni// shar gyi gre dang byang gi dbo// me
93b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / / sa ga dang ni lha mtshams dang // snron dang sbubs dang chu stod dang // chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dang // gro bzhin mon gru de bzhin du// mon gre dang ni khrums stod dang // khrums smad dang
93b2(rgyud 'bum): ni nam gru dang / / tha skar de bzhin pra nya dang // zla ba nyi ma rA hu dang // sa'i ma nyid dang spen pa rnams// rang rang dus nyid shes par bya// the tsom med pas gzung bas so// thams cad zla ba'i spyod bdag nyid//
93b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la ni mnyam par gnas// 'chad bzhin pa yi rab sbyor bas// sngags pas cho ga shes par bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha'
93b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ / bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i phyag cha'i brda'i
93b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid dang / / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang // ming gi cho ga'i ye shes kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // slar yang gzhan pa bshad bya ste// dgos dang /
93b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub po'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// zla ba nyi ma gzas gzung bar// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags mtshan nyid// po tam gi ni gsong por smra
93b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / pra ti po te gyi ni lan yin no// ga mu 'gro ba'o lum pa ni// 'ong ngo zhes ni bya ba nyid// de ha grong khyer ro ce zu gam zhes bya// zung zhig pa'o srid ya ni dpa' bo yin// ko ra ba ni song cig pa nyid do//
94a1(rgyud 'bum): kar+t+ti ka ni dril bu'o a li byed pa'o// shir 'khyil ba'i sgra yin te// sra ba Na rna ba'o gzhan pa ni// man tha na ni bdud rtsi ste// nar phrad pa'o tA li ka yang // mkha' 'gro ma'o na ra ka/
94a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor// a mu kaM ni dur khrod de// kA khi la sgo'o swa sa naM// bram ze'o pa ri rgyal po'i rigs// bi ra ti rje'u rigs kru ra ni// dmangs so an+ta gdol pa can// a li ka phyugs DA ki ni// sring mo'i
94a3(rgyud 'bum): mu da ka tshal/ / lce yis so reg de bzhin du// zas kyis ltogs par rig par bya// tre snA dri yis sgos pa ste// A gam na zhes bya gnas gang nas// che ge mo'o ka ri Na me tog go/ lam pa lto ba dan ta
94a4(rgyud 'bum): rgod pa ste/ / ni ro d+he char ro bi dz+nyA pa ti tshim pa'o// d+hu mra zhes bya sprin de bzhin// d+hu mra pri ya ri bo ste// sA nu sa ri ta chu klung // aM gu lnga ni cha shas te// ba da na rA dzaM ka l+ye// a d+ha ra po yin paM ka ti// rgyal
94a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan no tshan do 'phreng de bzhin/ / tsa la rlung ngo mri gA pa ti phyugs// maN+Da la ni mnyam pa ste// swA sa lam gyi bzhi mdor shes par bya// skye ba nga la gu shAm mo ma hA k+Sha raM ni// phyugs chen no tsA ni ra skyes so//
94a6(rgyud 'bum): na ni mi 'o ba ni glang yin no// ma ni ma he b+ha ni za ba ste// si ni seng ge b+ha ni stag de bzhin// sgra ni gnas pa'o kha la reg pa zos pa yin// so la reg pa tshim pa yin// hrI ka ngo che stong pa la reg pa// 'khrig
94a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o brla la reg pa ni/ / de ltar da ltar gyis zhes pa// mchog tu mthun ma shes par bya// 'dir ni dgos pa slar bshad pa// mkhas pa yi ni bsrub par bya// byed pa rnal 'byor mar shes bya// dpa' bo
94b1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu dgos pa'o/ / sna tshogs dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis// ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag/ bskyed pa srid pa'i sbyor ba dang // sbyor bral kun rdzob de bzhin du// sgyu ma mthun pa 'khor ba dang //
94b2(rgyud 'bum): brtse ba rang bzhin brtags pa dang // gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub dang // du ri yi 'khor lo sgom pa dang // sems dpa' byas dang tshul khrims dang // gtong ba brtul ba dpa' de bzhin// skar rtsis
94b3(rgyud 'bum): mkhan dang sman pa nyid/ / bzo dang khams dang smra ba po// lhag ma rten 'brel yan lag ni// bcu gnyis ma rig sogs shes bya// mA l+la ba yi nye gnas su// shing grib ma yi rab sbyor bas// ting 'dzin
94b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i phyogs rnams su/ / 'jug pa med dang 'jug pa mtshungs// dbang po 'dod chags chags bral dag/ yang dag phun sum tshogs bdag po/ mA ma kI rdo rje'i bu gar ni// spyi gtsug gnas
94b5(rgyud 'bum): su yongs gnas bya/ / 'phyang bzhin pa kha 'og tu ste// kam po ji yi phyag rgya'i tshul// ba ni yang dag rig pa'i rgyud// rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// de ltar byas dang ma byas kun// mkhas pas
94b6(rgyud 'bum): dbu mar mi snang ngo / / zhu ba'i dngos po'i ye shes 'dir// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sku can te// smig rgyu dang ni 'dra ba'i gzugs// bdag nyid gzugs can mthong bar 'gyur// ye shes shin tu bas g.yogs pa//
94b7(rgyud 'bum): kun 'gro ba yi lhar drar byas// gang 'dra'i snying rje gnyis byar med// de 'dra'i dngos por skyes dran bya// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngon can grags pa bsgom par bya// gsang sngags bden
95a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzung bdag nyid/ / chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus son pa'o// oM sa marba hA b+hU sh+ma ta shA saM na tA pri sa yA na ya ka hUM ra hUM ya pha hUM ya pa hUM Ta hUM pha phaT Ta swA pa hA Ta swA hA oM dru ma ts+tshe ye huM hUM/
95a2(rgyud 'bum): phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags gzugs bdag nyid du// kun tu 'gro ma can shes bya// mchod pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du// lhan skyes mdzes ma 'dus pa'o// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dngos bdag/ rnal 'byor
95a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' gtso bo yin/ / dbugs ni sba ba byas nas ni// slar yang oMR+Yan kun tu 'gro// sa gsum po yi ris su ni// gzugs kyi gtso mo bsgom par bya// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa'i dngos
95a4(rgyud 'bum): grub bsgom par bya/ / slar yang rdo rje phag mo yi// rnal 'byor pa yis rigs ldan mchod// lha rdzas mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas pa bas de mchog go// ma mo'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar// 'gro ba'i gtso bo/
95a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya// 'di 'dra'i dus kyi ye shes ni// mkhas pas a ba d+hU tI'i nang du'o// rnal 'byor pas bsgoms sems bdag nyid// stong pa nyid gzugs dmigs pa can// de yis thams cad rig byas
95a6(rgyud 'bum): nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang mtshan nyid/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
95a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ shing grib ma'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//
95b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab bdag che// phyag rgya yang dag rig pa'i gzugs// ji lta'i rigs pas bstan du gsol// phyag rgya bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// re re la ni dgu dgu ste// las
95b2(rgyud 'bum): dang chos dang dam tshig dang / / phyag rgya chen po bzhi pa yin// pad rtsa ltar dkar bud med gang // pad+ma'i dri ni gtong ba yin// pad+ma dang ni ut+pal dri// kha dog tsam pa ka yi yin// dzA ti dang ni tsam pa'i dri// de yi
95b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang mdog 'dzin ma'o/ / ga pur dang ni tsan dan dri// pad+ma dkar po'i pags can ma'o// ri dgas lte ba dang mnyam dri// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can ma'o// ut+pal sngo 'dab ljang ku la// dri ni de nyid
95b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis mtshon bya/ / mal+lI ka dang ut+pal dri// mu men dang ni mtshungs pa'o// ke ta ke yi dri shes bya// dmar po ban du ka lta bu'o// pA Ta li mal+li ka yi dri// slar yang nam mkha'i kha deg go// de ltar las kyi phyag
95b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyar 'gyur/ / chos kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya// bde gshegs tshogs pa la dga' ba// mthar skyes rnal 'byor ma mchog yin// bsam gtan bzlas la rgyun du dga'// bram ze mo ru rab tu bshad// rtag tu
95b6(rgyud 'bum): khrus dang gtsang sbra dga'/ / rje'u rigs kyi ni bud med do// rnam rtog med bdag nyid mi mo// rtul cing dpa' bo la rtse zhing // rgyal rigs kyi ni rang bzhin te// 'di ni mchog tu gtam dga' ma'o// las la yongs
95b7(rgyud 'bum): su rtsa ba ste/ / dmangs rigs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma'o// bde gshegs lus la rjes su chags// mchog tu mthun ma'i rnal 'byor ma'o// mkhas pa yi ni phyogs su gzhol// chos kyi gnas su khro med ma'o//
96a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo yi ni rigs su skyes// rtag par sha ni za ba yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam srung ma// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa byed// khro ba rnams la mi khro zhing // mnyes par
96a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i khur khyer ma'o/ / de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya ste// dam tshig phyag rgya mngon brjod bya// gtor ma mchod pa la dga' ma// dam tshig can du de mngon brjod// rab gnas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // don
96a3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa la dga' ma'o/ / 'gro ba rnams la dbang bskur ma// rnal 'byor dam tshig can mar grags// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing // rtag tu dam tshig skyong ma'o// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su//
96a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu rmad byung rtsen ma'o// dus thams cad du dga' dang bcas// rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhin byed ma'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams bu bzhin snang // rdo rje rnal 'byor mar de shes// dus kun tu ni dub med ma//
96a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha 'bebs pa'i ming can ma'o// mi mo rtag tu 'gro bzhin du// dam tshig brda ni skyong ma ste// de ltar dam tshig phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya chen po rab bshad bya// lhan skyes zhing skyes lha mo dang // sngags skyes
96a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon po ma/ / sbyor skyes gnas skyes de bzhin du// dam tshig lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma// pad can ma ni dus kun tu// phyag rgya chen po rab bsngags pa'o// de ltar phyag rgya'i rang bzhin te// de mngon
96a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul bdag phyag rgya'i lan/ / gang zhig gang gi mdog dang dri// de yi de ltar tshul dran bya// sa srungs ma yi rab sbyor bas// kA ma rU pa shes rab dbang // sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i phyir// phyag rgya 'di
96b1(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgrub par bya/ / e yig ye shes rlung rnams ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab zhugs// 'dod chags me yi rang bzhin bdag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje gsang ba las bzhengs rtsa// khams
96b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ma 'pho med ma'o/ / 'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas rnams// de dge sems can cha can no// sems ni re re la yang ni// sum cu rtsa drug las can ma'o// lus can gzugs ni des de bzhin// zhing
96b3(rgyud 'bum): du ka la sogs pa'i gzugs/ / chen po'i sngags kyi tshul bdag tu// sa la da ltar nyid rol 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs la yang // gzugs dang gzugs med shes mi 'gyur// gzhan gyi gzugs
96b4(rgyud 'bum): su byas lha mo/ / sangs rgyas lam ni shes byed ma'o// dbang po kun tu 'gro sangs rgyas// gang phyir shes rab pha rol phyin// de ltar de nyid nges shes pas// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs dang mtshungs// ye shes
96b5(rgyud 'bum): / 'khor lor lha mo rnams// bdag mo 'dod pa kun sbyin ma// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sngags kyi gzugs can du byung ba'o// oM dza ma nA hA ka kA lA la ya pA man+ta ku ga TA ni ya te hUM dza hAM ya phaH
96b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM swa pa hA Ta phaT swA hA/ oM ai rA pa tI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i sngags kyi sa bon du// mchog sbyin ma ni byung ba ste// kha dog dbyibs ni sngon gyi can// ji ltar kun nas thams cad du'o// dpa' bo tham
96b7(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
97a1(rgyud 'bum): po las/ sa srungs ma'i sku'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mes mchod byas nas// 'di skad
97a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni tshigs smras so/ / gang gis 'byung po thams cad sogs// mthong bas kun tu skrag pa yi// thams cad bden pa yi ni brda// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro nyid kyis gsungs// phyag rgya kun gyi nang son pa'i/
97a3(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i phyag rgya de nyon cig/ rgyud gang du yang ma bshad pa// de ni khyod kyis bskul bas te// rdo rje me yi rab sbyor bas// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu brjod// lte ba'i 'khor lor lha mo gang // shing reg mtha'
97a4(rgyud 'bum): yi spyod yul can/ / 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rim pa ni// sna tshogs rtsa yi rim pas so// thig le nyi mar son phyag rgya// bsam dang sems ni dbyangs gsal te// sum cu rtsa drug ring dang thung // phyag rgya de ni
97a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon ster na/ / phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// byang chub sems son pa yi dbugs// 'di kun sems can la thim pa'o// 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyor ba yis// /
97a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// phyi mo de nyams myong byas nas// gang dang gang gi ngag las byung // hUM hA rnams kyis dgod kun rnams// ljon shing rtsa ba can du bya// dga' bas der ni 'du ba ni//
97a7(rgyud 'bum): khams dang skye mched rnams kyang ngo // bag chags thams cad dang bral ba// 'jigs byed 'chad bzhin pa yin no// oM Ti'i gnas su dang ba'i stobs// ji lta'i grangs kyi spyod yul can// nye bar
97b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jal ba'i khyim dbus su/ / de'i phyir brtan dang 'gro ba ni// thim pa'ang dngos po kun gyi bdag/ mkhas pas phyag rgya rnams kyis brlan// nam mkha' ru ni 'phur bzhin pas// 'gro ba kun las
97b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mchog/ dad pa'i shugs las shes byas nas// lus can kun gyi stobs ldan yin// sha chen po la za bzhin dang // yid kyi khrag ni 'thung bar byed// he ru ka mar byed rig ma// ljon shing
97b3(rgyud 'bum): drung du yang dag bzhugs/ / de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor dbus su// 'jigs byed chen mo rnam par bsgom// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di dbus su ni// sngags rnams yi ge las byung ba'o// oM ma kha hA Ta/
97b4(rgyud 'bum): sa bAM mu ga drA ka ma yA kha la lA sU ya la hUM b+hi hUM n+d+ra pa d+hA Da ri phaT Ne swA huM hA hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i gsang sngags sbyor chen las// rnal 'byor ma yi sku
97b5(rgyud 'bum): thugs can/ / yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs//
97b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// 'jigs byed chen mo'i nang gi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya
97b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas 'dod ma'i rnal 'byor ma// phyag rgya yi ni brda yi rgyud// snying rjes bshad bya rnal 'byor pa'i// mthong ba yis ni dngos grub 'gyur// snang
98a1(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams su gang tshe dngos/ / dbang po'i spyod yul du mthong 'gyur// gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang dmar ser ljang ku dang // ser dang sngo skya khra bor snang // sna tshogs
98a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang du ma'i mdog/ sngo dang dmar ser 'dres pa dang // slar la yang ni dkar nag mdog/ dmar ser dang ni ljang sngo skya// sngo ba dang ni dmar po'i mdog/ dkar sngo dang ni dmar ljang dag/ sprin dang sna
98a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mdog can dang / / sna tshogs dang ni ser po'i mdog/ du ba dang ni ser mdog can// ser ljang dang ni ljang ser dang // dmar po dang ni dung mdog can// dud ka dkar po sna tshogs sngo// ser dang dmar
98a4(rgyud 'bum): po bsres pa can/ / dud ka dang ni sngo sgra'i mdog/ dkar dang sna tshogs pa'i mdog can// skya bo dang ni du ba'i mdog/ skya dkar dang ni dmar skya dang // sprin dang skya bo ldang skya dang // sna tshogs pa dang sku
98a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mdog/ thams cad mdog gi kha dog tu// khams bcu gnyis kyi kha dog can// gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags// 'khar ba dang ni ra gan te// phan tshun 'dres pa'i kha dog gis// rtse ba chen
98a6(rgyud 'bum): po de bcu gnyis/ / rnal 'byor rnams kyi khams thams cad// der ni snang ba skye bar 'gyur// de yis snang ba'i dus su ni// 'phrul chen mo ni 'byung bar 'gyur// phyag rgya gnyis dag rnams shes pa/
98a7(rgyud 'bum): kha dog mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur// sngon dang phyis ni bsdus pa las// gal te lhan skyes sbyor bdag nyid// rlung shugs ma yi rab sbyor bas// tri sha ku ne'i gnas su ni// lha mo brtson 'grus stongs
98b1(rgyud 'bum): su ste/ / de ltar yi ge'i don rnams kyang // ba ni dbu mar 'bab pa ste// bag chags stobs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// dus 'joms thams cad chos rnams su// slar yang mthong lam bdag nyid yin// be ni
98b2(rgyud 'bum): yul dang ldan pa nyid/ / bdag nyid rnams kyi sgom pa'i lam// de kho na nyid mas 'khyud pa// skyob rnams kyi ni grol ba'i lam// mtho ris mi yul sa 'og gi/ grol ba rnam pa gsum zhes bya// mnyam pa'i
98b3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba mthong 'gyur ba'ang / / rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshams na gnas// bum pa kun sogs byas gang phyir// gtum mo phra ba'i rtsa can no// pad+mar rtsa ni thams cad can// de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes med// de phyir
98b4(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus 'byung bar 'gyur/ / stobs su ye shes ye shes can// de ltar shes byas rtag rnal 'byor// 'dod can ma la 'dod spyad kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag mo dang // gsang sngags yi ger
98b5(rgyud 'bum): / yang dag byung // lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub mchog tu// lha mo chen mo skye bar 'gyur// oM be b+hU tA g+hA la tsa saMrma g+ham+b+ha ma ra d+ha d+hA Na ri ka Ne rA hUM ya hUM hUM pa hUM Ta phaT swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM bA yu be ge
98b6(rgyud 'bum): huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ kha dog gzugs ni sngon ji bzhin// sum cu rtsa bdun gyi dbus su'o// khams gsum snying po'i phyag rgya yis// gang de nus pa rdzogs par grags// gsung gi 'khor lo gsang
98b7(rgyud 'bum): ba cher/ / bdag gis gang zhig rim pa yis// thams cad bden par shes par bya// de phyir rdo rje 'chang dbugs dbyung // dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
99a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rlung shugs ma'i
99a2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'o/ / / de nas rdo rje phag mo yis// ji lta'i cho gas mchod byas nas// nyon cig lha mo bshad bya
99a3(rgyud 'bum): ba bla ma rang gis lha'i phyag rgya/ / 'o byed de bzhin lA ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma// yongs 'gyur ma dang rjes 'jug ma// rnal 'byor phar phyin drug de bzhin// lag pa g.yon pa
99a4(rgyud 'bum): yis ni brda/ / rnal 'byor dbye bas ston byed pa// re re la yang rnam gsum 'gyur// dpa' bo'i rnam pa gsum nyid de// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje nyid// A ro li ka dang rta mchog dang // he ru ka rnams
99a5(rgyud 'bum): lag g.yon la'o/ / mkhas pas gnyis sbyar rnal 'byor te// spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI// sgrol ma gos dkar bdag med ma// de bzhin rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ pha rol phyin drug tu shes bya// de ltar
99a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum shes bya ba/ / dpa' bo 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ sa yi snying po la sogs der// de bzhin mkha' 'gro sogs gtso bo// lha mo lag pa'i rgyab son te// sor mo rnams la de bzhin gshegs//
99a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin lha mo dbus tshigs su// lag pa'i mthil du de bzhin gshegs// dpa' bo de bzhin sen lkog la// lag gdub gnas su rnal 'byor ma// lag pa'i rtse mos brda byas te// mkhas pas
99b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu gshegs gsol bya/ / gang zhig gang gi bdag po nyid// de yi de nyid kyis mtshon bya// chang 'thung ma yi rab sbyor bas// ko sa la dang sna'i rtse mo// dran pa'i stobs kyis bdag nyid kyis// bza'
99b2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni ston mo bya/ / gnyid log dus kun las skyes par// phyag rgya chen po legs par zung // rA hu dus me nyi ma ru// zos pa sna yi rtser de bzhin// phra mo gnyis su med gzugs las// yul yang
99b3(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar byas nas ni/ / me tog sems kyi sa bon las// k+Shi ni bdud rtsi skud pa 'dzag/ de ltar nges byed rnal 'byor pa// lta ba'i 'chang sngon song las so// gzhu yi dbyug par son pa'i sems// rang
99b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs yang dag rig pa tsam/ / ro mnyam pa ni myang ba yang // the tsom med par 'dir byed 'gyur// brkyang ma'i bde ba'i nus pa yis// sa bon zag pa med par son// dus de nyid du rtag phyag rgya// dpa'
99b5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i brda yis 'thob par 'gyur/ / byang chub 'khor lo dga' bcas su// 'jug 'gyur mchog gi zhal can ma// brda dang bral na 'khor ba ru// grol ba'i thabs gzhan yod ma yin// rnal 'byor ma
99b6(rgyud 'bum): / yi tshogs bdag mo// chang 'thung grags pa chen mo yin// sum cu rtsa bdun 'khor lo cher// gsang sngags las byung mchog zhal mo// oM sha ma tra hA ni bi su g+ham+b+ha na Na ni ka d+hA rA ri ya Ne hUM hUM hUM hUM pha
99b7(rgyud 'bum): phaT Ta pa phaT Ta sA sA hA hA/ oM su rA b+hak+Shi ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags rgyal mngon par ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'byin dang sdud pa dag gis ni// gnyis gnyis kyi ni rkang par
100a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// kha dog dbyibs ni sngon can no// kun mkhyen bgrod bya phyag rgya'i lan// mngon par shes pas sbyin mi bya// ma shes pa yis rnal
100a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma'i/ / phyag rgya chen po 'di 'grub 'gyur// sbrul dang rkun sogs pas bsad nas// dmyal ba sogs su 'gro ba yin// sna tshogs lung 'dzin pa rnams la// yang dag yid ches bya phyir ster//
100a3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i drin gyis yod pa der// mkhas pa de yi rkyen gyi brda// dngos grub dngos po bdag nyid kyis// byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// de yi drin gyis grol ba ste// mkhas pas zhing du gnas par bya// bla
100a4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i man ngag zhing yin te/ / de ni gnas dang byang chub phyogs// gnas pa ts+tsha ma ma ka rnams te// rang bzhin med pa ts+tsha ma ma'i lan// yang na 'di kun bla ma 'am// bla ma thams cad thams cad pa'o//
100a5(rgyud 'bum): man ngag dang bcas ye shes che// ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul can// sku yi 'khor lor dngos grub che// theg pa kun gyi bde bar bzhugs// bde med bde ba med pa'ang med// thams cad der ni gnyis
100a6(rgyud 'bum): med che/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
100a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor ba'i brda'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas
100b1(rgyud 'bum): phag mo pad bzang mo'i/ / lha mos mchod pa byas nas ni// las dang rnal 'byor ma'i bdag po// rdo rje chen pos bdag la gsungs// sems can kun gyi dgos byed pa// lha rdzas las ni bshad par
100b2(rgyud 'bum): byagang gis thams cad dbang sogs su/ / lha sogs thams cad de bzhin 'ong // thog mar rdo rje phag mo'o// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi ni las// ka ling ka ru ljang lha mo'i// mngon par bka' bsgo
100b3(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur/ / de yi rigs rnams su skyes pa// bdag dang bdag gir gnang bas so// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// mchog gi dbang phyug ma bsgom bya// rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa sngagasasu
100b4(rgyud 'bum): sa bon yi ge las skyes pa'o/ / 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de dang bral bas dngos grub med// oM sa tri ta sA sa ha ha sra sra ma mu hA khA sa ya ha hUM swa hUM ka phaT ro sA mA sA bar+d+han+ta brti ne huM hUM phaT swA hA/
100b5(rgyud 'bum): oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog 'di ni// bsgom bya bzlas dang bsam gtan no// rdo rje phag mo gnyis byar med// 'bad pas rtsa ba'i sngags rnams su'o// zla mtshan gyi ni me
100b6(rgyud 'bum): tog gis/ / brlan pa'i gos ni legs bskams la// garga Ta yi brun gyis ni// dngos grub 'dod pas bdug spros sbyin// sngags pas bdug spos 'di yis ni// bcom ldan 'das ma nye bar bya// phag mo yi
100b7(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyor ldan pas/ / 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so// mthun pa'i rtsa dang 'dus pa las// 'gro ba thams cad g.yon las byung // rang gi rgyud ni mdzes bzhin pa// zla mtshan gyi ni rdul sogs so// brun kyang
101a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum po dang / / ye shes bsres pas spros su 'gyur// byi la gzhan du bzhag pa'i sems// h+yA yi yi ger tshig 'di'o// ljang ku'ang snying rje'i sbyor ba ste// lha mo de bzhin
101a2(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma'o/ / ci zhig bde ba rig pa ci// ci zhig don dam pa'i spyod yul// gos bzhin pa ni rnal 'byor che// rnam par shes pa lha mor 'dod// skye bo kun gyi bdag nyid ches// bgrod pa mtshams rnams kun
101a3(rgyud 'bum): tu'o/ / thod pa kha sbyar bcing byas nas// sgra rnams kyis ni sbyin sreg brjod// 'di ni me tog tu grags te// dam tshig so sor skyong bar byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// zhi ba'i btung ba nyin rer ro//
101a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar byed pa'i sngags shes pa// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o// ba lang shA ni chang btags pa// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya// lha thams cad dang rgyu skar bcas// klu sogs sum cu'i gnas pa
101a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na// phra mo'i mi ni slar yang ci// lud pa dang ni so shing dang // rang lus dril phyis de bzhin du// ming gis chang btags sbyin sreg gis// 'jig rten dang bcas dbang du
101a6(rgyud 'bum): byed zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni/ / bza' ba zos pa'i skyugs pa ni// mi yi sgra dang yongs ldan pas// da lta nyid du 'gugs byed mchog/ rang lus mar gyi skyugs pa dang // rang gi sgra ni mkhas pas bsreg
101a7(rgyud 'bum): nim pa'i me ni 'bar ba yis/ / mod la sdang bar byed pa'i mchog/ bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg byed// mnyam gzhag d+ha du ra yi mes// mar nag tshan te yongs ldan pas// mod la gsod dang smod pa yin// stong
101b1(rgyud 'bum): phrag dgu yi sreg blugs kyis/ / yun mi ring bas rgyal po 'thob// gang zhig sreg pa'i sreg lugs ni// mkhas pas brgya ni sha yis te// de la zla ba gsum rjes la// skad cig la ni 'phongs pa 'joms// gang
101b2(rgyud 'bum): gis rgyun du dran byed na/ / de ni skye bo'i mthun par 'gyur// mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// lus med tshogs mchog bud med rnams// myos pa'i bsam can 'grub
101b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pas myos pa'i 'jig rten rnams// mi 'jigs pa ni sbyin par byed// bud med bye bas yongs bskor nas// grub pa sa yi steng du rol// dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sbyor ldan pa// dpal he ru ka'i
101b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor mnyam/ / rdo rje slob dpon gzhan dang 'dir// dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byed de// dam tshig spyod pa bsrun pa yi// 'jig rten gsum la dngos grub ster// sngon bshad rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// de
101b5(rgyud 'bum): ltar sbyin sreg byas pas 'grub/ / rnal 'byor las gzhan las med de// las dang bral bas sbyor ba med// 'pho ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi las// rlung 'bab pa ni de rnams son// gnyis kyi mtshams ni
101b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa las/ / sbyin sreg thab kyi nang du blta// lte ba gnyis ni 'dus par te// slar yang mtshams rnams thams cad du'o// de yis dus su shes bya ba// sngags kyang yi ge la 'bum phrag/ bzlas byas
101b7(rgyud 'bum): bskul ba gsang ba yis/ / byas pas kun nas dngos grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor rab byas te// de nas gcig gis dman lnga bcu// re mig sa la gzhag par bya// sngags pas gnod mdzes
102a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i sngags/ / de la thog mar rnam snang mdzad// bdun pa la yang slar de'o// dgu par su yi yi ge sbyin// bcu gsum pa la gri yig go/ bcu bdun par ni b+ha yig ste/
102a2(rgyud 'bum): slar yang bcu dgu pa la hA// sum cu gcig par gri yig sbyin// sum cu gsum par ni yig go/ sum cu bdun par sbyin bya ba// mkhas pas hA yi yi ge sbyar// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa 'dir ni//
102a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin su yi yi ge sbyin// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum par de bzhin// ye shes sa bon sbyor bar bya// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu par sbyin pa// thams cad shes pas m+b+ha'i yig/ dum bu gnyis par sbyin bya ba//
102a4(rgyud 'bum): rig byed rnams kyi thod dbyangs so// dum bu drug par de bzhin 'dir// rlung ni dus thams cad du'o// bcu par gri yi yi ge sbyin// bcu gnyis pa la paM yig go/ bco brgyad pa la h+na yig ste//
102a5(rgyud 'bum): sum cu gnyis pa ya yig go/ sum cu brgyad par h+na yig ste// bzhi bcu pa la ya'i sa bon// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi de bzhin 'dir// gri yi yi ge slar sbyin bya// bzhi bcu brgyad par sngags pa yis// /
102a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu hUM yig gzhom med pa'o// brgyad par de bzhin du ni 'dir// slar yang yi ge kun dbang phyug/ bzhi bcu pa ru dza yig skye// bcu drug pa la b+ha yig go/ nyi shu pa la a'i yi ge/ nyi shu bzhi
102a7(rgyud 'bum): par ga yig go/ / nyi shu drug par na slar sbyin// sum cu pa la wAn sbyar bya// sum cu bzhi par ya sbyin te// rA yig sum cu drug de bzhin// bzhi bcu gnyis par hUM sbyin bya// rdo rje 'khrul 'khor bsdus
102b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dum bu bcu gnyis rnams la ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i ming gzhug bya// hUM yig dum bu thams cad kyi// bsgrub bya rnams kyi dbus su bri// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yongs su bskor// rdo rje yi ni
102b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba bya/ / 'khor lo zung ni bri bya ste// dbang la kham phor sa mthil la'o// 'khrul 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// dbang gi rdzas kyis yang dag bri// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba yang // de tshe myur du byon
102b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bdud rtsi lnga rnams phab pa las// dam tshig der ni bya ba yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis// sngags kyi gtso mo shes par bya// dpa' bo gnyis med sbyor ba yis// de las las
102b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog bshad par bya/ / rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang mchod pa// rtag tu 'khyud pas mchog rab byed// mtshan mo kun tu sgrub pa pos// de nas pho nya mchod par bya// sha za'i rtsa ba khar bcug nas//
102b5(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du ni// de srid ling ga las rung 'gyur// gzhan du nga yis ma bshad do// sa yi lkugs ma til mar du// btsos pas rkang pa byug par bya// mkhas pa de yi mtshan ma ni// dus
102b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du rengs pa mkhas/ / pA tha ka Tu ka ro hi Ni// rta yi dri dang 'di rnams ni// cha rnams mnyam par bya ba ste// brtse chen cho ga'i lhag ma ni// arka'i 'o ma dang btags nas// de yis ling ga
102b7(rgyud 'bum): dril phyis bya/ / gang gi tshad du 'dod pa yi// de yi tshad du 'gyur zhes bya// myur ba ru ni chu dron gyis// bkru ba byas na sngon gyi tshad// pad+ma dkar po'i ke sa ra// sbrang dang btags pa'i byung ba ni/ byin
103a1(rgyud 'bum): na ling ga brtan pa ru/ / de 'gyur 'dod ma la spyod do// pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar ni// til dkar po dang de bzhin gzhan// mar gsar dang ni dpa' gcig gi/ rtsa ba sbrang dang lhan cig/
103a2(rgyud 'bum): tubatags nas lte bar byugs byas na// de srid ling ga mi ltung ngo // rdul can ma dang yung ba gnyis// yongs bzung ba yi dar ba dang // bre do gdu bar bya ba ste// bre gang ma gyur par du'o// de ltar
103a3(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs pas nyin bdun na/ / bcud len rdzogs par byed pa yin// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo// yang dag dpa' bos gsungs pa'o// spre'u'i mchin pa bzung nas ni// phye ma zhib mo ru ni bya// rang gi
103a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po yang dag ldan/ / dbang du byed pa bla med pa'o// gang dang gang du gnas nas ni// rdo rje phag mo zlos gyur pas// lan cig bzlas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis// g.yon dang g.yas su bskor bar bya//
103a5(rgyud 'bum): gang gang bsams pa thams cad rnams// de ni thams cad rab ster byed// so ba gos dang ser dang ni// bza' ston zas dang btung ba ste// de thams cad ni 'thob byed de// sngags pas de bzung yongs
103a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs byed/ / rnam 'gyur med pa dang ni khrag/ sgrub pos gcig tu byas nas ni// rig pa lan bdun bzlas pa yis// de nas mi la bslus pa yis// rig pas skyes bu rnams phye bar// 'gyur te chog
103a7(rgyud 'bum): ni gzhan du min/ / 'di yi rig pa lan cig ni// bzlas pa'i chu yis grol ba yin// de ltar gang dang gang gi ni// sems can dag gi khrag gis ni// bsgos pa'i skud pa bcings pa yis// bzlas pas
103b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni 'dzin pa ste/ / 'di rnams thams cad chus grol bar// 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// bud med gzugs mdzes rgyal po dang // sa yi bdag po la bltas na// sgrub po ma mthong ba yang ni// de
103b2(rgyud 'bum): / rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas// de yi mtshan mo 'ong ba ste// nub bdun na ni mda' shugs kyis// 'ong ba la ni the tsom med// de ltar bya dang bya min pa'i//
103b3(rgyud 'bum): las kun rdo rje'i nor son par// rang gis rig pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// ye shes pha rol son pa 'grub// 'khrul 'khor khams kyi re'u mig tu// rtsa ni phra ma'i gzugs can ma// yi ge'ang rlung chen po yin
103b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ lha ni kun tu 'gro ba'o// ljang ku gnyis med bdag chen mo// lha mo ye shes rgya mtsho yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
103b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i ljang lha mo'i dbang du bya ba'i sbyin
103b6(rgyud 'bum): sreg dang / 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan mkha' 'gro yi// bdag
103b7(rgyud 'bum): po yis ni slar gsungs pa/ / laM pa ka yi rab sbyor bas// shin bzang rnal 'byor ma'i sbyor ba// shes rab stobs su shes bya ste// 'khrul 'khor rta yi 'gros de bzhin// rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor bas bzhugs/
104a1(rgyud 'bum): rtswa sngags rnal 'byor pa yis so// ye shes ldan pa dbugs rgyu'i bdag/ kun rdzob bden pa kun nas 'dzin// rtsa yi kun tu spyod lugs las// stobs ni las rnams thams cad
104a2(rgyud 'bum): du'o/ / gnyid log pa yis rab bzhugs pa'i// srog thams cad ni de'i nang du'o// las chen po la za bzhin pa// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byas nas ni// bdud rtsi dron mo bzhu byas nas// de'i dbus rnams
104a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo la'o/ / der ni sum cu bdun bdag nyid// 'phyang bzhin pa ni byang chub skyes// me yi rnam par rtag lha mo// gtso mo rnams kyis snying bdag nyid// keng rus rlung dang rnam shes la// phyin nas
104a4(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod bdag nyid rnams/ / de yi sa bon yig shes nas// pho nya rnams kyis rtag tu bskyed// re re yi ni sa bon gyi// mthar ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma dz+nyA hA na pi sA si ga ta ra ru pra d+hi b+ha ra ya/
104a5(rgyud 'bum): ba hUM swA hUM hA pa ri Ta Ne pha hUM swA phaT hA phaT hUM swA hA oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags las yang dag byung // las kyi kha dog dang ni gzugs// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can// gsang ba'i
104a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bsgom par bya/ / gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg bya// phyi nas las ni 'di dag brtsam// sngags pas lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'bum phrag bzlas pa byas nas ni// sems can kun la bde 'byung ba'i// 'khrul
104a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya/ / 'khor lo sngon ma'i gzugs can ni// byas nas gsang sngags 'dir dgod bya// rnam par snang mdzad thog mar te// gnyis par de nas ni dgod bya// gsum par hUM yig
104b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin bya ste/ / lnga par oM gyi yi ge'o// drug par gri yi yi ge sbyin// hUM gi yi ge bdun pa'o// brgyad par m+b+ha'i yi ge sbyin// bcu par su yi yi ge 'o// bcu gnyis par ni hUM yig sbyin// bcu bzhi par ni gri yig go/
104b2(rgyud 'bum): bco lngar m+b+ha'i yi ge ste// bcu drug de bzhin hUM yig go/ bcu bdun pa ru su yig ste// bcu dgu pa ru hU~M sbyar bya// nyi shur phaT yig sbyin par bya// hA yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig par// nyi shu dgu par rnam snang mdzad//
104b3(rgyud 'bum): sum cu par ya'i yi ge gnyis// sum cu gcig par slar de'o// rig byed dang po sum cu gsum// sum cu bzhi par ya yig ste// rA dzA'i yig dag sum cu lngar// sum cu drug par h+na yig sbyin// sum cu brgyad
104b4(rgyud 'bum): par gri yig go/ bzhi bcu par ni wan sbyin bya// bzhi bcu gnyis par a de bzhin// bzhi bcu gsum pa ru ni hA// bzhi bcu bzhi par hUM hUM dag/ bzhi bcu lnga pa ru ni gri// bzhi bcu bdun pa ru ni na// bzhi bcu brgyad
104b5(rgyud 'bum): par sbyin bya ba/ / hUM hUM gi ni yig gnyis so// b+ha ga'i sgra ni slar sbyin te// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la'o// lhag ma la ni rtsa sngags bri// 'khor lo bani ru bsgrub bya'o// kun nas yongs su 'khor bar ni// sngags pas
104b6(rgyud 'bum): rta mgrin bri bar bya/ / gnyis pa g.yon du skor ba ste// 'khrul 'khor kha sbyar 'khrul 'khor bya// gsang ba'i yi ge las skyes par// shes bya lhan skyes rnal 'byor pas// klu dgug pa dang dbang dang ni// lha la
104b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa gsad pa yin/ / rnal 'byor rtse bdag nyid can gyis// rang sems rtag tu gsad par bya// gang yang de'i yang sdang ba ni// de yis thams cad gsad pa yin// sdang sems can gyis gzhan du ni//
105a1(rgyud 'bum): bsad pas dngos grub rnams mi 'thob// bde mchog phyi ma'i las gang ni// de kun nges par byed par 'gyur// re re yi ni las cung zad// mdor bsdus 'di ni bshad par bya// klu'i
105a2(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal po de bzhin brgyad// mtha' yas rim pas bsgom par bya// nor rgyas srog tu shes par bya// thur du sel ba dung skyong ngo // mnyam gnas pad+ma yi ni klu// bsam gtan pad+ma chen po'o// khyab gnas 'jog
105a3(rgyud 'bum): po yi ni klu/ / klu ni slar yang hu lu hu lu'o// rus sbal mtha' yas shes par bya// rtsangs pa rgyal ba yi ni klu// lha sbyin rnam par rgyal ba'o// mtha' yas nor las rgyal ba'o// 'jig pa yis ni dgug pa
105a4(rgyud 'bum): stebatang ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ / bum pa can gyis char dbab pa// mnyam pa'i rlung gis gsal ba'o// rnam shes brgyad po de bzhin du// 'dir ni klu mor shes par bya// ye shes nam mkha'
105a5(rgyud 'bum): dang gnyis gzhan/ / rnam par shes pa bcu yi rgyu// phuHyi yi ge brgyad sbyin bya// ting 'dzin sna tshogs de bzhin no// phan tshun skyes pas dkris pa ste// klu mo de yi mtshan khung du'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i
105a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs tshan gyis/ / klu yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// ji lta'i rim pas kha dog rnams// thun mtshams gnyis kyi thun tshod brgyad// rtsa sngags mngon par brjod pa nyid// klu dang klu mor shes par
105a7(rgyud 'bum): bya dbang po thim par byas nas ni/ / yi ge la 'bum bzlas pa nyid// gang gang las ni phyi rol gyi// de de'i las kyi dbang tshul bya// gzugs ni gang 'dod par bya ste// khro bo'am zhi ba'i gzugs
105b1(rgyud 'bum): dag tu'o/ / sems ni gzugs su yang dag grags// de phyir shin bzang ming can no// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de yis lha ni byed par 'gyur// slar yang phyi nang bdag nyid kyis//
105b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan pa'i lha ni ma bshad do// de yis thams cad mngon brjod pas// rnal 'byor pa yis gang 'dod 'gro// sems can rnams kyi bag chags skyon// phyi rol tu yang sprin mthong 'gyur//
105b3(rgyud 'bum): bag chags zad pa'i dus su ni// sprin dang klu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan
105b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang shin tu bzang mo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid
105b5(rgyud 'bum): can rta'i sngags mdor bstan pa rigs kyi klu'i las kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // de nas de phyir slar la yang // lha mos mchod pa 'dir byas
105b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ phag mo'i 'dod chags bcas pas so// mnyes nas lha yis ston pa mdzad// rta rna ma yi rab sbyor bas// dus kun tu ni kAny+tsir ro// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag dang // snying ka ru ni yang dag bzhug//
105b7(rgyud 'bum): ha yig nA dang lus kun tu// snying ka'i dbus las kyang ni langs// ya yig bskyod pa yi ni srog/ rdo rje'i rlung gis bskyod pa yin// du tsam de bde dang bcas pa// slar yang 'dab 'dab la gsum gsum//
106a1(rgyud 'bum): sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos// nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dab ma brgyad// bcu gnyis lte ba'i pad+ma ru// rnal 'byor ma rtag sum cu drug/ de tshe re re'i 'dir rnams kyis// mtshams kyis rta
106a2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa rnams/ / d+hA yig lha mo de ma yin// gsal dang mi gsal rang bzhin can// 'dod pa'i khams su'ang skyes pa mo// thar pa'i gzugs kyi las can no// ts+tsha yig 'pho ba yi ni chos// thams
106a3(rgyud 'bum): cad rig pa'i mtshams las grol/ / sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// gsod pa'i las la brtson par bya// gang gang gsod pa'i las rnams kyis// bla ma gsod la byed par 'gyur// bstan pa la ni gnod
106a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'am/ / de bzhin mtshams med lnga byed la// dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang // d+ha dur dur khrod sol ba dang // rang gi sdigs mdzub khrag gis ni// 'khor lo 'bad pas bri bar bya// gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor
106a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu de'i/ / byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// sngon bshad re'u mig shes byas nas// gsang sngags 'phreng ba 'di dgod bya// thog mar rnam par snang mdzad de// gnyis par su ni rnam par brjod// gsum
106a6(rgyud 'bum): par m+b+ha'i yi ge brjod/ / rig byed dang po lngar de bzhin// drug par gri yig de bzhin te// slar yang bdun par hA yig go/ brgyad pa la ni hUM yig gnyis// dgu par phaT yig de bzhin no// bcu par ni yig de bzhin
106a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ slar yang bcu gnyis par hUM yig/ bcu gsum par ni phaT yig ste// gri yig bcu bzhi par de'o// hUM gi yi ge bco lnga par// m+b+ha'i yi ge bcu drug par// bcu bdun pa ru sa yig ste// hUM yig bcu dgu pa
106b1(rgyud 'bum): la'o/ / nyi shu pa la hUM yig sbyin// hA yig nyi shu rtsa gcig par// rnam par snang mdzad nyi shu dgur// sum cu pa slar gri yig go/ sum cu gcig pa hA yig ste// sum cu gsum par rnam snang mdzad// sum cu bzhi
106b2(rgyud 'bum): par a yig dang / / na yi yi ge der sbyar bya// sum cu lnga par ya'i sa bon// ho yig der ni sbyin par bya// sum cu drug par hUM gnyis sbyin// sum cu bdun par phaT yig go/ sum cu brgyad par pa ya gnyis//
106b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcur hUM gnyis de bzhin no// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la phaT// bzhi bcu gnyis par b+ha ga gnyis// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa la ni// pa ya gnyis dag yi ge'o// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa la hA// bzhi bcu lnga par
106b4(rgyud 'bum): / gri yig go// bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la ni// rA dza'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bid+ya'i sgra ni slar sngags pas// dum bu bzhi bcu brgyad par ro// wA na yig slar yang sbyin bya ba// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la'o// lhag ma rnams
106b5(rgyud 'bum): la go cha'i sngags/ / bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa'o// gshin rje'i gdong ni grwa kun tu// lag pa rkang pa phyogs su dgod// snying kha gshin rje'i sa gzhi ni// de yi dbus su bsgom par bya// ye shes rnam
106b6(rgyud 'bum): shes sbyor bdag nyid/ / mkhas pas sngags kyi kun spyod bya// bla ma dam tshig la brnyas pa'ang // rnam par shes dang blo dman pa'o// bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa// mig la sogs pa'i skye mched do//
106b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshams med lnga po byed pa ni// phung po khams dang de bzhin gzhan// sems can thams cad gcig pa yi// rigs ni phung po sogs dang khams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyis de// bsad pas
107a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can khams bsad pa'o/ / gang dang gang gi gdong bltas nas// de dang de'i bdag nyid gzugs can// bag chags ye shes kyis bsad par// 'gyur ro sems can gzhan
107a2(rgyud 'bum): bsad min/ / de rnams gsod pa'i las sam yang // byas pas gsang ba de dang 'dra// sbyin sreg dug la sogs rdzas kyis// yang dag rig gzugs can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo der dran bya//
107a3(rgyud 'bum): / sreg pa gtum mo la ni'o// sa bon yi ge las skyes pa// dkyil 'khor rta rna ma yi'o// kha dog dang ni dbyibs sngon gyis// shes rab thabs kyi mchod pa de// oM shrI saSh+NIrba saM mA hA ra ra ba kA la ra d+h+waM ka si ya
107a4(rgyud 'bum): / Ne huM hUM huM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA oM ha yA kar+Ne huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'khor rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas ni// skrag nas sa la 'gyel bar gyur// kye ma tshul 'di mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten rnams ni/
107a5(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa nyid// gang gi bde kun la gnas nas// srog gis 'di la tshar bcad pa'o// mtshar nas sems can sar 'gyel bas// lag na rdo rje sogs bzhengs nas// pus mo'i lha ba sar btsugs nas/
107a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po bdag 'dri'o// ci yis bdag dang gang gi nyid// 'bras bu dang ni rgyu'i rang bzhin// bcom ldan gang du rnam par gzhag/ gal te nyid kyi 'bras rnams kyi// gsod pa de dang 'dra bar
107a7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / yang ni rgyu ni bcom ldan la// 'bras bu skyes bu gsod pa yin// bdag gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ the tsom bsal bar mdzad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig pa yis tshig de la/
107b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// 'bras bu las kyi rjes su 'dun// bdag ni bde ba kun gyi gnas// de'i las dbang gis sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams so// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
107b2(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin ni/ / gnyis su med pas gcig tu gyur// de ni dngos po kun gyi rgyu// mkhas pa las ni rkyen yin no// dmag dpung la sogs sa chen la// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba yis// thams cad
107b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med bdag nyid bya/ / de'i phyir gsod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag nyid bsad pas sangs rgyas nyid// skye bo gzhan kun gyis ma yin// dus kyi dbang gis rgya srid na// tshegs chung las kyis
107b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / de yi phyir na sngon gyi las// mkhas pa rnams kyis brtag byas nas// khams ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin du// de dang der ni gdags par bya// de yis bdag nyid bsad pa yis// sems
107b5(rgyud 'bum): can khams rnams de nyid do/ / 'bad pas brtse ba bskyed byas nas// nges par gsad par bya ba yin// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// brtse ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad
107b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
107b7(rgyud 'bum): po las/ rta rnam dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas go cha dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi bsad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas spro bar byed pa
108a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi sbyor ba kun tu rnyed dka' ba/ / bya gdong ma yi rab sbyor bas// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// brtson 'grus byang chub yan lag chos// hi mA la yar yang dag zhugs//
108a2(rgyud 'bum): lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i gtso mo bsgom par bya// mkha' gzugs nyid bdag pho nya mo// rkan dang rdo rje chu skyes dbus// rnam shes rlung dang lhan cig tu// mda' yi shugs kyis
108a3(rgyud 'bum): / gyen du 'phang // lus ni 'dar 'dar bya ba ste// drag shul sbyor bas bya ba yin// rtag tu byed bzhin rnal 'byor pa// mchog tu zag med 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ji srid mi 'dod par// rlung dang rnam
108a4(rgyud 'bum): shes gso mi 'gyur/ / s+thA yi bu gar srog srog la// lte ba'i dbus su bskyod par bya// lte ba rna gnyis sbyor ba yis// 'dzin bzhin pa yis g.yo mi 'gyur// rlung dang rnam shes lhan cig tu// de ni smyo bas
108a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba yin/ / de dus sbyor ba'i bdag nyid la yang // dngos po thams cad mthong ba gang // de dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur// d+ha du ra'i me yi sbyin sreg gis// shing la dpyangs pa'i skra dang ni// sha za'i/
108a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba bsreg par bya// 'di yi las kyi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas skad cig gis smyo 'gyur// de phyir brtson 'grus byang yan lag/ de rnams las ni mngon par bya// brtson 'grus rdzogs byang chub
108a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong bas/ / rtag tu myur du 'thob par 'gyur// ha yig 'phyang ba'i ye shes su// rang nyid dpa' bos bshad pa yin// mA yig kyang ni rang rig pa// bdag nyid rnam pa'i gnas bzhugs de// thim dang
108b1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rnam pa'i gzugs/ / sangs rgyas sku can skye bar 'gyur// rang gis rig bdag rig pa rnams// sems can don byas nas gshegs 'gyur// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// las kyi
108b2(rgyud 'bum): / rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya// mdog dang gzugs ni sngon gyi bzhin// gsang sngags sbyor las yang dag byung // oM a san+narba mA nA lA gA d+hA nAM ri Sho Ne Sha hUM Na hUM sta phaT b+ha na sA pi hA d+hU pa NA ya huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM
108b3(rgyud 'bum): kha gA na ne huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya sngags kyi sbyor bdag nyid// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// ji lta ba ni sngon gyi bzhin// 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya// yi dgas 'khor lor rtag tu ni//
108b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di dgod bya// thog mar rnam par snang mdzad de// gnyis par m+b+ha sbyar bar bya// gsum par de nyid de ltar sbyin// lnga par rig byed rnams dang por// hA yig drug par sbyin par bya// hUM gi
108b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge bdun par dgod/ / brgyad par su yi yi ge ste// dgu par de nyid sbyin par bya// bcu par hUM gnyis sbyin bya ste// gri yig slar yang bcu gnyis par// bcu gsum la hA'i yi ge/ bcu bzhi pa la hUM yig go//
108b6(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga pa la ni yig ste// hUM yig bcu drug pa la dgod// bcu bdun pa la phaT yig ste// gri yig bcu dgu pa la'o// hUM yig nyi shu pa la sbyin// phaT yig nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// rnam snang mdzad pa nyi shu dgur//
108b7(rgyud 'bum): sum cur hA yig slar dgod bya// sum cu gcig pa de nyid sbyin// sum cu gsum par rnam snang mdzad// sum cu bzhi pa ra ya ho gnyis// sum cu lnga par rA dza gnyis// gri yig sum cu drug par sbyin// sum
109a1(rgyud 'bum): cu bdun par de nyid do/ / sum cu brgyad par hUM hUM gnyis// bzhi bcur A na ya yi tshig/ bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la wan// hUM gnyis bzhi bcu gnyis pa la// bzhi bcu gsum par pa
109a2(rgyud 'bum): ya ste/ bzhi bcu bzhi par de nyid do// bzhi bcu lnga par hUM dang phaT// b+ha ga bzhi bcu bdun par ro// bzhi bcu brgyad pa ru ni hUM// bzhi bcu dgu pa la ni phaT// stong par snying po yi ni sngags// bsgrub bya'i
109a3(rgyud 'bum): ming nang bcug pa'o/ / kha yis 'khrul 'khor la 'dzin pa'i// thams cad du ni yi dgas bri// dur khrod kyi ni ras la ni// kha sbyar rnam par bya ba yin// lte ba'i gnas su 'khor lo 'di// mkhas pa yis
109a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgom par bya/ / yi dgas chos dbyings ngo bo nyid// rtog pa gsol phyir snying rje yin// rta yang gnas dang gnas min du'o// snying po'i byang chub kyis rdo rje// klu'i 'gros theg pa che rnams kyi// rang bzhin
109a5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo thams cad kyi'o/ / dge dang mi dge ro langs te// sems can slu bas bgrod pa'o// gzhan ni theg pa gsum po yang // sngon gyi las can ston pa yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/
109a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bya gdong
109a7(rgyud 'bum): m a dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i smyo bar byed pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i snying po'i sngags dang bcas pa'i las zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig
109b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de nas 'khor shugs ma'i sbyor bas// brang 'gro'i 'khor lo bshad par bya// pre ta pu rir byang yan lag/ dga' ba zhes bya mdor bsdus pas// stobs rnams thams
109b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rengs byed de/ / 'khor los sgyur sogs las can no// yung ba rgya skyegs bsres pa yis// 'khrul 'khor thod pa la bri bya// spyod do dus ni thams cad du// lte ba sogs su phyed bcas gsum// ro
109b3(rgyud 'bum): langs kyang ni gzugs bdag nyid/ / 'gro dang 'ong ba rengs byed pa'o// bud med phyag rgya bzang bcas pas// rim gyis dbugs ni dbyung bar bya// kun bdag gtso bo rnam par shes// bde ba rnams su
109b4(rgyud 'bum): thim par 'gyur/ / de ni g.yo bar mi 'gyur te// blo ldan dus rnams thams cad du'o// 'di yi bya ba kun med pa// byas pa'i bdag nyid kyi rab 'byung // las kyis sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing // de yi gnas
109b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dpag par bya/ / rnal 'byor pas dngos gang gang dran// de de da ltar rengs par byed// de yi las kyis bskyod pa yis// slar yang las gzhan dran mi bya// de dang der ni byang chub che// skye bo thams
109b6(rgyud 'bum): cad byed par 'gyur/ / slar yong yongs su myang 'das pa'ang // byas nas bde ba che las 'jug/ rmi ni 'dod chags rang bzhin 'dir// skye bo thams cad byed pa'o// byang chub yan lag dga' las
109b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ rang bzhin dar ni byung ba yin// 'khor shugs ma yi gnas zhugs te// de ltar rengs pa'i las bya'o// kha dog dbyibs ni sngon gyi ste// 'khor lo'i dbus su bsgom par bya// sngags
110a1(rgyud 'bum): dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/ / de yi gnas la 'byung bar 'gyur// oM kro su d+ha me bi ru g+ha ka hA ma hA bi ri ta NA NA ya dA hUM ya huM hUM pa hUM Ta pha phaT Ta pha swA Ta hA swA hA/ oM
110a2(rgyud 'bum): / tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ lha mo chen mo gsang sngags 'di// mchog las shes rab thabs bdag nyid// 'khor lo'ang sngon gyi bshad pa ste// gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i bdag/ thog/
110a3(rgyud 'bum): mar rnam par snang mdzad de// su yig slar yang gnyis par ro// gsum pa'i dum bur m+b+ha sbyin bya// ni yig bzhi par de bzhin no// lnga par su yig sbyin par bya// slar yang drug par m+b+ha'i yig go/ hUM
110a4(rgyud 'bum): yig bdun par sbyin bya ste/ / rlung gi yi ge brgyad par ro// gri yig dgu par sbyin par bya// bcu par hA yig de bzhin no// bcu gcig pa ru pa sbyin te// de nas bcu gnyis par ya yig/ hUM gi yi ge
110a5(rgyud 'bum): / bcu gsum par// bcu bzhi pa ru hUM yig go/ pa yi yi ge bco lnga par// bAM yig bcu drug par dgod bya// bi yi yi ge bcu bdun par// slar yang d+hA yig bco brgyad par// gcig gis dman pa'i ni
110a6(rgyud 'bum): shur rA/ / nyi shu par hUM slar dgod bya// nyi shu gcig par de nyid sbyin// b+hU yig nyi shu gnyis par dgod// ga yig nyi shu gsum par te// nyi shu bzhi par phaT yig go// nyi shu drug par dza yig sbyin/
110a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM yig nyi shu bdun par ro// nyi shu brgyad par phaT yig ste// gri yig nyi shu dgu pa la'o// sum cu pa la b+ha yig ste// sum cu gcig par hUM yig go/ sum cu gnyis par de nyid sbyin// hUM yig sum cu
110b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum par ro/ / phaT yig sum cu bzhi par te// sum cu lnga par oM dgod bya// sum cu drug par de nyid sbyin// sum cu bdun par ho de bzhin// ya yig sum cu rtsa brgyad pa// sum cu rtsa dgu pa la na// bzhi bcu
110b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la A sbyin bya/ / bzhi bcu gcig pa la ni oM// gri yig bzhi bcu gnyis par te// bzhi bcu gsum par phaT dgod bya// hUM yig bzhi bcu bzhi par te// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa ru hUM// bzhi bcu drug par hUM
110b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin bya/ / bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la hA// gri yig bzhi bcu brgyad par te// gcig dman lnga bcu pa la hA// de ltar 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo ni// mgrin pa las skyes rta dgod bya// rengs pa thams cad
110b4(rgyud 'bum): lus chen las/ / srog ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin che// sbyor bar byas pa gang da ltar// sems can gnod byed rengs pa'o// grol ba sems can thams cad la// rnal 'byor pa'i yang yid kyis so// lo
110b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu ni goms pa las/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// nye ba yi ni snying po'i sngags// re'u mig dbus mar yang dag bri// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug nas// rlung dang rnam shes thim par bya//
110b6(rgyud 'bum): brang 'gro 'khyil bar grags pa ste// 'khrul 'khor yang lus can rnams kyi'o// ri bo phung por 'gro ba ste// byang chub sems ni thod pa'o// de yi steng du ster ba nyid// mkhas pa 'khrul 'khor gang giso /
110b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge thams cad rang bzhin te// nyin zhag las kyang shes par bya// sems kyi bran po chen po yi// rba rlabs rengs par bya ba yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i
111a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor lo la
111a2(rgyud 'bum): shugs can ma'i rengs par bya ba'i las dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas dum skyes
111a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sbyor bas/ / ji lta'i las ni gsal bshad bya// las thams cad pa'i thab byas nas// ji lta'i cho gas sbyin sreg ste// las kyi cho ga rnams mthong bas// bskrang pa'i las ni bsgrub par bya// gri ha de ba
111a4(rgyud 'bum): tAganas su/ / shin sbyangs byang chub yan lag tu'o// nam mkha'i bu ga'i byang sems kyang // 'dzin pa chen po steng 'phan 'gyur// bskam byas AHyi rnam pas te// mgo bor rnam par gzung bar bya//
