111a5(rgyud 'bum): yig yi ges 'gro bya ste// mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor// rlung gi dkyil 'khor can bsgoms nas// mgo bo'i dbus su rgyal mtshan te// rnam shes de ni bskyed par 'gyur// dpag tshad
111a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag stong phrag can/ / sangs rgyas nyid ma lus pa 'thob// rnal 'byor pa de sa gsum du// hA hA he he rnam brgyad du// mkha' 'gro'i sbyor bas dgod pa'o// mkha' spyod 'gro ba'i bya ba yis// rnal
111a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma ni der byed do/ / rang gis chung rtag gyen bgrod las// khyim du 'chi bar shes par bya// 'phrog pa sdig pa thams cad de// sdang ba'i dbang po'i cho ga can// sbyin bya theg pa chen po kun// rtag tu
111b1(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa med rgyas so/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'ang // sems can thams cad la sbyor bya// de srid rdo rje rnal 'byor che// ji srid bsgrub byar mi spyod par// shin tu sbyangs pa chos kun tu// ye
111b2(rgyud 'bum): shes zhes bya'i bdag nyid du yang ngo / / byang chub yan lag yid kyis blta// yid de chos can thams cad do// de ltar bye brag chos shes pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bstan// theg pa chen por bsgru/
111b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ sbyin sreg 'di yis rdzogs par bya// bya rog sha gshog chu rgyus dang // bya rgod tshang stan mngon par ni// de yi sems kyis bsreg par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyang slong byed na// sa gzhi'i chung ngu'i
111b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa'i/ / skye 'gro kun la smos ci dgos// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngon du bshad pa can bsgom bya// sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// oM bu ma
111b5(rgyud 'bum): d+hahA ko kA Ti sha sa ti ha la sra kA k+Sha t+ma NA ne ni hUM Sh+Ta hUM phaT nA phaT ya swA hUM hA hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i sngags las yang dag byung // 'khrul 'khor sngon bdag
111b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid dngos can/ / gcig dman lnga bcu'i bdag nyid kyi// re'u mig gnod mdzes sngags gnas su// rnam par snang mdzad thog mar te// gnyis par de nyid sbyin par bya// A yig gsum par sbyin bya ste/
111b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi par na yi yi ge'o// lnga pa ra ya yi yi ge 'o// drug par ya yig sbyin bya ste// bdun par su yi yi ge'o// brgyad par phaT kyi yi ge ste// dgu par su yig de bzhin no// bcu par rnam par snang mdzad/
112a1(rgyud 'bum): de gri yig bcu gcig par dgod bya// bcu gnyis pa lah+na yi ge/ bcu gsum pa la m+b+ha'i yig/ bcu bzhi pa la nA'i sa bon// bco lngar hUM gnyis de bzhin no// bcu drug pa la hUM phaT/
112a2(rgyud 'bum): / de bcu bdun pa la rnam snang mdzad// bco brgyad pa la hA'i yi ge/ bcu dgu pa la gri dgod bya// nyi shu pa la pa yig sbyin// nyi shu gcig par ya sbyar bya// nyi shu gsum par hUM yig ste// nyi shu bzhi
112a3(rgyud 'bum): par hUM phaT dgod/ / hUM yig nyi shu drug par sbyin// nyi shu bdun par ya sbyor bya// hUM yig nyi shu dgu par te// dza yig dang por sbyin par bya// sum cu pa la de nyid sbyin// gri yig sum cu rtsa gcig par
112a4(rgyud 'bum): sum cu gnyis par hUM yig ste/ / hA yig sum cu gsum par ro// sum cu bzhi par gri sbyin bya// sum cu lnga par hoHdgod bya// sum cu drug par rA yig ste// sum cu bdun par hUM phaT gnyis//
112a5(rgyud 'bum): sum cu brgyad par ya sa bon// gcig dman bzhi bcu pa la ya// bzhi bcu pa la hA sbyin bya// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la hUM// b+ha yig bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa la ni// bzhi bcu
112a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bzhi pa la d+hA/ / bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa la bi// bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la wan// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa la ga/ m+b+ha yig bzhi bcu dgu par te// 'khrul 'khor ro langs su gzhug bya// le'u tshe lnga ru
112a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya dang / / rnal 'byor ma drug go char bcas// gsang sngags nang du chud bya ste// ro langs kha ru dgod par bya// gang dang gang gi ming gis ni// 'khrul 'khor brtse chen gyis bri bya/
112b1(rgyud 'bum): de dang de yir shes bya ste// mkhas pa yis ni bskrad pa'o// gsang ba chen po mi bstan no// skye ba 'di nyid la 'grub pa'o// gsang sngags brjod pa ma byas shing // sgom bral rnal 'byor pa
112b2(rgyud 'bum): yang ngo / / bla ma rnal 'byor ma'i gnang bas// khyab bdag ji ltar 'dod par spyod// de phyir bla ma bsnyen bya zhing // bdag chen rnams kyis mnyes par bya// de yis dgyes pas 'thob pa ste/
112b3(rgyud 'bum): las kyi byang chub 'byung ba'o// 'khrul 'khor 'char ba'i dus su ni// mgo bor rnam par bsgom par bya// des mngon grub par shes par bya// dus bzhin rnams su 'grub pa min// dpa' bo thams cad
112b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
112b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po las/ dum skyes ma'i rab tu sbyor ba sgom pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskrad pa'i las rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//
112b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas ro langs zung gi ni// sdang byed 'khrul 'khor de bzhin du// chang 'tsheng ma yi rab sbyor bas// mdor bsdus pa yis rab bshad bya// sau rASh+Ta yi gnas bsgrubs nas//
112b7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag rab tu rnam 'byed chos// byang chub the tshom med 'thob par// mchog gi 'dod ma shes par bya// myos byed chen po sbyor byed par// shaM yi ges rab tu bshad// bcud len dngos po dam pa yang //
113a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi pad+ma dag tu 'dzin// smin ma'i dbus su snal ma gang // rdo rje nor bu'i nang phyin nas// snyoms par 'jug las skyes bzhin par// NI yig rang gis reg mi btu// reg
113a2(rgyud 'bum): med der ni rnam shes kyis/ / mchog gi bu mo btung bar bya// bdag med pa yi nang du ste// de ni ni yi yi ge bshad// ye shes 'di 'dra btung byas pas// dbang po thams cad rab myos te// dbye ba de tshe de
113a3(rgyud 'bum): / rnams su// yid kyis rtsod par byed par 'gyur// bde ba chen po la rol pa// sau yig de ni bdag gis bshad// ro ma bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// ma mchu 'jib par bya ba yin// rta dang ma ha'i 'khrul
113a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du/ / dbye ba srog dang thur sel la'o// Sh+Tha yig tshigs pa thams cad du// shes par byed par the tshom med// yan lag rab tu rnam 'byed des// chos bdag med pa'i byang chub rtogs// 'di dang
113a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / dbye ba dang ni gsad pa ste// dbang po dang ni yul thams cad// mi bskyod pa yi 'jig rten spyod// brtse bas de rnams bsad pa yi// bdag nyid kyis ni grol rgyu can// dkyil
113a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ / mchog gi gtso mo bsgom pa yin// smin dbus phyogs su gzugs rnams ni// dkar ba'am dmar dang mtshon cha rnams// de'i dus nyid du yang dag byung // sum cu rtsa bdun
113a7(rgyud 'bum): yig rnams su/ / shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gzugs// mchog gi gtso bo shes par bya// oM sa dz+nyA wa nA ka mri rma ta ba baR+Sha r+N+Na pa nA NA ya ya ne huM hUM huM hUM pha pa Ta Ta pa pa Ta Ta swA swA hA hA oM sho NI nI ye huM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/
113b1(rgyud 'bum): sgom bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ches// ji ltar yid 'dod las bya ste// dur khrod sol ba'i snag tsha yis// mi yi rus pas bri bar bya// sman thams cad ni rgyu skar ni// rgyal sogs khams rnams mnyam pas so//
113b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sngon du brjod pa ste// dum bu'ang gcig sman lnga bcu'o// phan tshun gzung gri gsang sngags su// yi ge'ang mkhas pas dgod par bya// grwa bzhir rnam par snang mdzad de// sgo bzhi rnams ni stong pa'o//
113b3(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma thog ma'i 'phreng la ni// dum bzhi rnams su rim pas gang // hA sum+b+ha gri dgod par bya// de la gnyis pa'i dum bdun la// gri ya hoHgri b+ha ga pa ya// bA na bi Ta rim bzhin bri// gsum pa dbus ma'i logs su
113b4(rgyud 'bum): nigasum gsum rnams ni sbyin bya ste/ / phaT hA hUM hUM hA ni sbyin bya// bzhi par dbus las thams cad du// phyogs su re re dor bar bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sgo gnyis kyi// dbus su yi ge gnyis gnyis te/
113b5(rgyud 'bum): / pA na d+hA ra sbyin par bya// 'phreng lnga pa la dgod byag/ dbus ma'i logs su gsum ga sum ste// hUM pa ya hUM hUM gris su dgod de// 'di rnams ji lta'i 'dir rim pas// drug pa'i 'phreng la shes bya ba'o// hA an hUMH
113b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT de bzhin/ / phaT dza hUM phaT rim ji ltar// sngags thams cad ni sbyin bya ba// dum bu bdun pa rnams la bshad// sgo spangs pa la rim pa yis// sbyin bya hUM hUM ma b+ha hUM// 'khrul 'khor chen po'i chen po'o// dbus
113b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi dum bu lnga rnams dang / / de bzhin du ni sgo bzhi ru// bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa yi// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bcas pa'o// ro langs 'thab par 'gyur ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni zung bya'o// de dag lto bar
114a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor te/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag
114a2(rgyud 'bum): / pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ chang 'tshong ma'i rab tu sbyor bas dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin zhes
114a3(rgyud 'bum): / b+ha ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i// ting 'dzin gsal bar bshang bya ste// 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i sbyor bas// lkugs par bcing ba'i sbyor ba'o// gser
114a4(rgyud 'bum): / gling gi ni gnas dang ni// de nas dran byang chub yan lag/ srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor te// cho ga gzhan du rab 'jug 'gyur// spyi gtsug mthil gyi sa gzhi la// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// lha dang lha
114a5(rgyud 'bum): min 'thab mo cher/ / mi smrar gyur to de'i 'jug pa// de'i dus su gzugs chen po// 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bltas// yi ge gnyis kyis 'chad pa sti// g.yo ba'i sems ni 'ching ba ste// gnod pa rnam par
114a6(rgyud 'bum): shes pa'i chos/ / gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis// rgyud du dam pa'i chos bstan pa// 'dir ni phyag rgya gnyis kyis bshad// de bzhin sngon gyi spyod par yang // sbyor ba'i phyag rgya spyod par 'gyur// thams cad
114a7(rgyud 'bum): man ngag le'u ru/ / de yi rgyu can bsgoms pa yis// rim pas 'di kun zab mor ni// bdag nyid kyis ni gsang bar byas// nam mkha' mkha' med nam mkha' che// shin tu nam mkha' nam mkha' min//
114b1(rgyud 'bum): gyen du phyogs pa'i rtsar 'bab ste// ji srid rom mi mthong bar// de srid rgyun mi chad pa 'thob// dga' skyes bde ba'ang cis mi 'bab// dngos dang dngos med 'dres pa yis// skye bo kun nas byung ba yis// dngos
114b2(rgyud 'bum): med gzugs bdag nyid ma yin/ / dngos med thams cad las skyes bde// lam la gnas pa 'khyer 'gyur te// gang der ji ltar de bzhin no// ye shes lkugs pa bzhin du gnas// 'ching bas rang gi phyag rgya
114b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes 'di yis lkugs par 'gro ba ste/ / dgra bzhin du ni kun la 'bigs// rdo rje 'dzin yang lcags nyid na// skye 'gro phra mo slar ci dgos// thams cad rig pas byed po byed// byed po gzhan ni srid ma yin//
114b4(rgyud 'bum): yid bzang ma dang gang zag nyid// bdag med rig 'gyur skad cig las// rdo rje theg par de tshe gnas// rang bzhin bdag med par brjod do// brjod pa bdag med brjod pa yang // rnal 'byor mthong bas
114b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung mi 'gyur/ / de las langs pa'i rnal 'byor che// hA yig gzhan dngos rnams kyis min// gnyis bdag bsrub cing bsrub pa ni// dpa' bo spyi gtsug rkang mthar ro// rnam gnyis rjes su sbyor ba yis//
114b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus kyi mda' ni sngags skyes so// mtshon bya mtshon pas gang mtshon pa// mtshon par bya dang mtshon byed med// pad stsal lta bu'i skud pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis mtha' gnas phyin// mda' dang gzhu ni mi
114b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ste/ / gang du btang zhing 'gro bar bya// de tshe srog kun lkugs par ni// 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i sgom pa ste// de yi dbus su 'di dgod pa// 'khor lo'i go cha ma lha mo// mdog
115a1(rgyud 'bum): dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi can/ / sngags yig rnams las byung ba ni// shes rab thabs bdag nyid can mchog/ oM sa barban+d+ha bi na ka ka la rA ba ya d+ha rmAdz+nyA dz+nyAn pha ka Ta rU pa ya Ta hUM swA hA
115a2(rgyud 'bum): tsakrA barmiN+Di ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya sngags rab sbyor bdag nyid// lkugs pa'i rnam shes bsgrub par bya// sngon gyi 'khrul 'khor bris nas ni// gsang sngags 'phreng ba 'di dgod bya// thog mar rnam par snang
115a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de/ / gnyis par ldan ni rnam par sbyin// bi yig gsum par sbyin par bya// bzhi par hUM gi yi ge'o// lnga par d+ha yi yi ge ste// dum bu drug par rA sbyin bya// bdun par gri yi yi ge ste// brgyad par ga yi yaM
115a4(rgyud 'bum): / ge'o/ dgu par m+b+ha yig sbyin bya// bcu par b+hU yig slar dgod do// gri yig bcu gcig pa ru ste// hUM yig bcu gnyis par dgod bya// bcu gsum pa ru gri yig ste// bcu bzhi pa la dza yig go// bco lnga pa la b+ha
115a5(rgyud 'bum): yig ste/ / pa ya gnyis dgod bcu drug par// bcu bdun pa la su yig ste// pa yig bco brgyad par dgod bya// gcig nyung nyi shur hUM sbyin no// nyi shu pa la Ta'i yi ge/ nyi shu gcig par yi ge hUM// nyi shu gnyis
115a6(rgyud 'bum): par hUM 'gyur ro/ / nyi shu gsum par gri yig ste// hUM yig nyi shu bzhi par ro// nyi shu drug par Ta yig sbyin// nyi shu bdun par pha'i yi ge/ hUM yig nyi shu brgyad par te// hoHyig nyi shu rtsa dgu par// sum
115a7(rgyud 'bum): tsuchub laM b+hU yig sbyin/ / sum cu gcig par sna dgod bya// hUM yig sum cu gnyis par sbyin// sum cu gsum 'dir m+b+ha yig go// sum cu bzhi par hUM yig ste// de nyid sum cu lnga par ro// sum cu drug par
115b1(rgyud 'bum): ya yig sbyin/ / hA yig sum cu bdun par te// sum cu brgyad par pa ya gnyis// gcig dman bzhi bcu pa la hUM// bzhi bcu pa la hUM sbyin bya// bzhi bcu gcig par ni b+hi'o// hUM yig bzhi bcu gnyis par
115b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin rabazhi bcu rtsa gsum pa la oM/ / ya na'i yig gnyis sbyin bya ba// dum bu bzhi bcu bzhi par ro// bzhi bcu lnga par A na ste// bzhi bcu drug pa'i phaT de bzhin// bzhi bcu bdun pa la ni oM// bzhi
115b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu rtsa brgyad pa la phaT/ / bzhi bcu dgu par su sbyin bya// thams cad ji lta'i rim pas so// dum bu dbus mar bsgrub bya'i ming // ka ra ka ra sogs nang bcug/ thams cad bsdus nas shes byas nas//
115b4(rgyud 'bum): lkugs par bcing bar bya ba ni// byi ba steng du 'gro ba'i sgor// 'khrul 'khor glang rmig bcas par snga// a ba d+hU tIr yid byas nas// de yi dbus su rab tu gzhug/ phyogs thams cad du srin po ni//
115b5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas 'khrul 'khor bsgrub pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
115b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i lkugs par bya ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / 'khor lo sgom pa dang / dpa' bo dang
115b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas shin tu dpa' mo'i las// zhi bar byed pa gsal
116a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya/ / rab sbyor de rnams kyis bya ste// na ga rer ni yang dag bzhugs// btang snyoms byang chub yan lag ste// lha yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul cher// dpral ba'i gnas su lha mo ni/
116a2(rgyud 'bum): skye 'gro'i bdag mo bsgom par bya// dbang gnyis yang dag 'dus pa las// rtsa chen po ni bde bas gang // bcu gnyis mtha' ru bskyod pa las// 'dir ni sa bon g.yo ba med// dbang po la sogs thams cad
116a3(rgyud 'bum): ni'adod chags bral ba nyid 'thob 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor chen po mnyam pa'i bde// slar yang bde ba'i rang bzhin med// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun dri ma// rnam bral pha rol son pa che// 'thob po dga' ba de
116a4(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / skyes bu dang ni gnyis med rtse// theg pa gsum las gzhan med de// de rnams kyis blta dus kun du// 'gro dang nyal dang za ba ni// rnal 'byor sgrub pas spangs pa yin// dga' rol rtsed mo rtse ba
116a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / glu len pa yis gos pa med// de phyir btang snyoms byang yan lag/ gnas skabs kun rjes spangs pas so// de ltar zhi don du byas pas// don yod mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur// gang dang gang gi
116a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can ni/ / nad pa la sogs la bltas pa// de dang de yis sems can ni// zhi ba'i las can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur du na// phra mo'i las ni smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs
116a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su/ / shin tu dpa' mo bsgom par bya// lha mo rtag tu mdog dkar mo// lhag ma sngon ma lta bu mchog/ gsang sngags 'phreng ba'i rab sbyor bas// shes rab dang ni thabs byung ba'o// gtor ma sbyin sreg
116b1(rgyud 'bum): chog yis/ / blo ldan zhi rdzas rnams kyis te// zho mar 'o ma zas rnams kyi// 'dir ni dgang blugs dbul bar bya// ga pur tsan dan la sogs pas// 'khrul 'khor sngon gyi bri bar bya// oM pa mu radz+dza kr-i ba ta
116b2(rgyud 'bum): lI ya lan+ta ga ma nan+ta sha rA nA ya ya huM hUM huM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA/ oM su bI rI ye huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya sngags yig sa bon te// skye ba dang ni gnas pa'i rgyu// ye shre sa bon thams cad rnams//
116b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas dpral ba sogs par ro// rnal 'byor pa rnams rtse dus las// bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'gag par 'gyur// dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ru// sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di dgod bya// dum dbus phyi rol brgyad
116b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / phyogs mtshams ji lta'i rim pa yis// rnam par snang mdzad sa bon bzhi// hUM gi yi ge bzhi rnams so// de'i phyi dum bu bcu drug tu// phyogs mtshams rim pa ji bzhin pas// hUM yig brgyad ni
116b5(rgyud 'bum): / dgod bya zhing // de nas gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na'i tshig/ sum+b+ha ni su'o dum lhag ma// de'i phyi rol nyi shur bzhir// m+b+ha gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya// 'dir ni bri bar bya ba ste// A na ya A na ya hoH'i tshig/ b+ha ga wan bid+yA rA dza dang /
116b6(rgyud 'bum): phaT yig de nas bri bar bya// dbus ma'i dum bur bsgrub bya ni// gnod mdzes sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o// lha yi gzugs kyi khar bri bya// de ltar lha yi 'khrul 'khor ni// ling ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya//
116b7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu spyod kun shes par bya// gzhan gyis dus su mi 'grub bo// thig le sgra yi dus su ni// rlung gi dbyibs nas brtan pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro na//
117a1(rgyud 'bum): slar yang sa gzhi'i 'jig rten pa'i// zhi ba'i dgos byed smos ci dgos// de byed rnal 'byor dbang phyug ni// lha dang lha min rnams kyis mchod// de yang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob na//
117a2(rgyud 'bum): de zhabs 'brang byed smos ci dgos// 'jig rten sangs rgyas sogs chen pos// de ni phyag 'os mchod 'os so// bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa dang // sbyin sreg yA ga srogs mchog tu// zhi dang byang chub
117a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni sems/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas pa yis// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pas// kun mkhyen skye ba 'di la'o// dpal he
117a4(rgyud 'bum): ru ka gnyis med lhan cig pa'i/ / rdo rje phag mo mthong bar 'gyur// de yis mchog ni ster byed de// rang gi 'khor los sgyur thim pa'o// de rnams phyag rgya'i grub byed par// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro
117a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gnas pa/ / gnas dang gnas rnams su 'thob bo// he ru ka'i sngags 'khrul 'khor dang // las rnams thams cad mi shes na// de ni don med yongs ngal te// 'gro ba drug tu
117a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khyam 'gyur zhing / / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang // 'jig rten 'gro kun 'grol ba min// dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas pa yi// sngags kyi nus pas grol ba'o// brtse ba chen pos phag mo sogs// rnal
117a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma bsnyen shes par bya/ / gnyis sbyor bde ba'i rnam pa ni// bud med skyes pa ma ning min// dngos po tsam du sems can la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam
117b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/
117b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dpa' mo'i zhi ba'i las kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo sgom pa dang gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi las kyi tshogs zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o//
117b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas lha mos mchod byas nas// 'di skad kyi ni cho ga dris so// thams cad bsrung ba'i las chen po// khyab bdag bdag gis mi 'tshal lo// phag mo lha rdzas pad can gyi// lha mo
117b4(rgyud 'bum): / nyon cig rab bshad bya// stobs chen ma yis rab sbyor bas// sin d+hu yi ni gnas bsgrubs te// yang dag lta ba'i rang bzhin du// mchog gi ma mo shes par bya// de ltar de nyid nges par byed// mchog gi
117b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par 'jug par bya/ / ma mo'i 'khor lo'i grong nyams dgar// dpa' bo'i gtso bo bsgom par bya// lhan skyes byang chub rigs pa yis// de'i bdag nyid du gang mtshon bya// sngon du hA ste bgrod pa bzhin//
117b6(rgyud 'bum): drag shul sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor thams cad yongs dmigs nas// phung po'i rtsa ba las gzhon can// spyi bo yi ni thod par bzung // uR+Yan bu gar son pa ste// lte ba yi ni gnas thob nas/
117b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sa bon rnams kyi 'dzin// mtshan ma yis ni bzung bar ni// khams thams cad kyis gang bar byas// la la nA yi lam son nas// sngon gyi gnas su yang dag rig/ me yis bzhu ba'i khams kyis
118a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rtsa sbubs thams cad dgang bar bya/ / 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// skad cig la ni lta zhing mthong // zla ba 'gro ba'i dbus su ni// sgor 'phyang ba ni blta bar bya// sbyor
118a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog shes byas bsgrubs byas la/ / de yi rang bzhin can bsam bya// mdzod spur son pa'i bu ga ru// rlung gi lce ni gzhug par bya// rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom rim pas// yang dag lta bar shes par bya//
118a3(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog/ shes rab rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya// sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba// shes rab thabs bdag nyid mchog go// oM du ma Sha hA TA ra nAM k+Sha bi ka dA rA la ya ne hUM hUM hUM hUM pha
118a4(rgyud 'bum): phaT Ta pha phaT Ta swA swA hA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i sngags las lha mo che// ye shes sku ni yang dag byung // gru bzhi zlum po dang bcas pa'i// byang chub 'khrul 'khor
118a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag bri ste/ / dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la// gsang sngags bzhi po yang dag par// dum bu re rer bri bar bya// dum bu lnga ru sgrub po ste// g+hA g+ha la sogs nang bcug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i phyag tu ni//
118a6(rgyud 'bum): gi wang ngam ni yang na ni// gi wang chen pos bri bya ba// gro gar 'khrul 'khor thams cad ni// las kyi khyad par gyis bri ste// g.yul ngo chen po'i ras la ni// las thams cad pa bya ba yin// dpa' bo
118a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i
118b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ stob chen ma'i sbyor bas srung ba chen po phur bu'i sngags kyi las byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul 'khor sgom pa'i man ngag gi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa
118b2(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa'o/ / / de nas las mchog thams cad ni// sems can kun la 'byung bshad bya// 'khor los sgyur ma'i rab sbyor bar// mA ru'i gnas su bsgrub par bya// yang dag
118b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa byang chub kyi/ / phyogs su gnas bzhin par bya'o// rgyas pa bsgrub bya phyi nas ni// mkhas pas las ni bya ba yin// gtum mo lte bar sbar ba yis// tshogs thams cad ni sreg pa ste// mig la sog
118b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bsregs nas ni/ / bsregs pas rkan las thig le 'dzag/ 'gro 'o de ni mtshams kun tu// pad snal skud pa'i dri ba'o// 'bigs shing 'gro bas ro myong ba// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la'o//
118b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thom dang rmugs pa'i ye shes ni// 'gro ba med dang 'ong bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yi rnal 'byor pa// lo yi sbyor bas de 'grub 'gyur// de dang 'di yis yang dag ldan// las rnams thams cad byed par
118b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dga' ba 'jig rten thams cad du// zhes bya 'gro 'gyur de'i bdag nyid// rnam par rtog pa de 'khyer te// gom pa gcig ni 'gro mi 'gyur// tshogs kun ngo bor gyur nas ni// bdag gi gdan ni
118b7(rgyud 'bum): de mthong 'gyur/ / 'chi bas mi 'jigs 'di yi phyir// gzhan gyi gdan du yang dag gnas// gang gang las la bltas rnams kyis// de de thams cad du byed do// char pa'i dus las shes byas pa// de ni
119a1(rgyud 'bum): de ni rnal 'byor gdan du 'dod/ / kun mkhyen thams cad las can ni// gang phyir gsang ba'i gdan mchog yin// yang dag rtog pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// byang chub phyogs su 'gro bar
119a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ba lang rta dang mi dang khyi// glang po ma he bong bu dang // rnga mo byi chung byi la dang // phag pa dang ni spre'u rnams kyi// sha ni skyur po la btags pa// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya// rang bzhin dngos
119a3(rgyud 'bum): grub 'thob 'gyur na/ / dngos grub brgyad po slar cis min// ral gri mig sman rkang byug dang // ril bu dngul chu mchil lham dang // bcud len dang ni sa 'og dang // dgug pa yang ni 'grub pa'o// ro langs
119a4(rgyud 'bum): bslang ba'i dngos grub ni/ / khyi nag mo yi 'o ma dang // ma Sha nag po'i thug pa yis// yi dgas bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo 'am// sngags pas tshes brgyad la ro yi// kha ru sbyin sreg bya de bzhin// dur khrod kyi ni yungs
119a5(rgyud 'bum): kar ram/ / mar khu 'bad pas bzung nas ni// des kyang dpa' bos byug bya ste// de tshe'i nub mor rnam par brjod// yi dgas chen po de langs nas// dbang chen mthil la phye mar byed// des rtag 'jigs par mi
119a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ rang rkyen sbyor bas bskyed pa yin// til lam til mar gzhan yang ni// gang rung ci rung bzung byas nas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems can rgyur// byin pas thams cad du 'gro'o// sgrol ma tsun du
119a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer can/ / khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma dang // gshin mthar bcas sogs khro bo che// sgom dang sngags kyi bzlas pa ni// 'bum phrag gcig gis sdig 'joms te// dbye bas mjal ba thob par byed// dngos
119b1(rgyud 'bum): grub ci 'dra ba 'dod pa/ / stsal nas rgyun du zhugs pa yin// yang na snyan dngags rig pa yin// lung gi don ni 'chad pa'o// kun shes gang thams cad kyi skad// ma mthong ba rnams shes par 'gyur// tshar
119b2(rgyud 'bum): gcad rjes gzung thams cad ni/ / chos bya chos can thams cad byed// sgrol sogs rnal 'byor ma mchog rnams// rang bdag gzugs gzhan shes bya gnyis// 'di rnams kun bsdus gzugs nyid
119b3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ 'khor lo sgyur ma sgom par gyis// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs 'dzin de// de rnams kyis ni 'khor sgyur ma'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM tsun+de swA hA/ oM mA ri ts+tshe swA hA/ oM b+hi ku TI swA hA/ oM
119b4(rgyud 'bum): par+N+Na sha ba rI swA sma de ltar kun gyi 'khrul 'khor yang / / sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyis bya// bskyed pa dang ni gnas pa'i rgyur// ji lta'i rigs pas bsgrub par bya// 'od zer 'phreng bas kun 'khrigs pa// snying
119b5(rgyud 'bum): kha'i 'khor lor gzung bar bya/ / 'di yis 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'joms te// rgas dang 'chi ba med 'thob byed// 'khor lo sgyur ma'i lha mo ni// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid mchog/ mdog dang dbyibs
119b6(rgyud 'bum): ni rang gi ste/ / sngags yig rnams las yang dag byung // oM kro d+hu d+harmo s+thA dA ra ya s+thA ka ra rA NA ya ya huM hUM huM hUM pa phaT Ta pha pha TaT sA sA hA hA/ oM tsakra bar+t+ti nI ye huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags
119b7(rgyud 'bum): las yang dag byung / / mkha' 'gro ma yis 'khor lo sgyur// lha min 'khrul 'khor bri bya ste// gcig dman lnga bcu'i dum bu la// ji ltar lha rnams kyi ni sngags// bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa yi// phag
120a1(rgyud 'bum): mo yi ni snying po yang / / dum bu so so la bri'o// phyi rol tu ni sngags kun gyis// 'dir ni rtag tu bskor bar bya// g.yul ngo yi ni ras la ni// rdzas kun gyis ni yongs bris nas// 'khrul
120a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor las ni thams cad la/ / lha ma yin gyi khar sbyin bya// lo yi nyin zhag sbyor ba can// thun mtshams so sor bsgom par bya// gshin dgra'i 'khrul 'khor bri bya ste// dum bu bcu bdun pa la ni// phyi rol
120a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug sbyin bya ba/ / hrIHSh+T+rIH'i sngags 'di dgod par bya// ya ma me da k+She rA dzA sa do// ru Na yo ni rA yats+tsha ni// de ltar sngags chen bris nas ni// las thams cad ni bsgrub par bya// yi ge re re'i gtso bo
120a4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ las rnams kyang ni bcu bdun no// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug nas// gshin rje'i snying po'i sngags rnams ni// lugs bzlog yi ge phyi rol tu// mkhas pa rnams kyis bri bar bya// 'jigs dang
120a5(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal po'i rigs dang ni// dgra thams cad ni rnam par 'joms// gzhan yang rdza rnga bcing ba yi// khyab bdag rang gis sngags btu ba// sa gzhi cha mnyam nyams dga' bar// tsan dan la sogs byugs/
120a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ru sgrub pa po yis yang bya ste// ri mo dgu pa legs zlum por// gcig dman lnga bcu'i dum bu la// gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi yi khar// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// sngags kyi
120a7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge rnams gzhag bya/ / gnod mdzes rgyal po yi ni sngags// sngags pas de nas yang dag btu// de ni tshigs kun tu shes bya// rgyud gzhan du ni ma bshad do// de yi yi ge rtsa rnams su// re re yi ni tshogs
120b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams ni/ / gcig dman lnga bcu yi ni mtshams// mkhas dus me yi tshogs can no// gang gang tshes su yongs bshad pa// mnyam par gzhag pas de de'i tshigs// gang du yi ge gcig blangs nas// der ni
120b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge thams cad de/ / rtsis kyis rim rnams kyis btu bar// bde mchog 'bum par gsungs pa yin// phyi dang nang bdag nyid 'khrul 'khor// rnal 'byor rnams kyi kun bsgrub pa'o// gsang sngags bde bas
120b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / khyad par du yang 'khrul 'khor ro// de yis dngos grub thob 'gyur bar// 'dir ni som nyi srid ma yin// rten dang brten pa'i gzugs can te// ji lta'i rim par ming dang gnas// gnas ni
120b4(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi gzugs su ste/ / brten pa'i ming ni rnal 'byor ma// 'di dag mnyam par snyoms 'jug pa// las thams cad par mngon par brjod// de yis rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// brten pa thabs kyi spyod yul
120b5(rgyud 'bum): lo gang phyir sa gzhi rten yin pas/ / de'i phyir thabs ni rnal 'byor ma// yang na thams cad thabs yin la// yang na thams cad shes rab bo// shes rab thabs bral de rnams kyis// sangs rgyas sku ni mya
120b6(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'das/ / theg pa mchog 'dir shes rab dang // bral bas thams cad srid par 'gro// srid dang mya ngan 'das gang chos// de rnams spangs pas chos med do// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//
120b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor
121a1(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo sgom pa'i lam dang / rdza rnga'i sngags mdor bstan pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste
121a2(rgyud 'bum): le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang mchog gtso bo// 'khor los sgyur sogs rgyas pa ni// phan pa thams cad ster ba'i las// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par
121a3(rgyud 'bum): byabartson chen ma yi rab sbyor bas/ / ku lu tAr ni yongs su bzhugs// byang chub phyogs ni yang dag ngag/ 'khrul 'khor mi yi gzugs can no// 'phyang ba la ni yongs brten nas// bsam med byang
121a4(rgyud 'bum): chub 'thob par byed/ / de ni las kun gtso bo ste// rang byung phyag rgya chen po'o// khams rnams thams cad yang dag byung // de ni 'phyang bar mngon par brjod// dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams la// re re la ni
121a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa brgyad/ / khams thams cad la'ang shes bya ba// mig dang bu ga zla bya'o// dpa' bo thams cad so so yi// re re'i ming du'ang brjod par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa bdun du// dpa' bo re re
121a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / khams brgyad po ni thams cad du// rnam pa gsum du'ang mtshon par bya// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kyi// rab sbyor ming mdor bstan pas te// phag mo sogs su yongs gnas pa'i//
121a7(rgyud 'bum): brtson chen ma'i nang shes par bya// dal gyis khams la bsnun pa yis// gnyid log pa las sad par bya// dpa' bo'i ral gri gang 'dra bas// stobs po che la 'bigs par 'gyur// de 'dra'i 'phyang ba'i
121b1(rgyud 'bum): ral gri ni/ / khams thams cad la 'bigs par 'gyur// hA yi mdor bstan shes byas nas// tshigs mtshams kun tu gnas par gyis// de las bskyed pa'i dpa' bo rnams// bye ba 'bum tshe stong phrag
121b2(rgyud 'bum): go/ byang chub sa bon rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor ma ni de'i rigs grags// khams thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa// nges 'byung dus su yang dag byung // 'phyang bzhin par ni de shes bya// rang gzhan
121b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag rig pa spangs/ / rigs ni khams rnams thams cad de// rnal 'byor ma ni rigs can yin// gnyis po yang dag sbyor ba ru// 'phyang ba lto bar rab zhugs bya// khams thams cad kyi ro'i
121b4(rgyud 'bum): bar du/ / de ni chad pa nyid du 'gyur// bcud kyis len ni bsgrubs pa yis// skye bo kun la rgyas pa yin// de rnams kun tu gnas pa med// mkha' spyod nyid du nye bar 'gro// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
121b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / dbus su zag pa med par bzhugs// de ltar yon tan gter thams cad// yang dag ngag gi go 'phang gnas// brjod min pa yi sngags chen po// bsnam zhing skye bo kun la sgrogs//
121b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhom du med par de shes bya// sa ni rdo rje 'dzin ma rang // khams rnams kyi dngos ma lus pa// ming gis dpa' bor yang dag gnas// thod pa'i dum bu yi ni khams// rang nyid so sor bshad par bya//
121b7(rgyud 'bum): sen mo dang ni so 'bab pa// re re'i brgyad du phye ba can// sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi dang // de bzhin dngos po bzhi dag go// de ltar gnas ni gsum gsum du// dpa' bo thams cad sbyar bar bya// skra
122a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ba spu 'bab pa dang / / pags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab// sha dang sha red 'bab pa dang // chu rgyus dang ni rtsa 'bab dang // rus pa dang ni pags 'bab dang // mkhal ma dang ni stobs
122a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bab dang / / snying dang 'dra ba 'bab pa dang // mig dang chu ser 'bab pa dang // mkhris pa dang ni rlung 'bab dang // glo ba dang ni rtsa 'bab dang // der 'bab pa yi dngos po ni// gnye ma dang ni mchin pa 'bab//
122a3(rgyud 'bum): lto ba dang ni dbugs 'bab dang // bshang dang gci ba 'bab pa dang // mtshams kyi mtha' dang dri ma 'bab// rgyu shun dang ni mchil ma 'bab// rnag dang chu ser 'bab pa dang // khrag dang me tog 'bab pa dang //
122a4(rgyud 'bum): rdul dang rlangs pa 'bab pa dang // tshal dang lto tshal 'bab pa dang // mchi ma dang ni khu ba 'bab// lud pa dang ni rims med 'bab// snabs dang rkang mar 'bab pa ste// dpa' rnams khams kyi mtshan nyid do//
122a5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar dum bu dum bu nyid// khams ni gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur// re re yi yang rang bzhin yang // zad pa'i rlung gis thod pa can// bde ba kun gyi nang thim par// keng rus chen po 'gro ba yin// sems dang
122a6(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa de yi phyir/ / keng rus kun tu stong pa nyid// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yis// thams cad gnyis med lhan skyes gsal// lha yi dgra ni chen po'i gzugs// rnam shes lha dang lha can no// 'od
122a7(rgyud 'bum): dpag med dang tshig med pa/ / rdo rje'i 'od zer rang bzhin can// rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi ni sku// rdo rje'i sku ni der shes bya// myu gu can ni dngos po can// mthong ba tsam gyis dga' byed pa'o// rnam shes bems
122b1(rgyud 'bum): por 'ching bar ni/ / rdo rje ral pa can 'gro'o// sa gsum zas kyi mchog tu ni// dpa' bo chen po'i bgrod pas byas// mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas sdod par// rdo rje hUM mdzad 'gro ba'o// shin tu bzang po thob med
122b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'ajig rten 'jig rten spangs pa'o/ / skye 'gro kun tu rang byung ba// rdo rje bzang po de grags pa'o// 'jigs byed chen po'i go 'phang gis// las kyi bag chags thal bas bsgos// mig mi bzang gis ma
122b3(rgyud 'bum): bltas kyang / / thams cad mtshan nyid mthong bar 'gyur// stobs po che ni sngags thams cad// rnam pa gsum gyi bdag nyid do// rin chen rdo rje smra bcad che// zag med khams ni thams cad du'o// rta mgrin sa
122b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhi chen po la/ / srog son kun la sbyar bar bya// srog kun dgang bar bya ba ste// de yis nam mkha'i snying por bshad// dpal he ru ka rtag tu stong // sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin can// pad+ma gar dbang phyug pa gzugs
122b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs med rnal 'byor du 'gro ba'o/ / bde ba chen pos snang byed pas// rnam snang mdzad du mngon par brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings byas pa// mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam
122b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba/ / khams thams cad kyi nang du'o// skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu// ro myang mtshan nyid shes par bya// khams 'di rnams ni thams cad kyi// zad nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar che// rang bzhin khams kyi
122b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs ni/ / dus tshod dang ni klu dang mda'// de rnams rnal 'byor mar yongs grags// rgyud ma'i rim pa las 'ongs pa'o// khams kyang rnam par dpyad bzhin pas// thams cad bdag nyid kyis 'byung min//
123a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes ma yin ye shes min// thams cad stong pa 'o yod ma yin// gser 'gyur rtsi ni ma rig pas// mchog tu bde ba rig pa min// rang gi dgos pa byed pa ni// spar sha'i rigs lha'i
123a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid do/ / brtson 'grus chen por mngon brjod pa'i// de phyir rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya// khams thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa// rnal 'byor gdan du yang dag byung // gang zhig kun nas kun tu ni// de ni de
123a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs par mthong / / mkha' 'gro dang ni sdom rgyud dang // nges par brjod pa phyi ma dang // kun spyod 'byung ba'i rgyud rnams su// dngos po las ni rab tu bstan// de yis rgyud ni chen po 'di// thub pa
123a4(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ / dum bu dum bur yongs gnas pa'i// las chen po ni der drang bya// phra mo'i bya ba mngon brjod pa// khams rnams kyi ni gnas la'o// ji lta'i rim pas khams blang ste// yongs
123a5(rgyud 'bum): bsdus spyod yul bar du'o/ / tshogs bcad thog ma sogs pas kyang // ji srid rdzogs pa'i spyod yul du// rgyud 'di rnal 'byor gtso bo ste// las rnams rgya che ba yin no// yang na rnal 'byor thams cad ni//
123a6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi tshogs su 'dod par bya// bdag gi de nyid rtag tu las// byas pa'ang gal te ma byas pa'o// rnal 'byor rnams kyi sbyor mtshan nyid// rang bzhin las su yang dag bshad// de ltar rgyud rnams thams
123a7(rgyud 'bum): cad du/ / sngags pas mchog tu shes par bya// yang na gang dang 'dra'i rnal 'byor// de dang 'dra bar khams gnas te// bcud kyis len gyi rdzas rnams ni// sman chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi por// sbyar byas dpa' bo
123b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid rnams kyis/ / grol bar bgrod pa gsungs pa yin// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bcu drug de rnams rdzas chen te// brgyad gnyis tshigs bcad phyed kyis so// /
123b2(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang gzugs su yang dag byung // 'jig rten gsum du rnyed pa dka'// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i kun sbyor ba'i// dbus ma bla na med pa'i dbus// ril bu rtag tu mchod bya ste// pho nya lhan cig skyes bdag nyid//
123b3(rgyud 'bum): yid ni nang du son pa yis// rang khu sangs rgyas thig le can// sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas// tshogs kyi dbus su rab tu bzhugs// ming med mthe bong dag gis khar// zla ba'i btung ba myang bar gyis//
123b4(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi lngar gyur 'di rnams kyis// mchod pa bzhi ni de bzhin bya// lha dang mi rnams bde ba bas// bcu drug cha shas rin che'o// de ltar tshogs bcad 'di kun gyis// khams lnga rab tu bshad par 'gyur//
123b5(rgyud 'bum): / ra yi yi gre khrag gi khams// hA yig ri skyes su 'dod do// s+ya yig dri yi lo ma ste// pa yig pags pa ru ni 'dod// ra yig g+han d+ha kar rab bshad// me yig me tog tu dran bya// ra yig rA bi Na de bzhin//
123b6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang me yi yi ge shwa/ sa yig kun tu ru las skyes// rba yig yi ge rtsar 'dod do// t+ma'i yi ge spug skyes bshad// ni yig dri yi mar khu'o// sa yi yi ge so yi rdul// dA yi yi ge rgya mtsho skyes// s+thi yig
123b7(rgyud 'bum): ba mo de bzhin tu/ / ta yig snying po'i ga pur ro// sgra dang gzugs su yongs byung ba// khrag khu nor bu'i bar dag tu'o// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// rang rig pad+mar son pa'o// bsrub dang bsrub
124a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor rnams kyis/ / rang byung gis ni rnam bsres pa'o// dbus ma'i mchog gi dbugs kyang ni// skad cig dbu mar gzung ba'o// ril bu rtag tu mchod pa ni// bdud rtsi gsang
124a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chu yin no/ / pho nya lhan skyes bdag nyid ni// dbang gnyis sbyor las rtse ba'o// yid ni nang du song ba ni// khams rnams kyang ni zhu ba'o// rang khu thig les sangs rgyas rnams// zhu gang sbyor ba las
124a3(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'o/ / sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga pur bcas// bcu drug 'dod ma las byung ba'o// tshogs dbus rab tu bzhugs rnams kyis// 'di kun lhan skyes la sbyar ba'o// ming med mthe bos khar gzhug pa//
124a4(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par 'jug las khrag byung ba'o// zhi ba'i btung ba myang ba ni// 'pho ba'i dus las ma lus gang // 'di rnams bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ba// 'phos las byung ba'i mi'i mar khu// mchod bzhi de bzhin bya ba ni//
124a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi mnyam ga pur bcas pa'o// lha dang mi rnams bde ba ni// dga' ba kun las gang byung ba'o// bcu drug cha shas rin che ba// thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin can// de ltar dpa' bo thams cad ni// khams
124a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdzas rnams su sbyar bya/ / bcud len de las byung ba ste// gtso bo ye shes me rlung gis// 'dzad pa dang ni bsad byas nas// 'pho ba dang ni gzag de bzhin/ dzad pa byang chub 'dzag pa ste// bsad pa
124a7(rgyud 'bum): yis kyang 'pho med 'gyur/ / 'pho ba rtsa rnams kun tu ste// gzag pa lte ba'i pad+mar ro// de rnams bcing ba byas pa yis// khams thams cad du gzag par bya// bsad pa dngos po gzhom pa ste// rgyas pa
124b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams rnams su/ / sbyin sreg cho ga der shes nas// 'khor los sgyur nyid thob par gyis// thab tu bdud rtsi bsreg bya ste// 'jam pa'i rdo rje mngon sum du// rnal 'byor ldan pas mthong
124b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / sa thams cad la 'khyer bar byed// srog ni gang gi chos can che// chos ni kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi rang bzhin brtson chen ma// sum cu bdun bdag nyid mchog tu// dkyil 'khor sngags
124b3(rgyud 'bum): las nges rdzogs pa/ / shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid mchog/ lha mo chen mo kha dog dkar// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ma// sems can thams cad dbang 'gyur dang // 'khor lo sgyur ba 'thob par
124b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / oM ga i ran+d+ra sa dzA ta la bA sa darba pra sa bA tA dat+sa ma ne hA hUM ma hUM te phaT hUM swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA bir+ya yai huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags kyi de nyid bdag/ lha thams cad kyi sa bon no//
124b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo de'i tshe ni// re'u mig gcig dman lnga bcu ste// kha ches yang dag bri byas nas// gsang sngags 'phreng ba 'di dgod bya// lugs las bzlog pas gnod mdzes sngags// ji lta'i
124b6(rgyud 'bum): rim pas dgod par bya/ / de tshe mi yi gzugs byas nas// slar yang zlum po sbyin par bya// de la rtsa ba'i sngags bris nas// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug pa'o// dbus kyi dum bur bsgrub bya ni// de yi sngags
124b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang bcug pa'o/ / gro ga sogs su sngags pas bri// phyi dang gsang bar mtshon par bya// de lta'i 'khrul 'khor rab sbyar bas// sa gsum po la bsgom par bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo
125a1(rgyud 'bum): rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po lnga/
125a2(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus chen mo'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsang ba'i bcud len la sogs pa dang / rgyas pa'i las dpal yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa
125a3(rgyud 'bum): dgu pa'o/ / // de nas dpa' bo phyag rdor sogs// sngags pa thams cad bzhengs rnams kyis// bstod dang mchod dang phyag bcas pas// phag mo rab tu sad par byed// bdag gi ma yi
125a4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo kye/ / lha mo kun gyis rab mchod ma// khyod ni 'di rnams kun gyi ma// ye shes snying mo phyag 'tshal 'dud// sem can kun la snying rje yi// gzugs su rang gis sprul pa mo// bdag la kun tu thugs rje yi//
125a5(rgyud 'bum): bka' drin chen po mdzad par rigs// bde ba chen po yongs bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan bdag po la dri'o// rgyud thams cad kyi las tshogs kyi// sgrub pa'i thabs ni mi 'tshal to// gal te ji srid rgyud rgyud
125a6(rgyud 'bum): dulas thams cad ni bstan pa ni/ / rnam dag ye shes thob rnams kyi// de tshe der 'di ci phyir gsungs// rgyud 'di nyid du 'jug 'gyur bar// skye bo thams cad mi rigs so// slar yang bshad pa skyon dang
125a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas bdag gis ma shes the tsom mchis/ / phag mo ci yang mi gsung bas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zhugs nas// de yi ye shes su 'gyur te// de yis lan ni gsung bar mdzad// bcom ldan chos
125b1(rgyud 'bum): kun bdag nyid kyi/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi yid du ni// byas nas gsung ni rjod byed pa// phag mo'i ris thams cad kyis so// kye kye dpa' bo thams cad rnams// ye shes zhes bya gnyis 'dres pa'i// khyed kyi ye shes
125b2(rgyud 'bum): gang mthong ba/ / de ni de dang de ru thim// 'on kyang so sor 'jug byed pa// sems can sna tshogs bsam pas so// dbye ba med nyid rgyud chen por// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sdom pa dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor rgyud
125b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / 'dus pa la sogs don chen po// de rnams kyis ni rgyud 'di yis// sna tshogs don ni mngon brjod pa// de thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs// ldan pas rab tu gsal bar byed// rgyud du brjod bya brjod/
125b4(rgyud 'bum): pa por// de yis phra mor 'jug par byed// re re'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid can// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs ldan// de la rnam par shes pa'i chos// thod pa yi ni dum bur bshad// sems can kun gyi las dang ni//
125b5(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs bde bar shes par bya// gzhan du kun mkhyen rgyud la ni// yi ge skye bar mi 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi ni bar gyi ni// zla ba bcu gnyis de shes bya// dus tshed drug gi 'khor lo sgyur// sems can rmi
125b6(rgyud 'bum): lam lta bu mchog/ mi shes dri mas bsgos pa yis// de rnams kyis ni bde mi rig/ hA ra do la'i rim pa yis// rnam par shes pa shes bzhin par// khri phrag gnyis la stong dang ni// drug brgya yis ni lhag pa
125b7(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ dbugs kyi chu tshod drug cu la// zhag gcig tu ni rab tu grags// hA ra do la'i dbugs rnams kyis// bsgyur bas do la la mtshan pa'o// gnyis kyi dbugs ni blo ldan gyis// phyir 'byung nang 'jug thim
126a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor pa yis dgongs 'gyur te// kun mkhyen nyid du nyer 'od min// phra zhing phra ba'i rnal 'byor du// gnas nas thams cad rnam par spyad// de yi ang ka phyi rol tu//
126a2(rgyud 'bum): sa la bcu gnyis gzhag par bya// ji ltar nyi ma'i dbye bshad pa// yan lag bcu gnyis kyang de bzhin// rgyu skar dang ni gza' rnams kyi// 'char ba dus thams cad du'o// re re yi ni khams kyi ni// rang gi dus
126a3(rgyud 'bum): su'ang 'char bar 'gyur/ / dus su 'chi dang de bzhin gzhan// rim pa 'di yis 'chad par 'gyur// dA t+yA la sogs sbyor shes pas// 'di ni sbyor ba phyi mo la'o// nyi ma byang du bgrod pa yi// rgyal gyi zla ba sogs
126a4(rgyud 'bum): brtsams nas/ / zla ba bcu gnyis de ltar du// rim pa rim pas gzhag par bya// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs brtsams nas// snga dro nas brtsi blo ldan gyis// gsum la bcu gsum de bzhin te// bzhi pa yang na
126a5(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi pa/ / lnga pa bco lnga pa ru ni// bshad par bya yis da lta nyon// 'di rnams mnyam zhing mnyam ldan par// sgrub pos mthun par bya ba yin// de la ma rig 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/
126a6(rgyud 'bum): skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor ba dang ni sred de bzhin// nye bar len dang srid pa dang // skye ba dang ni rga shi'o// de bzhin ro hi ta sogs kyis// chu srin la sogs rA si rnams// bcu gnyis nyid du 'dod
126a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / thog mar ma yig chu srin dang // ro hi ta 'o de bzhin gzhan// gnyis par mo hi ta bum pa// 'du byed du ni gsal bar 'gro// gsum par bzang po dang ni nya// rnam par shes par de rig bya// bzhi
126b1(rgyud 'bum): par khyu mchog dang ni lug/ ming dang gzugs su 'dod par bya// lnga pa ru ni rus sbal te// bri Sha skye mched drug mchog go// drug par chu sbyin dang 'khrig pa// rtag tu reg pa ru ni 'gro// bdun par raN Ta kar+m+masa?/
126b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni tsher ba mchog/ brgyad par mi kI ra seng ge/ mchog tu mthun ma sred pa'o// dgu par b+hi dri dang bu mo// nye bar len pa ru ni 'dod// bcu par sems g.yeng pa dang srang // srid pa ru ni rab tu brjod//
126b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu gcig pa ru rmi lam dang // brish+tsi ka dang skye de bzhin// bcu gnyis pa ru sa'i dbang phyug/ gzhu dang rgas shing shi ba'o// de ltar sa'i dbang phyug sogs dang // rmi lam la sogs de bzhin gzhan// g.yeng
126b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs b+hi dri ka la sogs/ / de bzhin mi ki ra sogs dang // raN+Da sogs dang chu srin sogs// rus sbal sogs dang khyu mchog sogs// bzang po sogs dang rmongs pa sogs// de phyir zla ba rnams bcu gnyis//
126b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams nyi mar grang skyes pa// de yi mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// skad cig thang cig yud tsam du// chad pa'i shing du mtshon par bya// mig phye btsums par son pas kyang // shin tu phra ba'i dus las so// gal
126b6(rgyud 'bum): te sems ni ting 'dzin gnas/ / rim gyis sa bcu gnyis par ro// yang na ting 'dzin mi gnas pa// bar ma yi ni 'gro bar 'dod// dman pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i// skye bo thams cad 'gro ba'o// 'dren
126b7(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams kyi bde sdug bsngal/ / las kyis kun tu longs spyod do// gnyis su med pa'i dus can gyis// thams cad rang bzhin sa la skye// de ltar yin yang der skyes pa'i// rang gi las kyis 'bras bu za//
127a1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rnam par bzung tsam gyis// thod pa'i dum bu'i rnal 'byor ldan// sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pa yis// khams kyi dbus su 'bab pa'o// rlung gi kun spyod dus su ni// rnal 'byor pa
127a2(rgyud 'bum): ni skye bar 'gyur/ / nyi ma dgu dang zla ba dang // lo na mkhas pas 'chi shes bya// de la rgyal srid rtsom par 'gyur// de lha nyid du the tsom med// ro hi ta yi nyi ma skyes// sa yi dbang phyug la 'chi 'gyur// sa yi kun
127a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod dus skyes pa/ / nyi ma brgyad dang zla ba dang // lo gcig na ni ma shi na// byang chub sems dpar the tsom med// rmi lam kun spyod dus su ni// dpa' zhing rtul phod pha rol gnon// bsod nams dang ni sdig
127a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'dres/ / lnga bcu rtsa bzhin 'chi'o// sems g.yeng ba la dgra yis gsod// de yi nyi mar skyes pa po// drug cu rtsa bzhi'o zla bcu na// gal te shi bar ma gyur na// de ni 'byor chung phyi nas ni// phun sum tshogs
127a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba ste/ / b+hi tri'i nyin mo 'chi ba yin// de'i tshe'i nyi ma la skyes pa// lnga pa gnyis dang gsum gcig gi/ lo na 'chi bar ma gyur na// de la 'dod don kun dman zhing // pha dang ma ni gsod pa ste// dka'
127a6(rgyud 'bum): / thub dang ni 'dres pa yis// mi ki ra la rang khyim 'chi// gang zhig de nyin 'dir skyes pa// gnyis pa lnga gsum dgu'i lo ni// de ltar gal te ma shi na// de ni tham cad mkhyen pa mnyam// yugs sa mo la chur 'chi'o//
127a7(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig de'i tshe nyi mar skyes// gnyis dang gsum gyi lo na ni// ma shi na ni blo ldan te// sdig pa byed po nad dang ldan// mi dang mi mo rnams skal bzang // chu srin la 'chi de nyid la// skyes pa bcu lnga gsum lnga yi// nyi marma/
127b1(rgyud 'bum): ba lo rnams la// ma shi na ni mdor na yang // yon tan thams cad yongs rdzogs te// mtha' skyong ba yi rgyal por 'gro// rus sbal dang ni 'khrig par 'chi// de'i tshe nyi ma la skyes pa// gnyis brgyad dgu yi lo na 'chi// de ni
127b2(rgyud 'bum): / shi bar ma gyur na// tha mal sems can du shes bya// dman dang gtso bor 'gro ba'o// khyu mchog la ni rang khyim 'chi// de yi nyi ma la skyes pa// gnyis dang brgyad dang dgu yi ni// lo na mkhas pas ma shi na/
127b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug thams cad phun tshogs shing // khro sogs dang ni lta ba ngan// bzang po la ni bsad nas 'chi// de nyid nyi ma la skyes pa// lnga dang dgu dang bcu na ni// skye bo 'dir ni ma shi na// 'phongs shing chos ni phun sum chog
127b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis ni brgyan pa ste/ / gti mug la ni chur 'pho'o// de yi nyi ma la skyes pa// gnyis dgu'i zla ba dang po la// gal te de tshe ma shi na// thams cad dman zhing dmyal bar te// bsam ngan sdig pa'i bdag nyid can
127b5(rgyud 'bum): rkun mo la sogs pas bsad nas/ / ro hi ta yi nyi mar 'chi// de ltar mdor bsdus shes bya ste// gal te ting 'dzin ma thob na'o// skye rnams mngon sum byed pa yi// las rnams gzhan du 'thob pa yin// de nyid nye
127b6(rgyud 'bum): bar gang zhig na/ / de ni legs par bsrung bya ste// bshad pa'i rim pa'i nyi ma la// 'grol bar 'di la the tsom med// thod pa'i dum bu rang nyid ni// 'di rnams shes byed bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gror bgrod pa'i gang
127b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig rtsa/ / de'i dbus bdag nyid spyod par byed// de ni sgo nga'i rigs shes bya// gtong ba bskyod pas bsrung bar bya// rnal 'byor pa lus 'dzin par 'gyur// 'dir ni mthe'u chung bskyod par bya// rkang mthil dang ni spyi
128a1(rgyud 'bum): bo'i sgo/ / mtshams rnams kun tu bsrung bar bya// A li kA li mnyam byas nas// khams rnams la ni thim par bya// rnam par shes pa mi g.yo ste// thams cad de'i rang bzhin du bya// mgo/
128a2(rgyud 'bum): / bo'i dbus las nges par yang // 'og tu kha bltas 'bab 'gyur 'gro// de yi dbus phyogs phun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor pa de srid mthar 'gro// a ba d+hU tI dus grangs su// ji ltar gsal bar bshad par 'gyur//
128a3(rgyud 'bum): / zla phyed lo gsum shes bya ba// skye bo'i dus su 'chi ba yin// lo brgya rnams kyi gang zhig tshad// de rnams dbus su brtag par bya// ro ma brkyang ma gnyis dag gi'ang // skye bo'i zla ba nyid mtshon bya// zla ba zla bar
128a4(rgyud 'bum): 'joms 'gyur ba/ / nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i cha can no// dbugs ni gcig gi grangs kyang ni// de phyir lo gnyis las nyis 'gyur// sum 'gyur sogs pas thams cad rnams// de nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'gyur// mkha'
128a5(rgyud 'bum): bug mig tu shes par bya/ / phyi nas chu tshod rnams su 'gro// lo ni bcu gnyis bar du ni// lnga lnga yi yang chu tshod do// drug cu'i lo nas nyi ma 'phel// sum cu rtsa bdun zla phyed gsum// lnga lnga ru ni 'phel ba rnams//
128a6(rgyud 'bum): nyin mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya// skye bo kun gyi 'chi ba ni// zla phyed gsum dang lon shes// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lo rnams kyis// gang phyir mi rnams dpyod ldan 'gro// sa yi khyim du zhugs nas ni// yid kyis 'chi ba
128a7(rgyud 'bum): slu ba ste/ / dpal he ru ka'i gnas bzhugs pa'i// thod pa'i dum bu bsam par bya// bgrang ba'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// nyin zhag chu tshod mtshon par bya// ji lta'i dus su mtshan pa yis// rim gyis
128b1(rgyud 'bum): rim gyis bya ba yin/ / byang du bgrod pa'i dus tshod du// lha mo rgyal sogs rim pa'o// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang bzhi// mkhas pas nyin mo'i chu tshod do// mnyam pa'i dus su shes bya ba// rang gi dus sbyor
128b2(rgyud 'bum): du 'chad 'gyur/ / bcu po gsum dang drug po ste// mtshan mo'i chu tshod rtsom par byed// brgya la dus kyi bye brag gis// de yi dbus las shes par bya// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug/ nyin rnams chu tshod
128b3(rgyud 'bum): ang ka bya/ / bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag/ bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad// nyi ma rnams kyi chu tshod bzhin// bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu// mtshan
128b4(rgyud 'bum): mo'i chu tshod du ni brtags/ mnyam dus dbus su gnyis sbyar nas// sum cu gcig pur rab tu brtags// sum cu rnam pa gnyis rnams kyis// nyin re dag gi chu tshod 'byed// bcu po rnam gsum gnyis
128b5(rgyud 'bum): / gcig pu// nyin mo rnams kyi nyi mar brtags// bcu po gnyis rnams dang ni brgyad// mtshan mo yi ni ang ka bya// bcu po rnam gsum ang ka la// bzhi dang yang dag ldan pa'o// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang
128b6(rgyud 'bum): / drug/ mtshan mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya// bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang drug/ nyin dag ye shes can gyi'ang nyin// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang bzhi// rdul can rnams kyi chu tshod grags// lho ru bgrod par rab
128b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ / nam zla'i dus kyis shes par 'gyur// bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi// nyin phyed chu tshod yongs su bshad// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug/ mtshan mo'i de bzhin mtshon par bya// bcu la gsum
129a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur gnyis gcig pa/ / nyin rnams chu tshod de bzhin no// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug/ mtshan mo'i chu tshed du ni grags// bcu la gsum bsgyur bas mtshon pa// mnyam sogs chu
129a2(rgyud 'bum): chotsho de bzhin te/ / bcu la gsum bsgyur mtshan rnams kyi// bi shu'i dbus su gnyis de bzhin// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad// nyin rnams kyi ni nyin mor sems// bcu po gsum 'gyur gnyis gcig
129a3(rgyud 'bum): puHrdul can chu tshod du brtags so/ / bcu po gnyis 'gyur dang ni drug/ nyin rnams chu tshod rim pas so// bcu po sum 'gyur dang ni bzhi// rdul can chu tshod rnams de bzhin// sum brgya de bzhin drug cu ni// chu
129a4(rgyud 'bum): tshod rnams kyi dbugs rkang ngo / / chu tshod grangs ni drug cu ni// zhag gcig tu ni rnam par brjod// zla rnam rim pa ji lta bas// de bzhin rims rnams kyis mtshon no// chu tshod dbugs sogs yongs rdzogs pa//
129a5(rgyud 'bum): rim pas 'phel dang 'chad pa ste// las dang las min khyad par gyis// dbugs ni rim pas yongs su bzung // de ltar mkha' mkha' ro de bzhin// zla mig chu tshod de bzhin du// lo gcig gir ni shes par bya//
129a6(rgyud 'bum): zhag rnams chu tshod mtshon pas so// de ltar byas pas rnal 'byor pa// dus kyi 'chi ba slu bar 'gyur// lte ba'i dbus su pad+ma che// ji ltar rdo rje phag mo'o// mtshams kun son pa'i pad+ma la// ba mo dang 'dra 'dzag
129a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / lte ba'i dbus mtha' bcu gnyis su// 'gro ba 'ong ba byed pa nyid// srog gi thig le de bgrod pa'ang // mtshams kun tu ni 'bab pa can// blo ldan lo gcig sbyor ba yis// de nyid du ni thim par bya//
129b1(rgyud 'bum): til mar me ni 'bar ba yis// gzugs can kha ni 'og tu bltas// chu shing me tog dang 'dra ba// mkhas pa yis ni 'phyang bzhin pa'o// lte bar A yi rnam pa'i gzugs// thung dang ring po 'bar ma'i bdag/
129b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs// dbyangs dang phyi mo gnyis med gnas// sgom dang sgrub pa mo bshad pa// rtul po bar ma rnon po dang // lhag par rno dang shin lhag no// thams cad de rnams su brtags so//
129b3(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir rang bdag nyid kyis sgrub// de phyir gzhan gyis kyang bsgrub bya// nus mthu 'jig rten 'di nyid la// skye bo kun la yid ches byed// phyi nas gdul byar 'gro ba yin// rang gzhan don gyis sems/
129b4(rgyud 'bum): brlan pas// dbyangs bcu gnyis ni thob byas nas// dge dang mi dge bshad par bya// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams su ni// dbyangs kyi bdag po mtshon par bya// a yig gis ni ye shes dang // mkhas pa
129b5(rgyud 'bum): / chos don thams cad thob// A yi yi ges 'tshir ba dang // rgas dang 'chi bar rnam nges bshad// srid pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus pa// mthong 'gyur lam las nyams par 'gyur// i yi yi ge yongs thob
129b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sa yi dbang phyug tu ni 'gro/ / I yi yi ge yang dag thob// myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur// u yi yi ge thob pa yis// skye ba dran par 'gyur 'gro ba'o// U yi yi ge gal te thob// yul la zhen ma can du
129b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro e yi yi ge yang dag thob/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gro// aM yi yi ge sems rmongs shing // 'gro ba drug sogs 'jigs par 'gyur// oM yig pha rol phyin pa yi// der ni sa thob rnam nges
130a1(rgyud 'bum): ston/ oM yig ang ka thob pa yis// dam tshig nyams par 'gro ba yin// aM yig byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mthong bas skad cig la dgrol 'gyur// aHyig yang dag thob pa
130a2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ phung po khams la the tsom za// de la sogs pa ma lus pa// ma gsungs kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bla ma bstan bcos rang nyid de// rnam gsungs chos kyis yid ches bya// zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i dum bu can
130a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi ming can te thog ma'i tshig go/ rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // de nas keng rus chen po yi/
130a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad bya ste// bong 'dra'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// yid kyi shugs ni 'jug med bya// khams mnyam pa yi ri bo ni// spyi bo'i gnas su bsgoms pa nyid// pad snal skud pa kha 'og
130a5(rgyud 'bum): bltas/ / glog ni kun tu 'gro ba mo// de yi dbus su dpa' mo che// bong bu'i dbyibs can bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag tshogs// mchod pa chen po bsam par bya// de yi dbus su dpa' chen
130a6(rgyud 'bum): po keng rus chen po'i sbyor bas so/ / srung ba rnams kyi lce dbus smra// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// hA yig rnam pa yi ni gzugs// mgo las srud pa gcig pu ste// me long rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/
130a7(rgyud 'bum): tho pa'i dbus su ngal bso bya// bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis// khung bu'i dbus su'ang 'dzag par 'gyur// thim dang longs spyod sogs dngos pos// sems kyi bgrod pa bstan par bya// khung der bong
130b1(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / skye ba bdun yang mthong bar 'gyur// ma las byung ba'i dbyibs gsum dang // pha las byung ba gsum de bzhin// khams thams cad dang bdun po de// rnal 'byor sgom pas mthong bar/
130b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ bde ba'i rang bzhin khams kun gyis// keng rus chen po yang dag byung // lA ma la sogs bsgoms pa yis// de la gnas pa'i gzugs mthong 'gyur// bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// khrag gi
130b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal can rtse gsum du/ / tshe son pa yang rnam par shes// tshe ring ba yang mthong bar 'gyur// snga mar glang po che sogs pa// dpa' rang bdag nyid kyis de mthong // chen po'i rtsa rnams thams cad du// keng
130b4(rgyud 'bum): rus srog ni nges 'gro bya/ / de bskyod bong bur shes bya ste// sna tshogs rang bzhin de mthong 'gyur// sA lu la sogs bza' ba'i dngos// de dang 'dra bar dngos po kun// mthong ste de na yod pa min// khams
130b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang 'khrul pa'o/ / ji ltar skyes bur dus rnams kyis// glang chen khams kyis shes par bya// de bzhin keng rus che rnams kyis// sa li la sogs khams rkyen gyis// rang bzhin 'jig rten pa
130b6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs pas/ / rang bdag nyid kyi gzugs de mthong // rnam pa sna tshogs rigs de rnams// rnal 'byor 'dzin rnams kyis shes bya// ma rig sogs nyin so so la// de rnams kyis ni nang du grags//
130b7(rgyud 'bum): rims la sogs pa'i nad tsam gyis// nad chen rnam par mtshon par bya// de la ma rig nyi ma'i nad// legs pa rnams kyis de bsrung bya// 'pho ba bco lnga pa la ni// 'chi 'am las ni dge mi dge/ ye shes
131a1(rgyud 'bum): me yi bdag nyid ches/ / nub lnga rnams na grol bar 'gyur// rga shi yi ni dus su ni// 'pho ba gsum na 'chi ba ste// yang na dge dang mi dge ba'i// las kyi bag chags mthong bar 'gyur//
131a2(rgyud 'bum): rang rig bde ba bzung ba yis// nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur// skye ba'i nyi ma'i 'chi ba ni// 'pho ba gsum pa ni yang ste// las ni dge mi dger 'gro ba// nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur// srid pa yi ni
131a3(rgyud 'bum): 'pho gsum na/ / 'chi bar 'gyur ro mtshan mo ni// lda na de rnams grol bar 'gyur// yang na de ni mi grol te// 'das pa bzhi pa'i dus rnams su// bde ba de kun rtogs par gyis// de lta'i rigs 'gyur de
131a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / ji lta'i rim pas shes par bya// len pa'i 'chi ba'i 'pho ba ni// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa na'o// gal te las ni dge mi dges// mtshan mo bcu na grol bar 'gyur// bsod nams phun sum tshogs
131a5(rgyud 'bum): kun dang / / blo dang ldan pas 'pho med sgrub// sred pa'i 'pho ba gsum na 'chi// las ni dge dang mi dges te// nor bu'i nang son la blta bya// mtshan mo bdun na nges grol te// nga yi ngag la the tsom med// tsher
131a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'pho ba lnga na ni/ / 'chi 'gyur las kyang ngo de bzhin// dgu dang bcu bdag na grol te// rdo rje pad dbus son pas so// reg pa'i nyin mo'i 'pho ba ni// brgyad na 'chi bar shes par bya// de ltar las dge mi dge srid//
131a7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag drug gis thim par bya// gcig dman nyi shu'i nyi ma ma// grol ba'am yang na mi grol lo// skye mched drug gi 'chi ba ni// las dge mi dges blta bya ste// 'pho ba brgyad na shes par bya// khams kyi nang rnam/
131b1(rgyud 'bum): de thob 'gyur// nub bcu na ni grol 'gyur te// 'khor lo bzhi ru thim par bya// ming dang gzugs la 'chi ba'i las// gsum pa 'am ni lnga pa yi// 'pho ba dag ni shes par bya// mtshan mo brgyad na 'grol ba'o//
131b2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni thig la'i gnas son par// rten par gyur pa'i cho ga bya// rnam par shes pa'i 'chi ba'i las// slar yang brgyad dang bcu pa yi// 'pho bar sa la shes par bya// yang na de nyid la 'grol te// bcu drug
131b3(rgyud 'bum): phyed phyed kyi gzugs can/ / ye shes rlung gis gzung bar bya// 'du byed kyi ni 'chi ba'i las// gsum dang bdun gyi de bzhin du// bltas par gyur pas 'pho ba yin// de yi//
131b4(rgyud 'bum): lta bas grol bar 'gyur// thig le gnyis ni shes byas nas// stang du 'gro bas thim par bya// 'di yis nang dang 'chi med 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang // sum cu bdun bdag nyid dge ba// slar
131b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / keng rus chen po'i gtso bo yi// rnal 'byor pa yis thams cad mtho/ zhes bya ba ni sdong bu'i rnal 'byor la keng rus chen po sgom pa po'i man ngag de kho na nyid dang ldan pa
131b6(rgyud 'bum): ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas keng rus kyi sbyor bas// yul yul rang gi skye gnas skyes// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' gtso mo// ye shes ldan pas shes par bya// an+d+har
131b7(rgyud 'bum): dgod par rdul lha mo/ / rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gtso// de yi gnas su gnas lha mo// ka dam shing la dril chen ma// lha mo de yi rtag dpa' bo// zhing skyong zhal chen po yin no// keng rus bde ba'i sgyu ma yi// bdag
132a1(rgyud 'bum): @nyid che las de 'byung 'gyur/ / de rnams keng rus kyis rgyas btab// oMr+yan bu ga las steng son// rang khams las bzhengs rnam par shes// rim gyis yul thams cad du 'gro// kol+la'i
132a2(rgyud 'bum): ri dang ba ru NA/ / de bi ko Ta bi ra dza kaM/ e ru Nu dang de nas grong // e la'i grong dang kha che dang // ma rU'i grong dang de bzhin du// pud+d+ha ba d+ha na yi zhing // dza yin+ta dang pr-iSh+Ta'i grong // sau pa re dang spyod de bzhin// oM r+yan dang
132a3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'bar ba 'dzin/ / k+Shi re ke dang sgyu ma'i grong // aM bu ke dang rgyal po'i khab// bod kyi yul dang de bzhin du// mA le ba dang pu lir sogs// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas yin no// ri yi rtse dang tA la'i shing // b+ha Ta a mra gser
132a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin/ / ral pa'i shing dang gzhan gnon dang // ri yi rtse mor yang dag rten// thang chen po dang rtswa khung dang // a shwat+tha dang khang pa brtsegs// u dum wa ra shal ma li// ka rany+dza mya ngan med la rten// gser shing dang ni
132a5(rgyud 'bum): sA la dang / / tsu ta d+hA tu dil la ki/ brag brtsegs pa dang sbrang rtsi'i shing // sngon du yang dag rten pa'o// rdul gyi skye gnas tshol ba'i lus// stobs chen dang ni rnal 'byor gnas// thod pa las dang rdul rab gtum//
132a6(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas dpa' bo tshol ba'i lus// stobs chen rnams dang khrag de bzhin// dpa' bo'i skye gnas nus las byung // skye gnas zla ba las byung dang // stobs chen rigs las byung ba dang // 'jigs byed khrag las
132a7(rgyud 'bum): byung de bzhin/ / tshil dang g.yul ngo che las skyes// me tog skye gnas gnyis de bzhin// slar yang de nyid tshig dran bya// 'di rnams rigs las byung lha mo// lhan cig skyes gzugs bu mo yin// dpal chen mo dang
132b1(rgyud 'bum): me yi kha/ zhing skyong mchog gi zhal can te// me yi gdong can zhes grags pa// keng rus bde ba rig pa po'o// de yi 'pho ba 'dzin pa ni// rnal 'byor ma gnyis spro bar byed// de yis de 'dod sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo gnyis
132b2(rgyud 'bum): med yang dag rten/ / sems can rnams la phan don du// rdo rje dkyil 'khor du gnas te// kun tu spyod pa'i bgrod gzugs kyis// yul thams cad du 'gro ba yin// lang dbang phyug ma gyen brdzes sgra// zhing skyong
132b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsigs pa chen po ste/ / gyen brdzas sgra zhes bshad pa ni// keng rus bde ba'i rgyu can te// rnal 'byor ma mchog khyad par ni// lhag ma sngon gsungs bzhin shes bya// rna ba gcus dang drag mo ste// zhing skyong ba ni lus
132b4(rgyud 'bum): chen no/ / de nas yang na rgyu can dang // mchog dbang phyug ma drag chen mo// keng rus bde ba'i stong pa yis// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// zhi ba'i gzugs dang me dang ni// zhing skyong an+dar dgod pa'o// me dang
132b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul chen dag dang ni/ / sgra chen por yang shes par bya// keng rus kyi ni gtum mo ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su bde ba che// me yi gdong dang brtson chen ma// zhing skyong ba ni dril bu'i sgra// brtson 'grus chen mo zhes grags
132b6(rgyud 'bum): pa keng rus bde ba'i 'byung gnas yin/ / dmar ser grags dang 'jigs mig ma// zhing skyong byin pa chen po ste// 'jigs byed ma dang spyan ma 'am// keng rus bde bas 'gengs byed pa'o// 'jigs chen ma
132b7(rgyud 'bum): dang stobs chen ma/ / zhing skyong glang po chen po skye// yang na glang po'i rnam dang // zhing skyong glang po'i rna can te// keng rus bde ba la zhon pa// rtswa thams cad du de'i rang bzhin// ba lang rnam ri'i rtse ma// zhing skyong 'jigs
132b8(rgyud 'bum): byed chen po ste/ / de nas slar yang sdug ma'i sbyin// keng rus bde ba la thim pa'o// bgrod pa mo dang 'jigs zhal ma// zhing skyong ba ni gtsigs pa ste// rmongs par byed ma zhal chen po// keng rus bde ba la chags pa'o//
133a1(rgyud 'bum): ro langs ma dang bzhin bzang mo// zhing skyong ba spu'i byin pa can// yang na gyen gtsigs chen po ste// keng rus bde ba la za ba'o// tsA muN+Da dang lha chen mo// zhing skyong bum pa'i rmig pa can// yang na/
133a2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo chen mo dang // zhing skyong bum pa'i grul can te// yang na lha chen po yin no// keng rus bde bar gar byed pa'o// rab gus ma dang ral gsum ma// zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste// yang na ral pa gsum zhe bya/
133a3(rgyud 'bum): keng rus bde ba'i pha rol phyin// glog gi gdong ma dril sgra ma// zhing skyong 'ug pa'i gdong can te// dril bu'i sgra ru nges grags pa// 'dir ni keng rus bde za ba'o// me zhal ma dang lha chen mo// zhing skyong 'jigs par
133a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ / yang na lha chen por shes bya// keng rus bde ba'i gzi can no// ka rany+dza gnas ma de bzhin// gzhan yang dril bu chen mor grags// zhing skyong ba ni stobs chen te// keng rus bde bas mdzes pa yin//
133a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang grags ma dang lha chen mo// drag gzugs ma dang stobs chen ma// zhing skyong sgra chen po dang ni// drag po'i gzugs dang stobs chen te// keng rus bde las yongs byung ba'i// mchog tu mi 'gyur rnal
133a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ldan/ / gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang // zhing skyong ba ni 'bar bar grags// de nas yang na drag po'i gzugs// keng rus bde ba'i cha lugs can// 'jig rten gyi ma gyen sgra mo// zhing skyong ri rab chen po ste/
133a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang na gyen brdzes sgra// keng rus bde ba snom pa po'o// 'jigs pa mo dang stobs chen ma// zhing skyong 'jigs pa de bzhin te// stobs po che dang 'jigs gzugs ma// keng rus bde ba'i snying po can// srul
133b1(rgyud 'bum): mo dang ni lha chen mo/ / zhing skyong brtul zhugs chen po ste// keng rus bde ba'i nus pa yis// de phyir dbang po kun bde ba'o// pi pan sa ma ril li sgra// zhing skyong rna ba chen po can// yang na di li sgrogs pa ste// keng
133b2(rgyud 'bum): rus bde ba 'dzag pa'o/ / lhan skyes grags ma 'byor grags ma// dpa' bo chen po de bzhin mchog/ zhing skyong shin tu thub dka' ste// keng rus bde ba dpog byed pa'o// dbang bskur mnyam ma skyes dbang
133b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug ste/ / keng rus bde ba la gnas pas// rang nyid 'dod pa'i bde bar 'gyur// rdo rjes mgo bo rtse gsum dang // dar dang rdo rje mdud thung dang // gtun shing zhags pa de

133b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug kun mchog ma/ / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab sngar ma// yang dag rmongs pa'i zhing ster ma// gtsigs ma rmongs pa'i zhing ma dang // 'jigs chen ma dang de bzhin gzhan// gtum zhal ma dang dgra
133b7(rgyud 'bum): 'joms ma/ / rmongs pa'i zhing gi 'jigs byed ma// dpa' bo kun la mchog ster ma// longs spyod grol ba sdig 'joms ma// bde ba kun gyi mchog ster ma// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma// gtsigs ma
134a1(rgyud 'bum): drag cing 'jigs pa mo/ / sha'i gdan can ma dang ni gzhan// bde ba'i dbang phyug mchog ster ma// mdzes shing thams cad dgos ma dang // 'jig rten dngos grub ster ba mo// lha mo gtsigs ma
134a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed/ / shin tu drag mo gzugs bzang ma// dbang phyug thams cad rab ster ma// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma// 'jigs ma sgrub ma grags ster ma// nag po'i gzugs dang drag chen mo// dgra
134a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi 'jigs pa zhon/ / thams cad dbang du byed ma dang // sems can thams cad 'jigs byed ma// 'khor lo kun rgyal ma nyid dang // 'jigs par byed dang de bzhin gzhan// zhi ba'i zhal ma gzugs

134a5(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i mkhar du yi dgas gnas// bi ra dza ru shing leb bzhugs// e ra n+ya ru phag la bzhugs// de nas grong du yi dgas bzhugs// e le'i grong du bong bur gnas// kha cher nor sbyin la ni gnas// ma ru'i yul du
134a6(rgyud 'bum): ma her gnas/ / grong du mgo yi rgyab tu ste// puN+Da ba d+ha ra ro la gnas// dza yan t+ya ru kang rus gnas// priSh+Ta'i grong du brtsegs par gnas// so pa red pa re ta la gnas// ka rany+dzar gnas tsa ri tra ra// oM r+yan du ni
134a7(rgyud 'bum): bdud la bzhugs/ / 'bar ba 'dzin par ro la gnas// k+Shi ri kar ni me la gnas// sgyu ma'i grong du ro yi steng // am bu ka ru seng ger gnas// rgyal po'i khab tu 'khor lor gnas// bod kyi yul du yi dgas
134b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ ror gnas mA la bar de bzhin// keng rus kyi ni rab sbyor bas// de lta'i zhing du dngos grub 'gyur// keng rus las byung bde ba ni// rtsa ba'i rtsa ba las yongs langs// mtshams rnams kun tu khyab par/

134b5(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de nas keng rus bsgom par bya// skye 'gro'i gtso bo'i dpa' bo yang // shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// gsungs pa'i yul du rnal 'byor ma// de nas rab gtum sogs ming
134b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sgrub pa pos ni dngos grub 'gyur// der ni 'du ba yang bya'o// bza' dang btung sogs yang dag brtsams// nyer spyod lnga sogs mchod pa dang // nyer spyod gtor ma'i snod rnams ni// rmon pa'i sha dang nya
134b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs/ / bza' dang rdzas rnams thams cad dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang de bzhin gzhan// g.yon par snod rnams bzhag byas nas// g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya// shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dam// ri dang
135a1(rgyud 'bum): khrod dang khyim dang ni/ / grong dang grong khyer ngos rnams dang // khang stong lam gyi gzhi mdo dang // chu la 'gro dang thang la rgyu// sa dang ma mo'i khyim dang 'gram// nag mo drag mo drag chen mo// lha sbyin yang
135a2(rgyud 'bum): dag rten ma dang / / nag mo gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren dang // tsA muN+Di dang drag gzugs ma// lha mo dbu ma dang ni ma// rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub ma dang gzhan ni
135a3(rgyud 'bum): mi thub/ / bzang nag mo dang nag chen mo// sbom nag mo dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo zla ba mo drag mo// sdang ma 'phyang ma sum cu'i dbang // kam po dza ma mar me ma 'jib ma// grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma//

135b7(rgyud 'bum): yispyi bo'i gtsug tu sbyar byas nas/ / sa yi mthil du mchod byas nas// skye gnas dbus su dgod bya ste// 'bad pas zhu ba blta bar bya// skye gnas dbus su rim ji bzhin// bdag nyid bsam bya rnal 'byor pas//
136a1(rgyud 'bum): so ba'i khyod der kun nas 'gas 'ab ba'i drung ba rgya mchog/ sa rnam pa bsams gyur ba // nus 'byor gyus cad 'de ba'i blan sa rdo rngam 'ang 'grod bzhin gshegs /

136a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sngon gyi sprul pa'i bag chags ni// de la rgyun du 'joms par byed// rnam par zhu ba'i bdag nyid che// zhi ba'i gzugs su ster bar 'gyur// Sh+Ti zhes rkang pa'i mthil bar du// nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du bgrod//
136a7(rgyud 'bum): na de mtshams kyi don dam par// sa gsum po la lta bar 'gyur// de phyir skye bo thams cad la// mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis 'byed do// dbang po de rnams thams cad la// bdag nyid kyis dbugs slar ci smos// 'gro ba
136b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du rab 'jug par/ / mchog tu rmad byung 'gro bar 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra bar yang dag gnas// skye bo kun la rnam par blta// mig sogs rnam par shes pa ni// nang rnams su ni bskyod par byas// mkha' 'gro'i

136b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro che/ / mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs// thams cad chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'i// snying por gzhom du med zhi ba'i// chos kun gcig tu yongs bsdus pa// sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri//
