136b5(rgyud 'bum): 'og rtag tu dngos grub ster/ / bdag nyid pho nya kun 'gros so// yi ge lnga bcu sde tshan brgyad// de nyid mkha' 'gro mchog rmad byung // sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor ram yang na// chung ngu'i rgyud dang 'dra ba mchog/ yi ge thams
136b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ni ched/ / sdom pa sogs su mtshon par bya// yi ge rnams dang ming rnams dang // sdom pa rnams su de brjod do// dkyil 'khor rnams dang rgyud rnams dang // le'u rnams dang ni de bzhin du// las tshogs rnams
136b7(rgyud 'bum): ni thams cad de/ / nyis 'gyur thung ngu ring ba'o// de nyid du ni kun nges rgyal// 'byin cing sdud par byed pa po// sems can rigs zhes 'dir de bshad// re re yi ni mtshan nyid do// re re yaM ni sgom pa ni// ji lta'i rim
137a1(rgyud 'bum): pas shes par bya/ / yi ge yi ni ming dang gzugs// de ni sems can gzugs su 'dod// gsang sngags de ni zlos bzhin pa// de nyid du ni rab gzhug b+ha// a yig thig le dang bral ba// dmar po//
137a2(rgyud 'bum): phyi mo rnam par spangs// A yig thig le dang bcas pa// de phyir mtshal gyi rigs can no// guny+dza'i me tog dang mnyam par// i yig la ni brgyan par 'dod// I yig sin+d+hu ra yi mdog/ bzang po lnga par shes
137a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / u yig dbang po'i gzhu yi 'od// A yi yi ge drug pa nyid// glog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o// raM yig du ba'i kha dog ste// phra mo lus ni spangs pa'o// r-I yi yi ge mun pa'i gzugs// l-i ni bya rog
137a4(rgyud 'bum): / gshog pa mtshungs// lAM yi yi ge mtshal gyi mdog/ e yi yi ge dmar skya ste// aM yig sin+d+hu ra dmar mdog ma// oM yi yi ge nyi ma 'dra// 'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar// oM yi yi ge rtag 'bar ba//
137a5(rgyud 'bum): ma bye ba dang mnyam 'od// zla phyed de bzhin du thig le// aM yig sngon du bshad pa can// zla ba gnyis dang tsheg drag ste// aHyig rgyal po de bzhin no// de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug/ las rnams kyi ni dag
137a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyu/ / myos dang brlab gdol rmongs pa dang // sems bral dang po'i stong nyid do// rmongs pa dang 'khrugs dbang dang ni// myur du thams cad ster ba'o// bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang // brlab gdol du ni
137a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'o/ / stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas// de ni rmugs dang dbang du 'ong // yang dag rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur// lus brlan pa dang sems pa bral// dbang du 'ong dang dgug pa dang //
137b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes shes bya can mchog go// bskrad pa dang ni bzhu ba'i las// rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin// sa yi zil gnon 'dzin bzhin dang // sngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems// skye ba 'di la nam du yang // /
137b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi slar yang 'ong min pa'o// rnam par sdang dang thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o// 'jig rten kun dang mthun med la// skad cig gnas pa spangs pa'o// yid kyi las ni thams cad
137b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de phyir 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur// bde ba kha yis bkug byas nas// dbugs med ri mo 'dzag pa nub// phyi mo'i yal ga rnams kyis bya// dam tshig dbang phyug ma'i gnas kyis// phyag rgya
137b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ / gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med// sangs rgyas ri mo steng 'og tu// pad+ma'i rnal can rab tu gnas// A li kA li mdor bsdus pa// bcud len khams kyi lus las so// rdo rje sems
137b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' la sogs lha/ / zhal du yongs su 'gyur ba'o// de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du// yi ge thams cad nges par gnas// so sor snang ba ma byung bar// bsrung ba bgyis zhes bdag gis bshad// sems ni rjes
137b6(rgyud 'bum): mthun dbyangs su 'gyur/ / sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin can// zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o// slar
137b7(rgyud 'bum): yang thams cad byed pa yi/ / stong pa nyid ni so sor dgod// thog ma gnyis ni rkang gnyis dgod// brla dang gsang ba rked pa dang // lte ba snying ka steng dang ni// mgrin pa dang ni rkan de bzhin// kha dang sna dang rna dag
138a1(rgyud 'bum): dang dpral ba mgo dang rgyab tu ste/ / rang gi khams ming 'du shes kyis// dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do// slar yang re re yi yang ni// las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid// stong nyid de nyid
138a2(rgyud 'bum): rig byed pa/ / rgyun du nang du bsgom par bya// ka yig la sogs ma yig mthar// lha mo bdag nyid chen mos nyon// gang gis gsum gyi ni lha// thams cad lha ma yin dang mi// sgud po'i legs par nges par ni/
138a3(rgyud 'bum): dede rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// ka yig sogs su 'du shes so// bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni// lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags// rnam shes ye shes snying po dang // dus dang d+hU
138a4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'bras de bzhin/ / dbugs dang bcud len las dang ni// gtor ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan// dbang po dbu ma sgyu ma dang // 'tshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te// lung ni rjes su rig pa dang // mig 'phrul 'dri ba
138a5(rgyud 'bum): rim ji ltar/ / de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa// shes rab chen pos shes par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni brjod pa'i las// dus kyi me yi mdog can no// ji ltar dbang la sogs pa'i las// lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin//
138a6(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin dkar// ser dang ljang ku de bzhin no// sgrub po'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni// de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'ong // ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyis// ji lta'i cho gas yi ge rnams//
138a7(rgyud 'bum): phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang // yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa'o// ji lta'i rim pas blo ldan gyis// dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya// las ni de rnams shes byas te// 'dus pa bde mchog bla ma dang // brda
138b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / / 'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed saM pu Ta// ji lha'i tshogs gzhan du'ang ngo // de ltar nges brjod 'bum gsum las// phyung ba bde mchog chung ngu ste// a yig la/
138b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs k+ShaHyig mthar// le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis// de kho na nyid ldan par bya// sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro skyes// mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i// de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya// ji ltar
138b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus ma'i pad+ma ra ni/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsal bar bsgom// sku yi rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang // 'dod chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste// phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya// pad 'dab rnams su rnal
138b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma// pad+ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma// g.yon skor du ni bsgom bya ste// 'dab ma bzhi la thod pa ni// rgya mtsho bzhi po yi ni gzugs// dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o// slar
138b5(rgyud 'bum): yang grwa bzhi po rnams su/ / ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na// thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon skor du'o// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang chos dang yid dang sems// kun kyang rgya
138b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshor shes bya ste/ / g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya// sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni// rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste// ye shes zhes bya'i rgya mtsho dag/ sngon gyi rim pas dgod par bya// sgo skyong ma yi lha
138b7(rgyud 'bum): mo che g.yon bskor du ni dgod bya ba/ / glang po rgya mtshon rgya mtsho// seng ge rgya mtshom se rgya mtsho'o// grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo mi// sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtshom// gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mchom//
139a1(rgyud 'bum): dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin// byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che'i// dkyil 'khor de yis shes par bya// dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni// sgrub thabs rim pas bsgom par bya// sangs
139a2(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni// pad+ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon// kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po// pad+ma 'dab ma stong phrag can// de yi dbus su bsgom bya ba// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste// phyag stong
139a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni rnam par sgom/ / zhal ni sum cu rtsa bdun no// zhabs bco brgyad kyis gar du mdzad// spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan can gyi gzugs// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can// rgyab tu
139a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po 'dzin/ / lhag mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang mo// bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor// ji ltar bdag gis skyon bshad pa'o// shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad de// g.yas par rgyan du thabs
139a5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs// gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang // bden bral dang ni thags zangs ris// dbang po tshogs bdag karti ka/ sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma dang // bla ma skyob pa tha de bzhin// nor
139a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang ni skyes bu mo/ / myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste// rang rang khyim thabs yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshon cha yang bya'o// phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste// de'i gzugs can nam phyag gnyis skyes// sna
139a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma/ / slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o// 'dab ma stong du bsgom bya ba// rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te// bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba// de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya//
139b1(rgyud 'bum): thung ngu ring po yon tan 'phar// a yig la sogs de brgyad de// phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba// stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo // ka rdo rje sogs shes bya ste// khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so// 'khor lo drug bdag/
139b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor can// de thams cad ni gar du mdzad// thams cad kyis ni ro la gnon// phyag gnyis pa'am mkha' 'gro'i bdag/ thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin ma// bde chen rnam pa'i gzugs can ma'o// sangs rgyas thugs ka
139b3(rgyud 'bum): nas spro ba/ / 'khor lo gsum spro 'od zer 'phreng // srog ni 'og dang steng blta bas// sdom pa rgya mtsho dgug par bya// slar yang dbugs kyis dbyung ba ni// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag/ thams cad sdom pa'i
139b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub thabs su/ / ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o// de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// gzhung thams cad ni blta bar bya// gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya// dam tshig gi ni
139b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa tsam/ / sdom pa chung ngur rab tu bshad// thams cad sog ma bzhin dor la// thams cad sdom pa gzung bar gyis// mche ba rnam gtsigs rab sbyor bas// gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis// de yi dkyil
139b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khor lo yang / sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya// 'og dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis// bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag/ rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// hUM phaT yi ge mthar sbyar gyis// yang dag
139b7(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin rdo rje yi/ / gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o// thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang // sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no// bdag gi bdag pos rgyud 'di ni// gsungs pas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur//
140a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas// phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar lags// khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya// rab bshad bya yi lha mo nyon// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho shes rab che// thabs ni sdom brgya
140a2(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'o/ / 'og dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas// de ni phyag rgyar mngon brjod 'gyur// zhal las nges par 'thon yu ba// ngag gi bsgom pa'i bdag nyid do// de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang // rnam par shes
140a3(rgyud 'bum): dang thams cad 'ong / / zhi ba'i gzugs ni snying ka ru// 'od kyis thams cad sdom par gyis// de ni theg pa cher sdom pa// bdag nyid chen po ye shes gzugs// de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs// de ni
140a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar mngon par brjod/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho che// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa
140a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas lha mos mchod byas nas// phyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsol// sems can rnams kyi sdom 'byung ba// bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs// lha dgra yi
140a6(rgyud 'bum): nirab sbyor bas/ / rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyon// byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi// bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa// sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i// rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro// 'dod chags
140a7(rgyud 'bum): chags bral rnam 'dres pa/ / sdom pa skye 'gro'i gzugs can no// gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa// sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o// be yi nam mkha' nam mkhar te// sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs/
140b1(rgyud 'bum): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa// gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis// rang rig bdag nyid byang chub ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i
140b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyuthob 'gyur/ / ting 'dzin zad cig rig med pa// gang gi srid gsum la thim gyis// de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste// lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom min// rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa// de ltar de
140b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid nges shes bya/ / nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang // de yis sdom par bshad par 'gyur// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs ldan pa'o// A li kA li sogs sde tshan// dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs// gang
140b4(rgyud 'bum): du ming ni nges par mthong / / rigs ni de ru shes bya ste// ang ka'ang sems can yang dag ldan// mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang // nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin// mkha' 'gro ma'i ming theg byas nas/
140b5(rgyud 'bum): ma mo de rnams su rab grags// lha rnams kun gyi bskyed pa dang // sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi yang ngo // 'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te// de yis ma la yang dag brtan// rtsa ni dgu po 'gog pa las//
140b6(rgyud 'bum): / srog rgyu rnams su shes par bya// a A ka tsa Ta ta pa dang // ya sha'i sde tshan yi ge dgu// oM I kha tsha Sha tha pha dang // ra Sha gnyis par brjod pa'o// u A ga dza Ta da ba dang // la sa sde tshan gsum pa'o// e e
140b7(rgyud 'bum): g+ha tsA D+ha d+ha d+ha dang / / wa ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o// oM oM aM aHnga nyaN dang // nam de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid// bzhi po yongs su grags pa ste// nyi can lnga rnams kyis de bzhin// de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi de// brdzun/
141a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni 'byin par gnas// sku chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis// sa bon gzugs kyis tshogs dran bya// de rnams rA sir yang dag grags// rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba dang ni/
141a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i chas// 'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis// rgyu skar dang ni rA sir bshad// srog zung du ni de bzhin gshegs// ring dang thung ngu rgyal dang pham// steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad//
141a3(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam// nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun// rgyu skar rA si gza' de bzhin// rA si rnam gsum spyod gang phyir// nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur// srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan// rA si kun
141a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis shes par bya/ / karka Ta seng bu mo dang // bum pa ris drug yang dag ldan// 'char ba 'gyur dang shar ba yang // ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis// brish+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang // ri dgas bum par yang dag ldan// cha
141a5(rgyud 'bum): shas lnga yi tshad kyis ni/ / gza' shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur// ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang // skar da ru ni song de bzhin// cha shas kyang ni bzhi pa nyid// 'char ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur// zhag gi 'char ba ma
141a6(rgyud 'bum): lus pa'ang / / 'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan// nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar// yongs su rim pas nyi shu bzhi// gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'i// de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya// nyis 'gyur
141a7(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod bris pa dang / / dbang po rnams kyis cha dang ldan// thob par rtag tu shes bya ste// bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo// bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang // gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyar// de phyir phyi dang
141b1(rgyud 'bum): nang rnams su/ / dge dang mi dge'i las shes bya// sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni// rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya// gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes bya// dbyangs gang de rnams rA si'o// dbyangs dang rA si de
141b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin skar/ / rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o// dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po// yang dag sbyor dang bral na med// g.yo ba'i 'char bas g.yo ba'i las// nges par brtan pas g.yo med 'gyur// 'dren ma yis
141b3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dren mar 'gyur/ / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// lha rnams grol ba'i rgyu nyid pas// lha yi dgra ni bsgom par bya// sum cu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo// rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso// kha
141b4(rgyud 'bum): dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs/ / las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya// lha 'am lha min sbyin byed kyi// dgra ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/

141b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin byed sems can gyi/ / sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags// gal te kun rang bzhin ston pa// dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba// de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs// sems can kun ster po ci lags// 'di la bdag
141b7(rgyud 'bum): ni the tsom mchis/ / gtso bo gsal bar mdzod cig kye// phag mo la sogs mang po yi// lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon// rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas// lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi// bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med//
142a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub chen por zhu las yod// rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid// bdag gi las kyi yang dag 'byung // de phyir dge dang mi dge blta// sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed// de yis lha dang sbyin
142a2(rgyud 'bum): byed rnams/ / gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can// rang gi las 'bras la za ba// ster ro gzhan du ci yang med// ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur// glu 'di yis ni dgyes par byed// a mi tA b+ha dza ni tA sa mA d+ha mA ga mA ga mA
142a3(rgyud 'bum): / d+hAd+ha/ ma pA nya rI pA mA nya ri ga mA sA nya mA rI gi ma b+hu ya te/ sa rI re sa ri re sa ri re sa rI rI sA nI sA nya shru ta ni sa mA nya sa nI/ shI ri b+ha ga mA d+ham+ma sA nya pA yA pA pA ma da mi te/ 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di 'dra'i grol
142a4(rgyud 'bum): ba bsgrub par bya/ / a ba d+hU tI'i yang dbus su// rnam shes 'gro ba la mtshon bya// srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad// rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya// rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang // khams thams cad
142a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi bcud len te/ / 'thungs pas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnams bgrod mtshan nyid las// rkan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce// a ba d+hU tIr de rab bshad// cha shas can gyi tha ma yi// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni
142a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzag par 'gyur/ / rtsa thams cad du bkang ba ste// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim// mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste// gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod// dbang chen la ni me yis sreg/ chu yi dbus su rab
142a7(rgyud 'bum): tu thim/ / myur du zhu nas dro bar 'gyur// rlung ni nam mkha' la gnas so// chu yi tshogs ni bskams byas pas// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// sems ni stong nyid la son bya// stong nyid nam mkha'i khams la'o// nam
142b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya/ / ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// mkhas pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag/ de ltar 'od dpag med par sgom// rtsibs brgyad legs par brgyan pa yi// shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom/
142b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ pu me da bri pa mi u ku// d+ha si me ro ma ka 'drer// rlung du tu ka bi mi dbang ldan du// rA si'i 'khor lo rim ji bzhin// de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod// a i u e o aM aHsa bon rnams// bkra shis la
142b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs gza' lnga ni/ / shar la sogs par dgod par bya// ring po de nyid du dgod bya// aM aHnyi ma zlar shes bya// nyi ma zla ba 'di grol ba// ku li re la nyi ma ste// gza' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas// mthar ni gang zhig
142b4(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma yi/ / so so'i cho gas za bar 'gyur// rA si rnams kyis brgyan pa yi// 'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de// de ltar do la'i 'khor lor lor 'gyur// rgyu skar rA si dus dang zhag/ lug rnams ro hi ta sogs dang //
142b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag ldan// gza' dang nad ni de bzhin te// do lA rA si'i tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i las su
142b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa yin/ / kArti ka dang bzang po'i tshe// mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste// de la 'chi bar shes par bya// gal te rnal 'byor med na'o// mar ga shIr Shi mgo dang ni// gza' ldag nyi ma la spro ba// mgul pa'i nad
142b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis nyin bzhin/ / khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi// rgyal dang mri ga'i rgyu skar dang // gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o// ku li ri mchu'i tshes brgyad kyi// tho rengs pa sangs la 'chi'o// gre dang mchu yi rgyu skar dang // tshes
143a1(rgyud 'bum): @#bcu spen pa seng ge la/ / nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste// gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang ngo // bu mo gnyis mar gul mas 'chi// sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // gzhu dang phur bu'i ri mo dang // gal te
143a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa/ / srang la 'chi bar shes par bya// sngon dang bcu gcig nag pa dang // phur bu sdig pa la 'chi'o// chu stod chu smad tshes dgu dang // gro bzhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi// gro bzhin tshes bdun zla ba dang /
143a3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba rgyal dang chu srin la nor med// khrums stod khrums smad bcu gsum pa// zla ba mon gre bum pas mdzad// tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang // spen pa dang ni nyi la 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis// dus smra bas
143a4(rgyud 'bum): ni shes par bya/ / sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan// gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so// rigs gnyis su ni shes byas nas// de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas
143a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i rigs su skye'o/ / de yi 'bras bu shes bya ste// mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas// rA si sogs 'khor 'brel pa de// rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do// 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gsal
143a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bsgom par bya/ / dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po// lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs so// de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bur de dran bya// thams cad bde ba kun sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med
143a7(rgyud 'bum): la brten pa'i/ / 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// / rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bas// ye shes de kho na nyid bshad bya//
143b1(rgyud 'bum): lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas// de kho na nyid ye shes zhus// sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba// de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon//
143b2(rgyud 'bum): lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis te// de rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de/
143b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod// dar ni snying po dgu po mchog/ lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so// dbugs ni
143b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spros tsam gyis/ / lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis na// snga dro ro hi ta yi char// de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar// lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni//
143b5(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang // brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// mngoms dang ling ga dag de bzhin// mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs// mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du//
143b6(rgyud 'bum): dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te// 'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni// 'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon//
143b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin// der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te// sum cu drug cu rnams de bzhin// cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshad// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas// gang tshe rlung
144a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'bab pa na/ / lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang // dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang // nyi ma rnams ni bco brgyad kyi// gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod// zhag brgyad rnams su longs gtong
144a2(rgyud 'bum): bas/ rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na// lo gnyis su ni yongs bshad par// de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs// nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni// de yi zla ba rig byed grangs// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad// 'tsho ba yi ni dus grangs so//
144a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na// lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho ste// zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi// tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no// lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis// lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho'o// nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du// gang tshe rtsa
144a4(rgyud 'bum): ni rab 'jug na/ / lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis// nyi ma bco brgyad rab tu bshad// the tsom med par bshad pa'o// zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas// lo gcig tu ni rab tu
144a5(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can// nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa// g.yas su bgrod par 'bab pa na// lor ni yang dag bshad pa ste// zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs// nyi ma rnams
144a6(rgyud 'bum): ni dgu'i grangs na/ / 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su// rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad// zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags// nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te// de yi
144a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho ba'i tshad yin no/ / gang tshe bco lnga nyi mar ni// rlung ni de bzhin 'bab pa na// de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba// lo gcig na ni the tshom med// nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na// 'tsho ba zla ba bcu/
144b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni// nyim rnams ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu rtsa bzhi nyin rnams kyi// tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du// nges par gang tshe chung 'bab na// de tshe de yi tshad kyis ni// za ba rnams ni dgra
144b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / nyi ma bco brgyad na de bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus la the tsom med// nyi ma bco brgyad rgyu ba yis// zla ba yang ni brgyad na dang // nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs// dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o// gang tshe gcig dman
144b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi shur ni/ / dri la zhon pa spyod pa na// nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba// 'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can// gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod// zla ba drug na tshe/
144b4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'bral// nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams su// gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab na// zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste// nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs// nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'bab// zla ba rig byed na tshe 'gro// nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu ba ni/

144b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig na de bzhin du/ / 'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod// dus kyi grangs ni mdor bsdus nas// gong du sngon du bshad de'i phyir// bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang // bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni// cha yi rim pas

145a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis yid ches/ / khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro// sna yi sha ni rnams chad cing // steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab// de yis 'tsho bar shes byas pa// nyi ma bdun na the tsom med//

147a1(rgyud 'bum): la phyag bzhi pa/ / cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yi// bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// nyi mar gar mdzad ro la bzhugs/

148a2(rgyud 'bum): dog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ / dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang // kun tu skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin// bden bral mi la zhon pa ste// kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas skrag pas

148a5(rgyud 'bum): cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'/ / rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa sgom// rang gi dam tshig las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rigs ma de bzhin gzhan//
148a6(rgyud 'bum): de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// de phyir re re bsgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su// sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la// pho nya'i las ni yang dag

148b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing // sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// oM hUM phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas/
148b2(rgyud 'bum): der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang // bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs can te// ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa
148b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar/ / lhag ma sngon gyi gzugs can te// lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don// nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sku
148b4(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa// bcom ldan gzugs kyi 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o//
148b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yis sang mdzad nas// ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad// blo gros chen po dus ci lags// kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus// myu gu can gyis skyes
148b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad// gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs ni// sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod// gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi
148b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i rgyu/ / 'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// de tshe myu gu can sgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid// myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ba myu
149a1(rgyud 'bum): can rgyu skar rA si gza' sogs pas/ / gang zhig tu ni myu gu skyes// de yis myu gu can nges byas// rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya// dge ba 'am ni mi dge kun// tshes grangs rgyu skar
149a2(rgyud 'bum): gza' 'char ba/ / de rnams thams cad dus rnams su// thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom// ro tri maM ni rnyed byed pa'o// ma b+ha ma nad 'joms pas spangs// ku swa A dus byed gzugs te// tshes grangs de
149a3(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs su spangs/ / mo bu ma bzang dang bkra shis so// ra bu A 'joms par byed pa'o// b+ha bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so// b+ha pU gu rnyed pa byed pa po// mi g+hu d+ha nor la sogs par mdzad// tra gu a dus kyi
149a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can no/ / bri shu pU dge ba rnams byed do// b+hi shA pu nad dang 'joms pa yin// b+hu b+ha shu gshin rje'i mche can no// klu ma kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob// b+hU ma A gdung byed pa po// pU ra ma 'chi ba'i
149a5(rgyud 'bum): dus can no/ / me'i gdan can du mi ki ra// slar yang gshin rjer raN+Da spang // srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang // khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya// sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gter du rmi lam can de
149a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du// 'byung po'i nyi ma shar de bzhin// zla ba dang ni nyi sogs chas// de rnams res mo rab bshad bya// bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin// sems g.yengs 'byung po'i nyi mar
149a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / skye bo kun gyi ma yi ni// cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya// khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang // rmi lam bco lnga pa de bzhin// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod// nya la me ru yang dag gnas
149b1(rgyud 'bum): stong la rlung gi gnas su'o/ / de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa ni// phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyid las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gre// zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis// shes rab
149b2(rgyud 'bum): can gyi des de spangs/ / mche ba dang 'phrad ma bltas pas// bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin// dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa// rA hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// dkar dang cig shos cho ga yis// blo gros mthar thug pas
149b3(rgyud 'bum): shes 'gyur/ / rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// skye bo rang gis byas pa yis// las 'di shes par ma gyur to// las de yis ni dus rnams ni// the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/
149b4(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong // yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myu gu can du grags// kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// myu gu'i myu gu'i
149b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can ni/ / lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa sgom// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang son pa// gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs// ye shes myu gu rnam bsgoms pas// las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thams
149b6(rgyud 'bum): cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las/ / sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// rgyu rnams su ni rtag bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// // de nas
149b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gar byas nas/ / rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang 'brel bas 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon ni las ni rnam nyams pas// rgyun nyams pas na 'od med pa/ 'di la bdas
150a1(rgyud 'bum): ni the tsom mchis/ / snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stsol// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis// khyod ni
150a2(rgyud 'bum): yid gcig pa yis nyon/ / rdo rje ral pa can sbyor bas// las kyi nang du sgrub par 'gyur// re re yi ni sbyor ba yi// de ni rang byung du gnas so// shin tu dad pa la gnas pas// dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya// de yi ral
150a3(rgyud 'bum): pas rtag 'jig rten/ / ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur// de phyir bag chags thams cad dang // dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur//
150a4(rgyud 'bum): skye bo chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung // dril bu'i sgra ni thob byas nas// de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rtse
150a5(rgyud 'bum): dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang / / rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can// de ltar la sogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bar du'o// sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis// spros pa med cing yi ge med// rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
150a6(rgyud 'bum): dag/ de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/ gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtse can de rdo rje// gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba// chos dang sprul pa'i
150a7(rgyud 'bum): ris sku can/ / de nyid du ni gsor bar bya// phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu cha gsum can// lha yis yang dag brgyan par byas// re re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting /
150b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la pad sogs bya// ji ltar de rnams kyi ni brgyan// de bzhin
150b2(rgyud 'bum): dril bu'i ska rags so/ / lha ni sgo dang grwa rnams su// phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid// ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon bya// de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon// bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang // steng du
150b3(rgyud 'bum): rang rigs mtshan ma can/ / 'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che// tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag/ de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon cha// thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che/ rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam
150b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur// rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du'ang bsgom
150b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun// de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug/ thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje dril bu yang dag brten// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs
150b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyis// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis/
150b7(rgyud 'bum): lus can kun gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnams la yig dgod pa ni// ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin// yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khams re re la yi ge
151a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya// gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can// mtshams kun tu ni gnas pa 'bar// khams thams
151a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bde gnas las/ / dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po// bdag med pa yi bdag tu bzhag/ gnyis med chos
151a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung nang du'o/ / de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce// dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas// sman thams cad dang nye ba'i yin// sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge bdag/ de'i ming
151a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid du shes par bya/ / me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi// dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can// de rnams kyis ni bcud len sgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ji lta'i rim pas rims sogs kyi//
151a5(rgyud 'bum): ka sogs thams cad sman chen te// las smra ba yi rgyud gzhan du// der ni nges par gsal rig bya// dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms nas// rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na grub rnal 'byor
151a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba// des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyor las// bdud rtsi'i tshogs mtshams gzugs ldan pa'i//
151a7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// 'dres pas mchod pa
151b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba// ston pa rdo rje che ci lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags// sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags// chos nyan pa yi dus su yang // ci zhig gis ni bstan par
151b2(rgyud 'bum): byas/ lha dang lha ma yin dang mi// ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong // mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol// mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// ji lta'i rim
151b3(rgyud 'bum): pas bshad kyis nyon/ / shin tu zab mo'i don chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// bdag gis nges par mdor bsdus pas// rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du//
151b4(rgyud 'bum): khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can// lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi// grong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par las chung bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams
151b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas// sems kyang de yi gnas la'o// rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs// de yis rdo rje hUM mdzad
151b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul/ / rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// hUM gi yi ge'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khor lo can ston byas// chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs par/
151b7(rgyud 'bum): shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod par mnyan par byed// der song nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi// slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya// rdo rje la sogs de'i yi
152a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ / sems can kun la phan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang // sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs// mthun
152a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ngag dang thams cad la/ / bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang // gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol// ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed// 'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i
152a3(rgyud 'bum): ngag sems can kun la thugs brtse dang / / lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyin// kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang // bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son// mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma// phyag rgya brda ni
152a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa po/ / de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang // skye ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su// rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste// bde ba'i
152a5(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnams su ni sgra ye shes// rdo rje hUM mdzad can khyab bdag/ 'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no// sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni// de phyir phra
152a6(rgyud 'bum): mo'i rang bzhin can/ / spar sha'i khams su yang dag grags// de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs// mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par// sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo//
152a7(rgyud 'bum): shing srin gzhan ni sog ma bzhin// 'di yis bgrod pa ma shes pas// byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings// mtha' yis bde ba gsung ba po// bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang // lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po//
152b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad bya// de ni shin bzang rab sbyar bas/
152b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa// dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya// phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid// spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags// kun gyi bdag nyid
152b3(rgyud 'bum): yid bzang la/ / dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag rten// grong de rnams su spyod pa dang // yid kyis brtul zhugs bstan par bya// srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya// bdag
152b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can/ / yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas// lus ni lus la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas// phyag rgya chen por yang
152b5(rgyud 'bum): dag grags/ / phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa za// lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan// chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste// mi 'dod kyang ni de
152b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'gro/ / gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yid 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro// sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na// rnam shes brgyad
152b7(rgyud 'bum): du shes par bya/ / blo ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni// bde ba can du de rtsen to// dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas// phyi nas yid kyi rab tu bshad// srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas// dbang po'i grong khyer
153a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba yis/ / ye shes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi
153a2(rgyud 'bum): nikhyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ / rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang po lnga dang bdun// brgyad dang bcu gsum bco lnga dang // bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis//
153a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin// byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum// mi yi
153a4(rgyud 'bum): / tshogs su dran par bya// gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang // dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa// srin po'i rigs su dran par bya//
153a5(rgyud 'bum): ra rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang // klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o// drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o// bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste// byi la de bzhin dgu pa'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// rtag
153a6(rgyud 'bum): tu de ltar brjod pa'o/ / bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga// khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo// thog ma tha ma bong bu yi// rigs su de rnams rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// de ni ma her mngon par brjod
153a7(rgyud 'bum): thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug/ rta yi rigs su rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po yi ni rigs su 'gro// nyi shu gsum dang
153b1(rgyud 'bum): shu bzhi/ / mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyu skar// bshad kyis da lta mnyan par gyis// mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te//
153b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin// skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par// 'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi// lug dang srang dang karka Ta// chu srin mthon po la dran bya// kI Ta bum seng khyu mchog ni// brtan pa'i bya bar rab
153b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bstan/ / nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir// gzhu dang bu mo 'dres ma la'o// bla ma nyi ma sa'i skyes bu// ngan spong rA hu zla bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste// mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin//
153b4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du// byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje bzang por de bshad de// rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems// dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan//
153b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab pa// byang chub sems rnams kyis rig pa'o// snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni// las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin// yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan// rigs med rigs can yang med do// /
153b6(rgyud 'bum): srid par rtsed mo rtsam du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa// me long gi ni yul la gzugs// gang 'dra mthong ste de med do// de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can
153b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems/ / de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min// nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can//
154a1(rgyud 'bum): dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid// dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs// byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che// bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa
154a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bde kun bdag nyid du skyed bshad// don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor
154a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ sngags kyi 'phreng bar rang nyid byon// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// sa rnams la ni rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni// sa yi dbus su bya ba yin// thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig
154a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya/ / de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni// srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni// spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas
154a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid byed// khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa//
154a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po'i don can no// dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi// bsnun dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs// 'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni// nyi ma dang po zad med can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems//
154a7(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim pas so// de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can// dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams// sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya// ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa'
154b1(rgyud 'bum): bo rnams/ / bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis// de dang de yi gnas su bri// gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sku la sog/
154b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bzlas kun dang // de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can// sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang // de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de nas dpa' bo
154b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ / 'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su// me yi gzugs can bsgom par bya// shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung po'i tshigs de kun spyod bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang /
154b4(rgyud 'bum): drag po rengs par byed yi ge/ las dang rjes mthun gzugs bsgoms te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya// 'chi ba slu zhing de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da nA dar 'dzem bya zhing //
154b5(rgyud 'bum): thig le thig ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bus gdab// 'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis// rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de// oM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mtha'//
154b6(rgyud 'bum): dzilta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o// na maHshrI badz+ra DA ka ma hA bI ra bI re shwa rA ya/ tri b+hu wa na kaM pa kaM pa ba nA ya/ daMSh+Tot+ka Ta b+hI Sha Na b+hai ra bA ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ne tA ya/ bi d+yud dzi hA ya/ kaM kA la mA lA b+ha ra NA ya/
154b7(rgyud 'bum): ko Ti la k+Sha b+hu dzA ya/ dzA lA ba lI D+ha lag nA ya/ pa ru pu pA sho d+ya ta shU lA la/ kalpA na ta d+hu mA gra ba pu ShA ya/ piM ka Ta mu kha hA hA ra bA ya/ ma tri ga Na pa ri pU ri ta man+t+ra ya/ sa ha dza sun+da rI ba l+la b+ha ka rA ya/ hUM hUM kA
155a1(rgyud 'bum): rots+tsha ra Na mu khA ya/ ma hA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya/ sarba b+hU ta saM trA sa na ka rA ya/ ma hA kal+lAn+tag+ni te dzA ya/ dza TA ka lA pa/ ma ku nA ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la shU la b+hin na d+ha ri Ne/ ma hA sa mu dra me kha//
155a2(rgyud 'bum): lA ya/ b+hA g+hA tsar+m+ma ma ba ra d+hA ri Ne/ be tA la saM g+hA marda na ka rA ya/ ma hA big+h+nAM ni bA ri Ne/ sha dz+nyA ni sum+b+ha ka rA ya/ tri sa ha sra ma hA sA ha sre ka ro mA ba lpAn+tarbarti ne/ sha ta sa ha sra mu khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ ma
155a3(rgyud 'bum): hA pi shi ta ru d+hi ro ba sa hA ri Ne/ sarba mA ra ba la d+h+waM si te/ siSh+Ti saM hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA nAM sho Sha Na stam+b+ha na bi drA ba nA ya/ an+t+ra mA la d+hA ri Ne/ su me ru kaM pi tA nA dA ya/ kro d+ha bi gra ha d+hA ra NA ya/ ma hA kA sha ti la
155a4(rgyud 'bum): kAd+da Ne/ bud+d+ha ko Ti sa ha prak+Sha d+hA nI ya/ dz+nyA nA mr-i ta ban+d+ha par+N+Na ye/ sarba karma pre bad+d+hA nA ya na~M/ bar+d+han ka rA ya/ sarba ba~M kalpa b+hany+dzan ke rA ya/ mudz+nyA ba li lag na sha rI rA ya/ pa ra kri ta yan+t+ra man+ta nA sha nA ya/ ma hA rak+ShA
155a5(rgyud 'bum): ka rA ya/ duSh+TA nAM bi dA la ne/ d+harmo da ya da ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+pha ra s+pha ra NA ya/ in+d+ra dza la sarba satwA ta ma ne/ grasta bA da pra bA da ma hA ma te/ de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang // rab tu mang ba rgya che'o// sna tshog
155a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa du ma'i ming / / sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// bcom ldan sngag/
155a7(rgyud 'bum): pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o// // de nas mig la sogs dbang po// kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad// mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje gsum ni rab
155b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya/ / gang du byang chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par lha// rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog/ sems ni mig tu shes par bya// rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas// so sor rlung ni dbab//
155b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus su// de yi dus su thim nas 'gro// de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur// skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs// yid kyis sgra ni nyan par
155b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya// lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas// lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis// lce yi mngon shes la brten nas// dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin// lus kyi
155b4(rgyud 'bum): reg pa'i rnam pa yis/ / mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya// sngon gyi bag chags dran pa la// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro// nyin zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas// chu tshod drug cu nyid dang ni// chu'i srang drug cu
155b5(rgyud 'bum): tham pa dang / / g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la// dpangs su sor brgyad nyid yin te/ guny+dza drug cu'i tshad la ni// sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang //
155b6(rgyud 'bum): kASh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang // se gol gtogs par shes bya ste// dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gis// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus min sel
155b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon cha mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i// dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te// srog chags rnams kyis gar bgrod pa/
156a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur// 'dud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can// chos kyi 'byung gnas
156a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gnas pa/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya// thur sel lam la rtag brten nas// slar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon
156a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzag/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi// mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa// de lha'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog yin no// dngos
156a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i rang shes can ma lus/ / ring du yongs su spangs pa yin// thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las// lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa// bcom ldan mig gis
156a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha mos phyag byas nas// de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas// stobs po che yi sbyin sreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan
156a6(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / mkhas pas rgyun du rang bdag gi/ sbyin sreg bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas// khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te// bde ba thab tu yang dag 'theb// nyi zla
156a7(rgyud 'bum): dgang gzar thugs gzar ro/ / slob dpon gnyis med de med la// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su sreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di med// gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// yam shing rtsa ru
156b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag grags/ / gang phyir sA lu las skyes 'bras// tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'di ru mar ni byang chub sems// khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes par bya// srog sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o// gcin dang bshang ba
156b2(rgyud 'bum): dag de ltar/ / tsan dan dang ni gla rtsi'o// me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags// mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin// bud shing so sen rus pa'o// mdor bsdus pa yis pags pa gos// ma yi thab kyi dbus su ni//
156b3(rgyud 'bum): skra dang ba spu lha ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste de la sreg/ rim gyis mkha' 'gro rdzogs son pa// gang ba'i sreg blugs su shes bya// dbang po thams cad gar byed de//
156b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi bag chags glu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo// snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin// srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi// stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni// de
156b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur/ / 'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu// yid ni de ru yang dag rol// gang tshe'i dus su bde gyur pa// de'i tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas// sbyin sreg nang bdag nyid mthong bas//
156b6(rgyud 'bum): rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes// de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya// mtshams rnams kun tu khong khro ba// sems chen po ni gsod par 'gyur// rtog pas sprul pa'i
156b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ni/ / de las byung ba bza' bar bya// mtshon bya mtshon byed rab bcom pas// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni// de la thim par byed par 'gyur// khams kun yang
157a1(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyor ba las/ / ye shes gnyis byar med mtshan nyid// me yi gzugs su rtag bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o//
157a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rdo rje pad 'du ba// ji bzhin bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// a ba d+hU tI can dngos grub// rnal 'byor ma la yang dag rol// don dam pa yi nyams la gnas//
157a3(rgyud 'bum): de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni// gnyis med rgyud rnams kyis 'gyur ro// lus kyis nyams su myong bzhin pa// byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'ong // ha yig drug dang ldan pa yi// sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod// a
157a4(rgyud 'bum): ba d+hU tI'i rtsar dbab ste/ / steng du kha bltas dpral bar son// srung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis// rang gi lag pas rdo rje bzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin// srid pa'i skyon las
157a5(rgyud 'bum): 'goms pa yis/ / srid gsum de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas// nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya// de yi dus su gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung bar bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul
157a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid/ / rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du// bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni// sems can don ni nges par bya// sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor
157a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya/ / rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod// pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya// 'dod chags me yis dgyes par bya// byang chub sems ni rtag
157b1(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba/ / lce yi bya yis lag pas min// lhan skyes 'phros pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis gzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas btung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams cad kyang bza'
157b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sA lu skyes sogs 'bad pas so// sbyin sreg kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed// de de'i thod par bya ba ste// de nas sa bon gdab par bya// de rnams rdzas kyis spang ba dang //
157b3(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya// de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'jug 'gyur// ril bu'am ni skud pa ni// dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgoms
157b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rin chen rdo rje can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi ste// spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin// gang dang gang gi las kyi ni// de dang de'i ming can sngags so// sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las/
157b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni rtag tu sman rnams te// bcom ldan las kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i// /
157b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas// pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig skyes gnas dbus su ste// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o// gri yig dbu ma'i pad+mar te// wa
157b7(rgyud 'bum): yi yi ge snying kha ru/ / rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa// dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog/ gang phyir gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur// mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni//
158a1(rgyud 'bum): mgrin par ngag tu gnas pa nyid// 'tsho ba rta yi dbyibs 'dir ni// gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba// sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du'o// nyi de rdo rje sema?
158a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ste/ / khams gsum por ni skor bar 'gyur// nam mkha' nyi mas 'dzegs byas nas// byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs// rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog/
158a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang // lam mthong ba ni thams cad la// de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// mtshan mo mun pa drag po 'phrog/ rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par// rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin/
158a4(rgyud 'bum): gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba// sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te// sprin la sogs pa'ang nyams par 'gyur// kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par
158a5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyi 'jig rten du// thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med
158a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams de lha mo/ / yan lag gcig gis rol par byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste// sbyin sreg A ga sogs de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod
158a7(rgyud 'bum): chags kyis ni 'dod chags bsgo/ / me yis tshig la gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags// bsten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo // de nyid thabs so yid kyi las// dge ba'i mtshan nyid
158b1(rgyud 'bum): can bya'o/ / nang du byed pa ma yin te// gus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas// phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs// sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba//
158b2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par// kun tu dbye ba yod ma yin// lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste// tshad ma pa rnams tho co can// thams cad tshig ni rnam shes
158b3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ ye shes can rnams de'i phyi shes// mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las// nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di
158b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rlung gi
158b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid de/ / chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su// gang zhig stong pa de srog chags// khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste// dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i//
158b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang // de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// dus thams cad du g.yo ba med// g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo // de ni thams cad bdag
158b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid rlung / / bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o// ngo lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po// sgra dang thig ler de shes bya// 'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// de phyir nam mkha'i
159a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po yang / / mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// nang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yi// srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun gzhir shes bya ste// me long du yang rab tu
159a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang de// dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'// rnal 'byor rnams kyis
159a3(rgyud 'bum): lhag med 'pho/ / de'i dus rnam par gzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min// nam mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi// de yi snying por rab tu bstan// de dag shes rab thabs gnyis so//
159a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do// srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid// dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur// de ltar rnam bcas
159a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid dang / / rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar lha rnams kyis 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa'o//
159a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshul chen chos de 'dod pa dang // gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i
159a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid can/ / gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste// chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo // nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi//
159b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya// shan pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyob rnams kyi grol 'thob// nges par
159b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su/ / gzugs su bsdoms pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying
159b3(rgyud 'bum): po gcig pu pa/ / bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam pa yi// rnal 'byor la bzhugs pas 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// / de nas lha mos mchod byas te// phyag
159b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni 'di gsol to/ / rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas/
159b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa rang // dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum
159b6(rgyud 'bum): par mda'i yi dbyibs dang 'dra/ / bzhi par 'bem gyi gzugs can no// lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs// brgyad par pad+mar brjod
159b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / dgu pa ru ni bcud len te// bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba
160a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / bco lnga pa nyid rA hu ste// thig le zhes byas bcu drug pa// rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gis rig par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo bzhi
160a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams su bsgrub bya/ / rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang mdze sogs spangs pa yin// lte bar shrI yi yi ger 'gyur// he yig snying khar dgod par bya// ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste// thod par ka yi
160a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'o/ / thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med// gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// dbu ma'i nang
160a4(rgyud 'bum): du rab tu gzhug/ 'khor lo bzhi yi 'dab son nas// rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog/ rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyir// byung bar rnam par shes par bya// sems chen po ni sad bzhin pas//
160a5(rgyud 'bum): don yod mthong bas 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te// dus thams cad du nges par gnas// longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong // bzhi pa rab mang bdag
160a6(rgyud 'bum): med de/ / de phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod// de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas// nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can// rdul gyi sbyor ba
160a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba ste/ / nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang // bcu drug rnams kyi cha rnams kyi// nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor
160b1(rgyud 'bum): lo'i dbus rnams su/ / dpal he ru ka bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor// gtso bo rang rig bdag nyid
160b2(rgyud 'bum): can/ bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi// ston mo
160b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bshad par bya/ / pad+ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo // rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gar byed do// byang chub sems kyi dbang phyug ste// de rnams kyi ni
160b4(rgyud 'bum): nang du bzhugs/ / rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya// snying rje'i kha yos btung bar bya// gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol// sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de yi rang bzhin du// bza' ba
160b5(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba med par bya/ / pad+ma gar dbang bsgom bya ste// ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// pa yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro// brtan pa thams cad t+ma yi yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te// te yig bde ba'i
160b6(rgyud 'bum): lha can yin/ / shwa yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin// srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la// de yis rab tu sbyor bar bya// mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun// bde mchog phyi
160b7(rgyud 'bum): mar shes par bya/ / bgrod pa 'di rnams la brten nas// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang // he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo// pad+ma gar dbang phyug de yang // sbyor ba kun la
161a1(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / pad+ma ye shes yang dag grags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung // lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// shes po thams cad de la
161a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/ gar byed pa yi sku chen la// de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya// nam mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor
161a3(rgyud 'bum): lo dbus su/ / lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol bar gyis// 'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las// de rnams kyis ni dga' bar byed// gang dang gang gi las rnams la// de dang de yir bsgom par bya// sgrub po
161a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi byang chub rtser/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong // de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas// gar byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing // tshe son pa rnams
161a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas par byed/ / 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa sbyong // rang gi sems kyis dngos grub 'thob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//
161a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa// 'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams// bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya// bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs nas// phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya//
161a7(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las// bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis
161b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon// gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang // de ni shes rab chen por brjod// rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin
161b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no/ / spu khung rtse mo thams cad las// de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa// 'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhugs
161b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs// g.yo ba'i 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid// gdong gis gdong ni blta bar gyis// mi dang mi mo lA/
161b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs kyi// gzugs ni pad+ma'i 'dab chu bzhin// srog chen po der shes bya ste// shi ba'i dus las nges par 'thon// aM gi yi ge yid la bya// dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya// bdag nyid kyis ni hA
161b5(rgyud 'bum): yig spro/ / gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan// sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas par mtshon par bya// haM yig mchog gi dang po yis// ye shes dngos po rnams su sprul// chos kyi dbyings
161b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi dbus su/ / rnam snang mdzad kyi sgom pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis// sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya// bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur// 'dod
161b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste/ / 'dod na bde ba rnam par spro// de tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas// dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa// rnal 'byor ma la mi bya'o// myur bar
162a1(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs/ / rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya// sna tshogs du ma'i skad kyis chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyon// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // rin
162a2(rgyud 'bum): chen dbang dang A ro li ka/ don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs// shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyi// de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig/ 'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang /
162a3(rgyud 'bum): bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa po// blo ldan so sor sems can don// gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur// mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du// tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya// khams thams cad kyi
162a4(rgyud 'bum): til mar ni/ / dogs pa med pas bya ba yin// rnam snang sbyor bas btung bya'am// byug pa'ang de nyid kyis bya'o// de yis bsnan nas sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su
162a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong // gnyis pa thams cad kun sbyor las// rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol// bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku// rab grol mdzad pa 'di gsungs so//
162a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gsang chen bshad bya ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad
162a7(rgyud 'bum): du yang dag bzhugs/ / rdo rje mi phyed ye shes te// sems dpa' snying po ston pa'o// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// snying rje sems dpar rab tu grags// zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// gnas rnams
162b1(rgyud 'bum): bgrod pa bstan par bya/ / pu li ra las lte bar 'bab// dzA lan+d+ha rar yang dag gnas// oM D+yan du ni kun tu spyod// a ra pur bza' dang btung can no// go dA ba rir rol pa ste// rA me shwa rir rgyal dang pham/
162b2(rgyud 'bum): de bi ko Tir rjes su 'dzin// mA la war rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// kA ma rU par tshig 'grub bo// oM trer mngon sum dngos grub ster// tri sha ku ner dbang rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ ko sa
162b3(rgyud 'bum): lar rnal 'byor dngos grub ster/ / ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub skye// lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub// kAny+tsir gsad pa'i dngos grub bo// hi ma la yar mthun pa 'grub// pre ta pu rir rang gi lta ba// gri
162b4(rgyud 'bum): / ha de ba tar bkas gnang ba// lhan skyes 'pho med so raSh+Ta ra// gser gling du ni rang don 'grub// nA ga rer gnas kyi dngos grub ster// sin+d+hur stobs 'grub de bzhin du// ma rur 'chi med dngos grub bo//
162b5(rgyud 'bum): ku lu tar rang bzhin dngos grub tu// de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skye// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos// gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus su// khams
162b6(rgyud 'bum): su gyur pa'i ro chen po/ / gsang ba'i mchog tu shes par bya// mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran// dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste// thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas// rtag bzhugs gnyis mang rnam
162b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ sems can 'jig rten las ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis// nA da'i dbus las yang dag byung // de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// gnas par de ni mngon par brjed// de
163a1(rgyud 'bum): ltar thams cad cho ga bzhin/ / dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ni nus par rab tu bshad// skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad
163a2(rgyud 'bum): rab 'jug gis/ / dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam
163a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor las/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gtso// sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu
163a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / / de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi// las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya// nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'// thams cad gsang chen gyi gnas su// gsang chen rgyas par
163a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa can/ / kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bshad khams kyi 'du shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnam can// de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya// dpa'
163a6(rgyud 'bum): bonyi shu bzhi rnams kyi/ re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// thig le nyid ni gzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu// bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur// shar la
163a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa rim bzhin du/ / rdo rje'i 'khor lo sogs par 'pho// dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad// rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// bdun cu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'gro
163b1(rgyud 'bum): bya re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba/ / sum cu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni// nyin zhag la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal
163b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor de dngos bsgoms rnams la/ / sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor// 'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams// gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la// thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas// dus dang
163b3(rgyud 'bum): dus tshod za bar byed/ / 'di lnga'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang dpa' bo// de ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin no// sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du//
163b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul med// yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa// gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o// de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten rmongs// de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub mi thob bo//
163b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du// de dang de yis mchog ye shes// 'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni// sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad do// kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstan// lha dang lha min
163b6(rgyud 'bum): sa gsum 'joms pa la phyag tshol/ / dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis// gang zhig las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par byos//
163b7(rgyud 'bum): srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa ga la ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mor gnas// sems can theg pa da dung nyams par ga la byed// de ltar yongs su dgyes pa'i mgur// bcom ldan rang nyid kyis
164a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dus su blang bar gyis// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
164a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang
164a3(rgyud 'bum): chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste le'u lnga bcu pa'o/ / // de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag/ bcom ldan bdag po
164a4(rgyud 'bum): la bstod pa/ / khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs// chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur// chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs//
164a5(rgyud 'bum): chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med// bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis// 'jig rten kun gyi'ang don can te// bdag nyid chen po ster ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa// khyod kyis dam tshig
164a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa ste/ / gzhan min dam tshig nyid las byung // bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas// byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubs so// ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs// de yis sems can don mdzad pa'i//
164a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// nga rgyal can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur// khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'chi med// bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtsen// byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod// khyod dang thabs
164b1(rgyud 'bum): cig 'dres par 'gyur/ / gong bu gcig tu gnyis med bzhugs// de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad// dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed//
164b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas// gnyis pa yi ni mchod par dran// bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa'o// bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag/ 'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o// de
164b3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i mchod pa la brten nas/ / thams cad byas pas las rgyal por// 'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste// sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du//

164b5(rgyud 'bum): lag par son pa'i dpal/ / gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus// ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya// spun gyi spyod pa'ang bstan par
164b6(rgyud 'bum): byasnying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing / / dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par// bsgom bya snang ba med pa yis// rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas// rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid
164b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ stong nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// don dam can de nyid 'dir bya// rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thams
165a1(rgyud 'bum): cang mtshon par bya/ / ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis// sa thams cad ni 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang // man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnams
165a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rgan po dang / / rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du// mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// mi mnyam pa yis dngos grub 'joms// dmyal ba la sogs ltung bar 'gyur//
165a3(rgyud 'bum): rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa// de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir// byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang // gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// me tog bskor ba la
165a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs bya/ / kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya// 'dod dang 'dod min sbyor bral bya// ma byin par yang blang bya zhing // rtag tu srog chags gsad par bya// sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor

165a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ni rab tu 'jug/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro
165a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bstod pa dang mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//
165b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di rab tu byung ba ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs// sum cu bdun bdag nyid rnal 'byor// gnyis med mkha'
165b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro rgya mtsho dang gnyis med/ / rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rgyud chen po// 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// dus thams cad du zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi za ma tog/ 'bum
165b3(rgyud 'bum): phrag sum cu drug dang po/ / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rab bshad de// chen po chung ngur gsungs pa'o// ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi// mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so// mtha' yas shing ni mu med nyid// rtsod
