165b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i// de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis//
165b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus so// gcig la gcig gis bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// tshig 'di la ni mngon par dga'//
165b7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gro// srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag
166a1(rgyud 'bum): pos 'di gsungs so/ / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang / ye shes dang / sdom pa dang /
166a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / dpal bal yul grub
166a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran zla med pa/ snying rje chen pos
166a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul reg pa shAkya'i
166a5(rgyud 'bum): sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong d+harmA yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang
166a6(rgyud 'bum): bstun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so/ / mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis// gsung gcig gis
166a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ / de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi
166b1(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ / kho bos gzhan don nus min na yang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur// 'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis mi// sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan/

167a1(rgyud 'bum): @g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yi// bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan

172b3(rgyud 'bum): nyin mor shes bya ste/ / de bzhin mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi pa'o// zhag gcig la ni 'pho ba yi// yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te// thun ni phyed phyed rtag tu rlung // sna
172b4(rgyud 'bum): yi bu ram yang dag rgyu/ / yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyed la// zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste// de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung // go rims 'dis ni ji
172b5(rgyud 'bum): srid du/ / yar tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o// mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni// nyi ma'i rlung du grags pa rgyu// de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga'i bar// thun re yi ni bzhi cha
172b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / chu tshod du ni brjod pas ni// nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis shes par bya// nyin zhag gcig la dbyug gu yi// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni// rtsa dang chu tshod phyed dbyug gu//
172b7(rgyud 'bum): thun gyi brgyad cha zhes su bshad// sna sgo'i rlung ni 'byung 'jug la// dbugs gcig tu ni rab tu grags// rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas// dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya// srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang /
173a1(rgyud 'bum): dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang de dang ldan// nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi// nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yi// nyi ma lhor ni rgyu dus kyi// mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// dbyug gu re re'i 'phel 'grib/
173a2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dus kyi dbye bas shes par bya// dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas// 'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib yin// dbugs kyi gsum cha de'i bzhi cha'i// drug chas nyi ma re re 'gyur// thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las//
173a3(rgyud 'bum): phyin ci log tu 'phos gyur na// rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas// mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag/ nyi ma gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug tu gang tshe rlung // phyin ci log tu rtag rgyun// de
173a4(rgyud 'bum): tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur/ / zla phyed rtag tu log par rgyu// nad ni chen po yang dag 'byung // zla ba gcig tu log par rgyu// snying sdug gnyen ni brlag par 'gyur// phyed dang gnyis su log par rgyu// zla ba drug na
173a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'gyur/ / thun mong dus su shes par bya// gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ste// mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song // gang tshe skye ba'i nyi zla ba// de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus// 'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin no// mi
173a6(rgyud 'bum): ni khyim gang las skyes pa/ / gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir// der ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song // mnyam po bdun zhes bya bar bshad// nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du// rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag/ rgyun mi
173a7(rgyud 'bum): chad par yang dang yang / / mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya// dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung // bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na// dus de'i skad cig rdzogs par na// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// nyi phyed
173b1(rgyud 'bum): dang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs dang de bzhin nyin zhag gcig gi bar/ / de las zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de bzhin zhag ni bzhi yi bar dag tu// rlung ni gang zhig rtswa la brten te g.yas pa min pa'i nyi ma'i
173b2(rgyud 'bum): lam nas rgyu/ / de las sa dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya// lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lngar nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar spel bas bgrod par 'gyur// de las re res spel bas bcu ni sum
173b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ji srid gsum gyis lhag pa'i bar/ / de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo dang drug gsum zung zla'i zla// lhag ma tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i zhag tu 'tsho ba yin// re'u
173b4(rgyud 'bum): mig sum cu bdun bcas pa'i/ / 'khor lo rim gsum bris nas ni// tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang // nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// zhag lnga nas ni nyi shu lnga'i// bar bar gyi ni nyin zhag la// grangs ni bcu
173b5(rgyud 'bum): drug ma bshad gang / / de rnams tshangs par brjod par bya// zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu yi// rim pas gal te rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum na'o// drag po nyin ma
173b6(rgyud 'bum): yan lag sa'i/ / zhag ni rim pas rgyun ni// yon tan ldan pa'ang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o// zhag ni bcu drug de bzhin du// bcu bdun dang ni bco brgyad dang // bcu dgu yi ni rim pa yis
173b7(rgyud 'bum): rlung rgyu yon tan can yang zhag/ bcu gnyis nyis 'gyur ma tshang ba'i// lo gcig na ni skyabs med gang // de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du// the tshom med par 'gro bar 'gyur// nyi ma nyi shu gcig gnyis gsum//
174a1(rgyud 'bum): nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan pa'ang zhag drug ni// ma tshang zla ba drug na 'chi// re'u mig sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// rim gnyis 'khor lo bris nas ni// der ni tshe yang
174a2(rgyud 'bum): yan lag rlung / / grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// 'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di dag kun// rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas// blo ldan 'chi ba bslu ba yis// gal te brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod// rtsa ni yang
174a3(rgyud 'bum): ngag sbyangs byas pas/ / de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te// so so'i rim bzhin rnal 'byor pas// yang dang yang du mnan par bya// g.yon pa'i bu gar bcug nas ni// rtsa ni bsdams nas mnan bya zhing // de
174a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung / / bkug ste dal bus mnan par bya// sems can rnams kyi zhag gcig la// rgyu ba'i dbugs kyi grangs kyi tshul// brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig
174a5(rgyud 'bum): godabang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de/ / chus ni don rnams yang dag 'byung // me yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas// bkres skom du ba dang sdug bsngal nad// bya ba thams cad nyams 'gyur zhes// rdo rje 'dzin ma
174a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis gsungs/ / rlung gis rtsod dang skyo dang rmongs// nor nyams nyon mongs par byed// dbang chen nor dang 'bru la sogs// rnyed pa thob dang sdud byed pa'o// chu yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas// 'dod pa'i
174a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun byed pas/ / de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso bor// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'o// rlung ni bcom ldan he ru ka'i// rang bzhin nyid de gsum du 'gyur// g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin te//
174b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa snying rje'i bdag nyid do// gnyis po mi phyed sbyor yang // gnyis ka nas ni rnam par rgyu// de bas de nyid reg pas der// dge mi dge sogs shes par bya// dug sogs gzhom dang lhag ma ni// bkra/
174b2(rgyud 'bum): shis dpal ni bskyed pa la// shes rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// rab tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// g.yul bsham rol rtsed ston mo dang // gcad pa dang ni dbug pa dang // bsreg dang btso ba'i
174b3(rgyud 'bum): las la ni/ / snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje can// the tsom 'gyur ba shes bya ste// dge dang mi dge nges med par// rlung rig pas ni 'dir mtshon bya// mgon po ci
174b4(rgyud 'bum): ste A lir rgyu/ / 'ga' zhig kA lir gnas 'dri 'am// kA li'i rgyu la A lir gnas// de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur// gang nas mgon po de rgyu ba// der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na// de yi don
174b5(rgyud 'bum): kun yang dag 'grub/ / gnyis kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur// rlung gi bdag nyid kyis mgon po'i// sku gsum por yang shes par bya// 'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te// gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs
174b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku/ / 'byung ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad// 'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhed// 'dri ba po'am rang gi'ang rung // chos skus thams cad dge ba ste// longs spyod rdzogs pa the tsom 'gyur// sprul pas
174b7(rgyud 'bum): 'thab mor ston pa'o/ / rnal 'byor pa yi srog rtsol ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas// g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang na// rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyu// g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// ma yi
175a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ / nas kyi me tog lta bu'i mdog/ de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha// g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// kha dog ljang ku ltar snang ba/
175a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ni don yod mchog yin no// gnyis ka nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od// gser gyi 'od ltar snang ba ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung // rtag tu rin chen 'byung ldan rgyu// 'og nas dal bar rab rgyu bas// kun du
175a3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba lta bur dkar/ / chu yi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ste// 'od chen rdo rje mgon po'o// lus kun la ni rjes 'gro'i rlung // sems kun rab tu 'jug byed pa// mgon pa rnam par snang mdzad ni// 'byung bar rab
175a4(rgyud 'bum): tu grags pa yin/ / rnal 'byor ma ni mnyam bzhag pas// 'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bar bya// ji srid 'bum la sogs pa'i grangs// sgra dang bral ba rtag tu bzla// sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar ni// 'bum
175a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas yongs su rdzogs pa na/ / tshe nyams pa yang lo lnga ru// 'tsho bar 'dir ni the tsom med// rtag tu nang par langs nas rlung // stong phrag gcig tu bgrang bya ste// de bas rlung gi rnal 'byor la// rtag tu
175a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam gzhag gnas par bya/ / yang na bum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu 'chi bdag las rgyal bya// bdag nyid rig pas rkang mthil bar// kun tu rlung gis dgang bya ste// bum pa can la brten byas
175a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ dbye ba gsum gyis gzhom par bshad// tha ma sum cu rtsa drug tsam// de yi nyis 'gyur 'bring de bzhin// sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste// bum pa can des rgyal bar bya// bum pa can lngar shes
175b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / bdag nyid skyil mo krung bcas te// lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni// de nas lan drug se gol brdab// ji srid sum cu rtsa drug par// de srid bum pa can gyis byas// sum 'gyur chen
175b2(rgyud 'bum): pos gzhom pa ni/ / brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pas so// brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pas ni// brtson pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya// bum pa'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na// 'chi bdag las ni ring du 'jug/ bum pa
175b3(rgyud 'bum): can ni shes byas nas/ / 'gog la brtan par gnas pa na// de la bskal pa stong du yang // 'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur// snying gi chu skyes dbus son rlung // hUM yig dkar po'i rnam par ni// gang
175b4(rgyud 'bum): gis mnyam par bzhag bsams na/ / de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur// rlung gis 'khor ba'i steng du 'gro// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bgrod// snying ka yi ni chu skyes la// mi gnas mya ngan 'das par
175b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung // kha sbyar du ni yid kyis byas// de yi sbyor bas goms byed na// des ni brtan pa'i go 'phang 'thob// rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa 'am// gang zhig shes kyang mi byed
175b6(rgyud 'bum): pade ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshogs/ / du mas gtses pa'i srin bur 'gyur// gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung // blo dang ldan pas rtag bya ste// rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlabs// rlung ni kun tu
175b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro 'gyur ba'o/ / 'di ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i man ngag gi rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// / de nas lam lnga bzang po mchog/ rnam par nges par rab bshad bya// bdag gzhan don ni phun
176a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa'i/ / sgrub pos dge dang mi dge brtag/ me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu'i// dkyil 'khor yang dag rgyu ba las// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ de
176a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gsang dang bskrad pa yi/ / mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yi sbyor ba mi shes pa// de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur// mes ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste// rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur// dbang
176a3(rgyud 'bum): chen gyis ni rgyal srid 'gyur/ / chus ni nor dang 'bru rnams bsten// g.yas pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// byin za'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba ni// pad+ma'i mgon po'i 'byung ba'o//
176a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog ldang zhing gsal ba ni// las kyi mgon po 'byung ba'o// gnyis ka nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog ltar gsal ba ni//
176a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// rin chen mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// ngal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// khams
176a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun ni yang dag bsdus/ / rten dang brten pa'ang yang dag 'dzin// rnam snang mdzad ni rlung chen te// 'chi ba'i lus las rnam par rgyu// rlung gi de nyid mi shes par// las dang las min mi 'grub ste//
176a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni thams cad bgrod 'gyur bas// rtog ge ba yis mi shes so// rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas// sngags kyi de nyid bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa// rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed//
176b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste// sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob byed pa// rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste// byang chub rgyu yi thabs yin no// 'di ni lam lnga nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o// /
176b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo ni// rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya// lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rtsa// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur// rtsa rnams dang ni nye ba'i rtsa// de dag gnas la brten
176b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa// gtso bo zhes ni bya bar brjod// rtsa yi gnas dang yul rnams ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs yin te// de rnams dbus kyi rtsa gsum gang // thams cad khyab cing brten
176b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o mgor ni pul+li ra yin te/ / so dang sen mo 'bab par gnas// spyi gtsug dzA lan+d+ha ra ste// skra dang spu ni 'bab par gnas// oMr+yan rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa// pags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab// mgo rgyab
176b5(rgyud 'bum): / ar pu da yin te// sha ni yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa// go da bar+ya rna ba g.yon// rgyus pa yang dag 'bab pa'i rtse// smin dbus rA me shwa ri ste// rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa'o// mig ni de bi ko Tir gnas// mchin pa
176b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no/ / mA la wa ni dpung pa gnyis// snying 'bab pa yi rtsa gnas so// mchan khung kA ma rU pa ste// rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa'o// nu ma gnyis ni o tre ste// rtag tu mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa// tri
176b7(rgyud 'bum): sha ku ne lte ba ste/ / rtsar ni glo ba 'bab pas gnas// sna rtse ko sa la yin te// rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba 'bab pas gnas// kha ni ka ling ka yin te// rtag tu gnye ma 'babs pas gnas// mgrin pa lam pa ka yin/
177a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ rtag tu lto ba 'bab pa'i rtswa// kany+tsi snying ka'i gnas yin te// bshang ba 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// mdoms par hi ma la ya ste// 'tshogs ma'i mtshams ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pre ta/
177a2(rgyud 'bum): / pu ri mtshan ma ste// bad kan 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// gri ha de ba bshang lam ste// rtag tu rnag ni 'bab pa'o// brla gnyis so raSh+Ta yin te// rtag tu khrag ni 'bab pa'o// byin pa gnyis ni gser gling gnas//
177a3(rgyud 'bum): / rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa yin mo// rkang pa'i sor mo na ga ra// rtag tu tshil 'bab rtsar shes bya// rkang pa'i bol ni sin+d+hu ste// mchi ma 'bab pa'i gzugs can ma// ma ru de sha mthe bong ste// rtag tu mchil ma
177a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bab pas gnas/ / ku lu ta ni pus mo ste// rtag tu sna chu 'bab pas gnas// de dag dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa// la la nA ra ni sih+la 'bab// g.yas su khrag ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// ra sa nA zhes grags pa
177a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug/ snying ka'i chu skyes dbus son pa// chu shing snye ma'i me tog bzhin// 'phyang ba kha ni thur du bltas// til gyi mar me ltar 'bar zhing // byang chub sems ni
177a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam 'bab ste/ / a ba d+hU tIr shes bya ste// lhar cig skyes pa ster byed pa'o// la la nA la sogs pa'i rtsa// rtsa rnams kun gyi gtso bo ste// de bas 'dir ni gzhan bsten pa// gang gis sin+d+hur gzhan
177a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug bzhin/ / gcig gyur kA ka mu kha ste// de nyid skye gnas gzhan ma yin// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis// lus la brten par shes par bya// bud med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum//
177b1(rgyud 'bum): / la la nA sogs rtsa rnams yin// shes rab rang bzhin la la nA// ra sa nA ni thabs su gnas// dbus nas a ba d+hU tI'i ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs sku la la nA// ras
177b2(rgyud 'bum): nA ni sprul pa'i sku/ / a ba d+hU tI chos sku ste// sku gsum por ni bshad pa yin// rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni// lus ni dge bar byed pa ste// de yi tshogs las yang dag byung // gong bu lha yi bdag nyid do//
177b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs las 'das pa gong bur 'gyur// gong bu las 'das lha nyid du// de phyir bsam mi khyab sbyor bas// de bzhin nyid bdag kun tu 'gro// sgrub pos cho ga gang gang gis// gong bu las 'das go 'phang
177b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / des ni de yi bdag nyid du// gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa'i 'khor lo'i thabs rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis//
177b5(rgyud 'bum): myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba yi// dam tshig rnams kyang rim pa bzhin// yang dag par ni bshad par bya// rang gi khyim mam gsang ba'i gnas// dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang // ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang //
177b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dam// chu bo 'dus pa'i dbus su ni// bla med 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// yon bdag dad pa chen po yis// zhing
177b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes gnas skyes sngags skyes ma'i/ / rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa// slob dpon lha kun spyan drang bya// khyim pa 'am ni dge tshul lam// de bzhin dge slong slob dpon te// slob dpon kha cig 'jig rten
178a1(rgyud 'bum): brda bstan la gnas pa'i dge slong ngam/ / kha cig yon tan ldan pa 'am// de bzhin mngon shes thob pa'ang rung // 'di rnams nang na yon bdag ni// gang la dad pas gtso mchog bya//
178a2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis// dkyil 'khor dge ba bri byas te// slob dpon dbang bskur yon tan ldan// 'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad cing // mi dge bcu yongs spangs pa ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i
178a3(rgyud 'bum): gtso bor bya/ / rtag tu yon bdag blo ldan gyis// snying rje med cing khro dang gdug/ khengs dang brkam chags bdag nyid bstod// mnyam par ma bzhag gis mi bya// gang zhig khyim gnas longs spyod
178a4(rgyud 'bum): bsten/ / gzhol 'dzugs dang ni tshong pa dang // rmongs pas dam chos 'tshong ba ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor min// 'di ltar yon tan kun ldan zhing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin//
178a5(rgyud 'bum): dul zhing brtson 'grus yang dag ldan// sred pa med cing nga rgyal med// rtag tu sems can bstan par ni// ltos bcas rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // thod pa'i rgyan la dga' ba dang // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan
178a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mkhas pas g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ / g.yon pa'ang rab tu gzhag par bya// 'di ltar yon tan ldan slob dpon// las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags// rim pa ji bzhin slob dpon dang // lha
178a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams spyan drangs byon pa la/ / ji ltar rnyed pa'i dri chu yis// zhabs bkru bas ni gtsang byas nas// sa yongs brtag pa'i gnas su ni// slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis// rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye ba
178b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin zhugs nas gdan la gnas par bya/ / skal ba med dang nga rgyal can// de bzhin bla ma smod pa dang // dam tshig ma mthong rang gi bu// de bzhin skyes pa bud med rnams// sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa
178b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ dam tshig der ni gzhug mi bya// gal te phyugs ni de rnams zhugs// dngos grub ring du 'jug par 'gyur// dam tshig smad pas lus sems ni// sdug bsngal de bzhin gnas nyams dang //
178b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal las ring zhing sna tshogs pa'i// sdug bsngal gyis ni nyer 'tsher 'gyur// de ltar shes nas spang bya ste// mchod pa'i spyod yul can rnams bsdu// rgan dang gzhon pa'i rim bzhin du// me tog bdug
178b4(rgyud 'bum): spos mar me dang / / tsan dan dris ni khyad par du// blo dang ldan pas rtag mchod bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i// gtor ma slob dpon gyis rab brtag/ lha ni bsnyen phyir mchod bya zhing // yon
178b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag yid la 'dod pa yi/ / gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa'i las// dngos grub don du bris nas ni// gang gang mngon par 'dod pa yi// las de byin gyis brlab par bya// sbrang chang bur chang 'khur ba'i chang // ji ltar rnyed//
178b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dbul bar bya// gtsang zhing dul dang dpa' ba'i sems// srid dang gti mug rnam par spangs// thams cad mtshungs par blta ba ni// las kyi rdo rje rab tu brtag/ bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin btung // so rtsi
178b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni spos de bzhin/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du// yon bdag gis ni dngul bya zhing // phyi nas las kyi rdo rje ni// mkhas pas rdzas rnams yongs su spyad// thog mar lcags kyu mnyam ldan pa'i// dam
179a1(rgyud 'bum): tshig yongs su spyad par bya/ / de nas thams cad yongs rdzogs par// slob dpon gyis ni byin gyis brlab// gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang ni// 'dus dang dur khrod gnas pa'o// dpa' mo'i
179a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ma kun la/ / bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo rnams kyi tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang // des bshad gsung ni mchog tu tshad mar gyur pa ste// bden par gyur pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir//
179a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur ni gyur par shog/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mdun du ni// snying kar thal mo rab sbyar te// yon bdag gis kyang smon lam ni// yongs su bsngo ba nyid du bya// srid dang zhi ba mnyam

179a5(rgyud 'bum): chus bdag la mchod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol/ / rnal 'byor bdud rtsi ro gcig gsol bas thugs ni rnam par dag pa ste// gnas la sogs pa'i yul du bgrod pas
179a6(rgyud 'bum): sku ni rnam par dag pa yi/ / dpal ldan gnas kyi dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog gi mgon po ni// bla ma mchog la rtag tu mgo bos btud de gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo kun gyi sku ni
179a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mdzes pa ste/ / lha mo rnams kyi rin chen sku yis 'khyud pas brgyan// 'khor los gnas mgon lhan cig skye dga' dri med pa'i// rnal 'byor snying po bde mchog la yang rtag phyag 'tshal// sangs
179b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun mkhyen shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ / lha mo rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas kyis mdzes// 'dren pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba ste// dri med lhan cig skyes pa mchog bdag
179b2(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal/ / tshigs bcad gsum gyis yang dag bstod// ji ltar bde bar phyag kyang btsal// yid spro ji ltar bde bar ni// ca co'i spro ba chen po yis// me tog 'phreng rnams kyis brgyan cing // sna tshogs
179b3(rgyud 'bum): me tog gis mchod lus/ / chang gi sngon mo'i dga' bcas pas// rdo rje'i glus ni dgang bar bya// mchog tu dga' bas gar bya zhing // gnas kyi mtshan pa'i sbrang stabs gar// phyag rgya sngags kyis gar bya

179b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod dang grol sogs yang dag 'thob// dngos grub phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa ni// cho ga bshad bzhin bsdu bar bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus nas ni// 'byung po 'chol
179b7(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams la sbyin/ / gnas dang zhing gnas rnal 'byor ma'i// tshogs la dri zhing tshim par bya// spyan drangs dpa' bo thams cad ni// bde ba chen por gshegs su gsol// 'di ni dam tshig gi brda'i cho ga
180a1(rgyud 'bum): rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i brda// cung zad tsam ni bshad bya ste// sgrub pos gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub
180a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'o/ / gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa// de la gnyis bstan legs 'ongs lan// gang zhig g.yon pa'i sor mo sngams// bde 'am zhes pa'i rgyar shes bya// gang zhig ming med ston byed pa// de la
180a3(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung bstan par bya/ / gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa// de la mthe bong bstan par bya// gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa// de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya// gang zhig pa ni sa ston pa// de la rtse gsum bstan

180b1(rgyud 'bum): bas dus drug tu/ / rang gi rigs la rnam par lta// bden 'byung 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// rnyed dka' nges par dam tshig can// rang gi khyim du thod pa dang // dgra sta ral gri rgyal mtshan dang // 'khor lo dang ni rnga

180b3(rgyud 'bum): / dang yul du mngon par skye// sgrub po rnams kyis rtag tu bstan// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// de bzhin zhing dang nye ba'i zhing // tshan do nye ba'i tshan do ha// 'dus pa nye ba'i 'dus pa dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur
180b4(rgyud 'bum): khrod de/ / 'dzam bu'i gling na yang dag gnas// gnas ni pul+li rar grags te// de bzhin dzA lan+d+ha ra'ang gnas// oMr+yan de bzhin gnas yin te// de bzhin ar pu da yang gnas// nye gnas go da bar+ya ste// de bzhin
180b5(rgyud 'bum): rA me shwa ra'i ming / / de bi ko Tir mngon brjod dang // mA la ba yang nye ba'i gnas// zhing ni kA ma ru'i ming can te// o trer mngon par brjod pa'ang zhing // nye zhing tri sha ku ni ste// ko sa la yang nye ba'i zhing // ka ling ka
180b6(rgyud 'bum): dang laM pa ka'ang / / de bzhin tshan do ha yin te// kany+tsi hi ma la ya ni// khyad par nye ba'i tshan do ha'o// 'dus pa pre ta ba si ni// gr-i ha de ba yang de bzhin// so rASh+Ta dang gser gling gang // nye ba'i 'dus pa gnyis yin no//
180b7(rgyud 'bum): pa til pu Ta dur khrod de// sin+d+hu'ang de bzhin dur khrod do// ma ru ku lu ta gnyis ni// nye ba'i dur khrod gnas su bshad// de ltar phyi rol gnas su grags// nang gi gnas nyid lung du brjod// rang lus rtsa yis gzugs
181a1(rgyud 'bum): la 'dir/ / gnas kyi ming du rab tu grags// de gzugs lha yi rnam pa ste// des na nang gi bdag tu gnas// de phyir de yi gong bu'i dngos// lus 'di sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o// gnas ni rab
181a2(rgyud 'bum): tu dga' ba'i sa/ / de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed sa yin te// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// mngon du gyur pa tshan dor shes// nye ba'i tshan do sbyang dka' ba'o// 'dus pa ring du song ba ste// mi g.yo bar

181b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam spel ba'o/ / dar ram ras ni gtsang ma 'am// yang na kham phor kha sbyar la// gsang ste las ni bris nas kyang // srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya// kha dog dkar pos shar bltas te// me tog dkar pos mchod par
181b2(rgyud 'bum): byamadun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya gnas par bltas la/ / bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi chus gang bas dbang bskur bar bya'o// the tshom med pas thun gsum du// yi ge bdun pa'i sngags bzlas

181b4(rgyud 'bum): shar du kha bstan te/ / mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bya ba// gtor ma chu dang de bzhin me// de yi dbus su dur ba 'am// rma bya'i sgro 'am ku sha'i chun// khyad par du ni de la bya ba// gsang sngags 'di ni gtso bo mchog/

181b6(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug/ byang du kha bltas thun gsum du// kha dog ser por bsgom byas la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la// bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam// bdud rtsi ser pos dbang bskur zhing //

182a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bkra shis mnyam par 'jug/ las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rgyas par 'gyur te gzhan du min// tsan dan dmar dang sen rtsi dang // ming med kyi ni khrag bsres te// ras sam gro ga'i/

182b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya skad cig tsam de nyid la dgug par bya ste/ rkang pas dgug pa bla na med pa'o// de nas gzhan yang mnan pa yi// cho ga bla med bshad par bya// ri mo brgyad brgyad mnyam sbyar bas// re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/

184a1(rgyud 'bum): srad bu nag pos dkris nas ni// he ru kar ni bsgoms nas su// ro bsregs sa brkos sba bar bya// mdun du laM las byung ba'i rlung // gzhu yi dbyibs can dbus gnas shing // kha dog sngon po rnga
184a2(rgyud 'bum): mo zhon/ / lho phyogs su ni bskyod pa dang // khro bo'i tshogs kyis khrid pas na// sa stengs smyon pa bzhin du byed// yi ge hUM phaT sbyar ba yi// sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas// gang gi cho ga ci byas pa// de yi mod la

184a4(rgyud 'bum): lo gnyis po nyid rim bzhin/ / cho ga rdzogs par bri bar bya// gsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas// dbye ba rta dang ma he la// bskrad pa rnga mo la gnas pa// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// mi mo rnams kyi snying kar dbang /

184a6(rgyud 'bum): ni mi 'grub ste/ / bla ma'i man ngag med pa'i las// stong pa bzhin du 'bras med 'gyur// 'di ni las rab 'byam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// // de nas sngags kyi bzlas
184a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi mtshan nyid gsang ba bshad par bya/ / ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// bzhi mdo dang ni 'dun khang gnas// dur khrod dam ni yid dga' ba// sngon du dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// phyi
184b1(rgyud 'bum): nas lha yi bdag nyid kyis/ / sngar bshad cho gas yang dag par// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// ri 'am ri bo'i gnas su ni// snying po'i sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM shrI badz+ra he ru ka huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'bum phrag gcig
184b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bzlas nas ni/ / bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos grub// myur du 'grub ste gzhan du min// tshang tshing ljon shing bshams par ni// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bris nas su// nye ba'i snying po'i
184b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rtag tu/ / rgyun mi 'chad par bzla zhing sgrub// oM hrI ha ha huM hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas ni// bzlas pa'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya// char dbab pa dang gter dang ni// ngag gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya//
184b4(rgyud 'bum): drisul dri med chur bcas par// dkyil 'khor dge ba'i bris nas ni// rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te// zhal bzhi pa yi gsang sngags bzlas// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya
184b5(rgyud 'bum): huM hUM phaT/ A na ya ho bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzhi 'bum bzlas// bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya// zhi dang rgyas dang bcud kyis len// de bzhin sems can don sgrub pa'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram song nas/
184b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas ni// lha mo'i sngags ni khyad par du// 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su// ji skad gsungs bzhin cho ga ni// rdzogs pas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/
184b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dngos grub thams cad dang // de bzhin mkha' spyod dngos grub bo// dur khrod du ni sngar bshad pa'i// cho ga'i rim pas dkyil 'khor bri// yi ge bdun pa'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas la sgrub/
185a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu cha'i sbyin sreg byas nas las// rnam par nges pas bsgrub par bya// dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa'i las// khyad par du ni gsad pa'i las// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs bzhin// bzlas pa
185a2(rgyud 'bum): / tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mnan pa'i cho ga bsgrub par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags ni// khri bzlas pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/
185a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bsgrubs na ni// 'byung po ro langs 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug lag khang ngam 'dun khang du// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// lA ma'i sngags ni nges par yang // 'bum phrag gcig
185a4(rgyud 'bum): / tu bzlas nas ni// lha mo bcu char sbyin sreg bya// oM lA me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ mig sman dang ni rkang mgyogs dang // de bzhin dbang du byed pa ni// 'grub par 'dir ni the tshom med// dben zhing nyams dga'i
185a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas su ni/ / rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri byas la// khaN+Da ro hi sogs sngags kyis// cho ga sngon bzhin bsgrub par bya// oM khaN+Da ro haM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas nas kyang // bcu cha yi ni sbyin
185a6(rgyud 'bum): / sreg bya// rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo rnams sgrubs// gzugs can ma yi gsang sngags ni// nges par 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas nas// lha mo bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/
185a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ me tog dang ni spos dang dri// lha bshos gtor ma de bzhin te// bza' dang btung bas khyad par du// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod bya zhing // glu
185b1(rgyud 'bum): dang gar gyi khyad par gyis/ / phyag rgya sngags ni bsgrag par bya// yid 'ong dam tshig rnyed nas ni// phyogs su bzhag nas bsgrub bya ste// las ni gang gi khyad par gyis// de yi rigs sogs brtag par bya// lha yi rnam
185b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la gnas te/ / cho ga ji bzhin bzlas shing mchod// dus gang tshe na mi smra zhing // der ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya// myos byed gtor mar mnyam ldan pas// sngags kyi nus pa bsgrub bya ste// brgya dang stong dang 'bum gyi
185b3(rgyud 'bum): bar der ni grangs nyid mtshon par bya/ / grangs med sngags ni bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i dge ba 'byung // de dag nges par sbyor ba yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i
185b4(rgyud 'bum): nges pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // yang dag cho ga gang gis 'dir// grub par the tsom med pa yi// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba'i mtshan nyid ni// gnod sbyin bdag po
185b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par nyon/ / gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // de bzhin shel dang dung la sogs// zhi dang rgyas pa dag la sbyar// zhi la ril bu brgya pa ste// ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni// rgyas pa'i las la rab bsngags
185b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ mkhas pas rgyal srid cheng ngam dpal// bde spro phun sum tshogs phyir bzlas// dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor la// gur kum la sogs dri'i ril bu// byu ru tsan dan dmar po'i 'bru// rtag tu ril bu lnga bcu
185b7(rgyud 'bum): 'olo/ ru rak+Sha dang lung tang 'bras// de bzhin mi rus rnga mo dang // bong bu ma he'i rus pa ni// drag spyod lkugs dang mnan pa dang // dbye bas dgra ni tshar gcad dang // gsang dang bskrang la sbyar bya ste// las kyi khyad
186a1(rgyud 'bum): par ji lta bar/ / bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba'ang bya ba yin// bong bu rnga mo'i spu dang ni// khwa yi sgro ni bsre byas la// mnan dang bskrad pa'i las la ni// de yi srad bus brgyu bar bya// rta dang ma he'i spu
186a2(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / rnam par sdang la srad bu bya// dur khrod sgra yi srad bu dang // khyi yi spu ni bsre bya ste// de yi srad bu drug po yi// las la bsngags phyir sbyar bar bya// dge ba'i las la gzhon nu mas// bkal ba'i srang bus
186a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyu bar bya/ / zhi ba la ni mdzub la gzhag/ rgyas pa rtag tu gung mo yis// ming med kyis ni dbang zhes gsungs// tha ma yis ni mngon spyod yin// mthe bong lha yi rang bzhin gyis// las kun las ni sbyar bar bya//
186a4(rgyud 'bum): ril bu dgra bcom mdo 'dzin ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba'i khyad par gyis// mnyam gzhag sgom zhing bzlas par bya// rdzogs ldan dus su gcig bzlas pa// gsum ldan dus
186a5(rgyud 'bum): su nyis 'gyur bzlas/ / gnyis ldan dus na sum 'gyur bshad// rtsod dus bzhi 'gyur du ni bzla// sngags kyi grangs ni bzhi po yis// rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags bzlas// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba sogs bsdus
186a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni ngag gi bzlas pa ste/ / lha yi gzugs su dmigs pa yis// spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can// sngags kyi de nyid brda yis ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba yang dag gsum// mtha' gsum las ni rnam grol
186a7(rgyud 'bum): ba don dam de bzhin nyid kyi don/ / 'di rnams sngags kyi bzlas pa yi// cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin// 'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i bgrang 'phreng nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis
186b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ngang nas gzhan yang bshang phyag lnga yi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa can// dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gnas// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun khyab pa'i//
186b2(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs mkhas pas yang dag brtag/ khrag 'thung phyag gnyis sbyor ldan pas// phung po lnga sogs nga rgyal bya// zhal bzhi pa yi sngags brjod pas// phyogs ni bcing zhing ra ba ste// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/
186b3(rgyud 'bum): shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ byang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ nub tu'o// oM A na ya he bi d+ha rA dzA huM hUM phaT/ lho ru'o// phyogs su se gol brdabs pa yis// gdug pa'i bdud ni bslang
186b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / snying ka'i chu skyes huM yig las// 'od zer 'phreng ba spro bar bya// de yi snang bas mdun du ni// bla ma sangs rgyas sogs bltas la// phyag btsal me tog bdug sogs pas// mchod de rjes la sdig pa
186b5(rgyud 'bum): bshags/ / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // byang chub sems ni rnam par skyed// gzhan la phan pa'i sems ni byams pa ste// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal 'joms byed snying rje yin// gzhan gyi bde
186b6(rgyud 'bum): bas tshim pa dga' ba ste/ / sems can kun snyoms btang snyoms rnam par bsam// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM zhes bya bas/ sems tsam nyid la rnams gnas shing // byang chub tshogs ni
186b7(rgyud 'bum): / bsgom par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ rten dang brten pa'i gzugs su ni// b+hai ra~M b+ha la sogs pa bsam// yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor// gzhu 'dra kha dog sngon po ste// de yi steng dur
187a1(rgyud 'bum): las ni/ / me yi dkyil 'khor gyi ni gzugs// kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa// rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'o// de yi steng du baM byung ba'i// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar// de yi sdeng
187a2(rgyud 'bum): du'ang laM byung ba'i/ / sa yi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa// kha dog ser po grwa bzhir ni// de bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan// de yi steng du sum byung ba'i// zur bzhi pa ni ri rab ste// rin chen bzhi yi bdag nyid mdzes// rtse
187a3(rgyud 'bum): mo brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ / de yi steng du hUM byung ba'i// sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsgom// de yi steng du pad+ma ni// lte ba ge sar ldan par bsgom// de dbus A li kA li yi// dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de yi dbus
187a4(rgyud 'bum): su yi ge hUM/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa'i// dpal he ru ka rnam par bsgom// dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas brkyang ba yis gdan la bzhugs//
187a5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste// g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa'o// ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ mnan cing bde ba chen por bzhugs//
187a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnam snang mdzad mas 'khyud// thugs rje'i chags pas shas cher dgyes// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu ni// mnyam par ldan pas yang dag 'khyud// gnyis pa'i phyag ni mchog gnyis kyi// glang chen pags pa
187a7(rgyud 'bum): gos su 'dzin/ / g.yas kyi gsum pas cang te'u ni// chos kun ngo bo nyid sgra sgrogs// g.yon gyi phyag ni gsum pa yis// kha T+wAM ga rten thod pa bsnams// thod pa'i 'phreng bas thod du mdzad// zla ba phyed pas rnam par
187b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ / rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzad// zhal ni rnam 'gyur cher 'jigs pa// sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can// mi mgo nyi shu'i
187b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed kyis brgyan/ / lha ni phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan// de la 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma// gcer bu ban du ka yi mdog/ dum bus brgyan
187b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku rags can/ / skra grol ba dang rnam par gtsigs// khrag la dgyes shing 'dzag pa'o// phyag g.yon 'khyud pas gdug pa yi// bdud sogs khrag can thod pa 'dzin// g.yas pa sdigs mdzub rdo rje can
187b4(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa'i me 'dra'i sku chen ma/ / byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing // rtag tu bde ba cher dgyes pa'o// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro haM gzugs can ma// dngos grub kun gyi bde 'byung ba// pad+ma'i
187b5(rgyud 'bum): / phyogs kyi gnas su dgod// gnag dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // ser skya'i mdog can spyan gsum ma// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste// kha T+wAM thod pa'i phyag ldan ma// g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug ste// gcer
187b6(rgyud 'bum): bu g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs/ / skra grol mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni// byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dang
187b7(rgyud 'bum): glu dang gar gyi dga' bdes mchod/ / sgo bzhir lha tshogs gnas pa ste// rtag tu lha rnams bsgom par bya// shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma// phyag gnyis sngon mor bsgom par bya// byang gi sgor ni 'ug gdong ma//
188a1(rgyud 'bum): ljang ku s+tha ni grol ba'o// de bzhin khyi gdong ma ni dmar// nub kyi sgor ni yang dag gnas// phag gdong ma ni ser mo ste// lho sgor yi dgas gdan la gnas// me dang de bzhin bden
188a2(rgyud 'bum): bral dang / / rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams su ni// gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo// gshin rje mche ba 'joms ma ste// de bzhin zur gnas lha mo ni// yid 'phrog gzugs ni gnyis ma ste// yi dgas la gnas drag
188a3(rgyud 'bum): mo che/ / phyag rgya lngas ni rnam brgyan pa'o// g.yon na thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje gri gug ste// rnal 'byor ma ni de rnams kun// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o// de nas go cha gnyis shes nas// ye shes
188a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rnam par sgom/ / sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam tshig 'khor lor mnyam par gzhug/ de nas cho ga gnyis bshad par bya ste// oM ha snying khar ro// na maHhi mgo bo la'o// swa ha hu spyi gtsug
188a5(rgyud 'bum): / tu'o/ bau ShaT he phrag pa gnyis la'o// hUM hUM ho mig gnyis la'o// phaT haM yan lag thams cad la ste/ mtshon cha'o// dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste// gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gsum pa pad+ma gar
188a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang ste/ / dpal he ru ka bzhi par grags// lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma yin// drug pa de bzhin rta mchog ste// go cha drug po rnams kyis bsrungs// oM baM ni rdo rje rnam snang mdzad ma'o// oM haM yoM ni gshin rje'o// oM hri moM ni rmongs
188a7(rgyud 'bum): byed ma'o/ / oM hreM hr-i ni skyong byed ma'o// oM hUM hUM ni skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT ni gtum mo lus thams cad la mtshon cha ste// lte ba dang / snying ka dang / de bzhin du kha dang / mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug la de bzhin du ni
188b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha yin no/ / oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+hohaM/ lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa snying kar bzhag ste/ pad+ma'i rgyas pa'i gar bya'o// snying po'i phyag rgya la sogs lha// bskor ba mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom/
188b2(rgyud 'bum): / rnal 'byor 'di ni gtso bo mchog/ lha yi rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// bde chen 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni// lus kun dag par byed pa ste// gnas
188b3(rgyud 'bum): ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ / lus ni sdud cing 'dzin pa yin// lus 'di dpa' bo'i rang bzhin te// 'di ste sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang
188b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / rjes mthun rnal 'byor sems kyis mi// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni dpal he ru ka'i bskyed pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor
188b5(rgyud 'bum): ma mchod pa yang dag rab bshad bya/ / gnas sogs bgrod par mi nus na// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// rang gi khyim du rnal 'byor ma// mchod de sngon du bsnyen sogs bya// sngon du bsnyen pa med pa las//
188b6(rgyud 'bum): de yi don med yongs su ngal// mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu 'am// yar ngo'i yang ni de bzhin te// khrus dang gtsang sbra sogs ldan pas// dad pa'i sems kyis spyan drangs te// rang gi khyim du shar bltas par// yang
188b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gnas pas lha mo mchod/ / gur kum mig sman de bzhin du// li khri yis ni mgo la byug/ lag pa rkang pa gdong de bzhin// byug pas byug cing mchod par bya// mgo la me tog 'phreng ba dpyangs// dri zhim pa yi//
189a1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pas bdug/ gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// khyad par du ni bdun dang dgu// ji srid nyi shu bzhi yi bar// yon bdag nges par dad pa yis// bza' dang myos byed btung ba dang //
189a2(rgyud 'bum): nyadang sha la sogs ldan pas// phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas mchod// dpa' bos brda yis bstan par bya// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa'i tshogs// lha yi bdag nyid rtag tu mchod// gtor ma'i bya ba sngon 'gro
189a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / mar me lha dang bza' ba dbul// glu dang bstod par rab ldan pas// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// 'dir ni brtson pas rdo rje lha mo rnams// myos byed sha yis rab tu mchod byas te// dpal ldan
189a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje theg par mos gyur de'i/ / dad pas ston mos de rnams mchod byas na// thugs ni mnyes pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur te// gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas// rnal 'byor ma ni mchod nas su// zhi rgyas
189a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma brtag bya ste/ / gzhon nu ma mchod skad cig la// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras brtag/ gang zhig lag gnyis nyed pa na// yid ni mnyes par ma gyur nas// des na nad rnams 'phel ba dang // sdug
189a6(rgyud 'bum): bsngal thob pa nyid du 'gyur/ / mchod byas de yi skad cig la// gad mo'i sgra ni phyung gyur na// nad med pa ni mi 'grub cing // 'chi ba nyid du the tshom med// mchod pa'i mod la 'du byed cing // mig gnyis nyed par
189a7(rgyud 'bum): phyed na ni/ / skad cig la ni 'chi zhes brjod// sgrub pos rtag tu mchod byas pas// so so so sor zung rer ni// phan tshun gdong ni phyogs gyur na// thams cad du ni rtsod 'gyur bar// gzhon nu mas ni rtag tu
189b1(rgyud 'bum): ston rnal 'byor ma ni rgyab phyogs blta/ / so yis sen mo 'cha' byed na// sha yi bza' bas mtshim ste// slar yang las ni dgos par 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba thams cad kyi// ston mos mnyes par
189b2(rgyud 'bum): ma gyur na/ / mchod la sogs pa glo bur ba'i// nad ni 'phral du skye bar 'gyur// 'di ltar glu dang rol mo byed// yang dang yang du rgod pa na// rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa dag/ gzhon nu de ston mkhas pas
189b3(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ myos byed 'thungs nas yang dang yang // rnam pa du ma sa gar byed na// de rnams la ni nad chen 'byung // mchod pa'i dus su brtag par bya// ston mo'i bza' ba thams cad ni// dor nas phyogs su lta
189b4(rgyud 'bum): byed na/ / spyod pa nyams par byas pa'i skyon// lha rnams bdag la 'khrugs pa'o// phan tshun gtam la 'jug pa dang // gal te phan tshun rgod byed na// gtso bo'i cho ga nyams par ni// gzhon nu de bstan
189b5(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / zos ma thag tu skyugs byed na// smyo ba'i nad ni 'byung bar ston// mdzes ma gal te 'gro ba'i tshe// rgyab kyi phyogs su lta byed na// slar yang las ni dgos pa dang // yun ring zhig nas nad 'byung
189b6(rgyud 'bum): ston/ sa la rkang pas nyed pa na// gnas ni 'pho ba'i don du 'gyur// mchod dus babs par gyur na ni// phan tshun g.yul ni 'gyed par ston// rnam 'gyur 'di dag phral bas ni// mched pa 'grub par mtshon par
189b7(rgyud 'bum): bya de bas brtson pas mchod nas ni/ sgrub pos rtag tu brtag par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster// 'di ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga nges par bstan pa'i
190a1(rgyud 'bum): rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas de phyir snod kyi ni// mtshan nyid mchog ni yang dag bshad// 'jim pa'am de bzhin rus sbal snod// 'khar ba'am
190a2(rgyud 'bum): zangs sam lcags las byas/ / gser ram dngul las byas pa'am// dung ngam de bzhin nya phyis te// bal po se 'u'i 'bras bu mchog/ de bzhin gzhan yang gsar byung ba// rA las byung dang shing snod sogs//
190a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rdo snod khyad par ro// dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis// de bzhin gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dum bu drug dang dum bu bdun// dum bu brgyad par rab tu grags// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs
190a4(rgyud 'bum): sam/ dmangs rigs bud med rigs mthar skyes// dkar dang dmar dang ldang skya dang // ser dang de bzhin ser skya ste// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog ngan dang // sna tshogs mdog tu rab tu grags// lhag pa
190a5(rgyud 'bum): dman dang tha ma ste/ / de bzhin dbyibs ni sna tshogs dbye// gshong gnyis glang po'i rgyab lta bu// de bzhin rdo rje'am khwa yi rkang // so ni ljang dang ser ba 'am// lto ba'am srin bus zos de bzhin// 'di kun
190a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bltas nas ni/ / de la yongs su brtag par bya// sa gzhi mnyam pa'i yul rnams sam// thang ngam bye ma'i gshongs dag tu// sngags pas der ni bsgrubs byas la// de yi ltung ba brtag par bya//
190a7(rgyud 'bum): lhor balngas bram ze 'jigs par 'gyur// bden bral lhung bas pa lang dang // rigs med pa dang rigs ngan 'jig/ rlung bltas sngags ni 'jigs pa ste// byang du bltas na phyug por 'gyur// dbang ldan sngas
190b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub ste/ / brtul zhugs rgyun ni nyams pa med// mer bltas nye bar 'phrog pa ste// de bzhin 'og bltas chom rkun ma'o// steng gnas gnas pas bud med 'joms// logs su lhung bas gtum mo
190b2(rgyud 'bum): stesnod kyi mtshan nyid rnam shes bya/ / dum bu gcig pa gnas la dbang // dum bu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dbang // dum gsum sgrub po'i dngos grub 'gyur// dum bu bzhi pas sngags dngos grub// lnga pa
190b3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni zhi dang rgyas/ / dum drug slong mo rnyed par shes// dum bu bdun pas dbang du byed// dngos grub sgrub pa 'bras med phyir// de bzhin dum bu brgyad pa spang // bu ga gcig pa bram zer 'gyur// bu ga
190b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa rgyal rigs 'gyur/ / bu ga gsum pa rje'u rigs shes// bu ga bzhi pa dmangs rigs rnams// bu ga mang po'am bu ga med// mkhas pa yis ni spang bar bya// bud med thod pa'ang mi gzung ste// khyad
190b5(rgyud 'bum): par du ni mdog nyams dang / / so med pa'am so nyams pa// dge ba 'dod pas bcang mi bya// so ldang bas ni sdug bsngal mang // khwa yi rkang 'dras rtsod par 'gyur// gshong bu gnyis pas rgud par 'gyur//
190b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin glang po'i rgyab kyi nang // dbus kyi gnas su gshong bu bzhi// 'dod 'jo'i bar ni blta bar bya// mdun phyogs su ni gshong bu gnyis// yid bzhin nor bu zhes byar bshad// dung dang kun da
190b7(rgyud 'bum): zlabla ba yi/ / mdog mtshungs snum pa shes par blta// sngags rnams kun gyi dngos grub ster// sgrub pos dngos grub thob par byed// che zhing mdog ni ser po 'am// pad+ma lta bu pad+mas mtshan// rgyas la
191a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags par gsungs pa ste/ / nor ni phun sum tshogs pa 'grub// snod ni gang zhig kha dog dmar// gzhan yang thig le dmar por mtshan// rtag tu dbang dang dgug pa yi// dngos
191a2(rgyud 'bum): grub ster snong mtshan nyid do/ / ba lang kha lta bu yi dbyibs// shin tu sra zhing mu tig bcas// gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la// khyad par du ni rab tu bsngags// snod ni rab bsngags yang dag thob//
191a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster// gnas dang zhing du bgrod nas ni// sgrub pos lha mo bsgrub par bya// mtshan nyid 'di dag yongs rdzogs pa// bcangs nas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni snod
191a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o/ / // de nas de phyir bdud rtsi lnga'i// sgrub po yang dag rab tu bshad// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// dngos grub kun gyi
191a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras 'byung ba'o/ / cho ga spangs pas bram ze yi// mngal nas skyes las yang dag blang // des na rnam snang mdzad pa'i ming // grags te dngos grub yang dag bzhed// kha dog ldang zhing rab bzang lus// mig
191a6(rgyud 'bum): gi 'bras bu gnag pa yi/ / rin chen rigs ma rnyed nas de'i// dri chus bsangs te bsgrub par bya// yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus ldan zhing // yan lag mdzes gzhon pad+ma'i rigs// bza' dang btung bas yang dag
191a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod mkhas pas mchod yon phul nas ni/ / de yi mod la snyoms 'jug bya// phan tshun gyi ni shu kra blang // des na gar mkhan rigs ming can// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin grags// sngar bshad pa yi tshe
191b1(rgyud 'bum): ga yis/ / dngos grub yongs su rdzogs bgrod pa// tshes mkhan zhes ni rab grags pa'i// dang po'i me tog rab tu bsngags// dam tshig can ma'i gdol pa mo// gal te rnyed na rtag bsten bya// sha dang tshil dang de
191b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin khrag/ mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis// lcags kyu lnga ni ji snyed pa 'am// 'dir ni gsad pa gtsor bshad pas// ci ste yang dag rnyed ra gzung // ba lang sha dang rta sha
191b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / glang po'i sha yang de bzhin te// mi yi sha dang khyi yi sha/ mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'i// sgron ma lnga zhes grags pa'o// rnyed nas tshes bcu'i dus su ni// dngos po
191b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag yang dag bsdu/ / dri zhim pa dang bsres nas ni// rab tu gsang ste sbyar bar bya// sgrub pa po yis gsang ba yis// ril bu'i rnam pa yang dag bya// de yi mod la yongs rdzogs pa'i// bza' dang btung
191b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i khyad par gyis/ / tshogs kyi dbus su byin brlabs nas// phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam// sngags bzlas de bzhin bsam gtan dang // 'dod pa kun gyis 'bras 'byung zhing // lus kyi bcud kyis
191b6(rgyud 'bum): len dang ni/ / mchog tu grol ba'i dngos grub ster// rtag tu ril bu stan byed pa'i// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras rab sder// las rnams kun la rab sbyar na// mkha' spyod go 'phang thob par 'gyur// 'di ni bdud rtsi
191b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga sgrub pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba yi// cho ga mchog ni yang dag bshad// 'di ltar 'ga' zhig gsol 'debs pa'am// rang
192a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid bsod nams 'dod pa yis/ / dang por rang lha'i bdag nyid kyi// 'khor lo la gnas sngon bsnyen bya// sngan du bsnyen pa'i dbang byas nas// der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya// brtan zhing zab/
192a2(rgyud 'bum): mo'i chos shes pa// rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid shes// rig pa'i gnas ni thams cad rig/ gsang sngags tshul la dad cing mos// gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang /
192a3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma la gus brtser ldan na// sdom pa 'byung bar rab bshad bya// gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas// gnas khang 'dun khang sa phyogs gtsang // gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du// der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam
192a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sngon gyi las ni byas pa'i sar// brko ba la sogs mi bya ste// lag pas reg nas hUM yig gi/ sngags bzlas pas ni sa sbyang bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi chu// nyis 'gyur sa ni sbyang bar bya// rang gi sems
192a5(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs dag pa/ / de nyid kyis ni sa dag 'gyur// slob dpon sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// lha yi sku yi bdag nyid can// dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'chang ba// mkha' 'gror bcas la gsol ba gdab// blo ldan rdo/
192a6(rgyud 'bum): rje gsor byed cing // dril bu 'khrol bar brtson pa yis// lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // rab tu gdug pa'i bgegs tshogs bskrang // nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/
192a7(rgyud 'bum): lus srul la sogs gang ci'ang rung // bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhan du dengs// ci stengs bsgo su zhig 'da'// rdo rje'i bdag po'i sku yis ni// lus gsum las 'byung dgas bya ste// 'dir ni brlas
192b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur gzhan du min/ / sa ni yongs su bzung byas nas// ra bas mtshams ni bcing bar byas// lag g.yas dam bcas phyag rgya yis// yi ge baM byung sa'i lha mo// mdog ser gser gyi bum 'dzin la//
192b2(rgyud 'bum): bstod nas rab tu bskul bar bya// che ge zhes bya bdag dkyil 'khor// 'dri la lha mo khyod dbang gyur// me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod// mkhas pas mchod yon 'bul byas la// bcom ldan khro
192b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog rdo rje can/ / de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba gdab// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dgongs su gsol// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// mgon po ldan
192b4(rgyud 'bum): cig skyes 'byung ba'i/ / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba 'tshal lags la// de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la// bka' drin gnang bar mdzad du gsol// gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig
192b5(rgyud 'bum): rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / / rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten pa'i// 'byung po bstan la mngon dga' ba// gang su rdo rje'i spyan ldan kun// dkyil 'khor bde mchog 'byung ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'dri
192b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid lags pas/ / bdag dang de bzhin slob ma la// rjes su brtse ba bskyed du gsol// srang bu ye shes lnga ldan zhing // nyi shu rtsa lngar rnam dbye bas// chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni// srad bu phan
192b7(rgyud 'bum): tshun bsgril bar bya/ / sgrub pos yi ge hUM brjod de// bdud rtsi lngas ni byug par bya// dkyus su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la// sboms su sgo yi nyi shu cha// dzaHgsum brjod nas lte bar ni// g.yon pa'i
193a1(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ / tho ldan nam mkhar thig gdab ste// de bzhin sa la'ang gdab par bya// gsar zhing mdzes par ldan pa dang // tshang ldan gtsang ma'i srang bu yis
193a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan lhan skyes 'byung dkyil 'khor/ / shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// khru phyed la sogs nas brtsams nas// ji srid khru ni brgya yi bar// dang por tshangs pa'i thig yin te// gnyis pa
193a3(rgyud 'bum): la ni zur thig gdab/ / nub dang lho yi gnas su ni// slob dpon nges par yang dag gnas// shar dang byang gi phyogs gnas su// slob ma gnas te mnyam bzhag pas// dang por bzhi 'gyur
193a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid du/ / re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya// de nas brgyad 'gyur bdag nyid du// re'u mig gcig gi thig rab gdab// gzhan yang brgyad 'gyur nyid du ni// re'u mig gcig ni thig
193a5(rgyud 'bum): gdab bya/ / de nas gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid// re'u mig gcig ni thig rab gdab// de nas bzhi 'gyur nyid du ni// re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya// gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid du mi
193a6(rgyud 'bum): re'u mig gcig ni thig rab gdab/ / de nas mkhas pas bzhi 'gyur nyid// re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya// de nas gnyis 'gyur bdag nyid de// re'u mig gnyis ni thig gdab bya//

193b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin thig gdab bya/ / rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pa ste// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku nag po'ang de bzhin te// slob dpon dbang ldan phyogs su ni//
193b2(rgyud 'bum): song ste mnyam par bzhag nas su// legs sgras g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// ri mo lnga ni dgye bar bya// phan tshun bar du nas re tsam// shong ba'i tshad du bri ba ste// ri mo sboms na nang du 'gyur/
193b3(rgyud 'bum): phra bas nor ni nyams par 'gyur// yon pos 'di ni rtsod par 'gyur// chang pas 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur// shar phyogs su ni dkar po che// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan//
193b4(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ byang du mar gang yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni// in+da nI la 'od 'bar ba'o// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams
193b5(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par/ / mnyam par bzhag ste yang dag bri// rdo rje ra ba'i nang du ni// dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste// gtum drug de bzhin tshang tshing dang /
193b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'bar ba keng rus can// dbang ldan du ni mi bzang bzhad // byin tha ru ni bkra shis mchog/ mun pa drag po bden bral du// rlung phyogs ki li ki li'i sgra// shar gyi
193b7(rgyud 'bum): shir sha a shwad shing / / kang ke la khyad par tsU ta'i shing // ba Ta de bzhin ka rany+dza// la tA bta badz+ri ga/ dbang po de bzhin sbyin byed dang // klu yi dbang dang gshin rje'i bdag
194a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan de nas byin za dang / / srin po'i dbang ldan rlung gi bdag/ bA su ki dang 'jog po nyid// karko Ta dang pad+ma nyid// pad chen hu lu hu lu dang //
194a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo // sgrogs pa dang ni cher sgrogs dang // drag dang g.yo dang brtan de bzhin// gang ba dang ni de bzhin 'bebs// gtum pa 'di dag sprin dbang phyug
194a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang sna tshogs du ma yi/ / khra dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // ce spyang ce spyang mo dang ni// 'ol ba dang ni 'ol ba mo// seng ge'i gdong dang sngag gi gdong // drag cing 'jigs
194a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdong can ma/ / sbrul ni ba lang mgo can dang // gdong gnyis la sogs phyogs su rgyu// keng rus dang ni mdung gis phug/ 'phyang dang byed tshig pa dang mgo/ thod ba byin
194a5(rgyud 'bum): pa mgo rdum dang / / gtsigs pa'i mgo dang rus pa dang // rig 'dzin grub pa sna tshogs dang // dam tshig spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams dang // gnod sbyin ro/
194a6(rgyud 'bum): langs srin po sogs// ki li ki la'i sgra chen bdag/ dngos grub rdzu 'phrul yang dag par// thob pa'i slob dpon gyi ni tshogs// dur khrod dbus su blta bar bya// 'di ni dkyil 'khor

194b1(rgyud 'bum): can sems can kun rab mi 'jigs ster/ / sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor shes// bstan bcos rig cing snying rjer ldan// sems can kun la bu bzhin blta// thams cad du ni

194b3(rgyud 'bum): ni phyag rgyar ldan/ / sems can rnams kyi mgon 'gyur zhing // sems can bsam pa'i khyad par shes// mgon med pa ni rnams kyi gnyen// dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus//

194b5(rgyud 'bum): ma rigs bzang chos la spro/ / slob dpon gyis ni yang dag bsdu// snying rje med cing khro dang gdug/ khengs dang brkam chags rnams g.yeng can// drag dang rmongs dang snyoms las can/

194b7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spangs/ / sems can rnams la byams par blta// 'bar ba'i me dang dug bzhin du// gzhan gyi nor la mi reg cing // rtag par rgyun du bla ma mchod// dam chos balnga
195a1(rgyud 'bum): bar spro ba dang / / rtag tu sbyin pa la sogs dga'// 'jig rten pha rol mngon pa 'dod// de dag slob mar rab bsngags te// dkyil 'khor dge ba bstan par bya/

195a3(rgyud 'bum): po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ / dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang mo dang // de bzhin phag mo he ru ka/ gsang ba'i

195a5(rgyud 'bum): mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod// bu tshur shog theg chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje
195a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags mthu yis ni/ / mnyam med ye shes yang dag 'thob// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ bla ma mchod dang de bzhin byams// sangs

195b1(rgyud 'bum): brgal ba rnams rgal bar gyis/ / ma grol ba rnams grol bar gyis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dkrugs pa'i// sems can dbugs ni dbyung bar gyis// bslab pa de dag yang
195b2(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / slob ma rnams ni lhag gnas bya// cho ga ji bzhin khrus dang ni// bsang byas so shing sbyin par bya// srad bu dmar pos khyad par du// dpung pa bcings te rtag tu srung //

195b4(rgyud 'bum): sil ma rab bzung nas/ / der ni gdong g.yogs bcings nas su// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ skye ba sngon bsags sdig pa rnams// dkyil 'khor mthong bas byang bar 'gyur//

195b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs su 'gyur/ / chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni ming dbang bskur// de bzhin gshegs lnga'i bdag nyid dbang // brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan nyid// rjes gnang dang ni dbug

196a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / gnyis pa gsang ba mchog yin te// gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin// bani pa de ltar yang de bzhin// dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan// de ni dam
196a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig can zhes bya/ / gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas na// deng khyod sdig pa thams cad las// rnam grol bzang por gyur pas gnas// sangs rgyas kun
196a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi mnyam gsungs pa'i/ / rjes gnang mchog tu dbugs dbyung ba// dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa ni// 'di dag rtag tu bsrung bar bgyis// slob ma dang ba'i stobs kyis ni// bla ma'i zhabs
