196a5(rgyud 'bum): gi lus/ / bla ma la ni yon du dbul// dbang bskur gtso bo thob pas na// bya ba byas pa'i blo chen gyis// gzhan yang rab dgas 'di skad du// smra zhing mjug ni rdzogs par bya// deng du
196a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ / bdag gi gson par 'bras bur bcas// de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// sangs rgyas sras bor bdag gyur to// sbyin sreg gis ni rdzogs byas shing //
196a7(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun la ni ston mo drang // de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya// nad pa'am mgon med rnams la'ang sbyin// phyi nas man ngag ji bzhin du// dam tshig spyod pa la brtson pas// snod du
196b1(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i rgyun gyis ni/ / 'khor lo la sogs sgom pa'i rim// yang dag man ngag phun tshogs pas// dngos grub 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad
196b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de nas 'chi bar nges pa yi// mtshan nyid mchog tu bshang bar bya// rang gi lus sam phyi rol gyi// ltas ni mkhas pas brtag par bya// rkang mthil
196b3(rgyud 'bum): dag tu phug snyam dang / / gang tshe lte bar phug snyam 'gyur// de tshe nyin zhag gsum pha rol// lnga yi gong du 'gro bar 'gyur// bshang dang gci ba'i dus dag tu// dus mtshungs
196b4(rgyud 'bum): spring ba byung gyur na/ / lo gcig na dus de nyid kyi// dus tshod la ni 'chi zhing brlag/ mtshan gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yi// bar dang tha mar sbrid pa ni// dus mtshungs byung na de
196b5(rgyud 'bum): yi tshe/ / zla ba na ni nges par 'chi// snying ka lkog ma'i dbus dag tu// dus mtshungs gal te zug gzer gyur// ci ste chos la mi brten na// zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi// gal
196b6(rgyud 'bum): te mig g.yon 'bras bu yi/ / gzugs brnyan me long la ma mthong // ci ste zlog par mi byed na// zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi// rna rtsa dang ni smin ma'i dbus// spyi bo'i rtse mor zug
196b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ bzhi po mtshungs par zung gyur na// de tshe 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur// glo bur du ni 'tsho gyur cing // ring dang khro dang 'jigs pas 'khrugs// gal te chos ni ma bsten
197a1(rgyud 'bum): gang / de ni lo gcig dag na 'chi// yar ngo yi ni tshes gcig la// gal te khu ba nag por mthong // de tshe zla ba drug na 'chi// dmar pos nad kyis 'debs par ston//
197a2(rgyud 'bum): mig las rtag tu 'dzag pa dang // gzugs mthong ba yang rnam 'khrul dang // me long ngam ni chur gang zhig/ rang gi grib ma ma mthong dang // mtshan mo'i tshe na dbang po'i gzhu// nyin par skar
197a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong / / sprin med par ni lho phyogs su// brten pa'i glog 'gyur mthong ba dang // nyin par grib ma'i lam dang ni// de bzhin skar mda' lhung ba mthong // ngang pa bya rog
197a4(rgyud 'bum): rma bya ni/ / gcig tu 'dres pa mthong ba dang // zla ba gnyis dang nyi ma gnyis// de bzhin rang gi mgo bo 'bar// shing rtse ri yi rtse la ni// dri za'i grong khyer mthong ba dang // yi dgas
197a5(rgyud 'bum): sha za 'jigs rung ba/ / gzhan dag kyang ni mthong ba dang // glo bur du ni rab 'dar dang // yang dang yang du rgyal ba dag/ de yi gcig cig mthong 'gyur na'ang / zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur//
197a6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba ra ri med pa dang // nyi ma 'od dang bral ba dang // mtshan mo nyi ma nyin par ni// zla ba de bzhin rang mig 'bar// skar ma ri rab dag gi tshad// rgya mtsho chu bo lta bu dang // khu ba dang ni bshang
197a7(rgyud 'bum): gci rnams/ / dus mtshungs par ni 'bab 'gyur na// gal te chos la ma brten na// zla ba gcig la 'chi bar 'gyur// der yang nyin mo grib ma ni// skya bo'i gzugs can blta bya ste/
197b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi mgo bo ma mthong na// lo gcig gi ni nang du 'chi// lag pa g.yon pa ma mthong na// bu dang chung ma nges rlag 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pa ma mthong na'ang // pha dang bu sogs tshegs chen 'chi//
197b2(rgyud 'bum): gcin ni rgyun lngar 'gyur ba dang // g.yon nas 'khor zhing dri nga dang // skyur ba la sogs gcin byung na// zla drug nang du 'chi bar 'gyur// gang zhig gi ni rmi lam mthar// bye ma'am thal ba'i phung po
197b3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ lha khang ngam ni mchod sdong 'dzag/ de ni sngon bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te bong bu'am spre'u zhon nas// grog mkhar phyag dar phung po la// mngon 'dzeg lho phyogs 'gro bar ni// gang gis
197b4(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam mthar mthong na/ / bud med gang zhig gos gnag cing // mdog gnag mi ni 'dod spyod pa// de ni dus mtshan yin zhes bya// gshin rje'i lto bar 'gro bar 'gyur// bya rgod ce spyang khyi dang khwa/
197b5(rgyud 'bum): dreng dang yi dgas sha za yis// za bar rmi lam mthong na ni// lo gcig na ni nges par 'chi// gos ni dmar pos g.yogs pa dang // 'phreng ba dmar pos brgyan pa dang // til mar gyis bskus rmi lam
197b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / zla ba drug na gson mi 'gyur// man ngag ji bzhin ldan pa yis// 'chi ba bslu bar 'gyur ba ste// de nyid kyis ni 'chi las rgyal// chos kyis 'chi las rgyal ba ste// rdzogs pa'i byang chub
197b7(rgyud 'bum): rim sgrub pas/ / de bas chos ni mchog tu bsam// gzhan yang sgom pa'i khyad par ni// mdzes pas yang dag bshad par bya// dbugs ni skad cig 'chad pa dang // sna tshogs ltas ni yang dag
198a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / 'thor dang dgang ba'i sbyor ba yis// lus kyi dkyil 'khor sbyang bar bya// 'chi ba'i dus la yang dag ba ba// 'pho ba'i rnal 'byor mchog bya ste/ bu ga dgur ni son
198a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa/ / pU ri ka sa ni dgang bar bya// ri tsa kas ni dbugs mnan bya// kum b+ha kas ni bsdam byas te// bu ga'i sgo ni sbyang bar bya// rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur// rnam shes dbrog pa'i sbyor
198a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / gzhan yang pha rol bgrod pa la// A li kA li mnyam ldan par// mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// snying khar yi ge hUM sbyar te// yi ge phyed dang gnyis po ni// 'og dang steng du
198a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / de yi 'og gi char rlung gi/ sa bon 'og tu bltas pa'o// rlung gi sa bon gnyis byas te// rnal 'byor ldan pas kha sbyar bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig rim pa yis// yi ge byed dang
198a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sngags brjod/ / rnam shes bzhon pa rlung yin te// gang dang gang du bgrod pa yis// rlung gi sgor ni bsam byas na// grol ba'i dngos grub ster byed pa'o// mchog dang tha ma'i dbye
198a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / bshad kyis gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// lte bas 'dod khams bde 'gro ste// thig le las ni gzugs can lus// steng nas gzugs med khams su ste// der ni bde
198a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gro byed pa'o/ / sna las gnod sbyin rnams su 'gyur// rna ba la ni mi 'am ci// lha mo gal te mig las ni// mi yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin// kha yi sgo las yi dgas rnams/
198b1(rgyud 'bum): gcin las de bzhin dud 'gro'o// bshang lam nas ni dmyal bar 'gro// grol ba las ni gzhan du 'gro// dus la bab na 'pho bya yis// dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur// lha
198b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ / mi ni dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur// des na mkhas pas 'chi ba yi// mtshan ma yang dag shes par bya// 'di ni 'chi ba'i ltas blta ba dang // 'pho
198b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rnal 'byor rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / // de nas de phyir dus bzhi yi// tshad ni yang dag rab bshad bya// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyi// bskal pa
198b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du shes 'gyur ba'o/ / nye khri dang ni brgyad stong dang // sa ya phrag gcig bdun 'bum ste// de dag la ni rdzogs ldan gyi// bskul pa zhes ni grags par bshad// rdzogs
198b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan gsum ldan gnyis mtshams su/ / de bzhi stong phrag brgyad yin no// sa ya phrag gcig phrag gnyis dang // dgu khri dang ni drug stong ste// gsum ldan bskal pa zhes grags pa//
198b6(rgyud 'bum): der ni mkhas pas shes par bya// gsum ldan gnyis ldan par mtshams su// stong phrag drug ni shes par bya// drug khri dang ni bzhi stong dang // 'bum phrag brgyad ni gnyis ldan te//
198b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcos kun las bsdus nas ni// gnyis ldan bskal par yang dag grags// gnyis ldan rtsod pa'i bar mtshams su// de bzhin stong phrag bzhi yin te// sum khri dang ni nyid
199a1(rgyud 'bum): stong dang / / bzhi 'bum rtsod dus shes par bya// rtsod dus rdzogs ldan gnyis mtshams su// stong phrag dag ni bzhi dang ldan// de rnams dus shes grags pa ste/
199a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'dir ni the tsom med// gling bzhi pa yi dngos po ni// mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol// shar gyi lus 'phags sgra mi snyan// de bzhin nub kyi ba lang spyod// gling ni gsum po de dag
199a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / 'bras bu'i sa par yang dag gnas// 'dzam bu'i gling du legs skyes pa// dngos grubs par shes par bya// gling gsum por ni skye ba yi// 'bras bu 'byung ba'i bsod
199a4(rgyud 'bum): nams gnas/ / 'dzam bu'i gling bas grol ba dang // dngos grub nyid ni sgrub pa ster// de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis// gsungs pa'i gling du shes par bya// 'di ni dus bzhi po
199a5(rgyud 'bum): nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o/ / / de nas spyod pa pha rol son// mchog ni yang dag rab bshad bya// sgrub bo dngos grub rgyu nyid kyis// gang gis
199a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub mthar bgrod pa'o/ / thun mong rnal 'byor rgyud rnams su// gsang ba rnam par ma bshad pa// dngos grub rnams las mchog dngos grub// brtul zhugs rnams las
199a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog brtul zhugs/ / bla ma dam pa bsnyen bkur nas// bla med rgyud ni mang thos te// de nyid ji bzhin bla ma yis// zhal las thos nas rtag tu bsgom// nor dang chung ma de bzhin
199b1(rgyud 'bum): srog/ sbyin pa nyid du gtang bar bya// mdud pa 'di gsum las grol na// rtag tu spyod pa spyad par 'gyur// spro ba chen pos rig pa bzlas// de bzhin bden par smra la dga'//
199b2(rgyud 'bum): dam bcas pa la rab gnas te// ji ltar dad pas sngon du brtsam// 'dod dang khro ba 'jigs pa dang // sred dang gti mug nga rgyal spang // slob ma brtag dang bshad de bzhin// gzhung rnams
199b3(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba rtag tu spang / / gtsang dang mi gtsang dag phye dang // btung dang btung min brtag mi bya// smad dang bstod la khro ba dang // mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par spang // rtag tu mi chags dga'
199b4(rgyud 'bum): med par/ / thams cad las ni mnyam par gnas// sbyin sreg med cing mchod pa med// 'phreng ba med cing bzlas pa med// nyi ma gza' dang skar ma dang // tshes grangs kyang ni brtag mi
199b5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ bdag gzhan bdag nyid gzugs kyi ni// the tshom med par gnas par bya// 'dod pa med par mi spyad de// kun la 'dod pa cung zad spyad// stag gi pags pa gos su byas// phyag
199b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ / shes rab thabs bdag rnal 'byor pas// he ru ka dpal rnam par bsgom// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yis// yid ni bde bar gnas par bya// grong du mtshan
199b7(rgyud 'bum): mo gcig gnas shing / / grong khyer du ni lngar gnas bya// yid dang rjes mthun sbyor ba yis// sa yi steng du gnas par bya// yang na rlung zhes bya ba yis// spyod pa bde zhing dga' bar
200a1(rgyud 'bum): spyad/ / rtag tu grogs po med par rgyu// gcig pu yid ni rtse gcig pas// smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la brten nas// lo ma rlung gis bskyod bzhin 'khyam// dur khrod/
200a2(rgyud 'bum): dam ni mtshan gcig gam// shing gcig gam ni nags tshal lam// ri yi rtse 'am chu bo'i 'gram// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram yang rung // skyed mos tshal lam ri phug gam// khang bzangs
200a3(rgyud 'bum): sam ni khang stong ngam/ / bzhi mdo dang ni sgo mdun nam// de bzhin rgyal po'i pho brang sgor// gdol pa'i gnas sam phyugs lhas sam// bzo yi khang par sbas pas gnas// tshong srang
200a4(rgyud 'bum): dor ba'i me tog 'phreng / / me tog rnyed pa gang ci'ang rung // dur khrod mtshan gcig me tog 'phreng // de dag gis ni lus rab mchod// rang gi mgrin par me tog 'phreng // khyad par du ni tshangs
200a5(rgyud 'bum): skud dang / / ska rags dag kyang bcing bar bya// rkang pa gnyis la rkang gdub bya// smra ba bzlas pa'i bdag nyid grags// lag pa bskyod pa phyag rgya ste// rnam par mi rtog rab sbyor bas//
200a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa ni ci bder gnas// dogs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// sgrub bos seng ge bzhin du spyad// yang na g.yo med brtul zhugs la// brten nas rnal 'byor spyod pa spyad// skyed
200a7(rgyud 'bum): mos tshal lam khyim stong gnas/ / grong dman ngan pa'i khyim du ni// ji srid nus pa thob de srid// mi smra'i sbyor bas gnas par bya// ji ltar gnyid log 'gro dang 'dug/ sad dom yang na ma
200b1(rgyud 'bum): sad pa 'am/ / ci rnyed pa tsam za ba dang // mi bkres pa ni bzang por gnas// gal te slong mos gnas pas na// lag pa'i snod du ba zhing gnas// rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin gyis// 'dir ni 'grub
200b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur the tsom med/ / gsum po de dag nang nas ni// gang 'dod brtul zhugs la brten nas// cung zad nus pa rab thob pas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa spyang // lus ni sbyin par byin nas
200b3(rgyud 'bum): su/ phyi nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam// spyod pas rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa// nges par dri ma med 'gyur ba// 'di la 'khrul par mi bya ste// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'di ni spyod pa nges
200b4(rgyud 'bum): par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi nges pa dang // rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi tshad// bshad kyis
200b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i bdag po nyon/ / rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi ni tshad// bye ba phrag ni drug nges te// de bzhin rnal 'byor ma rgyud grangs// bye ba phrag ni bcu drug grags// theg chen las gzhan mdo sde rnams//
200b6(rgyud 'bum): dung phyur phrag brgyad gsungs pa yin// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// sa ya dang ni dung phyur lnga// 'di dag thams cad thub dbang po// sku gsum bdag nyid can gyis gsungs// bde bar gshegs
200b7(rgyud 'bum): pas bstan pa'o/ / 'dul ba'i gnas la sogs pa kun// nyan thos bdag nyid la bstan pa'o// sna tshogs mdo sde'i rnam bshad che// byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa'o// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma
201a1(rgyud 'bum): yi rgyud/ / gsang ba sangs rgyas spyod yul te// shes rab thabs bdag rnal 'byor gyis// bde ba chen po bsgoms pa yis// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa'i// sangs rgyas
201a2(rgyud 'bum): myur du thob pa'i phyir/ / sems can bsod nams dman rnams la// lha yi bdag nyid can gyis gsungs// de nas gzhan yang rab gnas kyi// cho ga pha rol son bshad bya// sngar bshad mtshan nyid dang ldan pa//
201a3(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon du ni yongs su brtag/ lugs ma'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'i// sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni// rab gnas don du sa sbyang zhing // bla re rgyal mtshan pa dan rnams// brgyan cing sa ni yongs
201a4(rgyud 'bum): su bzung / / sku gzugs sam ni gleg bam mam// bris sku yongs su rdzogs pa rnams// mdun rol tu ni gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo nam mkhar gnas// nyer spyod lnga yis yang dag mchod//
201a5(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma go// lan gsum du ni brjod par bya// ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// dga' ldan yang dag bzhugs nas ni// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums 'jug ltar// de bzhin 'dir ni bzhugs su
201a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / che ge zhes bya'i don du ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'phel phyir// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes te// mgon po 'dir ni rtag bzhugs mdzod// tshig 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// lhag par
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas par byas nas mi/ / mkhas pa yis ni bstod byas nas// yungs kar gyis ni bskor nas su// lan gsum du ni sbyang bar bya// brizhim ldan pa'i mar gyis byug/ 'dag tshal gyis ni khrus kyang bya// slar yang bum pa
201b1(rgyud 'bum): so so yi/ / sku gzugs rnams ni khrus kyang bya// byi nas nam mkhar gnas pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcom ldan 'das// lugs ma sogs la rab gzhug bya// yul chos la sogs ji
201b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / las bcu yi ni bya ba bya// spyan ni dbye ba byas nas su// rdo rje spyan ni byin gyis brlab// de bzhin me tog spos mar me// byug gzhal bas de bzhin te// de ltar las ni kun byas byir/
201b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg las kyis rdzogs par bya// lha kun zhal ni ma yin pas// mkhas pas rab tu gnas par bya// rab gnas yang dag rdzogs dus su// bstod dang bkra shis brjod bya zhing // mri tag
201b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs sil snyan sgra/ / ji ltar rnyed pas rab tu mchod// ston mo dang ni yon 'bul bas// skye bo tshim zhing rgyas par bya// rgyas pas skye bo skal pa bzang // bkra shis ni bar bcas 'gyur te//
201b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i sbyor ba la smod pa// sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'tshe bar 'gyur// ji ltar rab tu mi gnas lha// rab tu gnas par bya bar nus// slob ma dang bas gsol 'debs pas// bsod nams phyir
201b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bya ba ste/ / rnam rtog med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rab gnas lha ni bzhugs pa yin// 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha la sogs// gang tshe rtag tu gnas gyur pa// mchod dang mchod bya mnyam
201b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan par/ / de tshe lha yang yang dag bzhugs// 'di ni lha rnams rab tu gnas pa'i rim par bye ba ste nyid shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas me thab la sogs pa'i// mtshan nyid
202a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad par bya/ / sa ni sbyang ba byas rjes la/ me thab dag ni bya ba ste// sor brgyad pa nas brtsams nas ni// ji srid khru ni stong gi bar// sor
202a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pas ni dgra rnams gsod/ / sor bcus de bzhin rgyas pa ste// bcu gnyis sor gyis dbang dang dgug/ bcu bzhis de bzhin zhi ba'o// thab khung sor ni bcu drug pas/
202a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni mngon par 'phel bar byed// sor ni bco brgyad bdag nyid kyis// yul dang b.lang rigs 'phel 'gyur// thab khung sor ni nyi shu pas// yams kyi nad ni zhi bar byed//
202a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thab kyi nges pa ste// bsreg bya'i rdzas kyi tshad rnams ni// las dang rjes su mthun bya bar// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// rgyu yi tshad kyi cha gsum gyi// cha gnyis zab
202a5(rgyud 'bum): su brko bya ste/ / me thab dag ni thams cad kyi// brko ba'i thun mong mtshan nyid do// thab khung gi ni brgyad cha yis// kha khyer nyid ni mtho bar bya// kha khyer dbang kyi phyed tshad nyid// de nyid du ni
202a6(rgyud 'bum): dma' bar sbyar/ / ji ltar phyi rol dma' ba'i tshad// de bzhin kha khyer nang nyid do// de yi byi yi kha ran yang // dbangs kyi tshad ni ji bzhin bya// thab khung nang gi khyad par du// rdo rje yis ni
202a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan par bya/ / dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang // de bzhin gnag dang ldang ba ste// ji ltar las kyi rjes 'gro bas// thab kyi kha dog mtshan nyid yin// 'on kyang las kun byed pa'i thab/
202b1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i thab kyi khyad par mtshungs// kha khyer pad+ma'i rnam par te// dma' ba rdo rje'i 'phreng bas bskor// de yi phyi rol kha khyer ni// gru bzhi kha khyer dbangs tshad bya// ni la zlum po'i rnam pa ste//
202b2(rgyud 'bum): shar bltas kha dog dkar por 'gyur// rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste// byang du bltas pas ser pos bya// bskrad dang mngon par spyod pa la// zla ba byed pa nub bltas bya// dbye dang gsang ba'i
202b3(rgyud 'bum): las la ni/ / bur gsum lhor ni bltas te bya// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba gsum// kha dog dmar po bur gsum pa'o// mnon dang rmongs pa'i las la ni// bden bral du ni bltas te
202b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ bskrad la dud pa'i mdog lta bu// de bzhin rlung phyogs bltas te bya// rims kyis gdungs sogs dman pa'i las// rtag tu me phyogs bltas te bya// lha dang gdan dang mdog rnams
202b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / las kyi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba yin// yi ge hUM gi sbyor ba yis// phyag gnyis pa yi rnam par bsgom// skad cig rnam pas gsang sngags brjod// skad cig rnam pas lha'i bdag nyid// rgyas la
202b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i sems kyis bya/ / zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya// dbang la rjes chags sems kyis so// khro ba'i sems kyis gsad pa ste// rnam 'gyur drag po'i sems kyis ni// bskrad pa dang ni mngon spyod
202b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs gzhag/ de nas me ni spyan drangs bya// rang snying chu skyes hUM yig las// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par bsgom// yig gsum las byung zhu'i
203a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa/ / der dbumar gyis bon las// kha dog dmar po mdzes pa'i zham// dbyug sa ril ba spyi thugs g.yon// g.yas kyi bgrang 'phreng mi 'jigs sbyin// gsus 'byung
203a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cod pan can/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni// sngags pa mkhas pas blta bar bya// oM mr-i hU~M gi ma~M gas ni// thag khrung logs su blta bya ste// bas gtor 'thor 'thung mchod yon sogs/
203a3(rgyud 'bum): byin nas thabs kyi dbus su gzhag/ dam tshig sems dpa' bsams nas ni// ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya// me tog spos dang mar me drang // de bzhin dri dang zhal zas mchod// lag
203a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pus mo'i nang gzhag ste/ / dgang gzar dang ni thugs gzar bzung // oM ag+na ye swA hA zhes pas// dgang blugs bdun nam gsum byin na// de nas me ni tshim gyur nas// mi 'jigs
203a5(rgyud 'bum): ba ni chen po ston/ / me tog so rtsini bza' sogs// bstod pas kyang ni mnyes bya ste// de nas 'thor 'thung byin nas ni// me ni yang dag gnas par bsam// oM ba~M d+hi k+ShA ya swA hA/ a
203a6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra la tA yA swA hA/ thag sha'i'o// oM badz+rA yadz+nyA ya swA hA/ u dum tha ra'i'o// oM badz+ra gu be+e rA yA swA hA/ shing 'o ma can rnams kyi'o// oM sarba pA pa dA ha ni badz+rA ya swA hA/ tis nas
203a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi'o/ / oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras ma grugs pa rnams kyi'o// oM sarba sam+b+ha de swA hA/ no dang zas kyi'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dUng ba'i 'o// oM a pra ti ha ti badz+rA ya swA hA/ ku sha rnams
203b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi'o/ / de nas snying ka'i pad+ma'i gdan la rang gi lha'i sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur pa las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom par bya ste/ de nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo la
203b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o/ / me yi snying ka'i dbus su ni// skad cig rnam pas rnam bsam bya// bsang kator 'thor 'thung sogs mchod dang // mchod yon zhabs bsil bstod pas mchod//
203b3(rgyud 'bum): rang lha'i sa bon bzlas pa yi// the tsom med par sbyin sreg bya// lha rnams so sor phul nas ni// phyi nas ci 'dod sbyin sreg bya// gsum dang bdun dang lhag par ni// ji srid brgya stong bar de bzhin// rdza
203b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar las kyi rjes mthun par/ / mkhas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin zhu ba'i rdzas kun ni// de ltar me yi zhal du dbul// yam shing dang ku sha la sogs pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o// zhal zas
203b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o/ / me tog ni dbu la'o// bdug pa ni bo da la'o// byug pa ni thugs kar ro// bsang gtor ni sku la'o// zhabs bsil ni zhabs la'o// mar me mchod yon
203b6(rgyud 'bum): zhal zas rnams/ / rim pa bzhin du mdun du dbul// sngar bshad cho ga dzaM lta bas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten sbyin sreg yang dag rdzogs// gal te 'jig rten 'ang
203b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg/ nyin mo 'jig rten sbyin sreg ste// de bzhin mtshan mo 'jig rten 'das// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dus// bza' dang btung ba'i khyad par dang // ca co'i sgra yi spro ba che//
204a1(rgyud 'bum): glu dang kar gyi dga' bde ba// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// der ni ts+tsha ru'i sbyin sreg bya// mngon 'dod bya ba gsol btab na// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med/
204a2(rgyud 'bum): oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // ji ltar bde bar bzhugs su gsol// gang yang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i//
204a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'am 'byung po gang zhig la// dang por sbyin sreg sbyin par bya// oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mngon 'dod bya ba gsol btab na// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de nas
204a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa mnyam gzhag cing / / mkhas pas mdog dang sgra dang ni// dri dang 'bar ba'i dbyibs brtags te// de ltar me yi dge mi dge'i// ltas ni nye bar mtshon par bya// me ni rtse mo gcig tu 'bar// phun
204a5(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs ma kun byed pa'o/ / rtse mo gnyis rab mi g.yo bar// mtshungs par 'bar na bar mar shes// rtse mo bzhi ni mnyam du 'bar// rgyas shing dngos grub bstan par gnas// kun da zla ba lta bu'i
204a6(rgyud 'bum): mdog/ snum ning baiDUR+Sha yi 'od// dri med me ni du ba med// nad med rigs ni 'phel bar byed// rtswa ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// kha ba yi ni mdog lta bu// nor bu pul+la ka'i mdog/ sdig pa thams
204a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'jig byed yin/ / me tog ban du ka lta bu// nad kyi me tog gi ni mdog/ bcom gser gyi mdog lta bus// dbang phyug rgyal srid rab tu ster// tsam pa pad+ma ut+pal dri// u shi ra dang mA la ti//
204b1(rgyud 'bum): d+ha kan+d+ha'i dri mtshungs pa// ka pur a ka ru yi dris// dge zhing gnas kyi bdag po mchog/ pi wang rgyud mangs rdza rnga dang // dung dang zangs dung ltar sgra stan// shin tu zab pa'i sgra snyan pa'i// me mthong bde
204b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar byed/ / dpal be'u gdugs dang dung lta bu// gang zhig rtse gsum bum pa'i dbyibs// rgyal mtshan rnga yab rdo rje bzang // g.yung drung rta dang glang po'i dbyibs// sgra med g.yas su 'khyil ba dang // me lce
204b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig 'bar don cher ster/ / 'di dag dge ba phun sum tshogs// tshe dang nad med rab ster ba'o// g.yo zhing mdun gyi phyogs su 'bar// rtse gsum du ba'i tshogs mang dang // 'khor zhing me stag dang bcas pa//
204b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phro bas nad 'phel byed// me gang yang yang rab tu 'dar// yang yang rtsub par rgod pa dang // yang yang g.yon du 'khor ba dang // yang yang sa la me lce reg/ thig le nag po sol ba'i mdog/
204b5(rgyud 'bum): myur du rigs ni zad 'gyur zhing // gang zhig rgyal po'i drung gnas pa'i// sde dang bdag po 'joms par ston// mdog med du ba'i mdog ltar gnas// mdog ljang sna tshogs mdog rtsub pa// pa la sha dang
204b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bru mar mdog/ 'dis ni don rnams nyams par byed// ro yi dwi nya'i dri ltar ngan// chu skyes srog chags dri dang ldan// ji ltar me ni 'di ltar mthong // gtso bo rnam pa ltung zhes ston// tseg tseg ces pa'i
204b7(rgyud 'bum): sgra 'byung zhing / / hu ra hur gyis ni sgra gang ldan// sim sim gyi ni sgra bdag nyid// rdo rje'i sgras ni don nyams byed// mdung dang ral gri mda' dang sbrul// rngo mo ba lang mgo 'dra gang // 'ji/
205a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam pa 'di lha mthong // de'i mdun bzod pa mdzod cig ces// 'di ltar lan gsum brjod nas ni// yon bdag khyim du zhi bde dang // bde legs chog
205a2(rgyud 'bum): rim pa bya/ / de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi/ yan lag kun 'byung 'bras rab bshad// sa dang sa gzhi zhing byas pa'i// thab kyis yan lag yon bdag rgyas// mar gyis 'byor pa thams cad
205a3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / yam shing gzi brjid rnams 'phel ba'o// bud shing lhag par dpa' bar byed// ku shas thams cad srung bar byed// yungs kar dkar pos zhi bar byed// 'bras kyis rgyas par byed par bshang
205a4(rgyud 'bum): til gyis sdig pa 'joms rig bya/ / so bas nor dang 'bru rnams 'gugs// ma shAs stobs ni chen por byed// nas kyis rlung gi shugs rab ster// dUr bas tshe ni 'phel bar byed// glo yis nad ni 'joms par
205a5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / 'o ma sbrang rtsis shes rab 'phel// lag pan gyis ni bde kun ster// mes ni 'dod don dngos grub sder// rang 'dod lhas ni grol bar rtsol// lcug ma las kyi rjes mthun par// zhi sogs las byas shes
205a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dgang gzar shes rab blugs gzar thabs// de gnyis sbyar ba gnyis med sgom// de las nges 'byung mar gyi rgyud// ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsir 'dod// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi// me ni
205a7(rgyud 'bum): de yis yang dag mchod/ / 'di ltar sbyin sreg gang byed la// skal bzang dngos grub rab tu ster// 'di ni sbyin sreg nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//
205b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas las ni rab 'byam 'byung // dngos grub sna tshogs ko 'phang sngags// sna tshogs las kyi 'bras 'byung ba// yang dag par ni rab tu bshad// oM na maHswa shA ma bA sbyin/ ma hA kA la a nu tsa rA ya/
205b2(rgyud 'bum): tatad+yathA/ oM tsa la pra tsa la/ la~M lA la lA ya/ de ba pi ga swA hA/ bsnyen pa khri byas te/ mtshan phyed na ling ga bzung la ji srid 'ongs kyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste/ gong bu dgug pa'o// oM tsa mur+g+ha/
205b3(rgyud 'bum): / d+hAd+ha ma ke shi bid d+hur+N+Na hwe/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ de ba dat+taM/ A na ya swA hA/ rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil du sen rtsis ri rab bris la/ de'i nang gi cha la yi ke hrIHbzhi/ dbus su sngags kyi tshig bris te
205b4(rgyud 'bum): ci bzlas na dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ / oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya/ yo sU mA ra ya hUM phaT/ grog mkhar gyi sa ba'i rnam pa lnga dang bsred pa las mtho gang tsam gyi dA su ki
205b5(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas chu gtor zhing / gu gul gyis bar ma chad par bdugs te/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin na nyi ma bdun na chu'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// ci ste mi 'bebs na nyi ma bdun
205b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la dum bu dum bur byas te bum par bcug nas/ chu bo la bsgyur na char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// char dbab pa'i cho ga'o// oM ga ka a ri ga ga swA hA/ sngags 'dis gdong bkrus te rdo ba la lan bdun
205b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa byas nas su'ang rung ba'i sgo'i bu gar bcug na kha bcing ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / oM mu kha tiSh+Than+ti/ mu kha gats+tsha ti mu kha ka r+d+ha ti/ lA ga lA/ su khA nAM/ mu tra pu ri She na/ de ba dat+ta s+ya mu khaM ban+d+ha
206a1(rgyud 'bum): mI s+yA hA/ khyu mchog gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bablangs te/ gang su'ang rung bu kar gzhug pa byas na tha snyad brjod pa'i kha bcing bar 'gyur te bklags pas 'grub pa'o// oM
206a2(rgyud 'bum): na mo ni kha b+hai ra bA ya/ tsi ro tsi ri ka rA tA rU be Na/ mu Shi kA nA tuN+Te ban+d+ha mi/ ma rak+ka To/ shrI gA la/ sa ro bAM/ rik+Sho/ bA ra hA dI nAM/ si ri si ri/ khyi li khyi li swA hA/ sngags 'dis lag pa ya
206a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig gam rdo ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas khyim mam/ zhing ngam/ ldum ra'i zur bzhir rdzo bi bcug na nye bairi 'tshe ba med par 'gyur ro// yang dug dang / lan tshwa dang / ske tshe
206a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / yungs kar dang / la phug gi sa bon dang / da du ra'i sa bon dang / nag po chen po'i sa bon gyi rdzas 'di dag ma he dang / dag pa dang / ce spyang rnams kyi khrag dang bsres te/ yang dag par sbyar
206a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bcu bzhi'i nyi ma la me tog dang bdug pa la gtor ma byas te/ de'i rjes las lag pa g.yas pas yang dag par bzung ste/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub byas nas khro bo'i ngag gis bzlas te/ phyogs
206a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhir sbas na mtshams bcad pa dang rab byas par 'gyur ro/ / oM hUM bru~M hUM phaT ba Ti ba Ti swA hA/ sngags 'dis ba lang gi lci ba la mngon par bsngags te chu'i gnas su bcug na zho rnams rnam par chud zos
206a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ 'o ma gtor bas ni krol bar 'gyur ro// oM rab ta sa ma ni/ tre lokya a d+hi pa ta ye/ kra ru kra ru/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ b+ha.A ba b+ha kA ya/ ne tra ro gI si ri si ri/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ya pha/
206b1(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ mig nad la byab pa'i sngags so// oM a ru Ne hUM phaT swA hA/ chu la yongs su bzlas te mig bkrus na mig nad 'joms par 'gyur ro// sman pa lA'i rtsa ba dum bu bdun du byas te/ lag pa la bcings na
206b2(rgyud 'bum): rims 'joms par 'gyur ro/ / a ba marga'i rtsa ba bcings na rims nyin bzhi pa 'joms par 'gyur ro// shing sa p+ta par na blangs te sgo rtsa 'am lam du sbas na tshang rnam par nyams par 'gyur te/ bton na ni
206b3(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur ro/ / oM na maHtsaN+Da aM ku sha ku lu ku lu swA hA/ phug ron gyi blun dang / lham bu chu gsher dang / stang zil dang / gu gul dang / shing tsha dang / chu srin sen mo dang / rurta dang / gser shing gi
206b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu ste/ 'di rnams de bzhin du bu ram dang sbyar la spos su byas te/ zong gi snod thams cad la bdugs na tshong pa rnams rnyed pa bzang bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti su skad tsa mur+t+ti tsi ri mi ri pA tA
206b5(rgyud 'bum): ke.a mu kaM ba sha mA na ya swA hA/ ru rta shu thag dbang po'i nas// yungs kar ta ka ra'i me tog/ sug smel de bzhin klu'i me tog/ swardza ra sa cha mnyam byas// de dag gis ni rdzas la bdugs// tshong ni myur
206b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'ong bar 'gyur/ / yi ge ya gnyis kha sbyar byas// dbus su ming ni sbyar byas te// rlung gis khyer ba'i shing lo gzung // de yi lo ma la bri bya// khA yi sgo yi smyu gu dang // snag tsha dug dang ske tshe dang // dur khron
206b7(rgyud 'bum): sol ba mnyam ldan pas/ / legs par bsang ste bris nas mchod// lkog dang mig dmar nyin mo la// tshubs ma'i rlung la 'phyar ba 'am// chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na// dgra ni skrod pa nyid du 'gyur//
207a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gcig pa sar mtshan mo song ste/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ ces pa bdag nyid chen pos sngags bzlas par bya ste/ bskrad pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o// ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las
207a2(rgyud 'bum): sor bcu drug pa'i gzugs brnyan bya ste/ dur khrod kyi ras la ming mngon par bris la/ de'i nang du bcug ste khro ba dang bcas pas de'i kha zan gyis bkag la/ ro'i sku'i srad bus dkris te/ yang khro bas lan
207a3(rgyud 'bum): bdun bzlas pa'i gtun shing gis de'i khar bsnun par byas na mnan par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa g.yon pa la ldong ros kyis gzugs brnyar dris te/ mar me'i rtse mo la gdungs na dbang du byed pa'i
207a4(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / rlung gi phyogs su maN+Dal nye bar byugs te/ gro ga'i 'dab ma la lhas byin gyi ming dang spel ba zis la zan gyi gong bu'i dbus su bcug ste/ bya rog la byin na bskrad par 'gyur ro// rdza mkhan gyi
207a5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa byis pa'i 'jim pa la snang byas te/ stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ dbugs mi 'byin par chu'i nang du bzhag na grong brtan par 'gyur ro// de nas dgra bsad par 'dod na spra tshil lam bag zan
207a6(rgyud 'bum): la gzugs brnyan byas la chos gos kyi ras kyis gzugs brnyar de'i gdong nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bar du dkris la legs par sbas te/ de'i steng du lag pa bzhag la ming spel ba'i sngags stong du gci
207a7(rgyud 'bum): gis ma tshang ba bzlas nas/ lha'i khang pa'i phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/ snying kar seng ldeng gi phur bu btab la/ phur bu'i steng du dus gsum du chu tshan blugs shing khro bas yongs su bzlas na rlag par 'gyur ro//
207b1(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar lnga rnams khrag dang bsres pa dang / 'bru mar tshwa dang b+ha la ta ka bsres pa dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams bsres shing sbyar te/ dgra'i ming nas bzung nas sbyin sreg stong phrag gcig byas na de skad cig
207b2(rgyud 'bum): la gsod par 'gyur ro/ / yungs kar ser skya khrag dang bsres pa dang / 'bru mar tshwa dang b+hU ta la ka bsres la dgra'i ming nas bzung nas/ dur khrod kyi me la lan brgyad stong sbyini sreg byas na bsgrub bya brjed
207b3(rgyud 'bum): byed kyis gsod par 'gyur te/ khrag skyug par 'gyur zhing rims sam gzer nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi thal ba las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas rkang pa goyon pas mnan la/ skra grol
207b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing khros pas lhor bltas te/ gang gi ming nas bzung nas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dgra myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// til dmang po dang me tog bri yang ku mar dang bsres te/ lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg
207b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na mchog tu skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ / til dkar po dang 'bras dkar po mar dang bsres pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma dang bral bas
207b6(rgyud 'bum): nim yin no/ / ka ra bI ra'i me tog gnyis// de bzhin du ni tsan dan gnyis// ru rta shing tsha yung nga ser// me tog shing dang yung ba gnag/ de bzhin du ni ut+pal gsum// pad+ma'i ge sar de bzhin te// bri yang
207b7(rgyud 'bum): ku dang me tog brgya/ / de bzhin don grub dkar po dang // ni dguN+DI dang 'byung po'i sgra// gi wang ge sar tsha ba gsum// de bzhin chu yi sa bon te// sdong ros dang ni 'bras bu gsum// nim pa'i lo ma u
208a1(rgyud 'bum): shi ri/ / ka rany+dza yi 'bras sa bon// shing kun bA la ta ka ste// 'di ltar nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// cha mnyam du ni byas nas su// rgyal dang nyi ma la sbyar nas// ba yi rnam lnga dang btags
208a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ ci 'dod ril bu byas nas ni// nyi ma la ni bskam par bya// mar ngo'i tshes brgyad khyad par la// mchog tu spang bar gnas gyur pas// rang 'dod lha yi mdun du ni// brgyad stong du ni bzla bar bya//
208a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga 'di lta sngar byas nas// rab gnas sbyin sreg gis rdzogs bya// bcang dang mig sman byug pa dang // mgo la sngar ni sbyar byas na// de yi mod la skyon kun las// grol bar 'dir ni the tsom med//
208a4(rgyud 'bum): byis pa rnams kyi mgo la bskus na byis pa'i go don las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i gdon gyis zin pa la bdug pa byas na rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la mgo la byug
208a5(rgyud 'bum): pa byas na rims med par 'gyur ro/ / mang po'i dbus su rtsod pa'i tshe 'am rgyal po'i sgor 'gro ba na/ dpral bar byugs na de rgyal bar 'gyur ro// skra'i rtse mo la byugs na bud med dbang du 'gyur bas/
208a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma rnams 'dzan cing skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// bud med bu mi phyin pa rnams kyi lte ba dang skye gnas su byugs na myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mdze'i nad thams cad la ba lang gi chu dang lhan cig 'jung
208a7(rgyud 'bum): na ba de legs su 'gyur ro/ / mngal mi chags pa rnams la dpyid kyi dus su ba'i rnam lnga dang lhan cig 'thungs na/ mngal chags shing bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// khrag gis gzer ba la 'bras kyi chu dang lhan cig 'thung
208b1(rgyud 'bum): na zug gzer rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mig na ba la mgo la byugs na mig nad 'joms par 'gyur ro// mche ba'i dug gis zin pa la mchil mas bskus na drug med par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bcangs na seng ge dang /
208b2(rgyud 'bum): stag dang / dom la sogs pa nags kyi bdag po rnams dang / sdig pa dang / rta d+ha mo la sogs pa dang / gdon thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ thams cad du srung ba'i mchog dang / skye bo thams cad
208b3(rgyud 'bum): la sdug pa dang / skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// 'di ni las rab 'byam gyi sman gyi rab tu sbyor ba nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bcud
208b4(rgyud 'bum): len gyi/ / cho ga mchog ni yang dag bshad// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis// lus ni rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid 'gyur// zla ba si h+la gla rtsi dang // sman dang tsan dan ser po ste// so so 'am ni lhan cig gis// rgas
208b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'chi ba smra byed pa'o/ / rigs lnga las byung mchog yin te// rang rigs las byung 'bring du 'dod// tha mal bud med las byung dmar// rgan dang byis pa'i rnam par spang // mdog nag lus ni rab tu
208b6(rgyud 'bum): bzung / / gzhon cing sgra ni sdum pa dang // mig 'bras gnag cing dri zhim gang // de yi me tog rab bsngags te// mar gyi ngo yi dus 'tshal ni// mngon 'dod dngos grub thams cad ster// yar ngor 'dzag
208b7(rgyud 'bum): pa mi bsngags te/ / rgas pa la sogs byed pa yin// thog ma tha ma rnam spangs pa// dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs shing dag/ ri rags lte ba rab bsngags te// mdzes pa'i gla rtsi yang dag zang // gsad/
209a1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pa yang dag gtso// mchog gi sman ni gzung bar bya// 'o ma'i ston mo sogs skyes pa'i// tsan dan ser po yang dag gzung // mar ni gsum ste mgo skyes dang // sbubs las
209a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes dang sha skyes so/ / mgo skyes mar ni mchog yin te// sbubs las byung ba bar ma yin// sha las byung ba tha ma ste// bcud kyis len gyi cho ga mchog/ zla bas lus ni rgyas par byed// du ru kas ni
209a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad srung / / ri dgas lte bas nad 'joms te// sman gyis zhi bar byed pa yin// rtag tu gzhi mnyam gyur pa ni// snga dro'i dus su rgyun du bsten// zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba na// zla ba'i rgyu ba btung bar bya//
209a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i rlung na rgyu ba na// nyi mas nyi ma btung bar bya// rdzas 'di dag ni mnyam sbyar byas// rtag tu snar ni blugs par bya// zla ba drug tu sbyar byas na// rtag pa'i tshe ni 'phel bar 'gyur// sna sgo g.yon du rab thug
209a5(rgyud 'bum): na/ / las ni yongs su dag gyur pas// yar ngo zla ba ji bzhin du// nad kun mod cing 'tsho bar 'gyur// gnag dang ser ba dang bral zhing // dri ma dri med rnam par spangs// dang ba'i chu ltar gang gyur la// skyon bani
209a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rnam bral ba'o/ / rab mdzes dri ma med cing dge/ cung zad shel dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// dag pa'i shel ltar gyur pa nyid// lus ni bcing ba'i mchog yin te// nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang // bud med nyal po
209a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spang / / brtan zhing dul la sbas pa yis// rang gi lus ni yongs su bsrung // slob ma dang ldan lhan cig bcas// dben pa'i phug tu rab zhugs der// myos byed gtor ma mnyam ldan pas// lha rnams la
209b1(rgyud 'bum): ni mchod par bya/ / rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzla// sbyin dang bsod nams bya ba bya// slob ma rnams ni tshim par bya// kha na ma tho med pa'i gnas// rnyed nas bgegs med byas te
209b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / bde ba'i stan rab thob nas su// blo dang ldan pas smra mi bya// ji srid nyi ma bdun gyi bar// rang lus yang dag dag par bya// de rjes lo ni bcu sogs kyi// bar du las ni bsten par bya// dngos grub
209b3(rgyud 'bum): dus su lo gnyis kyang / / mkhas pas rtag par yang dag bsrungs// lo bcu gnyis ni yang dag rdzogs// gnyer ma skra dkar rnam par spangs// sna tshogs nad las rnam par grol// zla ba skar ma yod par 'tsho// 3
209b4(rgyud 'bum): dang lha min mi rnams kyi/ / bud med rnams la yid 'ong 'gyur// rdzas ni lnga po 'di rnams nyid// rtag par rgyun du bza' zhing btung // las 'di dag ni yang dag rdzogs// 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ 'dod
209b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jo'i ba dang mnyam pa'i lus/ / mkha' spyod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// so phag chos 'gyur mda' gu dang // nir gun thi dang bal gun ne// spro byed 'dang dang nir+ya sa// gla rtsi tsan dan ldan pa dang // bA li ka dang
209b6(rgyud 'bum): cotso rang ldan/ / rang gi lus ni dril byas na// nad nams kun las rnam grol zhing // dug med mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur// 'bras bu gsum dong tsan dan gyi// phye mar bcas dang gla rtsi ni// bsil dang lhan
209b7(rgyud 'bum): cig mo ga cig 'thungs/ / nad medags pa'ang med par 'gyur// 'bras bu gsum dang tsan dan bye// gre rtsir lhan cig bsten byas te// zos na zla ba drug tsam gyis// mo ring gzugs dang ldan par 'gyub
210a1(rgyud 'bum): gla rtsi 'bras bu gsum dang bcas/ / rdo yi snod du yang dag gzhag/ bgrangs te gang gis rtag 'thungs na// rgas dang nad med yang dag 'byung // tsad dan ka sa yi sman gsum//
210a2(rgyud 'bum): mi gang gis ni zla drug zos// de la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni// 'byung bar 'dir ni the tsom med// 'di ni bcud kyis len gyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de na
210a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang myos byed dang / / btso ba yang dag rab bshad bya// rgyu de rnams kun tu gsang cho ka/ ji bzhin gzhan la brjod mi bya// bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i ched du ni// bshad kyis gnod sbyin ba dag po nyon/
210a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rdo rje man da rang // grags te mkha' dbyings 'o ma'i mtsho// 'o ma'i rgya mtsho mdzes pa yi// bdud rtsi bsrungs pa tsam gyis ni// de las skyes pa'i lha mo chang // bu mo 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma// nyi
210a5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra zhing / / rgya skyegs khu ba lta bu'i 'od// rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// pad+ma'i mdog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// yi ge maM las byung ba'i sku// mdzes pa'i phyag ni bco brgyad de// 6
210a6(rgyud 'bum): mo sna tshogs bcud 'dzin cing / / 'jig rten gsum po dbang sdud ma// g.yas pa'i ral gri mda' lcags kyu// thod pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang // de bzhin mu tig 'phreng dril bu// dgu pas mchog ni rab ster ba'o//
210a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i phyag gis phub dang gzhu// zhags pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ ril bu spyi drugs mdung dang ni// tho ba pi wang bgrang 'phreng bcas// gzhon zhing lang tsho phun sum tshogs// lha mo mdzes pa'i spyan gsum can//
210b1(rgyud 'bum): man dar yi dbus phyung nas// chu bo kun tu gyur nas ni// 'o ma'i rgya mtsho zhes bya bar// mar dang sbrang rtsi lta bur 'bab// zhi ba'i btung ba'ang lha mo de// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad gzugs can// rnam snang mdzad ma'i sku'i
210b2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su/ / he ru ka ni zhu bar 'gyur// dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra mchog bde// thams cad ro gcig 'gyur ba yi// bdud rtsi drag po'i gzugs can ma// 'phrog dang bya ba longs spyod
210b3(rgyud 'bum): la de phyir snying po bdud rtsi yin/ / de bzhin thab ni chos dbyings grags// glus ni bdud rtsir bsgrags pa ste// chang gang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// gang zhig dregs te he ru ka/ mdog ni pad+ma'i dbang phyug bdag/ gang
210b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig dri de rin chen 'byung / / ro gang don yod grub pa ste// gang zhig rlung gi shugs bdag nyid// chang med pa la ye shes ci// rnam shes kyang ni ci zhig 'gyur// rnam shes ye shes phun tshogs pas// chang gis 'gro
210b5(rgyud 'bum): kun rmongs par 'gyur/ / gnas dang zhing dang tshan do ha// 'dus pa dang ni dur khrod du// mchod bya mchod byed 'brel ba yin// bdud rtsi mchod yon mchog yin te// rgyud dang rgyud gzhan gsungs pa yi// badra
210b6(rgyud 'bum): shis bde ba'i dga' ba'o/ / mtshun gyi lha dang mi rnams dang // bag ma blang dang mchod sbyin las// mkhas pa'i mchod sbyin dag la'ang ste// rgyal rigs g.yul ngor 'jug pa dang // rje'u rigs bkra shis don
210b7(rgyud 'bum): du ste/ / dmangs rigs rnams ni dngos grub sgrub// rab byung mchod pa'i dus dag la// yun ring bshad pa'i spyod yul dang // rab gnas sbyin sreg dus dag tu'ang // gnas rnams rgyu ba'i spyod yul du//
211a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa rnams spyan drangs te// mchod gnas gsang sngags smrab de'i dus// 'di ltar sna tshogs shes byas nas// de yi skyon rnams mi brtag go/ dbang du bya ba bshad par/
211a2(rgyud 'bum): bya// gsang ba pa yi bdag po nyon// bla ma dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// mchod cing rjes su spyad par bya// oM AHhUM zhes bya sngags kyis// rtag tu byin gyis brlab par bya// ha hoHhrI zhes bya sngags kyis// smra
211a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni rtogs bya ste/ / yi ge has ni kha dog 'phrog/ hoHyis dri ni 'joms pa ste// yi ge hrI yas nus pa 'di bcom// bdud rtsi'i rnam par bsten par bya// rtsa gsum la sogs dang bral bar//
211a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig can gyis 'thungs// de las dug 'gyur the tsom med// sngags kyi dngos grub mi skye'o// su zhig chang gis myos 'gyur ba// de la bgegs ni mang po 'byung // sngags pa chang gis rnam 'gyur bas/
211a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod la brkam zhing 'khrig par srid// rgod cing klu ni de bzhin len// 'thab mo la spro nam por 'khrul// smod cing nyams par byed pas kyang // ngu 'bod dmyal bar 'tshed bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams khros
211a6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / de la nad dang mya ngan 'jigs// 'jigs par byed pas rnam gtses nas// sdig can dmyal bar 'khrid par 'gyur// bla ma la 'khu bra ma smod// sems can 'khrul sbyin mi bya// bdud rtsi de nyid dug de
211a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / dngos grub sgrub pa 'bras bu med// sngags pas 'di dag spang bar ni// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// tsA ru'i 'ba' bar ldan pa dang // cho gar yang dag bstan pas spyad// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i
211b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'dus pa// cho gar gsungs bzhin mi bslu ste// dngos po thams cad mnyam pas na// skal dang skal min brtag mi bya// des na 'dus pa zhes gsungs te// dngos grub dang ni rjes gnang thob// shes rab blo/
211b2(rgyud 'bum): dang stobs dang ni// bde dang skal bzang 'bras rab ste// dbang phyug brgyad kyi yon tan kun// bla med 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur// rdzas skyes de bzhin rtsa ba skyes// go D+hi biSh+Ti chang gi rigs// shing skyes de bzhin bur
211b3(rgyud 'bum): shing skyes sa stengs gang dag skyes rnams te/ / ma n+ti rnam pa lngang bshad de// pe shI rnam pa brgyad du brjod// gi D+hi rnam pa bdun yin te// rim pa 'di dag shes par bya// rno dang kha dang tsha ba dang // mngar dang 'jam par
211b4(rgyud 'bum): skye ba ste/ / sna tshogs yul du rnam skyes nas// chang gi ming du rab tu grags// chu la dga' bo ba su ka/ der ni gdan du bsgom bya ste// me tog dang ni gur kum bdag/ gtor ma byin nas brtsam par bya// cho ga rdzog
211b5(rgyud 'bum): pas byas na ni/ / myos byed mchog ni skye bar 'gyur// gang tshe grub pa'i chang sems pas// nyin re nyin rare bya ba yin// sbyor ba 'di ni mchog tu mdzes// grub pa'i myos byed yid dga' ba// shrI gro'i sman ni zho gnyis dag
211b6(rgyud 'bum): skyu ru ra yang cha bcu dang / / de bzhin chu ni bre gang nyid// pho ba ris ni drug cu gsum// bu ram srang ni gcig bzung ste// 'di dag gcig tu sbyar byas la// 'di ni grub pa'i chang zhes brjod// nyi ma'i 'od la btso bar bya//
211b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyi ru ra yi myos byed do// d+ha ta ka yi me tog bzung // ts+tsha ta'i me tog so ba dang // ma la ya dang sa ri ba// rdo dreg shri ku ba la ka laM// 'di dag cha ni mnyam pa'am// bzhi cha ru ni rab tu brtag/ chu srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
212a1(rgyud 'bum): bu ram srang ni brgyad du 'gyur/ / nyi ma gsum na chang 'di nyid// 'byung ba ru ni shes par bya// me tog d+ha ta ka'i chang ngo // gan da pa tra pho ba ris// btsod dang nA ga ge sar bzung //
212a2(rgyud 'bum): dan+tim 'bras bu de bzhin tshwa// pi pi li dang 'o mar bcas// bu ram srang ni gcig nyid de// chu ni bdun 'gyur sbyin par bya// myos byed dri ni zhim pa dang // bsil ba'i bdag nyid du ni 'gyur// pad tA ka'i rgyang
212a3(rgyud 'bum): ngoshing tsha a ya na le de/ / legs mthong tam la ru pa ti// sha ka rang dang lhan cig sbyar// mkhas pas gcig tu bsres byas la// nyi ma'i 'od la lan bdun bco// grub pa'i chang ni blan med// kha ra 'i chang ngo //
212a4(rgyud 'bum): shri gu'i rtsa ba las byung chu// sbrang rtsi dang ni lhan cig ldan// mkhas pas rdzas ni dag bya'i phyir// cha brgyad du ni rab tu sbyin// sbrang rtsi lhag par sbyar la btso// der yang 'bras bu ka sum gur kum// gla rtsi dang ni
212a5(rgyud 'bum): ga pur dang / / gan da pa tra a ka ru// dbye bas rab tu sbyar bya ste// thams cad brgyad char phye nas ni// dbye ba'i don du sbyar bar bya// nyin zhag bzhir ni khyad par du// 'bru yi dbus su gzhag par bya// chang ni smin par
212a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa na/ / myangs na kla rtsi'i drir 'gyur ro// so bAn dza na'i shun pa dang // sbrang rtsi bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// dbye ba gnyis par ka pur dang // gla rtse dzA ti la lar bcas// ri dgas dregs par bcas pas ni/ 6
212a7(rgyud 'bum): ni dri ma med par 'gyur/ / Da da ka yi me tog dang // bA la'i bye dang sbrang rtsir bcas// de la slar yang mtshan nyid 'dis// bzhi chas lhag pas 'grub par 'gyur// kan da pa tra srang phyed ni// brgyad cha dang ni sbyar bar bya//
212b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar 'di nyid sgrub pa yis// zla re zla rer sbyar bar bya// sna tshogs chang gi dbye ba ni// yul dang rjes mthun 'gyur zhes bya// 'di ltar chang gi dbye ba ni// rgyud dang rgyud gzhan las shes bya// myos byed las gzhan
212b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa med/ / mar med sbyin sreg mchog ma yin// bla ma dang bral chos med de// chos dang bral ba'i grol ba med// myos byed las gzhan dam tshig ni// gar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// bdag nyid bsod nams/
212b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis sam// la lar bla ma mnyes pas rnyed// 'di ni myos byed nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang sngags btu ba'i// cho ga mchog ni rab tu
212b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / sa yi cha ni yid 'ong bar// dri yi chus ni nye bar byug/ dben pa'i gnas su legs sbas te// me tog spos kyis nyams dga' bya// sngags pas tsA ru'i bza' ba spad// de bzhin bdud rtsi btung bar spad// rang
212b5(rgyud 'bum): gi lhag pa'i lhar spor bas/ / sngon du gtor ma sbyin bya ste// mkha' 'gro ma kun mnyam sbyor ba'i// slob dpon legs par mnyam bzhag pas// gru gsum dkyil 'khor monyam dag pa// ri mo gsum gyi sau phyi rol
212b6(rgyud 'bum): bskor/ / chos 'byung skyed mos tshal chen po// sna tshogs me tog gis rnam mdzes// der ni A li kA li dbye// sde tshan brgyad po rim bzhin bri// 'dod pa drag po de bzhin nyid// thub pa mda' dang gzugs med nyid//

213a1(rgyud 'bum): mig dang po'i lnga pa gzung / / der ni re'u mig bcu pa nyid// steng du yang dag sbyin par bya// re'u mig dgu pa'i gsum pa yi// steng du thig ler rnam par brgyan// re'u mig bdun pa'i dang
213a2(rgyud 'bum): po gzung / / me yi sa bon 'og tu brgyan// dang po yi ni bzhi pa yis// brgyan pa 'dod pa mo yi mchog/ bdun pa'i gnyis pa'i yi ge gzung // re'u mig dang po'i bcu gcig blang // re ru mig dgu pa'i lnga pa gzung /
213a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge u yis 'og tu brgyan// re'u mig bdun pa'i bzhi pa gzung // re'u mig dang po'i bcu gcig pa// mgo bo la ni brgyan par bya// re'u mig dgu pa'i lnga pa gzung // dang po'i lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// re'u mig lnga pa'i

213b1(rgyud 'bum): / lan gnyis su ni bzlas par bya// re'u mig dag ni lnga pa yis// yi ge gnyis pa gzung bar bya// re'u mig bcu gcig pa dag gi/ bzhi pa nyid ni gzung bar bya// sngon du phyag 'tshal sbyin par bya// rtag par rgyun//
