214b6(rgyud 'bum): gzung mchog dbang phyug/ re'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi// yi ge bzhi pa gzung bar bya// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis ni// mgo bo la ni brgyan par 'gyur// mkhas pas bdun pa bdun pa ni// logs su
214b7(rgyud 'bum): thig le gnyis su gzhag/ re'u mig dag ni bdun pa yi// yi ge gnyis pa gzung bar bya// dbyangs kyi gsum pas spyi bor brgyan// re'u mig dag ni dgu pa yi// yi ge brgyad pa blang bar bya// de nyid kyi 'og/
215a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa sbyin// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar bar bya// yi ge mchog ni par brjod// re'u mig dag ni dgu pa yi// yi ge lnga pa gzung bar bya// dbyangs ni gnyis pas mdzes par bya// re'u mig bdun
215a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dang po ni/ / bzhag pas dngos grub thams cad ster// re'u mig ni bdun pa yi// yi ge bzhi pa blang bar bya// dbyangs ni lnga pa sbyar bya ste// zla ba phyed ni thig les brgyan// lan gnyis brjod pa mchog dbang phyug
215a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa'i yi ge gnyis pa gzung / / re'u mig bcu gcig pa nyid kyi// bzhi pa yis ni sbar bya ste// yang dag go 'phang mchog yin no// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// sngags btu ba ni shes par bya// yang dag bstan dang rnam bral
215a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ glegs bam bklags tsam gyi sngags la// bskal pa bye ba brgya ru yang // dngos grub go 'phang 'byung mi 'gyur// tshes bcu yi ni dus dag la// sna tshogs me tog la sogs dang // bza' dang btung ba mnyam ldan pas//
215a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// sngags nyid rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs// rnal 'byor ma nyid sngags kyi gzugs// ci ste go 'phang mchog thob na// de dag dbye bar mi bya'o// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// srog ni yongs su
215a6(rgyud 'bum): gtong yang bla/ / 'chi bar mnyam par 'gro yang bla'i// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya// 'jig rten gsum po rgyu mi rgyu'i// 'gro kun g.yon las byung bas na// rnal 'byor ma rtag g.yon la sprod// rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du
215a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dor/ / lag pa g.yon gyis mchod par bya// g.yon pa yis ni tshim dang za// rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa// rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag/ kun rtog kun las rnam grol zhing // gnyis pa thams cad
215b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spangs/ / bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos// bla ma dge 'dun de bzhin te// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// de'i phyir sangs rgyas go 'phang ni// 'dod pas/
215b2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma mnyes par bya// 'di ni sngags btu ba'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas de phyir sbyin sreg gi/ las kyi khyad par rab bshad bya// sgrub pos rgyal srid
215b3(rgyud 'bum): ched du ni/ / sngags ni stong phrag bcu ru bzlas// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis// sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya// bsgrub bya'i ming dang rnam spel te// sha chen 'o mar sbyar ba yis// rnam rtog med pa'i sprin
215b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas/ / yongs rdzogs rgyal po nyid du 'gyur// ba lang mi dang ce spyang sha// chang dang 'o mar mnyam bsres pas// sreg blugs mchog ri sbyin byas te// rtag tu 'bum gcig sbyin sreg byas// grong khyer mchog ni
215b5(rgyud 'bum): thob 'gyur te/ / dpal ldan rgyal po chen por 'gyur// tsher ma'i me ni rab sngar la// dug khrag 'bru mar tsha ba dang // de bzhin sgra dang phub mar ldan// mi yi rus pas sbyin sreg bya// skra grol khros pa'i dbang gyur pas// lho
215b6(rgyud 'bum): / phyogs la bltas gcer bu 'am// sngags pa gos ni nag po gyon// drag po'i las la nyin byed dam// mtshan phyed na ste gdol pa'i mer// bsgrub bya'i ming dang sbyar ba'i sngags// nga ro drag pas brjod bya zhing // rtse gcig
215b7(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis sbyin sreg byas/ / dpung bcas stobs kyang rlag 'gyur na// gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos// de nas stobs kyis dregs pa yi// dgra bo bskrad pa bshad par bya// rlung gi phyogs su kha bltas te// sha
216a1(rgyud 'bum): za'i me ni rab sbyar la/ / khA yi gshog pa zhag nim pa// nir ya sa yi 'bru mar bsres// las ni mtshan mo bdun sbyar na// the tsom med par skrod par 'gyur// dbye ba'i las zhes grags pa ni/
216a2(rgyud 'bum): spro byed shing la me sbyar la// gsang sngags rig pas nim pa ni// lo ma sbrul gyi shun par bcas// khwa dang 'ug pa'i tshang bsres te// brgya rtsa brgyas ni sbyin sreg byas// 'jig rten thams cad 'byed 'gyur te// snying sdug
216a3(rgyud 'bum): skye bo'i gnyen gyis spong / / de nas dgug pa bshad par bya// li khri mtshungs pa'i 'od sgom ste// bsgrub bya gcer du rlung phyogs nas// steng bltas g.yo bor dmigs nas su// stan la rol pa'i gnas pas gnas// gseng
216a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags yi ge dza bzlas te/ / zhags pa lcags kyu rab sbyor bas// bsgrub bya'i snying gi pad+mar dbug/ skye gnas pad+ma dbug byas na// nges par khams gsum dbang du 'gyur// thod pa dum bu gcig pa 'am// ma chag
216a5(rgyud 'bum): sdug cing mdzes pa la/ / bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni rnam par bri// de nas bsgrub bya'i ming brjod de// da du ra yi shing nyid dang // ka ra bI ra khrag tu ni// yang dag sbyar bas sbyin sreg bya// gro ga la ni bsgrub bya'i gzugs//
216a6(rgyud 'bum): rang khrag gi wang bsres pas bri// bsgrub bya gos kyis g.yogs nas ni// gsang sngags bzla zhing sbyin sreg bya// sngags kyi nga ror bcas lus kyis// me tog re re rab bzung nas// nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg byas// gang
216a7(rgyud 'bum): zhig yid la 'dod pas 'gugs/ / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// tsan dan dmar po'i shing las ni// gzugs brnyan byas nas rang khrag dang // gi wang gis ni ming bris te// de bzhin bsgrub bya'i
216b1(rgyud 'bum): snying khar gzhug/ tsha ba gsum gyis lus la byug/ zangs ma'i khab kyis dbug bya ba// snying kha lte ba gsang ba ste// bsgrub bya'i gnas gsum du ni dbug/ gang zhig yid la 'dod pa de// mtshan
216b2(rgyud 'bum): byephyed na ni 'gugs par 'gyur/ / gser mdog can gyi btsag gis skye gnas kyi mtshan ma mngon par bris la/ de'i steng du lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya ste/ gang gi ming nas brjod de
216b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags bzlas na skad cig de nyid la 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'tshung mas khyer ba'i shing lo blangs pa khA'i sgro rtsa dang mchi mas bsgrub bya'i ming bris te/ gyen du langs pa'i 'tshub ma la bskur na/ de'i mod la spyod
216b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / spre'u'i rus pa la sor drug pa'i phur pa byas te/ sngags lan bdun mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs rgyud 'chad par 'gyur ro// ba lang dang / glang po dang / rta dang / bong
216b5(rgyud 'bum): bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he'i gnas rnams su sbas na de dag rlag par 'gyur ro// yi dgas kyi gos ma lhung ba blangs la mar khu chen po dang lhan cig zha nye'i snod du sbar te/ mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i khyad par la snying
216b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i sngags bzlas shing / mig sman dbab pa byas la mig la byugs pa des mkha' 'gro ma thams cad par 'gyur ro// oM b+hU ta li ge swA hA/ me dpal la byab pa'i sngags so// glang po che'i lci ba blangs te rus
216b7(rgyud 'bum): sbal gyi khog pa'i nang du bzhag la khyim du bdug par byin na/ 'dre shig la sogs pa rang nges par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// oM u da kaM ma sha kA dzA tA/ u da ka saM b+hA bA/ te ShAM duHsh+tsa pak+Sha sh+tsa/ i dro rje
217a1(rgyud 'bum): DA ti ma hA ba la/ ma sha ka i dra pA sha bai DA i dra ba shag tA gats+tshan+te/ sUr+ya o ta ya swA hA/ bzhi mdo'i rdo yi dum bu blangs// 'di yis lan ni nyi shu bzlas// phyogs bzhi ru ni gzhug
217a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sbrang bu mchu rings bzlog byas pas// yid can rnams ni bde bar 'gyur// bde bas chos ni thob 'gyur te// chos kyis kyang ni bla med 'gyur// 'di ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad
217a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // de nas de nyid ji bzhin don// sgom pa yang dag rab bshad bya// sgom pa dngos med rang bzhin te// dngos med spros dang bral ba yin// rang rig bdag nyid can gyi las//
217a4(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa'ang sgom du med pa'o// gcig dang du ma rnam bral 'di// skad cig de nyid rab tu skye// ye shes 'di ni rang rig pa// ngag gi spyod yul las 'das shing // kun mkhyen ye shes de yi dngos// rmad du
217a5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i rnam par skyes/ / srid pa thams cad dngos med mnyam// yangs shing gting dpag dka' ba ste// rgyu dang rnam par bral ba ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i snang brnyan tsam// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal
217a6(rgyud 'bum): brnam par spyad pa'i spyod yul 'das/ / kha na ma tho med cing zhi// nges par bskul du med pa ste// brjod du med cing bgrang du med// stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// sgra
217a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs yon tan kun rnam bral/ / sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan bral// gnyis pa las ni rnam grol ba// rnam pa kun tu cir yang gnas// dngos med dngos po la brten nas// brten pa med par dngos por
217b1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / yid med yid ni byas nas su// cung zad tsam yang mi bsam mo// stan la gnas nas bla ma yi// brgyud par brtan par byas nas ni// de bzhin mkha' dang mtshungs pa yi// ro gcig sem//
217b2(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgom par bya// bsam gtan gsum las rnam par grol// rtog ge'i sbyor ba rnam par spangs// sems byung sems su brtan gyur pa// 'gro la'ang rang bzhin tshul de bzhin// mkha' mtshungs
217b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' yang dag gnas/ / shel gyi nor bu dag pa bzhin// thog ma mtha' ma med pa'i gzugs// spros bral dbang po'i spyod yul min// 'gyur ba med cing snang ba med// thams cad stong pa nyon
217b4(rgyud 'bum): mongs med/ / 'gro ba'i sgron ma srid pa yi// 'ching ba 'joms shing tshig brjod bral// yid kyi'ang spyod yul ma yin te// gnyis las rnam grol nyon mongs med// don dam grol ba rab stsol ba'i// 'pho
217b5(rgyud 'bum): med de nyid la phyag 'tshal/ / ji ltar de nyid la reg na// bsam pa kun gyis bsam du med// gang tshe bsam du med sems pa// de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// sems can ji bzhin bsam med de//
217b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam med ji bzhin rgyal ba'ang de// gang phyir bsam bral sangs rgyas kyis// bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bshad// bsam gyis mi khyab sems de la// bsam pa kun gyis bgrod pas 'das// sna tshogs
217b7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rtog pa med/ / chags med bde ba chen po ste// rnam pa thams cad kyi ni mchog/ dbang po kun 'das rnam pa med// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de// dngos dang dngos med rnam
218a1(rgyud 'bum): par spangs/ / bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig/ mi shes rnam par mi mthong ngo // gzugs med gar yang mi gnas pa// 'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o// dngos po
218a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i chos rnams la/ / blang dang dor ba ga la zhig/ blang bya dang ni dor bya yi// chos kun rmi lam ji bzhin no// dga' ba yongs su shes pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dag
218a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa/ / 'di ni dngos med byang chub bo// gnyis por ro gcig dbyer med pa// dga' ba'i bde ba chen po nyid// shes rab snying rje'i dbye ba ni// sgron ma dang ni 'od zer
218a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / 'di gnyis mi phyed bdag nyid ni// ro gcig dngos po'i sems yin no// shes rab thabs ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed pa// de nyid la ni bla med pa'i// sangs
218a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun rnams rab tu bzhugs/ / dbyer med rnam par yang dag rig/ gang zhig gnas pa rdo rje sems// ji srid rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur// bde bas sdom par byas na ni// sgrub pa bde
218a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog rdzogs bar du/ / de srid de ni myong bar 'gyur// mdzes pa'i sgyu ma rnam 'phrul dag la de shes ji bzhin nyid// dga' dang skyo ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu spyad// 'jigs par
218a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'ang med cing bde ba 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin/ / de nyid kyis ni sgrub po de bzhin nyid bdag rjes su 'gro// e ma ho bde chen 'dod pa yis// sa gsum po ni gang po ste// e ma'o zhi
218b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bde ba 'bab/ / sna tshogs mngon par byang chub rgyas// e ma'o bde ba'i bde chen po// e ma'o ji ltar ji ltar bza'// e ma'o lhan skyes bdag nyid che// chos rnams kun gyi ngo
218b2(rgyud 'bum): bo nyid/ / 'gro ba chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong ba dang // thos pa brag cha dang ni mtshungs par yang dag 'jug/ sems kyang mya ngan smig rgyu lta bur blta bya zhing // 'di ltar bza' dang btung ba nam
218b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lta bu ste/ / dri ni nam mkha' me tog mtshungs par mnam pa dang // yid ni nyi ma zla ba bzhin du khyab par bya// yang dag gnas nga'ang ri rab dang ni mtshungs pa yin// gzhon nu ma yi rmi lam
218b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dmigs par bya/ / tha snyad dag ni sgyu ma mig 'phrul lta bur bgrod// 'di dag ji bzhin lhan skyes pa de 'byung de bzhin te// srid pa rang bzhin bral zhing bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs// rtag
218b5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'char ba bde gshegs lam mchog phyag 'tshal bstod/ / mchod pa thams cad yongs spangs te// bla ma mchod par yang dag brtsam// de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i// ye shes mchog ni thob
218b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na// de yis bsod nams ma byas ci// dka' thub ma bsten ci zhig yod// 'jigs dang sdig ma spangs pa dang //
218b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sangs rgyas bde 'byung ngo // byang chub gnas ni dpe med pa// gang zhig 'gro la rnam gnas pa// la lar ngas ni ma bshad do// so sor mnyam pa'i de nyid ni// rgyal ba yis ni gsungs pa yin// /
219a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i rnam pa las 'das gsal bar rig cing skal ba bzang // sna tshogs nam mkha'i dkyil khyab ro ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i stobs// thams cad sems kyi nang son sna
219a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnam pa'i gzugs 'phro ba/ / 'jig rten gsum bor nam mkha' thim ltar yid la snang bar 'gyur// rnam kun gcig pa'i bde mchog gi/ rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod// rnam kun
219a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog ldan mtshan nyid kyis/ / de nyid dkyil 'khor shes par bya// rtsa kun mkha' 'gro ma rnams te// skye mched yan lag dkyil 'khor yin// thams cad ro gcig thob pa yis// he ru ka dpal
219a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin rgyas/ / snang ba med cing thogs pa med// gnas med lus la med pa ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin phyir// dngos po kun la rtag tu gnas// rnal ma nyid du shes bya ste// gang la sgom
219a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang rnal ma nyid/ / ngo bo nyid kyis dga' byas pas// 'di ni rang byung 'char ba'o// de bas bsam mi khyab bsam pas// sna tshogs gcig tu shes par bya// gang la dngos po dngos med kyi// bye
219a6(rgyud 'bum): brag rnam spangs bdag nyid ni/ / dga' ba'i bdag nyid brtan gsal bas// nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab par ni// bdag nyid chen pos rtogs par bya// rnam pa sna tshogs dri med pa'i// dkyil
219a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dag ni 'phro bar snang / / lhan cig skyes dka' ba ni pa'i ming // bde ba kun gyi gnas de yin// yang dag de nyid rig pa la// 'dir ni thabs med shes rab med// sgrub pos dkyil/
219b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus su ni// gos med mya ngan 'das pa'o// mdzes pa'i yon tan legs thob pa// ye shes ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// de nas bla ma'i skye bo la gus sangs rgyas dang ni mnyam blta
219b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing / rgyal ba'i chos ni shin tu rtogs shing brtan la legs par rab dang ba// de 'dir snod du gyur pa yin phyir de la bka' drin smin par bya// de nas gzugs sogs dbyer med cing // khams
219b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum gcig tu shes pas na/ / rgyun mi 'chad par sgrub po des// dga' bas kyang ni mchod bya ba// ji srid byang chub tshogs ldan pa// de srid dri ma med nyid 'gyur// sgrub po thabs dang shes
219b4(rgyud 'bum): rab dag/ bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// 'di ni de kho na nyid bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bye ba// ri mo'i lha yi
219b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rnams kyi/ / sku yi tshad kyi mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba pa yi bdag po nyon// tshangs pa'i ri mo sogs gzugs kyi// cha lnga yang ni gdan yin no// dum bu gsum can sku lus kyis// cha
219b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pas ni zhal byas te/ / zhal ni bcu gnyis cha yin no// mgrin pa sor ni bzhi pa ste// mkhas pas skra mtshams dbu dang ni// snyan gnyis la'ang de nyid sbyar// dpral ba zhal dang shangs
219b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshad/ / cha gsum zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ro// smin ma'i dbus dang zhal gyi steng // spun gyi zheng yang sor gnyis so// de dag dkyus ni sor bzhi yi// tshad nyid du ni shes par bya// mgrin par
220a1(rgyud 'bum): d+hU ba'i dbus kyi tshad/ / dpung ba gnyis kyi 'angs yin no// thams cad du ni thugs ka dang // lte ba'i gnas kyi tshad gcig go/ nu ma'i bar gyi tshad kyis ni// num dpung ba'i bar
220a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshad/ / rag dang gnyis kyi tshad kyis ni// dpung pa gnyis kyi'ang tshad de nyid// 'dra dang byin pa'i mtshams su ni// song bzhi pa dang yang dag ldan// bras mo'i ljang sor bzhi'i chad// zhabs kyi ngom
220a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi'ang de nyid do/ / cha ni bcu gnyis tshad kyis ni// lha yi sku gzugs bri bar bya// lhag ma sor ni bzhi pa ste// gdan ni gtso bo'i brgyad cha yin// gdan gyi dgu cha nyid kyis ni// sor ni gnyis gnyis
220a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ste/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snying por ni// phyag mtshan na bza' la sogs bya// zab mo rdo rje can gyi lha// tsa mi bcu gnyis mtshan nyid do// dman pa'i cha sogs cha rnams ni// nye bar mdzes
220a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin legs par bri/ / der yang zhal gyi tshang mtshungs pa'i// phyag gnyis cung zad bri bar bya// sor gnyis dor ba byas nas ni// zhi ba'i lha ni bri bar bya// de yang zhal ni mtho gang tshad// byas
220a6(rgyud 'bum): tephyag ni rtag mdzes bri/ / yan laganyid mag thams cad la// sor mi gnyis gnyis dor bar bya// khro bo khro mo'i dbang phyug ma// bran po zan mo ci bgyid ma// drag cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs
220a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / cha bcu par ni rnam par bri// yid du 'ong ba'i rang gzugs ni// cha dgu par mi mngon par bri// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lha rnams ni// rim bzhin rim gyis sbyar bar bya//
220b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus kyi rdo rje rgyal po ni// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par bri// kos sgo mgrin pa byin pa rnams// gsum po ring na skyon chen po// sngags pa rang nyid nges par ni// gnas las nyams shing bskrad
220b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / shangs dang snyan dang phyag sor rnams// gsum po thung na skyon chen po// dngos grub nges par 'joms pa dang // de bzhin dpal yang nyams par 'gyur// byin pa zhal dang mkhur
220b3(rgyud 'bum): chos te/ / gsum po sbom pa skyon chen po// sgrub po bdag nyid nges par yang // dpal las ring zhing bdud bgegs 'byung // 'gram pa brang dang rtsibs logs te// gsum po nom na skyon chen
220b4(rgyud 'bum): po/ don ni nyams par 'gyur ba dang // 'dir ni bgegs 'byung the tsom med// nu ma snyan dang dpral ba rnams// gsum po yo na skyon chen po// sgrub pa po nyid myur bar ni// dgra yi rtsod pas
220b5(rgyud 'bum): gdung bar 'gyur/ / brla dang dku dang nam tshong gnyis// gsum po nyams na skyon chen po// chom rkun rnams kyis 'jigs pa dang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// snyan dang mchu dang dpral ba dang /
220b6(rgyud 'bum): shangs nyams spyan ni yo myur na// sngags pa bdag nyid nges par yang // sna tshogs bgegs 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur// gyen du gzigs shing dbugs bskyod tshul// gdan las yo zhing bskyod lta bus
220b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gnas las rtag 'pho zhing / / don rnams 'joms pa nyid du 'gyur// mgrin pa nam tshong la sogs sku'i// skyon ni grangs med zhig tu grags// 'dir ni spyan tshogs yo ba 'am// phyag rgya
221a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag mtshan nor gyur na/ / mya ngan sdug bsngal gyis rab gdung // sna tshogs skyon sogs brtag par bya// rgyab yol gdugs dang gdan rnams te// gsum po chung zhing dog/
221a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skyon// mdza' bos mi snyan brjod pa dang // dpal nyams 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// skyon ni 'di dag skyon chen pos// mkhas pas legs par blta bar bya// dul zhing bzo rnams kun shes la//
221a3(rgyud 'bum): / cho ga mthong zhing mnyam gzhag pas// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // gzugs mdzes pas ni bri bar bya// zhi la zhi ba'i tshul gyi sku// drag la drag cing 'jigs byed pa// dpa'
221a4(rgyud 'bum): la dpa' zhing nga rgyal sku/ / sgeg pa la ni bzhad pa'i zhal// mtshan nyid 'di ltar mtshon nas ni// sngags pa rnams kyis bris sku bri// sngags pa las ni dang po pas// gzugs brnyan la
221a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs bya ba ste/ / bris sku bsgrubs na myur bar ni// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// 'di ni ro mo la sogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu pa'o//
221a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid// dge ba yang dag rab bshad bya// mkha' 'gro ma ni pad+ma ni// lA ma has+t+ri ni nyid 'gyur// khaN+Da ro ha shang ki nI// gzugs can
221a7(rgyud 'bum): tri ni nyid 'gyur/ / rigs ni bzhi po rang dngos su// mkhas pa yis ni brtag par bya// pad+ma ni yi mtshan nyid bshad// bzhin ni dkyil 'khor lta bu ste// sna ni til gyi me tog mtshungs//
221b1(rgyud 'bum): sen mo zangs 'dra rus sbal rgyab// rkang pa'i mthil ni mnyam par gnas// nu ma ta la'i 'bras bu bzhin// de bzhin pa spu 'khyil ba dang // khrem gnyer gsum can skye gnas mchog/ de
221b2(rgyud 'bum): yi brang yang shin tu mdzes/ / glang chen myos pa lta bu'i 'gros// pad+ma'i dri ldan ngang pa'i dbyangs// reg bya pad+ma lta bu ste// pad+ma'i bcing ba 'dod bsten bya// skra dang nu ma nas bzung nas// mchu ni
221b3(rgyud 'bum): so yis btsir bar bya/ / b+ha gar sor mo gzhug de ltar// pad+ma la ni 'dod par bya// de nas hasti ni'i mtshan nyid// de bzhin yang dag bshad par bya// chang gi dri can byin pa sbom// sna yon pa spu
221b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil ba yang / / 'dod pas myos shing sred pa dang // lus ni sbom zhing mi bsrun pa// u ra s+pho ta'i bcing ba yis// de la rol par bya ba ste// ril bu'i rnam pa hasti ni// mgor ni sor mos bsnun
221b5(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / drag tu 'khyud cing nu ma mnye// kha la reg cing sos gdab bya// mkhas pas sen mos drang bar bya// bzhad kyi nga ro hasti ni// glu dang rol mor mngon par dga'// mtshan nyid 'di dag yang
221b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag ldan/ / hasti nir ni shes par bya// shang ki ni yang bshad bya ste// sgra ring sna yang ring ba ste// ha cang skem min sbom pa min// nu ma na rang ka'i 'bras mtshungs// zho dang 'o ma'i ston mor dga'//
221b7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon pas sgra nas ni// bzung bas dga' ba bskyed bya zhing // so yis mchu ni btsir bar bya// shin tu dga' bas drag par ni// gzhi ba dang snying kar sen mos brud// bong bu yi ni dri ldan dang //
222a1(rgyud 'bum): ba lang lce ltar rtsub pa ste// bya rog sgra can shang ki ni// mtshan nyid 'di dag yang dag ldan// rtag tu shang ki ni zhes bshad// de nas tsi tri ni yang bshad// lus thung de yi brang
222a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams mdzes/ / nu ma dpal 'bras lta bu ste// shin tu khro zhing ngo tsha spangs// rtag tu rtsod pa la dga' zhing // byin pa phra zhing gang kyal nyal// mchu 'phyangs phug ron gyi ni skad// sha yi dri dang
222a3(rgyud 'bum): / ldan pa dang // dpung pa rgyas pa tsi tri ni// dga' bas rol pa bshad bya ste// thog mar lag pas b+ha ga btsir// 'o bya nu ma mnye ba dang // mgo la sor mos bsnun bya zhing // lus ni bskum pas
222a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / / drag pa nyid du 'khyud par bya// mchu ni 'jib tu gzhug par bya// sdeb sbyor tshigs bcad las bshad pa'i// mtshan nyid 'di dag yang dag ldan// tsi tri ni ti gzugs can
222a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nas gzhan yang 'pho ba yi// dbye ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag bshad// phyi yi 'pho ba rags pa ste// nang gi bdag nyid phra bar bshad// spyi bor bde chen 'khor lo ste// pad+ma 'dab ma
222a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa ni/ / phra ba byang chub sems kyi gnas// thams cad rten pa'i gzugs yin pas// byang chub snying po'i ngo bo nyid// sa bon gyur pa'i pha rol tu// pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu gnyis// de yi
222a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus kyi yi ke ha/ / 'og tu bltas pas bde ba 'dzag/ byang chub sems bdag zla ba ni// cha ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu bde ba chen por 'bab// rnal 'byor ma ni che bcu drug
222b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi logs ni gnyis po ru/ / la la nA dang ra sa nA// A li kA li rang gi dngos// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis// dga' ba bzhi yi gzugs can ma// lhan cig skyes dgra'i rang
222b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dang / / gnyis med mchog gi dbang phyug ma// kun rdzob kun da lta bu ste// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can ma// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// rten de rdo rje 'dzin pa'o//
222b3(rgyud 'bum): mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo ste// dmar po 'dab ma bcu drug pa// de yi dbus su yi ge oM// de yi steng gi lce'u chung gi/ bu ga'i lam nas bdud rtsi ni// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab
222b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / snying kar chos kyi 'khor lo ste// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de yi dbus su yi ge hUM// 'og tu bltas pas gnas pa ste// de'i steng phra ba'i pad+ma ni// tshangs pa'i gnas
222b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam pa 'dra/ / de yi dbus kyi rnam shes ni// rtag tu 'char ba thams cad khyab// rang byung ye shes kyi ni rten// rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug go/ lte bar pad+ma mdog sngon po// 'dab ma
222b6(rgyud 'bum): drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/ / de yi dbus kyi yi ge aM// nor bu bzhin du 'bar ba yin// de 'og phra ba'i pad+ma ni// mdud pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi// brten dang
222b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bar brjod pa yin/ / shes rab rang bzhin la la nA// thabs ni ra sa nA ru gnas// de dag dbus su son lha mo// aM yig sna tshogs gzugs can ma// lha mo sku bzhi'i bdag nyid can//
223a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma// kun la bde chen rab stsol la// rtag tu yang dag bdag phyag 'tshal// dngos po gang dang gang gis ni// mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/
223a2(rgyud 'bum): des de'i bdag nyid 'gyur lha mo// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// shes rab me yis bskyod pas yul gyi dngos po rnam par dpyad na rgyun dang bral// gtum mo 'bar zhing rnam par 'phro bas
223a3(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med nyid yang dag rig cing gsal/ / phung po'i rnam par rtag pa bsregs shing dmigs pa med pa'i rang rig 'dzag pa dang // dngos po thams cad mnyam nyid bdud rtsi nam mkha' khyab cing yang
223a4(rgyud 'bum): dag go 'phang ldan/ / de nas gzhan yang thig le'i gzugs// 'pho ba yang dag bshad par bya// yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// ji srid nyi ma'i bar du ste// yang ngo yi ni tshes gcig la//
223a5(rgyud 'bum): / rkang pa'i sor mo yi ge a// tshes gnyis byin par yi ge A// tshes gsum baR+Ya la yi ge i// bzhi pa skyed gnas yi ge I// lnga pa lte bar yi ge u// drug pa snying kha ra yi ge U// bdun pa
223a6(rgyud 'bum): nu mar yi ge raM/ / brgyad pa mgrin par yi ge rAM// dgu pa lag mthil yi ge l-i// bcu pa mkhur tshos yi ge l-I// bcu gcig mig tu yi ge e// bcu gnyis sna rtser yi ge ai// bcu gsum
223a7(rgyud 'bum): dpral bar yi ge oM/ / bcu bzhi 'tshogs mar yi ge oM// nya la spyi gtsug g.yas g.yon du// yi ge aM aHngo bo nyid// mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung ste// ji srid gnam stong gi ni bar// de nyid
223b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni 'pho bar 'gyur/ / g.yon par A li zla ba ste// phra ba yi ni rang bzhin nyid// g.yas par kA li nyi ma ste// rags pa yi ni rang bzhin no// byang chub sems bdag dbye ba yis// de bzhin 'pho
223b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bcu drug yin/ / thun phyed kun spyod dbye ba yis// 'pho ba bcu drug dag tu bshad// zla ba 'dzin dang nyi ma 'dzin// thig le 'gog dang nam mkha' 'gog/ 'di dag dang ni yang dag ldan// 'pho
223b3(rgyud 'bum): ba bcu drug shes par bya/ / rnam par mi rtog bde ba che// mngon 'dor ye shes kyi ni gzugs// 'di ni dga' zhing bde ba'i khyim// sgo'i them skas dang mtshungs pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma bzhi
223b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khor lo bzhi yi rim pa dang // byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste so gcig pa'o// // de nas gtor ma'i de nyid ni// ji bzhin gsal bar
223b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bshad/ / dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bzlas pa dang // rab gnas dang ni ni rgyas dang // dbang dang bskrad dang gsad pa dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin mo sgrub dang // gnas kyi sgrub pa'i dus rab ste//
223b6(rgyud 'bum): las rnams kun la mchog yin no// chang dang gtor ma med par ni// las rnams myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// des na gtor ma rab bsngags te// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// dang por ba
223b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog phyag gnyis pa'i/ / lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// srung ba gnyis kyis yang dag bsrungs// hUM ki sgra ni bsgrags par bya// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas kyis ni// lus kyi yan lag brgyar par bya/
224a1(rgyud 'bum): skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod// dang por re zhig bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / ston mo la sogs pa mdun du yang dag par bzhag pa
224a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sbyang bar bya ste/ de la mdun du yi ge yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor/ der yi ge a dkar po las byung ba'i pad+ma'i snod thor pa gsum gyi skyed
224a3(rgyud 'bum): bu la gnas pa/ de'i dbus kyi bza' ba la sogs pa rnams la/ oM aM traM khaM hUM lAM mAM pAM tAM bAM gyi yi ge las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang / sgron ma lnga'i gzugs rdzogs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rlung gis bskyod
224a4(rgyud 'bum): pas me rab tu sbar te bskol bas sa bon gyi yi ge la sogs pa zhu ste/ nyi ma shar ka lta bu'i bcud kyi gzugs su bltas la/ de'i steng du dngul chu'i mdog can gyi hUM las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga dkar po bdud rtsi'i
224a5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin can thur du bltas pa rnam par zhu bar bsams te/ de bcud kyi rang bzhin du ro gcig par gyur par bltas la/ A li kA li yongs su gyur pa las oM AHhUM gi yi ge brtse ge mar yongs su gnas
224a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ de dag las dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lha rnams spros la 'gro ba'i don byas te/ mnyam par sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas zhu bar gyur cing ji lta ba'i sa bon la rab tu bcug ste/ yi ge gsum ci 'dod par
224a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / mdzub mo mdur byas gung mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong rdo rje brtan par rab tu sbyar// de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas// bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor
224b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / rkang pa mnan cing steng du bzla// gyen du phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs// de nas yang lag pa g.yas pa
224b2(rgyud 'bum): dang g.yon pa bskor ba byas te/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ha sa ma ya hoH/ zhes pa lan gsum brjod cing / g.yas dang g.yon du bskor zhing bskor bas/ mchod bya dang mchod byed kyi dbye ba med cing shin tu
224b3(rgyud 'bum): grol ba sngon du 'gro ba yis/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i bde ba'i dam pas lha rnams la mchod par byas te/ shar du in+d+ra sa pa ri bA raM A ka rA ya dzaHlhor/ ya ma sa pa ri bA raM A ka rA ya dzaHnub tu ba ru
224b4(rgyud 'bum): Na sa pa ri bA ra A ka rA ya dzaHbyang du ku be ra sa ba ri bA raM A kaR+Sha ya dzaHdbang ldan du/ ma hA b+hU ta sa ba ri bA raM A ka rA ye dzaHmer ag+ni sa pa ri bA raM A ka rA ya dzaHbden bral du/ rak+Sha sa sa pa ri bA raM a
224b5(rgyud 'bum): kaR+Sha ya dzaHrlung dubA yu sa pa ri bA raM A ka rA ya dzaHsteng du/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya brah+ma Ar+d+haM de ba tA sa pa ri bA raM A kaR+Sha ya dzaHsa 'og tu/ de ma tsi tri thi thi bI de ba trA sa pa ri bA ra A ka rA ya dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHsa tr-i b+ha sarba de nga
224b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dug sa nas/ swe ga na/ nAr+b+yA tra bid+hAn+d+ha pa ti/ ang su She sa/ oM ka ra ka pa/ sa ru ku ru/ r+thA sa/ d+hU ba stA d+has pa/ k+Sho b+hA pats+tshed+ha ya/ r-idz+dza/ sa / s+yA bsadA twA daH/ bats+tsha ban+d+ha/
224b7(rgyud 'bum): b+hak+Sha/ ba sar d+hi ra a tra mA lwa ba ma bi ne kr-ih+Na kr-ih+Na sap+na pA tA la ka ta b+hu dza ga sarba bA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ A kar+N+Na A kaMD+D+h+ya/ dzAM trAM/ dz+r-I d+h+r-i/ k+ShAk+Sha/ hU~M tra~M/ hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi yi/ chu
225a1(rgyud 'bum): sU laT/ ces bya ba 'di lan cig brjod pas bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa nas/ gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug pa rim bzhin du bskor/
225a2(rgyud 'bum): ba byas te/ oM A ral+li sau dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+rA DA ki ni sa ma ya stA dr-i sh+ya hoHzhes bya ba 'dis lan gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lngar brjod de dbul bar bya'o// de nas nye reb dang so rtsi la
225a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa phyag tu phul la pad+ma'i lag bskor sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod de bstod nas/ srid dang zhi ba mnyam pas chags pa bcom zhing yang dag rtog pa 'joms// khyed kyis dngos po thams cad ma
225a4(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan/ / mgon po thugs rje'i chu yi ljid kyis brlan par gyur pa'i thugs kyi chus// bdag la mdzod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol// zhes bya
225a5(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dis dngos grub bslang bar bya'o/ / de nas dur khrod brgyad kyi phyogs skyong la sogs pa rnams la sngon bzhin bskor bar byas te/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ b+hU ta/ pre ta/ bi sha tsa/ un+ma da
225a6(rgyud 'bum): a basmA ra/ nA ka DA ki nu da yaHi maM ba liM gr-id+hA tu/ sa ma ya rak+ShaM tu/ sarba sid+d+hismai pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya thai baM/ ya thaiSh+Ta/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba tha/ dzi g+hA tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba kar+yaM sata su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa ha yi kaM
225a7(rgyud 'bum): b+haM baM tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rkang pa brgyad kyi sngags kyis yang dag par bstod la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub bslang bar bya zhing brda'i lag pas brda bstan par bya ste/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga
225b1(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+hohaM/ zhes bya ba brjod cing / pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya'o// nye bar bsdu ba'i phyag rgya mi phyer par 'khyud pa sngon du 'gro bas mthe bong dang srin lag se gol brdad par bya ste/ oM
225b2(rgyud 'bum): khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ / rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // ji ltar bde bar bzhugs su gsol// oM badz+ra muHzhes brjod pas gshegs
225b3(rgyud 'bum): su gsol bar bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams thams cad bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o// de'i rjes la lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus pas dam tshig bsgrub pa bstan par bya ste/ kha ni myos byed kyis bkang
225b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// hUM ki sgra ni drag po yis// lhag ma'i snod du sbyin par bya// me tog spos la sogs byin pas// mnyes byas sngags ni brjod par bya// oM sarba kha kha khA hi khA hi/ uts+tshiH
225b5(rgyud 'bum): ba li/ uts+tshiSh+Na b+hak+She b+h+ya swA hA/ snying rje la sogs nyams ldan pas// de bzhin bkra shis klu srang bya// rnam kun don ni yongs dag cing // rnam pa med pa'i bde ba che// sgrub po shes rab thabs bdag nyid// las rnams
225b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / 'byor na nyi ma re re'am// de bzhin zla ba'am lo rer ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gzugs// de bzhin nyid du yongs su bsngo// sbyin pa la sogs thams cad kyis ni 'gro ba yid kyis
225b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa mchog ni kun rdzogs mdzad/ / he ru ka dpal mkha' 'amo ma sogs rnam rtog kati mug grong khyer thams cad bye mar bcag/ gang zhig 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i tha ma rgyam ba'i ye shes 'byung gnas ma
226a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mdzad/ / de mi nying rje chen pa'i dbang gyur 'phags pa rnams kyi rtag tu sbyar bar bab shes yin// 'di ni gtor ma mchod pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste mo gnyis par/
226a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas ye shes 'byung ba yi// dngos grub sdom pa bshad par bya// sna tshogs tshul gyi thabs rnams ni// dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu yi mchog/ phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i lus// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma
226a3(rgyud 'bum): med/ / 'di ltar bdag nyid mkha' mtshungs par// rtag tu grol ba'i bdag nyid mthong // lus med thog ma tha ma med// bden pa dang ni ldan pa nyid// dam tshig spyod pa srung byed pa// de la rim pa rab bstan
226a4(rgyud 'bum): byahe ru ka dpal mngon brjod rgyud/ / klog gam 'chang ngam bris pas ni// dngos grub rdzu 'phrul skal bzang dang // byang chub sems dpa' yang thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//
226a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// 'byung ba'i rgyud la ni// gang tshe sgom zhing sems byed na// longs spyod che zhing bde ba che// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// spyod
226a6(rgyud 'bum): pab sna tshogs ston mdzad de/ / sna tshogs tshul gyis 'dul ba la// thabs kyang yang dag bstan pa yin// zab mo'i chos ni bstan pa la// gang zhig mos par ma gyur kyang // smad pa dag tu yi bya ste// stong
226a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid snying rje mi phyed pa'i/ / chos nyid thams cad bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs brten pa'i// he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor// sems can mos pas
226b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa rnams/ / de dag kun la dka' ba ste// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas// 'di ni rim par phye ba ste so gsum pa'o// / dpal/
226b2(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las/ lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal sdom pa 'brub
226b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ / // shes rab dman zhing spungs pa chung mod kyi// rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas// rang don tsam du bsgyur ba gang lags pa//
226b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa mdzod// rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba rgyus pan de smon lam grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
226b5(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka ang b+hu ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
226b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba ni// gang zhig mis ni yang dag rig/ sgrub po dngos grub thob par 'gyur// tshes grangs med cing skar ma'ang med// bsnyung ba med par brjod bya ste/
226b7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa dang ni mi gtsang med// mi smra chu yi bya ba med// dus dang tshod las rnam par grol// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// de yis grong pa'i chos mi spyad// rtsod ldan dus su dngos grub 'gyur// rdzogs
227a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan yon tan gcig 'grub ste/ / de bzhin gsum ldan yon tan gnyis// gnyis ldan yon tan gsum du gsungs// cor ldan yon tan bzhi nyid de// dngos grub nyid du the tshom med//
227a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ 'jug pa'i cho ka'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// / de nas gzhan ni rab bshad bya// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste// dpal ldan khrag
227a3(rgyud 'bum): 'thung rgyud chen du/ / 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// sa yi cha bsnyams yid 'ong bar// dri yi chu yis nyer byugs te// sna tshogs spos ni yid 'ong dang // me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram// gtsang
227a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ / sngags shes pas ni bsrung bar bya// phyogs ni bcing bar bya ba'o// de ltar cho ga yang dag ldan// mkhas pas dgod bya dgod par bya// sems ni shin tu dga' ba yis//
227a5(rgyud 'bum): / kun nas kun tu cho ga bsam// bud med phyag rgya ge sar bcas// dang po tsheg drag rjes dbyangs dang // ring dang thung bar rab tu grags// gru gsum gnyis ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin maM ni bzhi po dang // bur
227a6(rgyud 'bum): med skyes bu rnam pa bzhi/ / de bzhin gnyis pa dang po'i dbyangs// ring dang thung bar shes bya ste// dbyangs kyi phyi mo dgod par bya// dbyangs kyi sde ni dang por dgod// lce rtsa'i dbyangs ni gnyis par dgod//
227a7(rgyud 'bum): tsheg drag dbyangs ni gsum par ro// dbus su pad+ma bzhi par ro// lnga pa ta yi sde tshan te// drug pa pa yi sde tshan yin// an+tas+tha ni bdun par 'dod// dro ba'i yi ge brgyad pa ste// mtha' ma ru ni bsdus pa

228b1(rgyud 'bum): ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya tra sa ya/ k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hrIM hr-iHdrA hAHpaM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi ra an+d+ra mA lA ba la bi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM bA Shadz+dza/
228b2(rgyud 'bum): ya tar+dz+dza ya/ A kar+N+Na A kaD+D+h+ya/ hrIM tAM/ dz+r-I dz+nyok+Sh+mAM d+hA/ u0f7ftAM/ hau ti/ hUM hUM/ kaM li ki li/ si li se li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ huM hUM phaT/ oM gyi yi ge dang po ste// hUM phaT yi ge tha mar sbyar// rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu g

228b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / bzhi pa'i dang por brjod par bya// dang po yi ni tshig rkang ste// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu ster// gcig ma tshang ba'i nyi shu la// me yi bus ni dbye bar bya// dbyangs yig gsum par yang dag ldam
229a1(rgyud 'bum): dang po ru ni yongs su grags/ / drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la// lnga pa'i lnga pa yang dag ldan// lan gnyis su ni yongs su grags// drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la// bco lnga pa yis brgyan byas te//

229b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing mchog tu phan pa yin/ / yi ge bco lnga pa'i mtshan nyid// dbyangs yig gsum par ldan byas te// lnga pa yi ni lnga pas ni// 'og gi cha ru yang dag ldan// de bzhin yi ge bcu drug nyid// steng du nA ngas sbyar ba

231a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnyis pas ldan byas te/ / me yi bus ni rnam par dbye// lnga pa'i bzhi pas sbyar bar bya// bdun cu rtsa bdun yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan pa yin// bdun cu rtsa brgyad mal

232b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor gnyis med de// de la mi yis mchod par bya// dpa' bo'i sngags kyis yid sgrub pa'o// oM na mo b+ha ga ba tI badz+ra bA rA hi/ Ar+yA pa rA dza~M te/ trai lo kya mA te ma sA bi d+ye shwa ri/
232b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba b+hU ta b+ha yA ba he/ ma hA badz+re/ badz+ra A sa ni a dzi te a pa ra dzi te ba sh+yaM ka ri ne tra b+h+ra ma Ni/ sho Sha ni ro Sha ni/ kr-i d+ha ni ka ra li ni/ trA sa ni mA ra Ni pra b+he da ni a pa ra dza ye bi dza ye dza b+ha naM/ staM b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/
233a1(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra bA rA Ni/ ma hA yo gi ni kA me shA ri kha ke/ tad+ya thA/ pro taM ge pro taM ke/ ha na ha na/ prA NAM ki ki Ni khi khi Ni d+hu na d+hu na/ badz+ra haste sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la d+hA ri Ni/ ma hA u0f7f s
233a2(rgyud 'bum): i ta mAM sA sha ni mA nu Sh+yan+na pra brit+te san+ni d+hu ra ra shi ro mA lA thaM thi ta d+hA ri Ni/ suM b+ha ni su b+ha ha na ha na/ prA NAM sarba pA pa satwA nAM sarba pa shU nI/ ma hA mAM sats+tshe da ni kro d+ha muni daMSh+Ta ka rA li ni/ ma hA mu dre shri he ru ka de
233a3(rgyud 'bum): ba s+ya/ a gra ma hi Shi sa ha sra shi re sa ha sra bA ha be sha ta sa ha sra A na ne/ dz+wa li ta te dza se dzA la mu khi bi ga la lo tse ni/ badz+ra sha rI re badz+ra A saM ne/ mi li te ni mi li te he he ha ha hAM hUM kha khe d+hu d+hu/ ru ru/
233a4(rgyud 'bum): d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ a dwe te/ ma hA yo gi ni pa dzi ta/ sin+ni dro d+ha dr-i d+haM/ gr-i gr-i/ he he/ ha ha/ b+hI me ha sa hA sa bI re hA hA/ ho ho/ d+hu hUM/ trai lokya bi nA sha ni/ sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti/ ta thA gau ta pa ri bA ri te hUM
233a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ si ha rU pe kha/ ga dza ru pe ga/ trai lakyaM u da re/ sa mu dra/ me kha le gra sa gra sa hUM hUM pheMT/ bI ra dwai te hUM hUM ha ha ma hA pa shu mo ha ni/ yo gI shwa ri tAM DA ki nI/ lo kA nAM ban+d+ha ni sa d+yaHpra t+ya ya kA ra Ni hUM phaT/
233a6(rgyud 'bum): / b+hU ta trA sa ni/ ma hA bI re pa ra ma sid+d+he/ yo gI shwa ri phaT/ hUM hUM phaT hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba yas/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags su gsungs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba
233a7(rgyud 'bum): ste brgyad pa'o/ / de nas rdo rje phag mo yaM// rtsa ba'i sngags ni mchog grub pa// he ru ka dang phag mo ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dang 'dra ba'i gsang sngags
233b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'jig rten gsum na med pa ste// 'bum dang 'bum phrag gsum du gsungs// rgyud kyi snying po mtha' dag bsdus// gang gis cho ga 'di rnams rig/ thams cad gtong ba lo ma bzhin// bdag gis
233b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi ru ma bzlas kyang / / las rnams kun ni 'grub pa'o// nyon mongs kun las nges par grol// dngos grub 'bras bu myur du thob// shes shing dran pa tsam gyis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster//
233b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun la khyab pa de nyid rnyed// de ni lus kun la ni gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te// dpal ldan he ru ka yis gsungs//
233b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di dag ni yang dag byung // gang zhig la lar rab tu gnas// bstan bcos mtha' dag sa steng du// grub mtha' nges pa yang dag gnas// 'di ni shes pas 'grub pa ste// sngags rnams kun
233b5(rgyud 'bum): ni the tsom med/ / 'jig rten 'odi dang pha rol tu// de med par yang dngos grub med// grub mtha' rig byed mtha' dag ni// snying po gcig tu rab grags pa// bdag nyid kyis ni grub par 'gyur// rnam
233b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor bdag nyid gnyis med zlos/ / dngos grub thams cad the tsom med// las rnams kun gyis gos med de// rab 'phel kun tu gtse bar 'gyur// lus rnams kun la rnam par gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'ju/
233b7(rgyud 'bum): ra shes bya// rigs rnams kun la kun tu spyad// kha bas la ni brtag mi bya// 'di ni don dam ye shes te// 'di ni go ba'ang mchog yin no// sngags rnams snying po 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun la ster
234a1(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi thams cad dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// // de nas
234a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di thob pa yis/ / rang 'dod dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// rdo rje phag mo ma de gzhag/ rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya// rang byung rdul ni dmar po yis// yul nas rnyed pa'i ras gtub cing // byi la yi ni
234a3(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa nyid/ / dngos grub 'dod pas yongs su bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis rlob// spos bzang 'di ni sngags rig go/ rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya yis// thod pa kha sbar bcing bar bya// skra yi sprin
234a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg brjod pa ste/ / 'di ltar ma rtogs mnyam bshad pa'i// dam tshig rab tu bskyang bar bya// rtag tu phyag rgya mchod bya ste// rtag tu bza' btung bya ba yin// 'di ltar sngags zhes bya ba yin// dngos grub
234a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu ster/ / chang dang ba lang sha bskos te// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya// lha rnams kun dang skar ma dang // klu sogs sum cu rtsa gsum gnas// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur ro//
234a6(rgyud 'bum): phra mo rnams la smos ci dgos// lce yi dri ma so shing dang // de bzhin rang lus dril phyis dang // mi dang a la ka ta dag/ sbyin sreg dag ni byas pa yis// 'jig rten gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// rngub
234a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rang byung dmar po dang / / kha zas skyugs pa'i bza' ba dang // mi yi skra dang yang dag ldan// lan cig gis ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/ rang lugs mar ni skyugs pa dang // rang gi sgra yis sprin sreg bya//
234b1(rgyud 'bum): nim pa'i shing gis me sbar bas// lan cig gis ni sdang ba'i mchog/ bya rog sgo yis sbyin sreg bya// smyo byed ma la mnyam bzhag pas// tsha ba'i mar khus yang dag ldan// skad cig tsam gyis gsar
234b2(rgyud 'bum): dang bskrad/ / stong phrag dgu ru dgang blugs dang // sbyin sreg dag ni bya ba ste// dus mi ring bar rgyal po 'thob// gang gis sha ni blugs pa dang // mkhas pas dgang blugs brgya phrag gis// de yi zla
234b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum nang du ni/ / skad cig tsam gyis dbul ba zad// gang gis rtag tu dran pa yis// skye bo kun la sdug par 'gyur// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// 'grub par 'gyur te the tsom med// 'dod pa'i
234b4(rgyud 'bum): lha 'dra bud med mchog/ myos shing spro ba bsten par bya// 'dod pa shin tu rgyas pa yis// 'jig rten rnams la brtse bar bya// sa stengs rnams su dngos grub thob// bud med bye bas yongs su bskor//
234b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo dang // dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam sbyor la// dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byas nas// 'jig rten gsum du dngos grub ster// dam tshig spyod pas bsrung bar bya// dpal khrag 'thung
234b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'byung ba las/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i las kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// / de nas las mchog dam pa dag/ dpa'
234b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med rnal 'byor ni/ / rtag tu 'khrud pas gsang mchod bya// rnal 'byor mas ni mchog ster 'gyur// sgrub pa pos ni nub kun tu// de nas pho nya mchod par bya// sha za'i rtsa ba khar bcug sde// ji tsam 'a
235a1(rgyud 'bum): pa de tsam du/ / rtags ni las su 'gyur ba ste// sa yi dbu ni snying po dag/ til gyi mar khur btsos nas ni// rkang pa'i mthil la byug par bya// de nas rtags su gyur pa ste// ba ta dang ni
235a2(rgyud 'bum): ka Tu dang / / ro hi ni dang rta yi dri// 'di rnams cha ni mnyam byas te// arga'i po mar btags nas ni// ling ga la ni bskus byas nas// ji tsam tshad du 'dod pa ru// de tsam tshad du 'dod pa yin// myur du chu ni dron mo
235a3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / bskus na snga ma bzhin du 'gyur// pad+ma dkar po ge sar dag/ sbrang rtsi dag dang btags nas ni// lte ba la ni bskus nas ni// rtags ni brtan par 'gyur ba yin// pad+ma dmar po ge sar dang // til ni dkar
235a4(rgyud 'bum): po dag dang ni/ / ma he'i mar ni ma bskol dang // dpa' bo gcig pa'i rtsa ba dang // sbrang rtsi lhan cig btags nas ni// lte ba la ni byugs byas na// de srid rtags ni dgyes mi 'gyur// rdul dang yung
235a5(rgyud 'bum): ba gnyis blangs te/ / ba yi dang ba bre do ni// ji srid bre gang gyur tsam du// de srid bskol bar byas pa yin// de ltar btung bar byas pa ni// nyi ma bdun gyis rdzogs par 'gyur// bcud len sbyor ba yang dag ba
235a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo yis ni gsungs pa'o/ / spre'u'i mchil ma blangs byas te// phye ma zhib mor byas pa dang // rang gi dpa' bo'i sgo nas ni// byung dang yang dag ldan byas na// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje phag mo
235a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas byas te/ / yid ni gang dang gang gnas pa// lan cig bzlas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni// lag pa g.yon pa bskor byas te// gang dang gang la bsams pa de// 'tsho ba gro dang gser dang ni// bza' ba'i zas dang btung
235b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dag/ de dag thams cad blangs nas ni// sngags pa'i khyim ni yongs su gang // khrag dang rang byung gcig byas te// sgrub pos rig pa lan bdun bzlas// des ni mi la reg byas na// reg pas skyes bu khrag 'dzag
235b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / lan cig bzlas pas rig pa 'dis// chus ni yongs su thar par 'gyur// de ltar sems can gang gang ni// khrag dang khrag chen po dag gis// skud pa spags te bcing bar bya// lan bdun bzlas pa dag
235b3(rgyud 'bum): gis ni/ / de gzugs 'dzin par the tsom med// kun tu chu yis grol bar 'gyur// bltas pas bud med gzugs bzang dang // rgyal po rnams dang sa bdag dag/ sgrub pos mthong dang ma mthong ba// thams cad
235b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par gyur pa ste/ / lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas// mnga' yi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// nyi ma bdun na the tsom med// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba lnga/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i
235b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyi 'dod pa dang / bcud kyis len dang / 'gugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas dngos grub rnal 'byor che// 'jigs pa thams
235b6(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam spangs te/ / thang ka'i gzugs kyi ri mo ni// sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri// rnal 'byor ma yi lus gnas pa// sgrub pa pos ni mtshan par bya// bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad dam// nag po'i phyogs kyi
235b7(rgyud 'bum): tshes bcu la/ / rig pas nub mo mchod par bya// sgrub pos dri dang me tog dang // spos ni ji ltar gsungs pa dang // de bzhin yang ni bza' dang btung // mar me 'phreng ba dbul ba dang // dri zhim spos kyis
236a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / stan gcig la ni gnas nas ni// lha la mngon par kha bltas nas// sngags pas kha ni nub tu blta// sgrub pa pos ni thang ka'i gzugs// zhal bzhi phyag ni bzhi pa dang //
236a2(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mdzes pa dag ni gzung bar bya// lag pas zhags pa lcags kyu bzung // kha dog nag po 'bar ba che// thod pa'i 'phreng ba bcings pa dang // stag gi pags pas bla gos byas// stan la
236a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas/ / ral pa'i cod pan zla tshes brgyan// shin tu mdzes pa'i rus pas brgyan// cho gas yang dag bsgoms byas nas// de nas 'phreng ba blang bar bya// stan gcig la ni gnas nas ni//
236a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa yi// me 'dra'i lus kyi rig pa bzlas// sgrub pa pos ni snying po ni// mtshan ni thog thag bzlas pa bya// dang po'i thun la ha ha dgod// spang ki yi ni sgra sgrogs pa// sgrub po g.yog dang
236a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa yis/ / de mthong 'jigs par mi bya'o// gnyis pa yi ni thun dag la// nam mkha'i steng du 'bar bar mthong // mi g.yo bas ni bzlas pa bya// 'gro ba thams cad za 'dra yang // srin po'i 'jigs pa
236a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i zhal/ / thun gsum pa la mthong ba yin// lhar bcas lha min mir bcas rnams// thun bzhi pa la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phag mo mchog ster lags// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// nga yis
236a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni sbyin zhes smra/ / mchog tu sa 'og 'gro ba dang // ral gri mig sman 'khor lo dang // ngag gis thams cad 'grub pa dang // phyag rgya chen po rjes su 'grub// phyag rgya gang gis sgrub pa po// dngos grub thams
236b1(rgyud 'bum): cad phun sum tshogs/ / dpal ldan khrag 'thung nges mchod bya// phyag rgya yid dang lus ngag la// phyag rgya'i mchod pas mchog ni yod// 'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin// phyag rgyas dngos grub shes
236b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / 'jig rten gsum na yang dag gnas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas bshad pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
236b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas dgug pa bshad par bya// skye ba bdun pas dngos grub ster// srid par dngos grub dpa' bo che// thams cad pas
236b4(rgyud 'bum): ni lus gnas mchog/ kun tu lag pa brkyang ba'i mtha'// kun tu mig dang spyi bo dang // kun tu kha dang rna ba yis// 'jig rten pa rnams bskor te gnas// de phyir myur du bsgrub par bya// gnyis med ye
236b5(rgyud 'bum): shes sems kyis ni/ / rang gi lus la nges phyung ba// 'og gi char ni the tsom med// de ru bsgrub bya la ni gzhug/ rtsa ba'i lam nas rnal 'byor ma// phyugs kyi sa bon blangs nas ni// bdag gi lus la
236b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya/ / rlung dang me ni yang dag 'byung // bsgrub bya'i lus ni bza' ba yin// mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas ni// lha mo'i sngags kyis rmongs byas te// thams cad bgugs par 'gyur ba
236b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sgrub pa po yi sngags lus kyis// brgyal zhing dran med rmongs pa dang // rdo rje phag mos shin tu rmongs// de ni rtag tu dbang du 'gyur// 'ong zhing rjes su 'ong bar 'gyur// de lta nyid du bkod nas ni//
237a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan dag dang yang dag ldan// bdag nyid chen pos brgya byin dang // sngon du brgya byin chung ma dgug/ de nas thabs ni shes par bya// khams gsum dag ni ma lus dang //
237a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba rnams kyang dgug par bya// kun tu thabs ni phan pa'i mchog/ gang zhig rgyud rnams kun tu sbas// rnal 'byor sngags ni gsungs pa'o// brtul zhugs dang ni bzlas pa bral// bsnyung ba
237a3(rgyud 'bum): cung zad mi dgos te/ / bsam gtan 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro ba blta zhing rab tu sbyar// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ skye ba bdun pa la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa'i cho/
237a4(rgyud 'bum): ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// 'khor lo chen po pad+ma bzhi// dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor
237a5(rgyud 'bum): ma dkyil 'khor rgyal po mthong ba yis/ / dngos grub ci ste skye mi 'gyur// ring po nas ni thos pa dang // ring po rnams ni mig gis mthong // rnal 'byor ma yis 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang rnams ni spong
237a6(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// pad+ma bzhi ni yang dag ldan// grub pa'i slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// sa yi cha mnyam yid 'ong bar// zug rngu thams cad rnam spangs te//
237a7(rgyud 'bum): tshon sna lnga dang ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri ba yin// dngos grub 'dod pas mnyam bzhag pas// pho nya dag ni mchod par bya// dpa' borang mchod par 'gyur ba yin// des ni rdul tshon bsgrub par
237b1(rgyud 'bum): bya rdul tshon rdzogs pa nyid kyis ni/ / 'dod pa'i don kun thar pa ster// mthe'u chung gi ni tshad tsam du// rdul tshon yang dang bri bya ste// gal te re mig 'di dag ni// dma' dang chad dang 'khyog por gyur// dma' ba'i re
237b2(rgyud 'bum): khAs dngos grub med/ / 'khyog pos nad ni byed pa ste// slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka ni// ri mo chad pas 'chi bar 'gyur// de ltar ri mo'i mtshan nyid ldan// sa yi dbus su mtho ba bri// shar dang byang dag dam
237b3(rgyud 'bum): bas ni/ / sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shar dang byang dag dma' ba dang // dbus ni mtho bas rgyal por 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin pa'i go 'phang nges// byang mtho bas ni 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na nor ni
237b4(rgyud 'bum): rlag par 'gyur/ / ji ltar sngon gsungs shar mtho bas// myur du rigs ni zad par 'ongs// ji ltar sa yi dbus dma' bas// sgrub pa po ni gsod pa yin// de ltar ri mo mtshan nyid ldan// sa la dkyil 'khor
237b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bri/ / khru gang khru gnyis khru bzhi 'am// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug nyid// steng dang 'og tu brtag pa med// gal te rtog pa med na ni// slob dpon ye shes rnyed pa dka'// dmyal ba mi bzad par ni
237b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro/ / gang zhig dman pa'i mi ru 'gyur// de nas dgod pa'i cho ga bshad// dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor mas// dpal ldan rdo rje khrag 'thung lha// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis bskor// gshin rje ma
237b7(rgyud 'bum): dang skrag byed ma/ / tsan Di ka ni kun spod ma// nor ma dpa' bo'i blo ma dang // sdud ma 'jigs ma brgyad pa ste// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o// gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma// lA ma dang ni rab
238a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phel ma/ / sa pa li ka slar ldog ma// i hi ka dang kar dbang phyug/ brgyad pa ru ni brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor ma ni yongs su grags// khro gnyer ma dang mche gtsigs ma// sna chen
238a2(rgyud 'bum): ma ngang ba lang gdong / / dri chen ma dang klang chen lce// ba lang rna ba gdong bzangs te// rnal 'byor spyod par gyur pa'o// dmar ba'i gtum mo nyid dang ni// sa ni ljang ku nyid dag dang // stobs chen dpag tshad
238a3(rgyud 'bum): / gsum ma dang // rtsub mo dang ni bden smra ma// zhal ni shin tu mdzes ma dang // thod pa'i dum bu mo dag ste// 'di rnams snying rje'i dngos grub ster// sngon gyi rdo rje phag mo nyid// rang nyid kyi ni rig pa yin// rang
238a4(rgyud 'bum): ming brjod pa'i sngags dag la/ / dang por oM gyi yi ge la// hUM hUM phaT kyis mtha' mar sbyar// 'dod pa yi ni sgrub pa pos// de ni rtag tu mchod par bya// de ltar thams cad the tsom med// sring mo dang ni bu mo dang //
238a5(rgyud 'bum): chung ma shin tu gzugs bzang dang // rta dang glang po ba lang dang // zhing dang bran po bran mo dang // rin chen rnams ni dbul bar bya// deng nas brtsams te bdag nyid 'bangs// bdag gi lus ni phul ba lags//
238a6(rgyud 'bum): slob ma dag ni mi 'bul na// dngos grub ring bar the tsom med// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol na// des ni dngos grub mi 'thob bo// dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis ni// dngos grub ci ste skye mi 'gyur// sdig pa
238a7(rgyud 'bum): kun las rnam par grol/ / 'bad pas slob dpon dgyes par bya// de yis dngos grub myur du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha yis ni// ji ltar bu ru gsungs pa yi// ji lta bzhin du rdul tshon lngas//
238b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mnyam par bri bar bya// gdong ni gos kyis bcings byas te// lho phyogs sgor ni dgug par bya// me tog snyim pas gtor bar bya// me tog gang du lhung ba yi// gnas la sogs pa bstan par bya//
238b2(rgyud 'bum): oM shri he ru kA ya bid ma he bi dA rA dzA ya d+hIHma he swA hA/ bdag gis dpa' bo rab tu bskal// bklags pas las ni thams cad byed// 'chi ba'i dus kyi dngos grub ni// 'chi ba la ni brjod par 'gyur// dngos grub/
238b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi bye brag gis// nyi ma gcig gis dngos grub che// 'jig rten gsum sgrub bsgom par bya// sgrub pa'i dbang po cho ga shes// dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni// brtul zhugs la ni nub gsum gnas// lha yi lus
238b4(rgyud 'bum): su skye bar 'gyur/ / lha yi ye shes mthong 'gyur te// de bzhin lha yi gzugs su 'gyur// rtsod pa kun las rgyal ba dang // rgas dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas bzhin du lha mo bsten// dpa' bo bzhi/
238b5(rgyud 'bum): dus la rtse// phyag rgya dang ni bcas nyid du// nyi ma gsum gyis 'gyur ba nyid// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ lha dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu
238b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// dbang bskur 'khor lo mchod pa ni// slob mas nyi ma bzang po 'am// ji ltar du ni nub mo la'o// de nas dpa' bo mchod
238b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / stan gcig la ni gnas nas kyang // pho nya mo ni bcu drug nyid// dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med gnas// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo la// sum b+ha ni yi rig pa yis// phyogs bzhi ru ni mchod par
239a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de ltar rnal 'byor chen po mchod// gzugs brgyad pos ni rab tu bsrung // sngags dang phyag rgya yongs rdzogs nas// gnyis med ye shes brtsam par bya// dam tshig thams
239a2(rgyud 'bum): cad bskung bya ste/ / 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba// g.yon nas skyes par byed pa yin// dam tshig spod pa'i mtshan nyid dang // spor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// dbugs
239a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung mchog gi bar dag ni/ / dri yi chu dang bcas pa dang // rtag tu ril bu bza' bar bya// mchod pa'i dus kyi bye brag la// pho nyas lhan cig skyes dngos grub// dman pa mchog dang 'bring rnams kyi// de yis sbyor
239a4(rgyud 'bum): bas dngos grub 'gyur/ / 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// dpal ldan he ru ka las byung // rang byung me tog nyid dag gis// cho ga shes pas kun tu spyod// bzlas dang bsam gtan mchod pa dang // me tog kocig
239a5(rgyud 'bum): dang yang dag ldan/ / blo ldan gyis ni ston mo sgrub// ma lus snod gnyis 'dus byas te// rtog pa med pa'i shes rab che// sngags dang rgyud kyi tshul gyis ni// gang ltar ji ltar rnyed pa la// yid kyis gus pas mchod
239a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gnyis dang gnyis med rnal 'byor ba dag/ mkha' lding kha bzhin btung bar bya// rigs lnga gcig tu yang dag 'grub// ston mo bzang po brtsam par bya// rtag tu nub mo rgya che ba'i// mchod pa bya zhing brtsam
239a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gnas der mi yi las kyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu dkrug par bya// rnal 'byor gang gis me tog gnas// sgrub pa thams cad spangs pa dang // byol song rnal 'byor mchog tu bab// dman pa 'bring dang mchog
239b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / ce spyang gnyis skyes mig chen dang // khrung khrung sa ra sa dang khra// pho rog 'ug pa bya rgod kyi// dgang blugs kun gyi bye brag gis// mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma sprin// mchog dang dman pa'i dngos grub/
239b2(rgyud 'bum): ster// de yi rdzas kyi dngos grub skye// de bzhin mthong dang reg pa dang // rtag tu 'o dang 'khyud pa dang // sbyor ba'i gnas kyi bye brag gis// ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyis byed par brjod//
239b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags las 'byung ba sbyin par bya// gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// ma dang bu mo sring mo dang // chung ma pho nya mor gnas pa// gang gis rtag tu sngags ster ba// de ni de yi cho gar brjod// de nas bdag gis dam
239b4(rgyud 'bum): tshig bshad/ / g.yon nas 'byung ba mchog yin no// gang zhig mi yi bu mo thob// he ru ka yi sngags kyis ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// ring po nas kyang rnam shes bya// khyim mam zhing la rnam gnas
239b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / khrag 'thung rnal 'byor las gzhan min// slob dpon rnal 'byor ma yin te// yid can gyis ni rgyud 'di ru// rnal 'byor thams cad shes par bya// gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// sngon du dang ba
239b6(rgyud 'bum): la brten nas/ / gus pa yis ni mchod par bya// rtag tu ma mos rnam par gnas// gnyis su med dang ngo tsha med// phyag rgya shin tu rnal 'byor ldan// tshul khrims yang dag brjod pa yin// skye ba'i yul
239b7(rgyud 'bum): las skyes pa dang / / dam tshig yang dag bsrung ba yin// sems kyi bdag nyid snying rjes phan// dam tshig can la khro min te// ma gus pa la bshad mi bya// mtshan mo thog thag bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor ma la
240a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / bcu drug gnyis med rgyal po'i don// nub mo ru ni dam tshig ste// dpa' bo rtag tu gcer bu yin// sgrub pos sngags dang phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan//
240a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub po las ni mnyam par brtsam// bdag nyid pho nya mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor gnyis med gnas nas ni// de las 'byung ba'i rdzas kyis bsgrub// de bzhin mthong dang reg pa pos// nyin mo rtag tu gsungs
240a3(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ / rtag tu nub mo gsal bar bya// srog chags pags pas sham thabs bya// bde ba'i don du bskyod par bya// sgrub pa po ni dngos grub nyid// dag pa rnam gsum gyis 'grub ste// dpal ldan khrag 'thung
240a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med gnas/ / zhal ni dkar gnag smra ba dang // mi sma'i dka' thub la sogs spangs// dang po yi ni dag pa yi// sgrub thabs kun gyi mtshan nyid dang // byol song zos pas bsod nams sog/ gnyis
240a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dag pa brjod bya ba/ / zla ba'i chu ni 'thungs pa nyid// gsum pa gnyis mer brjod pa'o// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i
240a6(rgyud 'bum): le'u zhes bya ba ste bco lnga pa'o/ / / de nas sdom pa bshad par bya// rnal 'byor rgyud las rnyed dka' ba// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// kun gyi rgyal por grags pa ste// rtag tu
240a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'bras don du// spun dang slob dpon mchod par bya// de nyid gnyis med rnam gnas so// spur dang bu dang lhan cig tu// bde dang sdug bsngal kun tu
240b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / de la ye shes bstan mi bya// sngags rnams su ni 'byin pa yin// gtsang zhing dag pa bza' bya ste// rtag tu dam tshig yan lag gsang // sngags ni su la'ang mi sbyin te// man ngag rnam par
240b2(rgyud 'bum): nyams mi bya/ / gang gi don du man ngag rnams// dam tshig srung ba sbyin par bya// rtag tu 'jig rten g.yon la sprod// rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du gtang // yan lag g.yon pa bsgyur bar brtson// g.yon
240b3(rgyud 'bum): pas mdzub gtor byas la btung / / lag pa g.yon pas bdag nyid mchod// 'di ru g.yon pas 'khyud pa dang // g.yon pas gus par mchod par bya// g.yon nas kun tu blta ba nyid// de bzhin g.yon/
240b4(rgyud 'bum): pabs 'gro byas na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// ji ltar bdag nyid g.yon pas spyod// g.yon pas thar pa'i mtshan nyid de// cung zad gsungs dang ma gsungs pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung g.yon la spod//
240b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos sa stengs gnas nas ni// bzlas dang brtul zhugs bral byas kyang // g.yon pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ g.yon pa'i mchod pa dang sdom pa'i
240b6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas rnal 'byor ma yi ni// lta bas rengs pa'i cho ga bshad// snying gong sna rtser byin gyis brlab// da ltar rlung gi g.yo med par/
240b7(rgyud 'bum): snying gi gong bus ske bcings te// gzugs bzang ba ni myur du 'ong // de nas yi dgas mau sgrub pa// skye gnas la ni gi wang gzhug/ sngags pas pad+ma'i stan bstan te// bsam gtan bzlas pa yang dag
241a1(rgyud 'bum): brtsam/ / skyo zhing kun tu ngu bar 'gyur// thig le byas nas gnas pa dang // dgod cing dgyes pa nyid dag go/ de ltar gi wang dngos grub ni// gsang ba'i rgyud pas nges pa 'byung // ldong
241a2(rgyud 'bum): ros dang ni man shing la/ / bu mo la ni gzhug par bya// ser zhing zlum pa'i mig nas ni// mchi mar bcas shing rtag tu ngu// 'di rnams kyi ni bzlas par gnas// de bzhin snying po nye snying po// rang gi srog
241a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin legs par 'dzin/ / de ltar dpa' bo dngos grub che// rgyud 'di ru ni the tsom med// rtsod pa chen po 'byung ba la// yaM yig kha dog sngon po la// rlung gi shugs kyis bskor bar bya// 'khrug pa chen po
241a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi sde/ / thams cad rengs shing brlag par bya// tsheg drag yi ges mtshon cha ba// nyon mongs med par sbyar bya ste// de ma thag tu thams cad brlag/ de ni mi yi sde kun te// gang zhig cung zad mtshan mchog
241a5(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / bya ba la sogs byed pa yin// gza' dang dug dang me dang dgra// ser ba rlung dang mtshon cha'i char// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ gzugs bzang ma blta ba dang / gi'u wang dang /
241a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi sde rengs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ro langs kyi ni sgrub pa'i thabs// cho ga yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor pa dag/ 'grub
241a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te the tsom med/ / sngags pas ji ltar rnyed pa yi// ro ni nad med gas pa med// de ni blangs te bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor kun la dngos grub ster// ba nag mo yi 'o ma dang // sran gre'u
241b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras dang ldan pa yi/ / thug pa ro yi kha ru ni// 'jigs pa med par blugs par bya// ji srid ro ni langs kyi bar// bdag gis ci bgyi zhes ni smra// ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang // shing lham rgyal po
241b2(rgyud 'bum): ral gri dang / / sbyin dang dgra bo brlag pa dang // rkang byug dang ni bcud kyis len// don mchog gcig ni byin nas ni// 'grub 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// de ltar cho ga'i rim pa ni// mtshan nyid kun la bral
241b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na/ / sdig pa dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub rab tu brlag par 'gyur// rtog pa 'di yi tshad ma rnams// snying po ru ni rab tu sgrogs// khyab 'jug drag po dbang po dang // tshangs pa la sogs pa
241b4(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// drang srong sna tshogs dag pa dang // klu dang dri za lha rnams te// ro langs nam mkha' lding la sogs// drag po lha min mi 'am ci// sha za dang ni srin po
241b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / nyi ma zla ba skar ma bcas// 'jig rten skyong ba bgegs kyi rgyal// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma// mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs dang // lA ma dang ni dum skyes ma// gzugs can ma ni slar ldog
241b6(rgyud 'bum): ma/ 'dod ma sangs rgyas dbang dang ni// grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang // gnod sbyin po dang gnod sbyin mo// phyogs chen dpal mi u ma la// ji ltar bde bar rtse zhing rtse// de nas grub pa'i dpa' bom
241b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams kyis ni 'di dag gis/ / de ltar grub pa'i sngags chen po// rig po yis ni rnal 'byor skye// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ ro langs chen po sgrub pa'i thabs lha thams cad dang
242a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse zhing bde ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// snying po'i sngags sogs bzlas pa la// 'phreng ba'i rigs
242a2(rgyud 'bum): radang grangs ngag dang / / cho gas rnal 'byor bzlas pa bya// shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang // ru rag sha ni mdzes pa yin// rdo rje'i mig gis dngos grub ster// bo de tse ni thams cad bshad// ni bar
242a3(rgyud 'bum): ta dang lung thang dag/ tshe ring nad med 'phel ba yin// dbang du byed dang zhi 'dod dang // nor 'phel ba ni byed pa yin// byu ru yis ni 'phel ba dang // rin chen 'phreng bas mdzes pa yin// gser gyi 'phreb
242a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dag dang ni/ / sgrub pos rin chen 'phreng ba bsres// rgyal po'i don du sngags pas bzlas// dpal ni che ba nyid du 'thob// dngos grub thams cad yod pa dang // sa yi dbang por the tsom med// 'byung po'i
242a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid dbang du byed/ / nor rnams 'gugs par byed pa po// bya rog sgro yis bskur ba nyid// bong bu yis ni sdang ba'o// khyi dang rta yi 'phreng ba la// sgrub pos me tog gis ni mchod// ro yi sgra yi skud pa dang /
242a6(rgyud 'bum): bong bu'i spu dang yang dag ldan// skud pa 'di yis sdang ba dang // khyi yi spu dang bsres pas ni// dngos grub thams cad byed pa yin// gser gyi skud pas zhi bar 'gyur// yang na ras kyi skud pa ni// gzhon nu ma
242a7(rgyud 'bum): yis bkal ba yin/ / gzugs mdzes yongs su rdzogs pa dang // gtsang zhing dran ldan 'jam par smra// de lta'i skud pa'i 'phreng bas ni// grol ba'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan khrag bathung mchod
242b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / spyi bor ri bong can gyis mtshan// zhi zhing zhal ni bzhi pa ste// 'dod pa kun gyi gzugs bzang ba// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sangs rgyas nor bus gtsug bur byas// lag pas kha T+wAM
242b2(rgyud 'bum): ga ni bzung / / mdung dang ral pa'i cod pan byas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// brgya byed 'phreng bas mtshan pa ste// lha chen chung mar bcas pa yi// steng nas mnyam par gnas pa yin//
242b3(rgyud 'bum): steng nas gdugs dkar pos g.yogs te// lha yi dri yis byugs pa dang // lha yi me tog lus la mchod// phyag ni 'bum phrag dang ldan pa// lha yi ga pur dri yis ni// lus la bdug cing byug pa
242b4(rgyud 'bum): 'omakha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs pas/ / rnga yab kyis ni g.yob pa yin// rnal 'byor mas ni mnyam par bskor// lA ma dang ni dum skyes ma// rdo rje phag mo g.yon la gnas// dpal ni skyed tshal pad+ma ni//
242b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu me tog 'bras bu gnas// 'dod pa'i shing la lcug ma rgyas// lha dang lha min tshogs kyi gnas// 'dod pa'i rjes chags skye ba ste// skyed mos tshal na dpal mchog ste// sprin gyi 'phreng po phyed kyis bkab/
242b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i ro yis char pa babab// 'dod pa'i gnas ni mchog yin te// chags dang byams pas kun tu gang // pho nya kun dang mnyam par spyod// dpa' bo dang ni yang dag ldan// nags kyi dbus na rtse ba ste//
242b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug/ glu dang gling bu gar la sogs// zangs dung sgra ni mnyam pa'i rigs// rnga rings kyi ni sgra la sogs// tshe lang sgra ni chen po dang // rdza rngar byas pa'i sgra dag dang // paT tsas
243a1(rgyud 'bum): brdungs pa'i sgra/ / pi wang dgu po rgyud mangs sgra// rol mo kun gyi sgra chen pos// dpal chen bcas par rtse ba ste// kun tu yongs su khengs pa yin// de yis sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur/
243a2(rgyud 'bum): ji srid snying po skyes kyi bar du'o// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mchod pa dang / rtse ba'i rtsed mo'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o//
243a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas dngos grub rnal 'byor che// sprin sreg las ni rab sgrub pa// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// sprin sreg gnyis med dgang blugs kyis// mnyam med skal bzang de yis ni// dngos grub kun ni skye ba ste// skye
243a4(rgyud 'bum): shirga dang mya ngan dbul/ / myur ba nyid du rlag par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i don du sgrub pa pos// stong phrag bcu yi sngags ni bzlas// pho nya'i steng du gnas nas ni// sprin sreg stong phrag lnga ru bya// sha tshon dang ni'o/
243a5(rgyud 'bum): mar bsnos// sprin sreg dgang blugs rim pa yis// dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgya yi bar// g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dngos grub chen po rgyal dbang dpal// ma nyams kun tu khyab
243a6(rgyud 'bum): cing 'gro/ / sngags pas dus bzhi ru ni gson// de la sus kyang gnod mi nus// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas// ba lang sha dang sha chen dang // ce spang sha yis
243a7(rgyud 'bum): dgang blugs ni/ / chang dang 'o ma mnyam par bsnod// sprin sreg 'bum phrag gcig tu bya// gling bdun gyi ni rgyal dbang por// 'di yis dpal chen longs spyod 'gyur// ji srid snying po rgyas kyi bar//
243b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas dngos grub sngags chen po// brgyad lhag pa yi brgya ni bzlas// rdzas dang cho ga rdzogs pa yis// dgang blugs stong phrag lhag par bya// dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni// 'di nyid du ni dgang blugs brgya/
243b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa rab tu sprin bya ste// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzhin spun// de ltar sprin sreg cho ga brjod// de nas rab 'phel sngags shes pas// sa stengs gang gis 'grub par 'gyur// bskal ba chen po stong phrag gam//
243b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bskal po stong phrag tu// ma nyams sngags pa kun khyab spod// ji ltar ji bzhin 'gro ba nyid// sgrub pos nyi ma re re ru// rtag tu dgang blugs lnga yis mchod// rgyal po yul ba khor dbang du 'gyur// bcu/
243b4(rgyud 'bum): yis mi dbang rgyal po dang // sde ni stobs dang bcas pa kun// de rnams myur du dbang du 'gyur// sna tshogs bdag nyid nor dang ni// sa ni sum cu thams cad dang // gling bdun rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur// rgya
243b5(rgyud 'bum): mtsho bdun gyi mtha' gtugs par/ / longs spyod sa ni gser rang bzhin// sum cu lnga yi sbyin sreg gis// sa 'og bdun gyi lha ma yin// sgrub pos chung mar bcas pa ni// myur bar dbang du byed par 'gyur// de
243b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar dngos grub rnal 'byor che/ / dpa' bo dbang phyug dag gis gsungs// de nas sha yi dgang blugs 'bul// yang na sha chen dag la'o// chang dang bcas nas bsres nas ni// pad+ma gcig tu sbyin sreg bya//
243b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas yul ni rnyed par 'gyur// sum brgya yi ni tshad kyis so// 'bum phrag gsum gyi sbyin sreg gis// 'dzam bu gling ni kun tu 'thob// 'bum phrag lnga yi dkang blugs kyis// gling bdun de
244a1(rgyud 'bum): yis longs spyod 'gyur/ / rtse zhing dngos grub rgyal dbang po// ji srid snying po rgyas kyi bar// rtag par gsung ba'i cho kar gnas// skal dman gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur// de
244a2(rgyud 'bum): ltar gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg ni/ / sngogs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ gling bdun gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste
244a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu pa'o/ / // de nas mngon spyod kyi ni las// 'dod pas dpa' bo rnams ni bsten// dug khrag tsha ba'i mar khu dang // mi yi rus pas sprin sreg bya// tsher ma'i me ni rab tu
244a4(rgyud 'bum): sbaspar/ / de bzhin 'bras bu phub dang ldan// khro ba rgyas shing sgo yang grol// gcer bu kha yang lho ru bltas// sngags pa gos ni nag po bya// nyi ma phyed na me la ni// drag po'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya// gtum mo'i
244a5(rgyud 'bum): me la sems gcig gis/ / ji ltar nub mo'ang bya ba yin// sngags kyi mtha' ni ming dang sbyar// nus pa grol zhing myur bar 'gug/ stobs ldan sde dang bcas pa ni// mngon spyod kyis ni gsad par bya// pho
244a6(rgyud 'bum): nya de nyid rnal 'byor bdag/ 'grub par 'gyur ba the tsom med// 'di ni gsad pa'i las yin te// phyi nas lha la bzod par gsol// 'o ma bil ba sbrang rtsi mar// til dang ldan pas dgang blugs bya// de
244a7(rgyud 'bum): ltar dpa' bo rab tu zhi/ / yang dang yang du sngags 'di bzlas// de nas bskrad pa rab tu bshad// nyi ma'i gzhan la las brtsams te// bya rog sgo yis sbyin sreg bya// dri chen ro yi rgya chen dang // sha za'i
244b1(rgyud 'bum): shing gis me sbar te/ / rlung phyogs kha ni bltas te bskrad// bdag nyid du ni gnas nas ni// zhag bdun gyis ni the tshom med// rnam par sdang ba bshad par bya// sngags pas nim pa'i bdab ma dang //
244b2(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyi pags brjes yang dag ldan// bya rog 'ug pa'i tshang dag dang // smyo byed me ni rab sbar te// brgyas lhag brgya ni gzhug par bya// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par dbye// gnyen dang bshes rnams
244b3(rgyud 'bum): gtong bar 'gyur/ / dgug pa'i don du sbyin sreg ni// mtshan gyis 'di bzhin bsam gtan bya// seng ldeng me ni rab tu sbar// dus gsum du ni sbyin sreg spyad// de yi ming ni lan cig blang // de la sngags
244b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis sbar ba ste/ / rtag tu sngags pas sbyin sreg bya// nges par thams cad 'gug pa yin// sngags pas nub mo sbyin sreg bya// 'dod pas pho nya bcas pa ru// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
244b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yi ni rjes 'jug par// phyag rgya yi ni sbyor bar 'grub// rtag tu rgyal po dbang po dang // yang dag sangs rgyas pha rol gnon// ye shes gzugs ni rnal 'byor che// 'dod gzugs mar ni
244b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa ste/ / lha mo chen mo lha ma yin// klu mo nyid kyi bu mor 'dod// srin mo dang ni nye srin mo// dri za dang ni gnod sbyin mo// mi rnams nyid ni thams cad du// 'jig rten gsum ni dbang du 'gyur//
244b7(rgyud 'bum): drug cu rtsa bzhi rab sbar bas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya la ni rtse// bza' dang btung dang rnyed dang 'jigs// 'di rnams kun ni yongs su gtang // de nyid don dam ye shes te// de nyid don dam go 'phang
245a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de nyid don dam sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid don dam bde ba ste// gzhan du yod par mi brjod de// dam tshig nye bar spyad pa yin// rtag tu gnyis med phrag rgyar
245a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / po na mchod pas rab tu 'phel// sgrub pos mchod pa tsam gyis ni// dngos grub kun ni shin tu byed// pho nya smad par mi bya ste// sgrub pos thams cad 'gugs pa yin// rgyab dang
245a3(rgyud 'bum): smad dang bcad pa dang / / longs spyor sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// pho nyas lhan cig skyes dngos grub// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu 'phel// rnal 'byor sbyor bral mi bya ste// 'di rnams sngags ni
245a4(rgyud 'bum): smras pa yin/ / dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ 'phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad
245a5(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bya/ / ro langs chen po sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ 'khor lo kun la rnam par gnas// mi yi mar khu de yi sha/ sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad blugs bya// de ru rdo rje
245a6(rgyud 'bum): phag mo byin/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor gyis bskor// ro langs srin po yang dag gang // bsregs pa dgod cing 'jigs par byed// ce spyang sna tshogs nga ro che// yongs su bskor nas 'jigs
245a7(rgyud 'bum): par sgrogs/ / srin pos bkram nas sdig par byed// 'jigs pa'i dbyangs kyis sdigs par byed// de mthong 'jigs par mi bya ste// lus kyi sngags kyi nga rgyal bya// dpa' bo chen po legs zhes
245b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / bdag nyid rdo rje sems brtul zhugs// sgrub po yid la ci 'dod pa'o// de la mchog ni brkyar ster te// de yi gnas su dpa' bo 'gro// rnal 'byor ma yis yongs su bskor// de nas de ma thag
245b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid du/ / 'jig rten gsum la spyod par 'gyur// rang nyid lha yi lus su skye// dpal chen skal bzang 'dod pa'i gzugs// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun// nam mkhar kun tu spyod pa nyid// nang
245b3(rgyud 'bum): dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ / gnas kun la ni spyod pa ste// 'di rnams las ni dam pa mchog/ rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bos bshad// gnas las rnam par rgyal bar 'grub// de nas dpal chen las
245b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang 'thob// de yi las ni rab tu 'grub// gang gis bzlas med rgyud kyang med// spyod pa med cing bsnyung ba med// yid kyis ma
245b5(rgyud 'bum): lus par byas nas/ / sems dpa' chen po 'grub par 'gyur// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
245b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dgug pa bshad par bya// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min// bdag nyid khrag 'thung rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// thod pa dum bu gcig pa
