245b7(rgyud 'bum): sde skyon kun med cing mdzes pa la/ / bsgrub bya'i lus ni bri bar bya// de bzhin brgya byed 'dab ma la// sngags dang ming ni lhan cig tu// khrag chen dang ni mnyes nas su// gser gyi sbu gus nang du bri//
246a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni gi'u wang khu bas so// steng nas 'khor lo kha sbyar yin// snying po bzlog ste bsgrub par bya// sngags ni bzlas shing gzhug par bya// sngags pas nam phyed du gnas te/
246a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma gcig ni yang dag blang // lus kyi sngags kyi nga rgyal gyis// 'dabo ma brgya ni sprin sreg bya// sems kyis yid la ci 'dod pa// sprisbyin sreg pho nya'i ye shes dang // gtor ma sbyin pa'i bye brag
246a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// phyag rgya bcing ba bsam par bya// bsgrub bya de yis 'gugs par 'gyur// rgyal po'i bu mo bud med mchog/ 'khor lo sgyur bar bcas pa dang //
246a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du bya ba brtag mi dgos// dngos grub 'di rnams mchog tu gsang // rnal 'byor mchog ni mngon du bsgrub// mdun du dgyes byed mchog gis so// yang na las mchog dam pa dag/
246a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i lus dag ni// tsan dan dmar po'i rang bzhin las// gzugs brnyan dag ni rab tu byas// rang gi khrag dang gi wang gis// mngon par bris te snying khar gzhag/ tsha ba gsum
246a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis lus ni byug/ zangs kyi phur bus bsgrub bya yi// snying dang lte ba gsang ba ru// gnas gsum dag ni phug pa ste// nam phyed kyi ni dus dag tu// snying po'i sngags ni go bzlog bzlas// gang 'dod de ni
246a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par 'gyur/ / seng ldeng me la de srid gdung // sngags ni rjes su dran pa yis// bsgrub bya myur du 'ong bar 'gyur// gnas der sangs rgyas 'jig rten sogs// rdo rje sems dpa' dag kyang ni//
246b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// sngags 'di dag ni dran tsam gyis// 'jig rten gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// nam mkha'i bya yang ltung bar 'gyur// shing rnams kyang ni gus par 'gyur// chu ni rgyun las
246b2(rgyud 'bum): ldog pa ste/ / 'khrul 'khor dang ni glang chen dang // rta dang sbrul dang spre'u dag dang // mtsho yi rlabs ni 'ching bar byed// ji ltar thang la 'gro ba bzhin// de ltar chu la 'gro bar 'gyur// gser gyi btsag gis
246b3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga bri/ / de steng lag pa g.yon pa ni// bzhag ste brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bya// gang gi ming ni bzung na ni// de ni de ma thag tu 'ong // rang gi mal stan la gnas te// lag pa g.yon par rang rtags bzung
246b4(rgyud 'bum): gang gi ming brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/ / de ni de ma thag tu ni// sangs rgyas dkar mo de bzhin du// rab tu 'dod par 'gyur ba yin// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo ni// dran pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba ste// bzla/
246b5(rgyud 'bum): shing brtse bas sbyar bas ni// rig pa kun yang rmongs par byed// gang gis rig pa sbyor dran pas// 'jig rten gsum ni rakrug par bya// rig pa 'di rnams zhes bya ba// dpal ldan phag mo zhes bya ba//
246b6(rgyud 'bum): rmongs dang dbye ba 'di rnams ni// khams gsum dbang du byed pa'o// bklags shing bshad pas dngos grub sogs// dngos grub kun byed 'jigs pa yin// bshes dang bu mo rigs sogs la// sngags
246b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di brjod par mi bya'o/ / thams cad ci bgyir 'gyur ba ste// sgrub pos mthong bas nges par ltung // mi mi'i mtshams las 'dzag 'gyur te// rtag tu ngo tsha btang bar 'gyur// gos med sgra ni grol ba dang /
247a1(rgyud 'bum): nu mkhrang bdag nyid gzhan dbang 'gyur// lus la rig pa mtha' dag dgod// de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam 'gyur// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ dpal rdo rje
247a2(rgyud 'bum): phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / / de nas kun tu 'bad pa yis// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub pa// gang gis rnam par
247a3(rgyud 'bum): shes tsam gyis/ / sgrub pos dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mche gtsigs ma yi phyag rgya yis// sgrub po 'dod pa'i tshul gyis su// sa rnams kun la nges par sbyor// lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// thams
247a4(rgyud 'bum): cad dkrugs nas de yis ni/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster// brtul zhugs med cing bsnyung ba med// bsam gtan dang ni ldan pa med// rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum ni dbang
247a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / gang gis skye ba'i go 'phang mthong // lus la sa bon bkod pas ni// 'jigs shing skrag la brgyal bar 'gyur// rnam par rmongs shing 'dzum pa ste// 'dod pas myos pa'i skye bo rnams//
247a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med nyid du gyur po ni// sgrub pos mthong bas dgyes par 'gyur// sems ni rab tu myos par song // rig pa 'di zhes bya ba ni// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo las// nges pa ru ni 'byung ba ste// sams
247a7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad dkrug pa yin/ / rang byung sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs// sna tshogs rig pa de yis ni// lan cig bzlas shing bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra bar ni// 'jig rten pa yis
247b1(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ / rig pas 'gugs shing de nas 'ong // de ma thag tu brgyal ba dang // gsungs pa'i 'dab ma yang dag blang // 'khor lo bdag gis mngon par bri// bya rog sgo yi sku gus ni// mig gi chu yis
247b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bri/ / gang gis rlung 'thor byas pa ru// snying po zlos la bzlas pa bya// steng du rlung gi 'khor ba ste// brgya byin yang ni skrag par 'gyur// dgra bo la ni mngon spyod do// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ rdo rje
247b3(rgyud 'bum): phag mo'i go bzlog pa'i snying pos dgug pa dang skrag pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas mkha' 'gro ma yau ni// mtshan ma ru ni gyur pa ste// po tam gi ni phyag rgya zhes//
247b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa pra ti po tam gi/ bde 'am zhes ni bya ba yin// phyag rgyar yang ni 'gyur ba ste// dpa' bo chen po'i brda yin no// g+ha ma na zhes bya ba ni// 'gro ba yi ni bya ba yin// lung zhes bya ba ni bong ba'o// di hi zhes bya ba
247b5(rgyud 'bum): ni chang gi btung ba'o/ / gre h+ya ni gnas so// tsA ru ka ni ston mo med ces bya ba'o// pU tsa na ma zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'o// tsa ru ka ni khyim 'di zhes bya ba'o// na zhes bya ba bzang ba'o// pu ta ka zhes bya ba gtor
247b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / bun dza na ti zhes pa kun tu mdzes pa'o// tsa ra ka ni mnyam par 'gro'o zhes bya bar gsungs so// sman ra na ma ni ngag gis bshig pa'o// ka t+ya ni bu mo'o// Na ha ni 'o byed pa'o// g+ha d+ha ni g.yog
247b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / spa rna ni g.yon pa'o// a tat+ta ni bza' ba dang bca' ba'o// bal ni ka ni dam tshig go// si ra ni mchod pa'o// A li kA li bden par gsungs pa'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// la na naM khro ba zhes gsung
248a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / sa sra ba ra rna ba zhes gsungs so// sa ta ni srog ces su shes par 'gyur ro// swasti ni chung ma zhes su gsungs so// b+ha gaM ni bu mo dang sdor bar 'gyur ro zhes su brjod par
248a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / as sarta ni bud med kyi nu ma'o// ba lo ta ka ni skyes bu'o// ba la ha ka ni de dag 'khrud pa'o// ka ta ni ma'o// ta li ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// ka la ta ni 'dod pa'i skyes bu'o// me ra ni yod pa'o// ba sa
248a3(rgyud 'bum): ka ni dkyil 'khor ro/ / na ra ka zhes pa dur khrod do// ka kha ni sgo'o// sa ta ni bram ze'o// bi ra d+hi ni rgyal rigs so// tsa ra ti ni rje rigs so// ku ra ni dmangs rigs so// an+ta sA ni gtum mo'o// gre he ni
248a4(rgyud 'bum): phyags so/ / hi hi zhes pa gsod pa'i ston mo'o// di ki ni 'dus pa'o// ut+ta ka ni zla ba'i gtum ma'o// gro ho ni phyag rgya rnams so// dza h+ya ni ra'o// so la reg pa ni ltogs pa zhes brjod pa'o// an+ta zhes
248a5(rgyud 'bum): popa ni 'grangs pa'o/ / gan+da ba si ni gnas pa'o// bi ma zhes pa ni che ge mo'i gnas so// ta ki na No ni me tog go/ rgod na ni khro bar brjod pa'o// mal po da ra so zhes pas gsungs par 'gyur ro// mu
248a6(rgyud 'bum): kha ni tshos mkhan du 'gyur ro/ / 'jis pa ni mi 'jigs par gsungs so// an+ta ni so so'i 'phreng ba'o// d+hA dza ni tshim do ha'o// tsa la ni rlung ngo // ba shu ni ri dgas so// ma sa yan ti ni dkyil 'khor ro// sa sa
248a7(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi mdo'o/ / ko ta ni khrag go/ ma hA ba sa ni mi 'gyur ba chen po'o// a ha zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug chen po'o// si d+hi ni rnam grangs so// kha la reg na ltogs pa zhes pa'o// so la reg pa ni tshim zhes pa'o// an/
248b1(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ni un po zhes su gsungs so// gsang bar reg na 'khrig pa'o// brla la reg na gyis zhes pa'o// 'og tu bltas na med ces pa'o// steng du bltas na yod ces pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma'o//
248b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ gsang ba'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams// g.yon nas byung bas bya ba ste// cho ga
248b3(rgyud 'bum): shes nas phyag gi lan/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma las byung // sa ni spyan mar bshad pa yin// chu khams mA ma kI ru brjod// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ni// me dang rlung du rnam par gnas// 'o byed ma
248b4(rgyud 'bum): ni stong pa'o/ / de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'o// mdzub mo'i lcags kyu'i spyan ma ste// mthe bong mA ma kI ru brjod// gung mo gos dkar mo ru brjod// mthe'u chung la ni sgrol mar sbyar// ming med pa la pha rol byin//
248b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbus su mthong // gnas la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad rgyab tu gshegs su gsol// de ltar g.yon pa khyad par can// slob ma la ni bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems
248b6(rgyud 'bum): / dpa' thabs chen dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad// gsum pa pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ bzhi pa he ru ka ru brjod// lnga pa nam mkha'i snying po ste// drug pa la ni rta mgrin no// de bzhin khro
248b7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rdo rje mchog/ 'khor lo'i gnas la blta bar bya// bya ba thams cad sgrub pa la// rang ming brjod pa'i sngags dang ni// hUM hUM phaT yig sbar ba yin// gshin rje'i phyogs nas brtsams nas ni//
249a1(rgyud 'bum): ji srid bden bral gyi ni bar// g.yon pa'i kun spyod 'di rnams 'dod// mkha' 'gro ma ni mnyam par gnas// 'di rnams rang gi rigs dang ni// phyag rgya dang ni kha dog
249a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs/ / rigs kyi rig pa yi ge nyid// gang phyir de yi rigs su 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bcings pa yin// smra ba rang gi rigs ni brjod// bud med gang zhig g.yon du 'gro// rtag tu mkha' 'gro
249a3(rgyud 'bum): ma ni g.yon/ / ngag ni rab tu chen por 'gro// g.yon pa'i lta bas kun tu blta// bud med rnams la dgyes par smra// de ni dam tshig ces su brjod// bud med rnams la gsol ba gdab// rigs kyi
249a4(rgyud 'bum): sa bon rab tu brjod/ / rigs kyi bya ba gtang mi bya// rang gi bstan bcos brjod mi dor// rang gi rigs kyi rig pa bzlas// de bzhin du ni dam tshig bstan// gang zhig phyag ni byed pa ni// rtag tu
249a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa yis ni bya/ / bud med rnams dang mthun par bya// de yis nges par bden par 'byung // rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong gis// sa la rko zhing ri mo 'dri// lag pa g.yon pa rang phyogs kyi// spri ngo
249a6(rgyud 'bum): la ni 'drud par byed/ / de yis rang gi rig pa dran// sgrub po'i lus la phan pa yin// mkhur tshos dang ni kos sgo dang // sna la snyim pas reg pa yin// logs su lta zhing sngags bzlas dang // lan
249a7(rgyud 'bum): cig rig pa la ni b+ha/ / rnal 'byor ma ni bde bar 'gro// gang gis dam tshig nges pa yi// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor ma rnams de bzhin no// bdud rtsi lnga ni bden par 'byung //
249b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun byed mdzes pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rigs dang ni// 'di ru dpa' bo la sogs mtshan// thod pa bla re mche ba dang // 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ral gri dang // rtse gcig tu ni brgyad par
249b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya// dpa' bo sgrub pa rab tu grags// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo yi// rigs las yang dag byung ba yin// rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug gtso// gang zhig rtag tu
249b3(rgyud 'bum): la sred/ / mkha' 'gro thabs kyi nga rgyal gyis// zad pa med cing khyad par med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung // 'jigs pa med cing ngo tsha med// thams cad dus su 'gyod pa med// mchod
249b4(rgyud 'bum): ba byed par 'dod pa ste/ / sgrub pos mtshan ni thog thag tu// gzhan la nam yang bshad mi bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung // zhes bya gang gis bklags pas 'grub// sgrub pos dka'
249b5(rgyud 'bum): ba med pa ru/ / sa 'og tu ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sems can la ni phan dang gnod// yul kun tu ni skyes pa la// ji ltar rim pa zhi dang rgyas// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ lag pa'i
249b6(rgyud 'bum): brda dang / rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mngon sum dngos
249b7(rgyud 'bum): grub ster ba dang / / gang gis bris pa tsam gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ba rlag par 'gyur// ro dang btsun mo'i 'dzag pa las// rab dang 'bad pas yang dag blang // bcu bzhi dang ni nag pa'i
250a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad/ / ro sreg khung bu'i sol ba yis// thams cad rdo rje zhal bzhi pa'i// sngags ni rab tu chud par bya// sgrub pos gang zhig gnas su ni// lan bdun bzlas la brkos la
250a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'gyur// gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin rig pa'i stobs kyis ni// lus la mngon par brgyan byas pa// de yang yid kyi rnal 'byor gyis// mngon
250a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ / de ltar cho ga yang dag ldan// thams cad las ni sgrub par 'gyur// rang nyid kyi ni sngags bzung na// bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni// 'grub pa dag tu yang mi 'gyur// de kho
250a4(rgyud 'bum): na nyid bsdus pa dang / / dpal mchog dang po 'khor lo sdom// rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs par// man ngag nye bar 'gro ba ni// lus kyi dbus na yod pa ste// rdo rje khrag 'thung ye shes ni// sgrub bos gang
250a5(rgyud 'bum): gis mi shes pa/ / gang zhig brtul zhugs yun ring yang // de las dngos grub med par 'gyur// 'di ru las mchog shes par bya// sngags gzhan rgyas pa ci zhig dgos// 'di rnams kun ni yongs su
250a6(rgyud 'bum): gtang / / rab tu 'bad pas 'di ru gzung // sgrub pos gang dang gang gis ni// bsgom dang bzlas pa brtsams pa yin// de dang de yis rnal 'byor bdag/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// ji ltar nor
250a7(rgyud 'bum): bu dang ba dag/ rdzas la brten nas gzugs ni 'dzin// de ltar dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal// bsam gtan yang dag mchog tu 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang dag la// mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/
250b1(rgyud 'bum): de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu 'dra// sgrub po rnal 'byor gzhan la 'dod// bskal ba bye ba brgyas mi 'grub// bya ba'i rgyud kyi sgrub pa la// dpa' bos rab tu sbyor ba sbas// ji
250b2(rgyud 'bum): srid snying po rgyas kyi bar/ / de dang de ni nyon mongs 'gyur// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ nang gi bsam gtan dang / bzlas pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa
250b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa'o/ / // de nas sngags shes shin tu gsang // sbyor shes de nyid rnal 'byor brtsams// 'gro ba kun ni rmongs pas khyab// kr-i ya'i lam la sgrub pa yis// bskal ba bye ba
250b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya yis kyang / / de la 'bras bu thob pa med// sngags rnams 'di ni thams cad ni// dpa' bo dag gis sbas pa ste// de nas rnal 'byor shes pas sngags// gcig min yi ge ma lus pas// sbas nas yang
250b5(rgyud 'bum): ni thams cad la/ / brtson 'grus stobs kyi pha rol gnon// dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam bkug ste// slob dpon bdag nyid chen pos ni// myur du dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// de ltar rtags ni ston pa'o//
250b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang sbyor sgrub pa pos// nyon mongs med las 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig med pas bklags pa dang // gang gis nam yang nyan pa ste// ngan pa'i bdag nyid can gyis 'joms// rnal 'byor ngan 'gro
250b7(rgyud 'bum): lam du 'gro/ / 'jig rten pa la spyod pas dran// g.yon pa'i sngags las kun tu dmigs// thams cad g.yon pas kun tu bya// dngos grub kun ni rab tu ster// rnal 'byor ye shes sbas nas ni//
251a1(rgyud 'bum): ya'i bstan bcos la ni 'jug/ rab tu 'bad pas sgrub pa pos// de dang des ni 'grub par 'gyur// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ sbas pa'i sngags dang dam tshig
251a2(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhi dag/ yang dag bsdus te bshad pa yin// ba lang lci ba skam po dang // de bzhin lhag sa
251a3(rgyud 'bum): mgo skam dang / / ro sreg bzhi yi mgo ri dang // 'byung ba chen po bzhi pa'o// 'bum la phreng dang brgya yis dman// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs pa ste// gsum mtha'i thig le'i steng du'o// bzhi pa'i mthar
251a4(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu sbyar/ / 'bum mthar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed// bden pa gnyis la mnyam par brten// rtag tu drug cu rtsa bzhi mchod// 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug thang shing la//
251a5(rgyud 'bum): mi gang mnyam par spyod pa'i mchog/ sdig kun rnam dag bdag nyid do// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// sangs rgyas nyid mthong skad cig gis// ha gnyis thog mar dbang phyug dang // ha gnyis
251a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi khro bo ste/ / sa ra sa ni nying ngag dang // ngang pa dang naM ka ran dang // khrung khrung dang ni chu skyur dag/ sngags bya chen por brjod pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi gtor ma spyod// dkyil 'khor la ni dngos
251a7(rgyud 'bum): / grub bsgrub// sngags pas lan cig tu ni brjod// gzugs can ma ni myur du yongs// dgug cing dbang du 'gyur ba ste// ji srid 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ste// bud med stong gis yongs bskor nas// sgrub
251b1(rgyud 'bum): bos sa yi stengs su rtse/ / dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo yi// gro gar gi wang gis bris te// rtag tu sgrub po'i spyi bor btags// kun gyis khrag 'thung 'dra bar mthong // gos dmar yongs su bgos nas ni//
251b2(rgyud 'bum): / sgrub pos mtshan ni thog thag tu// chu las yongs su bzlas nas ni// shing la bsnun na me tog ltung // skyes pa bud med phrag pa la// lag pa bzhag ste bzlas na ni// rdo rje phag mo dbang du 'gyur// man shing
251b3(rgyud 'bum): li lan nyi shu bzlas/ / rkang pa la byugs mgo gnon 'gyur// go ro tsa na la lan nyi shur mngon par bzlas pa byas nas gang la thig ler byas pa de thams cad skye bo kun gyis byams par 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs
251b4(rgyud 'bum): nang du 'jug na sku drin chen por 'gyur ro/ / mig sman la lan brgyad brgyar bsngags te/ mig la mig sman byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyungs kar la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/ skyes bu la
251b5(rgyud 'bum): bsnun na shing du 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// chu la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po yi sngags 'di yis// ston mo'i bya ba bza' ston mo//
251b6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas kun tu thams cad du// rnal 'byor ma ni dgyes par 'gyur// thal ba la yongs su bzlas nas gzhan gyi rigs la bsnun na rengs par 'gyur ro// gos la brgyad brgyar yongs su
251b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te/ mdung pa bcings na gos shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar nor dang / gos dang / gzhan yang btang ba la sogs pa mang por 'gyur ro// chu la bzlas te chur thugs na chu skam par
252a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / thal ba la yongs su bzlas te zhing la bsnun na khrag tu 'gyur ro// yid kyis bzlas na thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi thal ba la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsdu
252a2(rgyud 'bum): te thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / mar la yongs su bzlas te mnyes nas sgo la reg na sgo rang 'byed par 'gyur ro// bum pa la yongs su bzlas te chus bkang na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni
252a3(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur ro/ / lcags kyi phur bu la mngon par bsngags te// 'o ma can gyi shing bcad nas yam shing la lan cig byas te/ gang gi ming dang sngags brgyad brgyar bzlas te bsregs nas/ de'i thal
252a4(rgyud 'bum): ba blangs te skyes pa la byugs na bud med du 'gyur ro/ / tsan ngan la yongs su bzlas te bsnun na rlag par 'gyur ro// lan tshwa la yongs su bzlas te skyes pas bud med la byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro//
252a5(rgyud 'bum): me tog la yongs su bzlas te mi'i lus po la bsnun na myon par 'gyur ro// thal ba la yongs su bzlas te thig le byas na gos dang bral bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa bam bud med
252a6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi rkang pa g.yon pa'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs te gos la bcings nas gang gi ming brkos te sbas na bcings par 'gyur ro/ / skud pa la yongs su bzlas te mdung ba gsum byas nas lan bdun mngon
252a7(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags pa dgra bo'i dbus su bcug na sbrul du 'gyur te/ de'i mche bas btab na mi gsod par 'gyur ro// slar yang brkyang brgyar bzlas na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// me tog la mngon par bsngags pa
252b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas spyi bor bzung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / mi snang bar gyur kyang bud med thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// me tog la mngon par bzlas te mngon par gtor na de nyid du gnas par
252b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jim pa'i gong bu la yongs su bzlas te spyi bor bzung na spyi bo mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// dpa' bo'i chu la yongs
252b3(rgyud 'bum): su bzlas te bsnun na 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya yongs su brje zhing posgos na gzugs yongs su brje bar 'gyur ro// dzA ti dang tsam pa ka'i me tog rnams la
252b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bgan ti ka dang sbyar ba'i dris 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ / chang yang dri chen du dri gyur par the tsom med do// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las
252b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / / de nas gsang ba thams cad kyi// yid 'ong ston mo la 'dus pa// gang zhig yang dag
252b6(rgyud 'bum): shes pa ni/ / gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor rnams// sha dang tshang du ldan pa yi// ston mo sna tshogs kyis ni 'grub// skal ldan mdza' bo'i longs spyod kyis// tshe ni dam par 'grub par 'gyur//
252b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa dang bud med kyi kam du song ste rin po che rnams sdud par byed do// de byir bla med dkon mchog gsum// shes par bya ste 'grub par 'gyur// ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu dang // skud pa gsum dang
253a1(rgyud 'bum): @lha rnams ni/ / thams cad gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// rab tu 'grub par the tshom med// tshul yongs su bzlas te zla ba'i btung ba la blugs na mer 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni grol bar
253a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / las rnams thams cad sgrub pa pos// de nas ri yi chu blangs te// tsan dan dmar po nyid la zla ba drug tu nye bar longs spyad na nad thams cad rnam par spong zhing lo stong phrag gcig tu gson zhing skra
253a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar dang gzer ma rnams spong ngo / / sa bon nag po blangs te sngags pas dngos po kun gyi snar blugs nas rnal 'byor pas bzlas na gnyer ma dang / skra dkar dang / mchi ma rnams kyis mi tshugs so// tshe
253a4(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa dang / skal ba bzang po dang / skal ba ngan pa rnam par spang ngo // nang thams cad rnam par spangs shing lo stong phrag gcig tu gson par 'gyur ro// don rnams kun gyi sgrub pa pos// de ltar cho ga
253a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / bcom ldan mo yi lus gzugs kyis// bzlas dang brtul zhugs bral bas kyang // mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// bla ma'i spyod pa sangs rgyas mnyam// brtson 'grus ldan zhing
253a6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gnon/ / gru gsum gyi ni dkyil 'khor du// gal te rgyal po de mchod byed// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// de ru rtag tu nga 'dug ste// rang byung me tog la sogs pas// rtag tu bdag
253a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchod par bya/ / dpa' bos zla ba gcig gis 'grub// ji ltar rang bzhin de bzhin 'gyur// rdo rje phag mo'i rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug ste// chung ma dga' ba med par 'gyur// yid
253b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis sngags ni yongs bzlas na/ / gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// sems can thams cad dbang 'gyur zhing // dngos grub thams cad the tshom med// dpal khrag bzung mngon par 'byung ba las/
253b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi tshe 'phel ba dang mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas gser la sogs pa ni// thams cad dgug pa'i mchog yin no// sngags
253b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun ni sbas pa ste/ / rnal 'byor rgyud gcig rnal 'byor ldan// nor gyi bdag po'i khyim song ste// gser gyi chu la lan bdun du// mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni// gang gi khyim du gtor
253b4(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur na// nyin zhag bdun na gser rnams 'gugs// dpag tshad stong phrag gcig gi sa// thig le byas na bsgrub bya 'gugs// kha T+wAM ga la lan bdun mngon
253b5(rgyud 'bum): par bsngags pa byas nas de la bdug na dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ gang blugs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro//
253b6(rgyud 'bum): paT yige dang bcas pa'i rgyas btab par 'gyur zhing rengs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dpal rdo rje phag mo'i yid kyis 'dod pa bzhin bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad ji ltar
253b7(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / nyin zhag bdun la 'bum phrag stong gi sbyin sreg gis dpal bong bar 'gyur ro// rigs can rnams la sbyin pa ster bar 'gyur ro// man shing srang gcig
254a1(rgyud 'bum): blangs te nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'i nam phyed na mchod pa byas te/ mur me chen po sbar zhing gtor ma dang lha bshos phul te/ brgyad brgya mngon par bsngags nas a mardza
254a2(rgyud 'bum): na bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad stong phrag gcig tu 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas ka ra bI ra'i me tog stong phrag gcig tu sbyin sreg byas na nam mkhar lha mo gnas shing bud
254a3(rgyud 'bum): med thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / chu'i nang du zhugs te mar dang sbrang rtsi la stong phrag brgyad du bzlas nas ji srid 'dod pa de srid du sbyin sreg byas na/ de nas 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par
254a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rkun mo dang rgyal rigs kyis nges par 'tshe ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa' yang yid kyis bzlas nas rdo rjes nges par 'gyur ro// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ rdo rje phag mo'i
254a5(rgyud 'bum): / yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gsang chen thams cad ni// gzugs ni yongs su brje ba ste/
254a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnams kun la gsang ba ni// 'di ru gsang ba'i bya ba gsung // ba lang gi spu las thag pa byas te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas/ gang gi ske la bcings pa de'ang ba lang du 'gyur ro//
254a7(rgyud 'bum): de ltar sems can gyi ske la bcings par gyur pa de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// so ba la mngon par bsngags te so ba'i bdag po'i khyim du gtor nas lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar/
254b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro// nyin zhag bdun gyis so ba thams cad dang nor gzhan kun 'gugs par 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi shing la phyags lham byas te mngon par bsngags nas de la mngon par gnas na gang /
254b2(rgyud 'bum): du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i yi ge drug pa zlos shing rkang rjes kyi rdul dang thal bar bcas pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa
254b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas gang la byugs pa de rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro// sngags bzlas shing spyi bor bcings na gang gis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar
254b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma la mngon par bltas te ming dang sngags bzlas na de 'gugs par 'gyur ro// zhag gcig gis dpag tshad gcig tshun chad dbang du 'gyur ro// zhag gsum gyis dpag tshad bcu
254b5(rgyud 'bum): tshun chad ngo / / zhag bdun gyis dpag tshad nyi khri tshun chad 'gugs pa'o// byi la'i spu dang gang gi ming dang lhan cig sbyin sreg byas na de gza' chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro// gang la nges bcings
254b6(rgyud 'bum): ba de byi lar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar khyi dang bya rog gi rgyas pas srang bu byas te mngon par bsngags na de bya rog tu 'gyur ro// de ltar sems can gang gis srang bu blangs te mngon par bsngags nas mgrin
254b7(rgyud 'bum): par bcings na de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ / bkrol bas ni grol bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i sgra'i srad bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bud med gang gi mgrin
255a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la bcings na de ni skyes par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar bud med kyi ska la srad bu bsgril te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas skyes pa gang gi mgrin par bcings pa de ni bur
255a2(rgyud 'bum): med du 'gyur ro/ / lag pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas reg na mngal 'pho bar 'gyur ro// bkrol bas ni grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yid kyis bzlas na rig
255a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas na dpal mo skye bar 'gyur ro// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ de nyid sngags kyis gzugs thams cad yongs su brje ba dang dbang du byed
255a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / de nas phur bu'i cho ga bshad// bram ze'i dmod pa 'dra ba yi// rnal 'byor yan lag yang dag blang // gsang ba'i las
255a5(rgyud 'bum): ni skye bar 'gyur/ / spre 'u'i rus pa'i rang bzhin pas// phur bu sor ni drug par bya// lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags te// gang gi sgo ru sbas pas ni// de yi rigs ni 'chad par 'gyur// ba lang klung
255a6(rgyud 'bum): chen rta dang ni/ / bong bu rnga mo ma he sha/ gnas pa'i sa der sbas na ni// de rnams rlag par 'gyur ba yin// mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin// gang zhig rtag tu 'di bsgom pa// rtag tu mig mi
255a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzums par blta/ / gang la bzlas par gyur pa yis// de yi mig ni ltung bar 'gyur// gang gi ming dang sngags su bzlas// de yi khrag ni 'gugs par 'gyur// thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mo//
255b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i mchog ni nyer spyod kyi// las ni kun tu bya ba yin// ji ltar 'dod pa dpal khrag 'thung // rdo rje phag mo'i snying po dang // de bzhin nye ba'i snying po'o// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/
255b2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu mdzes// gsang ba'i bla ma bla med sngags// lha
255b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/ / lha mo kun gyi snying po ni// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// b+ha yig bdag gis rab tu gsungs// oM yig sa bon zhes su brjod// ji ltar e yig sa bon la// me yi bu
255b4(rgyud 'bum): / ni gsum pas dbye// hUM phaT yi ge mtha' ru sbyar// 'di rnams yi ge drug pa'i sngags// mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin// gang zhig rtag tu 'di sgom pa// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras skal ldan// rtag
255b5(rgyud 'bum): tu de la bud med bzang / / sgrub pa la ni 'ong bar 'gyur// 'dod pas brgyal bar 'gyur na ni// sna tshogs kun tu 'dzag pa ste// sems ni 'dod pas dgyes nas su// de rnams kun ni 'ong bar 'gyur// rtag
255b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bzlas nas bud med rnams/ / rgan dang gzhon pa dbang du 'gyur// byin gyis rlob pa byed par 'gyur// rang gi khyim du zhugs nas ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rtag pa'i las 'di nye bar spyad pa ni las
255b7(rgyud 'bum): kun byed par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas te/ sgrub po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas pho nya sgrub bo// de'i lag mthil du song ba'i dpal sus kyang 'phrog par mi nus so// khang stong
256a1(rgyud 'bum): du zhugs nas nub tu kha bltas te/ stan la 'dug nas gos kyis yol bar byas te/ de la bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo byin te/ sman rnam pa lngas spos byas te/ mar khu chen
256a2(rgyud 'bum): pos me mar rab tu spar la stong phrag gcig tu bzlas pa byas te/ de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor la zhugs te sgrub pa po la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams
256a3(rgyud 'bum): cad ston par 'gyur ro/ / sha dang kha zas kyi lhag mas rnal 'byor ma rnams la gtor ma byin te/ gi wang la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags nas mig la an dza byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang gis
256a4(rgyud 'bum): nam yang 'di dam tshig med pa la brjod par mi bya ste/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar dpal he ru ka la mchod pa bzhin/ de ltar slob dpon rab tu 'bad pas mchod do//
256a5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du dgyes par byas te/ dpal he ru ka dgyes par byas nas rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dis dgyes nas mchog ster zhing slob dpon dgyes na thams cad dgyes nas the tshom med do// dpal khrag
256a6(rgyud 'bum): bathung mngon par 'byung ba las/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags btu ba'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
256a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa// sngon bzhin thang ka'i mdun du ni// gang gis myur du de 'grub 'gyur// yid kyis dbang bskur thob pa ni// rnal 'byor chen po la gnas te// dngos grub kun kyang phyag rgya ste// sgrub
256b1(rgyud 'bum): pos yang dag mchod par bya'o/ / dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'ongs nas mchog ster bar byed do// de la arga phul te pus mo sa la btsugs nas lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ bsgrub pa'i mchog gis
256b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya'o/ / sgrub pa po'i lus la 'jug par the tshom med do// dpa' bo'i mig ni rab tu gdangs pa dang / thams cad shes shing gtso bo thams cad byed pa dang / de nas sgrub pa po mchog 'jig rten
256b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum du thams cad du 'gro ba'o/ / dpa' bo 'di rnams ye shes che// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sa dang rgya mtsho ska rags te// lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/
256b4(rgyud 'bum): / myur du dbang du byed par 'gyur// oM shrI he ru ka ya bid ma he bid d+hA rA dzA ya hi ma he swA hA/ bsgrub bya'i spyi bo la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bkod pas rengs par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di rnam par shes nas steng du
256b5(rgyud 'bum): stobs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang / glang po che dang / spre'u dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / rta dang / de bzhin du dmag mi rnams 'dir lus la bkod na rengs par 'gyur ro// de ltar yongs su
256b6(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa yis/ / gru gsum dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // skad cig tsam gyis bong bar 'gyur// kha yi dbus su rnam par bkod// de bzhin lce dang rkan la'o// de ni myur
256b7(rgyud 'bum): du dge bar 'gro/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam pa yang // skad cig gis ni mi smra 'gyur// lce yi rtse nas rig pa 'phrog/ 'di ru bkod pas 'grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi rgyal po snying khar dgod// sems
257a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'phrog par byed pa yi/ / rkang pa'i mthil nas mgo yi bar// nag po'i gzugs ni rnam par dkod// dbang po thams cad 'phrog pa ru// byed pa ru ni the tshom med// las
257a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di thams cad byed par 'gyur/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster// 'di rnams de yi dpa' bos gsungs// 'dod pas sa stengs rnyed par dka'// bdag nyid yid bzhin nor bu nyid// de nyid
257a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus par rnam bshad pa/ / 'di yi sngags dang 'dra ba med// 'di yi las dang mnyam pa med// rnam par mi shes pa yis ni// cung zad las ni 'grub pa med// sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par shes//
257a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad mdzes par byed// rang gi lus la rnam par dgod// sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// des ni bltas pas dbang du 'gyur// thams cad sgrub po'i gtso bo yis// rab tu khros
257a5(rgyud 'bum): ba gsod par 'gyur/ / brtul gzhan rnam par khros pa yi// chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho dang // 'khrug pa dang ni rgyal rigs dang // rkun mo me yi 'jigs pa las// de yi rdo rje thog tu 'gyur// gang der yang dag
257a6(rgyud 'bum): bris pa yis/ / 'jig rten gsum yang g.yo ba dang // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// sgrub pos mchog tu gyur pa yis// dbang du dgug dang rengs pa yi// rnam par snang ba bskrang dang
257a7(rgyud 'bum): gsad/ / gang du ming gis bris te bzung // thams cad du ni 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha// mkhas pa yis ni myur ba ru// skal med kyis kyang 'grub pa yin// sgrub
257b1(rgyud 'bum): pos rab tu 'bad pa yis/ / 'di ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'khrug pa dgra dang g.yang sa dang // rkun po stag dang glang chen dang // seng sbrul rta dang mtshon cha'i bar// gza' ni sna tshogs 'jigs pa/
257b2(rgyud 'bum): las// thams cad du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// nga ni rtsod pa med 'dod na// sngags pas bri bar bya ba yin// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i klu'i las kyi cho ga'i
257b3(rgyud 'bum): le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas bskrad pa yang dag bshad// dgra bo stobs kyis dregs pas na// steng du 'khor ba'i 'dab ma la// mkhas pas bya rog sgro yis bri/
257b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po go bzlog yang dag ldan// 'byung po'i zhag la brgya ru bzlas// steng du 'khor zhing lding ba yi// 'dab ma phyed dang gnyis las ni// bsgrub bya myur du skrod par 'gyur// gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' sgred// nim
257b5(rgyud 'bum): pa pa tra'i khu bar ldan/ / bsgrub bya'i ming dang dam tshig dang // snying du sngags kyis chud par bya// me la sbyin sreg bya ba ste// brgyad lhag brgya ni yongs su bzlas// go bzlog pa yi snying po yis// nyi ma phyed dam nam
257b6(rgyud 'bum): / byed na// pho nya 'khor zhing sngags ni bzlas// snying po gnyis brgyad lhag pa'i brgyas// 'di rnams 'khor bar bya ba yin// yid kyis brgyad brgyas dgra rnams ni// 'khrul 'khor dag ni gzhug par bya// sngags kyi
257b7(rgyud 'bum): zhags pas bcings pa dang / / spyi bor dbyug pa yis ni brdung // tshangs pa dbang po drag po dang // ming dang dgra rnams gsod pa yin// zla ba dag ni phyed pa la// bsgrub bya'i spyir ni yang dag bri// thod pa khrag
258a1(rgyud 'bum): gis bkang ba yi/ / gang gis gnas su de nyid bzla// de ma thag tu khrag gis 'dzag/ sngags la sun ni 'byin pa de// de nyid kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang po'i
258a2(rgyud 'bum): dgra/ / 'di nyid stong pa chen po ste// dngos grub kun byed mdzes pa yin// 'di ni khrag 'thung gis ni brjod// sngon dang phyi ma dbus ngag tu// mkhas pas 'jig rten sbyor par shes// dpal khrag 'thung mngon
258a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'byung ba las/ gdug pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas char pa dbab par bshad// dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor
258a4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / gang gis myur du char 'bebs pa// klu brgyad pos ni the tshom med// mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang // de bzhin 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu// pad+ma dang ni pad chen dang // dung skyong dang ni rigs ldan brjod//
258a5(rgyud 'bum): so so zhing ni re re yi// sngags dang rang ming brjod par bya// sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas dbye ba bya// bcu drug pas ni mnyam par brten// thog ma tha ma mnyam ldan brtags// sngags
258a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag ni mnyam par sbyor/ / mtha' yas la sogs brgyad po ni// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo yi// 'jigs pas gzugs brnyan bya ba yin// phyogs kyi mdog tu gdengs kha bdun// sngags kyis bskul
258a7(rgyud 'bum): bas yang dag ldan/ / de yi snying khar gzhug par bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dgod byas la// bzhag ste nyin bdun mchod par bya// mtha' dag chu yis rgyas par byas// myur du char ni mi 'bebs na// las gzhan
258b1(rgyud 'bum): dag ni sbyang bar bya/ / dung khrod kyi ni ras dag la// dug dang ni tshe dag dang ni// nim pa'i bdab ma'i khru ba yis// sngags 'di dag ni yang dag bre// sbu gul sogs par ni gzug/ dazas phub ma la gdung
258b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / char mi 'bab par 'gyur ba'o// yang na klu nar rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mgo dgu pa byas la de'i snying khar bcug la gdung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba'i rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling
258b3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / dpal he ru ka'i bka' nyan par byed pa dang / klu la klus zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas dpal ldan sbyin sreg gis// gza' dgu po ni zhi ba yin// mig dmar mjug rings la sogs
258b4(rgyud 'bum): par/ / sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du sbyar// nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin// mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang // de bzhin phur bu pa wa sangs// de bzhin du ni spen pa mchog/ sgra gcan mjug rings mnyam par bshad// rang
258b5(rgyud 'bum): ming brjod pa yi ni sngags/ / dang po oM gyi yi ge dang // tha mar swA hA sbyar ba yin// dbang po me dang gshin rje dang // de bzhin bden bral chu bdag dang // rlung lha dang ni gnod sbyin dang // dbang ldan du ni rab tu grags//
258b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // sbyor ba'i lam la rab tu 'jug/ rang mtshan bzhon pa kha dog dang // 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid che// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// bsgrub bya la ni sbyor ba yin// nyin zhag bdun
258b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi sbyin sreg gos/ / sgrub po ci bgyi 'gyur ba yin// nal bzhi pa yi sngags kyis ni// phyogs dang mtshams su gsungs pa ste// 'bru rnams thams cad bsres nas ni// ni khri ru ni bsngags nas kyang // grangs ni brgyad
259a1(rgyud 'bum): dang dgu po sprug/ 'di rnams 'jig rten pa yin te// rnal 'byor pas ni sgrub pa po// sa yi steng du rnam par spyod// dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'jig rten 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
259a2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mchog/ sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas kun// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam par bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thung mchod pa dang // mtho ris kyi ni don ched du// zhi ba'i
259a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'ong ba ste/ / rtag tu drug cu rtsa bzhi mchod// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// rang byung ye shes kyi ni gzhi// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las//
259a4(rgyud 'bum): char dbab pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan na med pa yi// pho nya kun gyi dbang phyug mchog/ 6
259a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yaM ni hUM yig dang / / ji ltar 'dod par las kyis dbye// lha dang mi yi bde ba ni// gcig tu bsdus nas bltas pa yis// khrag 'thung gnyis med bde ba la// bcu drug char yang mi phod ngo // gos chen
259a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni sha chen dang / / dbang chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che// thams cad dur khrod nas ni byung // phyag rgya 'di yi dbang phyug mchog/ bya ba kun la dngos grub ster// ji srid mdun du dgra bo sgom// zhags pa nag pos
259a7(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa bcings/ / 'dod pas dbyug pas brdung bar bya// cho ga bzhin du sngags pas bsam// lho phyogs su ni bsgyel bar bya// dgar ba yid dang ltung ba dang // yang dang yang du bskrad pa dang // lte
259b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ru ni bkag pa nyid/ / yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur// nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed na// gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyin sreg bya// nyi ma gsum pa kun tu bri// 'chi bar 'gyur zhing mgo bo ltung // sngags kyi cho gas
259b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar ni/ / sa steng mche bas btab pa ste// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags kyis ni// rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ster// snying pos mi la bsdus nas su// phyi nas yang ni ltung ba yin// phyag rgya chen po'i snying
259b3(rgyud 'bum): bo ru/ / yon po zhes byar rab tu grags// sgrub pos 'jig rten gsum po yang // 'di yis thams cad bsdus pa yin// de nas bskrad pa bshad par bya// dgra bo rnams kyis stobs dregs dang // sngags
259b4(rgyud 'bum): pas sngon gsungs cho ga bzhin/ / nim pa'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang // bya rog sgro yi bye brag gis// sgrub pos rab tu 'bad pa mchog/ blo ldan rang gi gnas la bskyod// de ni sa sngangs 'khor lo sgyur//
259b5(rgyud 'bum): ma bdun gyis lha nyid dang // zla ba yis ni 'jig rten pa// lo yis sangs rgyas byang chub sems// dran pas phal che'i mi rnams so// zla ba phyed kyis lha ma yin// srin po dang ni gnod sbyin mo// klu dang rnga
259b6(rgyud 'bum): za dag dang ni/ / mi 'am ci la sogs skad du// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// sgrub pos sa stengs rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor 'di ni dngos grub che// rnal 'byor kun la 'di mchog yin// rnal 'byor
259b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dpal chen po/ / sum cu pas ni mchod pa yin// 'di dang 'dra ba gzhan na med// cung zad mdzad pa gsad pa brgyas// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal// gsang ba'i ming dang mkha' 'gro ma//
260a1(rgyud 'bum): @gang zhig cung zad pas rab ste// de kun lho ru kha bltas pa'o// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ bsnad pa dang gsad pa'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum
260a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi sngags// cho ga shes pas sngags ni gsang // 'dod pa'i dngos grub bong bar 'gyur// sems ni shin tu rnam dag
260a3(rgyud 'bum): byas/ / de nas rdza rnga bcing bar bya// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// dbyangs kyi yi ge dgong bar bya// re mig dag ni bcing bya ste// mnyam par yi ge bzhi bcu dgu// gnas der bro ldan gyis ni btu// dang po
260a4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa' sogs/ / rdza rje'i rnam pa dpa' bo che// dba' bo chen po'i zhal ni bsgyur// ji ltar rigs pa de ltar byas// mtha' dag rab tu zhi ba yin// sde tshan dbye ba shes byas nas// mkhas pas phyi mo las
260a5(rgyud 'bum): nibatu/ / bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa blangs te// dbyangs kyi lnga pas yang dag ldan// dang po yi ger gyur pa yin// de nas bzhi bcu rtsa gcig blang // bzhi bcu pa yis sbyar ba yin// gnyis par yongs su grags pa'o//
260a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas sum cu so drug blang // dbyangs kyi gsum pa sbyar ba yin// gsum pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o// drod kyi yi ge gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pa yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o// drug pa y-i
260a7(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa la/ / de nyid kyi ni bzhi par ldan// lnga pa yi ger gyur pa ste// rdo rje sems bdag nyid chen po// de bzhin bzhi bcu rtsa dgu blang // dbyangs kyi lnga las sbyar ba ste// steng du nA ngas sbyar ba yin// yi ge drug pa
260b1(rgyud 'bum): ru ni brjod/ / oM gyi yi ge dang po ste// phaT kyi yi ge tha mar ro// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags// de bzhin gcig dman lnga bcu la// dbyangs kyi gnyis par sbyar ba yin// ya yi sde tshan brgyad pa la// me yi dbus
260b2(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyar ba yin/ / dbyangs kyi bzhi pas sbyar ba ste// gnyis pa'i yi ge mchog yin no// steng du nA das sbyar ba'o// yi ge gcig dman nyi shu la// skye bar byed pas yang dag gnas// dbyangs kyi gsum pas
260b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba yin/ / yi ge gsum par gyur pa yin// gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu blang // sum cu rtsa drug yang dag blang // yi ge bzhi pa brjod pa'o// lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// de bzhin bzhi bcu na brgyad
260b4(rgyud 'bum): bgazugs kyis rab tu dbye ba yin/ / bco lnga pa ni yang dag blang // yi ge bdun pa ru ni brjod// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa pos// oM gyi yi ge dang po ste// hUM phaT yi ge mtha' ru sbyar// rnam snang
260b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad du gyur pa'o/ / 'dis ni dngos grub thams cad ster// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid ngag dang // an tas+tha yi gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis sbyar// gnyis pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o// bzhi bcu rtsa
260b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yang dag ldan/ / dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar ba ste// yi ge gsum par gyur pa'o// oM yig dang por swA hA mthar// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/ 'di rnams rang gi bsngags pa'o// de bzhin gcig
260b7(rgyud 'bum): dman lnga bcu blang / / dbyangs yig bcu gcig po yis sbyar// dang po'i yi ge brjod par bya// drod kyi yi ge bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig gis ni sbyar// gnyis pa'i yi ge brjod par bya// an tas+tha
261a1(rgyud 'bum): @yi gnyis pa la/ / dbyangs kyi stabs sbyar ba yin// ra yig dag dang bcu bdun pa// lnga pa yis ni mnyam par ldan// bco lnga pa yis mchod par bya// oM gyi yi ge dang po ste// d+hUhUM/
261a2(rgyud 'bum): paT ni mtha' mar yin// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi dbang // de nas bco brgyad pa ni brang // drod kyi yi ge dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu
261a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa yis sbyar/ / gnyis pa ru ni rab tu grags// an tas+tha yi gsum pa la// bcu gsum pa yis sbyar ba yin// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dag dang // mkhas pas gsum pa ru ni brjod// bzhi bcu rtsa
261a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis yang dag blang / / gcig gis ma tshang lnga bcu la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba yin// steng du nA ngas sbyar bar bya// oM gyi yi ge dang po ste// phaT kyi yi ge tha mar yin// de ltar nyid du the tshom med// 'di ni
261a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyi mar 'gyur/ / dngos grub ster zhing thar pa ste// yi ge bzhi bcu pa nyid dang // de nyid la ni dbyangs yig dang // bcu gsum pa yis sbyar ba yis// de ni gnyis ldan du ni bri// 'on kyang rig pa cung zad med//
261a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis ma tshang nyi shu dang // an tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang // dbyangs yig gnyis pas yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa yi sbyar// bzhi pa'i yi ger brjod pa'o// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin
261a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug pa nyid dang / / dpa' bo nyi shu drug pa btu// yi ge bdun pas brjod pa'o// oM gyi yi ge dang po dang // hUM phaT mtha' mar sbyar ba yin// dpa' bo chen po rta mgrin te// dngos grub kun gyi gtso bo yin//
261b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal khrag bzung mngon par 'byung ba las/ 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi bsam gtan dang sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste so dgu pa'o// de nas yang dag gnas pa'i sngags//
261b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma// snying kha mgo bo spyi gtsug dang // go cha mig la sogs pa ru// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs sbyar// cho ga byas shing rab tu bsrung // rdo rje sems dpa' snying la sbyar// dngos grub
261b3(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad rab tu ster// rnam par snang mdzad mgo bor dgod// de ltar yon tan khyad par can// spyi gtsug pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ phrag pa khrag 'thung dgod pa ste// mig gnyis rdo rje nyi ma yin// yan lag kun la
261b4(rgyud 'bum): rta mgrin te/ / de ltar go cha bgos pa yin// thams cad las ni sgrub par byed// lag par dgod pa yang ni bya// lag pa'i brda ni bstan bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bor gnas// de bzhin rnam snang mdzub
261b5(rgyud 'bum): mo ste/ / gung mo pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ ming med dpal ldan khrag 'thung ste// mthe'u chung rdo rje nyi ma'o// sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog yin// lag pa'i mthil du dpa' bo che// gnyis med rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma//
261b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kun// 'di rnams lag pa la ni dgod// kun gyi bltag par mnyam pa ni// de ltar cho ga bzhin du ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// gshin rje'i phyogs nas brtsams nas ni//
261b7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid bden bral gyi ni bar// dus drug nyis 'gyur du ni byas// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa mchog/ tshes dang dbyangs dang dus shes bya// dus bzhi sum 'gyur shes par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus su he ru
262a1(rgyud 'bum): ka/ spyan drangs nas ni mchod bab phel// rtag tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug la// mchod pas dbul bar mi 'gyur ro// mkha' bgro ma dang lA mA dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs
262a2(rgyud 'bum): can ma/ / 'di rnams dpa' bo'i sring mo yin// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa yin// dpal khrig 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang / lha'i grangs dang / lag pa'i mchod
262a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dus bzhi mtha' yi rnal 'byor la// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i gsang ba ni// dpa' bo gnyis
262a4(rgyud 'bum): med bstan par bya/ / rdzogs ldan 'di ru ma yin te// gsum ldan la ni sring mor brjod// gnyis ldan la ni bu mor shes// rtsod ldan chung ma'i pho nyar gnas// de ltar cho ga shes byas nas// dngos grub
262a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu skal ldan 'gyur/ / dpa' bo kun gyi rjes bsgoms nas// 'dod pa'i dngos grub yod pa yin// phyag rgya chen po'i theg pa che// rnal 'byor ma rnams dngos grub ster// phyag rgya chen po gzhan na
262a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / rnal 'byor kun la sgrub pa pos// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// gzhan yang rig byed smra ba dang // dpyod pa pa dang grangs can dang // gzhan yang bye brag smra ba ltar// tshangs pa khyab bajug
262a7(rgyud 'bum): lha chen gyi/ / kun tu dngos grub mchod pa ste// dngos grub yang dag ye shes nyid// thams cad pas ni mchog yin no// sa las rin chen bzhi yin te// de bzhin mchog gi mchog nyid do// mkha' 'gro
262b1(rgyud 'bum): ma dang rig pa che/ / dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po dang // sdom pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang // rnal 'byor 'di rnams shes pa mchog/ rig byed bzhi la nga mi byams// nga la gus pas nga byams so// de
262b2(rgyud 'bum): la nga ster de rjes gzung / / ji ltar bdag nyid kun tu mchod// thams cad gnyis su med pa ste// kun nas kun tu rnal 'byor sgrub// dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo mchog/ mdza' ba thams cad
262b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa yin/ / zla ba'i btung bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtag pa yi ni go 'phang mchog/ mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// mkha' dang mnyam las btus pa yin// kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin//
262b4(rgyud 'bum): khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung zhes pa// thar pa'i dngos grub mchog tu ste ra/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung ji ltar 'thob// yon tan gzhan ni rtswa bzhin btang //
262b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan ma mthe bong la ni gnas// mdzub mo mA ma kI ru brjod// gung mo'i rtse mor sgrol ma yin// ming med la ni 'od byed ma// mthe'u chung pha rol phyin ma dgod// lag pa'i mthil du mnyam par sbyor// rgyab
262b6(rgyud 'bum): tu gshegs su gsol ba ste/ / de ltar nyid du the tshom med// dpal khrag 'azung mngon par 'byung ba las/ lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//
262b7(rgyud 'bum): nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// skye ba bdun pa'i sgrub pa po// bsdus pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang rnal 'byor rab 'bad pas// babras dkar btags pa'i rang bzhin las// sngags pas byol
263a1(rgyud 'bum): song gzugs dang ni/ / gro ga la sogs yang dag blang // sgrub pos gang lta ji lta bar// de yi gzugs la gzhag bya ba// ming ni sngags kyi nang chung bya// lus ni tsan dan dmar
263a2(rgyud 'bum): pos byug/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// gang gis nub mo ci nus bzlas// dbyug pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag dang // de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// mi rnams dam tshig can du 'gyur//
263a3(rgyud 'bum): ce spang sha dang chang gis ni// phyi nang bdag nyid mchod par bya// ce sbrang sprin sreg byas pa las// de la dngos grub thams cad gnas// 'di ru ce spyang sbyin sreg bya// nor gyi lha dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
263a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas gtor ma sbyin par bya// mkha' 'gro ma kun dgyes par 'gyur// ji srid yongs su rgyas pa ru// de yi sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// yang dag brtag pa'i tshogs kyis gang // rnal 'byor bzhi
263a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs phyag rgya dang / / rang gi mdog dang phyag mtshan dbyibs// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// thig le dang ni nA das sbyar// rnal 'byor che la rnam par gnas// las kyi dbye bas hUM yin no//
263a6(rgyud 'bum): babang bas thar pa bsgom par bya// lte snying mamin pa snga yi rtser// hUM gi yi ge rnam pa bzhi// 'phar gdang ni ring thung dang // rnam bcad las ni dbye ba ste// 'phar ba yis ni thar par 'gyur// ring bas
263a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa rab tu brjod/ / zung bas mi mthong ba ru 'gyur// rnam par bcad pas gsod par byed// lte ba dril bu'i sgra dang mnyam// snying khar 'brug gi smra badra ste// mgrin bar ba lang gi ni sgra// rtswa rtser
263b1(rgyud 'bum): / nyungs kar 'phar ba 'dra// hUM yig bzhi po rgyal po che// 'jig rten gsum yang sgrub pa po// pU dzA o a go ra de ma ka o tri ko ka la ka hi pre gri sau su na si ma ku/ phyi nang bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas//
263b2(rgyud 'bum): / pU yig la sogs rnam par gnas// rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya// rab tu 'bad pas bla ma bstod// phyi yi lam nas bstan pa ste// bstan bcos rnams kyang ring ba bzhin// thabs kyi rnal 'byor
263b3(rgyud 'bum): ma ni rnams/ / 'bad pas bla ma'i bsnyen bkur bya// bstan bcos mtshan nyid mdor bsdus pa'o// de nyid ston pa'i dpa' bo yin// skad cig gis ni rnal 'byor ba dag/ skad cig gis ni phyag
263b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu sbyin/ / kun nas kun tu skad cig sde// skad cig sngags dang rnal 'byor rig/ dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ skye ba bdun pa'i bsgrub bya dang hUM yig bzhi rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'i
263b5(rgyud 'bum): le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas dpal ldan rgyal chen dang // dpa' bo phan par 'dod pa yis// pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni// yid kyis kun
263b6(rgyud 'bum): nas phyag 'tshal te/ / sems can rnams la phan 'dod pa// gsang ba chen po dag ni zhus// kun gyi rnam pa rgyas pa ru// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// gang ni gnas su gnas
263b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams la rtse// nyon cig man ngag ji bzhin bshad// rtag pa bsam gyis mi khyab gzung // gang gis ji ltar sngon du gsungs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu gnas// lus
264a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod/ / sgo dgu ru ni gyur pa ste// lte ba'i dbus su pad+ma che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grags// de yi gnas na dpa' bo bzhugs// cha med cha
264a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam par spangs/ / lus rnams kun gyis rnam par rtse// lus bral dri ma med pa ste// la lar gzugs kyi gnas na bzhugs// la lar sna yi gnas na bzhugs// la lar mig gi sgo na gnas// la
264a3(rgyud 'bum): lar sgra yi sgo na bzhugs/ / la lar bshang gci'i sgo na gnas// la lar sems dang rnam shes bcas// la lar sred dang lkog dang skom// la lar khro dang la lar zhi// la lar rtogs dang bcas
264a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gdong / / la lar bud med mchog gi lus// la lar gsod cing rdeg pa ste// la lar smra ba bzhin du gnas// la lar me tog 'bras la gnas// la lar rtse zhing longs spyod gnas// la lar dri
264a5(rgyud 'bum): la rnam par gnas/ / la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga// sa dang chu dang me dag dang // la lar rigs kyi dbye ba yis// la lar gtum mo sbom po dang // la lar ma dang sring mo yin// la lar chung ma bu mo dang /
264a6(rgyud 'bum): la lar tshangs pa dbang phyug dang // nyi ma dang ni 'phrog ma dang // la lar zla ba skar ma dang // la lar nub mo nyin mo dang // la lar khams gsum pa yin te// la lar thams cad med zad rgyal// la lar
264a7(rgyud 'bum): ro dang bag chags nu/ / cha med stong pa kun mi gsal// la lar byang chub gzigs mo che// la lar bdud las rgyal ba yin// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo che// de bzhin la lar 'chi 'pho ste// la lar dka'
264b1(rgyud 'bum): / ba spyod pa yin// la lar dge slong tshul du gnas// la lar byis pa yi ni gzugs// la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa dang // la lar na bas zos pa dang // la lar snod dang bcud dag dang // la lar sngo zhing /
264b2(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba dang // la lar dkar zhing ser ba dang // la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo// la lar spyan ma mA ma ki// la lar kun tu zhi bar 'gyur// la lar bya yi mngal du 'gro//
264b3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' ru ni 'gro ba nyid// la lar glang chen nga rgyal te// la lar smad 'tshong mar ni 'gyur// la lar rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur// la lar gnyid ni log par gnas// la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang //
264b4(rgyud 'bum): la lar khrag dang pags pa dri// la lar ngu zhing mya ngan byed// la lar mi rnams za ba dang // la lar bskal par gsung ba dang // ji ltar kun tu rnam par dbye// lha yis ji srid gsungs pa kun// gang
264b5(rgyud 'bum): de thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ / dpa' bo 'di rnams gsang chen po// phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas// kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong // srid pa bzung zhing dri ma med// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di ltar bsgom//
264b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med ye shes nyid dang yang // de dang 'dra bar stong par 'gyur// bdag nyid la ni rnam par bsgom// de la brtul zhugs bshad pa med// 'phreng ba dang ni sngags kyang med// gzugs dang sbyin sreg
264b7(rgyud 'bum): las med de/ / mi g.yo go cha'i bya ba med// lag pa phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dang // g.yon brkyang rkang stabs la sogs med// dpa' bo chen pos srid pa gzung // rang byung mchog ni byed pa'o// dgag pa
265a1(rgyud 'bum): ru ni mi bya ste/ / bdag nyid nges par mchod par bya// zla ba'i dbus su thig le bsgom// brgya yi phyed kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su rab bsam ste// gzhom med thig/
265a2(rgyud 'bum): ler bcas pa yin// de yi lus ni bral 'gyur te// sgom du med cing bsam du med// dpal khrag bathung mngon par 'byung ba las/ kun gyi rnam pa'i sgyu ma ltar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum
265a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de ltar sgyu ma'i cho ga dang // gong gi cha ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu snying kha'i dbus na gnas// 'di ltar gsang ba chen po'o// lte ba'i rtsa bar pad+ma gnas// ge sar
265a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas shing 'ong dang ldan/ / rang bzhin kun ni shel dag ltar// bcu drug la sogs kyis ni bskor// yi ge mnyam par sbyor ba ste// nam mkha' sbyor ba'i bdag nyid do// de nyid dbus su stong pa che// spro
265a5(rgyud 'bum): dang sdud par byed pa yin/ / gang gis ming ni kun rang bzhin// gang gis yongs su grags pa'o// nyi ma b+hA ba rnam dag ste/ 'char dang nub par bston pa yin// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bsod
265a6(rgyud 'bum): nams thams cad rnam par 'phel/ / pad+ma'i sna rtser yungs kar tsam// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin kun// yid kyis bzlas par yang dag ldan// phyi yi dbyangs ni rnam par spangs// de yi ye shes sangs rgyas te/
265a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis sangs rgyas mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu sems pa dngos po shes// khrus med dri ma med pa ste// bde ba'i chos ni de bzhin shes// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang bzhin// thams cad me yi rnam pa ru// mthong
265b1(rgyud 'bum): ba mtshan ma dang po'o/ / srin bu me khyer rnam pa yi// mtshan ma gnyis par mtshon pa ni// rdul phran dkar po'i rnam pa ru// phyogs bcur 'jig rten mthong ba yin// nyon mongs 'don pa'i las rnams ni// rnal
265b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid dang / / 'dod pa lha yi longs spyod myang // bzhi pa mthong bar bstan pa'o// lha gzugs mtho ris lha rnams ni// gang la mthong bar sems pa'o// drug pa 'jigs pa longs spyod po//
265b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de// brgyad par 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'bras bu 'thob// sgra yi rtse mo brgyar gshegs cha// rdul phran shin tu bsam par bya// stong pa la sogs
265b4(rgyud 'bum): / dmigs mi bya// gzugs la sogs pa mi blta ste// rngub med sa bon med pa bzhin// gzugs med mtshan nyid med pa'o// rnam shes ye shes gzung ma yin// rnam shes de yi rang bzhin te// mngon
265b5(rgyud 'bum): shes brgyad po yang dag 'thob/ / kun mkhyen kun byed gtso bo ste// ye shes sku ni dri ma med// skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid stobs dang ldan pa yin// sdug cing skal ba bzang por ston// dpag
265b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam shing ni yang dag byung / / rtag tu bsgom zhing bzlas pa ni// ji srid lus ni bskul bskyod dang // ngag gi smra ba thams cad ni// de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya ste// dpal ldan khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas/
265b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma bzhi dang 'khor lo che// de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi gzhi// dpa' bo bye ba rnams dang ni// sangs rgyas bye bas legs par gsungs// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ thams cad
266a1(rgyud 'bum): so sor gsal ba'i mngon par shes pa brgyad nges par bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas gzugs brnyan gyis zhi ba//
266a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ru yid ldan don du gsungs// gang gis myur ba de 'grub pa// nad pa zhi bar byed pa ni// pho mo rgyal po byis pa rnams// sus kyang cho ga shes bya ba// spang leb khri sogs stan rnams ni// 'bras
266a3(rgyud 'bum): / dang sran chung yang dag bsres// shin tu btsos nas bsnos byas te// nya dang sha dang khrag gis ni// gzugs brnyan dag ni bya ba ste// bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa ni// skra yi tshad du bya ba yin// sngags
266a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi yi ges bskul bar bya/ / drug dang bcu gnyis yi ges so// bla re dag ni bre ba dang // sna tshogs gos dang rgyal mtshan mchog/ dri dang spros dang me tog sogs// gsang sngags kyis ni bskul bar bya//
266a5(rgyud 'bum): srung ba chen mo'i gos kyis ni// spar g.yogs dang ni stod g.yogs byas// gang gis cung zad nad pa yi// sprod lugs ji ltar yin pa bzhin// ro ru song nas bskul bar bya// rol mo sna tshogs glu dbyangs
266a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin gzhug pa bya ba ste// gzugs brnyan la ni gdags par bya// dpung rgyan lag gdub mgul rgyan dang // gos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan// rkeng pa la ni mtshon chas bcings// lag pa
266a7(rgyud 'bum): ral mi 'dzin pa ste/ / spyi bor btsang zhing go cha bgos// snying rje la sogs phan pa'i sems// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// go cha gsum gyis rnam par brgyan// dur khrod du ni 'gro ba ste// rnam
266b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma dang dpa' bos bskor/ / 'du byed rnams ni dang por byas// dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri ba ste// ma mo rnams dang rnal 'byor ma// bsgom zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dgod// de ru/
266b2(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams yang dag gzhag/ gzugs brnyan lus ni lho phyogs su// sngags pas mgo bo bstan par bya// ji ltar mdzes pas bsgrub bya bsgom// nad rnams kun las rnam par grol// g.yas
266b3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang gis ni yang dag gnas/ / rtsa ba'i sngags sogs kyis ni bsrung // sngags pas kha ni shar du bltas// lag pas shes rab kha TI ga/ grib ma 'gom par byas nas ni// lte ba'i phyogs su brdeg
266b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ji ltar sdug bsngal bar ni btub// lha sprin nad ni zhi bar 'gyur// dbang po la sogs shar phyogs gzhag/ sngags kyis bskal bar bya ba ste// ji ltar cung zad gzhug par bya// slob dpon
266b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni mdzes par brtag/ khye'us khye'u grol ba ste// bu mos bu mo grol ba yin// thams cad khrus dang gtsang spu dang // mdzes shing zhi bar bya ba ste// phyi dang slob dpon dgyes par bya// gos dang
266b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyan la sogs pa yis/ / gzhan kun la yang mchod par bya// bza' ba btung sogs gos kyis so// gsang ba chen pos zhi bar bya// dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ 'bum phrag gsum
266b7(rgyud 'bum): las btus pa/ bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal khrag 'thung chen po bklags pas 'grub pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhan las rgyal ba dang po'i sgrub pa'i rgyad kyi phyi ma/ dpal
267a1(rgyud 'bum): khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba rnam 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po baN+Di ta chen po a dA ya badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba la
267a2(rgyud 'bum): cings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ yo gi nI san+dur+yA/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu
267a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi drin gyis bde chen gnas// skad cig gis ni thob gyur pa// tha ma rin chen lta bu yi// rdo rje can zhabs pad la
267a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dud/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga mchog/ 'khor lo gsum bdag 'di bsgom pa// rnal 'byor lam la gnas pa yin// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par
267a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rgyud du sbas par gnas gang de// bstan pa 'di ru ji skad gsungs// bshad pa yang ni de bzhin no// so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid// brda yi cho ga rgyas pa yin// gang gis shes pa tsam
267a6(rgyud 'bum): / gyis ni// sgrub pa po yis grub thob pa// sum cu rtsa bdun tshul gyis ni// byang chub phyogs la gnas pa yin// 'jig rten du ni bsgom byar bshad// he ru ka dpal 'gro ba'i mchog/ de la thog mar
267a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis phung po lnga la lha'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba ste/ gzugs kyi phung po la ni rnam par snang mdzad do// tshor ba'i phung po la ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du shes kyi phung po la ni pad+ma gar
267b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang phyug go/ 'du byed kyi phung po la ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni shrI he ru ka rdo rje'o// mig gnyis
267b2(rgyud 'bum): la ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ / rna ba gnyis la ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sna dag la ni phrag dog rdo rje'o// lce la ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o// lus la ni ser sna rdo rje'o// skye mched thams cad la ni dbang phyug rdo rje ste
267b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal he ru ka'i dbyings so/ / sa'i khams la ni ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams la ni gsod ma'o// me'i khams la ni 'gugs ma'o// rlung gi khams la ni gar dbang ma'o// nam mkha'i khams la ni
267b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i dra ba mo ste/ de ltar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la lha nyid kyi nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ lha rnams kyi gnas kyi rnam par dag pa gnas
267b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste dang po'o/ / // de nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i sbyor bas sbyar bar bya ste/ de thams cad kyang gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
267b6(rgyud 'bum): tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / bdun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
267b7(rgyud 'bum): dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
268a1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / ting
268a2(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dgab pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
268a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
268a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting
268a5(rgyud 'bum): nge badzin dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi
268a6(rgyud 'bum): skyed pa'o/ / de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya
268a7(rgyud 'bum): papa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yin no/ / rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o//
268b1(rgyud 'bum): / de la de rnams kyi lha'i sbyor ba grangs ji lta bar mdor bsdus pa bshad par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o//
268b2(rgyud 'bum): chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni khaN+Da ro hi'o// sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum
268b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mig can ma'o/ / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u
268b4(rgyud 'bum): thung ma'o/ / dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o// brtson
268b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ / dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag
268b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o/ / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang
268b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khaN+Da ro ha'o/ / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'a tsheng ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// btang snyoms
269a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o/ / yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus
269a2(rgyud 'bum): chen mo'o/ / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khA gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni bug gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdod ma'o// yang dag pa'i ting
269a3(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje'o/ / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o// mi dge ba'i
269a4(rgyud 'bum): chos skyes pa rnams spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o/ / mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
269a5(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste gsum pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ dpa' bo gnyis med dam pa ste// he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag/ yan lag kun ni cha
269a6(rgyud 'bum): shas granas/ / sen mo dang so la ni thod pa phyed pa'o// skra dang sbrul nI keng rus chen po'o// bkas pa dang dri ma la nI keng rus so// sha la ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o// rgyus pa la ni lha dgra'o// rus
269a7(rgyud 'bum): pal ni bong dpag med do/ / mkhal ma la ni rdo rje 'ong ngo // snying la ni rdo rje sku'o// mig gnyis la ni myu gu can mo// mkhris pa la ni rdo rje ral pa can no// glo ba la ni dpa' bo chen po'o// rgyu ma la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad do//
269b1(rgyud 'bum): / gnye ma la naM rab bzang ngo // lto ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'o// bshang ba la ni 'jigs byed chen po'o// 'tshogs ma'i srubs la ni mig mi bzang ngo // bang kan la ni stobs po che'o// rnag la ni rin chen rdo rje'o// khrag
269b2(rgyud 'bum): la ni rnga mgrin no/ / rdul la ni nam mkha'i snying po'o// tshil la ni dpal he ru ka'o// mchi ma la ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/ mchil ma la ni rnam par snang mdzad do// snangs la ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// rnal
269b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod ba las/ dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa// gang
269b4(rgyud 'bum): ga shes pa tsam gyis ni/ / sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// ji ltar nang gi bdag nyid shes// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// rnam dgod ji ltar sbyar ba ni// snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste/
269b5(rgyud 'bum): rten dang brjen pa'i tshul gyis ni// b+hai raM b+ha sogs yang dag gnas// bla ma las brgyud rim bzhin du// gang zhig cho ga 'di shes pas// raM stengs pad+ma ge sar gyi// sna tshogs 'dab ma 'jam pa la// de yi
269b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/ / 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub mdzad pa// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro haM gzugs can ma// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin/
269b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam rol ma'o// mtshams kyi bzhi po dag la ni// lnga pas gang ba'i thod pa gzhag/ pu la sogs dang yang dag sbar// yul dang yul du gnas
270a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / spyan drang 'khor lo'i dbus gnas la// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// pu zhes bya ba ni pul+lI ra ma la ya na khaN+Da ka pA la dang / pra tsaN+Da'o// dzA zhes bya ba ni dz+wa lan
270a2(rgyud 'bum): d+har nA ma hA kaM kA la dang / tsan+d+ra k+Shi'o// u zhes bya ba ni oMr+yan na kaM kA la dang / pra b+hA ba tI'o// a zhes bya ba ni ar bu da na bi ka Te daMSh+NI Na dang / ma hA nA swa ste gnas so// go zhes bya ba ni bo dA ba ri na
270a3(rgyud 'bum): su rA bai ri Na dang / bI ra ma tI bi// rA zhes bya ba ni rA me shwa ra na a mi tA b+ha dang / kha ra be rI'o// de zhes bya ba ni de wi ko Ta na badz+ra pra b+ha dang / lang ke shwa rI'o// mA zhes bya ba ni mA la ba na badz+ra de ha dang /
270a4(rgyud 'bum): / dru mats+tsha yA'o// nye ba'i gnas so// thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o// kA zhes bya ba ni kA ma rU pa na ang ku ri dang / aM rA ba tI'o// o zhes bya ba ni o dra na badz+ra dzA Di la dang / ma hA b+haM ra
270a5(rgyud 'bum): bA'o/ / zhing ngo // tri zhes bya ba ni tri sha ku ni na ma hA bI ra dang / bA yu be gA'o// ko zhes bya ba ni ko si la na badz+ra hUM ka ra dang / su rA b+ha k+Shi'o// nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka zhes bya ba ni ka laM ka na su b+ha dra dang sh+yA mA de
270a6(rgyud 'bum): bI'o/ / la zhes bya ba ni laM pA ka na badz+ra d+hA dra dang / sra b+ha dra'o// ts+tshan+do ha'o// kA zhes bya ba ni kAny+dzi na ma hA b+he ra ba dang / ha ya kar+t+ta'o// hi zhes bya ba ni mA la ya na bi ru pak+Sha dang / kha gA nA nA'o// nye ba'i ts+tshan+doH po/
270a7(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ sa la rgyu ba'o// bre zhes bya ba ni pre ta pr-i ri na ma hA ba la dang / tsakr-i de gA'o// gre zhes bya ba ni gr-i ha de ba tA na rat+na badz+ra dang / khaN+Da ro hA'o// 'dra ba can no// sau zhes bya ba ni sa~M rASh+Tan
270b1(rgyud 'bum): ya gr-I ba dang / shauN+Di ni'o// su zhes bya ba ni su bar+Na dI ba na A kA sha gar+b+ha dang / tsakra barmi NI'o// nye bar 'du ba can no// na zhes bya ba ni na ga ra na shrI se ru ka dang / su bI rA'o// si zhes bya ba ni sin d+hu de sha na/
270b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma narde shwa ri dang / me hA ba lA'o// dur khrod do// ma zhes bya ba ni ma ru de sha na/ bai ro tsa na dang / tsakra brti nA'o// ku zhes bya ba ni ku lu tA na badz+ra sa twa dang / ma hA bIr+ya'o// nye ba'i dur khrod do// sku'i
270b3(rgyud 'bum): / 'khor lo ste/ sa 'og na spyod pa'o// kA kA s+tha dang / u lU kA s+yA dang / shA nA s+tha dang / su ka rA s+yA ni phyogs su'o// ya ma da D+hi dang / ya ma du tI dang / ya ma daMSh+NI NAM dang / ya ma ma tha nI ni mtshams
270b4(rgyud 'bum): su'o/ / de ltar phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid ji srid nges par rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur kyi bar du dmigs par bya'o// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ lha'i gnas kyis bstan pa ste lnga pa'o//
270b5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bdag po sogs kun gyi// mtshan ma phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams dang // rang mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul rnams// rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya// rgyal chen shrI he ru ka ni// gdug
270b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad rab bajoms pa/ / phyag gnyis yang dag 'khyud pa dang // gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa 'dzin// g.yas pa'i lhag mar dgra sA mdung // rtse gsum gr-i gug Da ma ru// g.yon gyi lhag
270b7(rgyud 'bum): mar kha T+wAM bsgreng / / thod pa dmar chen zhags pa dang // tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams bshad de// bcu gnyis kyis ni brgyan pa yin// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs// brgya phyed par ni shes par
271a1(rgyud 'bum): bya bcom ldan yum ni mdun du bzhugs/ / zhal gcig 'bar ba chen po ste// 'khyud pa yis ni thod pa dag/ gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag bkang bsnams// g.yas bas
271a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sdigs mdzub dang / / ma rungs pa yi gri gug bsnams// sku mdog dmar zhing cher 'bar ba// thod dum brgyan pa'i ska rags can// dbu skra grol zhing spyan gsum sku// mche ba gtsigs
271a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'jigs su rung / / byin pa zhabs kyis legs par 'khyud// gnyis ka kha sbar tshul gyis bzhugs// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po ni// kha T+wAM ga snod gri gug bsnams// sku la spyan gsum
271a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya lnga sogs/ / skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan// phyag gnyis zhal gcig spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis bcings//
271a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dril bus logs 'khyud cing // chags pa chen po rjes chags mdzad// rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu bzhi// dbu skra grol bas rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang // spyi bor nor bus rnam
271a6(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / rnal 'byor snod dang bcas pas 'khyud// sdigs mdzub kyis ni gri gug bsnoms// he ru ka dpal la sogs kun// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// mgur chu dpung rgyan
271a7(rgyud 'bum): rna cha dang / / thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ni// phyag rgya drug par rab tu bshad// pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pas// phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa yin// sku
271b1(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ / spyan gsum 'og bag dag gis brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum gyi dngos grub kyi// ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing // dngos grub 'dod pas
271b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan mi bya/ / de yi bsod nams gang 'gyur ba// sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po// lce ni brgya stong du ma yis// bsod nams brjod par nus ma yin// khwa gdong la sogs rnam pa bzhi// thams
271b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang ni sgo skyong ste/ / kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs// sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs ldan// gshin rje brtan sogs mtshams bzhir te// de dag zhabs gnyis brkyang ba dang // gzugs gnyis ldan zhing
271b4(rgyud 'bum): yid 'phrog ma/ / mkha' 'gro ma bskyed ji bzhin du// khwa gdong la sogs dbye ba nyid// de ltar ma lus 'khor lor gnas// mdog dbye ba'i cho ga'i rim bzhin no// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu
271b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa las/ rang gi mtshan ma dang / zhal dang / phyag dang / sku mdog dang / mtshon cha bstan pa ste drug pa'o// de nas go cha gnyis po ni// gang shes pas
271b6(rgyud 'bum): nimyur nga ru/ / sgrub pa po yis grub thob pa// rgyud du sbas pa nges bshad bya// oM ha/ na ma si/ swa ha hu/ bau ShaT he/ hUM hU~M ho/ phaT haM/ snying ka spyi bo spyi gtsug dang // dpung pa mig gnyis
271b7(rgyud 'bum): go che sbyar/ / dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste// gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad gnas// gsum pa pad+ma gar dbang rgyal// ba ni bi he ru ka dpal bshad// lnga pa rdo rje nyim ste// drug pa la ni rta mchog
272a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de ni go cha rnam drug gis// shin tu bsrungs pa nyid yin no// oM Tha/ dzA ya~M/ waM sa~M/ (u0f7f/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ lte ba snying kha de bzhin kha/ spyi bo s+thi gtsug go cha n
272a2(rgyud 'bum): yid/ / dang po rdo rje bag mo'o// gnyis pa yA ma nI ru brjod// gsum pa rmongs byed ma nyid de// bzhi pa sbyin ma yin par bshad// lnga pa kun tu skrag par grags// drug pa gtum mo yin par
272a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / go cha drug nyid phag mo dang // dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ go cha gnyis bstan pa ste bdun pa'o// / de
272a4(rgyud 'bum): nas go cha gnyis shes nas/ / ye shes 'khor lo rnam bsgoms nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam tshig 'khor lor myur gzhug bya// rkang pa mnan la steng du blta// steng du pha
272a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi sgra bsgrags la/ / phyogs bcu'i bajig rten khams gnas pa'i// dpa' ngo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ sngags kyis yang dag bskural ba dang // skad cig de la spyan drang bya// mdzub mo
