272a6(rgyud 'bum): mdur byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ / mthe bong rdo rje brtan por yang dag sbyar// de ni dpral ba'i phyogs kyi dbus bzhag la// gcu zhing gcu zhing bskor ba byas pa yis// sngags pas dpa' bo rnam
272a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma byin brlab/ / yi ge d+ha ni sna rtser yang dag sbyar// byA ni mtshan gyi lte bar yang dag dgod// lte ba snying ka kha dang dpral ba ru// sngags kyi tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab// lte ba snying
272b1(rgyud 'bum): ka dag tu rnal 'byor ma/ / sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis ni// a ba d+hU ti'i gnyis kyis dpa' byin brlab// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyis med yin// dang por dga' ba dpa' bo ste/

272b3(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa yi/ / bsdu ba de nyid bshad pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag gnyis kyis// bskor ba mkha' 'gro'i bde de yin// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan
272b4(rgyud 'bum): drang ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa sna brgyad pa'o/ / de nas sprul par shes bya dang // longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod pa nyon// theg pa chen po phyag rgya che// rnal 'byor ma yi grub ster

272b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam las blangs pa/ / kun mkhyen ye shes de'i rang bzhin// he ru ka dpal dpa' bo mchog/ skye bo dam pa kun 'dus pa// zhi nga'i btung bas grub 'gyur ba// rtag pa'i go 'phyang mchog
272b7(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / skyon med pa ni brtag pa'i gnas// pu la sogs pa yang dag sbyar// yul dang yul du rnam par gnas// he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dgod// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// longs spyod rdzob
273a1(rgyud 'bum): bar shes byaste/ / rnal 'byor che la gnas pa yin// mdor bsdus nas ni rab 'jug pa// blo gros brtson pas shes par bya// ldog pa'ang ji skar bstan pa ni// bshang bya sgrub pa
273a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams nyon/ / shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni bkod dang bral ba ste// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// de ni rang bzhin stong pa ste// kun tu 'gro zhing mi shigs par//
273a3(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus nas ni sgom byed pa// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi// sku gsum dag ni rnam sgom pa// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// der ni nges par

273a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor dang bral bar mi bya ste/ / sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa 'di yin// sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin// bsam gtan cho ga rgyus byas la// rang 'dod las la gtor ma ni// khyad par du yang sbyin
273a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / zla ba mar ngo'i tshes bcu dang // zla ba yar ngo'i de nyid la// 'bad pas dpa' bo chang sogs dang // rdo rje lha mo rab mchod cing // sngar bshang sngags dang rgyu sbyar ba// cho ga bzhin
273a7(rgyud 'bum): du yang dag srung / / oM A ra l+li ho// dzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki n+yaHsa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho/ de ltar lan gsum bzhi lngar brjod// dam tshig sogs rdzas legs gnas par// rdo rje thal mo gyen kha phye/
273b1(rgyud 'bum): dbab bo rnal 'byor mas mngon bzla// oM kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha/ rak+Sha sa/ b+hU ta/ pre ta/ pi shA tsa/ un+ma da/ a bas+phA ra badz+rA DA ka DA ki n+yA da yaHi maM ba liM gr-ih+Na nA sa ma ya rak+ShanA ma ma sarba
273b2(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya thai baM/ ya theSh+Ta b+hu dza tha/ dza~M g+hA tha/ pi ba tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sar+b+ba kA ra ta yA/ sata su khaM bi shud d+ha ye/ saM ha yi kA b+ha ba tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dpa' bo'i 'khor lo la sogs
273b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags/ / dur khrod la sogs kyis kyang brgyan// lho phyogs kha bltas rnal 'byor pas// gnas ni mthun par rab tu mchod// nye bar mtshon pa ji lta bar// bdag gis nus pas dbul bar bya// dgun
273b4(rgyud 'bum): zla 'bring po la sogs pa'i/ / tshes bcu la ni dad pas mchod// skye bo dam pa kun 'dus la// bde ba thams cad dbul bar bya// der ni bshos rnams bza' bya ste// lhag ma snod du gzhag par bya//
273b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal// gang gis kyang ni gzhom mi nus// de ni skye bo dang ldan rnams kyis mchod// he ru ka dpal mngon par dgyes gyur nas// kun tu dgyes pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur
273b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas// mtshan mo sgra ni grol gyur pas// brtul zhugs gos med gtor sbyin na// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor bdag/ des ni ma mo dga' bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor/
273b7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ gtor ma dang mchod pa tshes bcur bya ba srung ba bstan pa ste bcu pa'o// // de nas pha rol phyin drug dang // byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun//
274a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas sogs sa ni bcu po rnams// tshe mchog lha yi bdag nyid can// dngos po gang dang gang gis ni// mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor// de yis de yi dngos 'gyur te//
274a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu 'dra// de bzhin 'jigs dang bcas pa 'am// 'jigs med ji lta ji ltar gnas// bsam gtan dag gam sems tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed//

274a6(rgyud 'bum): de dag kun gyis ma shes te// mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang // khengs pa la ni brten par dga'// nga rgyal la sogs bdun sems ldan// de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// spyod yul
274a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba mi shes so/ / he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug/ slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// myur du dngos grub skyed byed do// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// kun spyod cho ga'i rnal 'byor/
274b1(rgyud 'bum): shes// cho ga'i bya ba bsten par bya// srid pa gsum po ma lus na// de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol
274b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / de ltar de ni the tshom med// lha rnams bzlog ste dgod pa dang // sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang // sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa ni// snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin// rgyud rnams
274b3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi spyi yi ni/ / sems ni yongs su smin pa dag/ 'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi// dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin// bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa ni// ngag

274b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang // dpa' bos re nyid bstan pa yin// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ba dag/ skad cig rnam pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// kun nas thams cad skad cig ste//
275a1(rgyud 'bum): skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod// sngas dang lha dang lag bcangs dang // 'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs//
275a2(rgyud 'bum): gong nas gong du bsten par bya// thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin// rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin// de nyid thams cad khyab byed de//
275a3(rgyud 'bum): lus kun la ni rnam par gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te// he ru ka dpal yin par bshad// skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid// phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin// ye shes dag tu byung de la//

275a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtha' rnams las/ / 'di ni snying por rab tu bshad// 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid// gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang // gang du bde chen zhes bya gcig pu nyid// gcig/

275b1(rgyud 'bum): o au/ aM aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+hanya/ Ta pra Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin// mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin/
275b2(rgyud 'bum): lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang // sngags rnams kyi ni rgyud nyid yin// gang zhig 'di rtag sgom pa dang // rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang // rnal 'byor pa yis dang por brjod// he ru ka dpal
275b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med 'gyur/ / der ni lag sogs rgyan yin te// ska rags gnas rnams thams cad yin// 'di ni rtag tu 'dzin byed pa// chos kun rtogs par byed pa yin// A li kA li mdun
275b4(rgyud 'bum): bsams te/ / rnal 'byor chen pos rnam gnas la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor legs rdzogs pa// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas par bsgom// de yi dbus gnas bsams pa ni// dam pa'i gnas mchog
275b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge ste/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// lha yi sku ni bsgom par bya// de ni gzugs las bdas pa ste// dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin// bsam mi khyab pa nyid bsams te//
275b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam de mtshan mar brtag mi bya// yang na bdag nyid sems bsam pa// de la gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ rgyud thams cad las nges par byas pa'i
275b7(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid kyi gnas gcig pu bstan pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma gnyis med// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che ga
276a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni yi ge'i sa pa yin/ / pul+lI ra ma ya mgo la// dz+wa lan d+ha ra spyi gtsug nyid// oM r+yan rna ba g.yas pa ste// ar bu da ni rgyab tshogs la'o// gnas so// go da ba ri rma
276a2(rgyud 'bum): ba g.yon/ / rA me shwa ri smin ma'i mtshams// de bi ko Ti mig gnyis te// mA la ba ni dpung mgor ro// nye ba'i gnas so// kA ma rU pa mchan khung dgod// o Te nu ma gnyis la'o// zhing ngo //
276a3(rgyud 'bum): / tri sha ku ni lte ba'i dbus// ko sa la ni sna rtser ro// nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka li ka ni kha la dgod// lam pa ka ni mgrin dbus nyid// tshan+do ha'o// kany+tsi snying la dgod par bya// hi ma la ya mtshan
276a4(rgyud 'bum): / rtsar ro// u pa tshan+do ha'o// pra ta pu ri mtshan la ste// gr-i ha de ba bshang lam la'o// 'du ba can no// sau rASh+Ta baR+Ya gnyis sam// gser gling rje ngar gnyis la'o// nye bar 'du ba can no// na ga
276a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni sor mor ro/ / sin d+hu rkang pa'i bol gnyis la'o// dur khrod do// ma ru mthe bong gnyis la dgod// ku lu ta ni pus mor gnas// nye ba'i dur khrod do// pU dzA o a go ra de mA kA o tA ko ka la
276a6(rgyud 'bum): kA hi pre gr-i so su na si ma ku/ gnyid log mA log ldang ba dang // bza' 'am 'gro ba'i chos spyod pa'am// gang yin der ni rnam bkod na// 'jig rten gsum gyis ma g.yo'o// ming gi rgyud ni 'bum
276a7(rgyud 'bum): sde las/ / snying po bsdus par gyur pa yin// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i rgyud// 'bum gcig nang nas de bzhin bshad// shes rab rgyud ni gsang ba ste// ming 'byung ba la gnas pa yin/
276b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yis ni sprul pa yin// bshad pas longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod// so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid// mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan// sku gsum 'khor lo gsum du bshad//
276b2(rgyud 'bum): chos sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid// bsod nams ye shes tshogs dag ni// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yin// blo ngan glen zhing lkugs pa dang // shes rab dman zhing log lta
276b3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa// bla ma la ni sun 'byin yin// de dag kun kyang rnam spangs te// gus kyang bshad par mi bya'o// cha dang cha yi khyad par la// der ni gnyis su
276b4(rgyud 'bum): med par bshad/ / dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang // bka' bsgo'i lha mo dpa' bo skyes// de 'og ma lus kun spyod pa// 'khor ba las grol gtso bo yin// ma lus rig byed las sprul pa//
276b5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i mthar ni de rab bsgrags// dpa' bo khyod kyis nga la bshad// sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba// sgro dang sgra nyams brda rnams kyis// lam 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'brang // bsdus
276b6(rgyud 'bum): ngan yang dag blangs pa dang / / brda yi tshig ni rgyas pa yin// gang gis kun spyod mi shes par// rnal 'byor pa ni rnal 'byor ston// de yi ngal ba don med do// 'bras bu de ni thob mi 'gyur//
276b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la phan pas sngon gsungs pa// sbas te gzhan du gsungs pa yin// kun spyod 'dir ni bshad pa las// sgrub pa pos ni rab mnyam gzhag/ rgyal bas sngon ni rgyud chen po'i// sngags/
277a1(rgyud 'bum): kyai yi ge sgrub mdzad pa// las kyi bya ba gang yang rung // dge dang mi dge brtags te bya// yi ge mtha' dang dbus ngag tu// der ni thams cad rab tu grub// rnal 'byor ma
277a2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu spyod pa las/ A li kA laM dang las thams cad kyi nges pa gnyis su med par bstan pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du// sbas gsang
277a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga shes bya ste/ / sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa// rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal 'byor// mkha' 'gro la sogs rdo rje yi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// me long la sogs rnam pa
277a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi/ / gnyis med gnyis su med sbyor nyid// gnyis med rdzas ni me tog sogs// re re nas ni dbul bar bya// phyag rgya lnga sogs mchog lus kyi// pha rol son pas phar phyin drug/ lag pa'i mchod sogs
277a5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes can/ / blo ldan dpa' bos shes par bya// rnal 'byor ma drug go rim bzhin// rdo rje sems sogs bcu gnyis dang // dpa' bo chen por sbyar bya la// lag pa'i mchod la sogs pas bstod// lnga po
277a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga dang yang dag bsre/ / 'o ma dang ni bsre bar bya// mchod pa des ni legs gnas la// spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod dang ldan// lag pa'i mchod pas rnal 'byor pa// dbul ba'i 'dod don 'grub par 'gyur//
277a7(rgyud 'bum): sems ni gzhan du gyur pa dang // bza' btung gos sogs thob par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa byas na ni// de la bsam pa rnam grub 'gyur// dpa' bo 'di ni dpa' chen po// sa steng rnal 'byor ma rnyed
277b1(rgyud 'bum): dkag/ rnal 'byor pa yi spyod brtul zhugs// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// gang zhig rtag tu 'dis rang mchod// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod ba las/ dpa
277b2(rgyud 'bum): bopo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i lag pa'i mchod pa bstan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med spyod pa'i cho ga bshad// dang por mnyam bzhag
277b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas/ / 'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya// nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la// yid la 'dod pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// sems can rjes su gzung don phyir// dpa' bo chen po 'gro bya zhing //
277b4(rgyud 'bum): srog chags yan lag gos bgos la// bde don gnyer bar bde ba bsrung // mchod phyir thogs ni kun spangs la// he ru ka dpal gtsang sbrar gnas// grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// rnal 'byor ma
277b5(rgyud 'bum): kun mnyes par bya/ / rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dpa' bo gang // tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag/ lha yi snying po'i gsang sngags kyis// brgya phyed 'phreng bas brgyan pa yin// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs
277b6(rgyud 'bum): kun/ lus kyi khams su brtag par bya// dpa' bo'i go cha drug gi ni// rgya bdis lus ni mdzes pa yin// rdo rje phag mo sogs sngags gang // mgur chus rked pa mdzes pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi
277b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma'i/ / pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku// shes rab Da ma ru ru brtag/ yi ge bdun gyi gsang sngags kyis// rna chas snyan ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor ma
278a1(rgyud 'bum): drug gsang sngags gang / / ska rags byas pa brgyan pa yin// 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'i// sngags ni lag ma thod pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad yum sngags dang // thod//
278a2(rgyud 'bum): pas mgo bo brgyan pa yin// de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams nas// tsham rngam sngags kyis legs par bsrung // rtag tu tshangs par spyod 'gyur ba// gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad mchod pa'o// nyin mo
278a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan dpa' bo ste/ / mtshan mo bcom ldan ma brtag bya// mi bya ci yang yod min te// rtag tu mi bsam yod ma yin// mi bza' ci yang yod min la// dge dang mi dag mi smra med// bdag nyid
278a4(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin 'gro de bzhin/ / bdag ci 'dra ba gzhan de bzhin// de ltar rnam bsam rnal 'byor bdag/ 'jigs pa thams cad yongs spangs te// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod// bsam pa thams cad
278a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs byed yin/ / he ru ka dpal gzhir gnas pa'i// yan lag spyod pa ji snyed dang // tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed phyag rgya gsang sngags yin// rigs lnga'i kun tu spyod pa ni// rig
278a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig nyid du spyad par bya/ / de ltar shes pa'i bdag nyid can// go 'phang mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur// gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// mi rtog bdag nyid sems kyis
278a7(rgyud 'bum): de/ bdod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams spyad// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i brtul zhugs dang gsang sngags bstan pa ste bco lnga pa'o// gzhan
278b1(rgyud 'bum): yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/ / dus mthar dngos grub mi thob ste// blo ni gzhan du rnam 'khrugs pas// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bzlas pa yis// bde bar 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// bkres dang skom gyi
278b2(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal 'gyur/ / 'bad de 'dod bya dmigs nas ni// de nyid kyis bdag rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar he ru ka'i ye shes// ci 'dod par ni yongs su rgyu// rna bas ring nas thos pa dang // skad cig
278b3(rgyud 'bum): gis mthong rnal 'byor pas/ / chos 'di de ltar shes nas ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin// shes rab chen por byas pa nyid// gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang // A
278b4(rgyud 'bum): li kA li ma gtogs par/ / gal te chos 'di 'dod na ni// de yi ngal ba don med de// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro// mdo dang bya ba spyod pa rnams// rnal 'byor gsang sogs dbye ba nyid//
278b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun la bshad pa ni// byang chub don gyi rgyu nyid yin// nga yis 'jug par bshad pa ni// tshogs gnyis gnyis su med pa yin// de nyid chos kyi rang bzhin zhes// mya ngan 'das pa 'bab/
278b6(rgyud 'bum): zhig 'dod// thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni// rten par ngas ni sngon bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub kyis// sgom pa mngon dgar gyur pa yin// spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni//
278b7(rgyud 'bum): spros pas spros pa med par bya// rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba gang // sprul pa rnams kyi de nyid bstan// rgyu ba de yis ni rnal 'byor pas// bden pa gnyis la yang dag rten// sems can thams
279a1(rgyud 'bum): cad gsal nas ni/ / longs spyod kun la nyer spyad bya// blo ldan chen po 'khor lo sdom// sdom pa la ni rnam par spyod// rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma gang // gzugs dang badz+ra
279a2(rgyud 'bum): dang tha snyad dag/ khyim lnga la sogs yul rnams su// rnal 'byor mo ni lnga nyid gnas// bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas kun tu// g.yon na so bskor ba la rab brtson// ji ltar sngar bshad 'khor lo yi//
279a3(rgyud 'bum): grangs kyi cho gas brtul zhugs can// dpa' bo'i sngags sogs rnal 'byor ma'i// yid la 'dod pa dgod par bya// shar gyi bdab mar mkha' 'gro ma// bong bu'i rnam par bsgom par bya// he ru ka
279a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal zhes bya ba/ / las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas// lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la// bshar dang ma bshar gang bsams pa// de dag thams cad myur du
279a5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ dngos grub kyi nges pa dang dpal he ru ka'i mdzad pa bstan pa ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas he ru ka dpal rgyud// sems ni dri
279a6(rgyud 'bum): med yin par bshad/ / dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni// phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// de nyid dang ni thams cad 'byung // me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi//
279a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i bdab gnas rnal 'byor ma// mkha' 'gro ma bzhi pad+mar gnas// mA ma kI sogs bzang mo yin// thod pa'i dum sogs 'khor lor gnas// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med yin// sems can 'khor/
279b1(rgyud 'bum): ba las grol ba/ dpa' bo nyid ni yin par brtag/ khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs kun// sgo dang mtha' yi mtshams rnams su// sna tshogs gdul ba'i thabs chen gyis// sems can don la brtson par mdzad//
279b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i gnas kyi rnam gnas pa// rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster// rnal 'byor ba bras bu thob nas ni// srid mtshor ltung bar
279b3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khor ba las ni bsgral ba'i thabs// rgyud kyi snying po bsdus pa yin// bla ma slob mas rtogs bla phyir// cho ga rgya cher ma bshad de// sems ni ngal so rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan
279b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa bstan mi bya/ / de ltar spyod pa'i skyes mchog 'di// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'gyur// 'jig rten 'dibam pha rol tu// 'dis ni sangs rgyas nyid mthong 'gyur// ji ltar sngar bshad
279b5(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa rnams/ / spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin// gang zhig bdo sgom rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad ster// he ru ka dpal mtshan brjod pas// lha sogs kun gyi gsang gang dang //
279b6(rgyud 'bum): mi la sogs la gang zhig yod// de yi bsod nams des 'thob bo// bsam gtan gyis ni bsams tsam mam// 'don cing klog gam bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur te// yang
279b7(rgyud 'bum): na 'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor pa ni 'pho ba'i tshe// dpal ldan he ru ka la sogs// dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang // rnal 'byor ma ni ji snyed pa// lago na sna tshogs me tog
280a1(rgyud 'bum): bsnams/ / ba dan rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glus ni nye bar mchod// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog ste// mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas
280a2(rgyud 'bum): su 'khyer/ / de lta'i dpa' bo chen po dang // rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon// ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang // kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed// lam yang bshad cing 'chi bar//
280a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma yi gnas// he ru ka dpal sogs rnal 'byor// dpa' bo gnyis med rnal
280a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / pul+lI ma la ya ra rab gtum// dzA lan d+ha ra ra gtum pa'i mig/ or+yan na ni 'od ldan ma// ar bu dar ni sna chen mo// go dA ba ri ri dpa' blo ma// ra me shA rir mi'u thung ma// de bi ko Tar lang dbang
280a5(rgyud 'bum): phyug/ mA la bar ni shing grib ma// kA ma rU bar sa srungs mo// o trer 'jigs byed chen mo yin// tri sha ku nir rlung shugs ma// ko sa lar ni cang 'thung ma// ka ling lha mo sngo bsangs ma// lam ba kar ni
280a6(rgyud 'bum): rab bzang mo/ / kany+tsi nar ni rta rnam// hi ma la yar bya gdong ma// pre ta pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs// gr-i ha de bar dum skyes ma// sau raSh+Ta ra chang 'tshong ma// gser gling 'khor lo'i go cha mo// nA ga rar ni rab
280a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mo/ / sin d+hu'i yul du stobs chen mo// mya ngan yul du 'khor sbyar ma// ku lu ta ra ni brtson chen mo// yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang // dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o// gsang ba'i sngags la rtag
280b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas/ / rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma ni re re zhing // bye ba grangs snyed dag gis bskor// mtshan ma mtshan nyid phyag rgya sogs// g.yon pa'i sgrub pa po yis sba// mi bzad las ni gang gang
280b2(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / skye bo rnams ni 'ching bgyur pa// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// 'khor ba'i pha rol brgal nas ni// ci bdor ye shes can du 'gyur// mgur cha gtsug rgyan dpung rgyan dang //
280b3(rgyud 'bum): rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // mgul pa brgyan cing spyi bor 'phreng // ska rags rkang gdub sgra nyid do// ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi// ge sar A li kA li las// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag ldan// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma
280b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs bcas/ / u ma'i bdag po yang dag mnan// rdo rje dril bu skul 'khyud// he ru ka dpal rgyal po che// gob pang mchog ni bsgom par bya// de nas rtag tu spos chus pa dir// rtag tu lus ni yan lag dril//
280b5(rgyud 'bum): dri zhim yan lag gis brgyan cing // thal ba'i phyag rgya sogs pas bsgos// kha dog la sogs g.yogs pa'i gzugs// rang gi lus ni yongs su bsgyur// sprod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs par// shes nas rnal
280b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor la legs gnas/ / yan lag can dang tshogs can dang // sdud dang de bzhin snying stobs dang // gar gyi tshul ni bzhi po 'di// de nyid mthong bas shes par bya// btung ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni// rnal 'byor shes
280b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin par bshad/ / de la 'bad de bya ba ni// skal ba bzang po'i gar chen yin// gar gyi gnas su gnas pa kun// rgyan rnams de ni yin zhes bya// kun tu dbug dang bcing bya dang // gzhug dang de bzhin bsod
281a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / 'bebs dang bdi ni 'khyil ba dang // de bzhin ba dir ni brgyan pa dang // tshangs skud lus las dgrol ba dang // rnam pa kun tu bcing ba dang // rkang gdub rab tu gzhug pa dang //
281a2(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i rgyan ni nyid dag dang // srog shing gcig gyur srang bu yin// 'og pag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang // ro ldan bcu drug par shes bya// 'phreng ba nyi shu rtsa lnga yin// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/
281a3(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid dag pa dang gnas la sogs pa dang gar gyi spyod pa bstan pa ste bcu bdun pa'o// rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa rdzogs so// nu chen gyi
281a4(rgyud 'bum): lo tsa ba bgos lngas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu ra yo gi nI saM puT tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor
281a5(rgyud 'bum): ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor bzhi yi kha sbyor te// zhal ba ni zhes ni rnam par bshad// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste/
281a6(rgyud 'bum): zhal rnams kyang ni kha sbyor ma// 'di ru rgyas par brjod pa yin// 'o ga dang steng du rnam bshad dang // de bzhin g.yon dang g.yas pa'o// A li kA li bye brag gis// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// zla
281a7(rgyud 'bum): ba nyi mar rnam par bshad/ / sa dang rlung gi nyid dag dang // chu me de bzhin nam mkha' dang // khams lnga dag dang yang dag ldan// gzugs dang reg pa de bzhin sgra// mig gnyis dang ni sna dag dang // lus kyi skam
281b1(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu yang gsal/ / rtag tu rdor can rnam par gnas// cha dang cha min rnam par grol// stong pa'i ngang las yang dag gnas// ya yi sde mtha' yang dag rdzogs// u yig dag ni thig ler bcas// 'byar zhing gsal
281b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba ste/ / kha sbyor rnam pa rnal 'byor gyi// rdor can ji ltar chang gis myos// 'khor nas sems ni rnam par grol// khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// bdun gyi rgyal po'i/
281b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyis// ma lus lus pa med pa mthong // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang ldan dang // dbang po de bzhin 'dod dbang phyug/ pha rol stobs kyis mnan na ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis ni mchod// tshangs
281b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs lha rnams kyis/ / dam tshig sgra yis bshad pa ste// srog dang rtsol ba kun tu bya// de yis padi ni dam tshig sdo ma// de la kha sbyor rnam pa bshad// zhal bzhi ru ni rab tu gnas// rnal 'byor ma
281b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi de shes bya/ / sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan// gang gang dbang po'i lam nas byung // de dang de yi rang bzhin nyid// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur// gzugs ni ji ltar
281b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa las/ / de la bsgom pa ji lta bu// sngags rnams ji ltar bskyed par bgyi// rdzogs par yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// de dag thams cad tha snyad tsam// sngags dang rgyud rnams yang dag 'byung // byang
281b7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems ni ba di ru bsngags/ / 'dod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// mo tshon bya mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshon// mtshon bya du ma'ang mtshon mi bya// sngags rnams rgyas par bshad nas ni// lha rnams kyi ni bsgom
282a1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyon/ / steng gi sgo ni gsum yin te// lte ba rlung gi gzugs can ma// de yi dbus su rtag tu stong // dag pa yi ni shel lta bu// longs spyod chen po nges par 'byung // dgu pa//
282a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu yis ldan pa ste// cha brgyad de yi yan lag gis// sgo dgu'i sa bon pa yin te// lus las sa bon rjes su brjod// ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid kyis// steng gi char ni shes rab ste// rdo rje 'dzin
282a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas par 'byung / / sems kyi rdo rje zhes ni bshad// 'dir ni steng gi pad+mar bshad// de la gnas ni b+ha gar bshad// shes rab de nyid rdor can bcas// rten dang brten pa 'byung ba yis// rtsa rnam
282a4(rgyud 'bum): kun la rnam par gnas/ / khu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa yis// spro dang sdud par byed pas so// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsgom pa'i rim pa phyed pas so// gdams ngag
282a5(rgyud 'bum): rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / lha rnams bsgom par brjod pa ste// de rnams sna tshogs rnal 'byor gyis// zla ba nyi mar bshad pa yin// gzhan yang gzhan min rnam par grol// sangs rgyas gzugs
282a6(rgyud 'bum): ni g.yo ba med/ / der ni gzung bar bya ba ste// gang zhig de ru ji ltar gnas// nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab tu ni brjod// nam mkha'i nang song mchog tu zhi// dag cing dag la yid du
282a7(rgyud 'bum): 'ong / / sangs rgyas la sogs mu stegs kun// lha min gnod sbyin srin po dang // de nyid 'dod chags chags bral dang // 'dod pas thar par gyur pa 'di// de nyid bud med rnams la chags// de nyid
282b1(rgyud 'bum): mngal ni rab tu len/ / de nyid 'chi ste ril po'i gnas// de nyid bskams pas mthong ba yin// de nyid gong du gyur pa ste// de nyid dri ru rnam par gnas// de nyid sdug bsngal rig pa ste// rig pas bde ba nyid dag la//
282b2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid gcig pus khyab pa yin// bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni// gzugs bzang gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs rnams yid du 'o // gzugs kun gsal ba byed pa'i dpal//
282b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba'o// bcu drug phyed phyed de yi phyed// rtag tu de nyid rig pa po// sna tshogs rtag tu zhi ba'i gzugs// nam mkha' lnga dang yang dag ldan// de nyid rab tu bzhugs par brjod//
282b4(rgyud 'bum): bgro la gsal bar mar me bzhin// sna yi rtse mor rnam par 'byung // 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i 'od zer te// 'di rnams kun ni bdag gis brjod// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid du// gang gis shes pas cho ga
282b5(rgyud 'bum): / shes de yi dpal ni rgyas par 'grub// gzhan yang sngags kyi tshig bshad de// gsang ba'i spor ba sbas pa ste// snga tshan brgyad kyi mtha' ma gzung // sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan// de ba sa b+h+rUM yig sbyin par
282b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ drang por oM yig yang dag ldan// a ni yig ba bru kun gyi mchog/ thig le chen po yi ge med// nam mkha' nam mkha'i dbus gnas par// sngags dang rgyun ni yang dag 'byung // ji ltar de ltar sngags
282b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni/ / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul lta bur// yi ge tsam dang yang dag ldan// de la dbus su rab tu grags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gang yang gzhan gyi lha ya tshogs// 'byung po ma lus thams
283a1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / / lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs// yi ge la sogs gzugs can gyis// gzugs can rnal 'byor lA ma dang // dum skyes ma yi bye brag gis/
283a2(rgyud 'bum): zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad// rnal 'byor bzhi dang yang dag ldan// lte ba dang ni ge sar ldan// 'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan// de la dbus su dpa' bo che// phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan//
283a3(rgyud 'bum): dang po la ni sha yis brgyan// gnyis pa khrag gis bkang ba nyid// gsum pa bzhi pa lus phyag rgya// kha T+wAM ga dang Da ma ru// de bzhin kha dog dkar po 'phro// dri med ston ka'i nam mkha' bzhin// dkar dang
283a4(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang de bzhin gnag/ ljang ku'i zhal te gtsigs pa'o// phyag rgya brgyad ni mdo ru bshad// phyag gis mtshon char rab tu grags// dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa snying ni 'byin pa'o// gsum
283a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rmongs byed phyag rgya yin/ / bzhi par lhung byed de bzhin no// lnga par gar ma'i phyag rgya'o// drug par gsod byed mar ni brjod// bdun par za byed ma'i phyag rgya// brgyad par steng du len par nges// gshin
283a6(rgyud 'bum): rje mo dang skrag byed drag/ gtum mo dang ni bzang za dang // b+ha su ma dang 'dod pa nyid// de nyid brgyad po phag mo nyid// mi bzad rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs// khrag dang khu ba za ba mo// 'od zer
283a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba sna tshogs 'bar/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya// mang por rnam bshad ye shes ni// de la dbus su rnam par 'byung // dpag tshad gsum gyi rgya khyon du// de yis gsal bar byed pa yin/
283b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa' chags pa che// thig le rdo rje can du 'gyur// zla ba phyed pa lta bur gsal// gdan ni pad+ma rA ga ste// rgyal po'i gzugs ni gsal ba yin// rgyal po nyid ces rnam/
283b2(rgyud 'bum): par bshad// steng du 'byung bar rab tu grags// yang ni dgod par bya ba ste// rigs kyi dbye bas brjod pa'o// shar du rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// lho ru rnam par snang mdzad brjod// nub tu rta bdun rgyal po'o//
283b3(rgyud 'bum): byang du pad+ma gar dbang ste// 'khor lo'i dbus su he ru ka/ steng gi sgra ni rta gdong yin// 'di rnams 'di ru dgod par gsungs// rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lnga// de ru bsgom par bya ba yin// gzhom med gzhig
283b4(rgyud 'bum): tu med pa ste/ / de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs// bgon po rnam par snang mdzad sogs// rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis bsgyings pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba ste brtag pa dang
283b5(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / de nas rdo rje phag mo de// rkang rgyan dang ni do shal rgyan// de yi dkyil 'khor la gar byed// dbang bskur ba ni ster ba yin// dam tshig la ni legs gzhag phyir// phag mo re
283b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rdo rje can/ / ci 'dod de bzhin rdo rje can// dri chen dri chu za ba dang // khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha// rtag tu bud med dang nus sam// b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed dam// smros shig rdor can bde ba che// de nas bcom
283b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan rdo rje can/ / bzhad par gyur nas ba ri dag smras// lha mo ci ste bdag mi spro// khrag dang khu ba la sogs bza'// rtag tu bud med gus par bgyi// b+ha ga'i pad la bo bgyid ro// yang ni legs so legs so//
284a1(rgyud 'bum): byin// sgo skyong de bzhin rdo rje can// thod pa yang dag blangs nas ni// rdo rje can la bza' ba dbul// zhi zhing gcer bur bdug pa dang // rdo rje can ni sgra grol bas// legs par dbang bskur
284a2(rgyud 'bum): ster bar byed/ / b+ha gar po byed rdo rje can// de nas brtsams te rdo rje tsam// de nas brtsams te rdo rje khyod// sems can don gyis brtul zhugs bzang // bza' ba dri chen dri chu dang // khrag dang khu ba sha dag gi
284a3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga'i pad mar 'o bya ste/ / bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor po nyamos// de nas rtag tu dbang bskur ro// huM hUM ha hA a A hri hrI sa swA hA/ de nas de ma thag tu kun// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
284a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / sgra chen po ni rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje can de dbang bskur ro// sna tshogs gzugs can drag po che// thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// sha dang khrag dag 'thung ba ste// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni
284a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor/ / la la rol mo'i cha byad rdung // ba tra ha sogs mu kun d+ho// la la rab tu glu len cing // la la bi wang sbreng ba ste// la la dor can gar byed do// la la dril bu'i sgra sgrogs byed// la la sgra dag rab tu sgrog/
284a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcur pheM gyi sgra dag go/ la la gar dag rab tu byed// la la dkyil 'khor la ni gar// la la me tog rab tu bgrems// de yis rdor can la dbang bskur// la la spos kyis rab tu byed// la la dri yis
284a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / 'di ltar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni bya// de nas rdor can lha mo de// tshig 'di dag ni brjod pa ste// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid dag dang // dbang dag legs
284b1(rgyud 'bum): par brjod nas ni/ / nga yis gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lha rnams dgod pa mchog dag go/ rgya ru kun tu khru brgyad de// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sngags pas de yi nyis 'gyur dpyad// gang du mkha'
284b2(rgyud 'bum): bgro'i tshogs 'gying ba/ / nam mkha' bod kyis rgya khyab par// gang de dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// dbus su 'khor lo yang dag bri// lte ba dag ni ge sar ldan// 'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag bcas//
284b3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dkar por yang dag ldan// de la dbus su dpa' bo dgod// dag pa'i shel dang 'dra ba ste// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// dang po spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// smin ma khro gnyer rab tu gsal/
284b4(rgyud 'bum): mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni// lho ru bltas pa'i zhal dag go/ g.yon pa rmad du byung ba ste// rgyab ni 'jigs pa chen po yin// mdun rgyab rta yi zhal gyis brgyan// dkar po dmar po de bzhin gnag/ ljang
284b5(rgyud 'bum): ku yi ni kha dog go/ phyag brgyad pa yang bri bar bya// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// dpal ldan mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin// 'jigs byed ljags ni 'dril ba ste// 'jig dus chen po'i me dang mtshungs//
284b6(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod lta bur 'jigs su rung // brtsegs par dgod cing bzhad pa che// pheM gyi sgra ni sgrogs pa'o// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ru// lha bzhi rnams ni brjod par bya// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'i lag/ khrag dang
284b7(rgyud 'bum): khu ba dag 'thung ngo / / 'khor lo gnyis pa yang dag bshad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// 'khor lo chen po yi ge brgyad// 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba ste// gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma// lam mchog 'phel
285a1(rgyud 'bum): dang sa ma li/ / phyir mi ldog dang e hi ki/ rdor can brgyad par brjod pa yin// lha mo brgyad po 'di ru dgod// kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar// lag pas kha T+wAM ga bzung zhing // thod pa
285a2(rgyud 'bum): khrag gis bkang ba'o/ / phyi rol 'khor lo yang dag brjod// lha rnams bkod pa mchog dang ni// sa ki ni dang puk+ka sI// gsod ma dkar mo sgrog ma dang // gtum mo raM khrod ma nyid dang // sgrol ma de bzhin khro
285a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyer ma/ / khams gsum rnam rgyal glang chen mo// de bzhin g+hasma rI dag dang // durga tsa mun da dag dang // de bzhin tshangs ma khyab 'jug ma// sgo skyong yang dag bshad pa ni// sgo bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya// 'khor
285a4(rgyud 'bum): lo chen po kha dog sngo/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba tshogs kyi 'od// lha mo chen mo kha dog dkar// kha T+wAM ga dang nya phyis 'dzin// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyal po ste// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sdom pa ni// rang gi rgyud du thun mong
285a5(rgyud 'bum): stedakyil 'khor bla ma'i bla ma yin/ / srub pa chen po'i sdom pa ni// de yi bla ma zhes su gsungs// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ dkyil 'khor gyi brtag pa zhes pa ste gnyis pa'o//
285a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i sgrub thabs so// glang po rta dang bong bu dang // ba lang rnga mo dag dang ni// khyi yi sgron ma rab tu 'byung // sgron ma chen po rab tu bshad//
285a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dga' bas gso bar byed// bya rog 'ug pa khra dang ni// chu sbyar bya rog lnga po yis// spos chen po ni rab tu bshad// spos su 'bul bar byed pa'o// 'di rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur// sa
285b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum po ru rnam par spyod/ / ji srid sbyor ba tshogs pa yis// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdud rtsi lnga ni rnam brjod pa// 'chi med dngos po med pa'o// rtog pa med par bza' bar bya//
285b2(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan rang bzhin med pos so// sde tshan tha ma'i sngags btus te// bcu drug cha yis yang dag ldan// pra Na ba sbyor steng du ste// thig le mnan cing brgyan pa yin// dri zhes kun tu brjod pa yin//
285b3(rgyud 'bum): kun nas thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// nyi shu bdun pa 'og tu sbyin// sngags la sogs pas phye ba yin// spyi bo de ru yang dag sbyar// yi ge lha yi gzugs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa drug yang ni sbyar// dbyangs
285b4(rgyud 'bum): yig gnyis pas brgyan pa yin/ / nyi shu rtsa gsum yang ni blang // 'og gi char ni sbyar bar bya// dbyangs kyi gsum pa yang dag ldan// bzhi pas sbyar bar bya ba yin// de yi dbus su yang dag gsung
285b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dbang phyug gis ni brgyan/ / bcu drug mtha' ni yang dag bshad// steng dang 'og tu khyab pa yin// de la dbus su yang dag gsungs// stong pa chen po'i yi ge ste// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhig
285b6(rgyud 'bum): tu med/ / dge ba yi ni shel lta bu// rdzas 'dri rnams ni bza' ba yin// rnal babyor 'di rnams mchog yin te// rnal babyor kun las mchog tu 'phags// khyod la mdo ru bsdus par bshad//
285b7(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba rnams ni yang dag brjod// gang gi rigs pas thams cad bza'// dngos po ro mnyam bsres nas ni// dag dang ma dag mi byed par// de bzhin nyid rnams thams cad dang // bza' ba thams
286a1(rgyud 'bum): cad brda' bar bya/ / de nyid bcu yis rab dbye bas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par grol// sbyin pa'i snying po sbyin par bya// sems kyis rnal 'byor rdzogs nas ni// thams cad
286a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa sogs bzhin du gtang / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims gyur// de nyid kun gyis mi 'jigs pa// skye bo thams cad 'tshe mi byed// dang por snying rje bran med// bzod pa tshul khrims bgegs med
286a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gzhan gyi gnod pa 'gengs pa ste// gur dang phur bu dra ba dag/ gdug pa'i bdud ni 'joms pa ste// bdud med 'chi ba med pa yin// bdag gi sems ni bcing bar bya// gang gis rang sems btul
286a4(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / bdud kyis gnod pa smos ci dgos// mnyam pa'i sems kyi dri yis ni// gru bzhi pa ru yang dag bri// lus la ste'u dang tsan dan dang // sems kyis mnyam par brgyud pa na// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
286a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / dngos po bdag med bsres pa ste// gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyal bar 'gyur// gang dag rnal 'byor ma yi ni// nub rnams la za ba dag/ de yis sa stengs mtha' dag tu// rga dang na ba rnam par 'joms//
286a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ dam tshig chen po'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba'i brtag pa ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sbyor ba dang po'i sgrub thabs te// sbyor ba
286a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam bzhir shes par bya/ / dam tshig bzhi ni bsgrub pa ste// dang po khu ba rnams zhes bya// gnyis pa de bzhi khrag nyid do// rdo rje chu dang dri tshan ni// dam tshig bzhi ni bsten pa ste// 'dod chags khu bar rnam par
286b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / phrag dog khrag ni nyid dag go/ gti mug rnam snang rgyal po ste// zhe sdang dri chur btsas pa yin// dam tshig bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis// dam tshig bzhi la spyod pa pos// dang po sbyor ba 'grub 'gyur zhing //
286b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// bris sku gzhug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dam tshig de nyid bsgrub bya ste// bstod pa'i rdo rje brjod bya ste// ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsam// mdor bsdus pa ni sngags
286b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas bya/ / hUM dag sngags ni brjod par bya// dngos pos sgom pas bsgom par bya// spro dang sdud dang byed pa po// bdud bzhi gzhan las rgyal ba yi// go cha mtshon cha 'di yis bcing // ra ba phur bu gur sogs
286b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / phyogs bzhi la sogs bcing bar bya// khams bzhi por ni yang dag 'byung // bdud bzhi po ni rnam par brjod// bad kan sha dang rkang dag dang // rus pa'i khams la yang dag 'byung // spyan dang bdag
286b5(rgyud 'bum): ma sgrol ma dang / / gos dkar la sogs bzhi po'o// khams bzhi dang ni rnam gnas pa// sbyor ba dang por brjod pa'o// brtson chen zhes su rnam bshad pa// rlung dang ma ni mchog yin te// da la dbus su
286b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gnas/ / 'dza' ra ta yi rang bzhin ming // dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa// kha dog med par rab tu grags// dbyangs dang yi ge'i tshul dag tu// dbyangs med yi ge med pa'o// tshangs min khyab
286b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug drag po min/ / nam mkha' min zhing 'dod pa man// zla ba min zhing skar ma min// nyi ma min zhing rlung yang min// gnod sbyin srin po lha min mi// 'byung po yi dgas nyid min cing // snod dang bcud ni
287a1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dang / / khams gsum po ni ma lus la// bdag nyid chen po de yis khyab// bems po nyid la yid kyis rtogs// de nyid 'jig rten pa ru 'gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang
287a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug che/ / zla ba gza' zin skar ma lha// de nyid thams cad bde ba che// rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang mdzad// pad+ma nyi ma khrag 'thung rta// rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mo// de nyid rdo rje bde ba che// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// de bzhin
287a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma pad+ma 'dzin/ / nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// rigs 'di rnams su bsgyur ba'o// de nyid dkyil 'khor bri ba nyid// rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa'o// de nyid sngags su rab tu bya// hUM hUM phaT kyai yi ge nyid// dmyal ba dud 'gro
287a4(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas dang / / lha dang mi dang lha min dang // dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa yis// 'khor lo 'di ru 'khod par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po mdor bsdus pa// rdo rje can la gnas pa'o// lha mo chen mo slar
287a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dri/ / 'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur// gnas nas 'di yi sems dag ni// skye ba ji ltar brjod pa yin// khu ba ji ltar gzugs su 'gyur// skye bo'i skye ba ji ltar yin// de yi gzugs kyi sgyu mal la// khrag
287a6(rgyud 'bum): la ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ / 'byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba ci// de yi skye ba ji ltar lags// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni// skye gnas kun la chags pa ni// dngos po rnam pa
287a7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar khyab/ / ni ba'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin// thams cad du ni ji ltar skye// 'di rnams yang dag bshad pa ni// lha mo bden par bdag la gsungs// ji ltar de bzhin rdo rje nyon// sems can kun gyis
287b1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / / 'khor bar yang dag bsrubs pa las// ding 'di thabs kyis 'di 'gyur ro// thog ma tha ma med dus su// sems can thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgya mtsho 'khrugs sogs gting gi nga/
287b2(rgyud 'bum): blo gros chen po bsrubs pa yin// de las de dag skye bar 'gyur// sa yi khams dang yang dag ldan// me yis mnyam par nges par bsrubs// chu dang rlung gi bye brag go/ yid kyis de ru rab zhen pa/
287b3(rgyud 'bum): mngal ni bzung zhing blangs pa ste// de ni 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur// dag pa mya ngan ldan pa ste// de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni// so sor skye ba smra ba ste// de bzhin chos dag zab mo nyid// sangs rgyas
287b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis sangs rgyas brjod/ / de nyid 'di rnams mnyam bshad pa// sum nu pa ste rnyed par dka'/ rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag sbyor ba bzhi'i cha zhes bya ba ste brtag pa
287b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sgrub// sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas// phyi ru ji ltar gsungs
287b6(rgyud 'bum): pa lags/ / nang du yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// nyon cig rdo rje nang gi ni// ji bzhin sbyin sreg rab bsgrub bya// ma chen po dag rab tu sbar// rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya// bza' dang btung ba gang yang rung //
287b7(rgyud 'bum): de ru thams cad sbyin sreg bya// bsreg rdzas rang bzhin gsungs pa dag/ gzugs phung la sogs lnga po dag/ rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya// de dag thams cad sems las byung // khrag dang khu ba da
288a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin sha/ dri chen dri chu lnga po dag/ rnam rtog med par bza' bar bya// blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so// gti mug nga rgyal de bzhin chags// zhe sdang de bzhin 'dod chags nyid// phrag dog/
288a2(rgyud 'bum): sar sna phra ma dag/ dam tshig de nyid dri ma med// ji ltar nyi ma 'bar ba bzhin// de ltar dri ma med par 'gyur// ji ltar ston gyi zla gsal ba// de ltar 'di yi dbus gsal yin// 'dod chags chen por 'gyur
288a3(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / rdo rje snang byed sgron ma bzhi// de nyid thar par gsungs pa ste// bla me dgo ba phang thob par 'gyur// sbyin sreg 'di la rab gnas na// lha rnams dga' bas tshim pa yin// sbyin sreg las ni rab gsungang
288a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rab gnas dag na brjod par bya// sngon gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas// de nas rab gnas bya ba sna// rab gnas sku sogs thang ka dang // rnal 'byor can gyis glegs bam ste// dpal ldan g.yon gyis
288a5(rgyud 'bum): dril bu 'dzin/ / g.yas kyis rdo rje yongs su bzung // don kun rnal 'byor kun gyis ni// mdzes par sku gzugs mchod par bya// sha dang chang dag rab tu bkang // ro yi steng du yang dag gnas//
288a6(rgyud 'bum): par pa ti pa li ka saM ku li// mchod pa kun gyis dgyes par bya// me tog spos dang mar me dang // dri nyid dang ni rnam pa bzhi// glu dbyangs de bzhin gar dag dang // sgrub pos ba tra ha sogs te// sku la
288a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa 'di rnams la/ / rab gnas chen po bya ba yin// ba aM mu si i sa haM dz+dza yin// ma i hi ma d+hum+ma pa hi ts+tsha i// tsa taM ha tsani da ta d+hasma tsin ta dz+dza i// sa e la sa d+hu sarta tha ki ri ts+tsha i// glu 'di
288b1(rgyud 'bum): dag ni grangs pa yis/ dbang nams kun kyang blang ba ste// chos rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gaN+DI// mchod pa kun gyi sprin chen po// sgo zhing bsdu bar brjod pa'o//
288b2(rgyud 'bum): nga yis rab gnas bshad pa ni// rgyud rnams kun las rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ sbyin sreg rab gnas kyi brtag pa ste lnga pa'o// / de nas mdor
288b3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus rab bshad pa/ / de nyid gtan la dbab pa'i mchog/ rtag tu sems ni rnam rtog med// rnam rtog bcas pas ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar me dag rabab bar ba// rtag tu shing rnams tshig par brjod// de la tshig
288b4(rgyud 'bum): pa shing rnams te/ / 'di yis tshig par mthong ba yis// de yis tshig pa ji bzhin du// blo ldan rnam rtog med pa yis// phung po lnga yi shing rnams te// de bzhin gzugs kyi phung po nyid// rus pa rkang dang
288b5(rgyud 'bum): bad kan dang / / khrag dang khu ba dri chen dag/ mig gnyis de bzhin rna ba dang // de bzhin du ni sna nyid dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin ma// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang // 'byung ba lnga po thams cad la// de
288b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga dag/ de yi gnas ni bye brag tu// nga yis bye brag brjod pa ste// lte bar gnas pa'i 'khor lo chos// 'dab ma drug cu bzhi dang ldan// shes rab gnas su rab tu gsungs// zla ba'i gzugs
288b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gsal ba ste/ / de yi dbus su gnas pa dag/ me lta bur ni 'bar ba yin// me chen de ni 'bar ba ste// de yi rtse mo mthong ba ni// de yid de ni gzugs mthong yin// dngos po thams cad gzugs 'dzin pa//
289a1(rgyud 'bum): @rnon po gnas su gsungs shing brjod// d+hU y-ishrI nga ro tshul 'dzin pa// rdo rje can ni cag tu byung // rdo rje 'dzin chen gzugs bzhin no// rlung gi nus pa ma yin te// de yi dbus smra
289a2(rgyud 'bum): tu grags/ / kAng ni ga bong can gzugs gsungs// shes rab de nyid mdor bsdus so// ji ltar nyi mar rab tu brjod// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur// sde tshan brgyad kyis tham gzugs// thig sa
289a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni zhabs kyis bcas/ / de nyid nyi ma zhes su gsungs// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can// de yi dbus su yang dag 'byung // rdo rje can gnas mnyam par 'gyur// ji ltar gnyid kyis bzung ba ni/
289a4(rgyud 'bum): cung zad kyang ni mthong ba med// gzugs la sogs pa'i bzung ba dag/ langs na rtag tu mthong ba yin// de ru thabs ni bsgom pa yis// de yi rang bzhin mchog tu grags// sems can thogs med
289a5(rgyud 'bum): bde chen brjod/ / de ru der gnas dngos po yis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gsal// de phyir de nyid dngos po yis// blo ldan sems kyis de nyid gsung // sems ni rnam par dag pa ste// 'khor
289a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams par 'gyur/ / sngags pa gar 'dod 'gro ba yin// skad cig gis ni gnas par 'gro// 'dod chen rnams ni chags par 'gyur// drag po rnams la drug po mtshon// zhi ba rnams
289a7(rgyud 'bum): la zhi ba ste/ / 'di ni mdun rgyab rgyal ba rim// ji ltar 'di ru pad+ma rim// 'dod chags skyon gyi sa gos mi 'gyur// sna tshogs bag chags sbyin mi chags// khams gsum po ni de bzhin dag/ stong pa ma
289b1(rgyud 'bum): yin mi stong min/ / dbu ma nye bar thob pa'o// shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor// thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid do// 'di ni byang chub sems rdo rje// sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis// dngos po med par
289b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa'i dngos/ / de la bsgom par brjod pa min// 'phreng ba med cing bya ba med// sdud pa med par brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni// dbu ma'i mchog gi go 'phang ngo // bla na med pa'i ye shes ni//
289b3(rgyud 'bum): bla med ces ni rim pa med/ 'dis ni 'khor ba rnam par grol// phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su gsungs// de yis rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa ste// rdo rje
289b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ / khrag dang khu ba bza' ba ste// dri chen dri chu sha dang lnga// de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// bahU bi ha hU tra ta ga ti ba hUM bi ha bi ha hu pa ri Ne sa ba hU bi ha ra

289b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad bya ba/ / de nyid rnal 'byor thams cad ni// sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson// bsam gtan bzod pa shes rab dang // stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni// smon lam ye shes yang dag 'a byung // nga rol/
290a1(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi// sbyin pa rnam pa bani ru gsungs// tshul khrims gsum gyi ngo bo nyid// bsam gtan rnam bzhir gsungs pa ste// brtson 'grus//
290a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// bzod pa rnam pa bcur shes bya// shes rab rnam pa drug tu 'gyur// stobs ni rnam bcu rab tu gsungs// thabs ni rnam pa lngar 'gyur te// smon lam gnyis su shes bya ste// ye shes rnam lngar gnas
290a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / chos dang mi 'jigs rdzas dang byams// sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po ni// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ngar 'dzin med cing khengs pa bral// bden pa gnyis med gnas pa ni// tshul khrims rnam gsum brjod pa ni// /
290a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs// gang gis rnal 'byor ma gnyis dang // phyi yi rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni// dri chen dri chu de bzhin sha// khrag dang khu bar ma ngag 'byung // 'di
290a5(rgyud 'bum): / rnams brtson 'grus lnga po ni// dam tshig sgra yis brjod pa'o// tshig rtsub brdzun dang ngag 'khyal dang // chags sdang zhe sdang phrag dog dang // nga rgyal khro dang de bzhin dbyen// 'di bcu rnam par bshad pa ni// rdo rje
290a6(rgyud 'bum): can ni bzod bcas 'gyur/ / yang dag lta ba yang dag rtog/ yang dag ngag dang yang dag las// yang dag 'tsho dang yang dag rtsol// bdag gis mdo ru bsdus nas ni// shes rab rnam pa drug tu brjod// dad pa'i
290a7(rgyud 'bum): / stobs dang dran pa'i stobs// ting 'dzin stobs dang shes rab stobs// lus kyi stobs dang ngag gi stobs// ye shes stobs dang smon lam stobs// brtson 'grus kyi ni stobs rnams te// 'di rnams stobs ni
290b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu pa'o/ / ma skyes pa yi dge ba skyed// skyes pa'i mi dge yang dag spong // mi dge ma skyes mi skyed dang // dge ba skyes pa ba phel ba ste// lnga pa thams cad chos rnams kyi// dge ba'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni//
290b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par byed pa nyid dag go/ smon lam rnam pa gnyis su gnas// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya grub chos dbyings rnam par dag/ ye shes rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// 'di rnams bcu bzhi po dag ni//
290b3(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin pa mdor bsdus pa// bdag gis de nyid brjod pa ste// rdor can nyon cig gtan la dbab// bcu gnyis mtha' dang brgya yi mtha'// mgo nas rkang pa'i mthil bar du// de yi dbus su nges 'gyur/

290b6(rgyud 'bum): med cing / / dpyid med ston yang yod ma yin// dgun med sos kyang med pa ru// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod// sngags dang rgyud la ji ltar gnas// nya dang sha
290b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bza' bar bya/ / chang gi btung ba mchog yin no// bcud kyis len gyi cho ga yis// sngags ni brjod par mi bya'o// mtshon cha'i gnas la dus rtag tu// mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya// bcom
291a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par/

291a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar gyis bsgyur te/ slad kyis de nyid kyi tshe bar+t+ti ta gnyis la yang dag par gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+raH
291a5(rgyud 'bum): ra ti a b+hi da na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rnal 'byor bshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byung pa'o// b+h+yo ma las kyang phyim ste// mkha'
291a6(rgyud 'bum): bgro ma yi dra ba sdom/ / phag mo yi ni gtso mo yang // rnal 'byor rnams kyi grub b+har ma'o// rnal 'byor ma lus rnams kyi yang // snying po rnal 'byor btus pa'o// sgrub pa po la phan don phyir// bla ma'i brgyud
291a7(rgyud 'bum): ba gsal ba'o/ / byi rol rnam rtog med pa dang // kun tu dam tshig chos nyid dang // spyod dang dogs pa med pa dang // kun tu ser sna rnam spangs te// tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar med// bsnyen gnas cho ga sa/
291b1(rgyud 'bum): med de// dag dang ma dag gtsang yang med// chu yi gtsang sbra bya ba med// dus dang mal las rnam par grol// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang rgyud bsngags dang rnal 'byor shes// sems can
291b2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi don brtson pas/ / ra sul tshang tshang phug rnams dang // chu bo'i ba gram dang 'dus pa dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang // shang gcig sa dang khang snying dang // ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dang // skyed
291b3(rgyud 'bum): mos tshal mchog sna tshogs dang / / lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas// khyim mam yang na bzhi mdo ru// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba'i// sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya// gnas ni bstan par byas pa 'am//
291b4(rgyud 'bum): gang du yid ni dga' ba ru// sdom pa sna tshogs bsrung 'dod pa'i// der ni dngos grub yang dag 'grub// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsgom pa'i dbye ba mang ba'o// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi yis//

291b6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs te/ / sems ni rtse gcig pa yis su// tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag dang // sems can kun la bde ba byung ba'i// dge ba bcu ni dmigs par bya'o// chos rnams
291b7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid du ni/ / phyi nang bdag nyid mthong bya ste// de nas sems tsam du gnas te// byang chub kyi ni tshogs mchog go/ snying gi mkha' dbyings par dbus gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
292a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni// mchog gi de nyid der mthong ste// 'od zer sna tshogs rang bzhin bzang // kun tu rnam par spros pa las// sngar grub rnams ni yang dag
292a2(rgyud 'bum): bskul/ / nam mkha'i khams ni nyams dga' bar// dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba ste// byin gyis brlab pa dag kyang ngo // til gyi gang bu bzhin mthong ste// khro bo lha mo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas
292a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / / bla ma byang chub sems dpa' dag/ mchod dang mchod pa byed pa'i bdag/ lha mo rnam par dgu mthong ste// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi sprul pa spro// khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor/

292a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang po ni bskyed par bya/ / gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam par shes nyid kyang // oM hrIHhoHhUM zhes pa// rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang // de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang // rdo rje rgyal po zhes thags

292b3(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o zhes rnam par dag pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu gsum la skyabs su gsol te/ sngags kyi lus su gyur par bya'o// bdag nyid he ru kar bsgoms te/

292b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / nyi ma'i 'od zer 'phreng lta bu'i// dngos po kun brtse phyogs bcu ru// 'od zer de las ra ba dang // de bzhin du ni dra bar blta// rdo rje sa gzhi byin gyis brlab// bla re mda' yi ra ba dang // rdo rje me 'bar
292b6(rgyud 'bum): dra ba ni/ / de yi phyi rol ring du bsam// oM me di ni badz+ra b+hA ba badz+ra ban+d+ha haM/ oM badz+ra prA kA ra hUM baM/ oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM sha ra dz+wa la traM saM traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM hUM hUM/
292b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo mthe bong dag sbyar te// se gol gtogs te phyogs bcur ying // oM suM b+he na~M su~M b+ha huM hUM phaT/ shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hu~M hU~M phaT/ byang du'o// oM gr-in+d+ra pa ya gr-ih+NA pa la tsu hU~M phaT/ nub N+Dim/
293a1(rgyud 'bum): oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ lho ru'o// sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bgegs thams cad kyi mgo la phur pa btab te g.yas skor dang g.yon pa skor ba ma yin pa'o// oM
293a2(rgyud 'bum): g+ha b+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ kI li kI lA ya/ sarba pA paM hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI lA ya badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba duSh+TA na big+h+na ka ya bAk+ShiHbadz+ra kI lA ya hUM phaT/ brdung bar bya ste/ rdo rje phur pa la
293a3(rgyud 'bum): / khro bo'i lta bas bltas nas/ gau rims dang go rims ma yin pas rdo rje sgrub pa pos brdungs te/ oM badz+ra mu da ga ra badz+ra kI lA ya A ko Da ya hUM phaT/ bdud med bdud kyi las kyang med// rang gi sems kyis
293a4(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa bzhin/ / gang gis rang gi sems 'dul na// gang las bdud ni gnas par 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yang // mnyam gzhag dang bas dran par bya// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma
293a5(rgyud 'bum): kohaM/ oM a ni mat+ti dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM/ mig yor tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems tsam rnam par brtag par bya// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos 'di
293a6(rgyud 'bum): dag/ chos can med cing chos nyid mid// nam mkha' lta bur gos pa med// dngos po med cing rtog pa med// snying rje'i bdag nyid phan bya'i phyir// smon lam dbang gis dmigs bya ste// ji srid sa yi
293a7(rgyud 'bum): 'og dmigs pa/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// yaM gyi yi ge las byung ba// gzhu 'dra kha dog sngo dang ldan// rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan bsam bya ste// du ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'o// de yi steng du
293b1(rgyud 'bum): raM las ni/ / me yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// zur gsum pa la kha dog dmar// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrug cing dmar// nyi ma bye ba lta bur gnas// rdo rjes mtshan pa bsam par bya// de yi steng du
293b2(rgyud 'bum): chu nyid kyang / / baM las bum pa mchog tu gyur// zlum zhing 'od zer 'phreng bar ldan// kha ba lta bu nyid kyang ngo // de yi steng du bsam bya ba// laM las byung ba ser por ldan// gru bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan// 'od
293b3(rgyud 'bum): zer ser po'i tshogs 'khrug pa'o/ / de stang rnal 'byor pa bsgoms pas// ri yi rgyal po ri rab mchog/ zur bzhi rin chen bzhi rang bzhin// rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// suM las byung ba bzang po'o//
293b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer bzang po mchog gi mchog/ de yi steng du bsgom bya ba// bruM las byung ba rtag pa ste// de yongs gyur las 'khor lo mchog/ gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta
293b5(rgyud 'bum): babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ / dra ba drab phyed pas spras// dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin po che yis spras// phyi yi dkyil
293b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thig gdab pa/ / pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// sna tshogs kha dog mchog gi mchog/ lte ba dang ni ge sar bcas// thams cad dag pa nyid kyi gdan// de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha// gsal ba'i rang bzhin
293b7(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med/ / de stang A li ka li ni// dbus su bgyis brgyan pa'o// de yi dbus bzhengs gtso mo ni// phag mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis te// spyan gsum shin tu chags pa'o//
294a1(rgyud 'bum): gdan la byed skyil gyis bzhugs te// shin tu mdzes pas gar byed pa'o// phyogs kyi gos can spa grol ba// phyed ni dbus ma dbang phyug nas// dkar dang dmar dang 'di'ajam
294a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / thod pa'i dbus ni dbu rgyan mdzes// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bsnams// pad+ma bskor cing 'khor ba ldan// dpral bar phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // mi yi pags pa'i bla gos dang // thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin
294a3(rgyud 'bum): cing / / zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa bzhag/ cang te'u gri gug mgo bo yang // zhal bzhi pa ni tshangs pa yi// sngo dang ser dang ljang ku yi// bzang po'i zhal gyis nye bar mdzes// zhal ni mche ba gtsigs
294a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / zla ba phyed pas steng du brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu rgyan mtshan// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// lha mo phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// dum bu brgyad pas ska rags ni// ska rags sil
294a5(rgyud 'bum): sil sgra sgrogs pa/ / rkang pa'i gdub kyis nye bar mdzes// dpung rgyan mdzes par byed pa dang // dpral bar rdo rje 'phreng ba dang // phyag rgya rdo rjes mtshan pas so// shin tu gzugs bzang yid du 'ong /
294a6(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma// seng gdong ma ste 'jigs par byed// byang gi phyogs su phag gdong ma// lha mo lA ma 'jigs byed ma// nub tu lha mo glang po'i gdong // dum skyes ma ste drag mo bo//
294a7(rgyud 'bum): lho ru lha mo gzugs can ma// rta yi gdong pa lhag pa'i gzugs// spyan gsum sna tshogs gzugs can ma'o// thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing // mgo bo gri gug 'dzin pa can// gcer bu sgra ni grol ba ste//
294b1(rgyud 'bum): gar byed pa yis shin tu mdzes// yi dgas gdan la phyed skyil gyis// drag cing gtum pa 'jigs pa'o// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan ma// lha mo zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan// me la sogs pa
294b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshams bzhi ru/ / byang chub sems la sogs pa'i sdod// bum pa'i steng du rnam par dgod// dung dang kun da zla 'dra ba'i// byang shar la sogs phyogs bzhi ru// rtsibs drug pa yi 'khor lo bri// 'khor
294b3(rgyud 'bum): lo'i dbus su pre bya ba/ / rigs kyi lha mo bzhi po ni// lha mo mA ma kI dang spyan// sgrol ma gos dkar mo dag ste// sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba ste// lha mo rdo rje rigs dbang phyug/ dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba yaM//
294b4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo rtag pa'i rigs yin no// ljang ku dkar dang dmar ba yi// lha mo las kyi rigs yin no// dmar dang ljang ku sar ba yi// lha mo pad+ma'i rigs las byung // sman gsum skra ni grol ba yin// phyogs kyi

294b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar po mchog gi mchog/ de bzhin thams cad dril bu 'dzin// pad+ma skor bar byed pa'o// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs kyis mnan// grar dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// sna tshogs pad+ma rma dbus bzhugs

295a1(rgyud 'bum): cha ni thams cad du/ / gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa dgod// nang gi 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// lha mo ji ltar rjes mthun dgod// 'khor lo rtsibs drug dang po la// pul+li r+ya
295a2(rgyud 'bum): mal yang rab gtum ma'o/ / rtsibs gnyis pa la dz+wa lan d+ha rang gtum pa'i mig can no// gsum pa oM r+yan du 'ong ldan ma'o// bzhi pa ar bu dar sna chen ma'o// lnga pa gong ba rir brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//

295b1(rgyud 'bum): duljang ser rdo rje dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug go/ gsum pa nub tu dmar ser thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / pad+ma dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug go// bzhi pa

297a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma'o/ / ar bu ta ste lhag par sna chen ma'o// go da ba ri ste rna ba g.yon pa la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// rA me shwa ra ste smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o// de bi ko Ta ste mig gnyis

297b1(rgyud 'bum): shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa' 'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la dpal he ru ka'o// mig gnyis la gti mug rdo rje'o// rna ba gnyis la zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sna gnyis la phrag dog rdo rjeg

298b2(rgyud 'bum): d+hu na/ badz+ra ha sta sho Sha ya shau Sha ya/ badz+ra kha T+wAM ga ka bA la d+hA ri Ni/ ma hA bi si ta mAM sA sha ni/ mA nu Sh+ya tra pra brit+te sA na ni d+h+ye na ra shi ro mA lA graM thi ta d+hA ri Ni/ suM b+ha ni suM b+he/ ha na ha na/ prA NAM sarba pA pa sa twa nAM
298b3(rgyud 'bum): sarba ba shU nAM ma hA mAM sats+tshe da ni/ kro d+ha mUrti daMSh+TaM ka rA li ni/ ma hA mu dre shriHhe ru ka de ba s+yA gra ma hi Shi sa ha sra shi re sra ha sra bAM ha be sha ta sa ha sra A na ni dz+wa li ta te dza saM dzA la mu khe pi ga la/ lo tsa ni badz+re sha rI raM/

299a1(rgyud 'bum): ba rA dzi te ba shaM ka ri ne tra b+h+ra ma Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM na maHsho Sha Ni ro Sha Ni kro d+ha ni ka ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM na maHtrA sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni a ba rA dza ye huM hUM phaT/ oM na mo dza ye u0f7f d
299a2(rgyud 'bum): za ye dzam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ni mo ha ni huM hUM phaT/ oM na mo badz+ra bA ra hi ma hA yo gi nI kA me shwa ri kha ge huM hUM phaT/ sngags 'di thams cad du byas te/ A li kA li rdo rje phag mo'i bdag nyid kyi dngos por bya ste/
299a3(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa brgyad pa cho ga'i bdag nyid kyis mchod par bya'o// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni// zhi ba'i btung ba btung ba'i mchog/ chos rnams mnyam zhing dam tshig mchog/ sum cu rtsa bdun
299a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi mchog/ de 'og rnam par dag pa bsgom// lus rjes su dran pa mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba rjes su dran pa lA ma'o// chos rjes su dran pa khaN+Da ro hi'o// sems rjes su dran pa rU bi nI'o//
299a5(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa
299a6(rgyud 'bum): ni sna chen ma'o/ / dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o// dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o//
299a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
299b1(rgyud 'bum): / ni ljang lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang /
299b2(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin tu spangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o// dran pa yang
299b3(rgyud 'bum): dngag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los sgyur
299b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khA ga dong ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i
299b5(rgyud 'bum): dran pa ni phag gdong ma ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phag mo'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed par byed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o//
299b6(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams rjes su gnas pa dang srung bar byed pa ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong bar byed pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
299b7(rgyud 'bum): mi skyed par byed pa ni gshin rje ba joms ma'o/ / chos bdag med pa'i lam gnas su// 'khor ba dam par bzhugs pa ni// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas gnas bya//
300a1(rgyud 'bum): snang ba med pa'i gnas la nas// snang ba med pa yang dag rten// dpyod pa med pa'i chos rnams la// chos can med cing chos nyid med// rten 'brel mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos//
300a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med mtshan ma med pa'o// 'di nyid gong nyid go 'phang gnas// ye shes dag gi mig gis mthong // phra rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa// 'khor lo'i gnas mthong shin tu nges// skra rtse stong phrag
300a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya yi ni/ / cha dang cha ru yongs su brtag/ he ru ka dang mnyam sbyor ma// lhan cig b+ha ga'i dbus gnas mthong // 'khor lo sgyur ba rab brtson pas// khwa gdong ma ni phyi rol dgod// he ru ka sogs
300a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag po khyod/ / mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor// phan tshun du ni bdag po byed// rdo rje sems sogs sbyor bar ldan// phyi rol dur khrod bdag po dang // kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mchog
300a5(rgyud 'bum): shing mchog sna tshogs mdzes pa dang / / khyi dang lce spyang 'jigs pa dang // khwa dang 'ug pa bya dkar dgod// lce spyang de bzhin ro bsreg pa// keng rus gsal shing gis phug pa// 'gegs nas baphyang dang
300a6(rgyud 'bum): phyer bsregs dang / / thod pa skam po pus mo dang // mgo med lag bzod pa dkar// rnam pa sna tshogs sbrul gyis mdzes// drag po'i sbrul dang de bzhin rnga// seng ge phag dang stag dang ni// de bzhin rang
300a7(rgyud 'bum): lug dag dang / / glang po rta dang bong bu wa// rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog/ rnam pa sna tshogs chang dang ni// 'bru chang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis// dpa' bo bzang po 'dus pa dang // sna tshogs rnal
300b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'byor ma mchog rnams// thod pa kha T+wAM ga dag dang // dril bu cang te'u mchog rnams 'dzin// sna tshogs rol mo bzang po dang // bza' ba'i longs spyod ro mchog dang // sna tshogs po dang 'khyud ba dang // /
300b2(rgyud 'bum): bca' ba bldag pa'i mchog rnams kyis// rnam pa de ltar dur khrod ni// gnod sbyin ro langs srin po dang // he ru ka yi nga rgyal gyis// de la gtor ma sbyin par bya// cang te'u rdo rje dril bu dang // gar dang rol mo
300b3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / / phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgyar ldan// hUM hUM phaT ki li ki li bya// g.yas brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// dam tshig kha ru bcug nas ni// sngags 'di rjes su dran par
300b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ oM a/ a ra li so dzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM Di sh+ya ho/ de skad gsum mam bzhi dang sngar brjod par bya'o// g.yas skor dang g.yon skor gyis kyang thod pa'i nang gi sbyin par bya ba rnams/ rdoH
300b5(rgyud 'bum): thal mo kha gyen du phye la/ sngags 'di brjod do// oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba rak+Sha yak+Sha sarba b+hud ta pre ta pi sha tse ud ma ta a pa sma ra/ DA ki nI a Da ya i maM b+ha li gri han du ma ma sarba sa te d+hi/ da ngan ta ya sha
300b6(rgyud 'bum): baM ya thaM shrI bun dza thi pi pa tha dzi g+ha tha ma ti kra ma ta/ ma ma sarba kA ra sad su kha bi shud+d+ha ye sA ha ya ka ba b+ha na du hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de ltar tshe ga dang cho gas thun mtshams bzhir sbyin par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
300b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba'i yang gsang chen po 'di gsungs pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos bdag nyid// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis/
301a1(rgyud 'bum): stong nyid shin tu rnam par bsgom// legs so zhes ni bya ba byin// rgyud rdzogs pa yi sbyor ba las// legs so legs so ye shes che// bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las phag mo mngon/
301a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
301a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// 'bum phrag gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rgyud las sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba ste/
301a4(rgyud 'bum): snying kha nas spros pas rmi lam lta bu'i lus dang longs spyod dam pa'i bde ba gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / 'dir de'i steng du ma ning gi sa bon blta ste/ sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las dmar mo zhal steng
301a5(rgyud 'bum): du phyogs shing gyen du gzigs pa/ zhabs g.yon pa la 'khyud pa'i thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang me tog gi 'phreng ba bcings pa'i phyag can ma/ me tog gi zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na'o// zhabs g.yas pa'i rting
301a6(rgyud 'bum): pa la reg pa'i g.yas pa na rdo rje'i phyag can ma/ rgyan thams cad spangs pa mo/ rig pa 'dzin ma'i rig pa'i sbyor ba can ma/ spro zhing kun tu sdud pa'i lus can ma/ man+da ra ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / yod
301a7(rgyud 'bum): 'du rnams skyes par gyur pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'i khang par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ / oM baM rdo rje phag mo'o// hA yoM sngon mo gshin rje ma'o// hriM moM rmongs byed ma'o// hreM hU~M kun
301b1(rgyud 'bum): tu ba spyod ma'o/ / hUM hUM kun tu skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT gtum mo yan lag thams cad la mtshan ma'o// lte ba dang / rnying kha dang / de bzhin du kha dang / mgo bo dang / spyi bo ste 'di mtshon bya'o// rnal 'byor/
301b2(rgyud 'bum): ma lnga po 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bshad do// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// oM shri he ru ka ma hA badz+ra A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+d+ha pra be Sho ya te Sha ya/ sarba
301b3(rgyud 'bum): DA ki ni naM hr-i da yaM oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki ni pra tIts+tshe ma ba liM hUM oM/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ye pra tIts+tshe maM ba li hUM hUM/ oM rat+na DA ki ni pra tIts+tsha maM ba liM hUM tra/ oM pad+mA DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha maM baM li hUM hriHoM bi shA DA ki nI pra tI
301b4(rgyud 'bum): tsI ma ba liM hUM a/ oM sarba yo gI ni pra tIts+tsha paM ba li hUM hUM/ ha ha hi hI badz+ra dzaHhUM baM ha~M/ oM badz+ra yau ga nA~M sa ma yaM/ swa dri sh+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha hoH/ rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
301b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dza ya se nA'i zhabs dang / lo tsa ba btsun pa d+harma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar
301b6(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ saM puHnA ma mahA tan+ta/ bod skad du/ yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa
301b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas rdo rje snying
302a1(rgyud 'bum): bo la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i tshe rdo rje snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
302a2(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes kyi dbang po rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid nyan par 'tshal lo// e
302a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / rdo rje snying po legs so legs so// snying rje chen po legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi phung po legs so legs so// gang zhig rgyud thams cad du gsang ba de thams
302a4(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dod pas zhus shig/ de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams rab tu 'dzum zhing mig phye bas phyag btsal te/ rang gi the tshom yang dang yang du zhus pa/ rgyud ni thams cad
302a5(rgyud 'bum): ci zhes brjod/ / gleng gzhi yang ni ji ltar lags// 'di la gsang ba ci zhes gsungs// ji ltar yang dag sbyor byung ming // de la mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud
302a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni rgyud thams cad do/ / rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o// de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni byung bar nges pa zhes bya ba'i don to// khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs
302a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o// yang dag par sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no// de las byung ba ni yang dag par
302b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i don to/ / 'byung ba ni skye ba ste/ de ltar gnas pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa'o// mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni 'dis mtshon par byed pa'o// yang
302b2(rgyud 'bum): na rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpar gsungs so/ / gsong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni man ngag can gyi sngags btu ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la
302b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// dang por stong nyid bsams pas ni// lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru// gzugs kyi khams ni stong
302b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / sgra la de nyid kyis ni bya// dri yi khams ni stong pa yis// rol de nyid kyis ni bya// reg bya'i khams ni stong pa yi// yid la de nyid kyis ni bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ mig gi rang bzhin
302b5(rgyud 'bum): stong pa yi/ / nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags// rna ba'i rang bzhin stong pa yi// nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags// sna yi rang bzhin stong pa yi// nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags// lce yi rang bzhin stong
302b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi// nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags// yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi// dbus su rnam shes ji ltar lags// de phyir gzugs med
302b7(rgyud 'bum): lta ba med/ / sgra med thos pa po yang med// dri med snom pa po yang med// ro med myong ba po yang med// reg med reg pa po yang med// sems med sems las byung ba'ang med// bcom ldan 'das kyi/
303a1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ gnyis med gnyis ni rnam spangs pa'i// de nyid lam ni ji bzhin nyon// rtog ge med cing rnam shes med// de bzhin rtog ge pas mi rtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi
303a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba ni/ / nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid// nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes te// mi shes pa yi mun pas bsgribs// bag chags sad pa'i ye shes gang // rang rgyal rnams kyi sprul pa'o// sa
303a3(rgyud 'bum): ba sangs rgyas spyod yul nyid/ / de rnams kun gyis mi shes so// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las// rgal bar 'gro ba'i sems kyis ni// lus kyi dbus su bskor ba yi// rgal ba mtshon par
303a4(rgyud 'bum): gsung ba ste/ / rnam shes ye shes sems kyis ni// mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed// ye shes kyis ni shes bya ba lta// shes bya rnams kyis 'gro ba brtag/ 'gro ba brtag pa'i sems kyis ni//
303a5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rang 'dod la sogs 'gro// 'gro bar sngon gyi skye ba ni// stong phrag du ma dag tu 'gro// yo gis sngar gsungs mtshan nyid kyis// mnyam nyid stong par bsam nas ni// lus kyi stong pa'i zhing
303a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs la/ / blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab// rtsa yi mdzes spyi las byung ba// de ni rdul bral rab tu grags// dag pa'i shel gyi 'od dang mnyam// byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba// ye shes lnga yi
303a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos de nyid/ / yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam// de yi nang du gnas pa'i lha// mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// ma mo phyed pa mchog tu phra// thig le'i gzugs ni yid kyi dngos// snying
303b1(rgyud 'bum): gi dbus su rtag gnas shing / / 'od zer ldan zhing gzi brjid che// bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mthar// rkang mthil mgo bo med par ni// thag pa gcig ni rnam phyung nas// lte ba'i dbus su rnam
303b2(rgyud 'bum): par gnas/ / cha ni lnga pa tsam nyid ni// klu dbang dbyibs su rgyas pa la// de yi cha yang phyed nas ni// rdo rje'i dbus su rnam phyung ste// skye gnas dbus su sa bon gnas// chos dbyings khu bar
303b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / sgo ni dgu po thams cad du// de ni rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur// de bzhin me ni tshangs pa'i dngos// sa yi sa bon gnyis kyis ni// mig la de nyid sbyar bar bya// rlung gi sbyong
303b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs sa bon gyi/ / sems kyis sna dang rna ba sogs// bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon lce// dbang por gtso bo dbang phyug nyid// mgrin par gti mug sa bon te// lag par nyon mongs de bzhin no//
303b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba snying gi gnas rnams su// phyugs bdag lte ba'i rtsa bar ni// yan lag brgyad kyi sa bon gyis// yan lag brgyad kyi tsho gas 'dzin// brtan sogs g.yo bar bcas pa yi// 'gro ku/
303b6(rgyud 'bum): khyab par byed pas khyab// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min ni// de yi gdan du gyur pa yi// gang la gtso bo spyod gyur pa'i// khyim ni b+ha ga zhes su gsungs// ji srid lus la rnam gnas pa// de yi lwa
303b7(rgyud 'bum): dang las min 'gyur/ / dge dang mi dge'i las cung zad// byas pa'i las ni thams cad byed// rnal 'byor mnyam pa nyid du gsungs// rab tu sbyor ba sgom pa yin// gang tshe las kyis lus bcom
