304a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ da ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin// gang gis brtan dang g.yo khyab pa// des ni de tshe rang gis nus// nam mkha' lta bur mnyam nyid ni// de yi kha dog shes par bya// mya ngan
304a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das gnas dpa' bo ni/ / gos pa med cing dri ma spangs// ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo de bzhin gnyen mo dang // bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs dang // rje'u mo de bzhin dmangs mo dang
304a3(rgyud 'bum): gar ma chos ma g.yung mo dang / / de bzhin du ni gdol pa mo// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// de nyid sdug pas mchod par bya// ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar// rab tu 'bad pas sten par bya/
304a4(rgyud 'bum): ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun sogs// sa la spyod pa sdug bsngal byed// rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni// phyag rgya rnam pa lngar ni gsungs// bram ze skye gnyis rigs skyes ma// de bzhin gshe//
304a5(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du gsungs// rgyal rigs ma ni rgyal po'i rus// rma bya zla sogs rigs las skyes// rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes byar grags// rje'u mo ba glang skyong ba ste// las kyi rigs las skyes par
304a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / dmangs mo yang ni zan mo ste// rnam par snang mdzad chen por gsungs// gar ma pad+ma'i rigs nyid de// chos ma de bzhin las kyi rigs// g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad//
304a7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen gdol pa mor shes bya// phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges// 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing
304b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid/ / 'dis ni shes rab rig pas ni// de bzhin gshegs par mngon par brjod// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs// rigs ni brgya dang mtha' yas dang // sku
304b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs kyi dasnre yis/ / phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang // phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje rin chen pad nor bu// 'dzin pa'i rim pa'i rigs rnam
304b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sgom pa po med bsgom bya med// sngags med lha yang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// sngags dang lhar ni yang dag gnas// rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang // rin chen
304b4(rgyud 'bum): dpag med sems dpa' 'o/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang // thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya// zhi ba
304b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dge ba ste/ / thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de// dga' ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung ba'i phyir// lha zhes mngon par
304b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / 'dri la b+ha ga mnga' ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya// b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon mongs la sogs pa/
304b7(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa'i phyir ni bcom ldan 'das// gang phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir// shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya// gang phyir bskal ba ston pa'i phyir// shes rab de nyid sring mo nyid// shes rab
305a1(rgyud 'bum): chos mar brjod pa ni/ / sems can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyir// btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod// yon tan 'jo bar gsungs pa'i phyir// shes rab bu mor brjod par bya// snyi
305a2(rgyud 'bum): rje chen pos g.yo ba'i phyir/ / shes rab gar mar brjod par bya// gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya// A li kA li rab smras pas// bzlas pa smra bar yang dag
305a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor yin// nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin// sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni
305a4(rgyud 'bum): gang sems de ni bsam gtan ni/ / pha las bde ba gang thob pa// de yi bde ba rang gis brdal// bde ba gang gis 'ching ba 'dir// de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod// brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems
305a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa'i de kho na'i rab tu byed pa ste dang po'o/ / / de nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bshad par bya'o// nang gi lus dang / phyi'i
305a6(rgyud 'bum): lus dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la
305a7(rgyud 'bum): dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ / nang gi tshor ba dang // phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs
305b1(rgyud 'bum): pabs yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ / nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / phyi nang gnyis kyi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas
305b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang
305b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa de
305b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o/ / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'jug go//
305b5(rgyud 'bum): smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'jug go/ smon lam yang
305b6(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'debs so/ / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'jog go// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/
305b7(rgyud 'bum): de ltar dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ thabs tshad med pa bsgoms pas yongs su gang ba'i phyir/ yongs su gang bar gyur pas bsgom pa dam pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/
306a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rlom mo// sems rab tu 'jog go// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// 'di rnams ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o// 'dun pa'i ting nge/
306a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag byed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par
306a3(rgyud 'bum): byang bar gyur pas bdag gi 'dun pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed
306a4(rgyud 'bum): pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi brtson 'grus nub par gyur cing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma
306a5(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'o/ / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa
306a6(rgyud 'bum): nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi dpyod pa nub par 'gyur zhing / shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o// sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom
306a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bas nges par 'byung bas bdag gi sems nub par 'gyur
306b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ / 'di rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ 'dod par spyod pa dang bcas pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad par byed de/ rang gi las kyi rnam par
306b2(rgyud 'bum): smin pa la so sor yid ches par gyur pa gang zhig de ltar las byed par 'gyur ba dge ba 'am/ sdig pa de dang de'i las kyi rnam par smin par so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni 'tsho ba'i rgyur yang sdi
306b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o/ / 'di ni dad pa'i dbang por gsungs so// gang zhig chos rnams la dad pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par
306b4(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang por gsungs so// gang zhig chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes pa de'i chos rnams ni dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed do// 'di ni dran pa'i dbang
306b5(rgyud 'bum): por gsungs so/ / gang zhig chos rnams la dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa'o// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por gsungs so/
306b6(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig chos rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de'i chos rnams ni shes rab kyi dbang pos so sor rig pa ste/ de ni chos de dang de rnams la so sor rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di mi shes rab
306b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang por gsungs so/ / dbang po lnga po 'di rnams 'phel ba ni stobs lngar 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stong /
307a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams ni stobs lnga'o// de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
307a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lags
307a3(rgyud 'bum): btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
307a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bral ba dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sogs pa bsgom pa'o// de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba ni/ gang zhig 'jig rten la
307a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa ste/ bdag tu lta ba kun nas bslang ba gang yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / 'tsho ba med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes med pa/
307a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / shed bu med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa'i lta ba kun nas bslang ba chad pa ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta bas kun nas bslang ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa dang bral ba'i lta bas kun
307a7(rgyud 'bum): nas bslang ba dang / rigs su lung bstan pa'i lta ba kun nas bslang ba dang / ji srid 'khor ba ma yin zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin pa'i lta ba kun nas bslang ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta bar gsungs so// /
307b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pas kun nas spong ba de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog par mi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i
307b2(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa gang zhig/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos kun nas slong ba de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni yang da// /
307b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog par gsungs so// gang zhig tshig gis bdag la mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya bar gsungs pa dang / bdag la mi bya zhing gzhan dag la nyon mongs par mi
307b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / bdag la mi bya zhing gzhan dag la'ang dpya bar mi bya ste/ de mnyam par bzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshig gis yang dag pa'i 'phags par 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di ni yang
307b5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i ngag ces gsungs so/ / gang zhig las nag po dang / nag po'i nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dkar po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du
307b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa dang / nag po zad par bya ba'i phyir
307b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par spyod cing / de'i de las mngon par 'du byed de/ dam pa'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mthar gsungs so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta bur
308a1(rgyud 'bum): dul ba dang / yon tan yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing dul ba dang / kha gsag med pa dang / mang du smra ba dang / gtam la mi dga' ba dang / rang gi spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'jig rten pha rol
308a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bka'i gnang bas 'tsho ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsungs so// rtsol ba ni gang zhig badz+ra/
308a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'phags pas ma gnang ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa sten par mi 'dod pa ni rtsol ba ste/ rtsol ba gang zhig yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par 'jug cing mya
308a4(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'das par 'gro ba dang / so so'i gnas su skyed par byed pa de ni rtsol ba yang dag par rjes su 'brang ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsungs so// gang la nye bar gnas pa de ni rab tu mi g.yo ba dang / lus
308a5(rgyud 'bum): drang pos 'khyog po ma yin pa 'khor ba'i skyon sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas 'dod pa'i dran pa ni ma brjed pa ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i lam
308a6(rgyud 'bum): la sbyor ba'o/ / 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran par gsungs so// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas te/ mya ngan la
308a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa mnan pa'o/ / 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs so// de nyid yang dag par bshad pa ni/ dga' ba la sogs sa rnams de// dbang po la sogs rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
308b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / phung po la sogs byang bar gyi// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog tu 'bab// byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// gang tshe 'dir ni
308b2(rgyud 'bum): gang 'gyur ba/ / dbang po phung po 'byung ba yi// sangs rgyas de yi de ma thag/ rang lus nyid las sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan ni gang du'ang mi gnas so// lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid// mi shes pa yis/
308b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgribs par brjod// ye shes chen po rang lus gnas// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// dngos po kun la khyab pa po// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ lus la rtsa du
308b4(rgyud 'bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas// brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lhag/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyis// rtsa rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog/ gsungs pa 'di
308b5(rgyud 'bum): lta ste/ mi phyed ma zhes brjed pa dang / phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / thung ngu ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang
308b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma dang / brkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun dar ma dang / 'bab pa ma dang / rangs ma dang / gzug can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sbu gu ma dang
308b7(rgyud 'bum): grub ma dang / 'tshed ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzangs ma dang / gsum skor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud 'dral ma'o// bcom ldan 'das rtse 'di dag ji lta bu lags/
309a1(rgyud 'bum): srid pa gsum yongs su gyur pa ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
309a2(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthar thug pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'grel pa byang chub kyi sems
309a3(rgyud 'bum): la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste/ rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol
309a4(rgyud 'bum): to/ / gsang ba'i ye shes bla med pa// snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas rgyud thams cad kyi snying
309a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i ye shes mar me rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa nas// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
309a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// brtan pa brtag pa mchog tu yang // yid srub so sor skyes pa nyid// rtag tu
309a7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gnan dka' ba/ / sna tshogs las kyi rnal 'byor gyis// sna tshogs cho ga 'dod pa yi// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs rnams// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar brjod// sangs rgyas kun sog
309b1(rgyud 'bum): brtan dang g.yo/ / thams cad dngos po sring ba 'di// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 'dis ni sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog
309b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sogs pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ / dngos grub sems can kun don mchog/ rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur bas// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma grub// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma nes ma
309b3(rgyud 'bum): glo'i skad/ / DoM bai ha la sa 'gro bar// skad dbyings 'dir ni rnam par brtag/ nam mkha' kun tu spyod grub po// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// kun las sna tshogs phyag rgya ste// kun las sna tshogs sdom pa yi/
309b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// 'di rnams kyi ni rigs rnams yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyi gnon pa rdul dang bral ba'i gnas zhes bya
309b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di bka' stsal pa/ stong min stong pa min pa'ang min// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs ni snying rje
309b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid de/ / de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// dngos po med cing bsgom pa'ang med// rnam rtog med par lhag mos la'ang // brgya
309b7(rgyud 'bum): pa kun gyis brtag par bya/ / rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// sems can don ni yongs su brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag chos// chos can med cing chos nyid med// sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid
310a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di ni chos dag byung / / de nas theg pa chen po las byung ba'i bsgoms pas yon tan rgyas pa rnams kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po
310a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/ / rnal 'byor gyi bdag po sems can grol bar mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo// sems can bdag nyid skyes pa gcig par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i rgya
310a3(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'i gti mug gcod par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ / de kho na thams cad kyi ye shes gcig tu ston par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/ bdag rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// yang mchod pa byas
310a4(rgyud 'bum): nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / chos rnams thams cad gcig pa'i sku// snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid//
310a5(rgyud 'bum): de dang de yi rang bzhin las// mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis// rtag par shin tu mnyam bzhag nyid// gang phyir thams cad bdag nyid kyi// rnam shes phung por gnas pa ni// skyes pa tha ma
310a6(rgyud 'bum): sems rmongs pa/ / la las so sor rtogs mi nus// sems dang sems byung sems kyi tshul// ye shes shes bya rang bzhin can// 'bras bu rnams la byed pa nyid// chos rnams chos can bsgom pa'i
310a7(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir chos ni du mas mi/ / chu bo'i rgyun ni rgya mtsho ltar// thar pa nyid ni gcig pu nyid// mang po dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar mang du rnam gnas pa// bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur/
310b1(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa ste/ rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / de nas rgyung rngams thams cad du// gtan la phab par bshad bya// sems can kun la mnyam pa'i phyir// gru gsum rgya
310b2(rgyud 'bum): chen gzugs can nyid/ / tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas// de rnams kyi ni gnas su 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs can ma// de nyid yul las rnam par 'das
310b3(rgyud 'bum): srog chags kun gyi snying la gnas/ / de phyir de rgyas ci nig b+ha// mdor bsdus pas ni sangs rgyas cing // bsal pa bye ba grangs med pas// ji srid sangs rgyas gang thob pa// gang gis dam pa'i bde bas
310b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod/ / skye ba 'dir ni thob par 'gyur// yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// yang na 'khor los sgyur ba 'am// 'dris ni dngos grub chen po brgyud// gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa thob// gti mug chags pa
310b5(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal dang / / phrag dog dang ni nyon mongs lngas// sems can so sor bcings pa gang // rang gi yan lag nyid kyis 'joms// 'dis ni 'gro drug sems can bcings// 'khor bar 'khor zhing skye ba nyid//
310b6(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pas ni rmongs gyur pas// sdig pa du ma byed par 'gyur// de phyir 'di bcom cad mkhyen nyid// sangs rgyas kyis sbrul rigs pas ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi// sbyor bral sdug bsnga
310b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas ni/ / thabs dang shes rab sprul pa'i rgyus// nyon mongs rnams ni yid ches 'gyur// mtshon pa 'di ni 'bras bur gyur// khams gsum du ni dri med snang // gang dang gang gis gnas gyur te// /
311a1(rgyud 'bum): de ni de yi ngo bo can// bud shing sreg pa'i rigs pas ni// dgyes pa'i rgyal ba gar mkhan mchog/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// 'di nyid rnam dag mtshon pa 'di// ji lta
311a2(rgyud 'bum): dgra bo nus pa la/ / dgra bo nus pas de bsnun pa// gti mug dag pas gti mug ste// zhe sdang dag pas zhe sdang nyid// 'dod chags dag pas 'dod chags te// nga rgyal dag pas nga rgyal che//
311a3(rgyud 'bum): phrag dog dag pas phrag dog nyid// thams cad rnam dag rdor 'dzin mgon// de yi ngo bo rnam dag pa// nyon mongs lnga ni mnyam par 'gyur// de ltar rigs ni lnga rnams dang // ye shes lnga dang sangs
311a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas lnga/ / 'di las rdo rje snying po dang // khro bo khams gsum sems can skye// nang gi dbye ba 'di nyid ni// bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur// bla ma dman pa'i sems can rnams// sngags
311a5(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur/ / gang zhig shin tu gsal bas ni// 'dzam gling der 'dar sangs rgyas bsngags// gru gsum pa dag e yi dbyibs// dbus su dgyes pa'i e baM yin// grug su
311a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/ / rdo rje ra li rnam par byung // btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes kyang bya// chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes byar bshad// de yi nang song pad+ma ni// bdab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas// de la
311a7(rgyud 'bum): A li kA li 'dres/ / sde mtshan brgyad ni rnam par gnas// sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can gyi// las kyi tshogs ni byed par 'gyur// yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu nyid// rig byed rnams la nges par gnas
311b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams nyid dang rgyud rnams dang / / phyi rol tshul gyi bstan bcos kyi// rdo rje snying po rang bzhin 'di// gzhan du 'di las cung zad med// a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha/ sde tshan dga' ba lnga bcu yang // mnyam pa dag
311b2(rgyud 'bum): tu sprul pa rnams/ / rdo rje ra li pad+mar son// 'dab brgyad so sor phyogs dang ni// mtshams rnams su ni 'di rnams rig/ de rnams dbus su ze 'brul// dam pa'i dbang phyug ma yod de// sde tshan brgyad pa
311b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis ni/ / yi ge dam pa yongs su bskor// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen sde tshan gtso bo ni// lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni// de nyid las ni yang dag byung // gang zhig ral gri dang /
311b4(rgyud 'bum): mig sman dang / rkang byug dang / ri lu dang / rkang 'og dang / gnod sbyin mo'i yan lag dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su rgyu ba dngul chu'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba gang zhig thams cad du mthu che ba rang gi
311b5(rgyud 'bum): khyim du lnga bcu 'dod pa dang ldan pas 'grub bo/ / de ni sde tshan brgyad nang son// dbyangs mchog sde tshan bdag nyid 'byin// skye bo rnams kyi tshig rgyas pa// gang zhig cung zad rtogs bya ba// de kun sngags
311b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs kyis ni/ / de phyir rab tu skye bar 'gyur// lus can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sgra ni sngags zhes brjod par bya// sna tshogs 'dud pa'i gnas chen las// chos kyi ra li rnam par 'byung
311b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rdzu 'phrul rnam gnas pa'i/ / sngags dang nges pa gang yang med// rang bzhin gyis ni ma skyes pa'i// sngags kyi yig 'bru dbang phyug mchog/ yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni// de nas mchog tu/
312a1(rgyud 'bum): rab bshad bya// e ni sa ru shes par bya// las kyi phyag rgya spyan ma nyid// snying rje chen mo thabs chen mo// rang bzhin sna tshogs spyod yul ma// lte bar sna tshogs 'dam skyes la/
312a2(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i 'khor lor rnam par gnas// waM ni chu ru shes par bya// chos kyi phyag rgya mA mo kI// byams pa dang ni smon lam tshul// lha mo rdo rje'i rigs gtsem// snying khar chu skyes 'dab brgyad la// chos kyi 'khor lo
312a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gnas/ / ma ni me ru brjod pa ste// phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo// dga' dang stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// lha mo pad+ma'i rigs byung ma// lkog mar chu skyes 'dab brgyad gnyis// longs spyod 'khor
312a4(rgyud 'bum): lor yang dag gnas/ / yA ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms byed// dam tshig phyag rgya chen mor nges// lha mo las kyi rigs gcom// btang snyoms ye shes rnal 'byor gyis//
312a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol ba mo// 'dam skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis// bde chen 'khor lo chen por gnas// es ni shes rab brjod par bya// waM ni thabs dang ldan pa nyid// baM gyis rnam par brgyan ma nyid
312a6(rgyud 'bum): e ni nges par mdzes par gyur/ / thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// steng dang 'og tu snyoms par 'jug/ e nyid dang ni waM nyid dag/ gnyis gnyis su ni brjod pa nyid// 'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig
312a7(rgyud 'bum): gi phrang ni de skad ces gsungs nas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud kyi tshogs la bsnyegs so zhes brjod do/ / bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni de skad du 'dod chags chen po 'di la rtag tu gnas pa'o/
312b1(rgyud 'bum): sh+tsa zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par gsungs so// ta zhes bya ba ni gang yang bde ba chen po'i mgon po'o// bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis thos pa'i phyir rna ba'i ye shes kyis thos pa yin gyi/
312b2(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa ni ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das rtogs pa'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdud par byed pa dang 'chad pa po dag dbyer med par 'gyur ro// yang na rtogs pa nyid ni
312b3(rgyud 'bum): gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas nas 'chad pa po nyid sdud par byed pa yin te/ 'chang pa po nga chos kyang nga // rang gi tshigs ldan nyan pa nga // de dag ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// gang du bde ba chen
312b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i mgon po gar mdzad pa'i tshe gcig nyid gcig dang du ma'i ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rol par mdzad pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang cung zad gsungs pa de bdag gis gcig na zhes
312b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni dus gcig nyid la'o/ / gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig la'o// thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par son pa ste/ 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa la lhag par mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed do zhes
312b6(rgyud 'bum): bya bar bsnyegs so/ / dus zhes bya ba ni dus chod ces bya bar gsungs so// dus ni rnam pasum du brjod// bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal dus// bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid do// 'o ma'i rgyun ltar
312b7(rgyud 'bum): sna bug tu/ / 'ong ba bde ba'i dus su gsungs// me yi gzugs kyis 'gro ba nyid// sdug bsngal dus dang de gcig grags// gcig ni lhan cig med pa yini// dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur
313a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ / dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// de la 'dod chags nus tshad nyid// 'dod chags bral ba 'gog par gsungs// 'di bral dbu mar mi
313a2(rgyud 'bum): rtog pas/ / 'di gsum dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod chags nyid dang chag thal nyid/ 'dres par gyur pa rnyog pa med// de bzhin 'dod chags chags bral las// ro mnyam gcig pu'i skad cig ma
313a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po kun gyi ro mnyam pa/ / bsgom pa'i dus ni gcig tu gsungs// 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug dang / gzugs dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste/
313a4(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga drug ces gsungs so// de 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so// yang na gang zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos de rnams bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so// de bzhin gshegs
313a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams dang / de rnams nyid kyi snying po dang / de nyid kyi rdo rje dang / de nyid kyi btsun mo dang / de'i b+ha ga de la bzhugs so// kye bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
313a6(rgyud 'bum): so zhes bya bas ci gsungs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro gcig pa thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo yid 'phrog pa dang ldan pa
313a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i don to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i rab bzhin gang gis chos kyi 'byung gnas la/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag
313b1(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ shes rab gang gis nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa de'i phyir shes rab b+ha gar gsungs te/ b+ha kA der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad darang sun mo ldan cis
313b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhugs so/ / e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun mkhyen ye shes bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde don gang // btsun mo nye bar mdzad pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i
313b3(rgyud 'bum): yig 'bru ni chos kyi thog mar rtag tu yang dag par gnas pa ste/ dag pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub skyed par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rjes ma bshad pa de rjes khyod la bshad do//
313b4(rgyud 'bum): yig 'bru 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las pha rol tu shin tu ring bar 'gro ba mngon du mtshon par mdzad pa dang / mngon du ma mdzad pa de nub pa'i sems kyis skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas nyid dam/
313b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur te/ gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ma thob pa da ni bde bar gshegs pa ste sangs rgyas yin no// mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed pa ni sems dpa' yang dag par
313b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ sdang bas bstan pa tsam gyis mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur bas na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis ro spang bar bya'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi srid pa'i 'jig pa la
313b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i sgrub pa po dpal dang ldan pas dag pa'i yem sgom par byed na/ thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba 'dis ji ltar yang dag pa thob pa dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mtshan gzhi thabs
314a1(rgyud 'bum): dang shes rab kyi nus pas nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing gnas gsum du snang ba ste/ de'i mtshan gzhi ni mtshon par dka' ba dang / thams cad du son zhing rgyu dang rkyen spangs pas yid bzhin gyi nor
314a2(rgyud 'bum): lta bur 'jig rten gyi rang dang gzhan gyi don byed de/ dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog go/ rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste dang po rdzogs so
314a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// sgrub pa po la phan don du// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// cho ga yang ni bshad par bya// dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pa/
314a4(rgyud 'bum): ni nor 'dzin sbyangs// 'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang yang // khang stong dang ni khyim nang du// dkyil
314a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bor dam pa bzhengs par bya/ / rdul tshon dam pa nyid dang ni// yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te// rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid phyes// yang na 'bras la sogs pas bri// dkyil 'khor khru gsum bya ba dang /
314a6(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gsum yang lhag par bya// der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i// rig ma bzang po bzhug par bya// sngags kyi lam gyi rjes btsal bas// gang tshe mkhas pas dbang bskur ba/ sangs rgyas kun
314a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi mngon gsum du/ / dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs gnas su// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas bdag/ blo dang ldan pas de bzhin zang // rang byin brlab pa'i gnas thob pas// dam tshis
314b1(rgyud 'bum): nyams pas 'jigs pa yis/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam las// sngags kyi lam ni de bzhin gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// dam tshig rim pa shin tu ring // de phyir
314b2(rgyud 'bum): don kun la 'bad pas/ / dbang don rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes// rdo rje slo dpon yon tan mtsho// ji bzhin sbyor bas gsol ba gdab// yang na ma dang sring thu mo// bu mo sring mo'i bu mo nyid// 'di rang
314b3(rgyud 'bum): gang de ji ltar bar/ / rnyed nas bsgrub pa nyid du gyis// yang na mngon du 'di med na// kun mkhyen gyis bsngags rig ma ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyad mdzad pa// de ni de phyir gzung bar bya// skye ba
314b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi bu mo dang / / yang na btso blag ma dang // yang na gdol pa mau dang / g.yung mo dang / rigs las skyes ma dang / yang na rgyal mo dang / gar mkhan gyi bu mo dang / bzo mo dang / yang na ri dgas
314b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi mig ma dang / rked pa phra ba dang / ro smad rgya sA pa dang / nu ma mtho ba dang / b+ha ga bzung ba dang / dam tshi spyod pa la shin tu dam pa dang / de kho na la gnas pa dang / sngags dang rgyud shes pa ste/
314b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po'i dbang po la gnas gsum du che ba'i bu mo 'di dag bshad do// rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis 'di rnams kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ma rnyed ji ltar gang rnyed de// de bzhin ba
314b7(rgyud 'bum): drug lon pa nyid/ / dang po'i lang tsho phun sum tshogs// mig mdzes phyag rgya rnyed nas ni// rig ma de nyid blang nas ni// skyabs su 'gro ba'i rim pas ni// sbyangs nas de nyid gsang ba dang //
315a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang rgyud kyi rim kun bsgrags// sgra 'am 'og gi lam du lces// de nyid de bzhin steng du gtsug/ kun gyi cha rig sna tshogs byed// rim pa nyid kyis rna cha dang // ska rags cha
315a2(rgyud 'bum): dang se mo do/ / lag gdub dang ni rkang gdub ldan// de ltar dngos grub dam pa ster// gang zhig sbyangs pa'i rig ma kun// nye bar 'tshe ba med gnas su// rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor mang po// de nas tsan dan
315a3(rgyud 'bum): gos 'phreng sogs/ / rnam par brgyan nas dbul bar bya// dri dang 'phreng sogs rim gro yis// 'o ma'i mchog sogs rgyas pas ni// phyag rgya thabs gcig sgrub pa pos// gus par 'bad
315a4(rgyud 'bum): pas yang dag mchod/ / slob mas pus mo'i lha nga ni// sal dud pas btsugs nas ni// thal mo sbyar nas bstod pa 'dis// ston pa la ma~M'u bar bya// stong pa'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod/
315a5(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs// ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa can// dag pa'i de nyid don ston mdzad// bdag
315a6(rgyud 'bum): med chos las byung ba yi/ / rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems// pha rol phyin pa'i yon tan rnams// mgon po las ni tagaH byung // byang chub sems
315a7(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen dang // de bzhin bstan dang 'gro ba dang // khams gsum po ni 'di dag kun// 'gro ba'i dpa' bo phyag 'tshal bstod// yid
315b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu ltar gyur pa'i/ / 'gro ba'i 'dod pa'i don grub phyir// dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad// sangs rgyas sras po phyag 'tshal bstod// de nyid bla med bdag 'tshal pa
315b2(rgyud 'bum): yon tan mtsho khyod bka' drin las/ / kun mkhyen rdo rje dbang gis ni// da lta nyid du bka' drin skyobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// ji ltar dpal thugs rdo rje yis// rdo rje chos can
315b3(rgyud 'bum): la gsungs pa/ / de bzhin mgon pos bdag grub mdzod// bcom ldan zhabs pad spangs nas ni// gzhan du bdag la 'gro ma mchis// 'khor ba'i 'gro las nges rgyal bar// de phyir mgon/
315b4(rgyud 'bum): pos thugs rje mdzod// de nas rdo rje slo dpon dpal// rjes su brtse bcas phan sems kyis// slob la snying rje bskyed nas ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang // 'dod yon lnga yis gang
315b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / bla res bres pas nye bar 'bar// rnal 'byor ma dang sbyor ldan zhing // dril bu sil sil sgra dang ni// me tog bdug 'khyil nyams dga' ba// lha yi dri 'phreng bde ba'i mchog/ dpal ldan rdo
315b6(rgyud 'bum): rje sems sogs lha'i/ / dkyil 'khor mchog tu ngo mtshar bar// slob dpon skal ba bzang po mchog/ de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas// rgyal ba'i bdag skyes byang chub sems// pad+ma'i snod du
315b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / rdza yab g.yob cing gdugs dang ni// bkra shis tshigs bcad gru rnams kyis// phyag rgya ldan pas slob ma do// 'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya// slo dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis//
316a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang ni rin chen mchog byin nas// bzang po'i rang bzhin legs sbyangs pa'i// dam tshig yid 'ong nges par sbyin// khrag chen dang ni ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dang
316a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bdag po'i chu ldan zhing / / lnga pa sems las yang dag byung // 'di rnams dam tshig yang dag par// sangs rgyas rnams kyis nye bar gsungs// bzang po rtag tu bskyang bar gyis//
316a3(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa yang ni da lta nyon// srog chags gsang pAr mi bya zhing // bu me da rin chen yong mi spang // des ni slob dpon spang mi bya// sdom pa shin tu dpyad par dka'// gong du gsungs pa'i rig ma 'am/
316a4(rgyud 'bum): yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma// dag cing sprul pa'i rig ma ni// si h+la ga pur bsgos pa ni// ji srid khu ba ldan 'gyur// de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi
316a5(rgyud 'bum): gdong yang de bzhin te/ / bstan pas yang dag gang byung ba// slob ma'i kha ru btung bar bya// ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid// de nyid la ni bya bar bya// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// rang gzhan
316a6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag rig pa spangs/ / mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'dres// 'dod chags 'dod chags bral bas 'dres// de nyid
316a7(rgyud 'bum): srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid// de nyid 'di ni kun khyab byed// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes can// he ru ka dpal zhes byar brjod// gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang //
316b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos dang dngos med de las byung // dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ste// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges// de bde thabs las thams cad rig/ dang po dga' ba tsam
316b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid de/ / mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'i grangs// gsum pa dga' bral dga' bar bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de yang dbang ni rnam pa bzhi// dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang //
316b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi dbang gis ni// slob ma sdig pa bral ba yin// sangs rgyas grong khyer
316b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog sngon du/ / de nas de la gnang ba sbyin// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// phyogs kun tu ni 'khor lo ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// kun tu mchog tu rab tu bskor// thabs dang shes
316b5(rgyud 'bum): rab rang bzhin bdag/ yid bzhin nor bu lhur mthong bas// sbyor med bral zhing ma zhum pas// sems can don ni de ltar gyis// dbang dang bkas gnang thob nas ni// bya ba byas pas
316b6(rgyud 'bum): rab 'dzum zhing / / 'gro ba dga' bar byed pa yi// shin tu snyan pa'i tshig 'di brjod// deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas// bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas// de ring sangs rgyas rigs
316b7(rgyud 'bum): su skyes/ / de ni sangs rgyas rigs su 'gyur// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'jigs chen por// mnar med skye ba yang dag 'khrugs// nyon mongs 'dam dpag rgal dka' las// bdag ni mgon po
317a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis bsgral/ / khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las// theg pa rdzogs pa lta bur bdag/ bag chags thams cad bral bas nu// bdag la byang chub 'tshal ma
317a2(rgyud 'bum): mchis/ / rangs shing mig ni phye ba yis// zhabs la 'jus nas gus par bya// gang dang gang zhig sdug pa'i rdzas// re ba med pa'i sems kyis ni// de dang de nyid dbul bar bya//
317a3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'ang snying rje ldan pas ni// slob ma bsdu ba'i bsam pa'i phyir// de la phan pa'i bsam pas gzung // de nas phyag 'tshal mchod nas ni// bla ma la ni yon rnams dbul// gser ni sto phrag
317a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya dang ni/ / rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // gos ni zung 'gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta dang yul 'khor cing // rna cha dang ni rkang gdub dang // nor bu dang ni sor gdub mchog/ gser las byas
317a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ / rang gi chung ma bu mo dang // bran pho zan mo sring mo nyid// phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bar bya// bdag gis dngos po thams cad kyis// blo dang ldan pas bla ma dbul// de
317a6(rgyud 'bum): ring tshun chad bdag bran du/ / khyod la bdag ni 'bul lags zhes// de ltar nub byas gyur pas// mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas// nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag la bka' drin
317a7(rgyud 'bum): legs par skyobs/ / ji ltar bla med byang chub de// byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bsgrubs// bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas// kun mchog bskyed pa yang dag mchod// sems can gnas gsu/
317b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba rnams// de nyid la ni gzhag par bgyi// dbang cho ga 'dis sbyin par bya zhing / slob ma'i lhag par mos pa dang / zab pa dang rgya che ba rig pas lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis shes par byas nas
317b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig nyid kyis dbang rin po che sbyin par bya'o/ / gang thob dbang rab mchog ni rigs kyi bdag por bzung bar rnyed par dka' zhing mtshungs pa med par gdams// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing gi dpal dgra
317b3(rgyud 'bum): blang bar byas pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ / bka' yi gnang ba rnyed nas 'jig rten gsum gyi dgra bo las rgyal rtsom pa'i go bgos pa yi blos// byang chub dag la dgod pa'i
317b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'dir ni de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni dri ma med par spyod/ / byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // de nas thabs dang shes rab don// bsgom
317b5(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag rab bshad bya/ / pha rol don brtson brtson 'grus kyi// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jig pa las// bsgral dka' gang zhig rnam bsgom pas// rnal 'byor pas
317b6(rgyud 'bum): ni rang don du/ / mya ngan 'das par gnas mi 'gyur// gang gis khyed 'phags mthar thug par// sangs rgyas dri med ngo mtshar rmad// 'grib dang 'phel las rnam par grol// byang chub bla med thob
317b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / phung po lnga sogs chos rnams dang // theg gsum shin tu spang mi bya// chos dbyings shin tu mnyam pa nyid// chu shing lta bur yongs su gzung // stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste// sdong min//
318a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par mi bya'o// stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas// stong min yongs su mi spong ngo // stong dang stong min bzung ba las// rtog pa nyung min skye bar 'gyur// yongs su spangs na kun
318a2(rgyud 'bum): rtog ste/ / de phyir de gnyis yongs su spang // gnyis kyi gzung ba yongs spangs pas// rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste// nga zhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di// de phyir 'di ni yang dag spangs// rnam pa med
318a3(rgyud 'bum): cing dogs med pa/ / 'dod pa med cing sdig pa bral// thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol// nam mkha' lta bur mkhas pas bsgom// snying rje ldan pas sems can la// rgyab kyi sa phyogs par mi bya
318a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / sems can yod dang yod min zhes// de ltar yongs su brtag mi bya// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// shes rab ces ni rab tu grags// yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i// thams cad
318a5(rgyud 'bum): don byed snying rje nyid/ / dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang // dmigs med snying rje chen po nyid// blo dang lhan cig gcig 'gyur ba/ nam mkhar nam mkha'i ji lta go gang la sgom pa po yang med// gang
318a6(rgyud 'bum): yang rnam par sgom pa'ang med/ / bsgom bya nyid kyang yong min pa// de yi de nyid bsgom par brjod// gang yang bya ba yod min 'dir// bza' bya nyid kyang yod ma yin// byed po bza' las rnam par grol
318a7(rgyud 'bum): don dam rnam par bsgom pas ni/ / 'di la sgrub po gang yang med// gang yang stong par byed pa med// dor ba cung zad med par brjod// blang ba'ang cung zad yong ma yin// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang //
318b1(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // 'phrog pa zla ba'i grong khyer mtshungs// rmi lam rtse ba lta bur blta// sgyu ma ji bzhin thams cad du// blta ba nyid dang reg par bya// 'gro ba thams cad gnas pa ni// gang
318b2(rgyud 'bum): yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ / sbyor ba'i 'dus par bsam mi khyab/ rmi lam sad pa lta bu ni// ji ltar gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis ni// dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa yis// b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni//
318b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom// ye shes ci zhig skye zhe na// thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes de// gzhan du smra bar mi nus so// gzugs rnams thams cad blta ba da /
318b4(rgyud 'bum): sgra rnams nyid kyang nyan pa dang // smra ba dang ni rgod pa dang // sna tshogs rero ni za ba dang // las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro bas// de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// rnal
318b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ / 'di ni gnyis su med par brjod// 'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid// rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid// 'di ni shes rab pha rol
318b6(rgyud 'bum): phyin/ / pha rol phyin pa kun gyi dngos// mnyam nyid bsam bya nyid du gsungs// sangs rgyas kun mchog bsgom bya nyid// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang
318b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs/ / de nyid las ni thams cad skyes// dngos dang dngos med sbyor bral ba// rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom// dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba// bsgoms na myur du
319a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / ma lus skyon la sdang ba dang // kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nges// dpal ldan pa de gshegs yon tan rnams// mtha' yas de las skye bar 'gyur// kun rtog/
319a2(rgyud 'bum): mang po'i mun pas khyab gyur pa'i// rab tu 'joms pas spro zhing glog 'gyu ba// chags sogs dgag dka'i dri mas gos gyur pa'i// sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs// rang bzhin bod gsal
319a3(rgyud 'bum): rtog las rnam par grol/ / 'dod chags la sogs dri mas gos bral ba'i// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin med sems dpa' mchog/ de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs// sdug bsngal phung po du ma'i mtshan gyur
319a4(rgyud 'bum): pab/ / 'di las gzhan du cung zad yod ma yin// bde ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa// de las gzhan du grol ba'ang yod ma yin// sdug bsngal ma lus zad par 'dod pa dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde
319a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog thob 'dod pas/ / sems ni brtan par byas nas 'bad pas dpyad// de yi rang bzhin dngos po med par byed// ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa'i yul stug po// skye dgu'i yid bsgribs sdug bsngal mtha' ya
319a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ji srid de nas de ni bral yin pas// de srid bde ba rgya chen tha dad min// mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug 'phags dgyes pa'i// de yi zang phyir rang gi bya ba yang // rgyas pa de yi yan lag 'gro ba
319a7(rgyud 'bum): blta/ / de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyi nges pa byas nas bka'i gnang ba dang // rang gi dam tshig la gnas pas sgom par byed na/ lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / sku gzugs kyi
319b1(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal sgom pa dang / dam tshig gis thun mong gi dngos grub skyed par byed pa yin no zhes bya bas ci zhig bya// sangs rgyas nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshon pa mngon du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor yin te bskyed pa dang /
319b2(rgyud 'bum): de mtshon pa na gnas gsum po nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ro// gzhung thams cad spangs nas thob pa'i gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor de la brtson pas rang rig pa tsam la spro bas nyin dang mtshan du goms
319b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ri'i rtse mo dang / zhi ba'i gnas dang / pad+ma'i tshal dang / rgyal po'i tshal dang / dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang / rang gi khyim mam/ sems la mngon par 'dod pa thams
319b4(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pas bsngags pa 'di'i nang du gang dang gang gi gnas der gnas shing sngags shes pas spro ba dang ldan pas de sgom par byed de/ thabs dang shes rab ma gtogs par sangs rgyas nyid mngon du
319b5(rgyud 'bum): thob par mi 'gyur ro/ / de'i phyir shes rab ma dngos su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa bzang mo spang bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya re re dang ldan pa 'di ma gtogs par dngos grub ster bar
319b6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / de phyir ye shes bskyed pa yi// phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyar bar bya// gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste// zhe sdang phyag rgya chen por brjod// phra dog las kyi phyag rgya ste// 'dod chags chos
319b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya bdag/ yo gis phyag rgya sna tshogs 'di// bskyed nas rig ma bza' bar bya// de la gnyis ka'ang lha'i gzugs su mngon du bsams nas gti mug las zhi ba dang / khro bo las ma rungs/
320a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang // 'dod chags las chags pas las rnams byed pa'o// de'i don du rab tu byed pa lnga po 'di rnams kyis rgyal ba rnams yin no// snga dro dang / nyi ma'i mtha' dang / nyi ma
320a2(rgyud 'bum): phyed dang / nam phyed kyi dus su'ang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o// mnyam par sbyor ba las gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pa dang / skye bo gdug pa'i nang du gnas
320a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems 'ba' zhig de bsams pas sems la lhog par mos pa mngon du bya'o/ / gang zhig yang rnal 'byor pa brtson pa grus kyi 'bad pas rnal 'byor 'di bsgrub par bya'o//
320a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab mngon du ma rnyed na byol song dag la'ang rtag tu goms par bya'o// de ltar gang zhig rnal 'byor pas gal te pad+ma 'dzin pa la mngon du nyi ma re re'am/ zla ba so so 'am/ lo la reg par mi byed
320a5(rgyud 'bum): nadam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig nyams pas rnal 'byor pa bag med par skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig blang bar byas nas yang mi byed par sdom par gzung bar bya ste/ de'i
320a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir kun gyis sdom pa dang ldan zhing de kho na la gnas pas phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ / gsang ba'i nye ba'i rdzas dang / sngags dang / rgyud nyid kyis 'di skad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag
320a7(rgyud 'bum): par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rtag tu nye bar 'dug ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gnas gsum po rtse gcig pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o// thabs dang shes rab kyi don sgom pa zhes bya ba gnyis
320b1(rgyud 'bum): pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi// rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag bshad// dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i// thams cad las ni sna tshogs
320b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid 'di la sgrub// rnam par bral dang gnas su yang // rang gi tshal sogs rnams su yang // kun las sna tshogs phyag rgya ste// kun las sna
320b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs sdom pas ni/ / kun las sna tshogs bya ba rnams// ji ltar bde bar bsgrub par bya// bde gshegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid// khro bo'i sgrub thabs thams cad dang //
320b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba rnams kyi lha rnams la// ci zhig nga yis bshad par bya// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas gar// sgom pa lha'i rnal 'byor dang // sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga rim dang // bris sku 'am ni sku gzug
320b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / sems kyis thams cad sprul pa ste// sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir// nga yis rgyud du bsgrags pa yin// stong nyid gcig las rdo rje can// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs// rdo rje snying bri
320b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ bskyed pa'i yig 'bru gzugs dang ni// phyag rgya dbyibs kyi cho ga rim dang // sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga yang // gang gis sgrub pos 'grub 'gyur ba// gtso bo shin tu dga' chen pos/
320b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' drin gyis ni bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis par snying rje rnam par bsgom// gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang // kun gyi tha
321a1(rgyud 'bum): mar btang snyoms so/ / yang ni stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu// gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// re phas nyi ma sngon
321a2(rgyud 'bum): durnam bsgoms nas/ / nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje skye// rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang // gur yang cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya// dang por ro ni bsgom par bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de skang
321a3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/ / he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom// rang gi snying kha ra re pha bsgom// de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor// der na hUM gi dbyibs nyid ni// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// kha
321a4(rgyud 'bum): dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ / hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje nyid// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par// yang ni hUM gi de nyid bsgom// de nyid yongs su gyur bltas nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom
321a5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje skye ba dpa' bo che/ / 'dam spyi sngon po 'dra ba'am// yang na sngo dang nyi ma ltar// dad pas nges par bsgom par bya// nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni// rdo rje skye ba snying rje na// rgyan rnams thams
321a6(rgyud 'bum): cad badzin pa yi/ / lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya// dkar mo ri dgas mtshan pa 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod// ro langs ma ni chu lag ma// g+hasma ri ni sman 'dzin cing // puk+ka sI ni
321a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lag/ de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung // g.yung mos skul 'khyud pa ste// mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis// 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// de nas gnas la
321b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam grol ba'i/ / chos rnams kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// a li zla ba kA li nyi// sa bon nang du son rig pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// nam man
321b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/ / rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro// bsdus nas snying khar dgug pa na// yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur// nam mkha'i khams kyi nang son par// de nas nyi ma'i
321b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bsam/ / hUM skyes sngo dang nyi ma ltar// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ser// sdang mig brgyad gnyis
321b4(rgyud 'bum): lo yi dbyibs/ / 'jigs byed mnan cing g.yon pa na// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid dang // thod pa yang ni g.yon pa na// g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid// hUM ni 'don par byed pa'i bdag/ lha mo brgyad kyis
321b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor nas ni/ / dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sdom pa kun// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
321b6(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i gzugs ni 'dzin gyur pa/ / phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa ni// dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin no// sdug gsungs dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gnas// hUM gi
321b7(rgyud 'bum): sa bon las byung ba'i/ / g.yon na thod pa lha dang ni// lha min khrag gis bkang ba dang // g.yas na rdo rje me lta bus// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// gzhan pa yi ni phyag
322a1(rgyud 'bum): drag gis/ / lus la yang dag 'khyud pa nyid// shes rang rdo rje phag mo ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bsgom// dang por stong pa bsgom bya zhing // ze 'bru la ni cha
322a2(rgyud 'bum): bral nyid/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hU~M ni der ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug par// lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya// dang po'i zhal ni dkar min zhing
322a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba nyid/ / g.yon pa dmar po lta bu ste// spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can nyid// rgyun rnams kun gyis yang dag gang // thod pa'i gdan la yang dag gnas//
322a4(rgyud 'bum): bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams kyi// thod pa phyag gis bzung ba dang // gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// dang po rdo rje 'bar ba nyid// gsum par de bzhin rtse gsum pa/
322a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan shes rab 'khyud pa dang // ral pa'i cod pan brgyan pa ste// sprin gyi 'od 'bar du ma ni// sangs rgyas dam tshig spro bar bya// b+ha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos// der ni bdag nyid bsgom pa
322a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ lha mo lhan cig ldan par ni// de nas phyag rgya bsgom par bya// thod pa'i stan la gnas par ni// 'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya// sna tshogs gzugs ma yid 'ong ma// zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma
322a7(rgyud 'bum): dang por rim pa bri bar bya/ / gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin ma mdzes// thod pa khu bas gang ba dang // lcags kyu lag pas 'dzin pa mo// gnyis pa rtse gsum lag pa dang // khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang //
322b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid// gsum pa lag par ral gri dang // zod pa chu yi gang ba dang // de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// bzhi pa kha T+wAM ga lag ma// g.yon pa'i lag pas thod pa nyid/ mu suN+ye dang ba dan
322b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / lnga pa zhags pa'i lag pa dang // thod pa lag pas bzung ba dang // de bzhin ut+pal cang te'u nyid// drag pa'i lag pas pad+ma dang // thod pa tshal gyis gang ba dang // de bzhin me long dgra
322b3(rgyud 'bum): sta nyid/ / bdun pa'i 'phang mdung lag pa dang // dung dang 'khor lo'i mtshon cha 'dzin// thod pa khrag gis gang bar ni// khru gang tsam du yang dag bri// brgyad pa bum pa'i lag pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje
322b4(rgyud 'bum): dril bu nyid/ / thod pa skyes pa'i pags pa yis// bkab pa rdzas kyis gang ba ni// ze 'brur bde ba chen po dang // 'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// gsang ba'i
322b5(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu dang // rdo rje zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// sgo yi skyong ba yang dag bri// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom bya zhing // phyis
322b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/ / hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// oM ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba nyid// a ni ngag dang yang dag ldan// shel ni dag pa lta bu nyid// hri ni de la yang dag sbyar// de bzhin du
322b7(rgyud 'bum): yang swA hA nyid/ / sngags kyi bzlas par yang dag gsungs// bsam gtan yi ge gcig pu nyid// lha mo rnams kyi hrIHnyid ni// 'dab ma rnams la de nas dgod// mchod pa bzhi yi rang
323a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis/ / sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sgo yi skyong ba thams cad du// dang po dbyangs yig la sogs ldan// b+ha ga nyid du sgrub pa pos// de nas rdo rje gzhug par bya/
323a2(rgyud 'bum): hriHyi rnam pa nyid dang yang // de la hUM ni brjod par bya// zla mtshan dus su khrag bcas pa'i// khu ba kha yis bza' bar bya// bdag nyid dang ni b+ha ga la// me tog dri yis mchod par bya// gal te
323a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub po sgrub 'dod na/ / de nyid la ni bzlas pa bya// rdo rje drag mo de bzhin gcig/ de bzhin rdo rje gzugs brnyan nyid// gsum pa rdo rje 'dod chags ma// bzhi pa rdo rje zhi ba ma// lnga pa rdo rje gnod sbyin
323a4(rgyud 'bum): madrug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ / bdun pa sgra yi rdo rje ma// de bzhin brgyad pa rdo rje sa// gnyis pa la sra rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / 'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi//
323a5(rgyud 'bum): rim pa ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// bsrung dang de bzhin mngon spyod nyid// re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo yi// phyi rol mu khyud nyid du bya// 'khor lo las kyi kha dog
323a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'di yi so bon thams cad kyi// phyag 'tshal sreg blug tha ma ni// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// bsrung ba'i tshig
323a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang rnam par bya/ / mnyam nyid ye shes stong pas ni// bdag nyid kyi ni gzugs su bya// mnyam nyid thams cad rig pa'i gnas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// bsrung ba ye shes can gyi
323b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / 'jigs pa thams cad ring du byed// sems can dngos po med nA ni// rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i gdun ni bsam par bya//
323b2(rgyud 'bum): / dngos grub thams cad rab ster mar// bdag gi lus ni bsgom par bya// oM tA re swA hA/ mgo bo la'o// oM tu re swA hA/ mig dag la'o// oM tut+tA re swA hA/ mig dag la'o// oM tA re swA hA/ sna dag/
323b3(rgyud 'bum): / la'o// oM tu re swA hA/ rna ba dag la'o// oM re swA hA/ lce la'o// oM tA re nI swA hAM/ snying kar ro// yan lag drug ni rtag tu bzung // 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam par bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa
323b4(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung / / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// kun la skyabs sbyin lag pa dang // g.yon pa ut+pa lta bu mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po sa bskul ba yis// lha rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya
323b5(rgyud 'bum): oM ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA/ las thams cad pa'i sngags so// dgra dang rgyal pos bcings pa dang // 'gro ba'i shin tu 'jigs pa'i dug/ yan lag rims ni sna tshogs dang // dug sogs dus min 'chi ba yi
323b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i gnas ni gang gang lags/ / de dang de la rab sbyar bya// shes rab chung ba blo ldan par// bsrung ba bres nas gzung bar bya// bsrung ba bzang po 'di nyid ni// 'jigs pa thams cad du ni spangs// bsrung ba
323b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni thams cad las/ / rnal 'byor de nyid gong na med// 'bar ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// de yi dbus su hrIHnyid ni// kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'od// de nas bdag nyid
324a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma// mnga' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma// ut+pal dang lcags kyu badzin// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed
324a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/ / khri yis 'jig rten phal ba nyid// bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin// ba bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid//
324a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa 'di// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// mnyam nyid gzugs su bsams nas ni// khams gsum gyi ni rang bzhin las// sngar
324a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ / gong du gsungs pas bsgrub par bya// shes rab 'bar ba'i las rnams ni// 'di yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// oM pra dz+nyA ma hA dra dz+nye hUM swAhA/ dngos po'i rdo zas
324a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / 'od zer 'bar ba du ma yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
324a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / kha dog dkar mo 'od gsal ma// shes rab bdag nyid gzung bar bya// 'di yi sa bon bzlas nas ni// shes rab 'dab ma lta bu 'phel// gu pa bam blo ni dman pa yi// shes rab 'phel ba'i
324a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ro/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge de la dgod par bya// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhi ba'i 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin// thod pa
324b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni zhags pa nyid/ / de bzhin 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrug par// kun tu rnam par spro bar bya// 'dis ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas bsgom par bya// bcom gser gyi mdog lta bu/
324b2(rgyud 'bum): sku mdog ser po gzi brjid che// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo rin chen lcag kyu 'dzin// thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid// 'dir ni rnal 'byor rim
324b3(rgyud 'bum): pas ni/ / pad+ma rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i 'od// dpa' bo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing // thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// pad+ma zhags pa 'dzin
324b4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// don yod phyag na ral gri 'dzin// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//
324b5(rgyud 'bum): thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang // lcags kyu dag ni g.yas pa 'phyar// bai DUR+Ya ltar ljang ku ste// rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam
324b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de yi nang son sa bon ni// bruM las spun gyi dbyibs su ni// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i lag pa mda' dang gzhu// de bzhin
324b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dril bu nyid/ / zhags pa ral gri thod pa nyid// spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang // do shal dang ni rkang gdub brgyan// kha dog dkar mo shin tu mar+tha/
325a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyun nyid// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs gang ba// de yi nang son bsam par bya// hUM las mA ma kI yi dbyibs//
325a2(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// kha dog sngon mo 'bar chen mo// spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid// lcags su dang ni ral
325a3(rgyud 'bum): gri nyid/ / zhags pa rdo rje de bzhin du// dril bu dang ni thod pa'o// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // kha T+wAM ga dang bcu gnyis ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan
325a4(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// der ni hrIHni bsam bya zhing // gos dkar zhes bya rnam par sgom// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// kha dog dmar mo
325a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar chen mo/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs gang ba// phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan// gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa dang // pad+ma'i lag par ral gri dang // thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang /
325a6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa de bzhin rin chen nyid// do shal dang ni rkang gdub sgra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom na// myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// nam mkha
325a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su yongs gang ba'i/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi nang son tAM nyid ni// sgrol ma'i dbyibs su bsam par bya// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// phyag ni brgyad kyis
325b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / ral gri phyag na chags bcas ma// ut+pal de bzhin lcags kyu dang // thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang // zhag pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang // gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// zhal gcig/
325b2(rgyud 'bum): ma ni yang dag bri// kha dog ljang ku spyan gsum ma// rgyar rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// rgyud thams cad kyi
325b3(rgyud 'bum): gleng gzhi'i gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o/ / // he ru ka dang dag med ma'i// bskyed pa'o sgrub dang de bzhin nyon// gang gis
325b4(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa drag po yi/ / sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba yi// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad pa'i// de dag thams cad khyod la bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' gyur nas kyang // rdo rje can nyid rdo rje dbang//
325b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs drag po ni// kun tu rnam par spro bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sa bon 'phreng ba de nas dgod// de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar
325b6(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa khu bar gyur/ / sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las// de nas rig mas bskul bar bya// rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/ puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid
325b7(rgyud 'bum): spongs la/ / bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhid mdzad// khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas// kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod//
326a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci// khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol ba mo bdag zhu ba bgyid// bdag gi khyod kyi thugs
326a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal gyis/ / mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag nyid dran nyams pas// snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ aM dang hUM las rdo rje che// khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas
326a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ zhabs rnams sa la brjeb pa dang / lhad lha min bsdig par mdzad// gaM tsaM baM g+haM paM shaM tse laM DaM/ 'di yis sa bon dbyung bar bya// bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon las// aM hUM sngon po 'bar ba brtsig
326a4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / ma mo'i 'khor lo grangs nyams dgar// gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya// zhal brgyud pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid
326a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po/ / sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul 'jigs su rung // snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// mgo yi 'phreng bas do shal
326a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas// kha dog gnag pa 'jigs pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hUM spro zhing // thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid// bdag med
326a7(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing / / dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i gzhal ni bzhad cing gnag/ g.yas pa'i zhal ni kun dar mtshung
326b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa/ / steng ma'i zhal ni rnam par gtsigs// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis che// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang // mda'
326b2(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin 'khor lo nyid/ / de bzhin gshor dang dbyib pa dang // rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu nyid// g.yon par dril bu pad+mar bcas// gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga phyar zhing // thod pa dang
326b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rin chen nyid/ / sdigs mdzub zhag pa de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer ltar// kun tu rnam par spro bar bya// de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis// de kar mo la sogs de rnams
326b4(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste// gzhu dang mda' ni 'gengs me mchog/ thod pa khrag gis bkang ba dang // de bzhin rdo rje gri gug nyid// chom rkum ma ni kha dog dmar// 'khor
326b5(rgyud 'bum): lo lcags kyu 'dzin mar brjod/ / thod pa dang ni cang te'u nyid// gsal ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya/ mongs byed ma ni sku mdog gnag/ de bzhin thod pa dang ni gshor// sa la rlog pa nyid
326b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / g.yas pa rtse gsum 'phyar ba'o// ro langs ma ni dkar ser mtshungs// phyag dag na ni chung dang chu// ral gri dang ni thod pa nyid// mdzes ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya// puk+ka
326b7(rgyud 'bum): si ni kha dog ser/ / dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang // sha yis gang ba'i thod pa dang // rin chen dang ni mchog sbyin nyid// gdol pa mo ni sngo mdog mtshungs// de bzhin rlung gi gos 'dzin ma//
327a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan pa dag gis thod pa dang // de bzhin pad+ma dkar po nyid// g.yung mo sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog/ rdo rje dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin// g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa ste// gzhan pas rlung
327a2(rgyud 'bum): gi gos 'dzin ma/ / g+ha sa ma rI ni ljang ser mtshungs// rdo rje me thab dgra sta'i lag/ thod pa tshal bus yongs gang ba'i// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed ma// ri khrod ma ni dkar mdog mtshungs// kha T+wAM ga dang
327a3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa'i lag/ rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid// sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par bya// ro hi ta dang phag nyid dang // rus sbal de bzhin lto 'phyo nyid// seng ge de bzhin stag nyid dang // wa dang dge slong nyid rnams
327a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de ltar dkar mo la sogs pa'i// thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// sgeg pa la sogs ro dang ldan// rta yi gzugs dang phag gi gdong // khyi gdong de bzhin seng ge
327a5(rgyud 'bum): ma/ zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi ma// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gling bu dang ni pi wa nga dang // mu kun dwa dang rdza rnga ste// phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan
327a6(rgyud 'bum): nag mo dkar ser lta bu dang / / de bzhin steng du rta gdong ljang // ser mo nag mo dkar mtshungs dang // de bzhin steng du bag gdong dmar// dmar zhing gnag dang dkar mtshungs shing // de bzhin steng du
327a7(rgyud 'bum): khyi gdong ser/ / ljang dang gnas dang dkar ba'i gdong // steng du 'bar ba'i seng ge gdong // thams cad sgra ni steng du ba bar// g.yon brkyang ba yis ro mnan cing // spyan gsum khro zhing sgeg pa dang // rgod pa'i
327b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ni bsgom par bya/ / he ru ka bskyed pa gsum pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// / ye shes mkha' 'gro sgrub thabs ni// rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon// gnyis med ye shes chos ldan pa'i
327b2(rgyud 'bum): / gnyis kyi dngos po spangs pa yis// rnal 'byor kun sosas dang por ni// dag pa gsum ni gdon par bya// swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbadz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ yo ga shud+d+haHsarba
327b3(rgyud 'bum): d+harmaHyo ga shud+d+hohaM/ de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas// yang ni bsam gtan de nyid bya// yid dang rjes mthun gnas rnams su// de nas bsam gtan brtsam par bya// bla re yang ni bri ba nyid// sna tshogs gos
327b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'phyang ba dang / / 'phan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang // phyogs bcu'i gnas ni thams cad du// dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dang // de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du// skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//
327b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis lus ni bsam par bya// blo gros ldan pas sngar mchod nas// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ni gzung // de ltar cho ga sna tshogs ni// nges par bsgom pa nyid du bya// ye shes mtsho yi ri bo'i mgor/
327b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs sogs kha dog bzhi ni bsam// de bzhin gser gyi rgyan byung dang // rin chen bdun gyis rnam par spras// g.yer ka 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba ni// 'dod pas kun tu rgyas par ni// gnas ni lnga ru seng ge yi//
327b7(rgyud 'bum): gdan ni bsgom pa nyid du bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam nas ni// gdugs ni dkar pos rnam par spras// bdag gi dbugs kyis phyung nas ni// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// zhal gsum ma la phyag
328a1(rgyud 'bum): drug nyid/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas// ma bcings sgra yis mdzes pa dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis
328a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / rgod dang khro ba sgeg pa dang // spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma// sgra cher dgod dang 'jigs pa mo// gos ni dmar pos shin tu mdzes// steng du kha T+wAM ga nyid dang // gnyis
328a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni dgra sta nyid/ / gsum pa la ni rdo rje nyid// g.yon na de bzhin dril bu'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni lhung bzed nyid// gsum par de bzhin ral gri 'dzin// 'od zer 'bar ba du ma dang // dbus su
328a4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ / ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mdun du ni// bdag gi dbugs kyis phyung nas ni// kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes// ma bcings pa yi sgra yis brgyan// sbrul gyi rgyan gyi sa brgyan
328a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyi sa brgyan// phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro mi bsgom bya// ye
328a6(rgyud 'bum): shes byang gi cha la ni/ / bdag gi dbugs las byung na sa ni// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // bcom gser gyi mdog lta bu// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ ma bcings skra yis
328a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / yan lag sbrul gyi rgyan dang ni// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyi sa brgyan// 'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya bsgom// ye shes nub kyi cha la ni// yang ni ro langs ma byung nas/
328b1(rgyud 'bum): / phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // kha dog sngon mo shin tu mdzes// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan// lus la sbrul gyi rgyan gyi sa brgyan//
328b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyi sa brgyan// ye shes lho yi cha la ni// gdol pa mo ni dmar mo ltar// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan// phyag gnyis ma la zhal
328b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig ma/ / sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// yongs gang gzugs dang gzi brjid ldan// 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom// dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma// gdong ni seng ger bsam par bya//
328b4(rgyud 'bum): dkar dang ser ba lta bur ni// klu dbang stan la g.yas brkyang gnas// rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub zhags// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyi sa brgyan// 'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni// lus ni 'bar bar bsgom
328b5(rgyud 'bum): pabar bya/ / mer ni sdug mo zhes bya ba// rin chen bdun po mchog gi gdan// phyag gnyis sngo dang dkar ba mtshungs// gos dang rgyan gyis brtan pa dang // 'bar ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang // de bzhin sdigs mdzub
328b6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa nyid/ / 'od zer ba ba rab du mas ni/ lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya// bden bral lha mo wa gdong ma// sgra cher dgod dang 'jigs pa mo// ma he'i gdan dang yang dag ldan// dmar zhing gnag
328b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i kha dog ma/ / lus la shin tu mdzes gos dang // phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par sbas// lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// rlung ngu lha mo bug pa mo// ser dang
329a1(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba'i kha dog ma/ / klu yi gdan la gnas pa dang // de nyid rgyan ni rab tu brtag/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas// lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma// 'od zer
329a2(rgyud 'bum): babang rab du ma yis/ / thams cad kyi ni thams cad 'bar// mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dbus su ste// phyi rol tu ni bzhi po rnams// de ltar dgod pa'i rim bltas nas// phyi nas gnas ni rab tu brtag/ shar du mkha'
329a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro'i rgyal mo dbang / / phyag gnyis dang ni mdog dkar mo// yi dgas gdan la gnas pa dang // sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // sgra ni grol zhing drag mo dang // me ni 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu// khar ni lag pa bcug
329a4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / sgra cher dgod dang de bzhin 'bar// byang du mar me rgyal mo dbang // kha dog ser mo drag shul ma// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gtsigs pa can// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// rab tu song
329a5(rgyud 'bum): nga'i stan la gnas/ / 'bar ba'i me ni lta bu'i 'od// thal mo gnyis kyi lag pa ni// mgo bo'i steng du mar me bzhin// nub tu lha mo 'jib byed ma// kha dog dmar mo 'jigs pa mo// rab tu song ba'i stan la
329a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// khrag gi srad du lag pa yi// snyim par khrag ni thung bar byed// mer ni 'bar ba'i 'od drag mo// lha mo gtso mo 'jib byed ma'o// lho ru g.yo ldan ma zhes
329a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ kha dog nag mo lta bu'i 'od// rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas// macings pa yi sgra yis brgyan// go ni dmar pos shin tu mdzes// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing
329b1(rgyud 'bum): lag/ thams cad sems ni rmongs par byed// 'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo// thams cad rig pas thams cad bsgom// 'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du ni// dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya// rlung
329b2(rgyud 'bum): dang me yis bdun pa'i don/ / rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul// thig le sgras ni mnan pas ni// rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bdang
329b3(rgyud 'bum): med sgrub pa ni/ / ci gsungs mdo ru bsdus nas bshad// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid
329b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sA dang chu ni sngon/ / go rim bzhin du byin pa dang // lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba// chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni// 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze 'bru
329b5(rgyud 'bum): las ni gcig yin te/ / rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog/ bco lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yi// ro ni nges par bsam par bya// de yi steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid// phyi nas bdud las
329b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas mnan/ / gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po// A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do// zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pas// dkar mo la sogs rab tu grag
329b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ / de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni// so sor rtog par brjod par bya// thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid// gzugs brnyan rdzogs
330a1(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa'o/ / mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pas ni// rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya// A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yi ge las byung gong bu la/
330a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT rnam pa 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba// dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom par bya// phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes
330a3(rgyud 'bum): rab rang bzhin las/ / de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// A li shes rab kA li thAbs// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// de phyir kun tu
330a4(rgyud 'bum): rab 'bad pas/ / dkyil 'khor pa yang rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni// nang gi 'bar mar yang dag gnas// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pa snga rtag tu bsgom
330a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkar/ / chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol 'apar mar dkar mo dang // chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma
330a6(rgyud 'bum): g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ / ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyud pa g.yung mos gang ba'o// 'od ldan ma dang sdeng ldan nyid// mkha' spyongs spyod ma zhes brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// ngos su
330a7(rgyud 'bum): skyusbyar ma yang dag gnas/ / lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdog/ drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma// spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma// 'khor lo rna cha mgur
330b1(rgyud 'bum): / rgyan dang // lag par gdu bu ska rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs// ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// g.yon pas/
330b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang // de bzhin steng du ba T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje sngon po dang // de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid// ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid pa bar// spyan dmar de bzhin steng skyes ser// kha dog sngon mo
