330b3(rgyud 'bum): / ches gsal ma// stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing // 'jig pa'i me ni lta bur ni// gsal ba'i gzugs can ma de gnas// g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste// g.yon na margad sngo dang mtshungs// phyag
330b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel// g.yas na gri gug 'dzin pa mo// rgod dang khro dang skrag pa dang // de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas
330b5(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu spro// de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//
330b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyibs// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ri/
330b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen por yongs su gzung // thams cad rnam par bltas nas ni// sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya// gsar pa legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas ni// srad bus thig
331a1(rgyud 'bum): gdab shes rab can/ / ji ltar nus par dkyil 'khor nyid// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnams kyis shin tu mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// gos dang me tog
331a2(rgyud 'bum): baphreng bas brgyan/ / mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// de yi 'khor lo so so'i skabs// nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni// rdo rje
331a3(rgyud 'bum): thig ni yongs bcug cing / / phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// de nas dkyil 'khor nang

331a7(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum mgon po rnams/ / byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul
331b1(rgyud 'bum): khrims dang / / tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum// so sor bdag gis brtan por gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las

336a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / bi dzA b+hi dang / b+hur+ya dang / d+hu mra bi ya dang / sa nu dang / sa rita dang / aM gu lA dang / ba da nA dang / ra dzi ka dang / ang+ga na dang / paM ka ti dang / tsA na dA ha dang / tsa la dang / mri ga pa ti dang / maN+Dal
336a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / swa saM dang / pho wu la dang / ma hA k+Sha ra dang / ts+tshan/ go ma b+hi ha dang / a phyag dang / s+tha dang / dan+ta/ swar+Yanan dang / mu kha sparba ne dang / he dang / trI kA dang / shu n+ya swana? ne dang / a nu swaR+sha na dang /
336b1(rgyud 'bum): steng dang 'og tu yod pa ni phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du gsungs so// yi ge dang ngag gi ts+tsho ma ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // rdo rje snying po snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu
336b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas nyon/ / gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma// lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo// 'di dag mkha' 'gro bdun du gsungs// mngon par zhen pas blta ba dang //
336b3(rgyud 'bum): smin ma yon por gang byed cing // sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang // phyis nas 'jigs par byed pa ni// de ni gzugs can ma zhes bya// dpa' bos gnyis med sten pa'o// sdug pa'am ga'
336b4(rgyud 'bum): te mi sdug pa'i/ / byis pa lta zhing 'o byed ni// de ni bo byed mar shes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin// byol song lta sbyangs khro gnyer gdong // 'di ni smin sgyur bsdigs par byed//
336b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma// de ni lA mar rnam par bstan// phag dang lce spyad byi la dang // rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de ni yongs gyur ma ru gsungs// rab tu dag
336b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing gsal bar dgod/ / song bar gyur nas mi ldog pa// de ni byis bcas mo ru gsungs// gang zhig skyo bas lag pa'am// bong ba 'am ni rkang pas sam// gos mtha' 'am yang na shing
336b7(rgyud 'bum): gis ni/ / des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur// de mi ldog mar shes bya// dgod dang sgra dang ngu ba dang // glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba// de ni 'dod pa ma shes bya// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma
337a1(rgyud 'bum): mor gsungs/ / thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // chu srin rgyal mtshan ral gri dang // babang mdung dang ni bdun du gsungs// yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di// rnal 'byor
337a2(rgyud 'bum): rig pas rtag tu mtshon/ / lus srul mo'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// / de nas lA ma'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// dmar
337a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing dkar ba'i bu med gang / / pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i 'od// dkar po'i go sa la rtag dga' zhing // tsan dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// chags shing mthong
337a4(rgyud 'bum): na rjes 'gro ma/ / khyim du pad+ma 'dri byed ma// pad+ma gar dbang rika sa las byung // smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son// lus ni sde bsangs skya ba dang // ut+pal sngon po'i dri dang mtshungs// khyim
337a5(rgyud 'bum): du rdo rje bri nas ni/ / rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// de ni mkha' 'gro mar sher bya// mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba dang // de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes
337a6(rgyud 'bum): khyim bya drag gis kyang / / rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang // de yi khyim du rdo rje ni// bris nas rtag tu mchod byed pa// he ru dka dpal rigs byung ba// mkha' 'gror 'di la the tshom med// 'khor

337b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ma de/ / khyim du 'khor lo 'dri bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro// gnag cing sngo bsangs bud med gang // so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang // rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni/
337b2(rgyud 'bum): skra ni rtag tu grol ba yin// rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang // spyod cing mang du smra ba dang // rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las byung // dkar zhing

342a1(rgyud 'bum): bo ston pa po/ / 'di yi sgom pa thams cad kyi// 'od zer dkar pos rnam par brgyan// lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsam nas ni// kha dog dkar po 'od

342a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med// yid ni chos rnams sngon du 'gro// yid ni dag cing yid ltar mgyogs// yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' 'drin gyis// smra ba dag ni byed par 'gyur// de phyir yid kyis/
342b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kun// yid las byung bar blo ldan pas// snying khar sems bsgom sdom pa ni// gal te 'dod na yo gIs bzlas// rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te// de nyid dpyad pas ma yin no// 'bras
342b2(rgyud 'bum): bu rgyu yi sa bon te/ / de nyid mthong ba ma yin no// gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod kyi// dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lnga// spyi bo spyi med yang dag gnas// kun nas kun gyis 'bab
342b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rtag tu rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi// ye shes rnam shes sa bon las// thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan// 'khor ba'i longs spyod 'don pa yis// yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan// yi
342b4(rgyud 'bum): ge dag ni rnam par spangs/ / nges par rtag tu go 'phang gnas// rtag pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings// rtag tu phra zhing skyon med pa// ye shes la ni rnam shes nub// ye shes dngos pos rnam shes kyi//
342b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur// dang por mtshan ma thams cad kyi// mar me'i rnam par mthong bar 'gyur// gnyis par mtshan ma me khyer gyi// rnam pa'i rdul du mtshon par byed// rdul dka
342b6(rgyud 'bum): tsa nu ka dbyibs su/ / phyogs bcur de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/ lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang // bzhi par yang ni bstan
342b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / lha yi gzugs ni thams cad kyang // lnga par sems kyis brtag par bya// drug pa gzugs ni med pa'i tshe// bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de// brgyad par rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i// sangs
343a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don/ / rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyis ni re rer dbye/
343a2(rgyud 'bum): ba yis// lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya// lus can rnams kyi phung po dang // khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyon mongs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya// rang rig pas
343a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid dag pa nyid/ / dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// yul gyis dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde ba'i mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa snang
343a4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste// de phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos/ kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o// de ci'i
343a5(rgyud 'bum): slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// sgra ni rna bas mnyan par
343a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya// lce yis ro ni rig par bya// lus kyis dngos po reg par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni// dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya/
343a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rdo rje nam ste/ 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug// de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka/ mig la ga
343b1(rgyud 'bum): mug rdo rjer bshad/ / zhe sdang rdo rje mngon thos pa// phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer bshad// reg la ser sna rdo rje ma// khams dang skye mched thams cad ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug
343b2(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka/ sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma// chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod// me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma// de bzhin chung ni gar dbang phyug/ nam mkha'i khams su brjod pa ni// pad+ma
343b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba 'khyil pa nyid/ / 'di ltar lus can rnams kyi lus// phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las// nyon mongs la sogs des bskyed pa'i// bskyed pa'i cha la
343b4(rgyud 'bum): legs gnas pas/ / srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob// phung po dang skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas spyod pas rtog pa rnams// 'jig
343b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa bshad par bya/ / chos rnams kun la mnyam byung ba// de nyid spyod pa gong na med// sangs rgyas sras la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam gnas pa// gang zhig yang ni de nyid
343b6(rgyud 'bum): las/ / rdo rje yan lag med pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por// rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las// sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed//
343b7(rgyud 'bum): tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang // myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing // snying po'i yon tan kun gyi gnas// sems kyi rin chen las byung ba// 'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab
344a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa'i/ / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan kun// lus byung 'di la ma gtogs par// dga' ba'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs med 'di//
344a2(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'dod pas spad par gyis// lha yi dgra dang brgya byin dang // grong khyer sum brtsegs dgra bo dang // nor sprin tshangs pa la sogs pas// zhabs kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yi// sdig pa
344a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig byed 'di la spyod/ / myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi// gnas kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas ni// gang zhig 'gro la phan par ni// kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsu//
344a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar mchog tu bsam yas gnas// shin tu gsang ba yo gis bsgom// rtog pa thams cad bral bar ni// dam tshig la ni spyad par bya// rgyu mthun 'a bras bu rang bzhin las// dang po'i rtsom par
344a5(rgyud 'bum): yo gi gnas/ / de nas bsgom pas dub pa na// bsdus nas byis pa'i rtse ba bya// sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la// 'jam pa'i gzugs can rang nyid bsgom// grub par grags pa ma lus pa/
344a6(rgyud 'bum): cigasungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// spyod pas bla na med pa yis// kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas// spyod pa nges rig rdo rje can// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dpal ldan slob
344a7(rgyud 'bum): dpon rdo rje can/ / kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni// blo gros chen po bya ba byas// de nas rang gi 'dod sgyur bas// sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas// kun tu seng ge lha
344b1(rgyud 'bum): bur ni/ / de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyod// ji ltar byung don yang dag rig/ 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis// yang dag lta ba rab sgyur ba dag/ brtan pa'i sems ni gnas med pas// phung po khams
344b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs mtshan nyid ni/ / thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma ltar// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni// mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir shes bya// sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// 'tshe bar dbang phyug
344b3(rgyud 'bum): 'du ba dang / / de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni// thams cad shin tu ring du spangs// rtag tu rtog pa med gyur pas// gnyis su med par nges byas nas// pha rol phyin drug rnal 'byor gyis// sangs
344b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dngos grub rab grub phyir/ / sems can don la legs nus kyang // sems can yongs su brtag mi bya// byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas// phyogs las rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam// thabs dang
344b5(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ldan pa'i bdag/ sbyor ba kun la rgyab kyis phyogs// de nyid goms par rab byas pas// skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa kun las rnam par grolaM// sems can bsam
344b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khyad par las/ / sgyu ma ltar rtogs rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad nyid ni bza' bar bya// chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med// dogs pa med pa'i sems
344b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / ji ltar 'dod par rab tu bza'// longs spyod rdzogs don 'di dag kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpas rnam par sprul// ye she
345a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas thob pa yis/ / de bzhin gshegs phyag mi byan// rtag tu sgom par ldan pa yis// dbang bskur med sogs smos ci dgos// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin
345a2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// de phyir de nyid lha rnams 'di// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba mi bya zhing // phyag rgya mchod rten las mi bya// dpal ldan
345a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mgon pos ni/ / gang yang gzhan du bstan pa rnams// lhag par mos pas gnas gang yang // de rnams kyis kyang de nyid rig/ ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer bas// snying po blangs nas
345a4(rgyud 'bum): dar ba spong / / de ltar chos kyi snying po ni// thob nas rtog pa thams cad spangs// rtog med gang tshe blo ldan pas// dogs pa spangs shing gnas med pa// thugs kyi rdo rje ci gsungs bzhin//
345a5(rgyud 'bum): de tshe 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// rtog pas dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur te// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor bar ni// 'khor ba ru ni 'khor bar 'gyur// rtog pa med na grol 'gyur zhing // gnas ni dri med zhi ba
345a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / de phyir rtog pa'i dra gzhom phyir// dam tshig sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang // de ni rtag tu goms par bya// gang gis dam tshig gnas gyur pa// sngags shes bsam pa'i nus pas bya//
345a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos po kun la blta bar bya// nges par thams cad ma skyes pa'i// rnam pa yi ni rnal 'byor gyis// khyi dang bong bu rnga mo dang // glang po la sogs khrag 'thungs nas// sha yang rtag tu bza'
345b1(rgyud 'bum): babanyid/ / sha chen khrag gis gos pa ni// thams cad khyad par du ni blta// dman pa'i sha ni thams cad dang // srog chags 'bum phrag brgya ldan bza'// rnam snang shin tu rul ba yi// srin bu brgya phrag
345b2(rgyud 'bum): zi zir ldan/ / khyi dang mi skyugs bsres nas ni// shA ni rdo yi chu go ldan// rnal 'byor pas ni spro ba yi// rnam snang ba sres nas bza' bar bya// rdo rje'i chu ni btung bar bya// gang gi tshe sha'ang bza' bar

345b4(rgyud 'bum): bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa de la bgrod par bya ba dang / gang zhig bya ba ma yin pa de ni de'i bya ba dang / bgrod pa dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa dang / bza' ba dang bza' bar bya
345b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ma yin pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang / btung ba dang btung ba ma yin par sngags pas mi bya ste/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam par gzhag par gzhag par 'gyur ro// ji lta
345b6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar yang sems 'khrul ba ma yin pa de ltar chang rnal 'byor pas rtag tu btung bar bya ba dang / dman pas shin tu sgeg pa dang / rigs dang bcas pa dang / rigs med pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs

346a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bzlas pa mi bya ba dang / lha dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la phyag mi bya ba dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / pha rol gyi bud med skal ba bzang mo bsten par bya ba dang / gdug
346a2(rgyud 'bum): pa can la byams pa mi bya bar gsungs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang srog chags gsad pa dang / rgyal bas mchod pa'i slob dpon dang / ye shes kyi dam tshig ni sems can te/ dam tshig rtag tu
346a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par byed de/ blo dang ldan pa la phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pas mchod par byed do// gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams
346a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung du'i rtse mo la mthong ba de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas slob dpon la sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo // nges par rang gi dam tshig sangs rgyas 'dod
346a5(rgyud 'bum): pas dngos grub sbyin par byed pas bla ma dam pa la smad par mi bya ba dang / rdo rje spun la mi gus par mi bya ba dang / gang zhig byin pa de bzung nas mchod rten la phyag mi bya ba dang / spun dang / bu dang //

346a7(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// spyod pa pha rol phyin mtshan nyid// gang gis ring nas shes pa de// rdo rje yo gir the tshom med// mkha' 'gro ma sogs
346b1(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma ni/ / ji ltar rnyed dang bza' btung ni// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yis bzab// ro yi dkris ma'i gos bzang dang // ro bsreg thal bas rnam par brgyan// phru chag shin tu gsang ba ni//
346b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'i dus su rgyu bar bya// bzhi mdo dang ni ri bo dang // shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang // bzhir ni de nas sngags pa yis// sgom pa bzang po bya bar brjod// ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan
346b3(rgyud 'bum): mo dang / / yang na dben pa 'am pas mthar ni// cung zad drod ni thob pa yis// gal te spyod pa byed 'dod na// bdag nyid gal te 'grub 'dod pas// byis pa bzhin du spyad nas ni// sems
346b4(rgyud 'bum): can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur/ / blo ldan chen pos rgyu bar bya// zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// kha dog can gyis rtag sgrib pa// ba spu'i khung bu'i rtsa bug gnas// phyogs bcu rnams su

346b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu sna tshogs do shal sogs// 'ol ma zi sog de bzhin spras// srog chags yan lag gos gon zhing // bde don gter la bde ba sbyin// res 'ga' legs sbyar zur bcag ni//
347a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa yis ni 'don par byed// bza' dang bza' min ci rnyed pa// smyon pa'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// gzhan pa'i yul 'khor grub pa dang // ri yi phug dang tshang tshing dang //

347a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs las rnam rgyal brtsam/ / sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa yi// skye ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa yi// kun gyi bsam pa yongs su bgengs//

347a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin mo/ / yang na klu mo rkang 'og tu// gnas pa dang ni lha min mo// 'di nang yo gi rig ma gcig/ rang gi sems la mngon 'dod pa// ljags kyu zhags pa'i rab 'byor pas// rnal
347a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis bkug nas bsgrub/ / nye bar dgos pa rgyas pa kun// ma bslangs par ni lha yis ster// rga dang nad las rnam par grol// gnyis med gnas gsum sdig pa med// lus kyi sbyin
347b1(rgyud 'bum): pa byin nas ni/ / phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam// skal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bcab de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bza' bar bya// yid 'ong mi
347b2(rgyud 'bum): 'ong rnam rtog phyir/ / zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i bya ba nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che// mchod sprin sbyin

347b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan pa'i btung bas bzi ba med// yang na dpal ldan rgyal tshab che// brtul zhugs spyod pa'ang bsgrags pa yang // gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//
347b6(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa po yis rnam gzung ba// rna ba dag la rna cha bzang // spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin// lag pA dgra la lag gdub nyid// rked pa la ni sku rags nyid// rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub go/
347b7(rgyud 'bum): dpung ba'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin pa la ni nor bu ste// bgo bstag gi pags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// mnyam par gzhag pas gnas par bya// shin
348a1(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhin bzang mig yang ma/ / rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas// spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rtogs par bya// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos med na//
348a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i// rigs kyis kyang ni bya ba'o// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba/ byang chub sa bon bcug pa yis// sbyang bar byas te khyer nas ni// gang tshe rdo rje mchog ldan par// de tshe
348a3(rgyud 'bum): glu ni thang bar bya/ / gang tshe dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste// de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis bya// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi skyod pa// rna cha'i bdag

348a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi cang te'u/ / sman ni rnam par bza' bar bya// chu ni rtag tu btung bya ste// rga shi sa zil gyis mi non cing // kun tu bsrung bar gyur pa yin// rkun ma'i sgras byas cod pan can// de la hUM byung
348a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// sor lnga'i dum bur byas nas ni// cod pan la ni rnam par 'dzin// thabs dang shes rang bzhin las//
348a7(rgyud 'bum): sgo yis ska rags nyis skor nyid// thal ba spa yi mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni bzlas paste// sems can thams cad mgron gnyer ba'o// kha T+wAM ga ni shre
348b1(rgyud 'bum): rab ste/ / rdo rje bzlas dang sgom pa yis// thod pa can du rang gyur pa// brkam dang rmongs dang de bzhin 'jigs// khro dang ngo tsha'i bya ba ni// rtag tu rnam par spang bar bya// he ru ka bdag rnal 'byor pa/
348b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs lnga la ni gnas par bya// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan par// rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/ rigs gcig du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba bskyed mi bya// bdag nyid kyis
348b3(rgyud 'bum): ni gnyis spangs nas/ / the tsom med par spyod par bya// dpal yang dag par sposbyor ba las byung ba las spyod pa'i brtag pa ste lnga pa'o// // lha logs mnyan par 'tshal lakra
348b4(rgyud 'bum): na/ rang byin brlab pa'i rim ci lags// gsang ba la sogs dgongs po ci// rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// thams cad rgyud kyi gtan phab pa//
348b5(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus nas ni bsgrag par bya// e yi rnam pa gang gsungs pa// gnas kyi mtshan nyid mi gsal bar// bgro dang rjes su 'ong ba nyid// khams dang sems kyi rtag 'gro ba'o//
348b6(rgyud 'bum): khams zhes bya ba'i sgra du lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ltar gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug brjod par bya ste/ rA yi rnam pa khrag gi khams// hA ni de bzhin reg bya nyid
348b7(rgyud 'bum): s+ye ni bad kan zhes byar gsungs/ / pa yi rnam pa sems nyid dang // ra yi rnam pas ro nyid de// mes ni de bzhin lto tshil dag/ ra ni me nyid du ni gsungs// me yi rnam pa sha ru gsung/
349a1(rgyud 'bum): sa yi rnam pa bshang bar gsungs// rba yi rnam pas de bzhin tshil// tA ni pags pa nyid du gsungs// ni yi rnam pas rus pa nyid// sa ni gci ba nyid du gsungs//
349a2(rgyud 'bum): da yi rnam pas glo ba nyid// s+thi ni pad+ma nyid du gsungs// shin tu mdzes pa'i rdzas dang ldan// ta yi rnam pas khu ba ni// byang chub sems las byung ba yin// rtsa yi sgra yi rang bzhin las// de
349a3(rgyud 'bum): ltar lha mo bsgrags pa yin/ / byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// cha yi bdag nyid 'gyur ba nyid// ra ni me zhes bya bar gsungs// khrag las mkhris pa yang dag blangs// mtshan nyid
349a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig 'dod bad kan las/ / rdul dang chu rgyus yang dag byung // de yi mgon por brjod pa'i rlung // ha ni kun tu 'gro bar gsungs// rus pa'i mtshams ni 'di rnams su// sa bon lnga ni yang
349a5(rgyud 'bum): dag btab/ / rkan tu ra dang thams cad du// sa bon bzhi ni dam pa nyid// dang po'i re mig gnas der ni// sa bon lnga ni mdzes pa nyid// ha ni dbyangs kyi drug ldan pa// rnam par shes par
349a6(rgyud 'bum): / yongs su grags// ha yi rnam pas thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// sgra yi tshul las byung bton zhing // dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba
349a7(rgyud 'bum): thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas/ / srub dang srub byed sbyor ba las// ji lta ba ni de bzhin no// sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan// rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis// rtsa
349b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis skye gnas dbus su ni/ / g.yon dang g.yas su de bzhin du// g.yon du khu ba rnam shes bya// g.yas pa la ni khrag nyid de// de yi phan tshun bsdu ba yang // chos kyi dbyings ni sdud pa yin// snying
349b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs sku dang rdul dag bcas/ / mun pa sems kyi rang bzhin las// snying stobs khu ba rin chen rdul// mun pa skyed par byed pa nyid// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dngos dang dngos med ro gcig 'gyur//
349b3(rgyud 'bum): bshang ba gci ba bad kan dang // khrag dang lnga pa khu ba nyid// bdud rtsi lnga li gong bu dngos// de phyir rdo rje can du brjod// rus pa rkang dang khu ba ni// pha las skyes par de bzhin gsungs// pags pa dang ni
349b4(rgyud 'bum): sha dang khrag/ ma las skyes pa zhes byar bsgrags// gong bu'i bsdu ba rnams kyi yang // tshad ni 'di dag gsungs pa ste// gong bu gcig pu gnyis su 'gyur// gnyis su gyur pa du ma rnams//
349b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu du ma'i rang bzhin gyis// de phyir rdo rje can 'dir gsungs// rtsa yi spyod yul nyid gsungs pa// de yi sgo yang de gnyis la// de rnams 'du ba'i dus su ni// lha ni dmigs par 'gyur ba yin//
349b6(rgyud 'bum): steng gi sgo dang 'og nyid de// 'og gi sgo ni rnam par shes// steng gi sgo ni dbyings nyid do// rtsa ni thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'jug par bsam// de yi lus kyi skyeng sgo la'ang /
349b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyi rtag rgyun bzhugs// steng gi sgor ni sbyor ba gsum// sgo dgu rnams kyis yongs su bskor// kye bcom ldan 'das/ sbyor ba gsum ni ci zhes bshad// ji ltar gang gi rnam pa yis//
350a1(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi rtag tu 'gro ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsum nyid sbyor ba sbyor ba gsum// rnam gsum dbye bas rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs
350a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis/ / tha ma 'bring po dam pa nyid// ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu pa// sbom po lnga ni lhag pa'i lha// bug pa dgur ni son pa'i sgo// dgu yi rnam par yongs su grags// tha ma'i sgo ni skur
350a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ / sbom po lha yi sprul pa'o// sems dang skyes bu skyes bu can// khyad par rnal 'byor pa yi don// rtag par kun tu dus su ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad pas las// rkang med rkang gcig
350a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang gnyis dang / / rkang bzhi las ni sogs pa yi// rlung la sogs pas rab dbye bas// rtag tu 'gro ba rlung rnam bzhi// sems kyi gnas pa rnam pa gnyis// nub dang rab rgyu'i cho ga yis//
350a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu nub dang rab rgyu ba// sems can+da kun la 'gro ba'o// de ltar gang zhig mi rig pa// sems med skyes bu med pa dang // yid dang ldan pa med dang dang // rnal 'byor pa yi don med pa// me nyid gang
350a6(rgyud 'bum): dang rlung dang ni/ / dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu// 'khor lor sems kyi kun spyod pa// steng dang ngos dang drang 'og 'gro// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gsum pa'i sgo ni yid dang bcas// rngub dang dbyung
350a7(rgyud 'bum): ba gnyis ka yang / / sgo yi dam pa nyid yin te// gtso bo dam pa yi ni sgo// stong dang 'og tu rab tu grags// 'og gi sgos ni rnam par shes// steng gi sgos ni dbyings nyid de// rnam snang la sogs
350b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams/ / steng gi sgor ni g.yo zhing gnas// de rnams 'og tu rnam par gnas// steng gis gshegs su gsol ba nyid// dgug dang gshegs su gsol ba yi// tshul gyi sems
350b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis rtag tu 'gro/ / dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo rnams// 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la// yon tan skyon ni rab brjod pas// bde dang sdug bsngal rang
350b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis/ / lhan cig skyes pa grub pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan lha mos ni// bo la kak+ki lar bcug ras// sems
350b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po mnyes byas te/ / tshig ni 'di dag yang dag gsol// dpyid ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// thig le bgyi ba ji ltar lags// mi phyed ma sogs ji ltar gnas// de yi gnas ni ji ltar
350b5(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / pul+li ra sogs ci gsungs dang // 'khor lo bkod pa de bzhin gzhan// ji ltar rtsa yi rdzogs pa yi// de yi dbye ba bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
350b6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo bshad par bya yi sa nyon// gsang ba las ni rjes gsang mchog/ rtswa yi rang bzhin dang / gnas la sogs pa dang / sa bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor la
350b7(rgyud 'bum): son pa gnas kyi nang gi rab tu dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsungs pa/ spyi bo ma la ya yi yul// de bzhin spyi gtsug 'bar ba 'dzin// de bzhin du ni u rgyan nyid// rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod/
351a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsib ma'i rgyab ni arbu ta// bzhi ni gnas zhes bya ba'o// rna ba g.yon pa'i rang bzhin ni// de bzhin go dra ba rir shes// dga' ba'i dbang phyug bshad pa ni// smin ma'i dbus gnas
351a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bskul/ / de bzhin mig dag lha mo'i mkhar// lag pa'i rtsa bar mA la ba// de ltar nye ba'i gnas nyid de// thugs kyi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// gnas kyi khyad par rang bzhin gyi// mkha' spyod
351a3(rgyud 'bum): / rnams kyi yang dag bshad// mchan khung kA ma ru pa nyid// nu ma o trer rab tu grags// 'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod// lte ba tri sha ku nir brjod// sA yi rtse mor ko shA lA// nye ba'i zhing du brjod
351a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / kha ni ka ling ka ru brjod// mgrin pe laM pa ka ru gsungs// tsAn+do ha zhes rnam par bshad// snying ni kany+tsir brjod pa ste// dbang po hi ma la ya nyid// nye ba yi ni tsAn+dor brjod// de ltar yul
351a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cang du/ / gsung gi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// gnas kyi khyad par yul gyi ni// sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad// rtags la yi dgas lhag par gnas// gsang ba la ni
351a6(rgyud 'bum): khyim gyi lha/ / 'di dag 'du bar brjod pa'o// bad+ma ni so rAny+dzar brjod// rje ngar gnyis ni gser gling gi/ rang gi ngo bor rnam par bshad// nye ba yi ni 'du ba nyid// sor mo na ga ra ru brjod// rkang pa'i
351a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyab ni sin+d+hur nges/ / dur khrod du ni yang dag brjod// mthe bong la ni ma ru zer// pus mo ku lu tA ru brjod// 'di dag nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// mkha' 'gro mar ni gsungs pa'o// 'di dag yul dang
351b1(rgyud 'bum): rang lus skyes/ / rang gi nang dang phyi rol gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la// nyi shu rtsa bzhir bya ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas// thams cad du ni yang drug bshad// 'di
351b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams gnas su mkha' 'gro ma/ / rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// drug pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // de nas gzhan yang dam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
351b3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar gnas su son pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o/ / snying gi nang son pad+ma ni// 'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas// de yi nang du son pa'i rtsa// mar me'i rang gi ngo bo can// chu shing gi ni me toH
351b4(rgyud 'bum): lhur/ / brkyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o// de yi nang gnas dpa' bo ni// yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam// mi shig hUM gi sa bon ni// kha ba lta bur 'dzag pa nyid// lus can rnams kyi snying dgra' ba// dpyid
351b5(rgyud 'bum): ces bya bar rnam par bshad/ / rgod ma'i me yi gzugs kyis ni// bdag med ma ni thig ler brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// dpyid thob
351b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yi chog shes pas/ / snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par gnas// dpa' bo shri ni he ru ka/ 'di ni dpyid kyi thig ler brjod// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs 'dzin mA// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par gnas/
351b7(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas ni// sgo ni rnam gsum byung ba las// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar byed// 'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas// lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni// thung ngu ru ni rab tu grags/
352a1(rgyud 'bum): snying la yang ni hUM nyid ni// ring po ma mo gnyis dang gnas// mgrin par oM gyi gzugs kyi sa ni// ma mo gsum brjod pu lu ta// dpral bar hUM gi rnam pa 'di// sgra dang thig le
352a2(rgyud 'bum): mi shigs pa/ / 'khor lo bzhi ni rab dbye bas// sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // thun bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa dang // pad+ma bzhi las byung ba dang // dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor bzhi ni
352a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon du'o/ / mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis// bya dang byed pa'i dngos po las// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis ni// 'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol// 'dab ma rnams kyi gzhi la yang // 'byung bzhi
352a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi rtsa rnams ni/ / mar me'i rang bzhin lta bur ni// phyogs bzhi la ni rnam par gnas// rtswa rnams bzhi yang mtshams rnams su// rnam par gnas shing der son pa'ang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'bab
352a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / de mchod rang gi gzugs gnas pas// de yi dngos po'i ngo bo las// mchod pa bzhi ni rnam par bshad// lus kyi snying gi nang du ni// rtsa lnga rnams ni rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs
352a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbye ba yis/ / nyi shu rtsa bzhir nye bar brjod// gnas sogs dbye ba lA gnas nas// gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas// spyi bor yang dag byung ba yi// rtsa ni spyi bo skyes zhes brjod// dul
352a7(rgyud 'bum): dang snying stobs mun pa'i tshul/ / de yi nang nas gtso mo ni// pul+lI rar ni mi phyed ma// so dang sen mo 'bab par brjod// 'bar ba 'dzin pa phra gzugs ma// de bzhin sgra dang ba spu 'bab// u rgyan
352b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni chen po la/ / rtse ba ma ni rnam par gnas// rna ba g.yas par gnas nas ni// pags pa dri ma 'bab ma gnas// ar+tha dar ni g.yon pa ma// mkha' 'gro ma ni sha 'bab ma// gang zhig
352b2(rgyud 'bum): / chu rgyus 'bab pa'i rtsa// ba yi mchog sprin rnam par gnas// de ni sra ba'i tshul gyis gnas// thung ngu mar ni rnam par bshad// gang zhig dga' ba'i dbang phyug gnas// de bzhin rus sbal skyes mar
352b3(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / sra ba'i dngos pos gnas pa'i phyir// rus pa'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs par gnas// lha mo'i mkhar du gang zhig rtsa// 'jam pa sgom pa ma ru brjod// de ni rtag tu mchin pa babapa// thams cad
352b4(rgyud 'bum): lus la rtag par gnas/ / mA la wa ra ni dbang ma ni// rgyal ba'i dbang phyug snying la gnas// rtsa ni gang zhig mig 'bab ma// 'dod pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas// gzugs ni mthong bar 'dod
352b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / skyon bral ma zhes rnam par bshad// o Tar mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa// gang zhig 'jug ma chen mor brjod// tri sha ku ner byung ba ni// ma mo nges par glo bar bcas// ko sha lar ni mtshan
352b6(rgyud 'bum): mo nyid/ / rgyu ma'i 'phreng bzang khyab cing 'bab// ka ling kAr ni bsil sbyin ma// ngos kyi chu rgyus yang dag bshad// che ba mA ni lto gnas nges// laM pA kar ni rab tu grags// tshang ma ning ni kany+tsi
352b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / thams cad du ni bshang ba 'bab// mtshams kyi mtha' yi nang du yang // kha ba'i gnas su rangs pa'i gdong // shin tu gzugs can bad kan ldan// yi dgas lhag gnas yang dag gam
353a1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rtag tu rnag 'bab pa/ / khyim gyi lhar ni yang dag gnas// mkha' 'gro dam pa'i dbang phyug ma// spyi ma nyid du rnam par bshad// sau raSh+Tar ni gang zhig rtsa// rgyu sbyin ma ni
353a2(rgyud 'bum): dmar po 'bab/ / rdul ni 'bab par gyur pa ni// gser gling du ni yang dag bshad// yan lag gzi brjid kun khyab ma// sbyor bral mar ni rab tu grags// na ga rarA ni sdu gum// tshil can sdom zhing myos
353a3(rgyud 'bum): byed 'bab/ / sin d+hur shin tu grub ma nyid// mya ngan mchi ma 'bab mar brjod// ma rur gnas ma lud skam 'bab// 'tshed pa ma zhes rnam par bstan// ku lu tar ni yid bzangs ma// sha dang snabs ni 'ab
353a4(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / drug pa las yul gyi dgod pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// / lha lags mnyan par 'tshal lags na// nang gi dkyil 'khor mchod pa las// sogs pa'i las ni ji ltar lags
353a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg las ni mi 'chal bas/ / bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha// rtsa gzugs mdzes par yang dag byung // lus kyi dkyil 'a
353a6(rgyud 'bum): nyams dga' bar/ / sgo bzhir ji skad gsungs pa'o// rang gi yan lag brgyad byung bas// ka ba de yis bskor nas gnas// dngos po kun gyis mnyam pa'i phyir// gru bzhi par ni rab tu glags// sku gsung
353a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi ngo bos ni/ / dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gcig tu gsungs// ri ni mgo bo'i ze 'bru la// ji ltar rtsom chen la sogs rim// bla ma'i dus thabs rim nyid kyis// de ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas//
353b1(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i mthil du rtsom chen rlung // gzhu yi dbyibs su rnam par gnas// sum mdo yi ni gnas su ni// de bzhin gru gsum 'bar ba nyid// zlum po'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// chu ni lto bar rnam
353b2(rgyud 'bum): par gnas/ / snying kar yang ni sa nyid de// kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do// sgal tshigs dbyug gu'i gzugs kyis ni// r-i ra ba ri rgyal de bzhin no// de ni spyi bo'i char gnas pa// 'dab skyes 'dab ma sum cu
353b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / dbyangs dang gsal byed mdzes par gnas// sum cu rtsa gnyis byang chub 'dod// pad+ma'i nang du son pa gang // de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brjod// spyi bo'i nang du klad pa ni// gang zhig gnas pa de ru
353b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / de nang haM gi rnam pa nyid// thig le'i gzugs can mi shigs pa// 'jig rten kun gyi rtsa ba de// brtan pa'i bdag nyid g.yo ba'i bdag/ gsol dang mi gsal gzugs las ni// sa bon
353b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis rnam par gnas/ / lus can rnams ni kun gyi gzugs// de phyir gdod nas rdzogs pa nyid// bdud rtsi'i gzugs kyis 'dzag par ni// nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gnas// de nyid kyis
353b6(rgyud 'bum): ni sgra 'byed cing / / me ni dga' bar byed pa ste// des ni gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// yin pa nyid du the tsom med// de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// dngos po rnams kyi snying po mchog/ de ni len cing
353b7(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa'i phyir/ / lus ni dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// 'khor lor yang ni dkyil 'khor brjod// byang chub semra ni rin po che// dkyil 'khor de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid// phyi rol
354a1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i nang gzugs kyis/ / sna tshogs khyab cing rnam par gnas// phyi rol gzugs dang sgra la sogs// dbang po thams cad 'jug pa'o// nang gi khu ba la sogs pa// grub
354a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdzas ni rnam par gnas/ / phyi rol bcas pa'i nang nyid kyis// rdo rje can gyi byang chub sems// sbom dang phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba'i gnyen gyis rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
354a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yi/ / dam tshig don du gsungs pas ni// dkyil 'khor goms pas skye ba 'dir// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin rang rgyal rnams kyi dang //
354a4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs la sogs lha rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor goms pas rdzogs po nyid// shes rab me ni cher 'bar bar// nang gi khu ba la sogs dang // de bzhin phyi rol gzugs sogs kyis// bsreg
354a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyis ni sbyin sreg bya/ / skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang // phung po la sogs khyad par las// de rnams kyis ni gzugs can lha// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// des ni de mchod gang
354a6(rgyud 'bum): gi phyir/ / rnal 'byor mchod par yang dag bshad// thod pa 'di ni mgo bo nyid// bsreg rdzas kyi ni snod du gsungs// blugs gzar ro mar bshad pa ste// snying gi 'khor lo brkyang ma dag/ dgang gzar
354a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes byar yang dag brjod/ / thab khung lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du// las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi// tshangs pa'i me ni sum mdor gnas// sgra ni sngags zhes brjod pa ste// bzlas pa 'khor bar byed pa yin
354b1(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa mtshungs par snang ba nyid/ / dkyil 'khor gnyis med rnal 'byor phyir// lhan cig skyes pa zhon pa 'di// de ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs// dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gzugs kyi phyir//
354b2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po nyid// de skad la sogs ci gsungs pa// rgyud ni thams cad rtogs par bya// da dung bdag la the tshom mchis// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po'i gzugs
354b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / mgon po ji ltar rol par 'gyur// de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal bas// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa// spyi bo lter son 'khor lo ni/ e yi dbyibu su yang das
354b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ snying dang mgrin par yang dag gnas// waM gi rnam pa lta bur brjod// lte ba'i nang gnas pad+ma ni// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhir ldan// bdab skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis// spyi bo'i nang du rnam par gnas// mgrin pa'i nang
354b5(rgyud 'bum): du son pa yang / / pad+ma lo ma bcu drug nyid// de yi snying ka'i gnas su ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du brjod// bde ba ma drug cu rtsa bzhi nyid// sprul pa la ni rab tu grags// pad+ma chen mo 'dabargyad par//
354b6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sku ni rab tu bskor// longs spyod rdzogs pa bcu drug rtsibs// de bzhin 'dra ba ma sum cu gnyis// bde chen ye shes chen po la// kun tu yang dag rnam par gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus
354b7(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / sde tshan brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// yig 'bru dang po'i ngo bo yis// 'di ni a ste yi ge mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnams bshad pa// hUM ni mi zhig pa ru brjod// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag lnga
355a1(rgyud 'bum): ya ra la was rnam par brgyan/ / longs spyod 'khor lo'i nang gnas pa// oM ni yig 'bru gsal bar byed// cha ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// kun tu yongs su bskor ba'o// bde
355a2(rgyud 'bum): chen 'khor lo chen po la/ / haM ni thig le'i gzugs can no// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag la// zla ba nyi ma rnam par bshad// mgrin pa nas brtsams g.yon pa'i rtsa// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
355a3(rgyud 'bum): sku can ma/ / lte ba'i nang du ngal sos shing // kha ni 'og tu myos byed 'bab// gang zhig lte ba las stengs rtsa// de bzhin kha ni steng du 'bab// mgrin pa'i nang du dral sos shing // khrag po bab par ni rab
355a4(rgyud 'bum): tu grags/ / myos byed zla ba zhes byar bshad// khrag ni nyi ma zhes byar gsungs// sgo gnyis mnyam par zhon nus ni// steng dang 'og tu mnyam gnas pa// 'di dag zla ba nyi ma gnyis// rtsa ni gnyis
355a5(rgyud 'bum): su rab tu grags/ / dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba'i rgyur// nub pa dang ni 'char ba nyid// log dang sad pa lta bur gsungs// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos la ni//
355a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs ni bcu gnyis yang drag gnas// kha ni steng du yang dag bshad// ka la sogs pa rnams kyis bskor// kha ni 'og gi gnas su gnas// lhag par byas nas sbyar ba nyid// k+Sha ni srin
355a7(rgyud 'bum): po nyid gsungs pa/ / 'og gi char ni rnam par gnas// gang che mgrin par chags chen gyi// gzugs kyi zla ba gnas pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i sku// de tshe longs spyod rdzogs par
355b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / gang tshe rdo rje'i rtser gnas pa// de tshe der ni sna rtser ro// gang tshe longs spyod rdzogs sku yang // nub par gnas par 'gyur ba na// b+ha ga'i nang du son de yang // yungs kar tsam du rnam par gnas/
355b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i gzugs su yang dag bshad// sprul pa'i skur ni brjod pa ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// spros pa de yis bskyed pa'o// pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po ni// 'dab ma byed pa'i spor ba
355b3(rgyud 'bum): can/ sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs su ni// der ni nyi ma nub pa na// gang tshe rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// gong bur gyur pa rnyog pa med// 'khor ba'i lam ni rnam bcad cing // spros pa nyer ni dge
355b4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ gnyis med mchog tu dag pa nyi// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs// shrI ni he ru ka zhes bshad// rgyud ni srin bu'i gzugs can 'di// dgod dang lnga dang lag bcangs 'ang // rgyud ni
355b5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rnam par gnas/ / 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral yang // zos nas srin bu gnas pa nyid// rtsa thams cad kyi mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa sde drug pa las rab tu byed
355b6(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang // rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor lo'i sdom
355b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lam dang ni/ / lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba dang // mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo khyad par dang // dgongs pa'i skad kyi khyad par ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs ma// sdom pa'ang bdag
356a1(rgyud 'bum): la bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas par// aM gi rnam pa'i sdom pa'i gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin na/
356a2(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched thams cad nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa med// sku gsum lus kyi
356a3(rgyud 'bum): nang du ni/ / 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pa las// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // de bzhin bde ba chen po
356a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / skye gnas mgrin gnyis dbus su ni// sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi sems can gyi// skye ba gang la brjod bya ba// gang zhig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// de la sprun
356a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku nyid yin/ / chos ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi 'khor lo snying khar yin// ro rnams drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// chos rnams kun la
356a6(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa'i phyir/ / thams cad yod pa'i rang bzhin can// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang // bde ba chen po spyi bor gnas// I waM rnam pa rgyu mthun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor
356a7(rgyud 'bum): lo las/ / skye bu byed pa'ang longs spyod la// bde chen 'khor lor dri med nyid// rgyu mthun la sogs rab dbye bas// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// las/
356b1(rgyud 'bum): la bcom ldan shes rab brjod// gang zhig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas brtan brjod// chos ni ngag las byung ba'i phyir// 'khor lor thams cad yod par smra// gang zhig
356b2(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa kun bkur phyir/ / longs spyod 'khor lo kun bkur nyid// gang zhig bde chen mgor gnas phyir// bde chen 'khor lor dge 'dun tshe// sde bsku zhes brjod pa ste// lto ba gnas su brjod par
356b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / skye gnas 'dod chags bral ba nyid// mngal gyi phru ma chos gos te// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// de bzhin sngags
356b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas a dang haM sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid/ / gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs// 'di rnams rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med// zla ba bcu yang sa rnams te/
356b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go// btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du// khu ba zhes bya rnam par gnas// de med pas na bde med 'gyur// bde ba spangs na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas
356b6(rgyud 'bum): lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba/ / de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min// de nyid dngos med tshul yang min// zhal phyag rnam pas gzugs can nyid// mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun
356b7(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig skyes/ / lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni// lha yi gzugs kyis rnal 'dra
357a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bags chags phal pas so// de skad lha mos bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor kun gyi gong na med// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag
357a2(rgyud 'bum): med ma la sogs pa lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/ spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / skul byed ma dang / ri khrod ma shing lo can dang / bog zhal ma
357a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sdom pa ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur cing brgyal ba dang / skrag par gyur to// de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs
357a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi tshogs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bslang du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen
357a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad bslang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on
357a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs/ / de bsal bas ni sangs rgyas nyid// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu/ gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa// btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur//
357a7(rgyud 'bum): rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni// de yi de nyid yongs su gcod// dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des// dug gis dug ni 'bigs par
357b1(rgyud 'bum): byed/ ji ltar rlung gis zin de la// ma shwa'i bza' ba sbyin par bya// bzlog pa'i sman ni brtags pa las// rlung gis rlung ni bsnun par byed// so sor rtog las rnam rtog dang // srid pa nyid kyis
357b2(rgyud 'bum): srid dag byed/ / ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa// chu gzhan gyis ni dgug par bya// de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang // rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa la// yang ni
357b3(rgyud 'bum): me yis gdung bar bya/ / de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa// 'dod chags ma yis gdung bar bya// skye bo mi bzad pa yi las// gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de
357b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis/ / srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// 'dod chags kyis ni 'jig rten 'ching // 'dod chags kyis ni rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis
357b5(rgyud 'bum): mi shwe/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las// kun tu ru la lnga ru 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig pu nyid// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la sbyar bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags kyi//
357b6(rgyud 'bum): sra bi gti mug chos yin phyir// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod// grang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid// gsher ba chu yi khams su brjod// chu ni mi bskyod ngo bo'i phyir// zhe sdang
357b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa mi bskyod pa/ / gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// rtag tu drod ni skye bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// kak+ko lar ni gang
358a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig sems/ / de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can// don yod rlung las 'byung ba'i phyir// phrag dog don yod grub pa yin// bde ba 'dod chags sems yin te// rin chem thag
358a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dod chags nyid/ / ser sna nam mkha' lngas byung ba// nam mkha' ser sna rdo rje yin// sems can chen po gcig nyid las// lnga yi gzugs kyis mtshon pa nyid// rigs ni lnga po skyes
358a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / de la stong phrag du ma nyid// de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog tu phan pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yis// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// gong+gA'i
358a4(rgyud 'bum): klung ni bcu yi bye ma snyed/ / rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs chen lnga ni rigs ni du ma rnams// de rnams rigs las brgya phrag du ma rnams// de rnams la yang 'bum
358a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag rigs chen rnams/ / bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams// zhes bka' stsal to// 'drir
358a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ ci gong bu'i gzugs tsam du'ang chung ba de snyed kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye ma'i lam ni gcig pu la// sangs rgyas du ma dog min cing // gzir
358a7(rgyud 'bum): min stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha/ / bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag gi ni// sdum par ston mo bzhes par 'tshal// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rigs kyi bu// yang dag byung ba bka' stsal pa// yang
358b1(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni/ / bshad par bya yi sa lha mo nyon// gsang ba la ni sa yi khams// mchog la de bzhin du ni chu// dgyes pa la ni me ru bshad// thams cad bdag nyid rlung la gnas//
358b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bzhugs par 'dod pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa bdag/ yang na me long lta bu'i tshul// de bzhin du yang mnyam pa nyid// so sor rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin// de bzhin bya ba nan tan la// rtag
358b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhugs par brjod pa 'di/ / shin tu rnam dag rang bzhin can// de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad nyid// gzhan yang mi bskyod pa nyid dang // yang ni rin chen 'byung gnas la// yang na 'od dpag med
358b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / gang tshe rtag bzhugs don yod la// bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu dngos// thig le'i gzugs te yid lta bu// shin tu rnam dag ye shes cher// lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje sems dpa'
358b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes byar bshad/ / bde ba dam pa ru ni brjod// rang byung ngo bo 'di nyid ni// chos kyi skur ni rab tu grags// de yi shes rab lhan cig skyes// de phyir gnas pa'i gzugs can ma// las kyi rlung gis
358b6(rgyud 'bum): bskul ba yi/ / lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// bdag med ma zhes rnam par bshad// dpyid kyi thig le nyid du brjod// sgra yi rtse mo brgya stong lus// glog gi zer ma mnyam pa'i bod// lha yi rnam
358b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dus su ni/ / ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse bug nas// phyogs bcur rnam par phyung nas ni// kun tu lha dang lha min bsdigs// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lor ni// bsregs nas longs spyod 'khor lor song //
359a1(rgyud 'bum): sna yi bu ga g.yas pa nas// thams cad du ni phyung nas ni// mdzod spur song bdag gis kyang // bug pas nges par phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi//
359a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu ga g.yon par ni// zhugs nas spyi gtsug 'khor lor ni// kun bsdigs rnam par phyung nas ni// sngar gsungs nyid kyi bug pa nas// yang ni spyi gtsug zhugs par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni ba
359a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / dga' ba de nas bskyed par bya// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor phyin nas ni// snga ma bzhin du gnas par 'gyur// yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i rgyud chen po las byung ba dpyid kyi thig le zhes bya ba'i
359a4(rgyud 'bum): brtag pa'i rgyal po ste drug pa'o/ / / ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// dgongs pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi// rnal 'byor ma yi rtag dam tshig/
359a5(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos la sogs mi shis pa// dgod dang lta ba dag gis kyang // 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis sogs// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa// bcom
359a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan nges par gsung du gsol/ / dgongs pa'i skad ni skad chen por// dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru// rdo rje snying po nges bshad kyis// de nyid rtse gcig sems kyis nyon// ma da na chung ba la sha/
359a7(rgyud 'bum): 'du ba ma la ya dza nyid// 'gro ba khe Da ro ni shrab// rus pa'i rgyan ni Ni raM su// 'ong ba phreM ka na ru brjod// cang te'u kri pi da ru brjod// skal med du du ra zhes bshad// skal ldan ka liny+dza rar brjod//
359b1(rgyud 'bum): rig min Di Di ma zhes brjod// thod pa pad+ma b+hA dza na// bza' ba tri pi ta zhes bya// tshod ma mA la tInad+ha naM// bshang ba tsa tu sa ma brjod// gci ba kra s+phA ri zhes brjod// rang byung si h+lar shes par bya/
359b2(rgyud 'bum): bu ba ga pur brjod par bya// sha chen shA li dza zhes brjod// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// rdo rje bo la zhes brjod do// pad+me kak+ko la zhes zer// mu li ser mo kha ru bcug pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan
359b3(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / g+ho glu thal mo spyi bor yang dag bzhag/ mar me ma yi mtshan ma'o// g+hu g+h+raM mthe bong rgan po bcangs pa ni/ 'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// mu glu lag pas rna brdebs pa ni// g.yo ldan ma yi
359b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma nyid/ / lu g+h+r-i sna rtser thal mo rdebs pa ni// dge ba'i gtam ni 'dri ba'o// draSh+Ta ri dag sa bog ston pa// rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan mar mtshon// ra zhes bya ba skyes bur nges// Di ni bud med de
359b5(rgyud 'bum): nas brjod/ / pu zhes bya bar rengs pa nyid// su ni de bzhin za ba nyid// ma zhes bya ba mem ru brjod// yo ni de bzhin chung mar nges// b+hi zhes bya ba sring mo nyid// d+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor brjod// lu zhes
359b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba bu mor nges/ / sti ni khrag tu shes par bya// sa ni zhi ba'i btung ba nyid// pheM zhes bya ba thug pa ste// phi zhes bya ba nges par bshad// b+ha zhes bya ba bza' bar brjod// b+hu zhes bya ba 'du ba nyid//
359b7(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba 'du ba nyid// bi zhes bya ba dur khrod nyid// b+hu zhes bya ba ro ru brjod// Di zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma// ga ni de bzhin lA ma nyid// s+thi zhes bya ba gzugs can ma// ku zhes bya ba mkha'
360a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ kha zhes bya ba dum skyes ma// dza zhes bya ba sbyin bzung // ga zhes bya ba lag pa gnyis// b+ha zhes bya ba gsong por smra// swa ni legs 'ongs bya ba yin/ 'di rnams ni yi
360a2(rgyud 'bum): ge re re zhing yang brda ste/ / dpa' bo dang sring mor des shes par bya'o// yi ge'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ngag gi brda ni mi 'tshal bas// bde ba chen pos
360a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad bya ba// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// po te gI zhes bya ba ni phyag go/ pra ti po taM gi zhes bya ba ni phyag gi lan no// ga mu zhes
360a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni 'gro ba zhes brjod par 'gyur ro/ / lum pa zhes bya ba ni 'ong ba nyid do// ni ga raM zhes bya ba ni byin cig ces brjod par 'gyur ro// tsun+d+ra ka zhes bya ba ni khyer cig ces brjod pa yin no// hri da ya zhes bya ba
360a5(rgyud 'bum): ni dpa' bo zhes bya ba yin no/ / kau ra ba zhes bya ba ni gsod pa zhes brjod pa yin no// kaN+Di ka zhes bya ba ni dril bu zhes brjod pa yin no// a li ka ra Na zhes bya ba ni spyi bo zhes brjod pa yin no// ba ra ha zhes
360a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni skra zhes brjod pa yin no/ / shra ba na zhes bya ba ni rna ba'o// man+t+ra zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi'o// na ra zhes bya ba ni mnyam par sbyor ba zhes brjod pa yin no// tA li kI zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// na rak+Sha
360a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro/ / a mu kaM zhes bya ba ni dur khrod do// ka khi lA zhes bya ba ni sgo'o// swa san zhes bya ba ni bramo ze'o// pa ri d+hi ni rgyal rigs sau// bai ra ti ni rje'u rigs so// kru ra zhes bya
360b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni dmangs rigs so/ / an+ta ni gdol pa'i khyim mo// a li ka li phyugs so// b+hi ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// mu da kaM ni tshil bu'o// gri ha na zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'o// dan+na s+pharu tI dzI ha zhes bya ba ni bkres
360b2(rgyud 'bum): so zhes brjod pa yin no/ / g+h+nAn+da pA ti ni zhes bya ba ni sgo'o// sA sa NaM zhes bya ba ni sred pa'o// a kaM na zhes bya ba ni gan du'o// s+pha na ta na zhes bya ba ni che ge mor ro// ki ra No ni me tog go// le bo ni 'jig pa'o//
360b3(rgyud 'bum): dan+ta ni rgod pa zhes brjod pa yin no// ni ro d+ha ni char pa'o// bi dzA p+ti ni chog par 'dzin pa'o// d+humra ni sprin no// d+hu mra pri ya dang sa nu ni ri'o// sa ri ta ni chu bo'o/ a gu l+ya ni yan lag dang nying lag go// ba da
360b4(rgyud 'bum): na ni kha'o/ / ra dzi ka ni lce'o// An+da ni so'o// baM ka te ni rgyal mtshan no// tsAn+do ni 'phreng ba'o// tsa la ni rlung ngo // mri ga pa ti ni phyugs so// man+dA la ni mnyam pa'o// sA sa ni lam gyi bzhi mdo'o//
360b5(rgyud 'bum): phal+lu sha ni skye ba'o// ma hA kAr ni phyogs chen po'o// ts+tsha ni ra'o// na zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o// go zhes bya ba ni ba glang ngo // me zhes bya ba ni ma he'o// b+hi zhes bya ba ni bza' ba'o// ha zhes bya ba ni
360b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs so/ / a d+ya ka zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i skye bu'o// s+tha zhes bya ba ni gnas so// mu kha s+phaR+sha na ni zos zhes bya ba'o// daR+sha smAR+Yan ni 'grangs so zhes bya'o// ho zhes bya ba ni gang yang rnam grangs
360b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ hi ka ni ngo tsha'o// shun+ya swarA na ni me thun gyis shig ces bya'o// u ru swaR+Ya ne ni nga lta de ltar gyis ces bya'o// ngag gi brda'i ye shes so// mnyam par drag shul dpral ba can// rtag tu
361a1(rgyud 'bum): ltung bar byed par brjod/ / dbang gi sgra stangs g.yon na gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// g.yas pa'i chal dgug pa nyid// gnyis ni steng du sbyar
361a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / dbu ma rengs pa'i lha stangs nyid// sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis// dud 'gro'i lta stangs gsad pa la// sna yi rtse mor gzugs brnyan gnyis// dbyung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed//
361a3(rgyud 'bum): bum pa yis ni dbang du byed// dgang ba yi ni dgug pa nyid// zhi ba nyid kyis rengs par byed// rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid// me tog la ni dbang du grags// rdo rje shing la dgug pa nyid//
361a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bcas rtswa la rengs byed nyid// zla drug goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'di la 'khrul par mi bya ste// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// slob
361a5(rgyud 'bum): dpon gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ / shin tu phyag 'tshal dpal ldan ni// rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor gyis// g.yas pa'i smin ma sbyar tshul gyis// nam mkhar 'gro ba'i bsgoms pas
361a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ gang zhig gnas pas 'grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i smin sgyur pha rol gyis// sde las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur// bdud kyi dpung ni gzhom pa'i phyir// de nyid kyi ni rnal
361a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyis/ / g.yon pa'i mig bskul zhes bya bas// dkar mo la sogs gzugs bsgoms pas// ngor ni rdzogs na 'grub par 'gyur// g.yas pa'i mig bskul zhes bya bas/
361b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs kyis// skyes bu'i gzugs ni rdzogs par 'gyur// ngag gi tha snyad ma gtogs par// 'jig rten rab tu grags pa yi// tha snyad du yang 'grub par
361b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de ltar yo gis 'jig rten dang // 'jig rten 'das par bsdus par 'grub// legs par bshad pa'i dngos grub bo// lta stangs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dpal ldan rdo rje sems sbyor
361b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / ji ltar dbyibs kyi sku ldan pas// 'dir ni mi yi thod par ni// yungs kar cho ga bzhin du gdab// bcos pa'i mar khu bza' byas shing // mgo bo 'bras bus de bzhin byugs// phyogs mtsha

367b3(rgyud 'bum): mar bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang / gu DU tsi ta de'i phyed kyi tshig mar 'gyur ba dang / gong du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas zhen pas brtse bar bya'o// gal te 'di de'i tshe 'bring po la ni

373b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi ni dang po dang / / bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la// chom rkun ma yis de bzhin sbyar// brgyad pa yi ni dang po nyid// rdo rje ma ni mchog tu 'dod// yi ge nyi shu bzungs nas ni// lnga pa yis ni stan du bya// /

373b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / gang zhig bzhi pa'i dang po la// dkar mo lhan cig snyoms par 'jug/ lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// de nyid la ni dkar mor sbyar// rdo rje srung ba'i sbyor ba la// rtag tu las ni rab tu sgrub/
373b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po 'jigs don du// de yi stobs ni byed par brjod// ces bka' stsal to// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT swAsgra gnyis yi ni dang po dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po la// chom rkun mas ni ma
373b7(rgyud 'bum): par gsungs/ / bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// steng du dkar mos brgyan pa nyid// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // bcu gcig pa ni de nas bzung // chom rkun mas ni spyi bor mdzes// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la//
374a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar bar bya// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // gang zhig bzhi pa'i dang po la// chom rkun ma ni mchog tu 'dod// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // ba'i ba'i dang /
374a2(rgyud 'bum): por mkha' spyod ma// spyi bo ru ni rnam par mdzes// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // bcu gcig pa la chom rkun ma// lhan cig tu ni snyoms par zhugs// rtag tu chos ni rgyas pa'i stobs// de bzhin mdzod
374a3(rgyud 'bum): ni chen por gnas/ / gsung gi rdo rje gsung ba bzhin// sngags kyi bzlas pa byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+harma hriHswA hA/ de nas bcu drug blangs nas ni// rdo rje mas ni mchog tu mdzes// mthar gnas
374a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ / de nyid la ni chom rkun sbyar// de nas lnga pa blangs nas ni// mkha' 'gro mas ni rgyas par brjod// de nas bcu drug pa bzung nas// lnga pa'i dang po stan du bya// rdo rje ma ni de la
374a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar yi ge nyi shu bdun pa bzung / / chom rkun ma ni mnyam par bsgom// gang zhig lnga pa'i dang po la// mkha' 'gro 'og gi cha la sbyar// gang zhig bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// chom rkun snying po 'od
374a6(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams ni thams cad gcig/ bran khol lta bur thams cad ni// nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// de'i skad cig la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje/
374a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa chen pos bka' stsal to// oM ni thams cad gsal bar byed// mthar ni swA hA sngags btu bya// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster/
374b1(rgyud 'bum): oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho d+ha ya k+Sho b+hU ya/ hU~M hU~M/ hraHhA ba~M ba~M/ phaT phaT/ da ha dA hA/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hUk+Sha b+hAk+ShA/ ba sa ru d+hi rA a nanA mA lA ba laM bi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na
374b2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba pAt+pa la ga Na d+hAHng+ga sarba b+h+r-i r+dz+dza ya ter+dz+dza ya/ A kan+d+ha A kar+N+Na/ hrI/ d+h+r-idz+haiM/ k+Sh+mAMSh+TaM/ nAn+da/ d+h+r-i n+ti/ ts+tsha r+thaM/ ki si~M ki mi/ si la ma mi kyi la tsi li/ d+h-i mai d+hi li/ hUM hUM phaT phaT ba sa/ rig pa
374b3(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal po yi ni sngags// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la// puk+ka sIs mdzes stong pas mnan// mthor ni swA hA sbyar bar bya// 'di
374b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'bum du bzlas pas ni/ / 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed// dang por yig 'bru'i bdag po sbyin// de nis de rjes mkha' spyod ma// mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang
374b5(rgyud 'bum): du byed/ / rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// gnyis pa'i gnyis pa bzung nas ni// stong pos mnan cing mthar swA hA// sangs rgyas kyang spyod shes rab can// dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin
374b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ / ma ning dang ni chu ma sa brgyan// stong bcas mthar ni swA hA ni// sdang bar byed pa nyid du brjod// dang por yig 'bru'i dbang phyug sbyin// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa
374b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ stong pa rdo rje mkha' 'gror ldan// mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod nyid// yang ni yig 'bru'i dbang phyug sbyin// hUM ni dmar po 'dra ba nyid// mthar ni swA hA thi ga le mchog/ dga' bzang la
375a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs 'gro rtag 'gugs/ / gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin// g+hu ni yang dag rab tu sbyar// yang ni swA hA byas nas ni// lha dang mi ni gsod par byed// brgyad pa
375a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi nang du ni/ / brgyad kyi brgyad pas rnam par brgyan// gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin// dri med mthar ni swA hA sbyar// las kyi sa bon de nas bzung // rnam snang mthar ni swA hA
375a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ thams cad du ni sgo srungs la// ma ning bzhi ni sa bon dang // de bzhin dbyangs kyi lhag ma nyid// rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// mthar ni swA hA gdon par bya// me tog mi
375a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bdug pa ma/ / dri dang de bzhin mar me nyid// gling bu ma dang pi wang ma// mu kun da dang rdza rnga ma// de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// de nas lnga
375a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun byed pa'i/ / sgrol ma'i 'byung ba bshad par bya// ut+pa la ni kha bzhi dang // mtshams su rnam par gnas pa yin// tAM ni gsum gyi mtshan ma dang // de yi lte bar cho ga yis//
375a6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas zlum po'i rnam par ni// sngags pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'di lta ste/ oM pra san+na tA re/ a mri tA mu khi am+bi ta lo tsa ne/ sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ba shang+ka ri/ s+t+rI bA pu ru
375a7(rgyud 'bum): Sho bA/ rA dzA no pA ba shaM ku ru hi swA hA/ de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yi ge dang ldan par bya ba yin no// de'i lte ba la lnga pa'i dang po zla ba byed pas brgyan pa'o// de nas 'phreng
375b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbyibs su bskor zhing mthar swA hA dang / ze 'bru la ni hriH'i nang du chud par bya'o// sngags pas 'khor lo gnyis cho ga bzhin du byas na nyi ma bdun gyis mi'i dbang po'ang dbang du byed do//
375b2(rgyud 'bum): yang na 'khor lo rtsibs bcu par pad+ma'i dbus su sngags kyi yi ge bcu rig pas lte ba la bsgrub bya nang du chud par byas na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du byed par the tshom mi za'o// 'khor lo rtsibs
375b3(rgyud 'bum): / drug pa bris nas sngags kyi yi ge drug rig pas dbus su hrIHpa shang+gu hrIHswA hA sbyar bar bya ste/ ba glang gi gi wang dang / a lak+ta dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / rang gi khrag lhan cig pas gro ga

375b7(rgyud 'bum): la 'di dag bris nas khas phub ste bzhag par byas na shin tu rengs par 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// 'khor lo ni de nyid de 'on kyang hUM dang phaT nang du gzhug par bya'o// dug dang / khrag
376a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / ske tshe lhan cig tu mi'i rus pas thod pa la bris te dur khrod du bzhag na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nyid yin mod kyi oM nang du chud par byas nas gur kum gyis gro ga la bris te
376a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog ser pos mchod par bya'o/ / yang na mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang lhan cig pas nyi ma bdun gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi yi ge dang swA hA nang du chud par byas na bsrung bar 'gyur ro// sngags
376a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi yi ge bcu po de nyid rig pas a nang du chud par byas nas/ tsan dan dkar pos ming bris te/ kham phor la me tog dkar po dri bzang pos ji ltar nus pas mchod cing mchod pa bya sanA thun gsum du
376a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / e'i dbus su a che ge mo zhes bri bar bya zhing / de'i steng dang / ngos dag dang / 'og tu hUM dang / mtshams su baM dang /

376a7(rgyud 'bum): gi gi wang ngam/ yang na a le ka ta'i khu bas gro ga la 'khor lo gcig bris shing 'dzin par byed cing / 'khor lo gzhan mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug ste/ gang la kha bltas pa de sdug par
376b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tha dad pa'i sngags ni/ oM sarba mo ha na tra re tut+tA re sarba duSh+TAM mo ha ya mo ha ya b+ha ga wa ti sarba duSh+TA na ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ gos kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa byas nas lam
376b2(rgyud 'bum): / du 'gro ba na chom rkun gyis mi tshugs so// ut+pa la la la na bdun du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang la sbyin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ut+pa las mtshan pa'i 'khor lo'o// pad+ma 'dab
376b3(rgyud 'bum): ma brgyad par gyur pa las hrIHdang shrI mchog dang ldan zhing / lte ba la hrIHwA sbyin shrI/ ba glang gi gi wang gi gro ga la bris nas 'dzin par byed na thams cad du skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro//

376b6(rgyud 'bum): oMn+d+ra n+d+ra bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ khA da khAd/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ d+hun d+hu na/ mtha mtha/ bi d+ha bi d+ha/ a mu kaM a mu ke na/ sa ha bi dwe Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sdang bar byed pa 'di ni na mgrin gyi'o// mngon spyod
376b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdzas ni ma he dang / rta'i rmig pa'i nang du bris na skad cig gis 'phrog pa dang / bgrod par dka' ba lhan cig pa'ang sdang bar byed na/ yang dman pa'i mi lta ci smos/ me'i dkyil 'khor
377a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bris nas steng dang 'og dang mtshams zung gi tshogs/ hUM ga ts+tsha hUM gaHhUM de rnams ni steng du'o// d+hU hUM hUM phaT 'og gi cha la'o// hUM gaHhUM hUM gaHhUM 'di dag phyi rol gyi spyi bor dris//
377a2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni hUM hUM gaHhUM ste/ dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / nim pa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang rdo rje'i chus dur khrod kyi ras sam/ smon pa'i ras la bris naus stob

377b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas dang g.yon du'o/ / de ltar rtse mo thams cad kyi mgor rim pas bri bar bya'o// oM mA ri ts+yai ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su'o// de ltar dbus su ni/ oM ba rA li/ oM ba rA li/ oM ba

379b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sngags 'di bri bar bya ste/ oM a mri ta bi lo ki ni/ gar+b+ha sa rak+Sha NI A kAR+Sha Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ skar ma rgyal la gur kum dang / ba glang gi gi wang gis gro
379b2(rgyud 'bum): ga la bris nas 'dzin par byed na bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor lo bum pa'i dbyibs su gyur pa'i mgrin pa ring po'i mgrin par yang u0f7fyaHde aHba yaHda yaHt+ta yaHmu yaHts+tsha yaHTa yaHya yaH
379b3(rgyud 'bum): de ltar cho gas bri bar bya ste/ dbang phyug gi gnas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi ras la khwa'i khrag gis gang gi ming nas mngon par brisan+da khwa gson pa'i mgrin pa la btags te rlung gi phyogs su btang na
379b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du skrod par byed do/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/ hUM gi de kho na nyid kyi sa bon snying por chud par byas nas rdo rjes mtshan pa rnam par
379b5(rgyud 'bum): bsams shing phyis bsgrub bya nang du chud par byas te/ gur kum dang ba glang gi gi wang gis gro ga la cho ga bzhin du bris nas 'dzin na rnal 'byor pa de'i thams cad rtag tu srung bar 'gyur
379b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / pad+ma 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi par gyur pa kun tu ri mo gsum par/ oM ts+tshi k+ShiM/ 'dis cho ga bzhin du skur ma rgyal la bris te/ de 'dzin pa'i lag pas reg na de'i bran bzhin du byed do//
379b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rdza rnga'i dbyibs su gyur pa rdo rje dang pad+mas mtshan pa/ sku rdo rje la sogs pa mdor bsdus nas phyi rol du ri mo gsum gyis bskor te/ las kyi rdo rje rab tu bsgoms pas dgra thams
380a1(rgyud 'bum): cad nges par gnon cing / las kyi cho ga mthong bas sngags kyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de'i sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-i
380a2(rgyud 'bum): sta gr-ih+Nats+tsha hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA ba ya ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM An ya ho thA ga bAn bi d+yA rA dza ya hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin ma mo bcu gnyis kyi// yi ga bar ma phyi
380a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ yan lag drug ni he ru ka/ dpa'i bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba// yi ge re re yang dag gnas// snying kha ru ni dang po nyid// gnyis pa spyi bo ru ni brjod// gsum pa spyi gtsug sbyin par ba// bzhi pa go/
380a4(rgyud 'bum): char gyur pa ste// mig la lnga par gyur pa yin// drug pa mtshon char brjod par bya// rdo rje phag mo mnyam sbyor ba// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras// 'od zer ser pos gsal bar brgyan// dbu
380a5(rgyud 'bum): skyes zla ba phyed pas mdzad/ / rus pa'i 'phreng ba nar ba dang // kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// he ru ka nyid des dran bya// ye shes sems dpa' snying bsams
380a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rab phyogs su dgod par bya'o// khro bo 'bar 'khrugs bsams nas ni// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan// bgegs bskrad phur pas btab nas ni// phyogs ni kun tu
380a7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang ni/ / lha min mi ni bsdigs par byed// de ltar go cha bgos pa ni// sum cu rtsa gsum pas mi shigs// de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang / sgo bzhi par yang dag par bri bar bya'o//
380b1(rgyud 'bum): de 'dab ma drug pa ge sar dang ldan pa gzhag par bya zhing / sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur du rnam par bri bar bya'o// lte ba la dpa' bo dgod par bya zhing / de bzhin du
380b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la mkha' 'gro ma'o/ / sgo kun tu rdo rje rtse gsum pa kha dog ser pos mtshan par bya ba dang / 'khor lo'i snying por pho nya mo dgod par bya zhing // sgo la'ang cho ga'i rim pa bzhin du'o// mchod pa
380b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po byas nas/ skar ma bzang po la brtul zhugs can gyis 'di 'dzin par byed na dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / mtshon 'phog pa la sogs pa zlog par byed de/ lha mo ngas gsungs pa
380b4(rgyud 'bum): la the tshom mi bya'o/ / skyes bu dgra las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'khor lo'o// yang na zangs kyi 'dab ma la skar ma rgyal la brko bar bya zhing / de nyid kyi sngags bsgrub bya nang du bcug cing sgo dang bral
380b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ chur bzhag cing dus gsum mchod pa byas na de nas dgra thams cad rengs par byed do// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag pas cho ga bzhin du mtsho skam po med par bcug na zhi bar byed do// /
380b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang 'khor lor gyur pa gru bzhi pa dang / sgo bzhi pa dang / rig byed de bzhin du rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// sgo la rdo rje tho ba dang / rin chen dbyig to dang / pad+ma dang / de bzhin du rdo rje ral
380b7(rgyud 'bum): gri'o/ / mtshams su thod pa dkar po la gnas pa'i ut+pal dang lcags kyu'o// de bzhin du de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa la mkhas pas yi ge dgod par bya ba yin no// de'i lte ba la sngags
381a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog 'di bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ oM pra san+na ta re/ a mri ta mu kha/ a mri ta lo tsa ne/ sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ni swA hA/ dbang gi sngags 'di bri bar bya'o// de nas gdug/
381a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'i sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba mo he ni tA re tut+tA re sarba duSh+TA naM mo ha mo ha ya mo ha ya b+ha ga wa ti sarba duSh+TA naM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de'i dbus zla ba
381a3(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / zla ba'i dbus su bzhi pa'i dang po za ba'i dbyibs su zlum po'i rnam pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su rtsi bas drug pa de nas bya'o// de nas sngags rig pas yi ge drug hri'i cho gas nang du
381a4(rgyud 'bum): chud par byas na pha rol gyi dpung thams cad las rgyal ba sgrol ma 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / 'di 'bum bzlas pas sa g.yo ba dang / rgya mtsho dang mtsho la sogs pa skam par 'gyur ba dang / dug
381a5(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsir byed par 'gyur ba dang / bdud rtsi'ang dug tu byed par 'gyur ro// gyo mo la mngon par bsngags nas steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs dang / mtshams su gtor ba byas na lha thams cad dang //
381a6(rgyud 'bum): lham yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bcings pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'phrog pa dang / klu thams cad kyi dug
381a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ / gyi mo la yongs su bzlas nas chu bo la gtor na rgyun las bzlog nas 'bab par 'gyur ro// gyo mo de nyid kyis rba rlabs rengs par byed do// steng du bltas nas stong bzlas
381b1(rgyud 'bum): na char chen po zlog par byed do/ / pha rol gyi dpung la kha bltas nas spong bzlas pa byas nas g.yul du zhugs na mtshon brgya yis bsnun kyang na ba skye bar mi 'gyur te/ mtshon gyis chod par mi 'gyur zhing
381b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / ngo mtshar du byed par 'gyur ba dang / sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul bas rtse bar 'gyur ro// bdun pa las rgyas pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa
381b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / / rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po ni// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bzlas dang bsam gtan mi 'tshal bas// sbyin sreg las cho ga ji ltar lags//
381b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yi// dgyes pa chen pos rnyed dka' bas// bka' drin gyis ni bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
381b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan las cho ga ji lta bar// bshad par bya yis lha mo nyon// bsam gtan tsam gyis sbyor bas ni// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de la dang por sa spang ba bshad par
381b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas// khengs bcas gnyis med yang dag gnas// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gyur nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad
381b7(rgyud 'bum): bsrang bar bya/ / rkang pa'i dgod pa cigasungs pa// de bzhin du ni lha rnams nyid// sbyin sreg las ni ci gsungs dang // thab khung gi ni mtshan nyid dang // de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas/
382a1(rgyud 'bum): phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba zhal gsum pa phyag drug par gyur pa bsgoms nas/ khro bo'i sprin phyung ste/ de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
382a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa la khyed rnams kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / slob dpon dang de'i slob ma rnams bsrung bar mdzad du gsol zhe
382a3(rgyud 'bum): bskul lo/ / de nas de bsdus nas nang du bcug ste/ rang gi snying khar zla ba la rigs kyi bdag po'i lte ba'i nang du hUM gnas par byas nas de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs rang gi rig ma dang / rnal
382a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma dang / bcom ldan 'das lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas dang po'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab cing / 'dod pas bskor bar byas nas
382a5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bar bya'o/ / g.yon pas dril bu sgra snyan pa dkrol bar bya'o// rkang pa'i mthil du hUM las rdo rje 'bar ba dgod par bya zhing / khro bo hUM mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis blo dang

382b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dri bas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' thos nas de
