435a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa thugs kha nas bton nas sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog dag gi srad bu lnga po de'i bdag nyid du byas te/ hUM dal gyis bsgyur zhing hUM de brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par
435a2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de ltar rdul tshon yang rnal 'byor 'di nyid du gzhug pa gsungs la/ sangs rgyas lngas byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs ji lta bar thig gdab ste/ dang por slob dpon gyis
435a3(rgyud 'bum): rdul tshon bri bar bya zhing / phyis ni slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du sngon po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ljang ku dang / ser po'i rdul tshon rnam pa lnga pa'o// gnyis pa la ni sngon po
435a4(rgyud 'bum): dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang gsum mo// 'khor lo'i ni rdul chen dkar pos 'khor lo'i lte ba sna tshogs 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pad+mar bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad chen
435a5(rgyud 'bum): po bzhugs par bya'o/ / shar la sogs pa'i re'u mig rnams su ni rtag pa la sogs pa ste/ phyogs su'o// 'khor lo'i shar la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su spyan la sogs pa'o//
435a6(rgyud 'bum): baphar ma gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su drag mo la sogs pa'i rdo rje lha mo rnams so// 'phar ma gsum pa'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
435a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa bri bar bya'o/ / shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'o// mtshams rnams ni mur dza la sogs pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// ji ltar re zhig bum pa legs par
435b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ / rtsa ba'i bum pa la ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o// bzhi pa la ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po rnams kyis so// lha thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbye bas
435b2(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi'o/ / de nas bum pa sgor gnas pa la las thams cad pa bzlas pas bsang gtor bya'o// de rnams gos la sogs pas brgyan par byas bdag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas legs pa'i rnal
435b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyis lha thams cad kyi 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid kyi nang du bsgom par bya zhing de'i nga rgyal dang ldan par bya'o/ / mchod yon gyi nye bar spyod pa yongs su bzlas nas sgo mngon par phye ste/ gnas
435b4(rgyud 'bum): ji lta bar bum pa la sogs pa rnams bzhag la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du phyung nas rang gi gnas su 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o// rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs
435b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir rang gi phyag rgya rab tu bstan pas rang gi dbang gis dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bsams nas/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rnga dang gling
435b6(rgyud 'bum): bu la sogs pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig mas thal mo sbyar bas rdo rje'i glu legs par sbyar ba gsum du brjod pas phyag 'tshal te/ tshim par bya ba'i don du gsungs
435b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/ / dngos grub kyi don du rang gis gsol ba btab nas dang po la sogs pas bskyed par bya ste/ slob ma las sna tshogs brgyan par bya'o//
436a1(rgyud 'bum): oM la sogs pas snying khar sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// thal mo sbyar ba sdigs mdzub bsdigs pa'i 'khor lo'i
436a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pas hUM brjod cing gnas lnga po thams cad du byas te/ gdong gos kyis bkab nas rdo rje lha mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas bzung ba'i me tog dang / hU~M nyid kyis gzhug cing spyi'i tsho gas bya'o//
436a3(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas byin gyis brlabs nas/ dri dang me tog la sogs pas brgyan par bya ste/ ji lta bar bum pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
436a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis mchod yon dang / phyag na bum pa bdud rtsi bzang pos bkang bas de rnams kyis dbang bskur bar blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang gos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/ rdo rje la
436a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar gyur pa dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa du ma'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa'i nye bar thod dang / 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / rdo rje ming gis
436a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba dang / gser la sogs pa'i thur mas mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal ba dang / me long blangs te rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad kyis mtshan
436a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid rnams bsgrag par bya'o/ / dbyangs kyi dang pos glegs bam dang / dang po'i rjes kyi dbyangs kyis rdo rje dril bu dang / bka'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i don du rkang pa byin gyis brla bcing lagapag /
436b1(rgyud 'bum): gri sbyin par bya ste/ deng nas bzung ste 'jig rten 'khor lo skor cig/ skyob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang dag par dmigs par bya'o// di ring nas bzung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni
436b2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig nye bar bstan nas/ bla mas yon blangs nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa byas nas hUM zhes brjod par bya'o// satwa badz+ra mu/ zhes bya bas lha'i 'khor
436b3(rgyud 'bum): lo gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ / phur pa bton nas de bzhin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid gong du gsungs pa'i lag pa nyid kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes
436b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas rang gnas nyid du khyad par 'phags par nang du bsgom par bya'o/ / hUM nyid kyis rdul tshon dbyi bar bya zhing bsdus nas chu'i nang du blugs par bya'o// khro bos khro bo gzung ba'i phyir
436b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal he ru ka 'byung ba bka' stsal pa/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu bsgrags pa yin no//
436b6(rgyud 'bum): srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i mi dge ba bcu la spyod pa dang / dam tshig nyams pa de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod de/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni dag pa'o// sgeg cing zhes bya ba la
436b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i dang ldan pa dang / zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi par// bcom ldan 'das gsungs so// yang de ltar rim pa des
437a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras pa'o// de la zhal dang po ni drag po'o// gnyis pa g.yas pa ni bde bas rab tu myos shing 'jigs par mdzad
437a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rgyab tu zhal gsum pa la ni rmad du byung ba'i bza' ba'o// g.yon du zhal sgeg pas 'o mdzad pa'o// de bzhin du steng ma'i zhal gtsigs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mdzad pa'i mchog go// zhal
437a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ye shes so// mi bskyod pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje can ni de bzhin du phyag drug pa'o// rgyas par mdzad pa'i mtsho 'byung ba ni phyag
437a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa la zhal gcig par yang bstan par bya zhing / / g.yon pa'i phrag par ni mchod phyir dag pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje dang / dril bu dang bcas pas kha T+wAM ga gnas pa'o// de'i phyag g.yas pa ba
437a5(rgyud 'bum): dan rtse gsum pa dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje su tsi ka dang 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'o// phyag g.yon pa na thod pa snying rje chen pos gang ba yongs su 'dzin pa'o// phyag rgya chen po'i phyed krung gis za ba zhes bya
437a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ni snyan mthon po la 'dug pa ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa sa la gzhag par bya ste/ de'i brlal g.yas pa'i rkang pas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis sbyor bas bkod do// de'i rkang pa'i mthil
437a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis yang g.yon pa'i brda mnyam par sbyor bar byed pa'i sbyor bas mnan par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dag pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya 'dis
437b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / g.yon pa'i brla rkang pa'i dgod pas mnyam par sbyor bar byed pas phye mar byas nas rab tu rgyas par khro bo'i sku de ni zhal steng du bsams
437b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / des bsgrub par bya ba btung bar bya'o// de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal sbeng du bsgom par bya zhing zhabs g.yas pas de bzhin du rdo rje skyil mo krung gi sbyor bas bud med thams
437b3(rgyud 'bum): cad ji ltar 'dod par blangs nas/ / brla g.yon pa bskyod pas de rnams dang mnyam par sbyor bar bya'o// yang na zhal gyi phyag rgya bsgrag par bya ste/ shar gyi re'u mig la ni dkar mo'i gdong zhi pa'o// /
437b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su chom rkun ma'i gdong ni drag mo'o// rgyab tu rab tu rmongs ma'i ni bde ba'i myos byed kyis rab tu rmongs ma'i gdong ngo // g.yon du ro langs ma'i gdong ma'o// me'i re'u mig la puk+ka
437b5(rgyud 'bum): sI ni gar gyi gdong ma'o/ / bden bral gyi re'u mig la ni gdol pa mo gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa'i sbyor bas thams cad du gus pa dang bcas pa'i gdong ma'o// rlung du g+hasma rI shi ba za ba'i
437b6(rgyud 'bum): gdong ma'o/ / dbang ldan du he ru ka lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma'o// dkar mo ni zhi ba'i lha sbyangs so// chom rkun ma ni drag mo'i lha stangs so// rab tu rmongs ma ni rab tu
437b7(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa'i lha stangs so/ / ro langs ma ni shi ba slong ba'i lha stangs so// puk+ka sI ni gar gyi lha spangs so// gdol pa mo ni steng du lta ba'o// g+hasma rI ni gdan du lta ba'o// me tog la dkar mon
438a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bsams nas/ gang la byin pa de phyag rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro// bdug pa la ni chom rkun ma'i gzugs so// chang la ni rab tu rmongs ma'i gzugs so// chu
438a2(rgyud 'bum): kha ni ro langs ma'i gzugs so/ / shing gi 'khril shing la ni puk+ka sI'o// ras la ni gtum mo'o// me la ni g+hasma rI sne/ rtse gcig pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas kun tu gnas
438a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas dkar mo de'i bsam gtan gyis kyang phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o zhes sbyar ro// de ltar bya ba chom rkun mas snying kha nas drangs pa'i bsam gtan gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs te snying nas
438a4(rgyud 'bum): drangango / / rab tu rmongs ma'i sbyor bas bde bas rmongs shing bsgrub bya rmongs par bsam par bya ste/ de ltar bde ba rab tu sbyin pas rab tu rmongs par byed pa'o// ro langs ma'i bsam gtan gyis
438a5(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi chu yis gtor bas shi ba slong bar byed do/ / puk+ka sI'i rnal 'byor gyis se gol gtogs pas gar byed do// steng du shin tu dbugs kyi bsam gtan gyis lhan cig tu gyur pas gdol
438a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mos gsod par byed do/ / gdan gyi bza' bas g+hasma rI'i bsam gtan des bza' bar byed do// dkar mos ni g.yon gyi lha stangs kyis bsgrub bya la bltas pas phyag rgyas 'debs par
438a7(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / yid kyis bsgrub bya'i snying khar zhugs te/ de'i snying gi pad+ma lag pa g.yon pas 'don cing 'gugs par byed do// chom rkun mas ni snying nas 'dren par byed do// rab tu rmongs mas
438b1(rgyud 'bum): ni yid kyis sam mngon du'o/ / byed pas bde bas rab tu rmongs par byed do// ro langs ma ni yid kyis sam/ mngon sum du 'khrud nas 'di ba slong bar byed do// puk+ka si'i rnal 'byor gyis gar byed
438b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni yid kyis bsgrub bya dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas rang gi sa gar byed do/ / yid kyis bsgrub bya dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas bde bas rmongs pa'i steng gi lha stangs byas te/ gtum mo'i rnam
438b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyis gsod par byed do/ / g+hasma rI'i rnal 'byor bsgrub bya khar bcug ste bca' zhing bza' bar bya'o// bza' bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni dgra bo thams cad shin tu rtag tu zos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/
438b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i don to// rdo rje hUM mdzad la ni 'jig rten gsum sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ming rnyed par 'gyur te/ de ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no// de nas gzhan du
438b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni mdzes pa dang / snying rje'i stobs la sogs pa'i khro bo gzhan thams cad khro bo'i ro gcig par zhen pa'o// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i gzugs kyi mtshan ci lags/ gang gi don du
438b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ lus la dam par lta ba dang / srog dang gang zag la sogs pa bdag tu 'dzin pas smras pa dang / rtag pa thams cad kyi mthar byed pa gshin rje'i rgyal po ste/ gsum byed pa de rnams
438b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis brtags pa'i 'khor lo las rgyal ba ni brtags pa thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub kyi dbang phyug yin no/ / khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba bshad par bya ste/ gang gi phyir khyab
439a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nas bzung ste/ de thams cad rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis thal bar brlag par mdzad do// 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba la 'don/
439a2(rgyud 'bum): chags chen po ni 'dod chags rdo rje ste/ de'i ngo bo can ni der brjod pa yin no// yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas 'dod chags can gyi rdo rjer 'gyur ba'i phyir dpyid lta bur me tog dri zhim pa'i
439a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang / snying po la sogs pas brgyan par bya ba'i phyir dang / me tog gi gzhu dang mda' dang ldan pa'i phyir nga ni 'dod pa'o// sku gsum mda' ni rnam dgod pa zhes bya ba ni spang leb
439a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phub kyi dbus su yuM khaM dang / oM la sogs pa gsum dgod pa dang / mda' dang lhan cig btsun mo'i spyi bor rdzas 'di rnams bsam par bya zhing 'dzag pa'i don du pad+ma'i mthar gsungs so//
439a5(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'dod pa zhu ba ni 'dod pa zhu ba lta bu'o// pad+ma zhes bya ba ni snying po ste/ e baM lha bur dbang du gyur pas 'dzag pa'o// 'di skad la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom
439a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
439a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// nyid kyi 'byung ba yang dag par bka' stsal pa/ da ni bdag la bshad
439b1(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ sna tshogs bris sku bkab pa zhes bya ba ni gdan rnams su brjod do// de rnams kyi yar 'jug pa ni don gyi rnal 'byor to// bris sku 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ro// de bas na rang 'byung
439b2(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / yang dag par rab tu gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bskyed do// zhes bya ba'i don to// pad+ma'i snod ces bya ba'i ni mi'i thod par shes par bya'o// da ni yang khyod la btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor
439b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbyibs bshad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho zang ni zlum po 'o// he ru ka'i zla ba byed pa'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs zhes bya ba'i don no// pad+ma'i rnam pa dang / rin po
439b4(rgyud 'bum): che'i rnam par shes par bya'o/ / ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dun pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / rin po che dang / ral gri'i gdan gyi dbus su sgrub pa po gang
439b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan no/ / phyi nas rta mchog gi gzugs brnyan gzhug par bya ste/ rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin no// ji ltar thob pa zhes
439b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni ji ltar rnyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ / gang nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad skyes pa nyid kyi yo byad kyis bri bar bya'o// dus ji lta bar zhes bya ba'i ni zhi bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
439b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dbus su sngan te bri bar bya'o/ / rgyas pa'i don du rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma shar na bri bar bya'o// mngon spyod kyi las rnams la nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la'o// gzhan
440a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las rnams la pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma skur na'o/ / ji ltar bde ba zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang / dbang la dus kyi nges pa yod pa ma yin no// shar dang / lho dang / byang dang /
440a2(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi phyogs su thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad du'o// yongs su gang ba'i dbang zhes bya ba ni slob dpon thams cad do// slob ma mchog 'bring tha ma kun zhes bya ba ni tha ma la ni dkyil 'khor
440a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang dang / nyin par gyi thig le'o// 'bring po la ni nya phyis kyis so// gang zhig mchog de rnams la ni sangs rgyas gcig pu'i bdag nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o// dum bu gcig pa'i mgon skyes
440a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni dum bu gcig pa dang / mgo bo'i rdo rje ni dum bu gcig pa'i mgo skyes so// dum bu gcig pa'i ni thod pa dum bu'i gcig nyid kyis dbang yang bya'o// mgo skyes zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i snod do// dum
440a5(rgyud 'bum): bubu gcig pa ni dum bu gcig pa ste/ ma gas pa dang ma chag pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rtogs par bya'o// kaM ni phung po skyong bar byed pa'i phyir thod pa'o// de bzhin du gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
440a6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / pad+ma gcig bdag de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang ngo // dpal he ru ka ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo // 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang ni nor bu'i dbang dang / der bzla
440a7(rgyud 'bum): par yang bya'o/ / rin po che phyed pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ni nor bu'i dbang du shes par bya'o// rta mchog gi'ang ngo // rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' yang
440b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / thod pa'i gdan 'di'i 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba gang zhe na/ rang bzhin nyid de'i 'grub pa rab tu 'byung bas rang bzhin las rab tu 'byung ba'i nus pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa
440b2(rgyud 'bum): skabs med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir de nyid du gyur pa'i rab tu byung bas de'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa'o/ / thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin las zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las de ltar
440b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin no/ / dper na me ni tshe ba'i rang bzhin du grub pa ste/ de ltar de'i yang rab tu 'byung ba nyid las rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir de nyid kyi bzang po'i bsam pa'i rnal 'byor byas na ye shes
440b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang lhan cig gcig pa'i dngos pos de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtogs par bya'o/ / rang gi snying kha'i zla bar hUM zlos bris nas de brjod par bya ste/
440b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o// de nyid kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid do// de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga par hUM thos yang sgom mo// der de bzhin
440b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad bcug cing / der yang rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas bkug ste pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol ba dang / ji ltar spyan ma la sogs pa'i sprul par yang bzhugs par bya'o/
440b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i don to// de ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang rang gi rigs kyi 'byung ba'i sbyor ba blta bar bya ste/ 'dis ni yang rab tu sbyor bas gang zhig de rnams skye ba de ni nyi ma dang bla ba 'byung
441a1(rgyud 'bum): ba lta bu'o/ / phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid las yi ge lngar 'gyur ba'i phyir lha mo thams cad gnyis las skyes pa dang rdzogs pa'o// las thams cad rab tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i tshe
441a2(rgyud 'bum): ga'o/ / la la zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'o// rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems so// byang chub tu btab pa'i sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'a'o// de'i spyod pa ni byang chub kyi
441a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa ste/ ji ltar sems dpa' yang dag par rnyed nas rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'o// rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don thams cad grub par byed pa'i ming po gsum gyi
441a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis gnas pa'i tshul gyis dang / sems can gyi don byed de/ de nyid sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'gyur zhing / rdul dang / mun pa dang / snying stobs kyang sems can gyi don du 'gyur te/ gang zhig
441a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pa de ni kun tu bzang po'o/ / de bas na byang chub kyi spyod pa 'di ni ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no// khab nas gsal bar 'byung ba'am zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don
441a6(rgyud 'bum): duskyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs pa ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po nga'i nyi zer gyi rdul ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams so//
441a7(rgyud 'bum): de rnams kyi rdul ni dpe byad bzang po rnams so// gsal bar gyur pa de gang zhe na/ gsal ba ni khyad par du yon tan la sogs pa 'dzin pa ste/ byang chub rin po'i mchod pa ni de rnams kyi tshogs
441b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis yongs sa su bskor ba'o/ / bdud kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slu ba ni skyes pa'i bdud de/ nyan thos dang rang byang chub kyi sems gsod pa'i phyir ni bdud ni 'dod chags rdo rje
441b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan zhing bdud las rgyal bar kha cig tu shAkya thub par gyur pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa tshar gcad pa'i phyir thar pa rnam par
441b3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'o/ / 'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gang zag tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'dzin pa tshar gcad pa'i phyir de ltar chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs
441b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ji ltar gyur pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir thar pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yin te/ 'di'i don du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'o// bdag tu lta ba
441b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'dod chags rnam pa thams cad dang / de'i rnam par dag pa ste/ de kho na la bdag mi dmigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir de'i don du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbab
441b6(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi rgyal po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yin no/ / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams thams cad kyi mthar thug pa la 'khor lo dam pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa'i mchog ni lha'i 'khor lo dam pa'o//
441b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ yang na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa zhes bya ba la 'du ba ni tshogs pa'o// bde ba can zhes bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ldan te/ rigs kyi bu bde ba can gyi khams lnga
442a1(rgyud 'bum): bu'o/ / dper na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pas brgyan pa'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpal
442a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med pas bskor bas/ de ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu ste/ de'i don du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sgrol ba po 'byung ba yin no//
442a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pas ser sna spang ba'i phyir don dam par rnam par dag pa de'i don du ser sna can gyi sems can rnams 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i
442a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyis shin tu sbyin pa la sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ / nyi ma lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o// nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las
442a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po bskyed pa'i phyir gang gi'i di ni de de bzhin du gsungs so/ / dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du
442a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs par gsol ba 'debs pa de rnams kyi bsam pa de rab tu sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa skong bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la glang po la
442a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa rin po che bdun gyi rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa zhes bya ba ni rin po che bdun gyi char 'bab pa'o/ / de'i don du sgrol ma ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no// shin tu/
442b1(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus dman pa zhes bya ba ni le lo la sogs pa'o// stobs kyi rnal 'byor ni drag po'i rnal 'byor ro// de bas na stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dag pa ni drag shul gyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam
442b2(rgyud 'bum): pabapar dag pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas ni de'i don du stobs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par dag pas rta mchog 'byung ba yin te/ rta mgrin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to// dpung pa bzhi dang lag pa bzhi zhes
442b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba 'di ni phyag brgyad pa lta bu'o/ / zhabs bzhi zhes bya ba ni g.yon brkyang ba'i sbyor ba'o// de nas g.yas pa'i zhabs gcig gis ni mi'i dngos grub ma dang dpal mo mnan to// gnyis pas ni lba
442b4(rgyud 'bum): mo sha tsi dang dga' ma mnan pa'o/ / g.yon gyi dang pos ni mig gsum pa dang khyab 'jug go// gnyis pas ni tshangs pa dang 'dod lha mnan nas bzhugs so// dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu
442b5(rgyud 'bum): m chog gis ni 'jig rten gsum po lha chen po la sogs pa de rnams bsdus nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par btul ba zhig rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis 'jig rten gsum
442b6(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad bsgral nas/ de'i dkyil 'khor du lha chen pos bla ma la dka' ba zlog ma yon du phul nas phyung ba ni rim pa ji lta bar gru bzhi sgo bzhi par thig gdab par bya zhing sgeg mo la sogs pas yongs
442b7(rgyud 'bum): su gang ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ / dkyil 'khor gyi tshad gang gis thig gdab par bya ba zhe na/ nang du khru gang zhes bya ba ni dbus su'ang khru gang ste/ phyi rol du khru gang nyid dang / 'phar ma gsum pa
443a1(rgyud 'bum): khru gnyis pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zlum po yin no// zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum
443a2(rgyud 'bum): bo sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to/ / da ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sgom pa bshad par bya ste/ de la re zhig dang por tshul bzhin
443a3(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro/ / rmongs pa las bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni lus la tshul bzhin ma yin pa sgom pa te/ de yongs su
443a4(rgyud 'bum): brtags pas gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jug pa'o/ / de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal te/
443a5(rgyud 'bum): de dang lhan cig zag pa med pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi sdug bsngal gang zhig lta ba'i phyir tshor ba ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyir te yong su brtag pas kun 'byung gi bden pa la 'jug go/ bdag gis
443a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni sems de yongs su brtags pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa la 'jug go/ / bdag tu lta ba gcod pas rtogs pa'i phyir chos la rtogs pas gang zhig kun nas
443a7(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i phyir lam gyi bden pa la 'jug pa'o// de ltar dang por bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
443b1(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa rnam par gzhag par bya ste/ de nas yang dag par spong ba'i sgom pa yongs su shes la/ gang gi phyir mthun pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad du de rtogs na brtson
443b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grus rnam pa bzhi po 'di rab tu rtsom mo/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgoms pas mthun pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su shes nas mthun pa'i phyogs
443b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi yang dag par rab tu rtsom ste/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang
443b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir zhes rgyas par gong du gsungs so/ / las nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni de la don thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir/ skyon lnga spang ba dang / 'du byed brgyad brten pas de'i phyir
443b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su shes pas brtson 'grus kyi bsgom pas sems gnas pa'i las nyid do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni don thams cad yang dag par 'phel ba'i rgyu'i phyir gnas pa ni 'dir sems kyi ting
443b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin du rig par bya'o/ / de nas yang dag par spong ba'i mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de'ang las nyid do// skyon lnga spang ba dang / 'du byed brgyad bsgoms pas rig par bya'o// skyon lnga gang lags/ bcom
443b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la le lo dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bying ba dang / rgod pa nyid do// mngon 'dus ma byas pa dang / de nas mngon par 'du bya ba
444a1(rgyud 'bum): skyon lnga spang bar lnga po 'di rnams brjod do/ / de la bying ba dang rgod pas skyon gcig byed de/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa bying ba dang rgod pa 'jug pa'i dus su skyon no// mngon par//
444a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dus byas pas rab tu zhi ba la 'di rnams spang ba'i phyir ji ltar spang zhing 'du byed brgyad rnam por gzhagacig ce na/ bzhi yis le le snang ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba dang / dang po dang / shin tu sbyan/
444a3(rgyud 'bum): pa de rnams yang rim pa ji lta bar rig par bya'o// gnas dang de nas gnas pa dang / de'i mtshan ma dang / 'bras bu nyid de/ gnas ni 'dun pa'o// gnas pa ni rtsol ba'o// de'i gnas 'dur ba'o
444a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma ni dad pa ste/ yid ches pa dang / dang ba dang / 'dod pa'o// de'i gnas pa rtsol ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis khyad par rtogs
444a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / lhag ma spong ba'i 'du byed bzhi ni dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / sems dpa' dang / btang snyoms te/ grangs ji lta bar skyon bzhi'i gnyen po'i phyogs so// de'ang dran pa la sogs
444a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa de bzhin du rig par bya ste/ dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas bying ba dang rgod pa rjes su rtogs par bya zhing / de nyid kyi mngon par 'du byed pa zhi ba la shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ngo // dran
444a7(rgyud 'bum): par migs pa na rmugs pa med pas shes bzhin te/ rmugs pa med par gyur na bying ba dang rgod pa rtogs so// ma rtogs pa de rtogs par bya ba'i don du mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems kyis bying ba
444b1(rgyud 'bum): dang rgod pa zhi ba la dam pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i sems kyi btang snyoms so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mthar dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po de rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ji ltar dgod ce na/ thar
444b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cha dang ldan pa gang zhig 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag po dang / dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas brjod pa med pa'i bdag po'o// bdag po zhes bya ba na sgyur bar byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi
444b3(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i las ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o/ / thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'dun pa'i bdag po dang / rab tu sbyor ba'i bdag po dang / dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pa'i bdag po dang / brjed
444b4(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i bdag po dang / rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag po ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po rnams rig par bya'o// de la za ba po dang bza' bar bya bas stong pa bka'
444b5(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ nang gi skye mched rnams nas brtsams te/ phyi rol gyi bza' ba stong pa nyid dang / de'i lus kyi za ba po dang / bza' ba dag gang zhig byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus de'i stong pa nyid la'ang lta
444b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing skyo bas 'du byed spong bar byed de/ dge ba mi zad pa dang / gang yang khyad par du bltas pas nang dang phyi rol stong pa nyid du gsungs so// rab tu gnas pa'i dngos po snod kyi 'jig rten rgyas pa'i
444b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir de stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsungs so/ / de'ang nang gi skye mched rnams la sogs pa gang gis stong pa nyid mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi de'i stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//
445a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar don dam pa'i rnam pas mthong ba'i de'i spyong pa nyid ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyid do// de'i don du'ang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu spyod do// de'i spong ba nyid kyi don ji ltar 'tshal bar
445a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba gnyis 'thob don du dge ba'i 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas gnyis so// rtag tu sems can la phan pa'i phyir dang /
445a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can la shin tu phan pa'i don du 'khor ba mi spang ba'i phyir de'i phyir stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba stong pa nyid du pa mthong bas skyo ste/ 'khor ba
445a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spong bar byed do/ / gang yang dge ba mi zad par khyad par du lta bas mya ngan las 'das par yang mi byed cing / de'i stong pa nyid spong bar yang mi byed de/ 'di ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
445a5(rgyud 'bum): do/ / rigs kyang rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ rigs ni rang bzhin te// ngo bo nyid do// mtshan dang dpe byad thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas
445a6(rgyud 'bum): par thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu spyod do// khyad par gyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyong ba'i phyir re
445a7(rgyud 'bum): zhig stong pa nyid bcu bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o/ / yang 'dir stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos dang gang zag gi don dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de/ de'i phyir de las byung ba don dam pa'i dngos po
445b1(rgyud 'bum): ni der de stong pa nyid dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang gang zag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las byung ba'i gcig pa'i dngos po'o// der ji skad gsungs pa'i zab mo la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug
445b2(rgyud 'bum): tu mtshan nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhung gnyis su stong pa nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ chos dang gang zag la yang dag par
445b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa de'i stong pa nyid ji snyed pa yongs su spang ba'i don du rim pa ji lta ba de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye bar shes par bya'o/ / ji ltar bsgrub par rnam par shes par bya zhe na/ gal te 'di kun nas nyon mongs
445b4(rgyud 'bum): papa can du ma gyur na lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te 'di rnam par dag par ma gyur na brtsams pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// gal te chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid glo bur gyi kun nas nyon mong
445b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ma skyes pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na kun nas nyon mongs pa dngos po med pa'i phyir 'bad pa med pa nyid du sems can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas
445b6(rgyud 'bum): ma skyes pa'i yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ thar pa'i don du rtsom pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / dag pa
445b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ma dag pa nyid sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir de ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'ang ma zhi ma dag pa'ang ma yin no/ / nyon mongs pa glo bur gyi phyi lhar nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhing dag pa can ma yin/
446a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing dag pa'ang ma yin no// de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsungs so// de la spong ba nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don bsgrub pa yin no// yang gsungs pa/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen
446a2(rgyud 'bum): por mi sdug pa la sogs pa dang / zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa dang / gti mug gi gnyen por rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// de la ji ltar 'dod chags rnam par ldog ce na/ gal te de dang 'gal ba'i phyir
446a3(rgyud 'bum): ro zhe na/ yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// de bzhin du gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad
446a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'dod chags kyi ye shes ni rnyog pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom nas bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed do// 'dod chags la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang
446a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa ste/ gzhan du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'dod chags rnyed pa yin na de'i 'dod chags la sogs pa yongs su mi spong bar spyod na/ 'on te rim pa'i khyad par las yon tan gyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur
446a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ dper na ke ta ka'i me tog dri'i glang po ches zos na gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro// glang po che phal pas zos na lci ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro// de bas na de la ka ha ka'i me tog gi skyon ma
446a7(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa'ang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa la gnas pas bsam pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba la khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro// dper na 'o ma sprul la sogs pas
446b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs na dug gi dngos por 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang skyes bus 'thungs na bdud rtsi'i dngos por skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rigs kyi bu 'dod chags la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyis rang bzhin gyis
446b2(rgyud 'bum): kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir sbyor bas dngos po khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dang gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang de'i 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa
446b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ngo / / dper na ke ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par
446b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya s+tha pa ga ya d+hA ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
446b5(rgyud 'bum): phab pa/ smad nas yang bod kyi lo tsA ba gzhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rang gi ming bcug cing / gzhan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang / mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir slad
446b6(rgyud 'bum): nas yang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du
446b7(rgyud 'bum): shrI gu h+ya badz+ra han+d+ha rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// gsang ba'i 'khor lo mi gsung ba
447a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs/ / de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // gsang ba'i
447a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo shin tu zab/ / rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
447a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gsang ba zhes bya ji ltar lags// de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// de yi rdo rje ji ltar lags// de yi pad+ma ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das
447a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ / gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba'i pho brang dang po ste// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir//
447a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste// de yi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir// bzhi pa gsang ba bde skyong ste// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yin// de rnams don ni gsang ba ste// brtul bzhugs byed cing
447a6(rgyud 'bum): gtong phod che/ / e baM zab cing chags la dga'// khu ba 'dzag cing rak+ta 'bab// 'di la ston gyi gzhan la gsang // rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba// bzhi po gnas pa'i rten yin te// dper na khang rten ka ba
447a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / rgyud kyi don ni rgyun yin no// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sel ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// re re'i dbye bas ma 'tshal
447b1(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / 'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du lhung // 'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi bzad pas// bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug/ 'dab ma'i grangs
447b2(rgyud 'bum): ni nyis 'gyur ro/ / rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes// gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis// brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no// rig pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga// rigs ni me tog lta bu'o// b+ha ga rab 'bring
447b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum yin te/ / rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snum gyi ril bu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo la bskus la// gzhang kha nas ni phye mas 'dug/ gsang ba nas kyang snum gyis bdug
447b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rnal 'byor pho 'am mos/ / rtsa de sor mos legs par btsal// ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas// sor brgyad par ni gar gnas pa// shes rab b+ha ga che chung dang // de bzhin b+ha ga grang dro dang // chu
447b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams che zhing bde ba chung / / de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// b+ha ga chen bde ba chung // b+ha ga chen chung ngu bya// chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs// grang na de bzhin bsgo bar bya// chu rnams chen chung bar
447b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ 'di 'dra'i b+ha ga gang la yod// bud med 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das// thabs kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang // ring ba dang ni thung ba ste// shes rang ji bzhin thabs la'o//
447b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi gnas su gzung bar bya// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// e baM rnam pa'i
448a1(rgyud 'bum): dbus gang du/ / bde ba'i khyad par 'tshol ba la// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu dben pa'i gnas btsal la// bza' ba bcud
448a2(rgyud 'bum): can sna tshogs dang / / btung ba zhim po mang po dang // gur kum la sogs dri zhim dang // shin tu 'jam pa'i snyan bting la// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// dri zhim thig le re re bya// rnal 'byor pa yi
448a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas lnga ru/ / de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya// de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs// e las gru gsum gting ring bsam// de yi nang du paM las ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam// de yi dbus
448a4(rgyud 'bum): su 'khor lo bsam/ / 'khor lo'i dbus su reg mi bzod// de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang // hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// oM las rdo rje mgo bor bsam// phaT las rdo rje b+ha ga bsam// de nas bde ba'i stan
448a5(rgyud 'bum): thog tu/ / sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa dgu 'am/ chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byugs// bde ba skye ba'i zas zos nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nA
448a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / thabs kyis gnas dgur 'o yang bya// shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya// thabs kyis shes rab pad+ma la// 'o byas pad+ma rgyas su gzhug/ shes rab kyis kyang de bzhin no// chags pa skye ba'i
448a7(rgyud 'bum): rtags 'byung ste/ / de nas gcig gis gcig la byud nas// he ru ka dang phag mor bsam// shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas// thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyod nas// nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir//
448b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ma la rtags gsum 'byung // lus 'dar 'phar ba sku yi rtags// mi bzod skad 'don dag gi rtags// shes pa rgyal ba thugs kyi rtags// de la ngo bor bshad pa'i phyir// 'di ni gsang
448b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ / 'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong // nad kyi zug rngu thams cad 'joms// 'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la
448b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sbyin sreg la sogs bya ba min// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'di ni// kun gyis thob par mi 'gyur te// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis bya// glegs bam gsang ba'i gnas su sba// yongs su smin
448b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ / 'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la sba// gsang ba ston pa'i bla ma ni// sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu// gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas
448b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / lnga bcu nas bzung stong gi bar// rnal 'byor ma kun bde med kyang // sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyod byas nas// bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor pas//
448b6(rgyud 'bum): rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skye// shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab ma// thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
448b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma ni gsang la bstan// lha mos gsol pa/ gsang ba bsten pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ming sring tshul lam rje 'bangs tshul// pha spang tshul la
449a1(rgyud 'bum): mkhan slob tshul/ / gzhan gyis mi rig ngo tsha bsrungs// dben pa'i gnas su sbyor ba bya// gal te ma bsnyen dam tshig nyams// tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar lhung // lha mos gsol
449a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bcom ldan 'das/ / thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// bde ba khyab med ji ltar lags// phyag rgya ma bsten ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bde ba la gnas
449a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i don/ / khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor dang // snyan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste// 'dod chags bsam pa yang mi bya// gal te de 'dra bsten
449a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / 'jig rten phal pa'i 'dod chags te// shi nas mnar med dmyal bar skye// 'dod chags spyod pa shal ma ri// lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa// ya ra la 'dzeg cing mar la 'bab/
449a5(rgyud 'bum): thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba 'bod// de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bsten// sbyor thabs las ni bde ba skye// de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba thabs med lus zungs nyams// rlung mkhri/
449a6(rgyud 'bum): bad kan kun nas skye// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu bsten// phyag rgya ma bsten dam tshig nyams// phyag rgya bsten pa'i dus su yang // rnal 'byor ming sring brda yis mtshon// gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa
449a7(rgyud 'bum): ma'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin/ / sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang // mthe bong drang por ston pa dang // de bzhin srin lag drang por ston// rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes bya// de ltar
449b1(rgyud 'bum): ma byas dam tshig nyams/ / brda yi bye brag ma lus pa// sa pu Ta ru shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje pad+ma dga' ba'i gnas// de ru gzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das
449b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ / de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab kyis dbugs dang shes pas gzung // dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas gzung // sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru gzung // gcig ni sbom po khra mos
449b3(rgyud 'bum): gzung / / gzung ba'i brten ni rnam pa bzhi// man ngag can gyis shes par bya// gal te de ru ma yin na// 'khor bar srung bas rang gis su// ting nge 'dzin gyis de la bsdu// lce yis byang chub
449b4(rgyud 'bum): sems blangs la/ / ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' zhig gis// thabs kyis bskyod pa
449b5(rgyud 'bum): 'ba' zhig gis/ / rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma// bde ba khyad par med dam ci// bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod/
449b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis kyang // de las bde ba khyad par 'phags// dper na dar dang snal ma bzhin// thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong // shes rab dar gyi sham bu tsam// de phyir rnal
449b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma yi rgyud/ / rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang // khrus dang srung
450a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa/ / gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste// ye shes lha yi sdes dang bral// de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / mkha'
450a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tshom yongs su zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i ros gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i
450a3(rgyud 'bum): yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / / gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
450a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / paN+Di ta rat+na badz+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar
450a5(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshin+da tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/
450a6(rgyud 'bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub se/ sa dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs
450a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba
450b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa ji ltar lags/ / de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang /
450b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhes pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bum dbang dang 'brel ba'i// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brten par sgom pa ni// snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams// spong phyir nga yis
450b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ / de yi khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong nyid la sogs pa// rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// rten dang brten pa'i bye brag la// dang po rten gyi dgod pa yang // thugs
450b4(rgyud 'bum): kha'i yi ge hUM las ni/ / mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po'i e 'phros pas// gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam// gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dug gsum 'jom
450b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dgongs pa'i don/ / logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te// lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab//
450b6(rgyud 'bum): dephyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas// gzhing ring ba ru dgongs pas bshad// de nas
450b7(rgyud 'bum): thugs kha'i hUM las yang / / hUM 'phros pa las rdo rjer gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang // dang po che yi bar chod dang // gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chod de/ bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi ma
451a1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs dang nang gi bgegs/ / phyi yi tshe yi bar chod byed// nang gis thar pa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis bsrung bas// rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don// maM
451a2(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra/ / dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang // mi rtog pa ni skye ba la// dbang du byed pas dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang // chos rnams
451a3(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum gnas pa yi/ / dgongs pa yin pa'ang nga yis gsungs// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don// baM las chu yi dkyil
451a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor te/ / zlum po spros pa zhi bar gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de steng ri rab rtse mo
451a5(rgyud 'bum): brgya da/ / rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// re re'i bye brag rnam rtog yang /
451a6(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas// shing rnams rim bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog mi dge bcu yi don// 'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dgod//
451a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus dang ngag gis sems can gyi// don
451b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad phyir ni char sprin mdog/ nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang // snyan nas brgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang // bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs
451b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad de/ / rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi dngos// yongs su gyur pas rnam snang sku// phyi nas bltas pas nang du gsal// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru gsal// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin
451b3(rgyud 'bum): chen sna lnga spu lnga'i don/ / kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// ka ba brgyad ni
451b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam thar brgyad/ / gdung bzhi ye shes bzhi yi don// hA ra Na la sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad+ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skye/
451b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad+ma'i gdan// de stang nyi ma zla ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda// dang por ro ni nga bdag gam// rnam rtog 'joms
451b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir gsungs pa yin/ / yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gdan// 'khor la re re gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil 'khor
451b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'o/ / de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung brdzus pa'i tshul// dper na chu gnyid las ni nya// rkyen las skye ba drod gsher tshul// dper
452a1(rgyud 'bum): na nyi mas pad+ma bzhin/ / spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las byung mngal skyes tshul// ya ra la bsreg cing mar la gso// dper na s+tha//
452a2(rgyud 'bum): tshotshil las ni lugs// pho brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs// rjes su skyed pa he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod pa don yod grub pa'o//
452a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med// yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa'am sgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i steng // rab kyis yongs
452a4(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs pa yi/ / sgom pa'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs// 'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin// mtha' ma dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum cu rtsa bdun
452a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par sgom/ / 'bring po yis kyang de bzhin te// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag
452a6(rgyud 'bum): bdun/ / 'di yis bstan pa shin tu zab// gong du gsungs pa thams cad kyang // rnam pa bani ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshul ni shin tu zab// phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don//
452a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// phyi la ltos nas nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don// las su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// nang du dkyil
452b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po skye mched khams rnams la// re re lha ru byin brlabs la// lnga 'am drug gam sum cu bdun// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya//
452b2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba'i// yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar lags// bskyed pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil
452b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / / thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar lags// lha spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag rgyu//
452b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i// rgyu ni gtso bor gyur pa yin// he ru kar gyur gcig la yang // rgyu rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs// /
452b5(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyu nor pa las ma yin te// gro las nas kyi myu gu min// ma tshang ba las ma yin te// 'bru nyams pa las myu gu med// rgyu med pa las ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog las
452b6(rgyud 'bum): nidri rgyu de rkyen med pa las med/ / nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang // lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// bskyed pa zhes ni gsung
452b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha// de yi rim par bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // khyams dang bla gab med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang du
453a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ / 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin thun bzhi ru gsungs pa yin// mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad sgom pa'i
453a2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa/ / thun dang mtshams ni mnyam par gsungs// mtshams kyi tshe na rnal 'byor pa// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis// lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas pas// mar me gcig las gnyis
453a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshul/ / mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste// rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa la// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i
453a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang 'brel ba la/ / rgyan dang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnang // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa gnang bar nga yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dang
453a5(rgyud 'bum): 'brel bas/ / gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnang // lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam tshig ste// mnar med sems
453a6(rgyud 'bum): can dmyal bar skye/ / de phyir lha med spyod pa spang // srin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o// spyod med lha 'di spang ba ste// dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing // phung sogs rnam snang la sogs pa/
453a7(rgyud 'bum): brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin// des na lha spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chen bzhengs kyang mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bdud
453b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags/ / de yi spyod pa ji ltar lags// de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung // rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
453b2(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ / bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang por phyi yi bdud rtsi bsten// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga ni dgod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag/ si h+la mi bskyod lud skam
453b3(rgyud 'bum): blang / / bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ he ru ka dang rnam snang dang // lud skam snying po blang bar bya// yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo // brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la// thams cad bzang po'i dus su
453b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / seng ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzang // lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni sha yi sgrub pa'i rten// glang po glang po chen po ste// ke ha ke yi rgyu nyid la// gla rtsi la sogs 'byung
453b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sha/ / ba glang gi wang ldan pa'i sha// rta ni rtswa yi rgyal po ste// kha dog dkar min dmar ba min// dbyi bas dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha// mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha// lus ngag yid la mkhas pas
453b6(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ bza' ba'i snod ni dum bu gcig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan ma ni// 'bar dang dud pa spro ba rnams// mtshan ma phyi yi yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni rgas
453b7(rgyud 'bum): chen sel/ / skad ma phyin na dngos grub med// skad phyung bas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin// dril can bu ga dgu lam nas// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru
454a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gang bsre/ / a ba d+hU tI dbugs chud pas// steng gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin// sih+la ga pur dbus na gnas// 'og gi drug pargyu ba yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste//
454a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rigs su 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug
454a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin/ / las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas// lnga pa goms par gyur pa ya si//
454a4(rgyud 'bum): drug pa gzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni dbus su gzhug/ lte ba'i gnas nas dbugs gnas pa// steng gi drug pa zin pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang
454a5(rgyud 'bum): du ma ste/ / sred pa med cing yang ba'o// 'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du// nam mkhar 'phur zhing lhung ba med// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'og gi drug pa yin par bshad//
454a6(rgyud 'bum): gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// dril can bu ga 'gag par byed// rgyan gyis dang po zhe sdang bajoms// dur khrod chen po sih+la ling // runy+dza 'dul ba
454a7(rgyud 'bum): rim pa'o/ / bdud rtsis rnam rtog la sogs 'joms// 'phrin las bzhi ni thun mong yin// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdo rje snying po yang gsol ba// drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu// gang
454b1(rgyud 'bum): zag mchog ni ji lta bu/ / 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni// lnga pa nam mkha'
454b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba yin/ / lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung // bde chen
454b3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin med par dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang // bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis// lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa sgom// dper na zangs kyi dngos po la// gser 'gyur rtsi
454b4(rgyud 'bum): yi nus pa yis/ / zangs nyid gser du 'gyur ba ste// zangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang // lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// nyin zhag
454b5(rgyud 'bum): dus drug dus gnyis la/ / skad cig re tsam drug la 'byung // las dang po yi spyod yul min// dper na chu yi snod nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig gzhag pa// chu ru nyams su myong ba las// gcig
454b6(rgyud 'bum): shos nyams su myong ba med/ / chu la brten nas bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros bcas lnga pa la// brten nas spros med drug pa 'byung // rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs//
454b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad dam// sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan// las kyi phyag rgya yongs su spangs// ye shes phyag rgya la gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'di ni gang zag mchog yin
455a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ / 'di yis drug pa zin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa/
455a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don// dang po lha yi nga rgyal bya// mkha' 'gro rtsa ru shes par bya// dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes// 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang // de nas bsgrub bya shes par
455a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshad// bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad yin te// sor gsum la ni 'khor lo re// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// dbang gi gnas dang

455b1(rgyud 'bum): lI ni nyi shu bzhi/ / 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag gzhan du spel zhing 'phyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i

455b7(rgyud 'bum): las g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi cha/ / bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi//

456a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi las ni zung / / sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyad kyis grangs su sbas pa'o// gzhang kha rlung
456a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rlung las sbas/ / gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas// 'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi// phyi ru srog gi rnam par 'khyud// chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen
456a4(rgyud 'bum): / por ro gcig 'gyur// lte bar rol pa bde chen sku// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byud ldan// snying la chos kyi sku yin te// rnam thar la sogs de bzhin no// mgrin pa longs spyod

456b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab dgu yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lo ni// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yi stong phrag bdun cu

459b7(rgyud 'bum): bdun ldan chen po yin/ / gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// dge ba shes rab ye shes te// de nyid spong bas dge slong yin// bdun dang ldan pas
460a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po yin/ / chen po 'di gsum bye zag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang // theg pa dman par ldog pa ni// spong ba gsum ni go rims bzhin/
460a2(rgyud 'bum): theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing // rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// cha lugs su ni gnas byas la// dbang bskur rab gnas la sos
460a3(rgyud 'bum): byA/ theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par ma gsungs te// dper na rdo las zangs su 'gyur// zangs las gser gyi rnam pa ste// zangs kyi dus na rdo med de// gser du gyur pas rdo mi sna
460a4(rgyud 'bum): rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la/ / so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// de nas gsang ba bzhi po yang // bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste// rtag tu
460a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid/ / gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas ni// bsgom bya lhan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas te bsgom par bya// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi// dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te//
460a6(rgyud 'bum): sems nyid bsam du med pas na// cir yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems nyid stong par bcug nas su// stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i// rtog pa bcom pas
460a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' ltar 'gyur/ / rten yod ma yin brten pa med// dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas gcod pa bka' stsal pa// khro tshul gar
460b1(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya rnams/ / sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsgoms// dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang sbas dang mthar
460b2(rgyud 'bum): thug gi/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas// sgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med/ gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gshe// rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'de bas// rdo rje spun tshig slob ma 'phya// rtsa ba
460b3(rgyud 'bum): yan lag dam tshig nyams/ / bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo yi// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i don mo tshogs// lcags gro sor ni bcu drug po/ 'dzeg
460b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ru ni nga yis bshad/ / gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par// sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis// thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rnga'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pa
460b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor/ / shes pas rang gis rang rig dang // rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang // rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa// rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang // dbyings dang ye shes la sogs pa// lta ba'i don nyid 'chad
460b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo rgyu yi rgyud// gsang ba sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba bde sbyong 'bras bu'i rgyud// bum pa rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud du
460b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye ba rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma do ni 'bras bu'i rgyud// rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te// rgyal po gsang ba ston
461a1(rgyud 'bum): paste/ / gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum dbang las ni dang por gsang // gsang ba bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye shes gsang bar gsang // rang rig shes
461a2(rgyud 'bum): rab ye shes gsang / / gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang // mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
461a3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur
461a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / rgya ga skad du/ shrI tsaklas par gu h+yA a tsin+ma tan+na r+yAH/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor ma sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis
461a5(rgyud 'bum): khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
461a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po
461a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi// de yi rang bzhin ji sta du// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
461b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / bslu ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar snang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// bsam gyis
461b2(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab sems nyid kyi/ / dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang // dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag dang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // gnas pa'i tshad dang rim pa dag/ gtso bos bdag la bshad
461b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag chags nyon mongs ye shes kun// rigs drug rtswa shing 'khril lcug gi/ rang bzhin dag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus
461b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo yin/ / bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// rtag chad skye'i'agag la sogs pa'i// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig ci// gdod nas spros thab
461b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba nyid/ / de don bsam gyis mi khyab des// de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// dang por rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang lam rtags bsam mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs
461b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam mi khyab/ / chos dang lha spyod bsam mi khyab// yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yi ge dam pa ste
461b7(rgyud 'bum): khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/ / skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// yi ge dam pa bsam mi khyab// phrag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan cha gcer bu thul gos sogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang ma dang sring mo
462a1(rgyud 'bum): bu mo sogs/ / rol ba'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yis 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas// de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab/
462a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag chad sgro skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bdar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam
462a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab pa/ / lha sgom rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rang gi nam mkha'i sprin char tshul// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu 'bras
462a4(rgyud 'bum): tha da kun dang bral/ / rtsol ba rdul gyis mgos pa// sprin med mkha' ltar bcom pa yi// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sbrul sogs kyis//
462a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis// yi ge'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug sogs// bcu dag phra rab rdul gyi bar// sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug te// reg
462a6(rgyud 'bum): bya bcu gcig chos de bzhin/ / gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dang bco brgyad dang // ji snyed 'du shes yid kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyas pa'o// chos
462a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam/ / mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtags bdud rtags 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal
462b1(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos nas/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang sgro skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mtha' yi bar// mtha' yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o//
462b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang // tshig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang // zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // 'dod chags re dang sbyir ba sogs// rgyu yi dbye
462b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyas pa'o/ / sems dang nam mkha' ye shes dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// blos brtags mtshan mar snang ba dang // sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang
462b4(rgyud 'bum): rim min mos pa khyad par tshol/ / rdul tsamakhas len blos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub byed pa// gang lngar bcos kyang de mtha' ste// gang zhig mthar lhung lha ba de// rang rig gzhan rig sems
462b5(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ / kun rdzong don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rig rtog ge skam po dang // mthar lhung dbu mar khas len pa// de ni sems nyid rang rig dang // brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ mi mthun pa ma
462b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs yin te/ / de bral bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang // rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yi// rang rig ye shes chen po la// thabs dang thabs
462b7(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba 'am/ / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// rang byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang // de la sgrib pa ma yin te// nam mkha'
463a1(rgyud 'bum): la ni sprin bzhin no/ / rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su snang // rang rig sprin med nam mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtog nam mkhar mtshungs//
463a2(rgyud 'bum): sprin tshogs rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu nam ma
463a3(rgyud 'bum): lta ba la/ / sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las// nam mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te// gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam
463a4(rgyud 'bum): grol min/ / 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus ngag sam/
463a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin las// rnam par stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang
463a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin las/ / bzhi yi grangs su nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol phyin
463a7(rgyud 'bum): drug rang bzhin las/ / yul drug dbang po drug la sogs// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de// brgya sogs grangs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gzhan reg gnyis// thog ma med
463b1(rgyud 'bum): nas gnas pa ste/ / lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas// rang rig med par gzhan rig dag/ so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod// 'khor
463b2(rgyud 'bum): baspangs nas mya ngan 'das/ / kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rig pas blang dor gnyis su rtogs// de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin la brgya rtsa bcu// theg pa mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan
463b3(rgyud 'bum): thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis/ / khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba//
463b4(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum 'khor ba kun shes na// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis
463b5(rgyud 'bum): ka spangs/ / sems med nam mkha' chos nyid med// 'khrul ba med cing ma 'khrul med// theg pa med cing rim pa med// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// ye shes med cing bde ba med// mtha'
463b6(rgyud 'bum): bral dbu mar mi gnas pa/ / bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste// 'di rtogs khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsom pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin
463b7(rgyud 'bum): pas byin rlob cing / / mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas// rig 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad de bslab// rig 'dzin sa la gnas par bya// rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang //
464a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te// bco lngas yi bdag nyid las// sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs// de mi stobs/
464a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang // rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi yi rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du byas
464a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med mkha' lhar snang ba yi// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdag gi de nyid
464a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis ni/ / mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa// snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi bying
464a5(rgyud 'bum): rgod la sogs skyon/ / gal te dben par gnas pa ni// snang med mthar phyin tshad yin te// rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing sgyu ma med// bya brtsal med cing bgrod pa med// rang byung ldan
464a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis grub pa ru/ / rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa yi ched yin no// 'dod chags ra yis myos pa dang // sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang
464a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi 'khor lo gdung ba'i dus/ / bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa'o// gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi/
464b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs la rten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhin no// 'dod
464b2(rgyud 'bum): chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs/ / nyon mongs nas ni rgyu ba ste// byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no// bzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// bla ma'i
464b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal nas shes par bya/ / sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang // byams dang snying rje la sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang // bzo dang sgyu rtsal la sogs dang // bskyed rdzogs
464b4(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa'i rim pa kun/ / skye ba gcig gam du mas ni// yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// bskyed dang rdzogs sogs
464b5(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas shing / / rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod pa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// bar ma chod par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs
464b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bco brgyad de/ / mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi med dang // g.yul drug dug gsum rten pa dang // lhan cig skyes nyid sgra la rten// sa chu me rlung sgra rten mo// chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i/
464b7(rgyud 'bum): rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla mas sems gzung dang por gces// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro// sems ni
465a1(rgyud 'bum): gcod nas rang rig pa/ / gzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra dri dag bya chos// de brten sems gzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya// de bzhin
465a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / / gti mug rjes su mkhas pas gzug/ lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par sgom// bye brag sems gzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg
465a3(rgyud 'bum): chen la/ / man ngag yod pa ma yin te// lha ba spyod pa sems gzung dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal du
465a4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' spangs tsheg chung dang / / tshegs sogs pa yi khyad par dang // khyad par rnam pa bco lnga yis// rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags// kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab pa
465a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ sbyin dang byams sogs dgos pa ci// sku gnyis gzhan don gang las byung // bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas// de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin dang
465a6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa la sogs pas/ / gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang // sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas su// 'byung ba'i rkyen du nges pas na// bsam mikhya
465a7(rgyud 'bum): la mi gnas kyang / / sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab par bya// de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung // sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang // gzung dang ting 'dzin la sogs kun// sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas ma
465b1(rgyud 'bum): bsam mi khyam pa 'byung bar nges/ / de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyag/ de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor bu'i byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang // bskyed rdzos
465b2(rgyud 'bum): rim pas sems gnas nas/ / de ni sngon sbyangs 'gro can te// sems kyi yig mgo gcad pa gces// rang sems las su rung ngan// de ni byi rtags nang du ste// de las nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // mus
465b3(rgyud 'bum): la dri mad srin bu med/ / smad kar gnyer ma sogs med pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // sbyin meng mkha' ltar gang snang ba// bsam mi khyab pa'i chags yin no//
465b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de khon nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam mi khyab pa'i rgyud
465b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so/ / // paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
465b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
465b7(rgyud 'bum): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas ma
466a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' spyod dang / sa spyod dang / sa 'og na spyod ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/ dang ldan snying rjer ldan
466a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rtse gcig sems/ / lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis nas legs par nyon// mkha' 'gro khyod
