466a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nyid ni/ / nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// mkha' spyod steng sgo'i rlung yin te// sa spyod par du thig le'i sgo// sa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang po mkha'
466a4(rgyud 'bum): spyod mtshan nyid kyang / / rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog chung // kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung // mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste// zung
466a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung / / ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang // lte ba'i lus ni khyab pa ru// rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i
466a6(rgyud 'bum): rlung / / dngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyad de// thun re la ni 'pho ba gnyis// rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin// 'pho ba gcig la chu tshod gnyis// chu tshad re la dbyug gu
466a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / rlung gi dbyug gu drug cu bzhi// de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sogs// sems dang sems med 'dres pa'i rlung // rags pa dang ni phra ba la// mkhas pas
466b1(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi bzhon par bzung / / rnam rtog bzung 'dzin sems kyi na// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams
466b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' spyod rang bzhin te/ / de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang nags rnams kyi// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang // gzhol ma dang ni g.yon pa ma/
466b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas// bems po rlung gi lam yin te// dbang po mngon sum lam yin pas// sna yi ri rab gling bzhi la// nyi zla byang nub lhor rgyug gi/ thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la//
466b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pas sems ni gzung bar bya// 'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te// 'di nyid kyi ni lam gyur pa//
466b5(rgyud 'bum): rom dang ni brkyang ma'o// sbrul 'khril lta bu'i rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'gag go/ rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung /
466b6(rgyud 'bum): kun 'dar ma yi rtsa la rten// tsad+d+hi lI ni shing lta bu// rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas der 'bad de rang rig gzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin te// de nas sa
466b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod bshad bya ste/ / rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsaN+Da lI yi bye brag brtag/ dang por rang bzhin tsaN+Da lI// gnyis pa gtum mo tsaN+Da lI// gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+DA lI// de bzhin gcer bu'i tsaN+Di lI/
467a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid la yang dbye ba ste// gcer bu gtum mo shin tu gtum// yang dag gtum mo gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang // shin tu gcer du/
467a2(rgyud 'bum): gcer bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya// dbyen rnam pa bcu gnyis te// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs// gzhan skyes kyi
467a3(rgyud 'bum): nikhro mo tsam/ / phra ba de las bzlog pa'o// brgya dang nyi shu skra yi rtse// sum cu rtsa gnyis skra yi rtsa// lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum// gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom
467a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// dngas ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar// rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la// yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no// gnas
467a5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa gzhan nas shes/ / 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di la brten nas thams cad 'byung // rigs 'tshol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang // dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol pa las ni
467a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub min/ / de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod ma yi dngos grub ste// thams cad kun gyi rten yin no// sa 'og spyor ma'i rang bzhin te// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// byang chub sems ni rnam pa
467a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / dang po chos nyid sems yin te// 'di ni shes brjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa rang rig byang chub sems// dper na rkyen gyis shel sgong bzhin// gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems//
467b1(rgyud 'bum): si h+la dang ni ga pur te// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems// ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te//
467b2(rgyud 'bum): dngas snyigs las ni rim pa yin// dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing // las kyi me yis mi 'dzag par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las//
467b3(rgyud 'bum): mi shigs haM gi dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la 'tsher dang gzi mdangs snum// bde ba chen po'i skur byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la gdang ba'i rang bzhin la
467b4(rgyud 'bum): khyad par bzhi ni thun mong ste/ / 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnas shing srid pa ste// dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de phyir don dam kun rdzob
467b5(rgyud 'bum): kyisems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ / rgyu 'chol ba las dngos grub med// rkyen 'chol ba la de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// don dam sems kyi spyod yul yin// kun rdzob tshor ba bden pa'i
467b6(rgyud 'bum): yul sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te/ / rdo rje gsum sgom mi phyed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yan lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi de ni// sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don//
467b7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rkyen las sna tshogs 'byung // A li kA li ma ning dang // drug tu sbyor ba brtag par bya// sgra mtha' yi ge bsam mi
468a1(rgyud 'bum): khyab/ yan lag rnam pa gsum yin no// rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang // brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do// de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las
468a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan/ / thun mong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa dbang dang sngags su dbye// sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis// chos ni spyi dang bye brag go/ de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid
468a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// snod dang snod min bye brag kyang // bla mas legs par brtag bya ste// de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs
468a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa med/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung // bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya min rnal 'byor de lhag la/
468a5(rgyud 'bum): de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang pa de lhag la// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// shes rab snying po rtser gyur pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bsrubs shing la// gnyis med thugs kyis
468a6(rgyud 'bum): bsrubs pa las/ / bdud rtsi'i ron nyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ma bkrogs 'o ma las// 'dod
468a7(rgyud 'bum): pa gang yang 'byung ba min/ / de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi'i ro 'dra seng ge gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu pa ni nyid kyang // sku gsung
468b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi byin brlabs te/ / mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la gtad// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab bo// dam du sra zhing dam du spel// rgya las 'das na dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyis
468b2(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ / de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag/ sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// dbyibs kyang gnyis su shes par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi nang
468b3(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa mthar thug bzhi/ / rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin te// de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gyi ni tsaN+Da lI// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste//
468b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum gyis ni byin gyis brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtad// pu ru rab gtum gsang rdo rje// dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod// oM ru
468b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od ldan bsam mi khyab/ / A ru stu rtse nam mkha' mnyam// go ru brtan blo nam mkha' che// ra ru mi'u thung sku gsung thugs// de ru lang ka rin chen 'phreng // ma ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru e ra stobs
468b6(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / oM ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang // tri ru rlung shugs ye shes 'phreng // ko ru chang 'thung ye shes 'bar// ka ru sha ma zla ba'i 'phreng // la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar// ka ru rta rna nyi ma'i
468b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor/ / he ru kha kha ye shes rgyal// phre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'gro gsang // gri ru khaN+Da gsang me 'bar// so ru shon ti gsang bdud rtsi// su ru 'khor lo dur khrod brgyan// na ru shin dpa' rdo rje rgyal//
469a1(rgyud 'bum): si ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal// ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus mkha' 'gro sdom// de dag gtad do legs par spos// nang du tsaN+Da li dag ni//
469a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ni gtad pa ste// dang po gsang ba gnyis pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang // rkyen ni thams gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rang bzhin te// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin//
469a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pa// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te// bdud rtsi'i ro yi ra li las// bla ma'i
469a4(rgyud 'bum): zhal nas dngos grub blang / / yid la zung la dran par gyis// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam
469a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / / paN+Di ha ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba'o//
469a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis dz+ra
469a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// gzhan yang dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma grangs
469b1(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te/
469b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang // 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang // bdag la khyod
469b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// ldan pa de yi gnyen/
469b4(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang // kha dog dbyibs la lo rtog gis// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon
469b5(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa yi bdud yin no/ / yang dag lam ston bla ma med// zhe sdang ru trar skye ba yi// rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyas// srog
469b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni 'chi bdag bdud/ / bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas// lha yi bu yi bdud kyang bcom// log rtog du ma'i rtog pa 'gag/ des ni phung po'i bdud bcom mo// rten dang brten pa ro mnyamatha
469b7(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/ / dus min 'chi dang tshe zad pas// 'di dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te// tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi// tshe yis 'chi ba'i bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud 'joms
470a1(rgyud 'bum): bye brag ni/ / phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len// grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms so// de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems kyis lha yi
470a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud bcom ste/ / rten dang brten ni sgyu mar ldan// de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang // phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ru du ma phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon
470a3(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa yi bdud yin no/ / dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag ni// sgo gsum
470a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul par gang ston pa/ / bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ma'i cha// de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud// de nyid 'bad de bsgrubs byas kyang // 'bras bu mi 'byung sems nyon mongs// nyon
470a5(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa yi bdud yin te/ / de yis tshe yi bar chad byed// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo// de nyid sgyu mar shes pa dang // de
470a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid shes pas phung po dang / / nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dngos po'i mthar lhung skye bas 'chi// rgyu med las skyes 'chi ba ste// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rang bzhin gnas// sgyu mas 'chi bdag 'du
470a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom mo/ / tshel dbang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rab ye shes bdud bzhi yang // rtsa dang shu kra la sogs pa'i// dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud// de nyid du
470b1(rgyud 'bum): ma phung po'i bdud/ / de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin pas// kha dog dbyibs ni skyes pas 'jig/ de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag
470b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'i// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// dga' ba bzhi ni du ma ste/ rgyud la srungs pas phung po'i bdud// rang sems nyon mongs pa yi bdud// 'khor bar lhung bas skye
470b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ skye ba las byung 'chi bdag bdud// rnam par rtog pa skyes pas so// 'dod chags kyis ni 'chi bdag bdud// ma spangs sum cu drug nyid dang // nges pa sum cu rtsa drug gis// lam brten bla mas
470b4(rgyud 'bum): lha bdud bcom/ / dga' bzhi sgyu ma rang bzhin med// bde chen ror gyur phung po bcom// 'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin// rang sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo//
470b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'chi ba dang bral bas// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi// dman pa'i stobs kyis zin pa ste// rgyal po dmangs su phab pa bzhin// de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin// rgyal
470b6(rgyud 'bum): po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin/ / bzhi pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni// gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la// bzhi pa'i lam ston bla ma ni// lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// bdud gsum bla ma'i zhal las shes// snod min gsang
470b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrogs pa dang / / mar dang kha ra la sogs pa// 'thungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin// khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste// rigs ngan rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra// dbang dang gdam ngag 'brel bcas pa'i// bdud//
471a1(rgyud 'bum): 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug/ ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags// bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis// thob na de nyid dam pa ste// bla ma gcig
471a2(rgyud 'bum): la dbang thob nas/ / bla ma gcig la mnyan par bya// tha ma rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi yi bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha// bdud dang dgra yi sde rnams kun// thams cad 'jigs shing
471a3(rgyud 'bum): skrag byed pas/ / 'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal// dmigs pa lha sogs bdun dang ldan// de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de
471a4(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / thams cad rgyud la dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
471a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga yang+ga ra dang / lo nub dge slong shAkya mi shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrIk+Sha
471a6(rgyud 'bum): yabAk+tsit+ta tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mtshon gyur la ni yang dag gnas/
471a7(rgyud 'bum): mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo yin// thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te// sangs
471b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI/ / dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mos// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsol// rgyud kyi don la rab goms shing // smra ba'i tshig gis ma rmongs shing // gzhan gyi rtsod pas mi rdzi yang // dbang dang man
471b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag ma thob par/ / dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs// sngags spyod ngal ba don med de// shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir gtso bos dbang gsum gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol//
471b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// dang por bum dbang rim pa yang // gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa btsal// bkra shis yid dga' shin tu snum// bkra shis bya rnams skad snyan sgrogs// dpag bsam shing
471b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas yod par 'dod/ / gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs dag la sogs pa ru// sa bdag sa yi lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gyis// sa bslang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs/
471b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas dang po bsnyen pa dbul// bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring tha// mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra// grangs ni stong dang khri
471b6(rgyud 'bum): dang 'bum/ / dus ni bco lnga bcu gsum dang // bdun du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams bsnyen pas mnyes byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin bya//
471b7(rgyud 'bum): bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi// bu mo ku sha'i phyogs mthun pa'i// ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtags// so shing rtse mor me tog dri// srung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor
472a1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par bya/ / dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'thing za// ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram// khaM bir mi sngags kyis kya //
472a2(rgyud 'bum): de la rdo rjes byab par bya// de nas ku sha la sogs la// spogs pa'i cho ga dang bcas bya// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas// bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang // dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir// rta dang
472a3(rgyud 'bum): glang po ma he dang / / rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang // spos dang mar me la sogs pa// brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// bla re rgyan dang ba dan sogs// byin brlabs tshogs bsags phyi ru dgod//
472a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// khrus dang yan lag dri yis byug/ kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrul pa las sad na// he ru kar grags chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol lam// dad
472a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bcas spro bar gyis/ / rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// rdo rje 'dzin pa dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen por lung ston pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo//
472a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol// pad+ma las byung bdag la stsol// gsang ba las byung bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag
472a7(rgyud 'bum): ni gzhug tu gsol/ / legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'jig byed pa// gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyod bcom ldan dang mtshung
472b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zil gyis mi non khyod kyis blang / / dam tshig spyod pa spyad na ni// mchog gi de nyid thang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug/ nam yang khyod kyis spang mi bya// tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam
472b2(rgyud 'bum): gtan la/ / 'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya// chang ni rtag btung khro mi bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya brten par bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la
472b3(rgyud 'bum): snabs su 'gro/ / thun mong sdom dang sems bskyed sbyin// bskor ba lan gsum phyag gsum bya// yol bas bar du gcad nas ni// mig la sogs pa lnga bkab la// lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun
472b4(rgyud 'bum): byed chu yis bsal dag bya/ / me tog dang bcas rdo rje yang // de yi snying la bzhag la bsgom// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs// lhung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya// phyi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab// sngon
472b5(rgyud 'bum): du sdig pa lan gsum dral/ / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang // rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri// lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg/ dngos grub 'phrin las so so ru// mkhas pas shes shing
472b6(rgyud 'bum): brtag par bya/ / me tog dor te lha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gtso bo'i yan lag yin// gtso bo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis// dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin// de bzhin
472b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po yis/ / mi shes pa yi rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
473a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ru bzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur/ / chu khams mi bskyod me long gis// rdo rje rigs kyi 'phrin las 'grub// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te/ mnyam nyid ye shes rang
473a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis/ / rin chen rigs kyi 'phrin las 'grub// 'od dpag med pa rdo rje'i dbang // so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+ma'i rigs kyi 'phrin las byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// bya ba nan tan ye
473a3(rgyud 'bum): shes kyis/ / 'phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo sde// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las// de bzhin nyid
473a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin/ / mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri stengs su// rig byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'joms pas rgyal mtshan bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan 'dzugs// chos kyi sku yis kun
473a5(rgyud 'bum): la khyab/ / gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsum yin te// dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang // rjes su gnang dang phyir mi ldog/ brtan par
473a6(rgyud 'bum): byed dang rnam pa lnga/ / gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thun mong yin pa rang yis gsungs// bum pa'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin/
473a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas nas// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas su//
473b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dbang gis rten gyur pa// rig ma dang po btsal bar bya// dang po shes pas brtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes pa dag par snang ba dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang /
473b2(rgyud 'bum): bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // srung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// dri yi thig le du ma bya// g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang // srub dang bsrub thabs sbyor ba dang // bsrubs las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis// lus
473b3(rgyud 'bum): kun khyab na gsang ba ru/ / dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro ma'i 'khor lor d+ha bsams la// lce de pad+mar byin brlabs te// lce yi rtse mor b+ha bsams la// si h+la ga pur
473b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pa yis/ / b+ha la gzhag ste de la bstim// sor gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyor la// dbus su mi dmigs bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje gtso mos sbyin pa dang // khro mo sbom
473b5(rgyud 'bum): pos sbyin pa dang / / rdo rje gre tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang por shes rab brtag pa ni// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad
473b6(rgyud 'bum): par lnga brtags te/ / rigs dang lang tshe longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par lnga// phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs// sems brtan rdo rje yi ni rigs// khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs//
473b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog chung ba'i rdo rje yi// lang tshe'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas brgyan shes pa ste// rdo rje'i rgyan gyi khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje'i
474a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi khyad par yin/ / chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// de yi rol longs spyod pas// rdo rje'i longs spyod khyad par ro// kun 'dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad
474a2(rgyud 'bum): par yin pa'o/ / de nyid mda' lhar mkhrang ba ni// thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro// rtsa de dmar la dngas pa dang // byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas// gnyis su med la dkar ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke
474a3(rgyud 'bum): rudar la brgyus pa ji bzhin du/ / thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tir gnyis med la// spyod thugs longs spyod khyad par ro// dang por phyi la gnyis pa nang // gsum
474a4(rgyud 'bum): pagasang ba'i brtag pa'o/ / lus brtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid brtag thugs su 'gyur ba'o// sgyu ma tsam gyi dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyab par shes par bya/
474a5(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi drug la ngag gi dun// sems kyi bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul// dang por smig rgyu chur 'khrul dang // gnyis pa smig rgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa smig rgyu mi snang bzhin// de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya//
474a6(rgyud 'bum): tshuchul bdun no mar la gcig/ dri ni bdun te sha la gnyis// sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams btsal ba'i rten gyur pa// lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gsungs// ka ra gnyis te bu ram gcig chang ni
474a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su shes par bya/ / rgyan ni bye brag sna tshogs so// dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha// zhag gcig na ni bcud dang ldan// dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang // drod dang ldan zhing bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin
474b1(rgyud 'bum): shi ba'i sha yin te/ / 'dun pa byas na dam tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman// mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gyis de bzhin no/
474b2(rgyud 'bum): bas kun gyi bcud skyed de// mngar ba kun gyis ro rtsa byed// bcud skyed sha ni gzhon nu ste// ro rtsa sha ni bco lnga yin// bcud skyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsres// chang ni mnyam
474b3(rgyud 'bum): por gsungs pa'o/ / ro rtsa ba yi sha la yang // 'o ma sgong cha mnyam par// lnga gsum lnga gnyis gtso bor bya// kha ra'i chang ngam 'o ma'am// sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya// 'di ni yan lag spros pa
474b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas mtshams gcad bsnyen pa dang // dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang // spros pa med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang bskur sngon du sgom pa'i don// dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs// rig ma
474b5(rgyud 'bum): gtad dang man ngag sbyin/ / brda rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags// rtag pa shin tu spros pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'khyud// dang po'i sbyor thags zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyan
474b6(rgyud 'bum): mgul rgyan la sogs pa/ / sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste// langs pa tsog pu gan rgyal dang // kha srub 'phred dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed
474b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste// gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste// de yi rnam smin brjod
475a1(rgyud 'bum): mi lang dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni/ / bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// yan lag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba dngos// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang /
475a2(rgyud 'bum): sman ni dang po ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa ting 'dzin yin pa ste// sngags dang sman gyis kun da drang // rked shing tshad dang gnas pa'i tshad// drang ba'i tshad rnams shes
475a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs mthun pa'i// rked shing rkeng pa'i tshad dang mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram men// gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsang ba'i pho brang gnas// skye
475a4(rgyud 'bum): mched rig par gnas pa'o/ / stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas// khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas// 'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas// he ru kar nim
475a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs shing / / rdo rje mda' yis ma brgyab pa'o// drang ba'i tshad ni sor bzhi dbyug/ dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la// sman dang snum dang dri dang gsum// sum cha sum gnyis stod smad du// lus la bsku
475a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing me la bdug/ rtse gsum rtse ni shin tu zab// ba spu ba dang lta ba dang // ra mnye ba dang nye'u shing dang // ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas// rdo rje la sogs lnga sbyar dang // gzhan yang sman dang snum dang dri//
475a7(rgyud 'bum): dar la sogs pa'i nang du blugs// sgo gnyis nas ni thi ldos 'dug/ zab pa'i sngags btab bsgoms byas nas// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan sna tshogs 'byung // tha ma'ang
475b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum mam bdun na 'byung / / dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur nas// sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya// 'di yi sdig pa bsam mi
475b2(rgyud 'bum): khyab/ / gdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa// sgor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs// bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor lo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // sku yi go bzlog sbyor
475b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / ye shes go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang /
475b4(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rtsa yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang // g.ya
475b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang / / brda yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // kun mkhyen gyis kyang ma gzigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum
475b6(rgyud 'bum): sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad par ma dpags par// zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin// dbang bskur ba yi sngon du yang // gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin/
475b7(rgyud 'bum): gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma la brten nas su// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas ni// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// si h+la ga pur shes rab ste// de yi bde ba ye shes yin// si
476a1(rgyud 'bum): h+la shes rab ces bya ste/ / ga pur ye shes su ni bshad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de yi thig le ye shes yin// la la nA ni ye shes so// ra sa nA ni shes rab ste// rtsa ni shes
476a2(rgyud 'bum): rab ces bya ste/ / byang chub sems ni ye shes so// mkha' 'gro ma ni shes rab ste// dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te// rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin// 'og ni shes rab
476a3(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ste/ / steng la ye shes su yang bshad// g.yon pa shes rab ces bya ste// g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab ces bya ste// ye shes bzhi ni ye shes yin// phyag mtshan ming dang
476a4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge rnams/ / gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang gsum// tshig la bslab pa'ang gnang ba yin// gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon par rtogs pas bsgom pa gsungs//
476a5(rgyud 'bum): / e baM ma ya'i rnam pa yang // e ni sa ste baM ni chu// ma ni me ste ya ni rlung // e ni snying rje baM ni bya mas// ma ni dga' ba ya btang snyoms// e ni spyan pa mA ma kI// ma ni gos dkar ya sgrol ma/ a ni sbyin pa baM
476a6(rgyud 'bum): / tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa ya bsam gtan// e ni phyag rgya chen po ste// baM ni dam tshig phyag rgya yin// ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste// ya ni shes rab phyag rgya'o// e ni shar te baM lho phyogs// ma ni nub sti ya byang
476a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs/ / e ni sku yi thig le ste// ba ni gsung la ma ni thugs// ya ni ye shes thig le'o// oM ni sngon po baM ljang ku// ma ni dmar po ya ser po// e ni mkha' 'gro ba lA ma// ma ni dum skyes ya gzugs can/
476b1(rgyud 'bum): e ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ste// baM ni rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste// ya ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'o// e ni 'gog pa baM ni lam// ma ni sdug bsngal ya kun 'byung // e ni bde chen
476b2(rgyud 'bum): baM longs spyod/ / ma ni chos la ya sprul pa// e ni mtshan ma baM stong pa// ma ni rnam thar ya dpe byad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// baM ni rnam par smin pa'o// ma ni rnam par nyed pa ste// ya ni rnam pa mtshan nyid
476b3(rgyud 'bum): bral/ e ni chung ngu baM 'bring po// ma ni lhag pa ya cher lhag/ e ni g.yas nas me rgyu ste// baM ni g.yon nas rlung rgyu'o// ma ni 'og nAs rlung rgyu// ya ni steng nas chu rlung rgyu// e ni gnas brtan baM phal chen/
476b4(rgyud 'bum): ma ni bku ra ba ya thams cad// e ni bsnyen pa baM nye bsnyen// ma ni sgrub pa ya sgrub chen// e ni shar lho bai lho nub// ma ni shar mtshams ya nub mtshams// a ni rgyud la baM ni sngags// ma ni ye shes yags
476b5(rgyud 'bum): ba.e ni snang ba baM snang mched/ / ma ni snang thob ya 'od gsal// e ni bdag gi bzang po yin// ba ni dus kyi bzang po yin// ma ni ye shes bzang por gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang po yin// e ni bdag gi
476b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas yin te/ / baM ni rnal 'byor gnas su bstan// ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yin te// ya ni rgyad kyi gnas yin no// e ni dga' ba baM mchog dga'// ma ni lhan cig ya dga' bral// e ni me long ba mnyam
476b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid ma ni kun rtogs ya nan tan/ / e ni chos sku baM longs spyod// ma ni sprul sku ya bde chen// e ni zhi ba baM ni dbang // ma ni rgyas pa ya gsod pa// yi ge btus pa'i sngags tshan gsum// oM ni sku yi 'khor
477a1(rgyud 'bum): lo ste/ AHni chos gsung 'khor lo'o// hUM ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// oM ni rnam snang AH'od dpag med// hUM ni mi bskyod rang bzhin no// oM ni phyag g.yon hUM ni g.yas// AHni dbus
477a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying ka yin/ oM ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te// hUM ni g.yas pa AHdbus ma// oM ni srog la hUM rtsol ba// AHni gnas par shes par bya// oM ni sku la hUM ni thugs/ A ni gsung du shes par bya// oM ni lus
477a3(rgyud 'bum): la AHni ngag/ hUM ni yid du shes par bya// oM ni thabs la hUM shes rab// AHni gnyis su med pa'o// oM ni g.yon gyi la la nA// hUM ni g.yas kyi ras nA// AHni a bad+hU ti yin// oM ni g.yas kyi ras na//
477a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM ni g.yon gyi la la nA// Ani de bzhin dbus na gnas/ oM ni ga pur hUM si hUM// A ni dkar dmar rtsa dag yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM khyad dga'// AHni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don// dga' ba lhan cig/
477a5(rgyud 'bum): skyes dgar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'gyur// rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la ni rgyu sbyor dang // rgyu la rgyu yi sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor// rgyu 'bras gnyis su
477a6(rgyud 'bum): med par sbyor/ / thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang // shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor// thangs la thabs kyis sbyor ba dang // shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor//
477a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba 'di yi dgongs pa yang // kun mkhyen gyis kyang rtogs par dka'// a ni rnam snang mi bskyod pa// na ro rin chen 'byung ldan te// bla tshes 'od dpag med pa yin// thig le don yod grub pa'o// ma ni
477b1(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs lnga rang bzhin/ / zhabs bskyed don yod grub pa ste// ba ni de bzhin 'od dpag med// ha ni rnam par snang mdzad de// zla tshes rin chen 'byung ldan yin// thig le mi bskyod rang bzhin no// zhabs
477b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed sgrol ma'i rang bzhin de/ / 'a ni gos dkar ngo bo yin// ha ni rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// zla tshe sa mA ma kI rang bzhin// thig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang // 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba
477b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga/ go rim bzhin du shes par bya// zhabs bskyed bya ba nan tan yin// 'a ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// ha ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// zla tshes so sor rtog pa'o// thig le me long ye shes so// 'di dag
477b4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi dgongs pa'i don/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // kun tu gsang zhes dpyad par dka'/ yi ge'i tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha'
477b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / paN+Di ha ga ya d+ha ra dang / lots+tsha
477b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na mA le tan+d+ha rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen 'breng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po//
477b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// rin chen 'phreng ba'i rin ma rtogs// khyed kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan
478a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / nyon cig na mo rkun parang rig// dpas ldan na mang ma sdom pas// sa gsungs ngam sa khyod lam ga// da sa pani rnam pa gsum// de mi 'greng ba /
478a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gsum// dang po snod kyi rin po che// gnyis pa bcud kyi rin po che// snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de ni rin chen gsum pa yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa gsum du gsung
478a3(rgyud 'bum): pa las/ / de rnams rin chen ji ltar lags// de yi 'phreng ba ji ltar lags// de rnams su yi spyod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po snod kyi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya//
478a4(rgyud 'bum): ka ka ru ni dkar po che// mi bskyod pa yis byin brlabs te// dbyibs ni zla gam lha bu la// ra ba ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam// 'di ni rin chen 'bar ba ste// pa dkar ra dkar lug dkar mo'i// 'o ma bsku zhing sngangs
478a5(rgyud 'bum): pab dang / / mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya// de nas spyi bor gdags pa'o// mchod pa'i bye brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang // gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni gzhan skyes sbom po tsam//
478a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rin chen dge ba ste// dngul chu rnam pa gnyis thugs la// rkyen gyi rdzas rnams tshang ba dang // kha yi nang du gzhug pa ste// ro ma'i 'khor lo lces mnan la// de nas dal gyis bskyod pa dang // gsang ba'i rdo
478a7(rgyud 'bum): rje'i sna rtse ru/ / bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa mnan// dper na sbrul gyi sha zos pa// mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'byung // de bzhin mnan pas byang chub sems// sna rtse las kyang byin
478b1(rgyud 'bum): la ldog/ til dang til mar bzhin du gnas// khyad par bde ba gyen la ste// bde ba ster phyir rin po che// de yi phye du mar bshad// tha ma skyes pa'i khro mo tsam// e ran la sogs sman lnga dang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu
478b2(rgyud 'bum): btags gyur na/ / lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang // baiDUR+Ya ni sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te// dbyibs ni sogs ka lta bu ste// rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i
478b3(rgyud 'bum): mig/ 'di ni ring chen ma gu ste// ngang pa'i sgo nga ldong ros dang // spang sha ma dang gsum sbyar nas// de gdugs rna ba g.yas su gdags// lho yi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la
478b4(rgyud 'bum): skyob/ / 'bring ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam// 'di ni rin chen e ran da// ga pur rak+ta dngul chu gsum// de yi nang blugs lce lkog tu// gyen thur gnyis ni sna dang 'jug/ de yis byang chub sems bzung ste//
478b5(rgyud 'bum): mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// tha ma bye'u sgong tshad tsam// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// ba ru ra dang ldong ros rnams// bsres te lus la rab byugs te// 'di ni d+han d+ha ka sa pu ra// lus kyi srin bu
478b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byer bar byed/ / de nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad+ma rA ga dmar po ste// dbyibs ni zlum po lta bu la// 'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te// rab ni kar sha pa Na stong // gur kum ga pur lnga sbyar la/
478b7(rgyud 'bum): de la bsku zhing byug bya'o// lte ba'i dbus su bzhag la bcing // 'di ni rat+na ke ru ra// nub kyi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// 'bring ni ka ra sha pa Na ste// 'di ni rat+na ka ra sti// mar dang sa li sbram
479a1(rgyud 'bum): dang lnga khazo ru byas pa'i dngul chu rnams/ / de yi nang blugs lte bar mnan// 'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste// chu la chu bzhag ji bzhin no// tham kar sha pa Na ste// 'bras bu gsum/
479a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ru rta dang // mar gyi snying po dang sbyar te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sba ba dang // 'di ni rat+na bde bas// sgra dkar med par byed pa'o// de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang // de ni margad ljang ku ste// dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu ste// don
479a3(rgyud 'bum): yod grub pas byin brlabs te/ / rab ni be con dbyug pa tsam// 'di ni rat+na ga ga ni/ rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// bskus la rna ba g.yon du gdags// 'di yis byang gi gdon rnams thub// 'bring ni bya mo'i sgong
479a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam/ ma hA de ba u ma de// gnyis kyi ga pur rak+ta yis// byugs la lte ba'i nang du gzhug/ ga pur si h+la gnyis ka 'dzin// tha ma gzhan skyes sgo nga tsam// ldong ros ser po gser dang gsum// mnan cha gcig
479a5(rgyud 'bum): ni byin nas ni/ / 'di ni e ru na ra ste// srin bu mi skye ba de dang ldan// 'di ni rat+na san da ha// de nas yang dag lnga pa yang // kha dog dbyibs ni du mar snang // rnam par snang mdzad byin brlabs te// de rnams so so du ma byed//
479a6(rgyud 'bum): lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs so so skye bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang nas btsal// rin chen mi 'tshal ji ltar lags// rin po che ni ji ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
479a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na/ / rin po che yi gling yod de// de yi gnas nas btsal bar bya// gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser dngul la sogs rdo rnams mi/ gser dngul kun na yod par gsung/
479b1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga// dang por rgyud rnams thams cad la// rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang // bla ma'i man ngag shes pas thob// gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes// gsum pa rgyud kyi man ngag la/
479b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes// bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po chen po des shes so// lnga pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang // rgyal po dang ni 'brel ba yi// gser ma gar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur//
479b3(rgyud 'bum): lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dang po'i man ngag ji ltar yin// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// gsum pa rgyud ni ji ltar lags// bzhi pa'i yon tan ji ltar lags// lnga pa 'brel ba ji ltar lags//
479b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po man ngag shes pa yang // rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la// yon tan du ma she pa ste// dper na rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin// chu la mi 'bying 'bigs la sogs// du ma shes
479b5(rgyud 'bum): pa man ngag yin/ / rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste// de yis thams cad shes pa yin// rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi// tshong dpon de yis shes pa yin// sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi// yon tan kun ldan rgyal po
479b6(rgyud 'bum): shes/ rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i// sa 'og gser gyi rlung pas shes// gser ma gar de yis shes pa'o// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma ste// rdo rje lam la sogs dang /
479b7(rgyud 'bum): e ran d+ha la sogs pa yi// mngon sum gtan la phab pa yin// ma hA nI la la sogs pa// gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang // tshe rnams ring ba la sogs so// dang por gdon
480a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtshan ma ni/ / mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas rten gyi mtshan ma la// de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu mig gtsang ma ru// gtor ma btang la chu gtsang blang // gser dngus/
480a2(rgyud 'bum): snod du chu blugs la// lha 'am klu'am gnod sbyin sogs// mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Dal la// rnal 'byor pa yis gzhag par bya// gom pa gsum gyis gcad par bya// g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog tu ni// chu yi nang
480a3(rgyud 'bum): du me long gzhag/ phyi ru gtor ma cha gcig gzhag/ nang du yol ba dkar pos gcad// de ru tshogs dang bkra shis gzhag/ rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang // khro
480a4(rgyud 'bum): bos drag tu mtshams gcad la/ / sbom po khro mo lha ru bsgom// de yis rin chen dang po gzung // de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du gzhug/ thub pa mi thu ba la sogs pa// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dbyibs
480a5(rgyud 'bum): dang kha dog rin po che/ / yon tan med pa ga la srid// dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na// pha med pa yang ga la srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gser dngul la sogs
480a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni bzor byas yin// rang bzhin gyis ni 'chi ba bslu// bzo byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis// gser 'gyur/
480a7(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi rgyan yin te// bdar ba'i lam ni srid lam 'gegs// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dngul la sogs pa'ang de bzhin to// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas/
480b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rin po che yin te// man ngag can gyis shes par 'gyur// de nas bcud kyi rin po che// lus kyi ri rab lhun po la// rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang // thabs dang shes rab rin po che// shes rab rtsa yi rang
480b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / thabs ni byang chub sems yin no// dmar dang dang bshes rab ste// dkar dang dang ba thabs su gsungs// a ba d+hU tI rin chen las// thig le du ma 'phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das//
480b3(rgyud 'bum): a ba d+hA tI ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a ba d+hA tI'i rang bzhin las// steng du sgo lnga yang dag gnas// bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las// yon tan
480b4(rgyud 'bum): / skyon gyi mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig le haM yin no// oM dang AHhUM ha dang bzhi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// 'bar ba bzhi ru yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che//
480b5(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi// snying kar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi// sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te// chos kyi sku ni rin chen la// stong pa bcu drug 'phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don// pad+ma rdo rje gnyis pa la// a
480b6(rgyud 'bum): ba d+hU tI rin po che/ a phaT a dang baM dang bzhi// gsang ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad// a ni ma long lta bu ste// phaT ni bya ba nan tan yin/ e ni so sor rtog pa ste// baM ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes
480b7(rgyud 'bum): ternam par thar dang stong pa dang / / mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams// a ni 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi// phaT kyi gnas su ye shes lnga// a yi gnas su snyoms 'jug dag/ baM gi gnas su lnga bcu brgyad// de kho na ru shes
481a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / k+Sha e e ta sa bon bzhi// yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyab cing shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis gdon rnams ji ltar thub// byang sems dgag pa ji
481a2(rgyud 'bum): ltar lags/ / skra dkar gnyer ma ji ltar zhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te// mtshan dang dpe byad spong ba dang // phung po lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye mched de ni lnga ru 'gyur// khams rnams
481a3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi ngo bo ste/ / de rnams rten rtsa'i ngo bo ste// rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che// byang chub sems dgag rim pa yang // g.yas brkyang bas ni thabs kyis te// g.yon gyis shes rab rtsa mdud dgag/ sa gas nam mkha' dgag par bya//
481a4(rgyud 'bum): zlum pos gsang ba'i sna rtser dgag/ la la nA dang ra sa nA/ a ba d+hU tI'i nang chud pa// de ni nam mkha' zlum po ste// dper na sbrul gyi lce gnyis la// dug dang sman ni yod pa bzhin// gzhan yang 'dug stangs bye brag gis// dgag pa'i phye
481a5(rgyud 'bum): brag shes par bya/ / 'gag pa srog dang rtsol ba'i rten// de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang // rim nas rim par gyen la drang // skad cig nas bzung lo yi bar// skra dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin 'gag/ gang la brten pa de yi tshad// lha mos
481a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ / dbus su gnas pa ji ltar lags// rim nas rim du ji ltar drang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'// shes rab ces pa chad pa'i mtha'// snyoms par zhugs
481a7(rgyud 'bum): pad bu ma'i don/ / g.yas kyi srog ni rtag pa'i mtha'// g.yon gyi rtsol bca pa'i mtha'// de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i don// rom rtag pa'i byang chub sems// brkyang ma khrag ni chad pa'o// kun d+ha ram ru gang gnas pa// de ni dbu mar/
481b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya// mchog gi dga' brtag pa'i mtha'// bral ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mtha'// lhan cig dga' ba dbu mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha' gnyis te/ A yi rnam pa dbu mar gnas/ A li kA li mtha' gnyis te// ma ni yi ge da
481b2(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ / skyes pa bud med mtha' gnyis te// ma ning gnyis su med par gsungs// 'di ni sgom pa zung du 'jug/ de ni gnas pa dbu ma'i don// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru// 'brel pa zung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang
481b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rgyud/ / snang ba zung du 'jug par gsungs// dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa ru// steng sgo dbugs la zung du 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru// si h+la ga pur zung du 'jug/ rim nas rim du dang ba yang // gsang ba'i
481b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo e la ni/ / bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa// pad+ma rdo rje 'gas pa snyam// de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas/ bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang // dang por de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sem
481b5(rgyud 'bum): ni brtan 'gyur ni/ / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// gsang ba'i sna rtse'i bar du drang // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas// de ni shes pa su yis shes// de yi brtag pa ji ltar lags//
481b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du// a ba d+hU tI'i tsan dan gnas// la la ras sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams pa thag khug par gnas// 'di rnams rang
481b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin kun la gnas/ / rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gsungs// phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa// gsang ba de bzhin mthar thug ni// man ngag yod pas shes par gsungs// brtag pa rnam pa
482a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su brtan/ / dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste// gnyis pa ngag tu shes par bya// lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis// sku ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// yan lag thung na chu yi khams// yan lag rgyas pa
482a2(rgyud 'bum): sa yi khams/ / smad zheng chen me yi khams// sna tshogs du ma nam mkha'i khams// spyi ru dkar ba chu yi khams// dmar ba me ru shes par bya// ser ba de bzhin sa yi khams// sngon rlung du shes par bya// yang na rlung gi
482a3(rgyud 'bum): khams yin te/ / drod rnams chen me yi khams// brtan pa sa yi khams su gsungs// chu khams chen chu yi khams// de rnams kun ldan nam mkha'i khams// 'jug pa bde chen sa yin te// ldog pa sprul pa chu ru gsung //
482a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rgyud ni bye brag gis// sems kyi gnas pa shes par byed// shu kra rlung la si sma ma// sbrul dang chos su sbyar ba yin// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa yin// dbyibs dag pa
482a5(rgyud 'bum): dog mtshan ma gsum/ / kun la mkhas par shes par bya// dang por dbyibs kyi brtag pa yang // dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi// gru bzhi zlum po zla ga ma dang // gru gsum du yang shes par bya// dkar po la sogs de dang
482a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ / rna ba nas bzung rkang pa'i bar// kun la brtag cing shes par bya// skad ni phra dang sbom pa dang // ring du 'don dang thung ba dang // 'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// rtags de brtag pa'i
482a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma ni/ / rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags su dang zhe sdang thugs// mun pa gsung du shes par bya// dang po 'dod chags dbye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// dbyibs dpakha dog skad
482b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum la/ / mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag/ nyin par bzhi dang mtshan par bzhi// de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams/ mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// mig 'dzum pa spu ldang la sogs// dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba dang /
482b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i gzugs ldan cung zhig dmar// sna bug dkar la sogs pa dang // skad 'dar kha ni skam la sogs// 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtags su bshad// gzhan yang 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtags// kha dog dbyibs la brtag
482b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sla phyir 'dod pa sa yi rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// gsung dang thugs la'ang shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi chen po ji ltar lags//
482b4(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba la zhen nas//
482b5(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i sa bon mi zad par// dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// chen po mi rtog rang bzhin te// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// 'dod chags zhes pa spang bya ste// de yi chen po ga
482b6(rgyud 'bum): por gsungs/ / 'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste// de yi chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten pa sku ru bstan// brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan// rnam rtog bral ba
482b7(rgyud 'bum): thugs su shes/ / rnam rtog chung zhing gtong phod che// tha ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang // bla ma yon tan kun ldan zhing // dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang / sa
483a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don la ma rmongs shing / / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// chos la ser sna med pa dang // gsal la gsong por smra ba dang // rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba dang // las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang /
483a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dang ldan bla ma ste// 'di la bkur gyi thams cad la// bsnyen cing bkur bar bya ba min// de nas rin chen gsum pa ni// gnyis med lha cig skyes pa ste// rtog bral spros pa med pa yin// de rtogs rin chen 'phreng ba'o// lha
483a3(rgyud 'bum): mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ / gab pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar min// sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gab pa zhes pa ye
483a4(rgyud 'bum): shes te/ / sum cu rtsa bdun sku gsung thugs// chos dang longs spyod sprul sku gsung // dga' ba bzhi ru mdor bsdus pa// dmigs pa'i rgyun ni gsang ba'o// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yi// sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po
483a5(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyis ma zhugs pa/ / sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis// snyoms par zhugs na 'dod pa skye// 'di ni rkun mo ma rungs pa// dper na ljon shin rtsa ba las// yal gi ma tog thams cad skyes// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags la// dug gsum
483a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs thams cad de/ / sbas pa'i gsang ba'i 'khor ba ste// gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba mnar med dmyal ba dang // dur khrod brgyad po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin
483a7(rgyud 'bum): duganas/ / mya ngan 'das pa sku gsums// skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang // 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du ni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yis su// sems can don la yang dag 'jug/ chos sku spros bral nam mkha' bzhin// sku
483b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sprin dang char lta bu/ / sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa// sems can las dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// sku gsung de nyid bani bcu'i don// dur khrod la sogs brda ru shes
483b2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda/ / rgyan ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi brda// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni// sbom po gsang ba'i rdo rje'i brda// khro mo gsang ba'i pad+ma'i brda// sku dang drang ba yon tan skyon// mdzub mo la rten mthe'u chung ni// nga yi
483b3(rgyud 'bum): gan du tshur shog yin/ / mthe bong la brten mdzub mo bar// khyod kyi gan du 'ong gis yin// mthe bong mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni// b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin// b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang // srong dam
483b4(rgyud 'bum): nam gung tho rangs gsum/ / mdzub tshigs dang po nas bzung nas// tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// lan gsum bar du nan tan gnang // gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsung
483b5(rgyud 'bum): bganas ni thabs kyi 'dug spangs so/ / nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs// zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs// de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing // 'du ba thabs ni 'ong ngo ste// shes rab 'ong ba nye 'du yin// tsAn+do thabs kyi snyan
483b6(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyan/ / shes rab de bzhin nyid ts+tshan+do// dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral// de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// kha dog de bzhin dbyibs dang yang // yan lag tshul las shes par bya// de nas lnga
483b7(rgyud 'bum): mo la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / dpal rin chen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gsang ba yang gsang ba ste rang bzhin gyis gsang ba rdzogs so//
484a1(rgyud 'bum): / khyi ma khan po rin chen rdo rje dang / lo nu ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan sa pab pa'o// slad kyis kyang dpe phyi mo la gzugs nas bcos bgo/
484a2(rgyud 'bum): @/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sa ma ya tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
484a3(rgyud 'bum): bdus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+hag la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma grangs
484a4(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/ dam tshig dang ni mi ldan na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyu med pa yi 'bras bu bzhin//
484a5(rgyud 'bum): yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro// de phyir dam tshig shin tu bsrung // sangs rgyas bla ma las thob phyir// thun mong ma yin bla ma yi// lnga bcu'i bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// thun mong brgyad dang bcu bzhi ste// de rnams nges pas shes par
484a6(rgyud 'bum): bya nga rnams spyi yi dam tshig ste/ / bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// skye mched sems dpa' sems ma yin// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la// brjed dang brnyas pa
484a7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs spong / / de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// don dam par ni rang rig ste// tshogs bsags phyir ning yis gsungs// tshor ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma yengs
484b1(rgyud 'bum): shig/ gong du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung // chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// mig la sogs pa de bzhin no// gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin bsrung // dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du mchod// brnyas
484b2(rgyud 'bum): shing gshe ba la sogs spang / / sems can pho dang mo kun la// dpa' bo dpa' mo dam tshig bsrung // bza' ba la sogs dus su yang // bdud rtsi sbyor bas dam tshig bsrung // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la// rang gi spyod dang gzhan spyod la/
484b3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i dzes// dam tshig bsrung zhing mchod pa'i phyir// lus kyi nye sdom sku yin te// ngag gi nye sdom gsung du gsungs// yid kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs/ oM gyi 'od zer dka
484b4(rgyud 'bum): po yis/ / 'dod khams dag par gyur pa ni// sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba'o// de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// bsdu ba'ang oM du shes par bya// AHni kha dog dmar po yis// gzugs khams dag pa'i gsung dam tshig/ hUM gi kha dog
484b5(rgyud 'bum): nag po yis/ / gzugs med dag pa dam tshig go// oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// AHni de bzhin mgrin par gnas// hUM ni snying kar spro dang bsdu// sku yi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyi su// 'dod khams dag pa'i dam tshig go// gsung
484b6(rgyud 'bum): gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su/ / gzugs khams dag pa'i dam tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs med dag pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM dang AHdang hUMl bsdu/ oM ni rgyu mi sku bcu gnyis// AHni
484b7(rgyud 'bum): lam gyi sku bcu gnyis/ / hUM ni 'bras bu'i sku bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// rang la ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs// mi shes pa ci ba spyor rngom pa'o//
485a1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rdzogs pa sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// bde chen snying po hUM nyid la// sku dang gsung dang thugs
485a2(rgyud 'bum): dang yang / / ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi// oM dang AHdang hUM dang yang // yan lag bzhi bzhir thub pas gsungs// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// aM dang haM gnyis rang bzhin gyi// sngags
485a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ngo bor shes par bya/ / sngags kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong // drug brgya bzlas par shes par bya// lag pa bskyod pa rang bzhin gar// rkang pa rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gnas ni dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam
485a4(rgyud 'bum): tshig bye brag yang / / 'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir// mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang // dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje pad+ma dang // ji ltar rol pa'i spyod pa kun// tha snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug
485a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni/ / rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu// theg pa che la smod pa dang // gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang // rnal 'byor kun la gnod pa dang // sems can kun la 'tshe byed pa// 'di bsad pa ni dam
485a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig yin/ / sbas pa bsrung ba'i rim pa yang // ma byin blang ba'i dam tshig ste// 'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa// 'dod chags spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra/ rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro tsa'i sha dang
485a7(rgyud 'bum): bcud kyi sha/ kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang // mar la gcig ste bo ma gnyis// gzhan ni gsum ste yan lag bcu/ 'di ltar dam tshig yin par gsungs// bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste/
485b1(rgyud 'bum): dang por yungs kar tha ma yang // byi la'i kham gyi tshul du bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gung gi thabs kyi dus// nam srod nam ni langs pa dang
485b2(rgyud 'bum): nam gyi gung ni shes rab dus/ / dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// dam tshig 'di las ma nyams na// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// mchod dang srung ba la sogs byed// gzhan
485b3(rgyud 'bum): yang gsang ba'i bye brag la/ / gsang bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lus la me dang khrag mi gdon// srog gam zug rngu'i phyir ma gtogs// srog chags 'dod pa spyod mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig bsrung phyir dben
485b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'dug/ las su rung na g.yeng bar la byam// 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gis bcu bzhi yin par gsungs// thos pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'i don// bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu
485b5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid/ / rdo rje mi phyed phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis brgyan mdzes// b+ha ga mnyam par 'jog pas so// snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// rdo rje snying po la sogs
485b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin no// baM ni bcu po'i rang bzhin te// ma ni lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// ya ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs// e ni srog chags gsod pa ste// baM ni ma byin len pa 'o
485b7(rgyud 'bum): ma ni brdzun du smra ba'o/ / ya ni 'dod chags spyod pa'o// e ni sku yi dam tshig ste// baM ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ ma ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// ya ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go// dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrung na// 'jig rten pa dang
486a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum 'gyur bas/ / rnam smin che ba rang yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra// kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur/
486a2(rgyud 'bum): bas dang // lag gis rdzas rnams mi thub cing // 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung // de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa des// dam tshig nyams pa shin tu bsam// bla ma rdo rje spun gral du// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la
486a3(rgyud 'bum): gser dngul la sogs brgya'am stong / / rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bai DUR+Ya dang man shel dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya'am stong // mar me la sogs de bzhin no// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// tshogs bsags
486a4(rgyud 'bum): pas ni nyams pa gso/ / gal te nyams pa ma gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan// gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig gam// yul dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya// 'dug na nyes pa
486a5(rgyud 'bum): bsam mi khyab/ / rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang // ril bu mig sman la sogs dang // zhi rgyas la sogs las rnams dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang // 'jig rten
486a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi/ / sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan ma gcig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dam tshig 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye 'gyur ba// rin che nas las skyes pa bzhin//
486a7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa sku gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur// de ltar bu ni med pa'i khyim// shi ma thag tu spong bar 'gyur// de bzhin dam tshig 'di me da na// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// pi wang gling
486b1(rgyud 'bum): bu sbyor kun sogs/ / rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung // de bzhin dam tshig med gyur na// sngags bzlas sgom pa la sogs pa// 'bras bu med par brlag par 'gyur// nas las nas kyi myu gu ste// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang
486b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'dir thob par gsungs pa ste/ / dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus// bstan pa gzhan min nga yis te// skye ba gzhan min pa dang ma// man ngag gzhan min sa ma ya// bzhi ni yin par gsungs pa'o// de ltar dam tshig dang
486b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ bud med 'du zhing dga' bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar bstan// nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang // rgyal po'i 'khor yul la sogs 'du// ngag ni snyan
486b4(rgyud 'bum): cing bde bar 'gyur/ / srog gcod la sogs tshig smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyis sems can bsang byas kyang // rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sku ni thob par gsungs pa'o// ngag gi
486b5(rgyud 'bum): phra ma'i tshig smras kyang / / nyes par mi 'gyur gsung thob 'gyur// yid kyis mnar sems bsam byas kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no// e ma'o rgyud ni ngo mtshar che
486b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal ma tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga yang+ga ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
486b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la tan+ta rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
487a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang / lA ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs
487a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jig rten na ni cher grags pa// dgra ni chen po drug yin te// ji ltar nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kyis//
487a3(rgyud 'bum): rta dang glang po la sogs pa// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin yul drug gi ni dgras// shes rab nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa yi mun pa la// so so'i skye bo thams
487a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis/ / ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// bde ba med pa'i gnas su skye// dgra de yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor
487a5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / klog dang sgom pa bsam gtan med// g.yeng ba'i tshes dang skar ma'i sogs// thams cad spangs te bde ba yi// stan la bdag nyid legs 'dug ste// shes rab ye shes bsrub par bya// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar//
487a6(rgyud 'bum): yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems// de dag las ni bzlog nas su// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos// ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog sreg ste bdud rtsi'i ros// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skye ba med pa'i
487a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su gzung / / de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas// mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur// de nyid las ni bzlog nas su// rang sems stong par bsgom par bya// chos la bdag med rtogs pa na// de tshe sems ni
487b1(rgyud 'bum): rtogs par 'gyur/ / thams cad stong par ros gang ste// bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// 'di la bsal ba ci yang med// bsnan par bya ba ci yang med// de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol//
487b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs lnga rigs ni brgya la sogs// de nyid 'di la tha dad med// ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni mi btsal ltar// sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyur na// rnam rtog gang yang
487b3(rgyud 'bum): mi btsal lo/ / ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la// sman nyid dug tu sbyar ta sprin// sman las dug 'byung spong ba yang // sman pa mkhas pas sbyor ba shes// gzhan yang mar dang kha ra dang // mar gyi snying po la sogs pa// 'thung
487b4(rgyud 'bum): te zhu na sman du 'gyur/ / de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang // drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// sgra ni ji bzhin ji bzhin min// dgongs pa dang ni dgongs pa min// bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtags
487b5(rgyud 'bum): nas nga yi bka'/ / blang bar bya yis mos pa'am// gzhan gyis mkhas pa 'jug mi bya// ji ltar skye bo blun po ste// dgra ru 'gyur ba'i skye bo yis// sman yin byas te dug byin na// sman du dmigs te dug zos na// zos pa'i
487b6(rgyud 'bum): rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur/ / thabs rnams thams cad sgyu mar shes// shes rab brjod du med par gsungs// ji ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis// dug ni dug gis 'byin par byed// ji ltar ma yis tshig pa la// de bzhin me yis
487b7(rgyud 'bum): gdung bar bya/ / ji ltar 'dod chags che ba la// 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// ji ltar zhe sdang che ba la// zhe sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya// de bzhin gti mug che ba la// gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya// dper na rlung ni
488a1(rgyud 'bum): mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu/ / de nyid nags sreg me yi grogs su 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod la rten pa bde ba'i yul// drug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// ril bu mig sman la sos
488a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di nyid las ni thams cad 'byung / / ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas// gzings la brten nas pha rol 'gro// pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig 'tshol bas kyang // bud med sgyu ma la brten
488a3(rgyud 'bum): he/ rang rig ye shes thob par bya// rang rig ye shes thob pa dang // bud med sgyu ma dor bar bya// zab mo'i dgongs pa ma shes shing // zab mo'i dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zab mo'i spyod pa spyod par byed// samra
488a4(rgyud 'bum): can dmyal ba chen por lhung / / ji ltar ri yi rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na// de ni ltung ba chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang dar gyi srin bu yis// rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed// mtshan mo ma yi srin bu
488a5(rgyud 'bum): yang / rang gis rang ni sreg par byed// sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol// spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi// mtshon cha mtshon byed ma yin te/ lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa yi// shwa
488a6(rgyud 'bum): rab pha rol phyin pa'o/ / dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // gang zhig brtag par byed pa ma yin te// gnas nas shin tu brtags pa ru// khru do ba
488a7(rgyud 'bum): yi maN+Dal la/ / dang po pa yi rnam lnga yis// sor gcig tsam du byug par bya// de nas dri chen dri chu yis// byugs te matog sngon po dgram// rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan// bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang dbus
488b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum/ / bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs te// gang zhig brtag pa'i mi de la// dang po mtshams gcad khrus byas te// skrag pa nag po phyir bzlog gyon// skra ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang // ber
488b2(rgyud 'bum): ka thogs te shar sgor gzhag/ tshil chen me mar shar du bstan// nub tu me long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang // dri lngas byugs te bkru bar bya// de nas me long nang du yang // gdon gyi mtshan ma
488b3(rgyud 'bum): brtag bya ste/ / gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' ru ni// gdon gyi ming dang sngags brtags na// lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan ma 'byung ba the tsom med// mi de rgyan ni tha dad de// lha la sogs mthong bye brag go/ dus
488b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byung po'i nyi ma sogs/ / mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe// de tshe gdon ni dbang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang // mdza' bshes zug rngu la sogs pa// gdon la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir// dpal
488b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs/ / brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs// bskor la mtshan ma brtag par bya// dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang // dbab po de bzhin sdig la sogs//
488b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma me long dag la ni// brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma brtag pa bla ma yi// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngung byung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rig pa las gsungs pa'i// chung
488b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bad kan mkhris pa dang / / 'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhir 'khor lor gnas pa ste// lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru// sngags pas lag pas mnye bya ste// me long dkyil du brtag byas na//
489a1(rgyud 'bum): rlung la sogs pa shes par nges// de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// dug gi brtag pa'i rim pa yang // nang khrol yan lag thams cad la// gang du dug zhugs
489a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te// mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis
489a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang // gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// gtso bo'i bzlas pa khri'am 'bum// bsnyen par byas te de nA yang //
489a4(rgyud 'bum): gser ram dngul las bzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'am// yang na 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas// rdo rje rab la sogs bya// yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga dang // rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // de
489a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bzhag ste ra ba gnas bya/ / yongs su rdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang gro ga 'am shing shun nam// dur khrod dag gi ro ras la// bsang dang bgegs bskrad tshul bzhin bya// bzlas pa gong dang 'dra ba ste/
489a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyur na// sngags kyang yongs su rdzogs par bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yos// lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug la// dpa' bo drug gi sngag
489a7(rgyud 'bum): / bris te// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par bsgom// rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung drung gi/ yi ge drug ni bris pa ste// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par bsgom// dbus su yi ge k+Sha bris te// bar chad thams cad
489b1(rgyud 'bum): bsal bar bsam/ / cho ga yongs su rdzogs bya ste// bzo byas snod ni kha dog sgyur// legs par spang ste spyi bo 'am// mgrin pa de bzhin dpung pa yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar longs spyod mnyam// sor bzhi dag tu bcing
489b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gzhan yang nad pa'am rnal 'byor pa// dag la srung na dang po yang // gdon bsal bsangs te gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas ni sum cu bdun//
489b3(rgyud 'bum): thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mtshon cha yang // tshul bzhin mthun par shes par bya// de nas snyan nam mal cha la// oM AHbadz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ bsgom mam gzhan la'ang bri bar bya//
489b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthil du gur kum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sbom po khro mo yis// spyi bo dpral ba rna ba mig/ sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang // dpung pa snying ka lte ba dang // 'og gi snod
489b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis yan lag la/ / sngags dang bcas nas legs par 'tsho// gzhan yang skud pa sna lnga la// sngags dang bcas na srung bar 'gyur// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste
489b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / / mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal te// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// srung ba'i 'khor lo de ltar ni// ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags/
489b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes kyi ni de nyid kyi// rtog pa rab tu bshad par bya// de la ye shes kyi ni gnas// rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang
490a1(rgyud 'bum): dang gsang ba che/ / nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// de la phyi yi ye shes ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan dang 'brel ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa phyi'i ye shes// nang gi phung sogs
490a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ru rtogs/ / de nyid dang bral ye shes so// de nas gsang ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig ler rtogs// rtog pa de dang bral ba ni// gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad// dga' ba mchog dang
490a3(rgyud 'bum): bral ba'i dga'/ / lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa// bde bar rtog pa rnam rtog ste// de spong rab gsang ye shes so// de nas ye shes chen po bzhi// dang po ro mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i// ye shes de nyid yod
490a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / rnam rtog spong ste de bzhin 'jog/ de nyid rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes chen po'o// de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyi// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ ye shes brtag pa'i
490a5(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas ye shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang por ro mnyam gyur pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/
490a6(rgyud 'bum): phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang // dga' dang mchog dga' bral ba dang // de la sogs pa thams cad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// de nyid gzhan rig ces bya ste//
490a7(rgyud 'bum): rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis su med par sgom pa ni// de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ ye shes chen po brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
490b1(rgyud 'bum): / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rjes su yi rang
490b2(rgyud 'bum): nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // paN+Di tag
490b3(rgyud 'bum): ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+d+ha rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes gsang
490b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub che phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi// rang lus rtsa 'khor bzhi yi gartsem mo// snying po de la yang dag phyag 'tshal lo// dbang bzhi'i
490b5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bdag la gsungs/ / nyon cig rdo rje snying po'i bdag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams kyi// de nyid dang por bshad bya ste// drug cu rtsa bani dpe byad yin// sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs// lha ni ye
490b6(rgyud 'bum): shes lnga yin te/ / dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings// phyag mtshan sku mdog gzhan nas gsungs// gu h+ya'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad// nas dang sor tshigs yin par 'dod// de nyid thabs dang shes rab yin/
490b7(rgyud 'bum): don dam nyid la dbyer med de// bsgom bya med de skom pa med// bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du med// sems kyi gzhi la sku lnga dang // ston pa med cing bstan pa med// 'jig
491a1(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam rtog kun dang bral/ / de nyid bzhi pa'i de nyid do// dang po rlung gi de nyid do// srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang haM// a ni chos rnams thog ma nas// ma skyes pa yi don yin no// haM ni
491a2(rgyud 'bum): gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong / / ldang 'jug gsum ni sku gsung thugs// semA gyi gzhi dang sku lnga dang // rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad sogs// de dag rlung gi de nyid de// de nas thig
491a3(rgyud 'bum): le'i de nyid kyang / / nyi zla thabs dang shes rab ste// sngags kyi 'phreng ba mtshan dpe yin// thig le ye shes lnga rang bzhin// gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yin// phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shes// de nas 'og
491a4(rgyud 'bum): / gi sgo dag ni// de nyid yang dag bshad bya ste// rtsa gsum sku gsung thugs ngo bo// rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yin no// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// de nyid ye shes nyi shu bzhi// chos sku'i 'phrin las nyi shu bzhi// kha sbyar
491a5(rgyud 'bum): thabs dang shes rab ste/ / 'dzag dang 'bar ba gnyis med yin// 'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste// drug ni de nyid drug yin te// sgrol ma rlung gi de nyid de// me ni gos dkar ngo bo nyid// bcu drug stong pa bcu
491a6(rgyud 'bum): drug yin/ / bzhi ni yang shes bzhi yin no// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad dang // rig sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu// ya shes lnga bcu la sogs pa// rtsa 'dab de nyid yin
491a7(rgyud 'bum): par nges/ / rtsa de gnas pa'i rim pa yang // 'khor lo ba thag khug pa las// g.yas g.yon sbrul ltar 'khril ba ste// phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu// gsum pa'i dbang gi de nyid kyang // sih+la shes rab
491b1(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings te/ / ga pur thabs kyi ye shes bzhi// rtsa ni 'og min gnas yin te// dga' ba mchog dga' byang chub phyogs// rang bzhin dga' ba chos sku ste// bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis// bcu drug
