491b2(rgyud 'bum): stong pa bcu drug go/ rgyud kyi tshul du sgyu ma tsam// gang zhig rang rig 'dod pas kyang // dang por ngo bor shes bya ste// de nas de nyid shes par bya// gal te de nyid mi shes par// zab mo'i lam nyid sgom byed na//
491b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu med cing rlag par nges// lha yi de nyid ma shes na// dur khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra// de bzhin dur khrod srin mo 'dra// spyod pa'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer gnas pa'i smyon pa 'dra// khyi phag srin
491b4(rgyud 'bum): po rak+Sha 'dra/ / phyag mtshan de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra// phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po phang gi btsun mo 'dra// rlung gi de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin spyi bo'i dud pa 'dra/
491b5(rgyud 'bum): yi de nyid ma shes na// tsan dan shing gi sbrul sogs 'dra// lus kyi gnyer ma dag dang 'dra// lus kyi dri ma chu dang 'dra// thig le'i de nyid ma shes na// tsan dan shing gi 'dzer pa 'dra// 'khor lo'i de nyid
491b6(rgyud 'bum): ma shes na/ / brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra// de bzhin srid pa'i 'khor lo 'dra// pad+ma'i de nyid ma shes na// 'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 'dra// stug po'i de nyid ma shes na// mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra// kha
491b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor de nyid ma shes na/ / thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra// gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal pho brang 'dra// byang sems de nyid ma shes na// mi gtsang sgo yi lud pa 'dra// sih+la'i de nyid
492a1(rgyud 'bum): ma shes na/ / mtshon sogs las byung khrag dang 'dra// dga' ba'i de nyid ma shes na// smad 'tshong ma yi 'dod chags 'dra// spang bya'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po
492a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ gnyen po'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer 'dra// rang rig de nyid ma shes na// 'dus byas nam mkha' stong pa 'dra// gzhan yang de nyid bco brgyad ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par
492a3(rgyud 'bum): bya thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul dang ni/ / rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu// de nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur// kye ho mgon po thugs rje che// rang rig ye shes 'chol ba la// rang dang gzhan gyi sde pa la// 'di la
492a4(rgyud 'bum): khyad par med dam ci/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyad par chen po de nyid de// gzhan ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang // de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags// chad pa bdag dang dbang phyug dang // phya dang byed
492a5(rgyud 'bum): pa po nyid las/ / rgyu sogs rgyud las khyad par 'phags// gang zag bdag dang bral ba'i phyir// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen dang // rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings// dman po rnams kyi snang bas
492a6(rgyud 'bum): khyab tu theg chen rang bzhin lha yis khyab/ / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po sogs// de nyid kyi ni khyad par che// legs par basman gyis legs par zung // de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing yi rangs par
492a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
492b1(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na mA le tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
492b2(rgyud 'bum): kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba bla na med pa yi// lta ba zhes pa gang zhig lags// spyod pa gang dang gang lags pa// gtso bos bdag la za shad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
492b3(rgyud 'bum): lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun gyis grub// rang gis ye shes dbyings na gsal// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa med// shes rab snying po rtser byung ba// lta ba kun gyi yang rtse yi// don dam rang
492b4(rgyud 'bum): rig ye shes la/ / blang ba med cing dor ba med// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// sgom pa po med bsgom bya med// dmigs med gnas su snying rje dang // dmigs med gnas su shes rab gnyis// blo dang lhan cig
492b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig gyur pa/ / nam mkha' nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgom pa min// dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab// de nyid la yang sgro mi gdags// dang por bskal par
492b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pa dang / / rang rig skad cig thob pa nyid// brgya stong la sogs char mi phod// dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus te// dper na mtsho dang rlabs rjes bzhin// dngos po bsgom pa sgom pa min// dngos dang dngos med ro
492b7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam na/ / ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// sgom dang mi sgom gnyis ka med// 'od gsal de la sems zin na// gzung 'dzin dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// dpa' bo
493a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas/ / rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spang // 'bring gis rjes thob stong par blta// tha mas rjes thob sgyu mar blta// seng ge lta bu'i lha spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par nga sri
493a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te// kun tu bzang po 'bu su ku// a ba d+hU tI gsum yin no// spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang zas// gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang // ngo bo dang ni tshad dang
493a3(rgyud 'bum): yang / thabs dang dgongs pa dgongs pa dang // mkhas pas kun la sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs dang rdo rje'i 'ogs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga/
493a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin// sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang // dkon mchog gsum ni 'dzin pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi spyod// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin// bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod// dam tshig yid 'ong
493a5(rgyud 'bum): dus bzhi ru/ / sbyin pa rnam bzhi rin chen spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin// pad+ma gar gyi spyod pa yin// dam tshig thams cad ldan pa dang // ma grol la sogs dgrol ba yin// rnga yi rgyal po'i spyod pa ni// za banya
493a6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'chag pa gsum/ / rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste// g.yeng ba g.yeng ba spong ba ni// 'bu su ku yi spyod pa'o// rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang // phyag rgya bsten dang rnam pa gsum// a ba d+hU tI'i spyod pa ste// rgyan la
493a7(rgyud 'bum): drug ste phyag rgya lnga/ / bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas// mi gtsang 'khrung pa'i spyod pa'o// gnas ni kha na mo tho med// phyi nang g.yeng med gnas yin no// rtog pa 'joms paslob pa'i dus// grub na rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i
493b1(rgyud 'bum): dus thabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang / / sgro dang skur pa med pa'o// dgongs pa mnyen pa'i stobs yin te// rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa dang // zug rngu'i kha zas ma yin te// bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten thang //
493b2(rgyud 'bum): kha zas rnam rtog chung ba yi// las dang po yis bya bar gsungs// dbye ba gsum dang bye brag ni// gong du gsungs pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog med sems de nyid// gtsang sme 'gags dang sprul pa ston// 'di nyid grub
493b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshad yin no/ / dgos pa la yang gnyis yod de// gtsang sme spangs pa'i dgos pa las// gos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang sems brtan g.yo brtag pa dang // phyag rgya khyad par 'chol ba dang // nges 'dul
493b4(rgyud 'bum): gang zag gzhug pa dang / / mi mos skur pa dag pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i lha spyod kyis// 'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs// dus dang brgyal dang 'gyel gyur pas// dbugs dbyung ba yi ting
493b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyis/ / thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas// thams cad mgrin gcig 'ad skad gsol// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa yi// lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba yi//
493b6(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa 'di yang ngo mtshar che// chos rnams spong bar ro mnyam na// lha dang mi lhag la yod// gtsang sme bdud rtsi ro gcig la// spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod// dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje
493b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod// thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas//
494a1(rgyud 'bum): @##// lhan cig skyes pa'i bsgribs g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dra can byas// zla ba rab rib sel byed de// mig gis rang gi rdul ma mthong // sems kyi de nyid
494a2(rgyud 'bum): martogs par/ / tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin// de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// bdud rtsi'i de nyid ma shes te// gtsang dang mi gtsang la
494a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs brtags/ / de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan// gnas pa'i rkyen dang g.yeng ba'i rkyen// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan// rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag
494a4(rgyud 'bum): rjes thob rgyal po bstan/ / mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// 'khrul pas gzung 'dzin gnyis su brtags// de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan// lha spyod 'di la nan tan gyis
494a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/ / phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes 'phreng brgyad kyi rgyal po lho spyod zung du 'jug pa rdzogs
